UVELE eNkantolo yeMantshi eMadadeni, eNewcastle, namuhla uthisha (53) osolwa ngokudlwengula umfundi oneminyaka engu-11 emagcekeni esikole.
Kusolwa ukuthi uthisha wadlwengula umfundi wabe esemsabisa ngokuthi uzombulala uma eke wathi vu ngalolu daba.
Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala uthe: “NgoJuni 9 nonyaka kusolwa ukuthi ingane ebisesikoleni esesiMadadeni idlwengulwe nguthisha ezindlini zangasese, wabe eseyithembisa ukuyibulala uma ike yasho ukuthi uyenzeni.”Uqhube wathi ingane ichazele unina ngokwenzekile, unina ube eseya kovula icala lokudlwengula esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseMadadeni kwaboshwa umsolwa.
UGigaba usola abasebenzisa uMngoma ngokufakaza amanga ngaye
OwayenguNgqongqoshe weziMali noMnyango wezaseKhaya uMnuz Malusi Gigaba utshele iKhomishana ephenya ngokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana, ukuthi umshado wabo omhlophe wakhokhelwa owayengunkosikazi wakhe uNorma Mngoma.
Uthe umshado wabo wakhokhelwa  uMngoma, ngakho lezi zigidi athi bazinikwa abakwaGupta kungenzeka ukuthi uyena owanikezwa zona.“Ngangazi ukuthi yena unemali.
Kwakungumsebenzi womndeni wakhe ukukhokhela umshado wethu omhlophe.
Ngakhokhela amasudi ami, abakhaphi bami bakhokhela amasudi abo ngoba bengixhasa.Uma ethi umshado waba u-R4 kuya ku-R5 million kusho ukuthi kwaba imali yakhe leyo.
Mina ngakhokhela umshado wesintu owawusekhaya,” kusho uGigaba.Uthe akaze amukele ngisho nesenti kwabakaGupta.UGigaba uthe usola abathize bezepolitiki abasebenzisa owayengunkosikazi wakhe ukumcindezela kwezepolitiki.Uthe unkosikazi wakhe uNksz Norma Mngoma wayeke amxoxele ngabanye abantu bezepoilitiki abebemfaka ingcindezi yokuthi akenze isitatimende, wathi kodwa uMngoma wayemthembisile ukuthi uyobeka umndeni wakhe phambili.
“UMngoma washo kimina ukuthi ufakelwa ingcindezi, abanye abantu abakwipolitiki ukuba azofaka isitatimende.
Bathi bafuna ukuqeda ngami kwezepolitiki.
Wathi yena uzothola imali nezinye izinto.
Washo yena izinto ayezohlomula ngazo uma efakaza ngami.
Wayelokhu ethi ngeke akuvume lokho.
Wathi uzobeka umndeni wakhe phambili, kodwa wagcina ezile ezofakaza.
Kulezi zitatimende zakhe, kuningi okuphikisanayo okukhomba ukuthi akuyona into esuka kuye.Okunye kusuka kwimibiko yabezindaba,” kusho uGigaba.UGigaba uthe uMngoma uhubhuza amanga uma ethi wayethatha imiyalelo kuMyeni no -Ajay Gupta.“Azikho zinto engingathi uNkk Dudu Myeni wayezidlulisa zisuka kowayenguMengameli uJacob Zuma, ziza kimina.
Nganginethimba lami engangilithinta uma ngidinga ukuxhumana noMengameli.
Ayikho into uZuma ayeyitshela uMyeni, bese (uMyeni) eyidlulisela kimina.
Uma uZuma wayedinga ukukhuluma nami wayengasho uma kunemihlangano yekhabhinethi,” kusho uGigaba.
USihlalo wekhomishini iJaji Raymond Zondo ubuze ukuthi uma kuyinto engekho yini pho eyenza washo lezi zinto unkosikazi wakhe.Echaza uGigaba uthe, uMngoma wayeqikelela ukuthi uma efakaza akazifaki yena njengoba ayethi wayenikwa imali kodwa akaze abone ngqo uGigaba enikezwa esandleni, kodwa wayevele abone isikhwama sakhe uGigaba sesinensavunsavu yemali.“Ikhomishini kade yaba khona ngo-2018, wayengasiboni isidingo sokuba eze.
Uze wafuna ukuza manje, ngoba sekunesigigaba  sokulimala kwemoto emzini wami.“Ngangiwungqongqoshe ngihola, ngeke ngazi kahle izinhloso zakhe ngaphandle kokuthi okwenza athi akazi ngemali ingoba akafuni ukuzifaka.“Ebhuthini lami angikaze ngibone imali.
Isikhwama sami sincane kabi, asiphathi ngisho nemali edlula ku-R5 000,” kusho uGigaba.Uthe uMngoma nje umuntu onamanga kabi ngoba waqamba amanga nangoyise ayethi ucebile.Ngaphambilini uGigaba watshela ikhomishini ukuthi yena wayazi ukuthi uyise kaMngoma owayehlala eNew York washona, wamshiyela imali eningi, kepha wagcina ethola ukuthi lowo baba kwakungumuntu ayezoshada naye.
Abantu abasha babonga ukuxhaswa wuhulumeni
BABONGA ithuba noxhaso abaluthole kuhulumeni abantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi emkhakheni wezokwakha.
Izolo basayine isivumelwano sokusebenzisana seminyaka emithathu esizodla uR150 million noMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal.Lesi sivumelwano sisayinwe emcimbini obuseGreyville Convention Centre, eThekwini ngosomabhizinisi abangu-90, okulindeleke ukuthi bafakwe ohlwini lwezinkampani eziholwa ngabantu abasha abazoncintisana bodwa, uma uhulumeni ekhipha ithenda yomsebenzi.UMnuz Mabutho Mbatha, umnikazi weKweleqadi Project, uthe okwamfaka kulo mkhakha ukubona amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.
Uthe bengabantu abasha yibona okumele babe sekhaleni lezinhlelo zentuthuko yaleli zwe.“Eminyakeni ezayo kuningi okusamele kwakhiwe futhi kulungiswe.
Kumele siwathathe amathuba anjengalawa enzelwe thina esibasha ngoba sifunda lukhulu kuwo,” kusho uMbatha.UNksz Slindile Dlamini weNothango Primary Co-operative Limited, uthe limnika ugqozi nofuqufuqu ithuba elifana naleli njengomuntu wesifazane omnyama futhi osemusha emkhakheni othathwa ngokuthi owamadoda.“Siyakwazi ukuhlangana nabanye abantu sicobelelane ngolwazi futhi sincintisane.
Siyalingana futhi sinamathuba afanayo manje kumele ngilisebenzise ithuba enginikwa lona.
Ngizoqasha abanye abantu sikhule sonke,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.UMnuz Qiniso Cibane ukhale ngokuthi bengosomabhizinisi abasathuthuka abanikwa imisebenzi eyevile kuR1 million futhi bavame ukuhlushwa ngabantu abazibiza ngeBusiness Forum, abafuna isabelo sika-30% emsebenzini abasuke benikwe wona wuhulumeni.
Uthe bathwaliswa kanzima yilaba bantu, wacela umnyango ungenelele.UNgqongqoshe uMnuz Jomo Sibiya nePhini likaNgqongqoshe eMnyangweni wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu kuzwelonke uNkk Pam Tshwete abebeyingxenye yomcimbi, babaqinise idolo abantu abasha.Bathe inhloso kahulumeni ukusiza abantu abasha abangena emkhakheni wezokwakha ukuthi banikwa amathuba afanayo nabanye.
Lo mnyango uthi izinhlelo zabo zihlose ukufukula abasha abesifazane, nomakadebona ababengamasosha ayelwa nohulumeni wengcindezelo.USibiya uthe bazolekelela abantu abasha bacathulisane indlela yonke noma isala endleleni bayifukule.
“Sifuna lentsha iphinde isungule amathuba omsebenzi.
Iwenzisise umsebenzi enikwa wona uhulumeni kungabi nongabazane,’ kusho uSibiya.Uthe bazosebenzisana nezinhlaka zezomthetho ukuze banqande ubudlova obenziwa abafuna umsebenzi ngodli.

UGIXABEZWE odilikajele abayisithupha owesilisa wase-Eastern Cape ngecala lokubulala intombi yakhe nezingane zabo ezinhlanu.

UMontana ufuna ikhomishini ixolise kuyena
OWAYEYISIKHULU sakwa-Passenger Rail Agency of South Africa (Prasa), uMnuz  Lucky Montana, uzivikele ngokuthi kungani enemizi yezigidi wabe esebhekana ngqo nomholi wofakazi kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.Ephendula umbuzo ngemizi yakhe ebiza u-R37 million uMontana, uthe akahambisani nendlela umholi wofakzi u-Advocate Vas Soni, amphonsa ngayo imibuzo.UMontana utshele uSihlalo wekhomishini iJaji Raymond Zondo ukuthi ikhomishini kumele ixolise kuyena.“Uyabona nje ikhomishini kumele ixolise kimina sihlalo.
Ngize lana ukuzophendula ezweni.
Ikhomishini kumele ingibuze ngezinto engazenza, okubalwa nendaba yezindawo zami.
Sihlalo ngikhiphe izincwadi ezifungelwe ezingamakhasi angu-15 mayelana nendawo yami yokuhlala.
Ngakho angibaleki,” kusho uMontana.Umphenyi wekhomishini uMnuz Clint Oellerman, uveze ukuthi phakathi kuka-Agasti no-Okthoba 2014, uMontana ubelungiselela ukuthenga imizi emithathu elinganiselwa ku- R36 million.UMontana ukuphikile ukuthi wathenga le mizi esebenzisa imali yakwaPrasa.
Ukuphikile ukuthi wagwazelwa.Ngokobufakazi buka-Oellerman's,  ukuthengwa kwale mizi kwenziwa kusetshenziswa ummeli uMnuz Adriaan van der Walt, weSiyangena Technologies.ISiyangena Technologies, kwatholwa ukuthi yathola amathenda ezigidigidi okuhlinzeka ngezokuphepha kwa-Prasa ngokungafanele phakathi kuka-2010 ngesikhathi seNdebe yoMhlaba.Lokhu kwakubandakanya ama-CCTV, ukukhanyisa, ezokuxhumana ngenkontileka ka-R6 billion.UMontana uthe lokhu kungamanga ngoba ulwazi oluvela ezigebengwini, wathi ufuna ukuziphonsa imibuzo.Uphonsele uSoni inselelo ngakushilo.“Othi ngikusize ngomsebenzi wakho weSoni, kumele usize ikhomishini ithole iqiniso, hhayi ukuba uphushe imibono ethize.
Akumele ungisabise, ngeke ngisabiseke,” kusho uMontana.USoni uthe ngeke ambuze uMontana uma esevele esethathe isinqumo esithize ngazokuphendula.Ngokwakhe uthe kumele athole ukuthi yini yena ayaziyo ngaleyo mibuzo.
“Ubekhala ngempesheni” othumbe abantu eThekwini
ULALE ebaliwe owesilisa osolwa ngokuvimbezela abantu ebhilidini elisenkabeni yeTheku, emgwaqeni u-Anton Lembede, ngoLwesine ntambama.
Lo wesilisa kubikwa ukuthi ubehlome ngesibhamu nesiqhumane ngesikhathi evimbezela abantu ebhilidini, iSalmon Grove Chambers.
Amaphoyisa abizelwe endaweni yesigameko ngabo-2 ntambama kanti ngokombiko walawo abeseduzane nodaba kodwa angagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba, kuvela ukuthi lesi sigameko besenzeka emahhovisi eGovernment Employees Pension Fund (GEPF) futhi senziwe ngumuntu obesebenzela uhulumeni.
Kusolwa ukuthi ubenesikhalo esithinta imali yakhe yempesheni.
Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi lo wesilisa ubekhalaza ngempesheni yakhe kodwa njengamanje amaphoyisa asathatha isitatimende kuye kulandela ukumbopha.

UMagashule uxoshiwe emhlanganweni we-ANC
KUCACILE ukuthi ziyaqonga izinkinga ze-ANC ngesikhathi kuxoshwa uNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Ace Magashule, emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu oqale izolo.
UMagashule akaxoshwanga yedwa ulandelwe wu-Advocate Bongani Bongo oyiLungu lePhalamende nobhekene namacala enkohlakalo ethinta umhlaba.I-ANC inomhlangano oyisipesheli ewubizile ukuxoxa izindaba ezisematheni ezithinta inhlangano.
Kusebenza ezobuchwepheshe ukuthamela umhlangano njengoba kugwenywa ukusabalala kweCovid-19.Isiteshi sethelevishini iSABC sibike ngokuxoshwa kukaMagashule.
UMagashule ubezama ukungena ngenkani emhlanganweni nakuba kwaziwa ukuthi umisiwe esikhundleni sakhe emuva kokugoloza ukushenxa.
Esikhundleni sokushenxa yena uthumele uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa incwadi yokummisa naye.
I-ANC yashaya umthetho othi bonke ababhekene namacala abucayi nathinta inkohlakalo, kufanele bashenxe ezikhundleni kuze kuphele amacala abo.
UMagashule ubhekene namacala enkohlakalo, asukela ngesikhathi esawundunakulu waseFree State.
Kusolwa ukuthi kwaba nemali eyadliwa ngesikhathi kushintshwa uphahla lwezindlu oluyitsheboya.
UMagashule ukhala ngokuthi kayikho emthethweni indaba yokumiswa kwakhe ngoba akanacala.
Ukushenxiswa kwabantu i-ANC ithi ikwenza ngenhloso yokugeza igama lenhlangano.
Umhlangano okuxoshwe kuwo uMagashule uqale izolo, kulindeleke ukuthi uphele kusasa.
Wumhlangano obhekwe ngabomvu ngoba i-ANC ibhekene nesikhathi esinzima.
Kwabashenxile kusavele uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu oyiPhini likaSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, ozishenxele yena esikhundleni sakhe, nabaholi bale nhlangano abathathu eNorth West.

UMabuza uya kolashwa eRussia
IPHINI likaMengameli, uMnuz David Mabuza, selithathe ikhefu elikhethekile ukuze liyolashwa eRussia.Lokhu kumenyezelwe iHhovisi likaMengameli ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Esitatimendeni, iHhovisi likaMengameli liveze ukuthi uMabuza ucele ukuthatha ikhefu lezinsukwana kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.
"Kulesi sikhathi sekhefu iphini likamengameli lizokuya eRussia, lapho lihlelelwe khona ukuba lixilongwe ngokwezempilo.
Lokhu kuxilongwa kulandela ukulashwa elake lakuthola ngaphambilini kuleliya lizwe," kusho isitatimende.Ngokwemibiko, uMabuza useke waya izikhawu ezimbili ukuyolashwa eRussia.UMabuza uqale ukuyolashwa eRussia ngesikhathi esengundunankulu waseMpumalanga ngo-2015.
Ngaleso sikhathi kwakunemibiko yokuthi udlisiwe.Ngo-2018, kuphinde kwaba nemibiko yokuthi uMabuza wachitha amasonto amabili exilongwa kuleliya lizwe.Kusukela lapho, sekube nokuqagela okukhulu ngesimo sempilo yakhe njengoba engajwayele ukubonakala emphakathini enza imisebenzi yakhe.Lokhu kuqagela ngesimo sempilo kaMabuza kuphinde kwabhebhetheka kakhulu ngesikhathi ehluleka izikhawu ezimbili ukuyophendula imibuzo ePhalamende ngenxa yokuxinwa ukugula.Kepha imibiko yachithwa ihhovisi lakhe, elaveza ukuthi uMabuza uphila njengosheleni.
NgokweHhovisi likaMengameli, uMabuza uzoqhubeka nemisebenzi yakhe uma sekuphele ikhefu.Phakathi kweminye yemisebenzi uMabuza anikezwe yona; ukuhola ikomiti longqongqoshe elibhekelele umgomo wobhubhane iCorona.

ASAZOQHUBEKA nokumba akholelwa wukuthi kuyidayimane, amalungu omphakathi abesagcwele okhalweni KwaHlathi, izolo, yize bese kumenyezelwe ukuthi akusilo idayimane leli alimbayo kodwa amatshe nje angenayo intengo enkulu njengeyedayimane.
Lo mphakathi ushaya phansi ngonyawo, uthi awuyi ndawo noma uhulumeni angabeka muphi umthetho ngoba lokhu kumba sekuyindlela oziphilisa ngayo.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lifika kule ndawo, bebesabaningi abantu abambayo yize isasasa beselehlile ukuqhathanisa ngaphambi kwalesi simemezelo esishiye kukhalwa.

"Sebefuna ukubiyela le ndawo bayihwaqe, bayenze eyabo.
Uma kungelona idayimane pho uhulumeni uhlushwe yini ngoba sizimbela emhlabeni wobabamkhulu?

Kodwa imali engiyenze selokhu kuqale imibiko yokuthi kunedayimane, iphindeke kathathu emalini ebengiyithola ngokudayisa emholweni.
Kodwa namhlanje (esho izolo) ngisenze uR100 kuphela ngoba abantu abasebaningi kanti bengilala noR1 500 ngosuku.
Sife olwembiza ngalesi simemezelo futhi angiboni ukuthi kusasa (namuhla) ngizobuya ukuzodayisa lapha," kusho uNkk Jiyane.Kuthiwa sekunezimoto ezingamaveni eseziqashwa ukuthutha abantu zibasusa ezindaweni ezehlukene ukuzokumba.Ngaphandle kokudla neziphuzo ezehlukene okukhona kuzo notshwala okudayiswa lapho kumbiwa khona, uma uqhamuka uhlangatshezwa ngabadayisa lawa matshe bewadayisa ngemali ehlukene.USiyabonga Mdlolo (19) uthe kulezi zinsuku ubesekwazi nokuthenga ubisi lwengane yakhe enenyanga izelwe.
"Ngiyalidayisa, kangangoba bengilala noR300 kuya kuR500 ngosuku.
Imali esengiyenzile selokhu kuqalile ukumba, wuR5 000 ngilidayisa.
NamaShayina ayafika ezolithenga, ngeke sivume ukuthi kuvalwe," kusho uSiyabonga.Uveze ukuthi balala emigodini abayimbayo, iningi labantu kaligoduki ngoba lawa matshe abonakala kahle uma sekuhwalele noma ekuseni kakhulu.Nakuba amatshe lawa enikeza ithemba emphakathini, kodwa akusiwona wonke umuntu onenhlanhla yokuhlabana ngawo.UMnuz Phumlani Jili uthe selokhu efike izolo esuka eMsinga, ubengakaze athole ngisho elilodwa.
"Sengimbe ngakhathala.
Ngiyabona nginebhadi, yimina kuphela kwengifike nabo ongakaze athole lutho," kusho yena.UNksz Nompumelelo Mpungose uthe akulula ukuthi bayeke ukumba kule ndawo.

Ukuthi akulona idayimane, akasiyeke siqhubeka nokumba khona lokhu, amaShayina ayakuthenga.

Imisebenzi ayikho, nathi bese sizizwa singabantu,"  kusho uNksz MpungoseKuvele ukuthi kukhona enye indawo ekhona KwaHlathi okuphinde kwatholakala ukuthi inalolu hlobo lwamatshe, kangangoba abanye abantu sebethutheleke khona.

Uvele okokuqala enkantolo ngoMsombuluko,” kusho uCap.
Gwala.Icala lahlehliselwa izolo njengoba ubezofaka isicelo sebheyili.

Usho lokhu nje kumele kuqalwe ukugonywa kothisha kuleli njengoba KwaZulu-Natal kulindeleke ukuthi kuqale namhlanje.UNkk Motshekga uthe isabelo somnyango, kuhlanganisa neminyango yezifundazwe, ngu-R288.7 billion kulo nyaka wezimali.
Le mali yehliswe ngo-8.4% kanti izifundazwe ezehliselwe kakhulu yi-Eastern Cape, KwaZulu-Natal neLimpopo.Uthe isinqumo sokuthi kuvalwe ezemidlalo, njengoba kusadlange leli gciwane, sisamile.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, uDkt Reginah Mhaule, lithe unyaka odlule ube nzima ikakhulukazi kwingqalasizinda njengoba kungazange kwakhiwe sikole ekoteni yokuqala yonyaka ngenxa yeCovid-19 nokuvalwa kwezwe.UDkt Mhaule uthe nasekoteni yesibili kube nezinkinga njengoba bekungadingeki ukuthi abanye abasebenzi baye kwezinye izifundazwe.
“Zingu-1 104 izikole esezinamanzi kwezingu-1 228.
Ezisele ezingu-157, zizofakelwa amanzi eminyakeni ezayo.
Sekuphothuliwe ukufakwa kukagesi ezikoleni ezingu-373, safaka izindlu zangasese kwezingu-748.
Kusele ezingu-2 102 ezidinga izindlu zangasese, esilindele ukuthi umsebenzi wokwenza lokhu uphele eminyakeni emibili ezayo,” kusho uDkt Mhaule.

U-Norma usola uGigaba ngamanga
OBENGUNKOSIKAZI kaMnuz Malusi Gigaba, uNksz uNorma Mngoma, uthe waphoqwa ukuba asuse bonke ubufakazi obuthinta umndeni wakwaGupta kwiselula yakhe.Izolo uNksz Mngoma wethule ubufakazi kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yindlazane lapho ethe waze waboshwa nje kusukela ekutheni wenqaba ukususa emaseluleni akhe izithombe ezaziveza ubudlelwane babo nomndeni wakwaGupta.“Bafika (oKlebe) bezofuna konke kobuchwepheshe bami.
Ngababuza ukuthi kungani bethatha zonke izinto zami.
Ngabuza ukuthi ngingafonela yini ummeli, bathi angivumelekile.
Bathi bona bangoKlebe ngakho anginalo lelo lungelo.
Emuva kwalokho bangitshela ukuthi angiwavule (pin codes).
Babhala phansi izinombolo eziyimfihlo zokuvula zonke izinto zami zobucwepheshe.
Base bethi bathole ukuthi kube nokukhlwebheka kwemoto ngakho bayaphenya.
Ngabe sengifonela umngani wami ngoba ngicela angisize ngoba izinto zami zingasabuyi.
Zaze zabuya sengiboshiwe emuva kwamasonto amabili.
Imininingwane eminingi yabe isisusiwe,” kusho uNksz Mngoma.Uchaze ngokuboshwa kwakhe wathi: “Ngelanga engaboshwa ngalo, ngatshela uGigaba ukuthi uma izinto zami zingabuyi ngizovula icala.
Wayelokhu ethi basendleleni.
Wayethi yena uzongisiza ngeyakhe ikhompuytha.
Kwafika amaphoyisa ngazitshela ukuthi bazoletha izinto zami kanti bazongibopha.
Ngacela ukushintsha izimpahla engangizigqokile, kwathiwa angisavumelekile ukuhamba ngedwa, ngashintsha phambi kwawo amaphoyisa abe esengithatha.“Ngaboshwa ngoLwesihlanu.
Ngangayithola ibheyili, ngoba abangibopha bahamba esiteshini, bahamba nedokodo.
Base bengatholakali emafonini abo,” kusho uNksz Mngoma.Esededelwe ngebheyili, uthe ezintweni zakhe kwabe sekususwe ulwazi oluthize.“Kwathi sekubuya izinto zami, sengiphumile ejele, ngathola ukuthi zonke izinto ezasuswa ezintweni zami zobuchwepheshe kwakuyizinto uMalusi ayecele ukuba ngizisuse ezithinta abakwaGupta.
Kwasuswa imoto ayeyithengelwe yibona, uhambo lwethu olwakhokhelwa abakwaGupta nesithombe engasishutha emshadweni wakwaGupta eSun City,” kusho uNksz Mngoma.Ebuzwa ngokuqokwa kukaGigaba kwesokuba wuNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uthe kungamanga uma uGigaba ephika ukuthi wazi kuqala engakamenyezelwa kulesi sikhundla.“UMalusi (Gigaba) wangitshela ukuthi abakwaGupta nabo bayamyala kulesi sikhundla sakhe kodwa abekho emthethweni.
Besijwayele ukuya emzini wakwaGupta, uma enemihlangano kokunye siye khona siyodla.
Cishe ngaya ngaphezu kuka-20 khona,” kusho uNksz Mngoma.
Akasakwazi ukuhamba okhukhunyalelwe isisu
NKOSIKHONA CELEISIPHENDUKE isihogo uqobo lwaso, impilo yowesifazane wakwa-E eMlaza, owahlinzwa ngesikhathi eyoteta ngonyaka odlule esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni Memorial.
Uthi akasakwazi ukuhamba usehlale eyinto yombhede.UNksz Phumzile Mlaba (26), utshele Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo ukuthi ngonyaka odlule ngoMeyi 8, waya kulesi sibhedlela eyoteta.
Uthi wateta ngomthungo izingane ezingamawele kepha uthi ngemva kwalokho impilo yakhe ayiphindanga yafana.Isisu sakhe uthi nsuku zonke sivele sikhukhumale ukwedlula ngesikhathi esakhulelwe.
Uthi useye esibhedlela izikhathi eziningi bemtshela ukuthi isisu sigcwele amanzi nesibindi sakhe sinenkinga.“Ibuhlungu le mpilo engibhekene nayo.
Impela sengifisa ngisho ukufa imbala.
UNkulunkulu nguyena owaziyo.
Uma esathanda ukuthi ngiphile ngizophila,'' usho kanje uNksz Mlaba, ekhala izinyembezi.Uthe usola sengathi bukhona ubudedengu obenziwa eMshiyeni ngesikhathi ehlinzwa.
Uthi bamyisa kwi-ultrasound khona eMshiyeni, kwavela ukuthi isisu sigcwele amanzi nesibindi sakhe siyakhukhumala.“Kunzima ukuhamba nokudla akusehli.
Angazi ukuthi ngiphila kanjani ngoba ngidla kancane mhlawumpe kuba yizipuni ezintathu,” echaza.Ubalise ngokuthi impilo yakhe imi ndawonye njengoba wakhulelwa enza unyaka wesithathu esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme.
Udalule nokuthi selokhu ateta akakaze nangelilodwa ilanga awaphathe amawele akhe.“Sengiphila ngokumpontshwa amanzi esiswini.
Sengimpontshwe kwaze kwaba kathathu.
Uma sengimpontshiwe siqala phansi futhi sikhukhumale.
Kunzima nokuphefumula,'' kubalisa inkosazane.UNkk Sbongile Dube ohlala noPhumzile uthi naye umangele ngendlela isisu sikaPhumzile esikhula ngayo.
UNkk Dube ungunina wendodana ekhulelise uPhumzile amawele.Utshele Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo ukuthi kubuhlungu nakuyena ukubona unina wezingane zendodana yakhe ekhala ngezinhlungu umzuzu nomzuzu.
Kuvela ukuthi eMshiyeni bayagweva nencwadi emgunyaza ukuba adluliselwe kwesinye isibhedlela ayothola usizo olwehlukile.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Agiza Hlongwane ucele imininingwane egcwele ngodaba.
Uthe ukuze bakwazi ukuthola umnyombo walo kumele baxhumane noPhumzile nesibhedlela.Isazi kwezamasiko uMnuz Thandanani Mnguni, sithe izinto ezinjena ziyenzeka uma kukhona umyalezo ithonga elihlose ukuwudlulisa emndenini.
Uthe yingakho kumqoka ukuba idlozi laziswe uma kukhona ilungu lomndeni eliyoteta esibhedlela.
Bakhalinywe sebedayisa impahla   kasonkontileka abebengaholi
KUSIZE ukungenelela kwamalungu omphakathi ukunqanda abasebenzi benkontileka eyanikwa ithenda yokufakela ugesi, okuthiwa bebelinga ukudayisa impahla umsebenzi ungaphelile, bekhala ngosonkontileka ongabaholeli.UMnuz Senzo Mkhize wenkampani eyathola ithenda yokufaka ugesi eNkonjane ku-ward 3, kuMasipala waKwaMaphumulo, bese kungenela enyangeni yesibili abasebenzi bakhe bengaholi nokuthe ekugcineni wavele  wanyamalala.
Uma bemshayela ucingo ubethi abazibonele ngoba akanayo imali yokubaholela, okubaphoqe ukuthi bathathe isinqumo sokudayisa impahla kagesi obekumele ufakelwe umphakathi abazame ukuyidayisa, ngesonto eledlule.UMnuz Nsizwa Khuzwayo obhekelele ukufakwa kwalo gesi endaweni, uthe ukufika kwakhe nezinye izakhamuzi yikhona okusizile njengoba abasebenzi bekwazile ukubalalela.
“Bekumi izimoto ezimbili neloli okusolakala ukuthi bese kuzolayisha impahla.
Ukudayiswa kwempahla bekuzobambezela intuthuko umphakathi oyilinde kusuka ngo-2016,” kusho uKhuzwayo.Uthe ukuhamba kukaMkhize engabambi nezingcingo zabo kubakhathaza kakhulu bewumphakathi ngoba nesikhathi okwakuvunyelwene ngaso ukuthi umsebenzi uzobe sewuphelile sesidlulile kodwa kusekuncane kakhulu okwenziwe.
Kuthintwa uMkhize, uphikile ukuthi unyamalele nokuthi umsebenzi usemningi.
“Kube khona ukubambezeleka ngenxa yezinkinga zokungakhokhi ngesikhathi kukamasipala okugcina sekuphoqa ukuthi abasebenzi ngingabaholeli.
Mncane umsebenzi osele, uzophela ngasekupheleni kwenyanga,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe umasipala sewukhokhile kanti konke sekuhamba ngohlelo, umsebenzi uyaqhubeka.UMnuz Thembokwakhe Mchunu oyikhansela endaweni, uthe kuyangabazeka ukuthi lo sonkontileka uzowuqeda umsebenzi anikwe wona.“Bekumele kuphele inyanga ugesi usukhanya emizini engu-50 kulesi sigceme njengoba umphakathi kade wawulindile.
UMkhize ubengayifaki incwadi yokukhokhelwa ngomsebenzi ngesikhathi okwavunyelwana ngaso.
Lokhu kwenza umasipala ukhokhe sekudlule isikhathi.
Abasebenzi bese bembekezeleli engabaholeli, kunalokho uvele wanyamalala, nami akalubambi ucingo lwami,” kusho uMchunu.UMkhize ukuphikile ukuthi izingcingo akazibambi, wathi umsebenzi awenzayo muhle kakhulu.
Usole umasipala ngokuthi yiwona omqhatha nabasebenzi njengoba ubuye ungamkhokheli.
Uthe incwadi yokukhokhelwa ngomsebenzi osuwenziwe uyifaka ngesikhathi kangangoba kunesikhathi okwaze kwaphela izinyanga ezimbili eyifakile kodwa umasipala ungakhokhi.
Bazovela enkantolo abasolwa ngokubamba inkunzi
BAZOVELA eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini namuhla, abasolwa abane ababhekene ngecala lokubamba inkunzi.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa aseDurban Central, abegadile emgwaqweni uMatthews Meyiwa oseThekwini, izolo ngenkathi elunywa indlebe nguzakwabo ngomgilwa obanjwe inkunzi.
Kuthiwa umgilwa ubanjwe inkunzi wakhonjwa ngommese ngamadoda amathathu, abe esengena emotweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa enze ucwaningo ngemoto ebihamba izigilamkhuba.
Imoto itholakale emgwaqweni uMngeni ezintathakusa ngo-3.“Kutholakale abasolwa abane emotweni, ngenkathi amaphoyisa esesha imoto athole iselula kamgilwa, nommese okusolakala ukuthi yiwona abawusebenzisile ngenkathi bebamba inkunzi,” kulandisa uCaptian Gwala.Uqhube wathi abasolwa abalinganiselwa eminyakeni ewu-20 kuya ku-28 babhekene namacala okubamba inkunzi, nokutholakala nesikhali esiyingozi.UCapt Gwala uthe, “Imoto ebisetshenziswa ngabasolwa ithathwe ngamaphoyisa, yayiswa ephawundini ukuze kwenziwe uphenyo, iselula etholakele ibuyiselwe kumnikazi wayo.”
'Ayikho into engingayenza ngoR3 000' - Norma Mngoma
UMANGAZE abaningi owayengunkosikazi kaMnuz Malusi Gigaba uNksz Norma Mngoma ethi ayikho into angayenza ngoR3 000 empilweni yakhe.
UNorma uveze lokhu ngesikhathi ephendula imibuzo kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana ngempilo ewubukhazikhazi ayeyiphila noGigaba, asehlukene naye, okusolwa ukuthi yayixhaswe abakwaGupta.
UGigaba wayengungqongqoshe wezaseKhaya ngaleso sikhathi.
NgoLwesihlanu uNorma uchazele ikhomishini ngezindodla zemali ababenazo noGigaba eveza ukuthi unenqwaba yamasudi athengwe ngokheshi futhi wamnikeza ikhadi angakwazi ukuchitha uR100 000 ngalo ngenyanga.
Encwadini ayibhalele ikhomishini uGigaba ukuchithile lokhu wathi empeleni wamnikeza ikhadi eliyi debit futhi wayemkalele ukuthi asebenzise uR3 000 kulo ngenyanga.
Ephendula lokhu uNorma uthe: “uma ethi kwakuyi-debit card eno-R3 000...ayikho into engingayenza ngoR3 000 empilweni yami futhi uyakwazi lokho.
Into engiyaziyo mina ukuthi kwakuyi-credit card.
Into ayisho ukuthi uma ngilisebenzisa ngingeqi kuR100 000 ngenyanga.”UNorma uqhube wathi kwakwenzeka ukuthi uma esemazweni aphesheya azithole esethenga isikhwama sika-R30 000 kuya kuR40 000.
“Ngakho kungamanga ukuthi lalinoR3 000.
Empilweni nje ayikho into engingayenza ngoR3 000,” kusho uNorma.
Lokhu kuthuse abaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kwazise kunabantu abebeziphilisa ngesibonelelo sikaR350 sabangasebenzi njengoba umnotho ukhahlamezwe yiCovid-19.
Abanye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bathe kuyabaxaka lokhu ngoba baningi abantu abahola le mali ngenyanga kuleli abakwaziyo ukuhlanganisa.

Bazobanjwa abadla eye-UIF kungafanele

Uthe ukukhula kwezibalo zabangasebenzi, ikakhulukazi entsheni, yinkinga enkulu edinga ukusukunyelwa ngokushesha.Ubalule nokuthi izinga lobuphofu eligcwele emiphakathini libangelwa ukuthi abantu abasebenzi okuyisimo esiletha usizi enhlalweni yomphakathi.UNxesi ukhulume kanje eNewcastle ngoLwesibili ngesikhathi ezokwethula ihhovisi elibhekelele izinhlelo zentsha namabhasi amabili angamahhovisi omnyango wakhe angomahambanendlwana azojikeleza imiphakathi eyakhele eMajuba eyihlinzeka ngezinsiza.Ubephelezelwa yiMeya yaseMajuba, uDkt Musa Ngubane.UNgubane uthe lolu hlelo luzohlomulisa intsha futhi lusondezele umphakathi izinsiza.
Kucutshungulwa eyesithembu sabesifazane
PHILI MJOLIUHULUMENI wakuleli ucubungula isiphakamiso sokuthi abesifazane bavunyelwe yini ukuthi nabo babe nesithembu.UMnyango wezeseKhaya kuleli usanda kushicilela umbhalo ohlongozayo, iGreen Paper lapho umema khona umphakathi ukuthi uphawule ngokucutshungulwa komthetho olawula imishado kuleli, ukuze nabangavikelekile ngaphansi komthetho, iMarriages Act bavikeleke.UMnuz Sihle Mthiyane, wophiko lwemithetho eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya, uthe umnyango ufuna ukuthi kube nomthetho owodwa olawula umshado kuleli, ukuze nabashade imishado engathathwa njengesemthethweni njengamanje nayo ingene ngaphansi komthetho.
"Kunemishado engangeni ngaphansi kweCivil Union Act ka-2006, okuyimishado yamaHindu eyamaMuslim, eyamaRasta nabesifazane abashade beneminyaka engaphansi kwengu-18.
Ngokomthetho okhona kuleli njengamanje labo bantu kabathathwa njengabashadile.
Inhloso yethu ngokucubungula umthetho sifuna bonke abantu abashadile bavikeleke ngokufanayo, akukhathalekile ukuthi ngowesifazane noma yindoda,"  kusho uMthiyane.Uthe ngo-2019/2020 kuke kwaba nezigcawu zokubonisana ebezihlelwe ngungqongqoshe, lapho bekudingidwa khona ngokuthi singavunyelwa yini isithembu sabesifazane.Uthe abamabandla bebesichitha isithembu, kungakhathalekile ukuthi ngesendoda noma ngesowesifazane, abamasiko bebesichitha isithembu sabesifazane ekubeni izishoshovu ezigqugquzela ukulingana kwabesilisa nabesifazane zithi kumele sivunyelwe, ukuze kube nokulingana.
"Lapha bekubhekwa ukulingana ukuthi kusho ukuthini ngokomshado.
Uma indoda ivumelekile ukuthi ithathe isithembu nowesifazane kumele avunyelwe ukuze kube nokulingana okugcizelelwa wuMthethosisekelo,“  kusho uMthiyane.Uthe kulezi zigcawu abamasiko bebethi isithembu ngesendoda, owesifazane akakwazi ukuthi abe naso.
"Bebethi uma kungavunyelwa lokho kuzoba nenkinga ngendlela umndeni okumele uhleleke ngayo.
Abamabandla  bebethi kabasifuni nasemadodeni isithembu, indoda kumele ishade nowesifazane oyedwa.
"UNkk Elizabeth Ritief wePolyamorySA, uthe kuyajabulisa ukuthi udaba olunjengalolu lubekwe ezithebeni nakuba kungakhulunywa ngqo ngesithembu sabesifazane.
"Lo mbhalo ohlongozayo (Green Paper) uzobe uqondisa ukungalingani okukhona.
Bayidlanzana kakhulu abantu abakholelwa ekutheni umuntu wesifazane naye kumele avunyelwe ukuthi abe nesithembu, uma efisa ukwenze njalo.
Ukuba khona komqulu okhuluma ngokulingana komshado kuyinto enhle kakhulu.
Uma indoda kuvumelekile ukuthi ishade nabesifazane abaningi, nabesifazane kumele bavunyelwe uma befisa ukwenza lokho,"  kusho uNkk Ritief.UMthiyane uthe uthando olunjengalolu kalujwayekile kodwa akhona amazwe anomthetho olawula umshado wabantu abakholelwa kuwona.
"Isithembu sivumelekile eChina, Kenya, India, Nigeria naseGhana," kusho yenaUkuphawula ngalo mbhalo ohlongozayo kuvulwe kuze kube wuJuni 30.

NJENGOBA luqala namhlanje uhlelo lokugoma othisha nabasebenza ezikoleni zakuleli, inhlangano yabafundi iCosas, ayeneme ngokushiywa ngaphandle kwabafundi kulolu hlelo.Le nhlangano ithi abafundi bekungamele bashiywe ngaphandle ngoba bakhona abatheleleka ngeCovid-19 kuze kuvalwe nezikole.UMengameli weCosas, uThabang Mokoena, uthe abeneme ngokuthi abafundi bashiywe ngaphandle njengoba kuzogonywa othisha.“Sizozama ukuxoxisana nomnyango ngoba bekungamele abafundi bashiywe ngaphandle.
Siyalwamukela uhlelo lokuthi kuqalwe ukugonywa kothisha kuleli sonto nalabo abaphekela abafundi kodwa sithi nathi akumele sishiywe ngaphandle ikakhulu abasemabangeni aphezulu, abasuleleka ngegciwane,” kusho uMokoena.UNgqongqoshe wemfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, umemezele ukuthi bagu-528 000 abazogoma kusukela ngoLwesithathu kuze kube yinyanga ezayo.
Uthe ucwaningo olwenziwe yizinyunyana luveza ukuthi u-76% wothisha usuzogoma, ekubeni ngasekuqaleni konyaka cishe bebengu-52% kuphela abebethe bazogoma.Uqhube wathi usazoxoxa nezinye izinhlaka emkhakheni wezemfundo ngoba abazali, izigungu zezikole, inhlangano yothishanhloko, izinyunyana zothisha baneme ngokuthi lolu hlelo luzoqala.KwaZulu-Natal zingu-91 izikhungo okuzogonyelwa kuzo othisha.
UNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe labo thisha bazothola umgomo iJohnson & Johnson.UNgqongqoshe wezempilo esifundazweni uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, unxuse abazali ukuthi bagade izingane zabo zingayi emicimbini engenza ukuthi zisuleleke ngegciwane.
Uthe kwezinye izindawo lapho kuzogonyelwa khona kukhona izikhungo abazozivula, kwezinye othisha bazogoma nabantu abadala.“Sizobiza isithangami sabezindaba nozakwethu kwezemfundo uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, lapho sizocacisa khona ngohlelo lokugoma kothisha oluqalayo.
Ukugoma akuyona impoqo ongafuni, akaphoqiwe ukuthi agome,” kusho uNksz Simelane.
Ubekwe endlini yokugcina uMyeni
UVUSE umunyu umfelokazi, uNkk Lindsay Myeni ngesikhathi ekhihla isililo ekhalela owakwakhe, uLindani Myeni enkonzweni yomngcwabo ebiseSikhaleni, ngoMgqibelo.

Lokhu kubuyise ithemba ngokuthi nakuMyeni kuzoba khona ubulungiswa uma uphenyo lwenziwe kahle.
Umndeni kaMyeni usezinhlelweni zokubopha amaphoyisa abulale indodana yawo.
Ufe olwembiza umphakathi kungqongqa ihholo
UFE olwembiza umphakathi waKwaSwayimane ku-ward 11 ngaphansi kukaMasipala waseMshwathi kungqongqiswa ngomlilo ihholo lomphakathi elibuye lisetshenziswe njengehhovisi lekhansela nomtholampilo ongumahambanendlwana.Lesi sigameko esishiye amalungu omphakathi edidekile, kuthiwa senzeke ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Ikhansela lakule ndawo, uNksz Londi Zondi, lithe lesi sehlo siwuhlukumeze kakhulu umphakathi kwazise kuphinde kwacekeleka phansi nempahla yokwakha amathoyilethi omphakathi ebigcinwe kulo leli hholo.“Abantu abenze lokhu bakhombise ukuba nonya oluyisimanga emphakathini ikakhulu njengoba sekuphazamiseke nohlelo lokwakhiwa kwamathoyilethi obelungakaphothulwa.
Ngaphandle kwalokho, kuphinde kwasha izinsiza engilekelela ngazo umphakathi njengekhansela, ngoba ihhovisi engisebenzela kulo likuleli hholo,” kusho uNksz Zondi.Uqinisekise ukuthi azikho izinxushunxushu noma imibhikisho ebisike yabakhona yomphakathi ukhala ngokunganeliseki.
Uveze ukuthi abenzi balokhu bebehlosile ngoba kutholakale amathayi ebeshiswa phakathi kulo ihholo nezitulo kuhlanganisiwe kwangqongqiswa ngomlilo.Ukhala ngomphakathi osele dengwane kusha lesi  sakhiwo athe besiwusizo kakhulu emphakathini kubanjelwa khona izinkonzo zamabandla ehlukene, kushadiswa kuphinde kubanjelwe kulo imihlangano yomphakathi.
Ugcizelele ukuthi belisiza kakhulu abagulayo njengoba bekusondezelwa kulo umtholampilo ukunikeza ngemishanguzo kulabo abaphila nezifo ezingamahlalakhona.Uveze ukuthi iziphathimandla zikamasipala zihlanganile nomphakathi emizameni yokuthola umkhondo ngokushiswa kwalesi sakhiwo sikahulumeni kodwa alikho nelilodwa ilungu lomphakathi eliveze ukuthi linolwazi.
Lokhu kubashiya bedunguza ebumnyameni ngalesi senzo kodwa banethemba lokuthi amaphoyisa azokwenza umsebenzi abambe abathintekayo ngokushesha.
Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokucekela phansi esiteshini samaphoyisa e-Wartburg, amaphoyisa ayaphenya.
LuseKZN ubhubhane lweCovid-19 olubhubhisa e-India
UBHUBHANE lwesifo seCovid-19 oluhlasele e-India selufinyelele KwaZulu-Natal naseGauteng, njengoba kukhona abatholakale ukuthi bahaqekile.I-National Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD) ikuqinisekisile ukuthi kutholakale abantu abane abaneCovid-19 edlange e-India, okuvela ukuthi bebevakashela kuleliya lizwe.
Ababili ngabaseGauteng, ababili kube ngabaKwaZulu-Natal okutholakale ukuthi banegciwane i-B.1.617.2.I-World Health Organisation (WHO) ithe iB.1.617.2 idlange kakhulu e-India.
Abagulayo bahlaliswe ngabodwana ngokulandela imigomo yeCovid-19 futhi kubhekwa abantu akade bexhumana nabo.I-NICD ibuye yathola abantu abaneCovid-19 yohlobo lweB.1.1.7, edlange e-Europe naseNorth America, kwabayisishiyagalombili eWestern Cape, ababili eGauteng noyedwa KwaZulu-Natal.USolwazi Adrian Puren onguMqondisi osabambile weNICD, uthe akubamangazi ukuthi lezi zinhlobo zeCovid-19 sezifikile kuleli, waqinisekisa ukuthi bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqonda kabanzi ngazo.UDkt Michelle Groome oyiNhloko yophiko lwePublic Health Surveillance and Response kwiNICD, uthe basiqaphe ngeso lokhozi isimo futhi bazohlolwa bonke abaphuma kwamanye amazwe, ikakhulukazi abavela e-India.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke uDkt Zweli Mkhize, ucele abantu ukuthi bangatatazeli ngoba izinhlobo ezintsha zeCovid-19 zingaqubuka ezweni ngisho abantu bengayanga kwamanye amazwe.
Ucele abantu ukuthi baqhubeke nokuzivikela kwiCovid-19 ngokugqoka izifonyo, bangayi ezindaweni ezinabantu abaningi, bawashe izandla futhi baqhelelane.Uthe ukuvalwa kwemingcele kufanele kuhambisane nocwaningo lwesayensi ukuze kuvikelwe nomnotho.
Uveze ukuthi uhulumeni uhlale elubheka ucwaningo futhi zizokwenziwa maduze izimemezelo ngodaba lwemingcele uma ikhabhinethi isixoxile.I-IFP ifuna ukuthi uhulumeni asheshise ukuvala imingcele eya e-India ukuze anqande ukubhebhetheka kwezinhlobo ezintsha zeCovid-19.
UMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa oyilungu le-IFP ePhalamende, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuthi uhlobo lwase-India lweCovid-19, selufikile kuleli yize kade becelile ukuthi kusheshe kuvalwe imingcele.“NgoLwesine ngamtshela uMengameli ngobungozi bokungavali imingcele yethu ne-India.
Wathi basaxoxisana nezinhlaka ezifanele.
Ngesikhathi besaxoxa iNingizimu Afrika isithole abantu abane abanohlobo lweCovid-19, equbuke e-India.
Siyazi sonke ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ngeke ikwazi ukubhekana nezingqinamba ezilethwa wukushintshashintsha kweCovid-19 ngoba nohlelo lwethu lokugoma luyacothoza,” kusho uHlengwa.Uthe ingozi ibivele isisekhaya ngoba kunamatilosi awu-14 ahlaliswe wodwa kuyimanje bese kuba nezinhlobo ezihlukene zeCovid-19 okungeyakuleli, eyase-India netholakala e-Europe.
UHlengwa uthe bazoxoxisana nohulumeni ukuze athathe izinyathelo ezifanele ukuhlenga impilo yabantu bakuleli.
UZimdollar ubanjwe inkunzi eqeda ukusakaza
KUQHUME isililo intandokazi yomsakazi wohlelo lukamaskandi, iSigiya Ngengoma kuKhozi FM, uZimiphi “ Zimdollar” Biyela ibanjwa inkunzi, iphucwa izimpahla zayo iphuma emsakazweni izolo emini.Isigameko sokubanjwa inkunzi kwalo msakazi, kuthiwa senzeke eqeda ukusakaza eseyongena emotweni.
Umthombo opotshozele Isolezwe ngeSonto, uthe lo msakazi uhlwithwe yisigebengu isikhwama, maqede sadla phansi.
Ozibonele uthe umsakazi ukhale waze wabhuquza ngenxa yokuthi isikhwama besinezinto zakhe ezibalulekile.UTshatha Ngobe, ongumsakazi woKhozi uze wakhuluma ngalo lolu daba ohlelweni lwakhe emini izolo.
Ubekhuluma noThozama Ngwenya ongumdidiyeli weTop 20, ngokudunwa kwakhe imoto ngaseBerea Centre eThekwini.Uthe: “Thozama besisababaza indaba yakho ukuthi ubudunwe imoto ngaseBerea.
Nakhu sesizwa kuthiwa noZimdollar usebanjwe inkunzi lapha ngaphandle.
Okusho ukuthi umuntu sekumele aphathe isibhamu emsebenzini manje.
Bazokuthola abakufunayo ngoba sebesifaka umunwe esweni manje,” kusho uTshatha.UThozama abekhuluma naye wubedunwe imoto kodwa ngenhlanhla imoto yakhe wabuye wayithola.
Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, uthe kawukho umbiko abawutholile ngokubanjwa inkunzi kwalo msakazi.
Kugqame uqhekeko kwelikaZuma
KUPHINDE kwagqama uqhekeko emalungwini e-ANC abezokweseka owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu izolo.Uhlelo lokuzwakalisa ukweseka uZuma lucishe lwadungeka nje luqala ngesikhathi kuphazamiswa obephethe uhlelo, uNobhala we-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli.Ube wukuthatha umbhobho uNtuli, obezama ukuchaza ukuthi izikhulumi zizolandelana kanjani, abebehambele umcimbi bavele bamemeza igama likaNobhala Jikelele we-ANC osamisiwe, uMnuz Ace Magashule, okwenze uNtuli angabe esazwakala abekusho.Kusize ukungenela komakadebona baleli qembu, boMkhonto weSizwe Miltary Veterans Association, okuyibona abakhuze abebebanga umsindo.Ngesonto eledlule uNtuli nosihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, bahhewulwa kabuhlungu ngabantu ababehambele icala.Ukuhhewulwa kwabo kwaze kwaholela ekutheni uZuma akhuze ngesikhathi esethula inkulumo yokuzibongela ekugcineni.
Izolo bebephume ngezinkani abalandeli bakaZuma ukuzomesekela.Phakathi kwabebezomeseka kubalwa amalungu esigungu esiphezulu se-ANC kuzwelonke nasesifundazweni, amakhosi nabamabandla ahlukene.Ekhuluma nabalandeli bakhe uZuma, uthe umsulwa kuwo wonke amacala abekwa wona.“Lingibuzile ijaji ukuthi ngiyawaphika noma ngiyawavuma yini la macala.
Ngathi ngiyawaphika wonke ngoba vele angiwazi.
Hlezi ngizwa kuthiwa ngiyisiboshwa, kodwa kangazi ukuthi ngenzeni.
UZuma uthe abakufunayo wukuba kushenxe umshushusi omkhulu wecala, u-Advocate Billy Downer, amsola ngokuchema.UZuma uthe uDowner nabaphenyi becala kabaziphathanga ngendlela efanele yokuziphatha kwabashushisi nabaphenyi bamacala.“Babekhokhoba ebusuku beyohleba nezinhloli zaseMelika, bephana izipho zikaKhisimusi ngegama lami.
Konke lokho kungukwephula umthetho.”UZuma uthe akakungabazi ukuthi leli cala lizophela maduze njengoba vele  kalikho.“Angikungabazi ukuthi uyothi uphela lo nyaka necala liyobe liphelile.”Uthe izinkulumo zocingo eziqoshiwe, zikuveza ngokusobala ukuthi wayeboshelwa amanqina enyathi, kusukela ekuqaleni.“Ngo-2005 kwase kukhona abase bevele bekhuluma ukuthi ngubani ozokuba yisekela-mengameli ngoba mina ngizosuswa.
Nangempela ngasuswa ngawo u-2005.”“Abantu engangibethemba nabo babengihleba, abanye bengibiza ngomfana woMzulu, abanye bengibiza ngesilima.
Ezingcingweni kukhona nababebuza ukuthi sishayelwa nini isipikili sokugcina ukuze ngife.”UZuma ngaphambi kokuba akhulume ubize indodana yakhe uDuduzani, ukuba ibingelele.
