Ugwetshwe udilikajele odlwengule ingane
INKANTOLO yeMantshi eMnambithi imgwebe udilikajele umsolwa otholwe enecala lokudlwengula ingane eneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye.U-Atiso Stenly Mofokeng (30), kuthiwa wabiza  umgilwa ngo-Agasti 2020, e-Elandslaagte, ezenza umuntu ofuna ukumthuma ugwayi esitolo.
Umsolwa kubikwa ukuthi wabamba umgilwa ngenkani,  wamkhumula izimpahla ayezigqokile wamdlwengula.Ngenkathi enza lokhu, kubikwa ukuthi wayembambe umlomo ngoba emvimba ukuthi angamemezi.Ngemuva kokugila ingane, kubikwa ukuthi wayitshela ukuthi ayigqoke.Umgilwa kubikwa ukuthi wafika kubo watshela ugogo wakhe okumehlele.Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority KwaZulu-Natal  uNkk Natasha Kara, uthe umsolwa wakhonjwa ngumgilwa ngaphambi kokuthi avalelwe ngamaphoyisa esitokisini.“UMofokeng oqale waliphika icala enkantolo, kubikwa ukuthi kwagcina ngokuthi alivume ngenkathi seliqulwa.
Akekho owabhadama umsolwa endaweni yesigameko ngokwesitatimende esathulwa enkantolo kodwa kunomfundi wesikole sasendaweni, owaqinisekisa ukuthi wambona ephuma esigangeni nomgilwa,” kubeka uNkk Kara.Isitatimende esethulwe ngumshushisi  uNkk Ashina Devi Singh,  siveza ukuthi umgilwa  bese ehlezi ehlalele ovalweni ngemuva kwesehlo.Ugogo wakhe oneminyaka engu-73, kubikwa ukuthi nguye obesehlezi emphelezela njalo ekuseni  uma eya esikoleni.Kubikwa ukuthi isimo sikanina kamgilwa , sigcine sintekenteke ngenxa yalesi sigameko, esenzeka esanda kushonelwa ngumyeni wakhe.Kubikwa ukuthi kugcine ngokuthi ashiye kulesi sifundazwe njengoba esezinze eGoli nomgilwa osefunda khona.Umshushisi uphinde wazisa inkantolo ukuthi umsolwa uthinteka nasecaleni lokugqekeza nelokushaya.UMqondisi wabaShushisi KwaZulu- Natal u-Advocate Elaine Zungu , uthe sikhulu isikhalo emphakathini ngamacala athinta ukuhlukunyezwa kwezingane.“Yize uMbuso ubungenayo imiphumela yolibofuzo, ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda bofakazi yibo obuqinisekise isenzo sikamsolwa.
Sinxusa amalungu omphakathi ukuthi ahlezi eqaphile ngaso sonke isikhathi,” kubeka u-Advocate Zungu.
Ubengazi umfelokazi ohlabane ngoR56 million weLotto
UBONGA umyeni ongasekho emhlabeni umfelokazi waKwaZulu-Natal ohlabane ngesamba sikaR56 million weLotto ebese kuphele iminyaka eyizama kodwa lutho inhlanhla.
Owesifazane osekuphele unyaka ashonelwa ngumyeni, uhlabane ngoR56 million emuva kokuthi edlale ngo-R7.50 kuphela eMeerensee Dried Fruits And Nuts, eRichards Bay.
AbeThuba bathi umfelokazi oseyinikiwe imali, wayedlale iPowerBall Jackpot kaR112 million yangoMeyi 4 kanti uzohlala, wangabe esazibheka izinombolo eziwinile.
"Bengilokhu ngidlala izinombolo ezifanayo selokhu kwaqala iPowerBall eNingizimu Afrika.
Bengingazi ukuthi ngiwinile kwaze kuba ngibona udaba obelushicilelwe ephephandabeni lomphakathi, kuthiwa kufuneka owine uR56 million wePowerBall.
Yingaleso sikhathi engibheke khona ithikithi lami.
Ngathuka ngibona ukuthi ngiwinile nokuwusuku olufanayo nokwashona ngalo umyeni wami nyakenye,"kusho umfelokazi.Ephetha umfelokazi uthe ziningi izinto asezihlelele le mali, ezingezogcina ngokusiza yena kuphela kodwa zizothuthukisa nempilo yomndeni wakhe.
"Sengivele ngibusiswe ngayo yonke into engiyidingayo.
Ngizosebenzisa lo mhlomulo ngithengele indodana yami nonkosikazi wayo umuzi nemoto.
Enye ngizoyisebenzisa ukunakekela umama wami, ngisize nomngani wami onenkinga yemali njengamanje, bese ngiyilondoloza enye imali,"kusho umfelokazi.Isikhulu esiphezulu seThuba, uCharmaine Mabuza, sithe bayamhalalisela kakhulu owesifazane ngokuhlabana ngalesi samba semali.
Uveze nokuthi abantu abahlabana kwiPowerBall basuke beqhamuka ezindaweni eziningi ezahlukene eNingizimu Afrika kanjalo nangaphansi kwezimo ezingefani.
Lokhu uthe kuyinhloso yabo ukuthi iLotto ikwazi ukudlalwa kalula yibona bonke abantu, okuyinto abayibona yenzeka kusukela ngo-2015 bethola ilayisensi yokusabalala kuzwelonke.
Uphethe ngokuthi welulekiwe  owesifazane ohlabanile njengoba kwenziwa kusukela kubantu abahlabane ngoR50 000 kuya phezulu.
Kuxoshwe nemeya i-IFP ixosha amakhansela
I-IFP isikhombe indlela amakhansela amahlanu akuMasipala waseMthonjaneni eMelmoth.Okhulumela leli qembu, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe bekuhlangane umkhandlu kazwelonke waleli qembu izolo, kwathi ngaphansi kwesigaba u-11.10 somthethosisekelo we-IFP kwanqunywa ukuba kuxoshwe eqenjini lawa makhansela.
Uthe la makhansela ngoMnuz Sibonginkosi Biyela, obeyimeya, u-Eric Masikane, uTholinhlanhla Ngema, uZipho Ndlovu noNhlonipho Buthelezi.“Laba batholwe benecala lokungaziphathi ngendlela okumele baziphathe ngayo, balandele umthethosisekelo weqembu.
Bebedelela nemiyalelo yeqembu,” kusho uHlengwa.
Uthe laba abasewona amakhansela e-IFP futhi bawazisile umasipala ngalokhu.
Uthe maduzane bazokhipha isimemezelo mayelana nokuvalwa kwesikhala semeya.
IPosi nezinhlelo zokuvala izikhungo zalo
ISOUTH African Post Office ithi phansi amaphaphu, akukho muntu  ozolahlekelwa njengoba ihlela ukuvala izikhungo zayo ezingu-130 ezweni lonke.Esinye sezizathu zokuvalwa kwalezi zikhungo wukungenzi inzuzo eyanele nokusondelana eduze kwezinye zazo.KwaZulu-Natal kulindeleke ukuthi kuvalwe izikhungo eziyisishiyagalolunye zePosi, bese zihlanganiswa nezinye.
Iningi lezikhungo ezizovalwa zisezindaweni ezisemadolobheni.Lapha kubalwa iWinkelspruit ezohlanganiswa neManzimtoti, iWandsbeck efakwa ngaphansi kwaseWestville, Umdoni uhlanganiswe neScottburgh, Emphiti ube yinto eyodwa nePietermaritzburg, iDorpspruit ihlanganiswe neMayor’s Walk, iBalgowan ihlanganiswe neHowick, iFilidi ihlanganise neVryheid, iFerrax ingene ngaphansi kweNewcastle bese iBellair ihlanganiswe neRossburgh.Okhulumela iPosi KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nobuhle Njapha, uthe abasebenzi nemishini bazothunyelwa emagatsheni amakhulu ePosi bayosebenza khona.Esitatimendeni uthe umvalelandlini odalwe wukubheduka kweCovid-19 phambilini uholele ekutheni kumiswe ukusebenza kwePosi okwakugcina ngokuthi kuholelwe khona izimpesheni kuphela.Lokhu uthe kubalahlekisele ngemali kodwa sebeyavuka bama ngezinyawo manje.“Sinezingxoxo nabanikazi bezindawo esizisebenzisayo, osekuholele ekutheni kuvulwe amagatsha ethu angu-27 abekade evaliwe isikhashana.
Ziyaqhubeka lezi zingxoxo ukuze kuvulwe amanye avaliwe,” kusho uNksz Njapha.Uthe basophe ukusebenza ngokubambisana nosomabhizinisi nemiphakathi, ngenhloso yokuphucula izikhungo zabo nendlela ezenza ngayo umsebenzi.UNksz Njapha uthe njengamanje basebenza kanzima ePosini bathumela amaphasela kubanikazi bawo njengoba kuke kwaba nokubambazeleka phambilini.
IPosi lihambisa amaphasela alinganiselwa esigidini ngosuku.
Usashaqekile owesifazane osinde ehlaselwa ’yiSikebhe’
USASHAQEKILE owesifazane wakwaNqokotho KwaNongoma, osinde kukubi ehlaselwa yiqembu leSkebhe sasendaweni, okuthiwa simshaqe kubo engazelele.UNksz Simphiwe Khumalo ( 28 ), uthi namanje usathuthumela uma ecabanga isihluku ahlangabezane naso ngoMgqibelo odlule ngenkathi kugasela abantu abebehamba ngezimoto ezimbili namaveni amabili kubo ngabo-7 ekuseni.Uthe bebelele ngenkathi kugasela abantu abahlanu, okubalwa kubo nabesifazane ababili.
Kuthiwa baqale benza sengathi bafuna ukuthenga imikhiqizo yeHerbal Life, njengoba eziphilisa ngokudayisa.
Ithimba labantu abangu-11,  kuthiwa limthathe ngoshova uNksz Khumalo, lamfaka kwenye yezimoto ebelihamba ngazo.Umzala kamgilwa obesola ukuthi kabezile kahle laba bantu, kuthiwa ulande iqembu labangani bakhe, elivimbe izimoto ngokusizwa ngamalungu omphakathi.
Kuthiwa abasolwa babaleke nomgilwa (uNksz Khumalo)  belubangise ehlathini elisendaweni, eMona.“Umqondo wami wubusudidekile ngenkathi kuxabana amalungu omphakathi nabantu abebengithumba,” kuchaza owesifazane.Eqhuba, uthe uzamile ukubuza kumlisa obeshayela imoto abekuyo kodwa wahluleka ukuthola ukuthi wenzeni njengoba emtshele ukuthi yena uqashelwe ukuba ngumshayeli kuphela.“Ukube kaliqhamukanga iphoyisa ehlathini mhlawumbe ngabe kukhulunywa okunye ngami namhlanje.
Okungikhathazayo wukuthi namanje angazi ukuthi yini eholele ekutheni ngihlukunyezwe ngaleya ndlela.
Ngizizwa ngingasaphephile nhlobo,” kubeka uNksz Khumalo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, usiqinisekisile isigameko sokuthunjwa kowesifazane kule ndawo.“Kuvulwe icala lokuthumba nelokuzama ukubulala esiteshini saKwaNongoma.
Abasolwa abangu-11 abathinteka kuleli cala bavele kafushane eNkantolo yeMantshi kule ndawo ngoMsombuluko.
Bonke abasolwa  basagcinwe esitokisini ngenxa yophenyo olusaqhutshwa ngamaphoyisa,” kubeka uGwala.Ethintwa usihlalo weSklebhe esifundazweni, uMnuz Tallman Zuma, uthe bebengakezwa lutho mayelana nokwenzekile.
“Zonke izinhlangano ezisebenza ngaphansi kweKZNCCPA elwa nobugebengu, ziyaye zixhumane nezinduna, amakhansela kanjalo namaphoyisa.
Asizithatheli izinqumo ngaphandle kokuxhumana nobuholi bendawo nabomthetho.
Ngakho- ke kuyiphutha okwenziwe yilabo bantu,” kusho uZuma.
Uphethe ngokuthi uzolulandelela udaba ukuze athole kabanzi ngokwekenzekile.
Izinyunyana zifuna othisha bagonyelwe iCovid-19
NJENGOBA uMnyango weMfundo eyiSisekelo uphakamise ukuthi bonke abafundi basemabangeni aphansi babuyele ezikoleni, uma kuvulwa izikole ngoJulayi 26, izinyunyana zothisha zithi kumele othisha babe sebegonyiwe.Okwamanje uhlelo lokugoma kuleli lusagxile kubantu abadala abaneminyaka engu-60 kuya phezulu, kanjalo nabasebenzi bezempilo.UNobhala jikelele weSadtu, uMnuz Mugwena Maluleke, uthe babethenjiswe ukuthi bazogonywa ngasekupheleni kuka-Ephreli kodwa kwaba nokubambezeleka.Uthe bachazelwa kodwa abasizwanga isizathu esenza ukuthi kube nokubambezeleka ekutheni bagonywe.“Sifuna othisha bagonywe.
Kasazi ukuthi yini le engaka ebambile ekubeni  ngabe sebegomile othisha.
Uma kuwukuthi kunezinkinga zokuthi kutholakale imigomo eyanele, kumele saziswe,” kusho uMaluleke.Uthe bafuna ukuthi othisha bagonywe ngoba kukhona izikole lapho kutholakale khona iCovid-19, ezinye zazo zize zavalwa.“Siyazi ngeke siqhudelane nabasebenzi bezempilo, kodwa besilindele ukuthi uma kuphela ukugonywa kwabo kuzobe sekulandela othisha.
Siyabagqugquzela othisha ukuthi baye kogoma uma sekufike isikhathi sabo,” kusho uMaluleke.UMnuz Sibusiso Malinga, ibamba likamengameli weNatu, uthe kumele ngabe sebegomiwe othisha.Uthe kababaphoqi ukuthi babagome kodwa kungaba kuhle bagome ukuze bazisindise.“Bekufanele silandele, kasisho ukuthi sithi kakugcinwe ngabantu abadala noma kasinendaba nabo kodwa othisha basengcupheni.
Kumele othisha bagonywe ngokushesha.”Abaholi balezi zinyunyana basho lokhu nje izinyunyana zenza ucwaningo ngokuhlanganyela kumalungu azo, zibuza ukuthi azogoma yini, bahlala kuziphi izifunda, bafundisa kuziphi izikole nokuthi baneminyaka emingaki yokuzalwa.
Lokhu zikwenzela ukubona ukuthi bangaki abazimisele ngokugoma.
Kuthunyelwe amasosha eGauteng
KUTHUNYELWE amasosha ukuthi ayosiza abasebenzi bezempilo ababhekene nengcindezi njengoba izibalo zabahaqwa yoCovid-19 zinyuke kakhulu eGauteng.Izolo inhloko yophiko lwamasosha abhekele ezempilo  uBrigadier General Zuziwe Maso, uthe kuthunyelwe ithimba lamasosha angu-60  kulesi sifundazwe ukuze azokwengeza kubasebenzi bezempilo abanegcindezi yomsebenzi ngenxa yokwanda kweziguli ezilaliswe ezibhedlela.Uthe kuleli thimba kukhona odokotela, onesi, abezimo eziphuthumayo abazokwengeza kulabo abakhona esifundazweni.UNdunankulu walesi sifundazwe uMnuz David Makhura  obekhuluma ngesikhathi emukela amasosha, uthe iGauteng yenza u70%  wezibalo zabahaqwe yileli gciwane kuzwelonke ezikhishwa zonke izinsuku."
Asisekho isifunda esingcono kunesinye  eGauteng zonke zinabantu abaningi abahaqekayo usuku nosuku.
Sisha nendlu eGauteng, njengamanje sesisidlulile isibalo sabantu esiphezulu abahaqeka  ngesiwombe sesibili sokuhlasela kwaleli gciwane.
Okwamanje asikafiki lapho izibalo sezimi ndawonye zisalokhu zikhula.
Noma kungenzeka ukuthi izibalo zabahaqekayo zehle kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi kwehle izibalo zabasezibhedlela.
Ayikho indawo ephephile ngisho nangaphakathi endlini akusaphephile abantu abafake izifonyo,"  kusho yena.Uthe okuphoxayo ukuthi kusenabantu abangayishayimkhuba imithetho ebekiwe yokunqanda ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane basaqhubeka nokungazifaki izifonyo, bagcwele ezindaweni zezokuzithokozisa.
Benza sengathi akukho okonakele.Uqhube wathi  okwamanje basabonisana nesigungu songqongqoshe ababhekele iCorona kuleli, iNational Coronavirus Command Council (NCC),   mayelana nokuthi ngeke yini isifundazwe saseGauteng sinyuselwe esigabeni esiphezulu sokuvalwa kwezwe ukuze kulawulwe ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane.Uthe  zonke izikhungo zezempilo kungaba ezizimele noma ezikahulumeni zinengcindezi efanayo."
Imibhede esinayo asikho isiqiniseko sokuthi ngakusasa izobe isekhona ngoba isibalo sikhula nsuku zonke.
Njengamanje sinabahlengikazi abangu-5000 abengeziwe esibalweni esinaso kanye namasosha.
Amasosha ayasisiza kodwa asikwazi ukuthi silokhu sibuyela kuNgqongqoshe  siyocela amanye ngoba nawo abhekene nomsebenzi wokunakekela ozakwabo nabo abahaqwe yilo leli gciwane," kusho yena.Izibalo zakamuva zikhomba ukuthi bangu-13 155 abantu abasha abahaqwe yicovid-19 kuleli, kubo u70% abantu baseGauteng.
Ezabashone emahoreni angu-24 zikhomba ukuthi bangu- 112 ababulelwe izifo ezihlobene neCovid-19.
Inkulumo eqoshiwe ngamaqhinga okuvimba ukugcotshwa kweSilo
KUBUKEKA sengathi akakaliphonsi ithawula ekuphonseleni inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, uMntwana uThokozani Zulu.Kuputshuke inkulumo eqoshiwe, okusolwa ukuthi yenziwe nguMntwana uThokozani, lapho edingida amaqhinga okuphonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Kule nkulumo ethunyelelwe Isolezwe lo wesilisa okusolwa ukuthi uMntwana uThokozani, uzwakala enxenxa abantwana basendlunkulu abangahambisani nokuqokwa kweSilo, ukuba bangapheli umoya.Lo wesilisa uzwakala enxenxa bonke labo abahambisana nabo ukuba baphelele lapho bekufihlwa khona uMntwana uSiphiwe Delange eMtubatuba ngempelasonto, ukuze bazodingida ngezinhlelo zabo zokuphonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Kule nkulumo, owesilisa uzwakala ezishaya isifuba ngencwadi yokuphonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo athi uyayibhala.
Uzwakala ezethemba njengoba esola nokuthi undunankulu kaZulu, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, usedidikeli ukuthi uzokulwisa kanjani ukuphonselwa inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Kuphinde kuvele ukuthi abantwana abangahambisani nokuqokwa kweSilo, banezinhlelo zokufaka udaba enkantolo kepha bakhethe ukuqala ngokubhala incwadi kuqala njengoba besahlanganisa imali yokuya enkantolo.“Sengiyayiqeda (incwadi) wena weNdlovu.
Ngeke sisishiye isikhathi Ndabezitha ngoba ziyime emthumeni.
Yingakho noMntwana wakwaPhindangene esethule, ngoba ziyime emthumeni.
Ngokucabanga kwami Ndaba iqhinga lethu singalishintsha singayi enkantolo ngoba izimali asikabi nazo, sibhale le ncwadi,” kusho lo wesilisa.Ethintwa Isolezwe, uMntwana uThokozani unqabile ukuphawula.
Uyalele iphephandaba ukuba yonke imibuzo elifisa ukuyibuza, liyibuze kumuntu oliputshuzele le nkulumo eqoshiwe.“Ngeke mina ngiphendule ngezinkulumo ezithunyelwe imithombo efihliwe.
Anginankinga ukubhekana nanoma ngubani, kepha ngeke ngiphendulane nabantu abazifihlayo.”UMntwana uThokozani uqale ukuba sematheni ngesikhathi kusuka isiphithiphithi emhlanganweni okwafundwa kuwo incwadi yefa  eyashiywa iNdlovukazi Shiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu, ephakamisa igama lozongena esihlalweni sobukhosi.Lesi siphithiphithi sasuka emuva kokuba uMntwana uThokozani esukume wacela ukubuza, kanti lesi siphithiphithi saholela ekutheni iSilo siphume ngesamagundwane.NgeSonto uMntwana uThokozani uphinde wenza isithembiso sokuthi usazogeqa amagula ngalesi sigameko, uma sekufike isikhathi.
Umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi ukhombise ukushisa ngesonto eledlule njengoba abantwana bakwaKhethomthandayo, uMntwana uNtandoyenkosi noMntwana uNtombizosuthu, bephindele enkantolo ephakeme eMgungundlovu, lapho bebefuna ukuthola isivimbelo sesikhashana esizomisa ukugcotshwa ngokusemthethweni kweSilo.Kulesi sicelo sebesekwa ngelinye lamazinyane kaMdlokombane, uMntwana uNhlanganiso Zulu, waKwaDlamahlahla.
Ngesonto eledlule uMntwana uNhlanganiso ufake incwadi efungelwe enkantolo lapho ephonsela inselelo ukuqokwa kweSilo.Emaphepheni okuphendula, uButhelezi uthe akekho ofanelwe yilesi sihlalo ngaphandle kweSilo esisanda kuqokwa.
UButhelezi uthe iSilo sakhethwa ngokulandelwa kwamasiko nemithetho elawulwa ukuqokwa kwamakhosi.Inkantolo yaluhlehlisela usuku olungaziwa lolu daba, yanikeza zonke izinhlangothi ezithintekayo umnqamulajuqu wangoJuni 18, ukuba zifake amaphepha okuphendula.
Lisenkingeni iphoyisa elishaye isidudla esiteshini
KUSE ngokunye ephoyiseni laseMnambithi selivulelwa icala lokushayela budedengu kade liklwebha isidudla ngaphandle kwesiteshi, lishayelwa ihlombe, kukhala namakhwela nomkikizo.Lo mlisa ugaxele kabili ngoba amaphoyisa avule icala lobugebengu ekubeni nangaphakathi emsebenzini angase abhekane necala njengoba kuthiwa kunophenyo.Iphoyisa ebelingekho emsebenzini, kuthiwa lishaye imoto yalo iVW Polo laya phambi kwesiteshi, lafika laqala layivuthela iphenduphenduka ngesikhulu isivinini.Imoto le inezinombolo zaseMnambithi ngaphambili, ngemuva kayinalo ipleti lezinombolo.
Igama lephoyisa lisagodliwe ngoba belingakaboshwa futhi belingakaveli nasenkantolo kodwa isigameko senzeke emgwaqweni uKing esiteshini eMnambithi.
I-video iveza konke lokhu, kuzwakala nabamhlohlayo umshayeli, kubuye kuvele nesakhiwo sesiteshi samaphoyisa nezimoto zawo.
Ngesikhathi iphoyisa lenza lokhu kuphazamiseke nezinye izimoto ngoba bezingeke zikwazi ukudlula esimeni esinjalo.
Ngesikhathi umshayeli enza lokhu wubebukeka engazi nanyaka nje, ekhiphe isandla esisodwa ngaphandle, kuvela nezimoto sezimile abasashayeli kungathi bayesaba ukwedlula.
Abaningi ababone i-video bebebuza ukuthi amanye amaphoyisa akhona athule athini, kawamnqandi ngani uzakwabo ngoba angaze alimaze abanye abantu, abangahlangene nomdlalo wakhe.
Babodwa abebesola ukuthi umuntu womthetho weqiwe ngamambawu, bazwakala bebuzana ukuthi kwenzenjani besho nokuthi uzibizela ukuboshwa.
Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uKapteni Nqobile Gwala, uthe likhona icala elivulelwe lo mlisa.
“Kuvulwe icala lokushayela budedengu esiteshini samaphoyisa eMnambithi, emuva kwezinsolo zokuthi iphoyisa ebelingekho emsebenzini belihlohloloza imoto emgwaqweni uKing.
Lukhona nophenyo lwangaphakathi oluqhubekayo.
Namaphoyisa ayaqhubeka necala lawo,’’ kusho uKapteni Gwala.
Kuvele ukuthi uma icala lihlaziywa kahle empeleni mathathu amacala abhekene nawo umsolwa.
Bafuna kubuyiswe imeya exoshiwe namakhansela
IBIJAMELENE phakathi kwamaphoyisa nezakhamuzi zaseMelmoth ezivale imigwaqo izolo zifuna kubuyiswe imeya namakhansela asanda kuxoshwa yi-IFP kuMasipala waseMthonjaneni.Ngenyanga eyedlule i-IFP yakhomba indlela imeya yalo mkhandlu, uMnuz Sibonginkosi Biyela, iketango lobumeya lase ligaxwa kuMnuz Mbangiseni Biyela.Leli qembu laphinde laxosha amakhansela amane, uMnuz Eric Masikane, uTholinhlanhla Ngema, uZipho Ndlovu noNhlonipho Buthelezi.Bonke laba baxoshwa emva kokuthi betholakale benecala lokuphula umthetho wokuziphatha kwamalungu eqembu.Izolo izakhamuzi zivuke umbhejazane zathi zifuna la makhansela abuyiswe.Laba bhikishi bathe i-IFP ayinalo ilungelo lokuxosha la makhansela ngoba akusiyo i-IFP eyawavotela kepha umphakathi owawabeka.Ababhikishi basabise ngokuqhubeka nombhikisho kuze kube kubuyiselwa laba abaxoshwe ezikhundleni zabo.Izolo bebevale imigwaqo emikhulu, u-R66 no-R68, exhumanisa le ndawo namadolobha afana neMpangeni, Showe neVryheid.Nakuba amaphoyisa esebenzise izinhlamvu zenjoloba  nesisi esikhalisa unyembezi ukuzama ukuhlakaza ababhikishi kepha kuze kwashona ilanga isajamelene.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile izolo ntambama ukuthi imigwaqo ibisavaliwe.“Amaphoyisa asiqaphile isimo, ayazama ukubuyisa uzinzo,” kusho uCapt Gwala.Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uwugxekile lo mbhikisho, wathi ukucekelwa kwempahla angeke kubasize ngalutho ababhikishi.Uthe okuxakayo ukuthi kubona bonke laba abaxoshiwe, akekho noyedwa ophonsele inselelo isinqumo sokubaxosha.“Umthethosisekelo weqembu unika noma ngabe ubani ilungelo lokudlulisa isinqumo uma engenelisekile.
Akekho noyedwa kubona okwenzile lokho,’’ usho kanje.UHlengwa uthe okunye okumangazayo ukuthi kungani ababhikishi bengahambisi izikhalazo zabo emahhovisi e-IFP uma kuwukuthi abanelisekile ngesinqumo se-IFP.“Kungani bekhethe ukuvala imigwaqo lapho kungekho khona amahhovisi e-IFP?
Uma ngempela kuwukuthi bayayazi into abayenzayo, abaphume emgwaqweni ngoba ngeke sikwazi ukubaphendula uma besemgwaqweni.“Le nto abayenzayo iwukuphula umthetho futhi ayibalekeleli nakancane kule nto abayifunayo.
Sinxusa amaphoyisa ukuba enze umsebenzi wawo ngoba ayilungile le nto eyenzekayo,” kuphetha uHlengwa.
Kuntwela ezansi ngokubuyisana kwabasendlunkulu
KUNENHLANSI yethemba ngokubumbana kwabaseNdlunkulu kaZulu ababanga ubukhosi obushiywe yiSilo uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu okhothame ngasekuqaleni konyaka.ISilo uMisizulu kaZwelithini kade sinomhlangano noMntwana uNombuso wasesigodlweni KwaKhethomthandayo, okuyindlu efake udaba enkantolo.IMbube ekhotheme yalandelwa yiNdlovukazi uMantfombi MaDlamini Zulu wesigodlo saKwaKhangelamankene obeyibamba bukhosi.
INdlovukazi ekhotheme yiyona ezala iSilo esihleli esihlalweni manje futhi yiyona  okuthiwa yashiya ibhale igama laso encwadini yamafa eyafundwa bukhoma kwabezindaba.Isolezwe ngeSonto linesitatimende seSilo siqinisekisa ngomhlangano esibe nawo noMntwana uNombuso, kukhona nezithombe ezisabalele behleli ndawonye etafuleni.
Isitatimende sivuma ukuthi kuxoxwa ngodaba lobumbano.“NgoLwesine ngoJuni 25 iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sihlangane nodadewabo uNombuso.
Inhloso yomhlangano wabo bekuwukuxoxa ukuthi kungenziwa kanjani ukuze kubanjiswane, kusetshenziswane phakathi kwawo wonke amazinyane eSilo,’’ kusho isitatimende esithunyelwe nguMntwana uThulani Zulu okhulumela iSilo.
Imizamo yokuthola uMntwana uNombuso kayiphumelelanga ngoba ucingo lwakhe belungabanjwa, kwangabuya ngisho impendulo yomyalezo awuthunyelwe ebuzwa ngomhlangano.Akucaci noma icala elisenkantolo lizohoxiswa yini emuva komhlangano kodwa amahemuhemu athi lingase likhishwe enkantolo maduze.
Umhlangano uba khona nje, uke wabhuntsha okokuqala kwaze kwasolwa uNdunankulu kaZulu uMangosuthu Buthelezi ngokutshela iSilo ukuthi singavumi ukuhlangana nodadewabo uMntwana Nombuso.Udaba olubangwayo endlunkulu wukuthi ngubani ofanelwe wukuthatha isihlalo seSilo.
Kusanda kuqubuka umsindo ngesikhathi kukhunyulwa inzilo, kugezwa nondlunkulu beSilo, kubangwa yona indaba yesihlalo seSilo.
ISilo uMisuzulu sike savela emithonjeni yabezindaba silokhu sishumayela indaba yobumbano endlunkulu.
UZikalala nesivumelwano esizosiza osomabhizinisi
UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, usayine isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nebhange i-African Export-Import Bank (Afreximbank), ngenhloso yokuqinisa ubudlelwane bokuhwebelana kwesifundazwe nezwekazi i-Afrika.Lesi sivumelwano sisayinwe nguZikalala izolo ekuseni eThekwini, bexhumana ngezobuchwephese nomengameli webhange uSolwazi Benedict Orama.UZikalala uthe bathathe igxathu elibalulekile lokuqinisa ubudlelwane nebhange eligxile ekuthuthukisweni kokuhwebelana kwamazwe ase-Afrika.
Wathi ibhange likhangisa imikhiqizo, lifake imali ezintweni ezihambisana nokukhiqiza e-Afrika, ngenhloso yokuhwebelana namazwe akuleli zwekazi.“Kunezinhlelo zentuthuko leli bhange elihlela ukuzixhasa ezifana neNyanza Titanium esiqalile ukwakhiwa endaweni yezimboni eRichards Bay.
Balekelela nohlelo lokuthuthukiswa koThukela Resort engeyezokuvakasha esifundazweni,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe zikhona nezinye izinhlelo zokuxhasa izimboni ezikhiqizayo.
Ugcizelele ukuthi ibhange lizosebenzisana nezikhungo zikahulumeni njengeKZN Growth Fund, Ithala, Dube Trade Port neTrade and Investment esifundazweni.“Lesi sivumelwano sizokwenza osomabhizinisi besifundazwe bakwazi ukuboleka imali uma beyidinga futhi kube lula ukusabalalisa imikhiqizo yabo e-Afrika.
Ibhange lizoba yingxenye yemibukiso yamabhizinisi nemikhiqizo esingathwa yisifundazwe,” kuchaza uZikalala.Udalule nokuthi konke bakwenza belandela imigomo ye-African Union, eyenza kuvuleleke ukuhwebelana kwamazwe aleli zwekazi.UZikalala uthe uma osomabhizinisi abasathuthuka befuna uxhaso lwesamba semali ebhange Ithala  nakwiGrowth Fund kodwa bengalutholi, uhulumeni uzobaxhumanisa ne-Afreximbank.U-Orama uncome lobu budlelwano abangene kubona nohulumeni wesifundazwe wathi kuyingqophamlando futhi kuzohlomula izinhlangothi zombili.
Leli bhange lisungulwe ngo-1993, kanti ekomkhulu lalo kuseCairo okuyinhlokodolobha yezwe i-Egypt.
Injabulo benikezwa izindlu eNquthu
IMINDENI emibili yaseNquthu, ibonga ayiphezi kosomabhizinisi nomasipala wendawo ngemuva kokuthi benikezwe izindlu zomxhaso.Izindlu zinikezwe umndeni wakwaMabaso esigodini saseKhuphe, nowakwaXimba esigodini saseNgedla.
Le mindeni ithole izindlu ezinamagumbi amane okulala, ikhishi nendlu yokugezela.UNksz Hloniphile Mabaso (36), ohlala namalungu omndeni wakhe awu-10, uthe impilo yaba nzima kubona ngemuva kokushona kukagogo wabo.“Besihlala nogogo, nokuyilapho sikhethwe khona ukuthi sakhelwe umuzi ukuze sibe seduzane naye singamshiyi.
Bekunzima ukuhlala sisonke kulezi zindlu ebezikhona ngoba bezincane, thina sibaningi.
Impilo yethu izoshintsha njengoba bekuyizindlu zodaka, manje sithole indlu enhle enefenisha phakathi,“ kuchaza uNksz Mabaso.Uveze ukuthi empilweni yakhe wayengacabangi ukuthi uyoke abuke iDStv kodwa lo muzi ufike nayo.UNkk Sebenzile Ximba, uveze ukuthi yize bebathathu emndenini kodwa bebehlala kanzima ezindlini zodaka.Wathi impilo izoshintsha kakhulu ngemuva kokuthola lo muzi.Uveze ukuthi empilweni yakhe wayengacabangi ukuthi uyoke abuke iDStv kodwa lo muzi ufike nayo.UNkk Sebenzile Ximba, uveze ukuthi yize bebathathu emndenini kodwa bebehlala kanzima ezindlini zodaka.Wathi impilo izoshintsha kakhulu ngemuva kokuthola lo muzi.Lezi zindlu zinikelwe nguMntwana wakwaPhindangene uMangosuthu Buthelezi, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa onguMengameli we-IFP, neMeya yaseNquthu uMnuz Lindokuhle Shabalala.
UMntwana ubonge kuMasipala waseNquthu ngokukhumbula abantu abakhele lomasipala.“Thina bantu abamnyama sithwale kanzima ngenxa yobandlululo olusenze izimpabanga.
Ngakho kuyathokozisa ukuthi sinabaholi abafana nabaseNquthu abakhumbulayo ukuthi abantu bakithi bafanelwe okungcono, " kusho uButhelezi.
Seyimi ngomumo iSantaco ngokhetho lwabaholi
INHLANGANO yamatekisi, iSouth African National Taxi Council (Santaco) imi ngomumo ukusingatha ukhetho lokuthola ubuholi obusha, kusukela kososeshini kuyoshaya phezulu esifundazweni KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kudalulwe ngumphathi wehhovisi leSantaco esifundazweni, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase.Udalule ukuthi kusukela ngoJuni 1 kuze kube wuSepthemba 30 kuzobe kukhethwa ubuholi obusha kososeshini.Uthe sebeqedile ngokukhetha ubuholi baKwaNongoma obekhungethwe yizinxushunxushu, kwathathwa isinqumo sokuthi makuqalwe ngabo khona kuzolethwa uzinzo.IKwaZulu-Natal inososeshini bamatekisi abangu-246 ezifundeni ezingu-16.
Kusuka ngo-Okthoba 1 kuze kube wuNovemba 30 yisikhathi esihlelelwe ukukhetha ubuholi ezifundeni.“NgoJanuwari wonyaka ozayo kumele sibe sesiqedile ukukhetha ubuholi obusha besifundazwe njengoba ngo-Ephreli 2022 kuzokhethwa ubuholi bukazwelonke.
Konke sekumi ngomumo ngezinhlelo zokusingatha ukhetho,” kusho uShangase.Uthe abakhethisa ezingeni lososeshini, yiManagement Committee okuyisigungu esiphezulu seSantaco.
Lolu hlaka lwakhiwa ngabantu abangu-64, okuwukuthi isifunda ngasinye sikhipha abantu abane abakha uhlaka, okuyibona abakhethisayo kodwa umuntu akakhethisi kusoseshini aqhamuka kuwona.UShangase uthe umuntu olungele ukungenela ukhetho kusoseshini igama lakhe livela ebhodini, ngogunyaziwe ukuthi ahwebe embonini.“Kumele abe nephemithi, umazisi wakhe, iphepha lemoto ne-certificate of fitness eshoyoukuthi ikulungele ukuba semgwaqweni,” kusho uShangase.Uthe bawuhoxisa umgomo owawuthi ongenela ukhetho kumele abe neminyaka emihlanu eyilungu likasoseshini.
Inkantolo yaphoqa iSantaco ukuthi iwuyeke lo mgomo ngoba wabekwa yiManagement Committee kawugunyazwanga engqungqutheleni eyayingo-2017.Abanezikhalo ngokhetho, iSantaco ithi babika ngazo kwabakhethisayo nasezingqaphelini zokhetho.
Uma bengasizakali banikwa ifomu yezikhalo okudingeka bayigcwalise zingakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ngemva kokhetho, bacacise ngabakhala ngakho.UShangase uthe abasuke bengamele ukhetho yibhodi elizimele njengoba beyaye besebenzisane ne-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) beqinisekisa ukuthi ivoti lomuntu liyimfihlo.Uthe ososeshini abavame ukukhungathwa wudlame nemidonsiswano, basebenzisana noMnyango wezokuPhepha namaphoyisa, ukuze ukhetho lusingathwe ngempumelelo.UShangase uthe ngosuku lokhetho kumele ikhorami ibe ngaphezu kuka-50% wamalungu kasoseshini.
Uthe okhethweni lwesifunda nolwesifundazwe balandela imigudu ecishe ifane neyokhetho lososeshini.Okhethweni lwesifundazwe amalungu ezifundeni anikwa izinsuku ezingu-15 ngaphambi kosuku lokhetho, ukuthi aphakamise amagama abantu afuna bakhethwe babe ngabaholi.
Izikhundla eziyisikhombisa ezisuke zigaqelwe, okungesikasihlalo, yiphini lakhe, wunobhala nephini lakhe, wumgcinimafa, ngowengamele ezokuqeqesha nomkhulumeli.Ngosuku lokhetho isifunda simelwa yizithunywa ezingu-10 eziqale zihlolisiswe ukuthi ziyahlangabezana yini nemigomo yokhetho nokuthi zigunyaziwe ukuba lapho kukhethwa khona.UShangase uncome ubuholi obukhona njengamanje wathi buzuze lukhulu eminyakeni emine busehhovisi.
Uthe busondeze ibhodi elikhipha izimvume zokuhweba kubantu, basayina izimvume zokusebenzisana neminyango kahulumeni, beqinisa ubudlelwano, baqinisa ezokuphepha nongqongqoshe womnyango, bacija ithimba elidingida ngezinxushunxushu, balwa nodlame, bathengela izifunda izimoto, banohlelo lokucija ngamakhono izitshudeni eziphuma emanyuvesi, bandisa ezemidlalo nokuzivocavoca kwabashayeli, bafukula abesifazane embonini, futhi bakha ubudlelwano nomalume nabezimoto ezikhokhelwa ngebanga ezilihambile.Uthe zisekhona izinselelo, okubalwa kuzona ukungabi nozinzo kwezinye izindawo embonini, wukusocongana, wukwehla komsebenzi wezokuthutha, wukudliwa kwezimoto bese kuba nababize ngezigebengu ezingena zicashe ngemboni ukuze zenze ubugebengu.
Sizoyithola maduze inkosi - uMntwana uThembi
UMNTWANA uThembi Ndlovu-Zulu usethembise ukuthi uzotholakala maduze ozongena esihlalweni esishiywe yiSilo esisasanda kukhothama, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.UMntwana uThembi, ongudadewabo kaMdlokombane, uthe iSilo sizotholakala uma indlunkulu isiphothule ukuzila.UMntwana uThembi le nkulumo uyenze ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku lapho ebethula khona inkulumo yokwamukela indondo ahlonishwe ngayo wuMasipala wesiFunda Amajuba.Lo masipala uhloniphe uMntwana uThembi ngendondo ngokuthuthukisa  nokuqhakambisa amasiko nezamaciko ezindaweni ezakhele wona umasipala.UMntwana uThembi ukhulume kanjena nje, ngesonto elidlule usanda kutshela Isolezwe ukuthi akukakavalwa ukuqokwa kweSilo.UMntwana uThembi watshela leli phephandaba ukuthi njengoba iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini singakagcotshwa ngokusemthethweni, kusavulekile ukuthi kungaphakanyiswa amanye amagama abazoqokelwa ukungena esihlalweni sobukhosi.Yize enkulumweni yakhe yangoLwesihlanu ekuphikisile ukuthi kunezinxushunxushu endlunkulu, futhi yona inkulumo yakhe ibuye  yanikeza isithombe sokuthi isazobambana ngezihluthu endlunkulu njengoba ethe isizathu esenza ukuthi njengamanje bangakwazi “ukunqakisana ngamazwi”, yingoba kusaziliwe endlunkulu.UMntwana ukhale ngabezindaba athe yibona abayenza ihaba indaba yoqhekeko endlunkulu.“Ngifuna ukuqinisekisa le ndlu, ngifuna ukuqinisekisa lesi sifunda neKZN ukuthi akukho nxushunxushu KwaZulu.
Abezindaba yibona bawathengisile amaphepha, bazama impela ukuthengisa amaphepha.
Okuningi kwakho(abakubikayo) akukho, okunye kukhona.“Ngakho ngiqinisekisa abantu ngalokhu, ukuthi siphezu kwakho siyindlunkulu ukulungisa.
Ukuthi manje asikakakhululeki, sisazililile.
Asikwazi ukuqagulisana nabantu kodwa nizobona, siyiphethe ngesinono.
Sizoyithola maduze inkosi yethu uma sekukhululekiwe.”UMntwana uThembi unxuse isizwe ukuba sibekezele njengoba indlunkulu isematasa ngalolu daba.“Ngiyazi ukuthi abantu abaningi bayathanda ukuzwa ngalezi zinto kodwa ngizogcina lapha.
Ngicela nihlale phansi, nibambe umthetho.
Konke kuzolunga.”UMntwana uThembi waqala ukudonsa amehlo abantu enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo kaMdlokombane etshela isizwe esasimagange ngokuzwa igama lozongena esihlalweni, ukuthi yiNkosi kuphela eyazi ozothatha isihlangu zikaBhejane.Uphinde waba sematheni ngokujikijelana ngamazwi noNdunankulu kaZulu, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, ngesikhathi kukhotheme iNdlovukazi ebiyibambabukhosi, uShiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu.Kusanda kuvela imibiko ethi uMntwana uThembi uhamba imihlangano ehlelwa wuhlangothi lwasendlunkulu olunganelisekile ngokuqokwa kweSilo esisha.Kuthiwa lolu hlangathi lufuna izinyane likaMdlokombane, uMntwana uSimakade, kube nguye ongena esihlalweni.
Uzobhadla ejele owagqekeza wabulala
IZOGUGELA ejele indoda egwetshwe iminyaka engu-56 ngamacala okugqekeza, ukweba, ukuzama ukubulala nawokubulala ezigamekweni ezenzeka eKloof naseWybank ngasePinetown ngoFebhuwari 2019.USiboniso Msomi (33) ugixabezwe ngale minyaka yiNkantolo yesiFunda ePinetown.Uzobhadla iminyaka engu-31 ejele ngoba ezinye izigwebo zakhe uzozidonsa kanyekanye.Kuthiwa uMsomi nabangani bakhe babebalekela amaphoyisa ngemoto bedubulana emva kwezigameko zokugqekeza.Ezintweni okuthiwa bazeba kwakukhona ubucwebe, ithelevishini, ama-laptop, amaselula, imali namakhamera.Kuthiwa umshayeli yamphunyuka imoto emgwaqweni uFields Hill, yase iyashayisa.Okhulumela iNational Prosecutig Authority (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Kara, uthe uMsomi wazama ukubaleka ngemva kwengozi kodwa amaphoyisa asheshe ambamba.“Watholakala nezimpahla zokwebiwa, ezagcina zibuyiselwe kubanikazi bazo.
Walashwa esendaweni yesehlakalo, wasedluliselwa esibhedlela.
Ayehamba nabo bashona,” kusho uNkk Kara.Uqhube wathi uMsomi ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-10 icala ngalinye kwamabili okugqekeza, eyisithupha ngokuzama ukubulala, wagwetshwa engu-15 icala ngalinye kwamabili abebhekene nawo wokubulala ozakwabo.UNkk Kara uthe uMsomi ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-56 isiyonke kodwa uzobhadla ejele engu-31 kuphela.
I-ANC ivuma ukushaywa yinkece nokulaxazwa ngabaxhasi
I-ANC isiphumele obala yavuma ukuthi ibhekene nenkinga yezezimali ngenxa yokulaxazwa ngabaxhasi nosekuholele ukuthi ihluleke izikhawu eziningi ukuholela ngesikhathi abasebenzi bayo.Njengoba abasebenzi bale nhlangano bezokuba nemibhikisho namhlanje lapho bezokuba bekhala ngokungaholelwa ngesikhathi, izolo i-ANC ibhoboke ngokulaxazwa kwayo ngabaxhasi nethe yikhona okwenze ukuthi ihluleke ukukhokhela ngesikhathi abasebenzi bayo imiholo.UMgcinimafa Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, uveze ukuthi abaxhasi baqale ukuqhela kuyona ngesikhathi kubheduka ubhubhane iCorona ngonyaka owedlule.UMashatile uthe bathe besazama ukubhekana nengcindezi yokuqhela kosomabhizinisi abebehlehle ngenxa yomthelela ongemuhle weCorona  kwezomnotho, izinto zavele zabheda kakhulu kulo nyaka ngesikhathi kuqala ukusebenza komthetho olawula ukuxhaswa ngemali kwamaqembu ezepolitiki.UMashatile, obenenkulumo ekhethekile nesiteshi sethelevishini esikhokhelwayo, uthe abaxhasi abaningi balaxaze le nhlangano ngesikhathi kuqala ukusebenza kwalo mthetho ngo-Ephreli.
Lo mthetho uphoqa amaqembu ezepolitiki ukuba adalule bonke abanikela kuwo ngemali.“Kukhona osomabhizinisi abangafuni ukuthi amagama abo adalulwe.
Ingakho bemanqika ukunikela.
Lena akusiyona inkinga ebhekene nathi kuphela, kepha namanye amaqembu ezepolitiki azochaphazeleka.“Lesi simo sifike sivele sidonsa kanzima njengoba bekunzima ukuthola abantu abazoxhasa inhlangano njengoba osomabhizinisi abaningi bekhahlamezwe iCorona nomvalelandlini.”UMashatile uthe njengamanje le nhlangano idonsa ngodizili.“Isimo sinzima.
Njengoba sikhuluma nje abasebenzi abakayitholi imiholo yabo kaMeyi.
Sinethemba lokuthi bazoyithola lingakapheli leli sonto.”UMashatile uthe isisombululo sinye kule nkinga, wathi ukudiliza abasebenzi, nathe bazoncishiswa ngo-50%.“Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi sigcina kuphela abasebenzi esibadingayo, hhayi abantu abazolokhu bezulazula ehhovisi, abangenamsebenzi.”Namhlanje abasebenzi be-ANC kulindeleke ukuthi babhikishe ekomkhulu lale nhlangano eLuthuli House, eGoli, emahhovisi ezifundazwe nawezifunda, lapho bezokube bekhalaza ngokhondolo lokuholelwa sekudlule isikhathi.Izinkinga zamaholo kwi-ANC zaqala ngo-Disemba 2019, lapho abasebenzi bale nhlangano baqala khona ukuhola emva kwesikhathi.
Ngo-Ephreli, le nhlangano ibhalele abasebenzi bayo ibatshela ukuba balindele ukuthi imiholo yabo izongena emva kwesikhathi.
Bafeze isethembiso bemhlasela bethatha imoto
NKOSIKHONA CELE UDIDEKILE futhi usamangele owesilisa waseMbingo, eMkhuze, othunyelelwe umyalezo yizigebengu zimtshela ukuthi ziyeza zizothatha imoto yakhe, akayilungise kahle.
Nebala zafika zayishaqa emva kokumshaya kanzima.
UMnuz Bheki Mthembu (42), uthi ubezitshela ukuthi imiyalezo  iwumdlalo okanye ibingaqondisiwe kuyena.
Kodwa ngemuva kwamahora ethole leyo miyalezo, ube esehlaselwa ngamadoda ayisikhombisa abehlome ephelele, ashaqa imoto njengokwesithembiso semiqhafazo.
Uthi afike ashaya isicabha ase eyazingenela ngaphakathi emzini wakhe.
Uthi afike ngesikhathi esathi ulungiselela ukushisa inyama.
Esengaphakathi uthi amtshele ukuthi asefikile azolanda imoto njengoba ebeshilo kwimiqhafazo.
Uthe  avele amtshela emehlwemi ukuthi angalinge athathe amashansi azame ukulwa ngoba uma enza lelo phutha uzolimala.Uqhuba athi aqale angena kuwona wonke amagumbi endlu yakhe efuna isibhamu embuza ukuthi usifihle kuphi.
Konke lokhu uthi kumxakile ngoba yena akanaso isibhamu.
Ngaleso sikhathi abeshaqa izingubo zokugqoka, ithelevishini ethatha nokudla okuvuthiwe nobekungaphekiwe akulayisha emaplastikini ahamba nakho.
"Ngemuva kwalokho bafune ukhiye wemoto yami iFortuner.
Bangiphoqa ukuba ngiphumele ngaphandle.
Bangibopha izandla nezinyawo bangitshela ukuba ngingene emotweni bangihlalisa ezitulweni ezingemuva,'' kuchaza uMthembu.Uthi imoto ihambe ibanga elide naye engaboni nalapho eyiswa khona, baze bamlaxaza endaweni esesigangeni futhi eyihlathi.
"Bangishiye kanjalo ngiboshwe izandla nezinyawo,'' kuchaza yena.
Uthe ube eseziqaqa wase eyocela usizo komunye umuzi oseduze.Isolezwe NgoMgqibelo lithole ukuthi kule ndawo ukwebiwa kwezimoto yinto esiphenduke insakavukela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uCaptain Nqobile Gwala usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.
Uthe icala livulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eMkhuze.
Uthe kusolakala ukuthi amadoda abehlome ephelele athathe imoto abaleka nayo.’’Endlini yakhe bathathe ithelevishini, ukudla nezingubo.
Ngemuva kwalokho baphoqa owesilisa ababezomhlasela ukuba angene emotweni yakhe.
Bahamba naye bamlahla esigangeni,’’ kuchaza uCaptain Gwala.Ngendlela okuthiwa kuyinsakavukela ngayo ukwebiwa kwezimoto eMkhuze, kuthiwa ngesonto okwebiwe ngalo imoto kaMthembu,  kunezinye eziyisikhombisa ezebiwe.
Amalungu omphakathi kuthiwa ayaveva asola nokuthi amaphoyisa ahosha izinyawo ekuwunqandeni.
Elinye ilungu lomphakathi elikhulume neSolezwe NgoMgqibelo elingathandanga ukudalulwa, lithe kukhona okusolisayo ngoba zonke izimoto ezebiwayo umkhondo wazo awutholakali.
Kuvele kuthuleke kucwebe iziziba nje, kube sengathi akwenzekanga lutho.
Sizokufa lapho kufa khona uZuma noMagashule - ANC eThekwini
AMANYE amagatsha e-ANC eThekwini aphumele obala athi ayofa lapho kufa khona owayenguMengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, noNobhala-Jikelele wale nhlangano osamisiwe, uMnuz Ace Magashule.Lokhu akusho izolo esithangamini sabezindaba eThekwini, ephumela obala ngokweseka laba baholi.La magatsha athe ayakuqonda kahle ukuthi kunezinkinga ezenza inhlangano ihlukane phakathi kodwa wona aseka uZuma noMagashule kukho konke.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe abezindaba, aqale ngokuthi: “Singamagatsha e-ANC eThekwini sikhathazekile kakhulu ngokwenzeka kuleli qembu nangendlela izindaba zombutho eziphethwe ngayo yi-National Executive Committee (NEC) ye-ANC.”UMnuz Ntando Khuzwayo, okhulumela la magatsha, uthe:“Siyi-ANC eThekwini sithi makubuyiswe uMagashule ngokushesha esikhundleni sakhe.
Uma kuxoshwa umuntu kumele kulandelwe imithetho hhayi uvele ummise nje, futhi kusetshenziswe indlela enokuchema.
Inhlangano ezimisele ngomsebenzi wayo ngeke yenze kanjena.
Lesi senzo sinobungane futhi sisenza inhlekisa.”UKhuzwayo uthe uZuma bazomeseka kuze kube sekugcineni njengoba ebhekene necala ngodaba lokunqaba ukuyofakaza kwikhomishini ephenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana, eholwa yiJaji Raymond Zondo.“Ukuboshwa kwakhe kungakaphothulwa udaba lwenkantolo ngabe akubona ubulungiswa.
Sizomvikela, uma kufanele sizocela usizo kwabanye ozakwethu ezwenikazi i-Afrika, siyokwenza lokho.
Kumanje siyahlangana ukuze simvikele.” UKhuzwayo uthe baphoxekile futhi abahambisani nezinto ezenziwe yiNEC wathi kumele ihlakazwe.Phakathi kwezinto athe kumele i-ANC izilungise yimfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uMagashule nelungu lephalamende, uMnuz Bongani Bongo, bakhishwe ngesankahlu emhlanganweni weNEC.Kulo mhlangano kuthiwa kukhona ababone ukuthi uMagashule noBongo bayingxenye yalo mhlangano, bathi mabakhishwe.Kuthiwa bakhishiwe kanti imibiko yabezindaba ithi ikhadi lokungena likaMagashule ekomkhulu le-ANC, eLuthuli House, alisasebenzi njengoba emisiwe.
Khonamanjalo i-ANC igxeke ukuputshuka kwezinto ezisuke zidingidwa emhlanganweni wale nhlangano.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kuputshuke inkulumo kalowo owayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki, ethi i-ANC isifana nento efayo.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Pule Mabe, ugxeke labo abaqhubeka nalo mkhuba wokuthi bapotshozele umphakathi izinto ezisuke zixoxwa kulo mhlangano.Uthe bakhathazekile ngalokhu, wathi abenza lokhu bafuna ukuhlukanisa phakathi inhlangano.“Labo abayotholakala beputshukisa izinto ze-ANC bazothathelwa izinyathelo.
Ithimba lezomthetho le-ANC liyayibheka lento yokuputshukiswa kwezinto ezingamele ziphumele emphakathini.”
Uchitha eyokhwantalala kwindodakazi yakhe uyise wengoduso ka-AKA
UYISE wengoduso yomrepha wakuleli odumile uchitha eyekuthi indodakazi yakhe ibiphethwe wukhwantalala kulandela izinsolo zokuzibulala kwayo.UMnuz Moses Tembe onguyise wengoduso ka-AKA u-Anele “Nelli” Tembe (22) obengcwatshwa namhlanje, enkonzweni ebibanjelwe e-ICC eThekwini uveze ukuthi indodakazi yakhe beyinenkinga yokusebenzisa izidakamizwa okubalwa kuzo nophuzo oludakayo.
UTembe usho kanje encwadini ebeyibhalile efundwe usomabhizinisi ongumengameli waMaZulu FC uMnuz Sandile Zungu.Kule ncwadi uTembe uthe uyazithanda zonke izingane zakhe, ziphelelisa impilo yakhe.
U-Anele umchaze njengengane ebinothando emndenini futhi ebikhonze ukwenza izinto ngokuzimela"Bengingekho ngeSonto kwenzeka lomshophi.
Angiqondile ukwakha izinsolo njengoba kusolwa ukuthi ubenokhwantalala kodwa u-Anele ubengeyena umuntu obecabanga ngokuzibulala futhi akazibulalanga .
Alikho ngisho elilodwa ilungu lomndeni elingamhlanganisa nokuzibulala.
Njengoyise ngithi ubengeke azibulale, kumele siqonde izikhathi esizithola sikuzo.
Usathane uhlasela intsha yethu esebenzisa utshwala nezidakamizwa, sinenkinga enkulu yokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa," kusho uTembe.Uthe iphupho elikhulu lika-Anele bekungukuvula indawo ephambili yokudla eNingizimu Afrika nokwenze wafunda wagxila emkhakheni wezokupheka.
UTembe uthe wamyala ngokuthi aqinise ekufundeni nomkhakha wamabhizinisi nokuyinto abephezu kwayo.
Umchaze njengentombazane ebingahluphi ngamasoka kodwa ebizazi ukuthi ifuna ukukhula ishade kwaze kwaba ilotsholwa u-AKA.
Wabayala nangokuthi laba bathole nokwelulekwa ngaphambi kokushada ngoba ebona ukuthi umshado nenjabulo yabo iyasidinga isisekelo.
Ekhuluma kule nkonzo uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini wakwaTembe.
Uthe okunye ngeke akukhulume enkonzweni ngoba amaphoyisa awakuzikhulumi izinto ezisabhekwa.
“Ngoba angifuni ukubizwa ngelinye ilanga ngizofakaza kuthiwe wathi...ngoba izinto ezisabhekwa,” usho kanje.
UMkabayi uthi wacishe wasilaxaza Isibaya
UMLINGISI weSibaya oyibambe iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili kulo mdlalo, uThembi Nyandeni, uveze ukuthi wacishe washiya kuwo ngenxa yokuthi babefuna ukuthi abe nesoka.UThembi, ubelingisa indawo kaMkabayi Zungu, okungowesifazane ongusomatekisi futhi ovikela umndeni wakhe, nobezibambela inganono uma behlaselwa njengoba bebenezitha emkhakheni wamatekisi.Isolezwe likhulume naye ngebanga aselihambile kulo mdlalo nokuthi kube njani ukuba yingxenye yawo kusuka, uqala kuze kube yimanje.
Uzophela ngo-Ephreli.“Ebengikuthanda kakhulu kulo mdlalo wukuthi kubalingisi, yimina ebengimdala kunawo wonke umuntu futhi nginobudlelwane obuhle nabo bonke.
Ukulingisa ngenye yezinto engizithandayo kakhulu njengoba ngesikhathi ngifika eGoli, ngisuka eNewcastle nabazali bami, ngabona ukuthi impilo ngizoyakha ngokungena kulo mkhakha.
Ngempela wangiphilisa, buka manje ngikuphi.
Ngangena khona ngoba ngingafuni udumo kodwa ngenxa yokuthi ngifuna ukuphila,“ kuchaza uThembi.Uthe okunye azokukhumbula ngomdlalo ukusebenza nentsha abenganqeni ukuthi uma kukhona engakwenzi kahle uma beqopha, amise yonke into ayisize.“Mina benginganqeni ukuthi ngimise yonke into, ngisho ukuthi lo mlingisi akenzi ngendlela bese ngimbonisa ukuthi kumele kwenziwe njani.
Okunye esake sakuxabanela nophrojusa wukuthi babefuna ngibe nendoda kulo mdlalo.
Leyo nto angiyamukelanga futhi ngendlela engangingayithandi ngayo ngakubeka kwacaca ukuthi ngizoshiya kulo mdlalo, uma bengayishintshi indlela abenza ngayo, ngempela bakuyeka lokho.
Ukunginika kwabo umyeni kwakuzoshintsha indlela okumele uMkabayi anakekele ngayo umndeni wakhe.
Alibale indoda okuyinto eyayingavelanga ngithola le ndawo,“ kuchaza uThembi.Ngisho empilweni yakhe yangasese uveze ukuthi akanaye umuntu wesilisa aphilisana naye.“Ngiyathemba ukuthi indawo kaMkabayi ibafundisile abesifazane bakuleli okuningi abazophila ngakho.
UMkabayi ngisho engekho umfowabo uMpiyakhe, ubesala anakekele amakhosikazi akhe wonke, abheke ibhizinisi nezingane.
Kuyaphileka ngaphandle kwendoda, kumele sikunake lokho singabesifazane,” kuchaza le ngqungqulu yomlingisi.
Uveze ukuthi maduze nje, abantu bazobona zanda izinkinga KwaManzini okuzophela belwa nazo njengomndeni.
Kulo mdlalo into athe akayithandanga ngawo, indlela owashintsha ngayo ekuhambeni kwesikhathi, yize kwakuthiwe uzogxila ematekisi.“Kwakuthiwe uzogxila ematekisini kubonakale izinkinga zakhona kodwa lokho bakwenza kusizini yokuqala bakudedela.
Sila sikhona nje yingoba nami bengike ngibatshele ukuthi akesibuyele lapho umdlalo wawuya khona, siyeke lokhu osuyikhona manje senze nocwaningo.
Kodwa bebengitshela ukuthi angigxile kulokhu enginikwe khona, okunye ngikuyekele kubona.
Ababhali abaqala kulo mdlalo bese bengekho, bahamba, kwafika abanye base beqhamuka nokuhlukile,“ kuchaza yena.
Kulo nyaka uthe usazophumula njengoba kungekho mdlalo asazongena kuwona, okuzothi ngonyaka ozayo bese ethatha imisebenzi ezoqhamuka.
Ibuya ngonyawo olusha iBlood and Water
ABADIDIYELI befilimu eqoshelwa eKapa, iBlood and Water sebememezele ukuthi le filimu izoqala ukubonakala maphakathi nalo nyaka kwiNetflix.Le filimu eyaba nesasasa ngonyaka odlule, abadidiyeli bayo ngempelasonto bamemezele izindaba zokuya emaphethelweni okuqoshwa kwayo, lokhu bakwenze bememezela nabalingisi abasha kule filimu iningi labo okuyintsha, esencane nedumile kulo mkhakha wokulingisa.Baveze ukuthi abalingisi balo mdlalo abadala bonke bayabuya, ngakho ababukeli kumele bangakhathazeki.Esitatimendeni abasikhiphile baveze ukuthi njengoba ababukeli bale filimu bacela isizini yesibili, sebengaqala bazilungiselele ukubona okuphethwe ile yisizini yesibili.“Kumanje abalingisi balo mdlalo basebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqopha le filimu sikhuluma nje.
Siyajabula ke ukwethulela ababukeli bale filimu intsha esanda kufika emkhakheni wokulingisa nezoqhubeka nokudala olunye uthuthuva kule filimu nakubafundi besikole iParkhurst,” kuchaza isitatimende.
Baveze ukuthi kubalingisi abasha abajoyina lo mdlalo kukhona uLeroy Siyafa ozolingisa indawo kaSam.“Uzoba ngomunye wabalingisi abazoba sembangweni kwezithinta uthando nozoshukumisa izinto kubafundi besifazane eParkhurst.
Asingabazi ukuthi lo mlingisi ungomunye wozothandwa ababukeli bale filimu.
Abanye abalingisi kukhona uGreteli Fincham, ozolingisa indawo kaRecee, Katishcka Chanderlal ozoba nguPauline no-Alzavia Abrahams ozoba uZyd,” kuveza isitatimende.
Kubalingisi ababuyayo kubalwa uKhosi Ngema, AmaQamata, Natasha Thahane, Gail Mabalane, Cindy Mahlangu, Thabang Molaba, Arno Greeff, Mekaila Mathys noDillon Windvogel.Abantu bakuleli bazijabulele izindaba zokumenyezelwa ukuthi sekuya ekupheleni ukuqoshwa kwale filimu futhi izophuma maduzane.

IQEMBU lehip hop, iSkwatta Kamp, lithi liduduzwa ukuthi ilungu lalo uMusawenkosi "Nish" Molefe, elishone ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokugula, lihambe seliqedile ukwenza i-albhamu.Ngokwesitatimende uNish (42), ushone emini ngoLwesihlanu emuva kokungeniswa esibhedlela isikhathi eside exinwe yiCovid-19.

INHLANGANO yezokusakaza iSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC), idilize abasebenzi abangu-621, iningi labo eligcina namhlanje.Le nhlangano yamemezela ukuthi izodiliza abasebenzi ukuzama ukwehlisa izindleko.I-SABC ithe abasebenzi abangu-346, yize kukhona eminye imisebenzi abebengafaka izicelo zokuyenza,  banqume ukuthi bathathe imali yabo bahambe.

NKOSIKHONA CELE noCHARLES KHUZWAYOKUYABASHUBELA abasakazi abasolwa ngokugwazisa abaculi ukuze kudlalwe izingoma zabo emsakazweni.
Kulaba basakazi kubalwa nabathathu bomsakazo Ukhozi FM.Ngesonto eledlule ohola amaciko ngaphansi kwalo mkhankaso wokulwa nokugwazelwa kwemisakazo, uMzwakhe "The People's Poet" Mbuli, uthe lolu daba sebelufake koKlebe njengoba benamagama abasakazi nobufakazi ngalo mkhuba.UMbuli, obecasuke egane unwabu, uthe kuyinto engakholakali ukuthi izingane zabantu eziculayo kumele zikhokhele amakhono azo ukuze zizothola ithuba lokuba kudlalwe umculo wazo emsakazweni.

UMbuli uthe baqale ngokubamba umhlangano nezikhulu zakwaSABC, uMadoda Mxakwe oyi-CEO nesikhulu sezemisakazo, uNada Wotshelwa,    e-Auckland Park ngoFebhuwari 26.

"Umhlangano olandelayo ngePayola ngesizowubamba noMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, khona maduze," kuphetha uMbuli.

Ngikhulelwe, ethanda engathandi:Babes
UBHODLA umlilo umculi weGqom’ uBabes Wodumo osolwa ngumamezala ngokusenga ezimithiyo ngokuthi uzithwele.
Le ntokazi yaseLamontville eThekwini ogama layo langempela uBongekile Simelane, ithi ngeke ivume ukuhlanjalazwa kanje, ngakho izovulela umamezala icala.Ekhuluma nephephandaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, iDaily News ngoLwesibili, uBabes uthe uyibonile le video enezinsolo ezishaqisayo ngaye kaNksz Zama Gumede, ongunina kaMampintsha.“Ngikhulelwe, ethanda noma engathandi.
Uma enenkinga nalokho angihlangene.
Ngiphatheke kabi ngalento.
Ngiyazi ukuthi akumele sizinake izinto azikhulumayo uma edakiwe kodwa kulokhu wedlulele.
Ngizomvulela icala.
Ngifuna ageze igama lami,” kusho uBabes.Kule video egcwale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoLwesibili unina kaMampintsha uthi uBabes wathi ukhulelwe amawele kodwa nanamhlanje akakawazali.

Ngibuhlungu ngalento (ayikhuluma kwivideo) futhi ngeke ngiyiyeke idlule.
Ngifuna ukumkhombisa ukuthi ngingowaseLamonti, ngizombophisa,” kusho uBabes.Uqhube wathi unina kaMampintsha wayazisiwe ngomshado futhi akukho okuthinta isiko angakwenzanga njengomakoti wakwakhe ngoba ubefuna ukuhlanganisa imindeni yabo ngalo mshado.

Umshado wabo wesintu obuseBallito ubuhanjelwe osaziwayo, umndeni kanye nabangani.Laba culi baveza ngo-Okthoba nyakenye kwivideo eyasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi sebethembisene umshado.
U-Elaine ethubeni lonkuqoba indodo yeBET
INTOKAZI yakuleli engene yezwakala endimeni yomculo, u-Elaine, ingelinye lamaciko asemasha endimeni yomculo eliqokwe emcimbini wezindondo wase-USA, amaBET Awards.U-Elaine, ezwenikazi lase-Afrika, uqokwe emkhakheni weThe Viewer’s Choice: Best New International Act nentokazi yaseNigeria, uTems, nokuyibona bobabili abamele i-Afrika kulo mkhakha.
UMonde Twala wakwaViacom uveze ukuthi kuyabajabulisa ukuqhubeka nokuqokwa kwabaculi base-Afrika abakade bafika kulo mkhakha nabasha njengoba kucaca ukuthi umculo wabo unakiwe nakwamanye amazwe.“Umkhakha weThe Viewer’s Choice: Best New International Act wakhelwa ukuhlonipha abaculi abasanda kufika kulo mkhakha nabangene kuwona kwezwakala futhi abenza kahle kuwona.
Okunye ngawo ubheka ukuthi umculo wakho uhambe kangakanani kwamanye amazwe nokuyingakho kubonakala laba baculi kuwona, ” kusho uMonde.Uthe kuyajabulisa nokubona lonke uhlu lwabaculi abazohlonishwa kulo mcimbi njengoba benze kahle kakhulu ezingomeni zabo abaqokwe ngazo kulo mcimbi kanjalo nama-albhamu abo.
U-Elaine ubonge abalandeli bakhe noNkulunkulu ngokuqokwa kulo mcimbi, wathi uyohlale ebathanda ngenxa yento abemenzele yona.
Ukuvotela lo mkhakha kuqale ukuvulwa ngoMsombuluko, kuyoze kuvalwe ngoLwesihlanu ngo- 4 ntambama.Abanye abaculi abaqokwe kulo mcimbi base-Afrika baqokelwe emkhakheni weBest International Act nguBurna Boy waseNigeria, Diamond Platnumz waseTanzania noWizkid waseNigeria.
Lo mcimbi uzosakazwa bukhoma ngoJuni 28 kuBET Africa (DStv channel 129) ngo-2h00 ezintatha.
Sizogadla nangezinhlelo zakuleli isiteshi esisha kuDStv
SELUMENYEZELWE usuku okuzoqala ngalo isiteshi sethelevishini esisha esizobe sigadla ngezinhlelo ezahlukene zase-Afrika, iHONEY ezotholakala kuDStv (173), kusukela ngoFebhuwari 15.Kulesi siteshi kuzobonakala izinhlelo ezintathu zakuleli uma siqala okukhona kuzona oluthi Pastors Wives, Shine Shine neThe Buzz.Ohlelweni iPastors Wives kuzobonakala amakhosikazi abefundisi bamabandla amakhulu kuleli ekhombisa ngempilo yawo yansuku zonke.Lolu hlelo lusungulwe intokazi engumlingisi uSonia Mbele, owasungula iThe Realhousewives of Joburg.UYolisa Phahle ongumphathi wakwaMultichoice,uveze ukuthi, izinhlelo abazibophele kulesi siteshi zizogqamisa ithalente izwe i-Afrika elinalo.“Ohlelweni iPastors Wives sizobona ukuthi abesifazane abayeni babo abangabefundisi bamabandla adumile, bamelana kanjani nokuphatha ibandla nemindeni yabo.
Kulolu hlelo ngeke nje kugqame okuhle kuphela kodwa kuzobonakala  nezimpi phakathi kwala makhosikazi.
Okunye ngalo wukuthi ngeke kubonakale amakhosikazi abefundisi bakuleli kuphela kodwa nawakwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika,” kusho uYolisa.Uthe abanye besifazane abazobonakala ezinhlelweni ezihlukene kukhona uPearl Umeh waseNigeria, Patricia Kihoro noFoi Wambui baseKenya, Anele Mdoda, Mbali Nkosi no-Anele Zondo bakuleli.“UMbali uzokwethula uhlelo oluthi Shine Shine, oluzogxila ekusizeni abantu abafuna ukushintsha indlela ababukeka ngayo.
U-Anele Mdoda uzokwethula uhlelo oluthi The buzz, okuwuhlelo oluyinkulumo ngxoxo, la ezokhuluma khona nabesifazane basemazweni ahlukene ngezinto ezithinta isiko, ezothando, ezempilo abangani nemindeni,”’ kuchaza uYolisa.
Uthe kulesi siteshi okubajabulisa kakhulu wukuthi sizoveza izinhlobo ezihlukene zamasiko nendlela okuphilwa ngayo emazweni ase-Afrika.
NjengeDStv uthe bayathemba ukuthi bazoqhubeka nokuletha izinhlelo ezenza baziqhenye ngendlela abaphila ngayo abantu base-Afrika.Lesi siteshi uthe sizotholakala kuleli eNigeria, eGhana, Kenya, e-Uganda, Namibia, Botswana, Malawi, Zambia, Angola,Mozambique, eTanzania, DRC naseCameroon.Sona kuDStv uthe, sizotholakala kuCompact, Compact Plus nePremium.
Isayine esitebeleni                   sase-USA iJoyous
ABASUNGULI beqembu lomculo wokholo iJoyous Celebration, sebeveze ukuthi banqume ukusayinisa leli qembu esitebeleni saphesheya kwezilwandle ngenhloso yokusabalalisa umculo walo.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kube nesivumelwano phakathi kwesitebele sakuleli i-Universal Music Africa neMotown Gospel, ezinze e-USA.UDkt Lindelani Mkhize ongomunye wabasunguli baleli qembu, uveze ukuthi lesi isiqalo esisha kubona njengoba belungiselela ukukhipha i-albhamu yabo yesi-25.“Kule minyaka engu-25 siyingxenye yaleli qembu, kuningi ebesikufunda ngakho ke ukushintsha kwezinto ezenzeka ngayo kulo mkhakha esikuwona sibone kungcono ukuthi sithathe lesi sinqumo.
Umculo weJoyous usuzotholakala e-USA naseCanada okwamanje esithemba ukuthi lesi yisiqalo esisha.
Sizizwa sivuselelekile, sinomdlandla omusha njengoba sishintsha izinto nje siya kwelinye izinga,” kuchaza uLindelani.
Uthe uhambo lwabo lube olungelula kuyona yonke le minyaka kodwa kuyabajabulisa ukuba la bekhona manje.
“Ukuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-25 akulula neze, ukuba nobudlelwano nalesi sitebele kuyasijabulisa njengoba kuzovula amanye amathuba emazweni aphesheya kwezilwandle njengoba sidinga ushintsho.
Esifuna ukukusho, i-albhamu entsha isetshenzwe kakhulu futhi abantu abalindele okuhle nokumnandi kodwa kuyona maduzane, njengoba izophuma iPhasika lingakadluli,” kusho yena.U-EJ Gaines ongomunye wabaqondisi besitebele iMotown Gospel, uveze ukuthi bakujabulele ukusebenzisana ne-Universal Music Africa, ebathulela iJoyous Celebration asebebonile ukuthi yiqembu elithandwayo emhlabeni wonke.
USipho Dlamini ophethe i-Universal Music Group kuleli, uveze ukuthi leli thuba kube elijabulisayo njengoba leli qembu liqhubeka likhula.
“Umculo wabo uzofinyelela nakwabanye abalandeli babo.
Siyabemukela futhi siyathemba ukuthi sizosebenzisana kahle ukuze kuqhubeke nokuvuleka kwamanye amathuba.
Sizosebenza nabo kukhona konke abakwenzayo okuthinta nokuqopha umculo wabo nokuhambisa iqembu lonke la liya khona.
Lokhu kufezekise iphupho lethu leminyaka," kuchaza uSipho.I-albhamu yeJoyous Celebration 25 ezophuma isihloko sayo sithi Still We Rise.
Ufuna abalingisi baholelwe ngemidlalo yabo emidala
UMLINGISI wakuleli osemnkantshubomvu uNambitha Mpumlwana, ukhala ngokudliwa kwamandla abo bebhekile njengofishi emkhakheni wezokungcebeleka.
Ekhuluma kwiNewzroom Africa ngeledlule, uNambitha uthe kufanele kube nemali abakhokhelwa yona uma kuphindwa imidlalo emidala, abasuke bekade bebambe iqhaza kuyo.
"Ngesikhathi kuqala ukuvalwa kwezwe besingasebenzi.
Ngisho sebevumelekile abantu ukusebenzela emakhaya kodwa besebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana, kodwa bengingakwazi ukusebenza ngenxa yokuthi umsebenzi engiwenzayo udinga ngisebenze eduze nabantu.“Into engaphephisa endlaleni imali oyithola uma kukhonjiswa umdlalo owawulingisa kuwo.
Okwamanje imithetho ekhona ayikasivumeli ukuba sihole imali, ngokuphindwa kwemidlalo esilingise kuyo, " kuchaza uNambitha.
Lo mlingisi uqhube wathi uyafisa eminyakeni ezayo ukuba uma kuphindwa imidlalo enaye, ahlomule naye.
"Ngifisa uma kuphindwa imidlalo enjengoGenerations, Justice For All  neBeyond Borders nanoma iyiphi imidlalo engiyenzile.
Uma iphindwa kusasa kufanele nami ngihole.
"Uthe abadidiyeli bemidlalo balokhu bethi bakhokhela abalingisi ngokubaveza emphakathini.
"Bathi abantu bazokubona.
Ngiyaxakeka ngoba kudala abantu bengibona.
Ngiyacela ungikhokhele.
Khokhelani amaciko."
Uthe ukuxhashazwa kwamaciko ngale ndlela wumkhuba omdala obuwenzeka ngisho nangezikhathi zoHenry Cele, owalingisa indawo eqavile emdlalweni UShaka Zulu.
"UShaka Zulu udlalwe kakhulu e-America kodwa uCele ubengatholi lutho ngokuphindwaphindwa kwalo mdlalo."
Uthe abalingisi benza umsebenzi omkhulu wokududuza abantu abadangele emakhaya kodwa bona abaneme.
"Abantu abafuni ukubona uNambitha kodwa basuke befuna ukubona abantu esibalingisayo.
Mina sengifuna babone uNambitha ukuze bazi ukuthi unengane futhi ukhokhela umuzi.
Amabhange awanandaba nokwaziwa kwami kodwa afuna imali nomasipala waseGoli udinga imali yama-rate.
"UNambitha ukhuze ibuya ekulingiseni njengoba ezobonakala emdlalweni omusha ozokhonjiswa kuSABC 1 kusasa ngo-8 ebusuku othi The Kingdom.
Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe nguye ekhasini lakhe leTwitter.
UBaby Cele emdlalweni omusha kwithelevishini
UMLINGISI uBaby Cele-Maloka, indawo abeyilingisa kaGabisile esanda kuphela emdlalweni Uzalo kuSABC, useveze ukuthi ungomunye wabalingisi abazobonakala emdlalweni omusha ozoqala ku-e.tv.UBaby Cele ufake isithombe sakhe nomlingisi ogcine ukubonakala emdlalweni Isidingo uLindani Nkosi, wathi bazobe bengabaganene kulo mdlalo abazobe bedume ngelikaMnuz noNkk Nkosi.“Sinethulela uMama noBaba uNkosi enizobabona emdlaweni omusha ozayo ku-e.tv,” kubhala uBaby Cele ngamafuphi.Ngeledlule Isolezwe lizame kaningi ukuxhumana noBaby Cele ukuzwa ngokuphela kwendawo ayilingisayo kuZalo, kodwa langaphumelela ukuxoxa naye njengoba kuvele ukuthi umatasa nokuqopha emdlalweni omusha .
Leli phephandaba libike ngalo mdlalo ozovala isikhala seRhythm City  ekhonjiswa ngo-7 ebusuku phakathi nesonto, okwamenyezelwa ukuthi iyaphela ngoJulayi 16, emuva kweminyaka engu-13 ikhona.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe izinhlelo zomdlalo ozongena esikhaleni sayo ziya ngokuvuthwa njengoba inkampani ezowuqopha isikhona, futhi isiqalile ukuqopha.
"Ikhulunyelwa phansi eyomdlalo omusha obizwa ngeHouse of Zwide.
Nakuba abaphathi beBomb Production bengakafuni ukuphumela obala kodwa sekutholakele ukuthi sebethole ikhaya elisha kwa-e.tv njengoba kuthiwa iHouse of Zwide izongena esikhaleni seRhythm City," kusho umthombo.Uthe kunezingqalabutho zeSibaya ezizofudukela kwiHouse of Zwide ukuyoshukumisa kanjalo nabasebenzi.Inhloko yemidlalo evutshelwe eNingizimu Afrika yakwa-e.tv uHelga Palmer, ikhuluma neSolezwe ngalo mdlalo omusha iveze ukuthi okwamanje ngo-7 basagxile kwiRhythm City kuze kufike isikhathi sokuphela kwayo.Ukuphela kweRhythm City kulandela isimemezelo sokuphela kweSibaya  kuMzansi Magic esizophela ekupheleni kuka-Ephreli.KwaSABC 2 ngakolunye uhlangothi khona kuncishiswe isikhathi okudlala ngaso iMuvhango njengoba isidlala izinsuku ezintathu ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesithathu.Kusona lesi siteshi kube sekubuyiswa umdlalo iGiyani.
ObekwiSibaya uselingisa koweshashalazi wodumo
UMLINGISI wodumo kwiSibaya, uBheki Mkhwane, uyingxenye yabalingisi abasha bomdlalo weshashalazi okhuza ibuya osihloko sithi Bopha!.
UBheki obelingisa indawo kasomatekisi uSamson Ndlovu kwiSibaya, uzobonakala noTerrence Ngwila noTshallo Chokwe kulo mdlalo kaPercy Mtwa.Sekuwumlando ukuthi Isibaya sisongiwe kuMzansi Magic kwathi indawo yaso yavalwa iDiep City.
UMtwa ongumqondisi womdlalo, uthe umyalezo usafanele ukudluliselwa kubantu namanje ngoba isikhathi asikakashintshi futhi kusenzeka,  okwakwenzeka kudala.“ Njengoba umyalezo wawubhekiswe emaphoyiseni ngesikhathi sikahulumeni wobandlululo, ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu abamnyama, namanje zisenzeka izigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabamnyama ngamaphoyisa.
Isihluku esenzeka eMarikana kubulawa abantu ngamaphoyisa, singesinye sezibonelo zokuthi amaphoyisa asenesihluku asibhekise kubantu abamnyama,” kusho uMtwa.UMtwa uthe bazoqala kusasa ukuzilungiselela lo mdlalo okulindeleke ukuthi uye nakwezinye izifundazwe.
Phambilini umdlalo wavakashela emazweni ahlukene njengoSwaziland, Scotland, England, USA nase-Australia.
IBopha!
ike yahlabana ngezindondo kwiDrama Critic Circle Awards, eyeBest Play, Best Director neBest Actor kwiLos Angeles International Festival ngo-1987.
Ngo-1993 yaphendulwa ifilimu yaseHollywood,  eyayiqondiswa wumlingisi wamafilimu waseMelika, uMorgan Freeman.
Kuvulwe eminye imingenelo kumaSaftas
ABEMIKLOMELO yezokulingisa ehlonishwayo eNingizimu Afrika amaSouth African Film and Television Awards (Saftas), banxusa ukuba kuthunyelwe imingenelo yeminxa yokuhlonipha abenze kahle.AmaSaftas okuzobe kungaka-15 uma esenziwa kulo nyaka ngoMeyi 21 no-22.INational Film and Video Foundation ebhekele imiklomelo ifuna imingenelo emunxeni weLifetime Achiever Award.
Kulo munxa okwake kwahlonishwa kuwo abalingisi okubalwa uThembi Mtshali-Jones, John Kani, Lillian Dube, Joe Mafela, Cynthia Shange nabanye, kufuneka abantu abanamava abanegalelo elikhulu kwezethelevishini namafilimu eNingizimu Afrika naphesheya.Omunye umunxa okufuneka imingenelo kuwo ngoweYouth Achiever Award.
Kuwona kufuneka abantu abenza umsebenzi wabo ngokuzimisela abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-35.Kowe-Outstanding Person with Disability Contributor Award kufuneka ophila nokukhubazeka ogqame kwezamafilimu nethelevishini, Outstanding Provincial Contributor Award okuzohlonishwa ngawo umuntu, iqembu okanye umkhankaso othuthukisa amafilimu nethelevishini esifundazweni nowe-Emerging Filmmaker Award okuhloswe ngawo ukuklomelisa umuntu osemusha kwezamafilimu nethelevishini.Yonke imingenelo kumele ithunyelwe kwiNFVF ngaphambi kuka-Ephreli 2.Ukungenela kweminye iminxa kuvulwe ngoNovemba ngonyaka odlule kwaze kwaba nguJanuwari 22.Muva nje kusanda kuphuma ithenda lokufuna inkampani ezohlela umcimbi wakulo nyaka ozodonsa izinsuku ezimbili.
Ukulifakela kuvalwa kusasa.
Akudluli kumsakazi woKhozi owaliwa yisoka
UMSAKAZI woKhozi FM othandwa abaningi ngomusa namancoko, uMroza Buthelezi udlulise enduduzo kunontandakubukwa obuye abe ngumethuli wezinhlelo osanda kugilwa yisoka lakhe, uLaSizwe.
UMroza uveze ukuthi isigameko sokugileka kukaLaSizwe simvusele iminjunju yokwaliwa yisoka engalonanga ngalutho.
Lo msakazi uveze lokhu ohlelweni lwantambama iSisonke Drive alwethula noMzokoloko, uthe lo mshophi wamehlela eminyakeni eminingi eyedlule kodwa uma ecabanga ngakho kuvele kuzwele engathi yinto eyenzeke izolo.
Uthe lokhu kwamehlela ngosuku olukhulu lokuhlukanisa unyaka, ngalowo mzuzu wayetetemuka nabanye kumnandi bengcebeleko olwandle kanti isoka lihlela ukumala.
"Awufuni ukudlula lo myalezo Mzo, ngempela ngiyadinga ukwelulekwa ngoba noma sengimdala ngingaka manje kodwa umyalezo wahlala.
Cha, wagadla mfowethu," kusho uMroza ephela insini.
Okumangaza kakhulu ukuthi le nsizwa ayigcinanga ngokucela bahlukane kuphela kodwa yaphinde yavuvuzela usawoti esilondeni"Waze wakugcizelela impela ukuthi uyabona sengathi impilo yami imile.
Ifana nesiqeda ngakho ngeke akwazi ukuthi siqhubeke," kusho uMroza.
UMzokoloko ubelokhu emduduze njalo uzakwabo.
Kuphinde kwavela ukuthi leli soka labuye lazisola ngokuhamba kwesikhathi selibona uMroza esimama kwasho khona ukuthi wawuzwa kahle umyalezo njengoba usankeneneza namanje ezindlebeni.UMroza ungomunye wabasakazi boKhozi abahlala benconywa ngokuba nobuntu nokuhlonipha umsebenzi nabalaleli nokumenza ahlale ehamba phambili.
Ngaphandle kwalokhu uma kuziwa endimeni yezokusakazi ukhombisile ukuthi alukho uhlelo olungamhlula njengoba ekwazi ukusakaza ngesikhathi ezahlukene kanti nezinhlelo asezenze kulo msakazi seziningi kakhulu.
Ulaxaze ubuthishela olingisa kwi
UKUHLALA etshelwa ukuthi akabukeki kahle futhi nomzimba wakhe awuhehi, akumvimbanga ukuthi afeze amaphupho akhe umlingisi waseBergville.UNompumelelo Vilakazi (23), olingisa indawo kaSne kwiDiepCity edlala kwiMzansi Magic, uthi ukhulele esigodini saseMagangangozi, nokuyilapho afunda waqeda khona eWinterton, eBergville.Kumanje uNompumelelo ungomunye wabalingisi abaphambili, kulo mdlalo ongene endaweni yeSibaya.
Engxoxweni neSolezwe le ntokazi idalule ukuthi ngenkathi iqeda umatric yafundela ubuthishela e-UKZN eThekwini, okuyilapho yafunda kabanzi ngomkhakha wokulingisa.“Ngasekhaya kuneqembu elenza izinto ezihlukene emkhakheni wamaciko engaba yingxenye yalo, futhi lalihambela izindawo ezihlukene eBergville.
Bengihlala ngitshelwa ukuthi angimuhle futhi nginomzimba omkhulu, lokhu kwenza ngizenyeze kakhulu ngangakhululeka ekwenzeni into engizithandayo.
Ngaqeda isikole ngase ngiya kokwenza iziqu zobuthishela e-Edgewood, nokuyilapho ngabuyelwa ukuzethemba ngenxa yezinto engafike ngazithola khona, ezithinta ukulingisa yize ngingakufundelanga kodwa kuningi engakufunda khona,” kuchaza uNompumelelo.Uthi esafunda ngemva kokubuyelwa ukuzethemba kwakhe, wangenela umncintiswano wozime wabantu abondlekile, nokuyinto eyamjabulisa.
“Ngabuyela ekhaya ngo-2019, ngaqala ngazama ukungena emkhakheni wokulingisa.
Bengithumela ama-video ami ngilingisa ezinkampanini ezihlukene kuleli.
UMandla N ngibone ngenkathi efuna abantu abazolingisa ku-Instagram, ngazama kodwa ngangaphumelela ngoba inetwork ibingihlupha emakhaya.
Lelo thuba lagcina lingilahlekele.
Kuthe sengingalindele lutho, uMandla wangibiza eGoli ngizokwenza inhlolokhono yalo mdlalo, okuyilapho ngashiya phansi nokufundisa eNtatakusa Secondary, la kwamina ngafunda khona,” kuchaza uNompumelelo.Uveze ukuthi indawo kaSne njengoba abantu sebeyibonile, izoqhubeka nokukhombisa owesifazane obekezelela ukuhlukunyezwa yisoka lakhe.“USne ngesikhathi uqala lo mdlalo ubeyisigebengu esikhululekile, kodwa manje usenovalo ngemuva kwesigameko esehlile kwaze kwakhona oboshwayo.
Okunye ngaye wukuthi uhlalele ubudlelwane lapho ahlukunyezwa khona kodwa ngeke aye ndawo ngoba uthola uthando esokeni lakhe, nokuyinto akhule engayazi.
Ubudlelwane bakhe nesoka  buzogqama kanti abantu bangalindela nokunye okukhulu kulo mdlalo,” kuchaza intokazi yaseBergville.Lo mlingisi uveze nokuthi ubusisekile empilweni ngokuthola indawo ephambili emdlalweni omkhulu kangaka, ekubeni uyaqala ukulingisa emdlalweni wethelevishini.
'Kusenzima ukukhuluma ngoNgamla'
UVEZA ukuthi bekusenzima ukukhuluma ngokushona kukazwakwabo umlingisi owayedlala indawo ephambili kumdlalo wansuku zonke phakathi nesonto kuSABC 1, iGenerations, uSonia Mbele.
Lo mlingisi owayedlala indawo kaNtombi kwiGenerations nokuyindawo eyayimsondeza kuMenzi Ngubane, owayelingisa ekaSbusiso “Ngamla" Dhlomo, uveza ukuthi ubengathule nje ngoba engezwanga ngezindaba ezibuhlungu zokudlula kukaMenzi kodwa bekusenzima ukuthi aphawule ngakho.
"Bengithule ngisetshisa izindaba zokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni.
Okwethu bekuwuthando olwaluhlanganiswe umdlalo wethelevishini, uyohlala uwubambo lukaNtombi," kusho uSonia.
Abantu abaningi bakhumbule izikhathi ezazimnandi nemdima eyadlalwa yilaba bobabili kwiGenerations eminyakeni edlule.Le ndawo njengoba esho USonia yabenza basondelana kakhulu nokwenza kwabanzima ukwamukela kubabukeli uma bexoshwa laba balingisi kwiGenerations.
UMenzi uqhubeke nokulingisa kweminye imidlalo emikhulu okubalwa kuyo neSibaya kanjalo namafilimu.
Kuyona yonke imidlalo ebelingisa kuyo ubevelela ngekhono lakhe nobekumenza abenogazi kubabukeli.
Yize ebesewumlingisi onamava kodwa ubengababukeli phansi ozakwabo abasebasha kwezokulingisa ngokushona kwabanye babo okubalwa nomlingisi weHostella uThobani Nzuza.
Ezindaweni zokungcebeleka nasezitolo uMenzi ubevamisile ukubonakala exoxa nabantu ethatha nezithombe ngaphandle kokukhononda.
Uzobonakala kuZalo uMaMkhize
UZOTHI xinti izinsuku ezimbalwa emdlalweni Uzalo usomabhizinisi waseThekwini uShauwn Mkhize.UShauwn udume kwabaningi ebonakala ohlelweni obelukhombisa ngempilo yakhe oluthi KwaMamkhize, obelukhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic.NgoMsombuluko ntambama inkampani eqopha Uzalo iStained Glass, iveze izindaba zokuthi uShauwn, uzobonakala kulo mdlalo kusukela ngoLwesine (namhlanje).Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba uShauwn uzobe elingisa indawo yowesifazane ongusomabhizinisi onemali, ofuna ukuthenga ibandla iKwaMashu Kingdom Church.Ngokwamazwibela alo mdlalo kuleli sonto, abazalwane sebezwile ukuthi umfundisi wabo ufuna ukudayisa ibandla, okuzothi esiqeshini sangoLwesihlanu bathole ukuthi kukhona oselithengile.
Ekhuluma ngokuba yingxenye yalo mdlalo uShauwn, uthe ube nesikhathi esimnandi eqopha kuwona.
"Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthola ithuba lokubonakala kulo mdlalo isikhashana, njengoba kungeke kube isikhathi eside.
Ukubona abalingisi balo mdlalo futhi ngibe nesikhathi nabo kube umzuzu ojabulisayo kimina futhi okusekude ukuthi ngiwukhohlwe.
Esengikulindile manje ukuthi wonke umuntu abone uhlangothi lwami lwethalente ebengilifihlile, lingaziwa muntu,“ kusho uShauwn.NgoLwesihlanu iyaphela isizini yesithupha yalo mdlalo njengoba kuzoqala eyesikhombisa ngoMsombuluko.UNomfundo Zondo okhulumela lo mdlalo, uveze ukuthi kuleli sonto bazokhipha isitatimende esizocacisa ngokusha okuzobonakala kusizini entsha, nokuthi obani abadlali abazobonakala kuyo.Kuleli sonto kuphinde kwavela izindaba zokuthi uJet Novuka, obelingisa indawo kamseshi uMpambani, uyashiya kulo mdlalo.Abanye abashiyayo kubalwa uSiyabonga Shibe noBaby Cele ogcine ukubonakala kulo mdlalo emasontweni amabili adlule.Ekupheleni kwaleli sonto ababukeli balo mdlalo bazobe sebazi ukuthi obani abalingisi abasha abazoqala ukutheleka kulo mdlalo ngesonto elizayo.Kuwona ezinyangeni ezizayo kulindeleke ukuthi abalingisi abadala balo mdlalo babonakale kuwona maduzane.Kwababuyayo kubalwa uKhaya Dladla, Nokuthula Mabika, Ntokozo Dlamini noNay Maps.
Amacala endoda awahlangene nomkayo: Ongoti
UKUVELA kwesiqephu ohlelweni iReal Housewives of Durban lapho ongunkosikazi wesihlabani sokholo esingasekho emhlabeni, u-Ayanda Ncwane etshelwa ukuthi kumele ayohlawula amacala awashiya kubo kwentombi, simangaze abaningi.
Izakhamizi zaseNingizimu Afrika nababukeli bohlelo lakwiShowmax iThe Real Housewives of Durban oselukhonjiswa kuMzansi Magic, balokhu bephawule njalo ngokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi u-Ayanda Ncwane kumele angenelele azame ukuyohlawula amacala kaSfiso Ncwane owashiya ethembise ukuyohlawula kubo kanina wengane yakhe naye oyingxenye yalolu hlelo.
Kulolu hlelo lokhu kuvele njengento eyingxenye yesiko newubuntu futhi umndeni wakubo kanina wengane obona kungaba yisixazululo esingaqinisa nobuhlobo.Ongoti bezamasiko bathi noma ikanjani ingane nonina bafanelwe ukuyohlawulwa futhi nabakubo kantombi bafanele ukubasela inhlawulo.
Ungoti wezesintu nesazi samasiko uSolwazi Sihawu Ngubane uthe lokhu kusuke kudinga ngqo umuntu wesilisa ngoba amacala akhe okumele ahlawulwe uyena.
Owesifazane oyingoduso noma oshade naye ephila noma engasekho emhlabeni usuke engangene nakancane.
"Akangene nakancane owesifazane emacaleni enziwe indoda yakhe ngoba noma ngabe bashadile yaphinga, kufanele kube iyona eyohlawula ingane ekhabonina.
Uma kwenzeka indoda ishona ingakahlawuli, unkosikazi akangene lapho.
Angikaze ngizwe ngisho emlandweni ukuthi endulo kukhona okufaka owesifazane emacaleni endoda," kusho uNgubane.Eqhuba uthe isintu sihambisana nobuntu.
Uma kwenzeka owesifazane enothando lokuqoqa izingane zendoda yakhe, kuhle futhi kuyakhuthazwa kodwa kodwa akukho okomphoqayo.
Uma kuvuka amacala endoda kusuke kufanele abakubo kantombi bayozibika kubo kandoda. "
Inja ibanjelwa umnikazi wayo, uma indoda ishona kade ishiye yone komunye umuzi yaze yathola nomntwana, kumele kuyobikelwa abazali bayo ekhaya.
Yibona okumele bamele lawo macala ngoba uma kuzohlawulwa komunye umuntu, kuthintwa nomsamo kubikelwe idlozi.
Uma unkosikazi enesifiso sokufaka isandla, angapha abazali imali kube yisipho sabo bese bona beyisebenzisa ngendlela yabo,"kusho uNgubane.Eqhuba uNgubane uthe okuba umqondo omuhle ukuthi owesifazane onengane engaziwa noma etholwe ngaphandle, abakubo bayombika nangalo usuku okuvele ngalo ukuthi indoda ayisekho emhlabeni ukuze uma kunesiko eligcinwayo nelingakhaleleka enganeni isheshe ilithole.
"Isiko elingagcinwa ngaleso sikhathi eliqondene nesifo kodwa uma sekukhaleleka amanye kufanele enziwe ingane seyihlawuliwe abakubo kandoda.
Unkosikazi naye onezingane naleyo ndoda eshonile okumele azikhulise yedwa ngakho ukuhlawula ingane eyodwa kungabe sekusho ukuthi uma kuvela enye ingane nayo kolindeleka ukuthi enze okufanayo,"kusho uNgubane.Omunye futhi ungoti wesintu nokukhuliswa kwezintombi, uNkk Nomagugu Ngobese ubambe emazwini kaNgubane njengoba ethe ingane ezalelwe ekhaya ngokomthetho wesintu eyasekhabonina ngoba nezinto zesintu zisuke zilindeleke komalume.
"Uma kuyingane yentombazane kuze kulindeleke imicimbi efana nembeleko nomemulo yenzelwe ekhabonina lapho sithi ikomalume khona.
Unkosikazi wendoda eyakutholisa untwana akahlangane nakancane nenhlawulo yengane nokugcinwa kwesiko ngaphandle uma ezenzela yena kusuka othandweni,"kugcizelela uNkk Ngobese.

USpikiri wasifaka njengabadidiyeli nonjiniyela bomsindo.

"Uchaze uMjokes njengomuntu obezithobile.
"Ubehlukile kunathi.

Ubethanda ukusiza abantu ebhalela abanye izingoma njengeMafikizolo neBongo Maffin.
Usize abantu abaningi.

"Kunesivuvu sesithathu seCovid-19 manje ngakho asifuni umngcwabo uyibhebhethekise.
Yonke into izosakazwa bukhoma i-ink sizoyifaka emakhasini ethu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kusasa."

UPHELELWE amazwi okubonga umlingisi uThuso Mbedu, ohalaliselwe ngabantu abahlukene emuva kokuvela izindaba zokuthi uzodlala indawo ephambili efilimini nomlingisi ohlonishwayo uViola Davis.UThuso (29), okuthiwa wake wakusho ukuthi uyafisa ukusebenza noViola, uzolingisa efilimini iThe Woman King.UViola nenkampani edidiyela ifilimu, iJuVee Production yaseLos Angeles, babhale emakhasini abo kwiTwitter ukuthi bajabule ngalokhu.UThuso uthe amaphupho ayafezeka.

OwoKhozi ucasule omaskanda eqamba izinja zakhe ngabo
UZITHINTELE owoKhozi FM eqamba izinja zakhe ngamagama omaskanda maqede wawadalula kwiFacebook.U-Ayanda Melansi, onguphrojusa wohlelo iJabul’ Ujule oludlala kuKhozi FM nolushayelwa nguDudu “ Lady D” Khoza, ucasule abaculi bakamaskandi, ngenkathi edalula ukuthi izinja zakhe zinamagama afana nawabo.Ubhale kwiFacebook ezwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngokugula kwezinye zezinja zakhe, athe uthole ukuthi ngesikhathi ziyohlolwa kuvele izinsolo ezithi zidliswe ushevu.
U-Ayanda ubethe ukhathazekile ngokugula kwezinja zakhe, okunguNtencane noNyonemhlophe.
Kuyona iFacebook kukhona obuze ku-Ayanda isizathu sokuqamba izinja zakhe ngamagama omaskandi,  waphendula ngokuthi akunasizathu kodwa ngamagama awathandayo.Udalule nokuthi empeleni bezinhlanu izinja zakhe sezizonke, okunguMfazomnyama, Mgqumeni, Nyonemhlophe, Ntencane noSgwebo Sentambo.
Uthe kodwa uSgwebo Sentambo noMgqumeni sebathengwa, usesele nezinye.Kuthintwa uSgwebo Sentambo ngalolu daba, uthukuthele wagana unwabu, wathi kumele u-Ayanda asho ukuthi ufunani kuyena usengaze aqambe inja yakhe ngegama lakhe.“Ngeke ngikwazi ukuthula ngale nto eyenziwe ngu-Ayanda ngoba ngiyabona ukuthi unenkinga nami.
Wake wangitshela emehlweni ukuthi akangithandi.
Manje usezoqamba inja, ngami.
Ngifuna angichazele ukuthi ufunani.
Ngeke ngithule nje enza le nto.
Ngeke futhi ngimncenge ngoba ngisaba ukuthi umculo wami kawuzodlalwa kuKhozi ngoba vele kawudlalwa,” kusho uSgwebo Sentambo.USgwebo Sentambo usho kanje maqede waqopha i-video wayifaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana echapha u-Ayanda Melansi ngenhlamba.UNdlemnyama waBafana bakaMgqumeni, uthe okwenziwe ngu-Ayanda kungubukela phansi omaskanda.“Uma kungukuthi la magama uyawathanda, kungani engaqambanga izingane zakhe ngawo kunokuthi aqambe izinja?
Angimazi ukuthi uhloseni ngale nto,” kusho uNdlemnyama.UNyonemhlophe uthe usamangele ngesenzo sika-Ayanda.“Kufana nokuthi usithukile ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi usibona siyizinja.
Kuyadumaza ukuthi akhombise ukubukela phansi umculo kamaskandi ngalolu hlobo,” kusho uNyonemhlophe.UNtencane uthe yena akaboni lutho olubi futhi ubengeke u-Ayanda afake negama lakhe uma kungukuthi ubeqonde into embi.“U-Ayanda ngudadewethu.
Ngiyamhlonipha naye uyangihlonipha.
Ngisho kukhona inkinga enginayo ngiyaxhumana naye, ngifune iseluleko,” kusho uNtencane.Ethintwa u-Ayanda, uthe ngeke esakwazi ukuphawula ngalolu daba.“Into esingicasula wukuthi uSgwebo wenze ne-video engichapha ngenhlamba.
Akaqhubeke enze ngendlela abona ngayo.
Mina ngisamile ekutheni bengikhuluma ngezinja zami engikhathazekile ngokugula kwazo,” kusho u-Ayanda.
