Asibanike ithuba abasakazi ezinhlelweni ezintsha
KUYASUKA ukukhuluma kuleli sonto ngoLwesine njengoba iziteshi zeSABC zizoshintsha izinhlelo abasakazi bafakwe kwezinye.Minyaka yonke uma sekungu-Ephreli kusuke kuqala unyakazimali omusha emsakazweni okusho nokuqala kwezinkontileka ezintsha.Silinde uLwesine nje, asevele aqalile amahlebezi oukuthi izinhlelo zizoshintsha kanjani kwezinye iziteshi kodwa sesilinde ukuthi kuqinisekiswe yiziphathimandla.Lo mkhuba wokushintsha abasakazi yinto endala ejwayelekile kodwa kwesinye isikhathi thina njengabalaleli sibuye senze sengathi kusha sifune izinto zenzeke ngendlela  yethu.Ngiyazi, imisakazo ikhona ngenxa yethu futhi nabaphathi kumele bazibheke nezimfuno zethu kodwa kwesinye isikhathi asibanikezi ithuba abasakazi lokuthi bazinze ezinhlelweni.Uthi umuntu eqala nje ngakho kodwa sibe sesimgxeka sibona izici.
Hhayi ngoba esuke ebheda kodwa sivala izindlebe singafuni ukuzwa okuhle ngoba nakhu isithandwa sethu singangenanga ohlelweni ebesisuke sisibheke kulo.Ngiyacela sike sibanikeze ithuba lokuthi bazinze ezinhlelweni bajwayele bese kuyima sibehlulela kahle.
Izibalo zokulalelwa kwemisakazo ezikhishwa yiBroadcast Research Council of South Africa yizo ezihlulela kahle abasakazi ukuthi benza njani ezinhlelweni zabo nokuthi iziteshi ngezinguquko ezizenzile ngabe zishaye emhloleni yini.Ngike ngibone ezinye ngezinyanga zokuqala zenze izinguquko izibalo zidubule ziye phezulu kodwa uma sekuphuma ezilandelayo bese ziyehla.
Ngokwami sisuke sifuna ukuzwa ukuthi izinguquko zikahle yini kodwa uma sezibheda bese siyashintsha siye kwezinye iziteshi.Kuye kwenzeke futhi ukuthi uma sixoxa nabangani bethu sivumelane ngokuthi umsakazi othile uyabheda kodwa ngaphakathi esiteshini izibalo zokulalelwa kohlelo lwakhe zilokhu zikhule njalo.Kumele uma kukhona umsakazi esizwa ukuthi akalwenzi ngendlela uhlelo singanikeli ezinkundleni zokuxhumana siyomgxeke simbeke nezici.
Phela ekugcineni naye ungumuntu ophilayo futhi uyazwela njengabo bonke.
Yingakho abanye beze behluthuke baphendulane kabi nabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
Kumele sizame ukugxeka ngendlela eyakhayo ukuze nomuntu akhule.Kodwa uma engenzi ngendlela singamuzwa njengabalaleli futhi nezibalo zimphika, abaphathi kumele basilalele bamfake lapho engenza kangcono khona.Ungangibhalela [email protected], kuTwitter @fanelebengu noma kuFacebook Fanelesibonge Bengu

Lwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyisizwe esihlangene ngenxa yothando esikhombisana lona futhi siyakwazi ukukhuluma ngokuvuleleka emphakathini ngezinto ezithinta uthando,” kuchaza uMzwandile.Kulolu hlelo uveze ukuthi bazoqhubeka nokusiza abantu abafuna ukwakha uthando nabantu abahlukana nabo, nasebebona kungcono baphinde bazame futhi.“Izingxoxo ezivulelekile engibe nazo nabantu abazobonakala kulolu hlelo, izona ezingenze ngakuthanda kakhulu ukuba umethuli walo futhi ngagqugquzeleka ukuthi ngiqhubeke nokulwethula.
Ngiyabonga kakhulu ngethuba engilitholile, ngiyethemba abalandeli balolu hlelo bazoluthokozela njengoba nami ngikujabulele ukuba ngumethuli walo,” kuchaza uMzwandile.Le nsizwa isanda kukhuza ibuya kwithelevishini ngemuva kokunyamalala isikhashana.Muva nje, uMzwandile uke wabonakala elingisa emdlalweni iThe River, elingisa indawo ka-Elvis Baloyi obeyiphela endlebeni kuLindiwe Dikana (Sindi Dlathu), owadubula wabulala indodakazi yakhe uTumi.U-Elvis ubelazi lonke iqiniso ngokufa kukaTumi, futhi efuna ukushada noLindiwe ngenkani ukuze amgcinele imfihlo yakhe.
UNomsa Philiso wakwaM-Net, uthe bakujabulele ukubuya kwalolu hlelo futhi bayathemba ukuthi abantu bazomjabulela uMzwandile ozobe esiza abake bathandana baphinde bavuselele lokhu ababenakho ekuqaleni.

UDJ Tira ugcine eqophile nentokazi 'yamabhodlela'
UPHROJUSA womculo weHouse ongumnikazi wesitebele somculo esiphambili kuleli, i-Afrotainment, uDJ Tira ugcine eqophile nentokazi eyabonakala icula iqoqa amabhodlela.
Le ntokazi ivela kwivideo eyasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana icula kamnandi ngesikhathi umngani wayo eyigquqguzela ukuthi icule khona izobonwa uDJ Tira.
Ikhono lale ntokazi lamthathile uDj Tira oyifuna waze wayithola.
"Sengimtholile usisi wamabhodlela , sahlela usuku lokuya estudio ngoLwesibili.
Ngicele noMondli Ngcobo ukuthi angilekelele ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuphuma ulozolo.
Sikhulekiseni sisazoqala siyazidinga izindaba ezinhle kulelizwe.
Lusiphazamise kakhulu udaba lukaLufuno, asithandaneni, sesekane.
Sidinga negama esizometha lona," kusho uDj Tira ngeledlule.Izolo uTira ufake ivideo yakhe esebenzisana nale ntokazi ngokunjalo noMondli Ngcobo njengoba ayethembisile.
Umlingisi nefilimu ehlolisisa okwazuzwa yinkululeko kuleli
UMLINGISI wakuleli, uJafta Mamabolo, unethemba lokuthi kukhona okuzofundwa yintsha yakuleli kwifilimu yakhe ethi Freedom.Kule filimu ekhonjiswa kuBox Office kwiDStv, uJafta uyena olingisa indawo ephambili yomfana owaziwa ngoFreedom.
Ekhuluma ngayo uthe okumjabulisa kakhulu ukuthi iphume ngenyanga yokubungaza intsha yakuleli eyalwela inkululeko.“Okuzogqama kuyona kakhulu ukuthi kwenzakalani manje entsheni yakuleli eseyathola inkululeko.
UFreedom ngumfana okudinga ngempela ukungena enyuvesi nowenza konke okusemandleni akhe ukusebenza kanzima ethatha noma yini engumsebenzi ayithola edolobheni laseJohannesburg.
UFreedom kuthi esengenile enyuvesi abone ukuthi usakudinga ukuthola imali nagcina ngokuthi abolekise izincwadi zakhe, ngendlela okwenza ngayo omashonisa, ukuze athole imali yokubhala izivivinyo zokugcina zonyaka futhi enye ayithumelele umndeni wakhe othwele kanzima emakhaya,” kusho uJafta.Uveze ukuthi uFreedom izinto zigcina zingamhambeli kahle uma ebuyela kubangani bakhe abadala, abagcina benza izinto ezingalungile beze bengena ezinkingeni.
“Okuphinde kuvezwe yile filimu ukuthi isho ukuthini inkululeko entsheni yamanje.
Ingabe ngempela  sikhululekile uma kusekhona intsha engakwazi ukuthola izinto eyathenjiswa yona ngesikhathi kuphunywa okhethweni luka-1994?
Angiyena umuntu onalezo zimpendulo kodwa ngiyakholelwa ekutheni kumele sixoxe ngalezi zinto, singathuli,” kuchaza uJafa.Uveze ukuthi uqale ukusebenza le filimu ngo-2017, nakhethe ukuthi bayishuthele eGoli ezindaweni okukhona kuzo iYeoville, Hillbrow naseNewtown.
Kubalingisi abazobonakala kuyo kubalwa uMary Twala ongasekho, Mandla Gaduka, Kenneth Nkosi, Samkelo Ndlovu nentokazi entsha kulo mkhakha wokulingisa uNicole Mathope olingisa indawo kaSonia.
UZodwa nonyanyavu lwemoto
ABAWUVALI abantu umlomo uZodwa Wabantu eziqhasabula ngemoto yomacaphunakusale.UZodwa Wabantu usematheni kwabaningi selokhu efake isithombe seLamborghini ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba  abantu belokhu bembongele njalo.

UZodwa Wabantu uvela nale moto nje abantu bebesamshayela ihlombe ngobuhlakani bakhe.
Emuva kokuvalwa kwemicimbi ebimngenisela imali wabona ithuba lokuqala ibhizinisi ebelibukeka lilincane futhi lingeke limenzele inzuzo etheni.
UZodwa Wabantu usedume ngokudayisa amaqanda muva nje, lama qanda akakhethi zindawo kodwa uwadayisa kuwona wonke amalokishi namadolobha ngisho basemgwaqweni uqobo.Abantu balokhu bembongele njalo okubalwa ngisho osaziwayo.
Kulezi zinsuku uZodwa Wabantu ubukeka ematasa kakhulu njengoba esengene naseqenjini likaSushi King, uKenny Kunene wePatriotic Alliance.
Okwamanje akukho okutheni abasakuveza noma abakudalulayo laba bobabili mayelana nokungena kukaZodwa Wabantu kuleli qembu.

UZakwe noDuncan ezinhlelweni zokwenza iqophamlando
OMREPHA baseThekwini abakhiphe i-albhamu ngokuhlanganyela uZakwe noDuncan, bahlela ukuyiphendula bayenze iqophamlando elikhuluma ngempilo yabo.Labo mrepha abaqala bengobhululu ngaphambi kokungaboni ngaso linye okwenza beqhelelane iminyaka ecela kweyisithupha, bakhiphe i-albhamu eqanjwe ngamagama abo ekuqaleni kukaDisemba ngonyaka odlule.UZakwe uthe kuyona bachaza konke ngempilo yabo yingakho bekubona kufanele ukuthi kungagcini kuphela ngokuthi kukhulunywe ezingomeni kodwa kube nakwi-video ngeqophamlando.

Kukhona nenye ekhuluma ngokuthi uNkulunkulu usisize kangakanani empilweni yethu.
"UZakwe uqhube wathi beneme ngendlela abantu abayamukele ngayo i-albhamu yabo abapike kuyo uKwesta, Q Twins, K.O, Bongo Riot, Tira nabanye ngoba ibalwa nadayisa kakhulu kwi-hip hop kuleli.
"Inhloso yethu ukuthi ishaye igolide maduze.
Empeleni ngeke siye ePhasikeni noma kushaye oJuni singakezwa lutho.
"Uthe basanda kudedela enye ingoma ekuyo ethi Kapteni, abapike kuyo uKwesta noMusiholiq futhi ngesonto elizayo bazoqopha ivideo yayo.

Lihoxisiwe elokushaya ebelibhekene nomlingisi
MBALI KHANYILEUMLUNGISI weMbewu; The Seed uPhindile Gwala obesobishini ngokushaya isitshudeni saseMgungundlovu eCubana ngeledlule,  ugcine ethelelene amanzi nale ntokazi ehoxise icala emvulele lona.
Lo mlingisi nale ntokazi uNompilo Mkhize ( 23), kuthiwa bagcine ngokuthi bawahoxise bobabili amacala abavulelana wona ngobusuku abahilizisana ngabo kule ndawo yobumnandi.
Esitatimendini salo mlingisi ku-Instagram, uveze ukuthi yena noNompilo kanjalo nomndeni walesi sitshudeni, bagcine ngokuthi bathathe isinqumo sokuthi bakhumelane umlotha.“Ezinsukwini ezedlule abantu bakuleli bazwakalise imizwa yabo ngesigameko esingesihle esimbandakanya mina noNompilo.
Ngalokho ngabe ngenza iphutha uma ngingayibongi imizwa yabo eyakhayo,  nangendlela engesekwe ngayo ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sehlo.
Ngidlulisa ukubonga nakuNompilo nomndeni wakhe,” kubeka lo mlingisi.Uthe yize kube khona ukuphambana kwemimoya phakathi kwabo, umoya wobumbano nokuzwana, yiwo oholele ekutheni bathelelane amanzi.“Angizogxila kakhulu odabeni lokuthathelana izinyathelo zomthetho kodwa umoya wokubuyisana yiwo osiholele ekutheni sinqume ukuhoxisa amacala ebesivulelene wona.
Sesivule ikhasi elisha manje empilweni yethu.
Ngiyathemba ukuthi ngokwesekwa ngabantu bakuleli, sizokwazi ukudlula kulesi simo sobabili,” kuqhuba yena.Uthe ufisela uNompilo konke okuhle empilweni nasezifundweni zakhe.UNompilo ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook, utshele abangani bakhe ukuthi uPhindile uxolisile wabe esethenga nomakhalekhukhwini omusha.
Abanye abantu abebephawula kuleli khasi, bebengayizwisisi eyokuxola kwalesi sitshudeni.
Abanye babo bebekhala ngokubhalwe esitatimendeni, bethi akukhombisi ukuthi uyazisola uPhindile ngakwenzile.
UPhindile obeseCubana nabangani bakhe ngempelasonto, kubikwa ukuthi waqonda ngqo kuNompilo owayematasa eshutha izithombe ngomakhalekhukhwini wakhe owawubheke ngakubona (kuPhindile nabangani).Lo mlingisi okuthiwa wayediniwe, wafike wahlwitha lesi sitshudeni umakhalekhukhwini waso wawuphahlaza phansi, ngaphambi kokuthi asiklwebhe ebusweni.UNompilo wavulela uPhindile icala lokumshaya ngenhloso yokumlimaza nelokuphahlaza umakhalekhukhwini wakhe.
Umlingisi ukhuza ibuya kwiMbewu
UMLINGISI okhuza ibuya emdlalweni owuchungechunge Imbewu:The Seed  uPortia Ncwane, uthe bekunzima ukubuya ngenxa yokushoda kozakwabo.UPortia (28) owaba yingxenye yalo mdlalo ngo-2018, udlala indawo kaSli Ngwenya.
"Ngithole ucingo lokuthi indawo yami iyabuya.
Angifuni ukuqamba amanga, bekunzima ukubuyela ngaphandle kuka-Enhle Gambushe (owashona engozini yemoto ngo-2018) ngoba sasisondelene kakhulu.
Bekungathi ngizombona kodwa ke umsebenzi kumele uqhubeke kunzima kunjalo," kusho uPortia oke wadlala kuZalo nasefilimini iLove Lives Here.Le ntokazi edabuka eNanda kodwa esihlala eNewlands eThekwini, ithe uSli ngumuntu ofuna kuzwakale uma ekhuluma.
"Ufuna inhlonipho, futhi uyazikhulumela.
Njengoba manje esebuyile indawo yakhe isondelene kakhulu noKaMadonsela (Brenda Mhlongo), okuyinto ezovivinya ubudlelwano bakhe nomndeni wakwaBhengu.
USli uhluke kakhulu kunami kodwa sicishe sifane ngokuthi nami ngiyayimela into yami," kuchaza uPortia.Uthe ukhuza ibuya kulo mdlalo nje, uke wanyamalala eNingizimu Afrika wayohlala e-United States of America, emuva kokuthola umfundaze weMandela Washington Fellowship for Young African Leaders eNyuvesi yaseDelaware eNewark.
"Bengihamba izindawo njengakoNew York ngisebenza nabezobuciko bakhona.
Ngibuye ngonyaka odlule ngenza umdlalo wami ngedwa iThe Journey of Growing Pains ePlayhouse Theatre.
Umdlalo ukhuluma ngezinhlungu zokukhula nokujabulela nje impilo.
"Le ntokazi ephinde ibe ngumdansi futhi eke yahambela amazwe ahlukene, ithe iyazifela ngobuciko nangokufukula umphakathi njengoba yaqala inhlangano engenzi nzuzo iPortia Ncwane Foundation, esiza kakhulu abantu abasha.
UPortia kulindeleke ukuthi aqale ukubonakala namhlanje kwiMbewu  ekhonjiswa ku-e.tv ngo-9.30 ebusuku phakathi nesonto.
Ukuzibulala kukanina kumenza asize abanye
UMLINGISI womdlalo wethelevishini ophinde abe ngumkhangisi, usebenzisa ubuhlungu abuzwa ngenkathi unina ezibulala, ukuthi afundisa intsha yabesifazane ngokubaluleka kokubhoboka uma ukhungethwe yizinkinga.UTebogo Thobejane olingisa kuMuvhango  uveza ukuthi ukuzibulala kukanina kwashiya amanxeba angakaze aphole yize kwenzeka eneminyaka ewu-11.
Ngaleso sikhathi unina wayeneminyaka ewu-31 kodwa kuze kube yimanje unembuzo engaphenduleki.Ukuhlasela kobhubhane iCovid-19 nokusebenza nentsha, nabantu ababhekene nengcindezi ngalesi sikhathi, uthe kumvulele isithombe sokuthi nonina yayinkulu impi ayebhekene nayo yedwa.
"Ngikhetha ukukhuluma ngakho ngoba abantu abaningi bacabanga ukuthi akuyona ingcindezi yangokomphefumulo akuyona into yangempela.
Ikakhulu ngalesi sikhathi abantu besifazane abaningi bephelelwa nayimisebenzi benezingane ezibabhekile.
Abantu besifazane kumele belokhu bekhuthazwa ukuthi bakhulume ngezimo ababhekene nazo kuze kube bayabhoboka ngazo," kusho uTebogo.Yize enohlelo alwenza nezingane zamantombazane ezikoleni kodwa njengamanje umatasa nezinhlelo zokuvula isikhungo ahlela ukuthi siqale ukusebenza maduze nje lapho ezokwazi ukuhlanganisa izingane nonina.
Inhloso yakhe enkulu ukuthi abesifazabe ikakhulukazi amantombazane, bavule izifuba  ngezimo ababhekene nazo ukuze bathole usizo.
Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi emnyakeni edlule uke wavuleleka kuleli phephandaba eveza ukuthi wakhula ngaphandle kukanina nokwamthwesa ubunzima esethola ingane.
UTebogo waveza ukuthi nebhizinisi lakhe lamaBofa okungamabhande esisu, laqala ngoba kwamthatha iminyaka ukwazi ukuthi owesifazane kumele azinakekele abophe nesisu uma esebelethile.Uphinde waveza nokuthi noma kuyinto ahamba nayo ubuhlungu bokuzibulala kukanina, kodwa okuhle ukuthi uyakwazi ukusiza abanye abesifazane bangazitholi sebethatha isinqumo esifanayo.
"Ngifisa abesifazane bazi ukuthi ingcindezi yomphefumulo yisifo futhi siyelapheka.
Abangazenyezi ngoba usizo bangaluthola akulona ihlazo," kusho uTebogo.
Ephetha uthe ukulekelela nokusiza omunye umuntu kuwumsebenzi wanoma ngubani obonayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi azikho izingane eziswela onina njengaye.
Uzalo luvikela abalingisi okuthiwa abagculisi
UKUBUYISWA kwabadlali abake balingisa kuZalo phambilini, okubalwa uKhaya Dladla noNokuthula Mabika, kufakele lo mdlalo isigcwagcwa kubabukeli njengoba bekhala ngokuthi izindawo zabo azigculisi.UKhaya ubuyele endaweni yakhe yakudala kaGC abeyidlala phambilini kanti uNokuthula ubuyele kwekaThobile.
Ababukeli babhale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana begxeka futhi bekhononda ngokuthi abachazekile ngendlela laba balingisi abadlala ngayo kuZalo.
Ngokusho kwababukeli, izinga lokulingisa kwabo lenza uZalo lwehlelwe yisithunzi futhi bathi abagculisekile ngalaba balingisi selokhu bebuyile kulo mdlalo.Abanye bakhale ngohleko lwabo uma belingisa, bathi alubachazi.
Kukhona abathe laba balingisi baphendula Uzalo isikeshi kanti abanye bebezwela ababukeli abasaqhubeka nokulubukela,  bethi bona bahluleka ukuqhubeka nokulubuka ngenxa yabalingisi abangakhombisi ukuba nekhono.Okhulumela Uzalo, uNomfundo Zondi uthe ukubakhona kwalaba balingisi kubalulekile kuwona nakubabukeli.“ Indlela okuhlelwe ngayo indawo kaGC nekaThobile ibalulekile ukwenza lo mdlalo ubemnandi futhi ujatshulelwe ngababukeli.
Sicela ababukeli boZalo baqhubeke nokulubuka ngoba kuningi okusazobajabulisa ngezindawo zalaba balingisi,” kusho uNomfundo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kuke kwanemibiko yokwehla kwesibalo sababukeli kuZalo kukhalwa ngokuthi indlela olubhalwe ngayo ayigculisi.
AboZalo bazivikela ngokuthi ngesikhathi kuphuma izibalo, azizange zigxile kuZalo kuphela kodwa neminye imidlalo yayibhekene nenkinga efanayo.
Isolezwe lijabule nabafundi eMaqaqa
BAGEZEKE  ubebebe abathandi bobumnandi abebehambele umcimbi weSolezwe, obuse-Adams eMaqaqa Exclusive Lifestyle ngoMgqibelo.Kutheleke iningi labantu kanti umcimbi ubugabe ngosaziwayo nabaculi abangaconsi phansi kwezikaqedisizungu.
Abaculi abebebhekwe kakhulu bekunguProffessor obegubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa, uDJ Mngadi obethula ingoma entsha noBig Zulu onandise kwachwaza iningi.Basine bededelana oDJ abashisa izikhotha kulezi zinsuku bejabulisa abantu, phakathi kwabo kubalwa uWonder,  Oros, DJ Nzwiri, Menzi The Drum, DJ Phumuza, DJ Tx, DJ Ma CDJS nabanye abaningiUNksz Noluthando Ngubane, wophiko lwezokukhangisa kwiSolezwe, uthe inhloso yomcimbi bekungukuhlanganyela nabafundi bephephandaba kwazise ukuthi sekunesikhathi eside sagcina ukuba ndawonye nabo ngenxa yemibandela yeCovid-19.“Sihlele ukuthi sihambele izindawo ezihlukene esizaziyo ukuthi zinabafundi bethu.
Lolu bekuwuhambo lwethu lokuqala, kanti ziningi ezinye izindawo esisazozihambela.
Siphathela nabafundi izipho njengendlela yokubabonga ngokuseseka kwabo kulesi sikhathi esinzima esibhekene nezwe,” kusho uNksz Ngubane.Uthe kuzomenyezelwa maduze ukuthi lizolibasa ngakuphi Isolezwe  ngokulandelayo, wathembisa ukuthi bazozama ukufinyelela kuzona zonke izindawo.Baningi abanye osaziwayo abebekhona kulo mcimbi kanti neSelimathunzi  ibikhona izoqopha obekwenzeka.
Abezokuphepha benze umsebenzi oncomekayo beqinisekisa ukuthi imigomo yeCovid-19 iyalandelwa nokuvikela abaculi, abantu abebefuna ukuzithintela mathupha kubona.
Zimhambela kahle izinto uLucia Mthiyane
KUBUKEKA zimhambela kahle izinto emkhakheni wokulingisa kulezi zinsuku uLucia Mthiyane njengoba esejoyine umdlalo, iDurban Gen.U-Lucia, ozobe elingisa indawo ka-Albertina Cele kulo mdlalo, uzoqala ukubonakala namhlanje.Kulo mdlalo uzofika njengoba kusanda kudlula emhlabeni udadewabo ogane kwaGumede, uMaCele (Monica Thuli Zulu), noshone emuva kokuphatheka kabi kwase kuthinteka inhliziyo ngenxa yezigemegeme ebezenziwa ngumyeni wakhe uBab’Gumede (Sifiso Sibiya).Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelelwe abezindaba, u-Albertina ungowesifazane ozimele nongekho ntekenteke, oyimelayo into ayenzayo.
“Ungowesifazane wasemakhaya okholelwa ukuthi kukhona isizathu esimenza abe okhethekile futhi kumele aphathwe ngendlela ephezulu noma yikuphi la aya khona.
Ungowesifazane okwazi ukubona abantu ukuthi banjani esanda kuhlangana nabo, engakabazi kahle kodwa avele asho nje ukuthi lo muntu asembonile unjani futhi uphila impilo enjani.
Imibono yakhe ayishintshi noma abantu bangamtshela okwehlukile, uma nje isinqumo esesithathile ngaleyo nto kusuke sekuphelile futhi engeke esawushintsha umqondo,” kuchaza isitatimende.
Kulo mdlalo uzofika kwaGumede esezizwa ngenye indlela ngoBab’ Gumede futhi ngesikhathi behlangana okokuqala kula kuqala khona ingxabano yabo bobabili.
Kulo mdlalo uMaCele ungomunye wabalingisi abasazonyamalala kuwona.Kuyimanje ungomunye wabalingisi abasanda kubonakala emdlalweni omusha othi Lingashoni ku-1Magic (103).Abanye abalingisi abasazonyamalala kulo mdlalo kubalwa uNtando Mncube, Lihle Dhlomo noSifiso Sibiya.Engxoxweni yakhe neSolezwe muva nje, uLucia uveze ukuthi ukujabulele ukubuya ekulingiseni njengoba eke wavela nakuDiep City isaqala.
U-Enhle Mbali ugeqe amagula 'ngokuhlukunyezwa' wuBlack Coffee
UKUHLALA egcwele ukwesaba novalo ngenxa yobengumyeni wakhe uveza ukuthi yikhona obekumenza afele ngaphakathi umlingisi odalule ukuthi ubeshaywa uDJ obengumyeni wakhe.
U-Enhle Mbali Mlotshwa useshicilele isitatimende wasinameka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana emuva kokuthi uBlack Coffee naye ephumele obala izolo waveza ukuthi uyamsukela ngezinsolo zokumshaya.
U-Enhle uthe akekho vele umuntu ohlukumezanayo owake wazivumela ngokwakhe ukuthi uyahlukumezana.
Selokhu ephumele obala u-Enhle uthi uzizwa ezethemba futhi engenavalo manje.
"Angisesabi manje ngifisa sengathi ngingakwazi nokuzibala izikhawu engishaya, engichapha engishiya ngiphuke umoya ngingeyilutho.
Njengo mshadikazi ngiyakwazi ukuhlukumezeka emoyeni, nokuhlukunyezwa ngamagama, imali, ngazo zonke izindlela.
Ngaphezulu kulowo mshado kuhambisana nokuphinga ngaze ngalala esibhedlela ngelashelwa ukhwantalala," kusho u-Enhle.Eqhuba uthe leminyaka emihlanu edlule bekunzima kuye nezingane zakhe zihlala zizibonela ngamehlo ehlukunyezwa ekhaya.
Uveze nokuthi ngo-2014 wamshaya ngezikhathi ezihlukene ekamelweni labo.
Ngonyaka olandelayo u-2015 emuva komcimbi wakhe uBlack Coffee iMusic is King, uthe wamjikijela ngesikhwama kulandela ingxabano ababenayo ngaleso sikhathi emzini wabo omusha.
U-Enhle uthi akugcinanga lapho njengoba ebuye wamphinda egubha usuku lokuzalwa.
"Selokhu kwaqala uhlelo lokwehlukanisa ulokhu engisabisa  enginswinya nemali ngoba efuna ukungivala umlomo.
Angisoze ngachithela inkantolo isikhathi ngidlale nangokuhlukunyezwa," kusho u-Enhle.
Ukukhuluma kwakhe uthe ufisa kube yisibonelo nesifundo kumadodana akhe azi ngobubi bodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane.
Yize ebengafisi ukukhuluma ngezinkinga zomshado wakhe kodwa uveze ukuthi ubona kuzosiza nabaningi, wabonga nokwesekwa akuthola kwabanye abantu besifazane.
OwaseMsinga emafilimini anzima
KUMHAMBELA kahle umlingisi waseMsinga, uSifundo Dladla, njengoba esengomunye wosaziwayo asebevelele emidlalweni yethelevishini.
Khona maduze uSifundo (25), wasendaweni yaKwaHluphiwe, uzobonakala efilimini emfishane kwiMzansi Magic esihloko sithi Lesiba.
Yize engakabi nesiqiniseko sokuthi lo mdlalo uzokhonjiswa nini kodwa unxuse ababukeli  ukuba bahlale begqolozele amathelevishini abo.
USifundo uthe ukhuliswe wugogo wakhe uMaNkabinde KwaZulu-Natal kodwa elokhu evakashela unina eGoli.
"Ukukhulela eKZN bekumnandi kwaze kwaba ngifika eGoli ngoba yilapho ngafike ngathola khona ukuthi impilo ihluke kakhulu khona.
Bengilokhu ngivakasha uma kuvalwe izikole.
Ngithe kodwa sengihlala khona unomphela ngoba bese ngizoqhuba imfundo yami, ngathola ukuthi izingane zaseGoli zinamaphupho amakhulu futhi ayafezeka lapha."
Uthe esakhula emakhaya kwakuhlale kukhulunywa ngokuba wuthisha, udokotela noma iphoyisa.
"Uma ngitshela abantu eKZN ukuthi ngifuna ukuba kwiTV, babevele baphele yinsini.
Bathi ngiyahlanya ngoba babekholelwa ukuthi uma ungowaseMsinga awusoze waba yilutho ngaphandle kokuba yiphoyisa noma uthisha.
"Uthe ukhule kubo kungekho ithelevishini nogesi.
"Ngangibuka iTV kuphela uma ngivakashele umama eGoli.
Yingakho ngagcina senginothando lwayo futhi ngangibona ukuthi uma useGoli ungaba kwithelevishini nanoma yinini.
"Uthe uqale ukungena emkhakheni wezokungcebeleka ngo-2008 ngokuba wuDJ nge-computer ne-sound system ayeyithengelwe wunina.
"Umzala wami, uSbongiseni, wayevamise ukungifundisa ukuthi zenziwa kanjani izinsimbi zengoma.
Ngabe sengiba uDJ futhi igama lami lasesteji nguS-Deez."
Uthe ukulingisa ukuqale ngo-2015 futhi wadlala efilimini ethi Mkhulu  kwiMzansi Magic.
Ngonyaka olandelayo, uSifundo ulingise kwenye ethi Fatherless.
"Ngabuye ngabamba iqhaza ohlelweni olusakazwa kwiSABC 1 iNow Or Never iminyaka emithathu.
Ngo-2017, ngalingisa kwiGold Diggers  kwi-e.tv, emdlalweni woKhozi nasefilimini yoMzansi Magic ethi Pastor Bae.
Ngo-2019, ngadlala kwiRhythm City  nasemafilimini oMzansi Magic athi Toro neMme Matswale.
Ngidlala izindawo eziqavile."
Ngonyaka odlule, uSifundo ulingise indawo kaNew Guy kwiGomora, okuyindawo ethandwe kakhulu ngababukeli.
Ngaphandle kokulingisa, uSifundo ubuye abambe iqhaza nakwingqephu njengoba enezimpahla zokugqoka ezibizwa ngeTypical Zulu Clothing.
Uhoxile ekwethuleni iRea Tsotella uMakamu
ISITESHI iMoja Love sithi siyakwemukela ukwehla ekwethuleni uhlelo kukaMbhishobhi Israel Makamu.Lokhu kulandela ukusabalala kwengxoxo yalo mbhishobhi, ekhuluma nowesifazane emcela inkonzo yasekameleni.Le nkulumo uMakamu uveze ukuthi yaqoshwa eminyakeni emine edlule, osekumumangaza ukuthi ivele manje.Kuyona kuzwakala uMakamu eqala ebuza owesifazane ukuthi unobani, ngoba kukhona into afuna ukumcela yona.“Uzonginika angithi?
Ngiyakucela phela, angithi uwedwa lapho.
Ngiyakunxusa, oh uyangichomela?”.Lona wesifazane uzwakala enqaba ethi ngeke akwenze okucelwa inceku yenkosi.
Esitatimendeni esikhishwe ilesi siteshi uMakamu athula kuso uhlelo oluthi Rea Tsotella, baveze ukuthi basazoba nophenyo lwangaphakathi ngalezi zinsolo.“Siyakwemukela ukuthi uBishop Makamu uthathe isinqumo sokuma ekwethuleni izinhlelo ngaphansi kwesiteshi iMoja Love.
Lokhu kulandela ukusabalala kwengxoxo phakathi kwakhe nowesifazane ethinta ucansi.
Ngaphambi kokuthi abuye emsebenzini sizophenya ngalesi sigameko.
Ekuxhumaneni nesiteshi uMbhishobhi ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umsulwa njengoba lona wesifazane wayemsebenzela futhi kule nkulumo wayefuna imali kuye,” kusho isitatimende.Siqhube sathi umbhishobhi uveze ukuthi kukhona abazama ukudicilela phansi igama lakhe njengoba lolu daba lwaxazululwa ngo-2017.“Uveze ukuthi umangele uma lolu daba seluphinde luvela emasontweni amathathu adlule.
Ngakho njengesiteshi siyakholelwa ekutheni sizwe izinhlangothi zombili ezithinta lolu daba.
Esikufunayo ukuthola iqiniso ngalo nezinto ezikhulunywa kulona udaba.
Njengesiteshi le ngxoxo siyithathela phezulu kakhulu, sesiluqalile uphenyo futhi sesixhumene nowesifazane othintekayo kulona,“ kusho umphathi wesiteshi uBokang Moyo.Uqhube wathi uhlelo lwabo, oluthi AmaBishop izindaba ezifana nalezi luhlale luzibheka, ngakho bebengeke baze baluzibe lolu daba.

KUZOSULEKA izinyembezi kubabukeli bomdlalo Uzalo, njengoba izintandokazi zabalingisi balo mdlalo zikhuza ibuya.Abalingisi okukhona kubona uKhaya Dladla (GC), Nokuthula Mabika (Thobile), Nay Maps (Mxolisi) noNtokozo Dlamini (Mastermind) kuvela ukuthi bazoqala ukuqopha kulo mdlalo kuleli sonto.Umthombo weSolezwe ongashayi eceleni, uveze ukuthi ukuvela kwezindaba zokushiya kulo mdlalo kukaThandeka Dawn-King (MaNgcobo), yikhona okwenze abadidiyeli bawo bathatha isinqumo sokubuyisa laba balingisi.“Kucacele noma ubani ukuthi badinga ukubhukula kulo mdlalo.
Abekho abantu ababacabangile ngesikhathi uThandeka eveza izindaba zokuthi uyahamba, babone kungcono ukuthi babuyise bonke abalingisi ababaxosha, okungangabazisi ukuthi nakanjani bazobuyisa isithunzi salo mdlalo uphinde ujatshulelwe ngabaningi futhi,“ kuchaza umthombo.Uveze ukuthi kuleli sonto uKhaya noNokuthula bayaqala ukuqopha njengoba beyobuya ngesonto elilodwa nokuyogcina ngalo ukubonakala kukaMaNgcobo kulo mdlalo.“UKhaya ngizwe ngandlebenye ukuthi nomdlalo iThe Zwide’s oqoshelwa i-e.tv ozovala isikhala seRhythm City uyafuneka nakuwona, asazi ke ukuthi  uzowancelisa kanjani amawele, abanye bona bakhululekile ngenxa yokuthi ayikho imidlalo abagxile kuyona bazoqopha ngokukhululeka kuZalo,” kuchaza umthombo.Omunye umthombo uveze ukuthi uNay Maps ngeke aze ahlale isikhathi eside kulo mdlalo.Omunye umthombo ngaphakathi uveze ukuthi kuleli sonto ababhali balo mdlalo basazohlangana neSABC ukumemezela lezi zindaba.“Lezi zindaba zisheshe zaputshuka kwabezindaba njengoba kungakaphothulwa okuningi ngokubuya kwalaba balingisi.
Kusamele kubikelwe iSABC ngomqondo ababhali abanawo bese uma ivuma ngokuthi lo mdlalo uzoyaphi futhi uzothakaselwa yini, bese kuqalwa ke besayiniswa izinkontileka ezintsha,” kuchaza umthombo.UNomfundo Zondi okhulumela inkampani eqopha lo mdlalo iStained Glass, uveze ukuthi ngeke liphele isonto bengasikhiphanga isitatimende esichaza ngezinguquko kulo mdlalo.“Akukho engizokukhuluma manje ngalaba balingisi kodwa engingakuthembisa ukuthi ngeke leli sonto liphele singacacisanga ngezinguquko ezizokwenzeka kulo mdlalo,“ kuchaza yena.Kulo mdlalo kulindeleke ukuthi kuphele ngendawo kaGabisile elingiswa uBaby Cele noQhabanga(Siyabonga Shibe).
Ufaniswe neqhawe umlingisi oshonile
UBEHLUSHWA yisifo sikashukela nesifo senhliziyo umlingisi wakuleli oshone ngokuzuma, uShaleen Surtie Richards (66), okuvele izindaba zokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni izolo.Le ntokazi yase-Upington, eNorthern Cape, kuvele ukuthi ishone ilele endaweni yezivakashi eseKapa.Kuvela ukuthi ubekule ndawo nje ngoba ubematasa eqopha omunye wemidlalo, i-Arendsvlei.U-Shaleen uzakhele igama kwiGenerations lapho ayelingisa khona indawo kaMattie.Waphinde wabonakala efilimini kaLeon Schuster ethi Mama Jack, nokuthe kuvela izindaba zokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni, abantu bathi bayomkhumbula ngayo kakhulu.Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelelwe abezindaba, umndeni uveze ukuthi amahlebezi okuthi uzibulele awalona iqiniso.“Umndeni wakwaSurtie uthanda ukuqinisekisa izindaba zokudlula emhlabeni ngokukhulu ukuzuma komlingisi obethandwa kakhulu kuleli, uShaleen Surtie-Richards.
Abaningi bebazi ukuthi uhlushwa yilezi zifo zombili nesisola ukuthi ukudlula kwakhe emhlabeni kusondelene nazo, sizolinda ukuhlolwa kwesidumbu ukuqinisekisa lokho.
Lokhu osekukhulunywa ngabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana asikwazi yingakho sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akazibulalanga kodwa ubengaphilile,” kuchaza isitatimende somndeni.Ubonge uxhaso oluthole kubantu bakuleli ezinhlakeni ezahlukene njengoba beveze ukuthi bezwa ubuhlungu obukhulu njengoba lokhu okwenzekile bebengakulindele.Ozakwabo endimeni yokulingisa, amaqembu ezepolitiki nabalandeli bakhe badlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini nasezihlotsheni zalo mlingisi.Ngo-2014 lo mlingisi wahlonishwa ngeLifetime Achievement Award emcimbini wamaRoyalty Soapie Awards.Eminye imidlalo abeseke walingisa kuyo kubalwa othi Egoli, Rockville neminye yesiBhunu.
UDJ Bongz neseluleko kumaciko
UMAKADEBONA kaDJ waseThekwini, uDJ Bongz, uthi siphelile isikhathi sokuthi amaciko athembele kuhulumeni noma ekuqashweni kuphela ukwenza imali kodwa kumele athathe umculo asebenze nezinkampani ezinkulu.UBongz owaduma ngengoma ethi Thina Sobabili, uthe amaciko kumele enze izingoma ezizokwazi ukuthi izinkampani zizithathe zizifake ezikhangisweni.Ukusho lokhu emuva kokukhipha ingoma entsha ethi Lotto ngoLwesihlanu.
"Kumele senze izingoma ezizokwenza kube lula ukuthi sisebenze nezinkampani ezinkulu.
Uma ubheka angu-99.9% amathuba okuthi abakwaLotto bayizwe le ngoma bese bayayithatha bayifaka ezikhangisweni zayo," kusho uDJ Bongz.Uthe ngayo akagqugquzeli abantu ukuthi bagembule budedengu kodwa yingoma enezincazelo eziningi.
"Ayikhulumi nge-lotto njengoba injalo kodwa nayo i-lotto ungayifaka ngoba yinto kahulumeni.
Ikhuluma ngokushintsha kwempilo yomuntu.
Ungathola into eshintsha impilo yakho kufane nokuthi unqobe i-lotto ngoba nayo iyayishintsha impilo yabantu.
Ngishaya izinyoni ezimbili ngetshe elilodwa, yingakho abantu besheshe bayithanda ngoba ikhuluma nabo ngqo ezimeni ezahlukene," kusho uDJ Bongz.Uthe kubalulekile ukwenza izingoma ezinomyalezo ukuze zingasheshi ukuphupha kepha zihlale isikhathi eside emqondweni wabantu.Uveze ukuthi upheka i-albhamu yakhe entsha.
"Ngiyaqala ukuthi ngikhiphe ingoma bese ngithola imiyalezo kwamanye amazwe, ethi bayayicela emisakazweni yakhona.
Izinkampani ezinkulu ngisebenza nazo isikhashana bese okunye ngiyazenzela.
I-albhamu yami edlule nje ngiyenze ne-Universal.
Uma befuna enye sizohlala phansi sikhulume, angifuni ukuzibophezela ngezinkontileka ezinde, ngimdala manje emculweni.
Ngisebenza nabo ngaleso sikhathi."

Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uNqobile uthe isifiso sakhe ukuthi wonke umuntu wesifazane abuke lo mdlalo njengoba kukhona isifundo kuwona.“Abantu bazoqala ukubona uNqobile esesimeni esingesihle njengoba kukhona ilungu lomndeni wakhe elishonile.
Leli lunga ligwiliza emanzini endaweni yokubhukuda eyakhiwe ekhaya.

Umyeni wakhe uyalwa naye njengoba emsolwa ngalesi sigameko.
Kusukela lapho akaphili impilo ejabulisayo, kodwa kukhona konke uyazama ukuthi asebenze kanzima ukuze aqhubeke nempilo,” kusho uNqobile.Uthe kukhona okuzofundwa ngabesifazane nabesilisa ababhekene nokuhlukunyezwa kwanoma iluphi uhlobo.

Engikuthanda ngalo mdlalo ukuthi ubhalwe yinkampani eholwa ngowesifazane ongulingisi u-Ayanda.
Ngiyabonga ithuba abangiphe lona nozakwabo kule nkampani yabo entsha eqale ngalo mdlalo ukukhiqiza,“ kuchaza yena.

Ihoxisiwe iFact Durban Rocks
UHOXISIWE umcimbi iFact Durban Rocks netende i-Afrotainment Marquee ngeDurban July ngenyanga ezayo njengoba ingeke ibe khona imicimbi ebanjelwa ematendeni kulo mcimbi nehanjelwa ngabantu abaningi.Ngokujwayelekile uDJ Tira ufike abe netende eGreyville Racecourse lapho kusingathwa khona iDurban July bese eba nomcimbi wasebusuku iFact Durban Rocks, ePeople's Park, eMoses Mabhida Stadium.Kulokhu, uthe abantu kuzomele balale ngenxeba ngoba ngeke kwenzeke.
I-Vodacom Durban July izoba ngoJulayi 3.
"Itende leDurban July neFact Durban Rocks ngeke libekhona.
Ngisho nesakazwa kwithelevishini iFact Durban Rocks ngeke ize ibe khona.
I-Fact Durban Rocks wumcimbi omkhulu oheha izinkumbi zabantu ngakho ibhizinisi alihambi kahle uma usakazwa kwithelevishini kuphela.
Kuvele kumsebenzisele emuva umuntu ngoba kuyabheda, abaxhasi abekho," kusho uDJ Tira.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngonyaka odlule iFact Durban Rocks yasingathwa ngaphandle kwezihlwele ezitebhisini zaseMoses Mabhida Stadium.
Yasakazwa kwiChannel O izinsuku ezimbili ngoJuly 25 no-26 lapho kwakushiyelana inkundla khona abaculi okubalwa kubo yena uTira, Black Motion, Beast, Nomcebo Zikode, Q Twins, Moonchild Sanelly, Babes Wodumo, Zakes Bantwini nabanye.Omunye umcimbi ka DJ-Tira wokuhlukanisa unyaka NgoDisemba 31 iFact Durban Rocks nayo yayisakazwa kwithelevishini kuphela.UTira uthe ngenxa yokuthi imicimbi emikhulu kunzima ukuyenza, ukhethe ukuqhamuka nomusha obizwa ngeDJ Tira's Table ozoqala ngoJulayi 2 kuze kube uJulayi 4.
Kuvela ukuthi uzosingathwa eDante, Warehouse, Wish, Azar, Liv Urbn naseYadini.
"Sithathe isinqumo sokuthi senze imicimbi ezogcwala idolobha lonke ukuze sizokwazi ukusingatha abantu abaningi abaqhamuka nakwezinye izindawo nokuthi igama leDurban July nobumnandi obuhambisana nayo bungapheli.
Sisahlela ukuthi ngoMgqibelo wosuku lomcimbi yikuphi lapho esizoya khona siswenke khona.
Sisalinde iDurban Tourism ukuthi iseseke," kusho uTira oveze ukuthi uzokhipha i-albhamu entsha ekupheleni kwenyanga.

UMCULI kamaskandi oyinxusa lenkampani yezimpahla zokugqoka iCrawl, uSanele "Igcokama Elihle" Dzanibe, uphume ngesamagundane emqashweni ngoba ebalekela ukondla inqwaba yabantwana bakhe.Ngokusho komthombo osondelene nalo mculi odume kakhulu ngokulingisa kuma-video abaculi abadumile, onina bezingane zakhe bese kubame emphinjeni ukumbona eswenka econsa ekubeni abantwana bakhe begqoka amanikiniki futhi belala bengadlile.
"Ubalekile lapho abeqashe khona e-Orlando East wayobhaca komunye umqasho ongaziwa ukuthi ukuphi."
Onina bezingane babuye baqonda ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bashiya abangalazi ngoSanele (27) odabuka eMzimkhulu.Omunye umthombo uthe uSanele uphila impilo engamanga yodwa njengoba evela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nezimpahla ezibizayo ekubeni engasebenzi .
Uthe uSanele wathatha imali yakubo, washiya umndeni nonina beswele, wazogwazela amantombazane eGoli.
"Uqonywe lonke izwe.
Unezingane ngisho nakwezinye izinhlanga.
Okubuhlungu ekhaya kulanjiwe.
"USanele uqale ukuchoma ngezimpahla zakanokusho engakabi yinxusa lakwaCrawl.
Omunye unina wengane uthe uSanele wayemphethe kahle kabi engakakhulelwa.
"Wayengithengela amawashi nemigexo ebizayo.
Abuye angenzele indumezulu yomcimbi ngosuku lokuzalwa kwami.
Isichitho kube ukuthola umntwana ngoba sobabili akasasinaki.
Useqhubeke nempilo."
Omunye uthe uSanele unoxhaxha lwezintombi azikhulelisayo maqede azilaxaze kanjalo.
"Mhlawumbe izingane asenazo ziyofinyelela ku-20.
Ukhulelisa ngisho namaNdiya imbala."
Kuthiwa ngisho namantombazane ayizihlobo zakhe akawayeki.
Enye intombazane ithe yona yamqoma yazi ukuthi abahlobene.
Ithe yashaqeka isithi ihambisa ingane kubo kaSanele yathola ukuthi unina kaSanele owakwaDlamini, koninalume wentombazane.
"Unina kaSanele uhamba nge-wheelchair futhi imali ayithola ngokulimala engozini yemoto iyona le ayidla namantombazane.
"Ethintwa uSanele uphike walala ngomhlane ukuthi kunezingane angazondli.
"Abantu abafuna ukungicekela phansi ngoba ngidumile.
Yitulo leli lokungicekela phansi.
Mina angizisheli izintombi kodwa yizo eziziphonsa kimi.
Zingifuna ngapha nangapha kulezi zinsuku.
Yila mantombazane engingawafuni lawa angenza nje."
Uthe izingane zakhe zine azaziyo naqinisekisa ukuthi uyazondla zonke.
Uphike walala ngomhlane ukuthi unina uhamba nge-wheelchair nokuthi uyise akasekho.
Ube esenxusa intatheli ukuba ilubhale udaba uma luzoyisiza nje.
Abanye bachaze uSanele njengomuntu onamanga nongumxabanisi wabaculi.
UKhuzani “uhlukanise” izitabani ebesezizoshada
UMASKANDI wesifazane ovelele kulezi zinsuku ngenxa yokucula noKhuzani neZingane Zoma, uSphesihle “Sphe” Zulu, ukhala ngowesifazane abezoshada naye.
Lo msakandi uthi lo wesifazane umsabisa ngokuveza izithombe namavideo abo beya ocansini uma engayeki ukukhuluma ngaye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Lezi zithandani obekulindeleke ukuthi zishaye indumezulu yomshado, azisabhekani.
Kuvela ukuthi ukuhlukana kwazo kudalwe wuKhuzani obewotha ubomvu ngothando lwazo, elubiza ngedimoni.USthembile “Ntando” Mkhize (obeyisithandwa sikaSphe), usolwa nangokuqola abantu esebenzisa igama likaSphe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ethi uzobafunela umsebenzi.
USphe usezakhele udumo emculweni kamaskandi njengoba epikwe uKhuzani engomeni ethi Ngashelwa Utsotsi nakwethi Ubhuti Wabantu.
Uphinde wapikwa nayiZingane Zoma engomeni yazo ethi Iphenti Lami.Lezi zithandani zithembisene umshado nyakenye kanti bezikipitile iminyaka emibili eMlaza.Kumanje kunecala elivulwe wuSphe emaphoyiseni mayelana nalokhu kuqolwa kwabantu.
Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Thembeka Mbele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunecala lenkohlakalo eliphenywa ngamaphoyisa aseMpangeni.
Kanti uNtando usabisa ukuputshuzela umphakathi izithombe nama-video abo bezitika ngocansi.
Uthe ufuna abantu bazi ukuthi uSphe akasiyo le ntombazane abacabanga ukuthi uyiyo.
“Nami ngazi inqwaba yamahlazo akhe.
Njengoba abehamba ezibiza ngentombi ehlolwayo, ubanjiwe ngoDisemba ukuthi ubekhohlisa abantu,”kusho uSphe.
UNtando uthe umuntu obenesandla esikhulu ekuhlukaneni kwakhe noSphe nguKhuzani ngoba ubengabemukeli ubudlelwano babo.
“UKhuzani uzame kaningi ukuphoqa uSphe ukuba ahlukane nami.
USphe ubengikhombisa imiyalezo ebivela kuKhuzani, ethi sinamadimoni, " kusho uNtandoEqhuba uNtando uthe wenzele uSphe izinto eziningi ngoba uyintombazane ethanda impilo engaphezu kwamandla ayo.
“Nasekhaya eHammarsdale bayamazi  uSphe kanti nabakubo bayangazi ngoba ngike ngaya khona KwesakwaMthethwa, eMpangeni, ” kusho uNtando.
Elinye ilungu lomndeni kaSphe, elicele ukungadalulwa, livumile ukuthi liyazi ngalobu budlelwano nangesithembiso somshado.
UKhuzani ungumphathi kaSphe futhi bobabili bazalwa oMaNgema.UKhuzani ubengazibambi izingcingo nemiyalezo kuWhatsApp ubeyifunda  kodwa engayiphenduli.
Uyabuya emsakazweni            uLoot Love
INTOKAZI yakuleli ezakhele igama yethula izinhlelo okubalwa kuzo iLive Amp kuthelevishini uLuthando “Loot Love” Shosha, izoqala ukuzwakala ngeSonto emsakazweni, i-Africa Now Radio.Lo msakazo awugcini ngokuzwakala kuleli kuphela, uyafinyelela e-Afrika yonkana, Paris, London naseNew York City.
Le ntokazi ibe ngenye yezinye ezingabuyelanga kwiMetro FM ngesikhathi kwenziwa izinguquko emisakazweni ehlukene kwiSABC.Kulesi siteshi esisanda kubungaza unyaka saqala, kudlalwa kakhulu umculo osuke uhambe phambili emhlabeni.
Ekhuluma ngokuba yingxenye yalo msakazo uLoot Love, uveze ukuthi ujabule kakhulu.
"Umculo ngezinye zezinto engizikhonze kakhulu ngakho ukuqhubeka ngilokhu ngisebenza kulo mkhakha kuyangijabulisa.
Leli yithuba lokuqhubeka nokuqhakambisa i-Afrika yonkana kwamanye amazwe kodwa-ke kakhulu mina ngizogqamisa izwe engiphuma kulona, iNingizimu Afrika kanjalo namaciko ahlukene engizobe ngisebenza nawo engivakashela ohlelweni lwami.
“Okunye okungijabulisayo ngokuba yingxenye yalo msakazo ukuthi ngizofunda nangolunye uhlobo lomculo oluqhamuka emazweni ahlukene esizobe siludlala kulesi siteshi,“ kusho uLoot Love.Ohlelweni lwakhe lokuqala uLootLove uveze ukuthi uzobe ehlezi nomculi u-Angélique Kidjo, ozobe ekhuluma nge-albhamu yakhe ethi Mother Nature  nezophuma ngoJuni 18.
Uthe okunye okuzokwenzeka kulona uzodlala izingoma ezinhlanu zabaculi base-Afrika nacabanga ukuthi yizona ezihamba phambili manje.
Ngifunde lukhulu ngamasiko aseMzansi: Harvey
UMETHULI wezinhlelo waphesheya kwezilwandle uSteve Harvey, uveze ukuthi kuyamjabulisa ukubuya kwesizini yesibili yohlelo iFamily Feud, njengoba kukuningi akufunde ngamasiko akuleli kwisizini yokuqala.Lokhu ukudalule ngemuva kobuya kohlelo njengoba luqale ngeSonto ku-e.tv (DStv194) ngo-6.00 ntambama.
Kulolu hlelo kuba nemindeni emibili eqhudelanayo ngokuphendula imibuzo ehlukene, iphinde idlale bese kuthi ekugcineni kuwine owodwa.USteve Harvey uthe uphatheke kahle ekuleli ngesikhathi eqopha uhlelo futhi ujabule ngokuthi kubuye isizini yesibili.“Ngesikhathi ngethula uhlelo okokuqala kuningi engakufunda ngezwe laseNingizimu Afrika, abantu bakhona, amasiko ahlukene nezilimi zakhona.
Kodwa okwathatha amehlo kakhulu ukudla kwakhona okuhlukahlukene okuthinta amasiko ahlukene akhona.
Ngikubheke ngabomvu namanje ukubuya ngizoqhubeka nokufunda okuhlukene nabantu abaziwa ngeRainbow Nation.
Ngibe nohambo olumnandi kakhulu futhi engiyohlala ngilukhumbula njalo emkhakheni wami wokwethula izinhlelo,” kuchaza uSteve.
Ubonge abaxhasi bohlelo, waveza ukuthi ithimba lase-USA enquma ukuletha uhlelo kuleli lenza umsebenzi omuhle.“Sibonga nemindeni ephinde yaba yingxenye yalo yaqopha nathi kule sizini.
Ukuba umuntu wakwelinye izwe ngihlala ngibeka izinto ngendlela ezingeyona kodwa kube khona abangisizayo okuyinto ejabulisayo.
Abasuke beqhudelana ohlelweni babe othisha kimina njengoba bebengiqondisa emagameni akade ngiwabiza, ngakho namanje ngifuna ukuqhubeka nokufunda,” kuchaza yena.Lolu hlelo oluqoshwe yinkampani iRapid Blue TV, luzokhombisa iziqephu ezingu-26 kanti luzophela ngo-Okthoba 31.
Isikhalo kunyamalala uZandile kwiThe Queen
ABABUKELI bomdlalo iThe Queen sebeveze ukuthi besingekho isidingo sokuvala isikhala sikaVuyiswa (Zandile Msutwana), kulo mdlalo.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi ngoMsombuluko uThembisa Mdoda olingisa indawo kaVuyiswa kulo mdlalo eqale ukubonakala kuwona.UThembisa ulingisa le ndawo ngemuva kokulimala kukaZandile eqopha okumanje ululamela ekhaya.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ababukeli balo mdlalo baveze imizwa ehlukene ngokubonakala kukaThembisa.Abanye bathe ngabe kube ngcono ukuthi indawo yakhe imisiwe aze alulame.Abanye bebedidekile njengoba bebezibuza ukuthi kwenzekeni kuVuyiswa abamaziyo kulo mdlalo.

Ngiyamthanda impela kodwa hhayi ukuthi alingise le ndawo”.UMthimkhulu Rhadebe uthe: “Angimuzwa kahle lo Vuyiswa omusha”.UMs Sharo_shaz uthe: “Uyohlala eyedwa uVuyiswa kimina.
Sengikhumbule indlela amamatheka ngayo nje”.U-Awethu Mangali uthe:“Angijabule ngalo Vuyiswa siyacela nisibuyisele uSis Vee wethu”.UTopollo Tayx uthe: “Ngabe kungcono ukuthi  bavale isikhala sikaVuyiswa ngomuntu ofana naye nse”.UMzansi Magic ngenyanga edlule wakhipha isitatimende umemezela  izindaba zokuza kukaThembisa kulo mdlalo.Esitatimendeni bakubeka kwacaca ukuthi uZandile kudingeke ame ukuqopha njengoba elimale khona ngaphakathi kulo mdlalo, kodwa indawo yakhe izoqhubeka nokuba khona kulo mdlalo njengoba izovalwa uThembisa.Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi uThembisa usazobonakala kulo mdlalo isikhashana njengoba uZandile eyoze abonakale uma sekuqala isizini entsha.
Ukugula kuphazamise uMkhwane koweshashalazi
UKUGULA kwenkakha yomlingisi, uBheki Mkhwane, kuyihuthisele ngethuba lokulingisa emdlalweni weshashalazi iBopha, ebengomunye wabalingisi abaphambili kuwona.
Ukugula kukaMkhwane kuphoqelele ukuthi ahoxiswe kulo mdlalo oqale kuleli sonto.
Okhulumela umdlalo eState Theatre, uThakgatso Setseta, uthe badumele ngokugula kukaMkhwane, okuphoqe nokuthi akhishwe kuwona.“UMkhwane ugule umdlalo usuzokhonjiswa, okuyinto esiphathe kabi.
Indawo yakhe kuze kwaphoqa ukuthi ithathwe nguPercy Mtwa ongumbhali futhi ongumqondisi walo mdlalo,” kusho uThakgatso.Uthe noma bengazi ukuthi uMkhwane uphethwe yini kodwa banethemba lokuthi uzolulama.“Esikuzwile wukuthi akalaliswanga esibhedlela kodwa ugulela ekhaya.
Udokotela umlalise amasonto amane engasebenzi, ukuze alulame kahle ngaphambi kokuba aqale ukusebenza.
Simfisela ukuthi asheshe alulame,” kuqhuba yena.UMkhwane ubezobe eqala ukulingisa kulo mdlalo osuneminyaka ukhona, osuphekwe kabusha.UMtwa naye uthe udumele ngokuhlabeka kwenkakha yomlingisi egcine ingasakwazanga ukulingisa kwiBopha.Uthe wafaka uMkhwane kulo mdlalo ngenxa yamagalelo akhe futhi ubenesiqiniseko sokuthi uzokwenza ubulungiswa ngokudlala kahle indawo kaNjandini abezoyilingisa.
Uthe uMkhwane uyamhlonipha futhi udumele ngokungabi naye kule sizini yeBopha, wabe esemfisela ukusheshe alulame.IBopha izogcina ukukhonjiswa eState Theatre ngoJune 13.UMtwa akamusha naye ekulingiseni njengoba ayelingisa kuyona iBopha,  yaze yajikeleza amazwe phesheya kwezilwandle.
Ubuyele ekulingiseni emidlalweni yeshashalazi, begubha iminyaka engu-40 yeWoza Albert ngo-2019 eState Theatre, lapho abelingisa khona noMbongeni Ngema.
KwiBopha njengamanje ulingisa noTshallo Chokwe noTerrence Ngwila.
Indawo kaMtwa yokuqondisa lo mdlalo ithathwe nguMillicent Tintswalo obevele engumsizi wakhe ekuwuqondiseni.
Ubuyisa ithemba ngengoma uMtee
UMCULI wakuleli obese kunesikhathi engakhiphi ngoma uMtee, useveze ukuthi ingoma yakhe entsha ethi iThemba, akangabazi ukuthi lukhona ushintsho ezolwenza entsheni yakuleli.Le ngoma ayikhiphe ngeledlule, uthi ukuphuma kwayo kuzolandelwa i-albhamu yakhe ethi Logan, ezophuma ngoMashi.Lo mculi oke waba sezinkingeni nesitebele adume engaphansi kwaso i-Ambitious Entertainment, uveze ukuthi yena uyisibonelo sokuthi uma unethemba konke kungaphinde kulunge.
“Noma ubani obona isimo sakhe singahambi kahle akabukele kumina njengoba ithemba ngingalilahlanga izinto zibheda.
Kuyimanje sibhekene nobhubhane lwegciwane iCovd-19, nalapho asibe nethemba lokuthi ngelinye ilanga kuzolunga.
Intsha ilahlekelwa imisebenzi, imindeni ilahlekelwa imizi ehlala kuyona nabathandiweyo bethu, isimo senhlupheko kunokuthi sibe ngcono siba sibi kakhulu, siyesaba ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo, kodwa ngithi ithemba singalilahli,” kusho uMtee.
Uthe abantu kuningi abazokujabulela kwi-albhamu yakhe ezayo ayiqambe ngendodana yakhe encane uLogan.“Kuyangijabulisa kakhulu ukuba ubaba, ngakho namadodana ami ngifuna akhule ebukela kumina ukuthi ukuba nobaba empilweni kuyinto ejabulisa kanjani.
Ngizama ngayo yonke indlela ukuthi amadodana ami ngiwafake kusemanje kulo mkhakha engikuwona.
Okunye engifuna ukukwenza njengoba ngiwakhombisa umsebenzi wami ukuthi akhule ezibonela ukuthi ngisebenza kanjani futhi iziphi izingqinamba engike ngabhekana nazo emculweni, angezwa ngabantu,” kuchaza uMtee.
Uthe indodana yakhe uLogan ifike emhlabeni la izinto zingamhambeli kahle khona, kodwa ubazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu akamlahlile.
Amaciko asengafaka izicelo zoxhaso
UMFELANDAWONYE wezinyunyana zamaciko iCultural and Creative Industries Federation of South Africa (Ccifsa) uthi amaciko kumele abumbane asize abahlwempu ukuze bathole uxhaso kuhulumeni.Iphini likanobhala jikelele weCcifsa kuzwelonke, u-Anele Maki, likusho lokhu emuva kokuthi uMnyango wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke umeme amaciko ashayeke ngenxa yeCovid-19 ukuba afake izicelo zoxhaso.U-Anele uthe banethemba lokubona kuhlomula amaciko angenawo amathuba kakhulu.
"Sithanda ukunxusa wonke amaciko ukuthi asebenzise leli thuba esilinikezwe uhulumeni ngoNgqongqoshe wethu wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko, uMhlonishwa uNathi Mthethwa.
Sithanda ukugqugquzela imboni ukuthi ibumbane futhi isize labo abangenawo amathuba ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bayahlomula," kusho u-Anele.Uthe amafomu azotholakala kuzona zonke izikhungo zobuciko kuzwelonke.Ngokomnyango kaMthethwa, bacishe bafinyelele ku5 000 abahlomula ngoxhaso lwesigaba sokuqala ngemali engaphezu kukaR80 million.Esigabeni sesibili kwakhokhwa imali engaphezu kukaR2 million.Ngokubambisana noMnyango wokuThuthukiswa kwamaBhizinisi amaNcane, kukhokhwe imali engaphezu kukaR5 million futhi kusazokhokhwa elinganiselwa kuR13 million ngaphambi kukaMashi.Imithetho nendlela yokungenela itholakala kwi-website yomnyango ethi, www.dac.gov.za futhi kuthiwa abaphumelele bangase bathole imali engekho ngaphansi kukaR10 000.Ukungenela kuvulwe ngoLwesihlanu kanti kuzovalwa ngoFebhuwari 22.
Kuzoshuba          kwiLove Island SA
BAZOBONAKALA ekupheleni kwale nyanga sekuqala uhlelo, abazoba yingxenye yabazozama inhlanhla yokufuna uthando ohlelweni iLove Island South Africa.Lolu hlelo oluzokwethulwa uLeandie du Randt, luzoqala kuM-Net (101) kusuka ngoFebhuwari 28, ngo-8 ebusuku.Le ntokazi yaphuma isibili ohlelweni iStrictly Come Dancing ngo-2014 nophathina wayo uBrandom Eilers le Riche.Ikhuluma ngokuba umethuli walolu hlelo le ntokazi, ithe kuyona kuyinto enkulu nesibusiso emkhakheni wezobumnandi selokhu yangena.“Bengihlala ngifisa ngithi empilweni yami ngelinye ilanga ngiyafuna ukuba umethuli wezinhlelo ezinkulu, nakho ke manje sekunjalo futhi ukuba umethuli walolu hlelo kumina kufike ngesikhathi esilungile impela.
Sengikubheke ngabomvu ukuhlangana nabo bonke abazohlala endlini la bezofuna khona omaqondana,” kusho uLeandie du Randt.Le ntokazi ayigcini nje ngokubonakala ezinhlelweni ezihlukene kodwa iphinde ibe umlingisi emidlalweni eyehlukene yesiBhunu ekhonjiswa esiteshini sakwa-kykNet.
Lolu hlelo kuzogqama kulona abantu abafuna omaqondana emkhakheni wezothando.
Bonke bazohlangana endlini abalungiselelwe yona eKapa, la bezohlala bazane kangcono, okuyothi ababa nenhlansi yothando bachithe isikhathi esiningi ndawonye babone ukuthi kukhona yini uthando abanalo olungaholela ekutheni babe sebudlelwaneni.
Esitatimendeni esikhishwe abakwaM-Net, baveze ukuthi esontweni ngalinye kuzolokhu kufika abantu abasha, okuzoholela ekutheni kube khona abaphukelwa izinhliziyo, baliwe uma ophathina babo sebebone abanye abasha.
"Ukufika komuntu omusha kuzodala izinxushunxushu endlini futhi kwesinye isikhathi kuholele ekutheni kube khona abaphelelwa uthando akade sebenalo nabanye, kuze kuphele nobungani okade bukhona.
Abasendlini bazophinde bathole nethuba lokuvotela oyedwa ababona ukuthi akanasidingo sokuhlala endlini, bese eyashiya ohlelweni,“ kuchaza isitatimende.
Siveze ukuthi ekugcineni izithandani eziyobambana kuze kuphele uhlelo, ziyobe sezithola umklomelo wemali nezinye izipho.
UVusi Kunene uzolingisa emdlalweni we-e.tv
ABALANDELI bomlingisi uVusi Kunene obegcina ukubonakala kwiGenerations: The Legacy ngoLwesithathu, bazokhala babuye nganeno njengoba eqopha nomdlalo omusha waku-e.tv.UVusi, obedlala indawo kaJack Mabaso kwiGenerations: The Legacy ekhonjiswa ngo-8 ebusuku phakathi nesonto kuSABC 1, ubegcina ukubonakala kulo mdlalo emuva "kokubulawa".UJack kuthe ehleli endlini nomfowabo uSiyanda (Kay Sibiya) nendodakazi uSphe (Pearl Monama), kwangena amadoda aseRussia abakhomba ngezibhamu, ababopha abavala amehlo nomlomo.
Aphumele noJack ngaphandle okuyilapho afike "ambulalela" khona ngokumqoba ngesaha maqede "isidumbu" sakhe asifaka emphongolweni.
"Isidumbu" sigcine singabonakalanga futhi namaphoyisa athe awasitholanga.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba uVusi uzolingisa indawo ephambili emdlalweni omusha ozovala isikhala seRhythm City, okuthiwa yiHouse of Zwide okuthiwa usuqalile ukuqoshwa.Ethintwa izolo ekuseni akavumanga futhi akaphingaka ukuthi uya kulo mdlalo.

"Ngizokhumbula wonke umuntu ngoba iGenerations ifana nomndeni.
"KwiHouse of Zwide kuthiwa uzobe edlala phambili noJeffrey Sekele obedlala indawo kaBlade kwiSibaya kuMzansi Magic.
Imizamo yokuthola uJeffrey ukuze aphawule izolo ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe belungabanjwa futhi nomyalezo ugcine engawuphendulanga.IHouse of Zwide ikhiqizwa yiBomb Production.
Umdidiyeli weBomb u-Angus Gibson ucingo lwakhe ubengalubambi.IRhythm City izogcina ukubonakala ngoJulayi 16.Phambilini inhloko yemidlalo evutshelwe eNingizimu Afrika yakwa-e.tv uHelga Palmer, yathi okwamanje ngo-7 basagxile kwiRhythm City kuze kufike isikhathi sokuphela kwayo.
"Siyabajabulela ababukeli ukuthi bazi ukuthi yini elandelayo kodwa isimemezelo esisemthethweni ngokuthi yini ezongena esikhaleni seRhythm City, sizosenza ngokuhamba kwesikhathi."
UMoonchild nohlelo ngempilo yakhe
ABANTU bakuleli bazomazi kangcono umculi uMoonchild, njengoba sekuvele izindaba zokuthi uzoba nohlelo oluthi yena kuMTV Africa (Channel 130), kusukela ngoMsombuluko, ngo-9.30 ebusuku.Uhlelo lukaMoonchild oluthi Moonchild Sanelly WOZA, luzovezela abantu bakuleli okuningi abebengakwazi ngale ntokazi eziqeshini eziyishumi ezizobonakala.“Uma kukhulunywa ngokuthi ngeke ngifihle lutho abantu ababukele lolu hlelo.

Uzofihlwa ngempelasonto uMenzi
UZOFIHLWA kubo eMnambithi ngoMgqibelo umlingisi wakuleli uMenzi Ngubane(56), odlule emhlabeni ngoMgqibelo ngemuva kokushaywa isifo sohlangothi.UMenzi ushonele khona eMnambithi ngemuva kokugula isikhathi eside ehlushwa isifo sikashukela nezinso.Okhulumela umndeni wakwaNgubane uNaomi Mokhele, uveze ukuthi zonke izinhlelo zokufihla lo mlingisi seziphothuliwe.“Konke kuzokwenzelwa ekhaya kubo eMnambithi, imigomo yeCovid-19 siyokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi iyalandelwa yize uMenzi bekungumuntu wabantu, okunye okuthinta ukufihlwa kwakhe kuzophela usuku lwakusasa (namhlanje) sekuphelile bese sikubikela abezindaba.
Umndeni nje engingakugcizelela ukuthi uyabonga kakhulu ngemiyalezo olokhu uyitholile selokhu kudlule uMenzi emhlabeni,“ kuchaza uNaomi.Ukudlula kukaMenzi kuthinte abantu abaningi kuleli kusukela kubalandeli bakhe, osaziwayo emculweni kwezokulingisa ngisho nosopolitiki.UMenzi ubonakale emidlalweni eminingi okukhona kuyo othi Kwakhala Nyonini, Ubambo Lwami, Generations, Isibaya neminye.Udlule emhlabeni esanda kuphunyukwa iqatha emlonyeni lokuyolingisa emdlalweni iThe Queen, la engabange esaqala khona ukuqopha njengoba avinjwa yikho ukugula.Abashadile bakwaFerguson uShona noConnie, badlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini wakhe  bemchaza njengeciko ebelizimisela emsebenzini futhi konke likwenza ngokuzikhandla.Bathe bebekubheke ngabomvu ukuthi uMenzi alulame kahle bese bephinde besebenza naye.Nozakwabo emdlalweni Isibaya badlulisele amazwi enduduzo bathi bekuyinjabulo yodwa ukusebenza naye.Izolo kuphinde kwavela izindaba ezibuhlungu zokushona kukayise kaMenzi Ngubane obeneminyaka engu-90.
Khonamanjalo akucaci ukuthi uzofihlwa nini umlingisi womdlalo iTsha Tsha, uNoxee Maqashalala (44).UNoxee  utholakale eshonile efulethini lakhe eHoneydew, eGoli ngoMgqibelo.Amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi bese kunesikhathi lo mlingisi eshonile yize isidumbu sakhe sitholakale ngempelasonto.Aphinde aveza ukuthi akukho akusolayo ngokushona kwakhe.
'Akube nendlela ehlukile yokukhumbula Isilo'
UMHUBI wamahubo akhuluma ngezigameko ezehlukene kuleli, uMbuso Khoza, useveze ukuthi lesi yisikhathi esifanele sokuthi osonkondlo nabaculi babhale izingoma nezinkondlo ngempilo yeSilo samaBandla Onke, uGoodwill Zwelithini.Ekhuluma neSolezwe,  uMbuso, uthe amahubo ayehutshwa ngalesi sikhathi KwaZulu kukhona kuwo awempi nawokubalisa uma kukhona okulahlekile ekhaya.“Kukhona ihubo elithi Uzithulele, elalihutshwa okaNdaba eqoqa izinkomo ngesikhathi kuboshwe Isilo sasoNdini.
Nawempi, yiwona aculwayo ngalesi sikhathi, kukhona elithi Sidedele Singene KwaNongoma, okuyihubo okumele lihutshwe kulesi sikhathi esibhekene naso siwuZulu sokukhothama kweSilo,” kuchaza uMbuso.Uthe abaculi lesi isikhathi esingaba lula ukuthi baqambe ekuhambeni kwesikhathi okungakhunjulwa ngakho iMbumbe ekwenze esikhathini samanje ebesiphila kusona.“Okunye engingakujabulela ukubona ukuthi kube nento eyenziwayo  ukuhlonipha Isilo njengoba sabona kudlule emhlabeni uNkk Winnie Madikizela Mandela, abesifazane babefake amaduku, yize iduku kuyinto yabezizwe kodwa kwaba kuhle ukukubona kuyindlela yokuhlonipha owesifazane wakuleli,” kuchaza uMbuso.
Sikhothame sinezinhlelo ze-albhamu yomculo iSilo
SIKHOTHAME  simatasa namalungiselelo okuqopha umculo waso iSilo samaBanda.
Lokhu kudalulwe nguZakhele Shiba oyimeneja yeGogo Records esiseMpangeni, ebesizoqopha ngaphansi kwaso iSilo.UZakhele uthe bahlangane ngoDisemba nyakenye noMdlokombane lapho befike khona esivumelwaneni sokuqopha umculo waso.“ Besingakaqali ukuwuqopha umculo waso kodwa bese kunezingoma ebese siziqophile iSilo ebesidinga ukuthi siziqophe kabusha ngendlela esezingeni.
Ngesikhathi sixoxisana noMdlokombane usitshele ukuthi ukuqopha umculo bekuvele kuyiphupho lakhe kusuka kudala.
Ezingomeni asizwise zona ezinye uthe waziqopha eseNgilandi.
Kuzona kukhona ezokholo namahubo,” kusho uZakhele.Uthe uNgangezwelakhe ubavezele ukuthi unothando lomculo kamaskandi futhi unesifiso sokuthi kunandise abaculi bakamaskandi emcimbini wakhe wokugubha iminyaka engu-50, aba sesihlalweni sobuNgonyama obuzoba kulo nyaka.UZakhele uthe bebesiqinisekisile iSilo ukuthi isifiso saso sizofezeka futhi nomaskandi sizobathola ngosuku lomcimbi.Omunye wamaciko oveze ukuthi ubesebenzisana neSilo samaBandla emculweni, uSandy B. Uthe baqale ukukhuluma neSilo ngoFebhuwari nyakenye.“ ISilo besidlala kakhulu ipiano futhi umculo waso besiwenze ngayo.
Zikhona nezinye izingoma ezingamahubo abeziqophile.
Ubethi uma kukhona ingoma aseyenzile angithumelele yona angizwise.
Ubekubeka kucace ukuthi uma engenzi kahle ngimtshele ngoba akafuni ukuqopha umculo ozomqeda isithunzi.
Ubengakapholisheki kahle emculweni nami bengingakugqugquzeli ukuthi asheshe awukhiphe ngoba ngisabela isithunzi sakhe uma ekhipha umculo ongejabulisa abantu,” kusho uSandy B.
USkolopad ukujabulele ukugomela iCovid-19
UNONTANDAKUBUKWA ophinde abe ngumhlengikazi ukujabulele ukuthola umgomo weCovid-19.
UNonhlanhla Skolopad Qwabe waseQwaqwa namhlanje uveza ukuthi usengomunye wabahlengikazi bakuleli esebegomele iCovid-19.Lokhu ukuveze ezinkundleni zokuxhuma kumbhalo obuhambisana nesinye sezithombe ekhombisa bemjova ngalo mgomo.
"Ngiwutholile mina umgomo namhlanje, lindela owakho nawe maduze," kusho uSkolopad.USkolopad yize edume ngokuba owesifazane okhonze ukugqoka izimpahla eziveza umzimba nezingxenye ezingavamisile ukuvezwa abesifazane uma begqokile kodwa uyazifela ngomsebenzi wobuhlengikazi.
Egcina ukukhuluma naleli phephandaba waveza ukuthi umatasa nezinhlelo zokuqhuba izifundo zakhe kodwa usazama indlela yokukwenza lokhu ngaphandle kokuthi kushayisane nesikhathi somsebenzi.Ngaphandle komgomo kubukeka sengathi lentokazi seyiphinde yaba senhlanhleni yokuthola uthando olusha.
Phambilini wayeveze ukuthi akasaziboni ebuyela emjolweni kulandela ukushiywa injinga eyayisimethembise ngisho umshado.
Emuva kokuba sengozini yemoto uSkolopad waveza ukuthi le njinga yavele yadla phansi ngaphandle kwelibi phakathi kwabo bobabili.
Muva nje usebonakala enameke izithombe enkonkoshele isidlakela sendoda efake nendandatho ebukeka njengesithembiso somshado.
Umsindo indodakazi ka-AKA ibhonga emswaneni ngokukhothama kweSilo
AKAYIBONI into esisuse umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana umrepha wakukeli u-AKA kulandela imibuzo ngombhalo wendodakazi yakhe uKairo ngokukhothama kweSilo samaBandla.
U-AKA uphendule ekhasini lakhe kuTwitter eveza ukuthi akayiboni into emangaza abantu abaningi ngokubhonga emswaneni kwendodakazi yakhe eneminyaka emihlanu.
Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kuqubuke umsindo ngenkathi kusabalala umyalezo kaKairo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana obubhalwe ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram .Lo myalezo kaKairo ubuzwakalisa ukudabuka ngokukhothama kweSilo evalelisa. "
Isizwe silahlekelwe yiNkosi, hamba kahle Silo samaBandla Goodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu," kubhalwa ekhasini lika-Instagram laKairo.
Abantu baqale lapho ukushaya amakhala ngalo mbhalo ogcine ususabalala nakuTwitter.
Babodwa abakhononda ngokuthi uKairo akasazi iSilo futhi akufanele engabe ufakwa ngekhanda ezintweni ezithinta abantu abadala nezindaba ezingakamdingi ngokweminyaka yakhe.
Abanye baveze ukuthi basola ukuthi omunye wabazali bakhe ombhalele nokuyinto ebingenasidingo.Ephendula ekhasini lakhe likaTwitter u-AKA uzwakalise okukhulu ukudumala ngendlela abantu abaphawula ngayo benze sengathi kunephutha okwenziwe yindodakazi yakhe.
"Yini emangazayo?
Ukuthi ingane eneminyaka emihlanu ilandela imvelapho yayo?," kubuza u-AKA.
