Bafuna uThabooty avale isikhala sikaDJ Fresh
OWAYENGUMSAKAZI nophinde abe ngumlingisi uThando "Thabooty" Thabethe, uthi akafuni ukuyikhulumela eziko eyezinhlelo anazo ngokusakaza.Sekuyophela cishe unyaka agcina ukusakaza emuva kokushiya kwi-5FM ngoMashi nyakenye.
Muva nje, usanda kufaka isithombe sakhe esakaza kwi-5FM ezinkundleni zokuxhumana wabhala ukuthi uyawukhumbula umsakazo.
"Angikwazi ukwenza izithembiso ngomsebenzi wami emaphephandabeni, angifuni ukuphawula kakhulu," kusho uThando ekhuluma neSolezwe.Emuva kwezindaba zokuthi ligqabukile igoda phakathi kukaDJ Fresh no-Euphonik nesiteshi abebesisakazela i-947, kukhona abaphakamise ukuthi uThando angene kwesinye sezikhala.Baqale bamiswa oDJ, emuva kokuvela kwezinsolo zokuhlukumeza ngokocansi okugcine bememezela ukuthi umshushisi unqume ukungaluqhubi udaba lwabo ngenxa yokwentuleka kobufakazi.Bafuna ukuthi uThando avale isikhala sikaDJ Fresh, obenza uhlelo lwantambama phakathi nesonto ngo-3 kuya ku-7 ntambama noMantsoe Pout.
Kuthiwa yena noMantsoe bangabangani abakhulu.Umsakazi woKhozi FM uSelbeyonce Mkhize, ungomunye wabathi uThando kumele avale isikhala sikaDJ Fresh.
"Ngingakuthanda ukuthi abangani abakhulu bashayele uhlelo lwantambama ndawonye.
Yinikeni uThabooty," kusho uSelby kuTwitter.Omunye uYaya Mavundla, okhulumela osaziwayo abahlukene weseka lo mbono.Ngesikhathi eshiya kwi-5FM lapho ayenza khona uhlelo lwantambama phakathi nesonto, lo msakazi waveza ukuthi useyogxila kwezinye izinto.
Uqale i-podcast kwiYoutube futhi ungenisile nasekulingiseni.
Uzofihlwa ngoMgqibelo uSphuzo Sabantwana
UZOFIHLWA ngoMgqibelo KwaDweshula, ePort Shepstone, umculi kamaskandi, uGawulezakhe Mbili, obedume ngelikaSphuzo Sabantwana.Imenenja yakhe uSakhile Cele ikhuluma neSolezwe, iveze ukuthi umndeni usuhlangane waphuma nokuthi lo mculi afihlwe ngayo le mpelasonto.Lo mculi udlule emhlabeni ngoLwesithathu ngemuva kokushaywa isifo sohlangothi ekuseni ngoLwesibili, kwamenela ntambama.USakhile uthe ngosuku lomngcwabo bazolandela yonke imigomo ethinta igciwane iCovid-19, uma sekufihlwa uSphuzo.“Umndeni ududuzeke kakhulu imiyalezo ebilokhu uyithola ngemuva kokwehla kwaleli lifu elimnyama.
Kusizume kakhulu ukudlula emhlabeni kukaSphuzo njengoba ebengaguli, uvuke nje ekuseni washaywa isifo sohlangothi ntambama kwase kumenela njalo,“ kusho uSakhile.USphuzo uzakhele igama ezinkundleni zokuxhumana la bebemqopha khona ama-video ecula, agcine eseqoshwa waze wakhipha izingoma okukhona kuzo ethi, Guava Juice.Osaziwayo, okukhona kubo uSjava, badlulise amazwi enduduzo kuvela izindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kukaSphuzo.Ngisho uSomlomo wesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, uMnyango wezamaCiko namaSiko KwaZulu Natal, nawo udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini kaSphuzo.USphuzo udlula nje emhlabeni, ubesanda kuvulelwa umuzi awakhelwa osopolitiki nosomabhizinisi abahlukene.
Sibucayi isimo sikaZola 7
OYISIHLABANI somculo wekwaito, uBonginkosi "Zola 7" Dlamini, usehlala elele embhedeni ngenxa yesifo sokuwa.
UZola, wodumo lwengoma ethi Umdlwembe nethi Ghetto Fabulous, udalule usizi lwakhe ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwiPodcast & Chill with MacG, okuwuhlelo olwethulwa nguMacGyver "MacG" Mukwevho, kwiYouTube.Le ngwazi ebingaconsi phansi eminyakeni edlule ithe yaqala ukubona ukuthi inesifo sokuwa, eminyakeni emithathu edlule.
Uthe wayevele asacazeke phansi engalindele.
"Ngangivuka.
Kuthi kungakapheli namahora amabili ngivele ngiwe, “ kusho uZola.
Uthe waya esibhedlela, wafike watshelwa ngodokotela ukuthi unogesi ekhanda maqede bamxilonga ngemishini.
"Bangitshela ukuthi kuzomele ngihlale ngihamba ngezinyawo ihora elilodwa."
UZola uthe isimo sakhe sesibucayi ngale ndlela yokuthi useze wathatha isinqumo sokuba angaphinde ashayele ngoba uzogcina edale inhlekele yengozi emigwaqweni.
"Muva nje lesi sifo sike sangibamba ngiphuma eZola, ngiyongena eKhwezi.
Ngebhadi bengihamba ngedwa emotweni.
"Uthe ngenxa yengozi ulahlekelwe uR60 000 ngenxa yezindleko zokukhanda imoto yakhe elimale yaphela.
Eqhuba uthe wehlelwa yile ngozi nje uhamba ngemoto abeyiboleke komunye umuntu ngoba neyakhe ibulawe yiso lesi sifo.Uthe abezindaba baze babika ukuthi uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela egula kabi kanti wavukwa ngamangongwane esemgwaqweni, kwavele kwenzeka ingozi.
Lo mculi oseke wazungeza amazwe uthe useke wahlabeka kwakubi impela.
"Ngonyaka owedlule ngike ngagula kabi ngisekhaya, ngiqhaqhazela."
Uthe indlela abexineke ngayo iningi labantu bese linovalo lokuthi usezohamba emhlabeni.
"Bengingasakwazi ukudla ngendlela.
Sengiphila ngokuphuza amahewu, idokwe nenhlanzi."
Uthe usephila ngokuphuza amaphilisi amabili ekuseni namabili ebusuku.
Ephetha uthe ingoma ayiqopha noCassper Nyovest ethi Bonginkosi nethi Hlengiwe waziqopha kunzima kangangoba wayephoqeleka ukuba elokhu ema kwaze kwaba ngamahlandla awu-25.
Uphethe ngokuthi kunosuku angakwazanga ukuya nasenkantolo ngoba wayesexinwe yikho ukugula.UZola waqala ukuzakhela udumo ngesikhathi elingisa indawo kaPapa Action wesibili kwiYizo Yizo 2.
Yilapho agqama khona njengomculi ngengoma ethi Ghetto Fabulous ngaphambi kokwethula izinhlelo ezihlukene zethelevishini, okubalwa iZola on Take 5, Zola 7, Hope with Zola  neTatakho.
Ubenza uhlelo lwantambama kwiMassiv Metro (online radio).
Ubuye walingisa efilimini eyahlabana kuma-Oscar Awards eyayithi Tsotsi futhi kwakudlalwa umculo wakhe.
Ikusasa lakhe liqale ukucikizela endimeni yezikaqedisizungu ngesikhathi engaboni ngaso linye nenkampani ayeqopha kuyo iGhetto Ruff.
Ufikelwe umunyu ehlonishwa ngakubo
ISIHLABANI somculo kamaskandi, uKhuzani "Indlamlenze" Mpungose, sifikelwe wumunyu ngesikhathi sihlonishwa nguMasipala wangakubo eNkandla ngegalelo laso emculweni.
UKhuzani ubungazwe esaphila nabafundi abaqhakambise indawo yaseNkandla kuGrade 12 nyakenye kumaMayoral Excellence Awards 2021 And Study Assistance, eNkandla Indoor Sports Centre ngoLwesine.
"Ngizithoba kakhulu ngokuhlonishwa njengomculi kamaskandi osemncane, kodwa namhlanje ngizithola ngihlonishwa.
Kungifikisela umunyu uma ngizwa kukhulunywa ngami kanje, ngiphila.
Ingoba ngike ngibone kukhulunywa ngabantu sebengasekho, kuthiwa benza kahle.
Ubeshaya, ehlula amaqhawe..." UKhuzani uthe yize esehlonishwe kakhulu kodwa okwaseNkandla kuvelele ngenxa yokuthi uyilokhu ayikho ngenxa yomphakathi wakule ndawo okuyiwo owamkhulisa nomxhasayo.Imeya yaseNkandla, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uchaze uKhuzani njengengqalabutho abaziqhenya kakhulu ngayo kule ndawo ngenxa yamagalelo ayo.
"Sihlonipha leli qhawe namhlanje, uKhuzani "Indlamlenze" Mpungose.
Singabantu baseNkandla sibone kufanele sikuhloniphe kumaMayoral Excellence Awards.
Akuhlonishwa nanoma ngubani.
Ubokwazi uma ufike kulesi sigaba, sisuke siziqhenya kanjani ngawe.
Sewuhlonishwe nabantu abasezingeni eliphezulu," kusho uNtuli ohloniphe uKhuzani ngesikhumba senkomo yabeNguni, isitifiketi, indondo, isiklabhu nesigingci sebhesi.
Uhlelo lwale ndumezulu yalo mcimbi beluphethwe umhleli futhi ongumfundi wezindaba zesiZulu kuSABC 1, uVusizwe Langa nomsakazi woKhozi FM, uTshatha Ngobe.Phakathi kwezicukuthwane ebezikhona kubalwa noMntwana uPhumzile Buthelezi ongusiHlalo we-IFP Women' Brigade kuzwelonke futhi oyiLungu lesiShayamthetho eKZN, uMnuz Mthokozisi Nxumalo ongusiHlalo we-IFP Youth Brigade kuzwelonke neLungu lePhalamende, Inkosi uMzamo Buthelezi oyiPhini likaMengameli weNkatha kuzwelonke futhi oyiLungu lePhalamende, uMnuz Siphosethu Ngcobo onguNobhala-Jikelele weNkatha futhi uyiLungu lePhalamende kuzwelonke.Kusukume wonke umuntu ngesikhathi uKhuzani esecula bukhoma unqambothi lwengoma yakhe ehlukanise unyaka oKhozini ngo2020.
Lo mculi ubuye wahlonishwa nangokugcwalisa iMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini ngo2019.
Ngaphandle kwalokho uKhuzani useke wahlula bonke abaculi kumaDstv Mzansi Viewers' Choice Awards ngo2018 futhi wahlabana nangeBest Maskandi Award kumaSouth African Music Awards (Sama) ngo2017.
Usebuya nase-United States of America ngokohlelo lwamaSatma Awards ngo2016.
Bahlabane ngezinhlelo ezintsha kuSABC 1
ZIKHONJWA kwisiteshi sethelevishini izilomo ezimbili, okubalwa umsakazi nomlingisi weminye yemidlalo kwi-1 Magic.
ULawrence Maleka wodumo lweThe River, uzovumbuka kuSABC 1 nohlelo olusha okulindeleke ukuthi lushise izikhotha.
Lolu hlelo olubizwa ngokuthi Too Hot To Be Single kulindeleke ukuthi  luqale ngo-Ephreli 8.
Ngokusho kweSABC wuhlelo lwabantu abafuna uthando ngendlela yesimanje futhi ebingajwayelekile kwindlu emnyama.
Kujwayelekile ukuthi insizwa izibike kwintokazi eyibuke yayithanda uma ihlangana nayo kodwa lolu hlelo luzokwenza okuhlukile ngoba abanye bazoxhunyaniswa ngisho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
Umuntu uzonikwezwa nethuba lokuzikhethela kubantu abahlukene, ahlunge aze afike kulo azizwa sengathi unazo zonke lezi zinto azifunayo ebudlelwaneni bezothando.Omunye ozokhonjwa kwiSABC, obengumsakazi weGagasi FM uZola Zeelovin.
Le ntokazi ibingomunye wabasakazi abebengaconsi phansi kubalaleli  bomsakazo.
Yize kwakuba muncu kubalandeli bakhe  ngesikhathi ekhipha isitatimende ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kodwa sebezokwazi ukumbona ohlelweni olusha lwezokuvakasha kuSABC 1.
Lolu hlelo olubizwa ngokuthi Shayi'Round, kulindeleke ukuthi luqale ngo-Ephreli 7.
Luzogxila kwezokuvakasha lubheka abangani, abasebenzi nezelamani.Owengamele ezokuxhumana kuSABC 1, uDzivhuluwani Siala ukuqinisekisile ukuthi iSABC inalezi zinhlelo wathi kuningi ababukeli abazokufunda ngobuhle bezokuvakasha nabazokuthakasela ngezobudlelwane bezothando.
UMnqobi Yazo usolwa ngokugoloza ukukhokhela imoto yentombi
Umculi ongaconsi phansi ngenxa yamanoni ezingoma zakhe, usolwa ngokunqaba ukukhokhela izindleko zemoto “yobe yintombi yakhe” okuthiwa uyishayisile ngesikhathi imboleke yona.Kuthiwa uMnqobi Yazo, usolwa ngobe yisinqandamathe sakhe uNondu Ngcobo, futhi sithi asisazi ukuthi kumele senze njani ukuze umculi akhokhele izindleko zokushayiswa kwemoto yaso.Umthombo weSolezwe ngeSonto  osondelene nowesifazane, uthe uNondu uphatheke kabi ngesenzo sikaYazo futhi ufuna usizo ngoba kuthiwa akayingeni umculi indaba yokulungisa imoto.“ UNondu usefuna noma yiluphi usizo ukuthi uMnqobi Yazo agcine ekhokhe izindleko zokukhanda imoto yakhe.
Ubemboleke imoto ngonyaka odlule, wayishayisa yalimala yaphela.
Lesi senzo sikaYazo sidale ukuthi izinto zingahambi kahle phakathi kwabo, baze bathatha nesinqumo sokuhlukana.
Bebehlala ndawonye emzini kaReggie Nkabinde, ongumphathi weMabala Noise, esayine uMnqobi Yazo,” kusho umthombo.Ethintwa uNondu ngalolu daba uqale wathembisa ukuthi uzobuye afone ngenxa yokuthi ubambeke emihlanganweni embalwa.
Emyalezweni athunyelelwe, uphendule ngokucela ukuthi udaba luxoxwe noYazo ukuze kutholakale lonke ulwazi ngalo.Kuthintwa uYazo uvele wahleka, akangaphika futhi akangavuma lutho.“ Nkabi yami bengithi njengoba ungithinta nje, uzongitshela ukuthi mhlawumbe kunendondo engiyiwinile.
Akukho engingakusho ngaphandle kokuthi ukuphuma ephepheni kusho udumo kumina njengomculi.
Noma ngabe kuthiwani ngami lokho kusho udumo ungabhala noma yikuphi.
Okunye engingakusho ukuthi angiyena umuntu othanda ukudalula izindaba zami esidlangalaleni,” kusho uYazo.Kuthiwa umculi ubehlala noNondu emzini kaNkabinde oseFourways, eGoli.
Uzogxila kweminye imisebenzi oshiya kuKhozi FM
OWETHULA ezemidlalo emsakazweni Ukhozi FM uSpha Mavuso, useveze ukuthi ufuna ukugxila kwamanye amabhizinisi njengoba egcina ukwethula ezemidlalo emoyeni kule nyanga.USpha waseMnambithi usebe umethuli wezemidlalo kulo msakazo kusuka ngo-2010.Ngeledlule uSpha ubhale ekhasini lakhe kuFacebook, ememezela izindaba zokushiya kwiSABC, nasekwethuleni ezemidlalo kuKhozi.Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngemuva kokuveza lezi zindaba, uthe akawushiyi umkhakha wezindaba akuwona kodwa ushiya kwaSABC ngoba sesifikile isikhathi sokuthi avalelise.“Ikusasa angazi ukuthi lingiphatheleni, kuningi okusemqondweni wami engikuhlelayo ukuze impilo iqhubeke kodwa ekwethuleni ezemidlalo sengithi khumu.
Zikhona izinkampani zezemidlalo ezixhumane nami ngesikhathi zibona ngiveza izindaba zokuthi ngiyashiya kuKhozi, ngisakhuluma nabo njengoba kwabona beyizinkampani ezinkulu.
Okunye engifuna ukukwenza ukugxila kwezolimo njengoba kuyinto engiyithandayo, umama engikhule ekwenza kuze kube manje, manje usekhulile umama sengiyabona ukuthi ngingazithatha ngizibeke kwelinye izinga.
Nomculo ke enye into engigxile kuyo njengoba sengike ngasebenza noDemor noSun-El Musician, ngizoqhubeka kube khona engikwenzayo nakuwona,” kusho uSpha.Uthe akhona namanye amabhizinisi anawo eceleni athemba ukuthi azokwenza kahle.“Ngijabule kona ngekusasa ngoba ngiyabona ukuthi liyakhanya.
Ngizobakhumbula kakhulu abalandeli bami kulo msakazo esisebenze kahle kakhulu nabo, nawo wonke umuntu kozakwethu esenze umsebenzi oncomekayo ngokubambisana.
Ngisazovalelisa kahle kubona uma sekusondele usuku lokugcina kwami emoyeni,“ kuchaza uSpha.Ngesikhathi uSpha eveza lezi zindaba ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abalandeli bakhe bamfisele okuhle kodwa baveza ukuthi bazomkhumbula.
UModiadie uphumele obala 'ngokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi' kwiMetro FM
UMSAKAZI weMetro FM, uPearl Modiadie, uthi abezindaba bamnike isibindi sokuthi aphumele obala ngezinsolo zokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi esiteshini seSABC iMetro FM.
U-Pearl uzivumele ekhasini lakhe kwi-Twitter ukuthi ziyiqiniso izinsolo zokuthi wahlukunyezwa ngokocansi wumphathi wakhe kulesi siteshi.
“Sengithule isikhathi eside kwaze kwaba abezindaba bayayizwa le nto, ngiyathokoza kakhulu.
Sekunginikeze isibindi sokuthi ngikhulume ngokunukubezwa ngokocansi engadlula kukho kwiMetro FM,” kusho uPearl kwi-Twitter.I kept quiet for too long until media picked it up and never have I been grateful for that because it finally gave me the courage to speak out about the sexual harassment I was was subjected to at Metro FM.
https://t.co/y5qgtEXGVnLe ntokazi esebenze kulesi siteshi iminyaka emihlanu, iveze ukuthi le menenja ibijwayele ukukhuluma izinto ezingafanele ngomzimba wakhe.Ngenkathi ekhuluma nephepha iSunday World nokuyiyona ethi ibone lama-email, uPearl uveze ukuthi bese kukaningi le menenja ikhuluma okungafanele ngomzimba wakhe.
Uthe ngenkathi egqoke i-jumpsuit emubambayo beshutha enkundleni yebhola, imenenja yamtshela ukuthi akabheke le ukuze kuzovela izinqa.“Sekukaningi esho izinto ezingafanele ngomzimba wami ngisho phambi kwabantu engangisebenza nabo.
Kukhona la ngangifake khona isithombe sami ngigqoke i-bikini wafika esekhuluma okungafanele emsebenzini,” kusho uPearl kwiSunday World.Uqhube wathi okokugcina, imenenja yakhuluma kuma-email asemsebenzini abonwa ozakwabo, “Ngaphendula ngasho ukuthi lokhu ekushoyo akungiphathi kahle nokuthi ngasengikhathele.”“Waxolisa kwi-email, waze wazoxolisa kumina kodwa ngangicasukile ngaze ngakhala.
Usaziwayo owayekhona ngaleli langa ezindlini zokuqopha wabona.
Indlela engangiphatheke kabi ngayo, angizange ngize emsebenzini ngosuku olulandelayo.”Emva kokuba abantu bebhodle umlilo kwi-Twitter iSABC ikhiphe isitatimende.
Igqugquzele abasebenzi bayo ukuthi bawabike amacala afana nalawa enkampanini.The SABC views sexual harassment in a serious light and will use its internal policies and procedures to deal with this matter.
The SABC encourages any employees subjected to sexual harassment to use the Corporation’s specific internal channels to report such cases.
Bethuliwe abalingisi bomdlalo
INTOKAZI yakuleli ezakhele igama yethula izinhlelo zethelevishini, uFarieda Metsileng, iyona ezolingisa indawo ephambili emdlalweni omusha wamahlaya othi uBettina Wethu.Lo mdlalo osuselwe kowamahlaya othi Ugly Betty osungulwe e-USA, uzoqala ngo-Ephreli 5 ngo-7.30 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko kuze kube uLwesithathu.Kulo mdlalo wakuleli kuzobe kukhulunywa izilimi ezihlukene.Abanye abalingisi abamenyezelwe noFarieda kubalwa uZweli Dube, Tsholofelo Mashishi, Linda Jiyane, Coconut Kelz, noZaza Moloi.UTshepiso Sello Phiri onguphrojusa walo mdlalo ngaphansi kwenkampani iKnown Associates Entertainment, uveze ukuthi baqale ukuthungatha abalingisi bawo ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi sikathaqa ezweni.“Kusithakaselise kakhulu ukuthola izicelo zabalingisi abadumile nabanye abasafika kulo mkhakha.
Yingakho kulo mdlalo kuzogqama ubuso obusha nobudala futhi kuzogqama izinhlanga ezihlukene zabantu bakuleli.
Ngesikhathi senza inhlolokhono, sathatha abalingisi abaningi ukubheka kahle ithalente nokunika ithuba lomlingisi othi yena akaze abizwe kwinhlolokhono, konke kwahamba kahle njengoba sesilana namhlanje,” kuchaza uTshepiso.
Uveze ukuthi isililo esasikhalwa intsha yakuleli ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi  #OpenTheIndustry, basebenze ngaphansi kwaso.“Ngesikhathi senza inhlolokhono asitholanga nje kuphela intsha yakuleli kuphela kodwa neyakwamanye amazwe njengoba konke babekwenza ngobuchwepheshe besimanje.
Ubuso obusha kulo mdlalo kuzokwenza abantu bawuthakasele lo mdlalo njengoba ugcwele intsha,“ kuchaza yena.Umphathi weSABC1, uPhumzile Zonke, uthe kuyabathokozisa ukubiza lo mdlalo owabo njengesiteshi.“Indlela lo mdlalo oyiwona kwamina ungimangazile, kusetshenziwe kakhulu kuwona ngesikhathi uqoshwa.
Njengenhlangano yezokusakaza enkulu kuleli nase-Afrika, senza okusemandleni ethu ukuletha imidlalo ekhuluma ngento eke yenzeke ngempela kwabanye abantu.
Nakulokhu ke kuyisiqalo sezinto ezinkulu esisazozimemezela kubabukeli bethu okukhona kuzo ezobumnandi, ezemfundo nokunye,” kuchaza yena.Abanye babalingisi abakulo mdlalo oMichael Potter ( Brandon Thomas), Elliot Makhubo (Israel Sikhakhane), Mbasa Msongeli (Mpilo Hadebe), Brighton Ngoma (T-Bang Moeketsi), Ayanda Bandla (Lakhe Amon) nabanye.
Kumjabulisile uZozi ukuba uzime isikhathi eside
INTOKAZI yakuleli ebiphethe isicoco sikaMiss Universe, uZozibini Tunzi, ithi yayazi ukuthi ukuthatha kwayo lesi sicoco ngo-2019 kuzoba nomehluko.UZozi ukusho lokhu emcimbini wokukhetha uzime walo nyaka obuse-USA, eHollywood, Florida, ngeSonto, ezintatha.Enkulumeni yakhe yokuvalelisa, uZozibini uveze ukuthi ukuthatha lesi sicoco kwakuyiphupho lamadlozi akuleli angasekho.“Ngiqhamuka ezweni elineminyaka engu-27 lakhululeka e-Afrika, ngiyajabula ukuthi ngikwaze ukumela leli zwe emicimbini emikhulu efana naleli.
Ngokuthola lesi sicoco bekuyindlela yokubabonga ngabakwenza ezweni lami belwela inkululeko,” kusho uZozibini.Le ntokazi ibe isibonga umndeni wayo nabalandeli ngokuyinika uxhaso eminyakeni emibili iphethe lesi sicoco.“Ngangazi ukuthi kukhona okuhlukile okuzokwenzeka ngesikhathi ngithatha lesi sicoco.
Ukusibamba iminyaka emibili kimina kusho lukhulu.
Ukubheduka kwegciwane iCovid-19 kwenze ngathinta izimpilo zabantu kabili, njengoba sisebenze ngokuzikhandla,“ kuchaza le ntokazi yase-Eastern Cape.Okunye okuphinde kwadonsa amehlo kulo mcimbi yingubo yale ntokazi ebithungwe ngumsiki wengqephu, uBiji La Maison de Couture, eyigqoke ngendlela yesintu njengoba ibishuqulile ekhanda.
UZozi ubesehlale e-USA iminyaka emibili ngemuva kokuthatha lesi sicoco kanti kulindeleke ukuthi abuye maduzane kuleli.Isicoco salo nyaka sithathwe yintokazi yaseMexico,     u-Andrea Meza, isibili kwalala intokazi yaseBrazil, uJulia Gama, indawo yesithathu yathathwa yintokazi yasePeru, uJanick Maceta Del Castillo.Intokazi ebimele eyakuleli, uNatasha Joubert, iphume zisuka kulo mqhudelwano njengoba ingafikanga ngisho esigabeni seTop10.Lo mcimbi usakazwe kuleli izolo ku-1 Magic (DStv Channel 103) ngo-9.30, ebusuku.
Umsakazi uthi akaziboni eshada nonengane yomunye umuntu
AKAZIBONI ethatha owesifazane onengane yomunye umuntu, umsakazi owale unkosikazi phambi kwezwe libuka, ohlelweni lwesithembu oludlala kuMzansi Magic ku-161 ngoLwesithathu.
UBheki "Magaye" Cele wohlelo uMnakwethu Happily Ever After, nongumsakazi wohlelo Senza Kwenzeke kwiZwi Lomzansi FM eThekwini, ubonakale kulolu hlelo lwesithembu kwithelevishini nobeyinkosikazi yakhe encane uNksz Thempe Xulu, emtshela ngemfihlo yakhe yeminyaka nokumdine wamala khona lapho.UNksz Xulu utshele uMagaye ukuthi kule minyaka ewu-12 bethandana, unengane abengakaze akhulume ngayo nabeyifihlile.
Lokhu kushaqe abantu abaningi futhi kuwundabuzekwayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
UMagaye uthe yize engumuntu okhululekile nonothando kodwa ngesikhathi esaqala ukwazana noNksz Xulu, wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi akaziboni engakwazi ukuthandana nomuntu wesifazane onengane.
“Nami ngifana nani, ngikuqabuke phambi kwamakhamera ngingeke ngisenza lutho, ngamangala.
Anginayo inhliziyo embi njengoba ngimalile nje kuphelile futhi angifisi abantu bacabange ukuthi ngimbambele igqubu.
Othandweni azifuneki izimfihlo, ingane akuyona into yokufihlwa umuntu aze ayokhokha kini uthule ungamtsheli iqiniso,” kusho uMagaye.Eqhuba uthe lokhu okumehlele ukuthathe ngokuthi kuyafana nse nokuvamise ukwehlela abesifazane begilwa ngabesilisa.
Lesi sigameko uthe ufisa sibe yisifundo kwabanye abantu besilisa sokuthi uthando luhambisana nobuhle nobubi, okungasho ukuthi kumele ajeziswe owesifazane uma esephutheni.
"Ngendlela ebengizizwa ngayo bengingenza noma yini kodwa ngakhetha ukuxola ngazitshela ukuthi nakubantu besifazane sihlala sibona kwenzeka, nami ngishaywe ngenduku ehlala ishaya banye.Ephetha uMagaye uthe uyasola ukuthi lo nkosikazi wakhe wathatha lesi sinqumo ngoba esaba ukuthi ngeke esaqhubeka nokuthandana naye ngoba enengane.
UMagaye uthe ngesikhathi beqala ukuhlangana wayesemncane kakhulu mhlawumbe nalokho kwamenza waba namahloni.
Ukufihla ingane akuzange kuqinise uthando lwabo, kunalokho kuvele kwaphela nobelusozwaneni ngokusho kwakhe.
UMagaye ucele ukuthi kube okokugcina emataniswa nalo wesifazane ngoba yena usedlulile lapho.
Isikhala sonkosikazi wesibili uthe sesivulekile ngoba uzimisele ngokuqhubeka nesithembu kodwa ngeke esabheka emuva.
UNksz Xulu ngesikhathi kuphela uhlelo uzehlisile wacela uxolo kwithelevishini izwe lonke libuka, waveza ukuthi ubengaqondile ukumzwisa ubuhlungu kodwa ubengeke athule ingunaphakade nale mfihlo ebimudla ngaphakathi yonke le minyaka.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukankosikazi iphunzile njengoba ebengatholakali ocingweni.
U-Oprah ubabaza ikhono likaThuso Mbedu
UMETHULI wezinhlelo ongusomabhizinisi odumile emhlabeni u-Oprah Winfrey akawuvali umlomo ngomlingisi wakuleli uThuso Mbedu ongundabamlonyeni eHollywood, e-USA ngenxa yomdlalo omusha alingisa kuwo.
Lo mlingisi okhulele eMbali, eMgungundlovu udlala indawo eqavile kaCora Randall emdlalweni okhonjiswa kwi-Amazon Prime Video, iThe Underground Railroad, U-Oprah uqale wabhala ekhasini lakhe ku-Instagram encoma lo mdlalo noThuso ngokushaya into ecokeme.
“Kade ngibuka iThe Underground Railroad isonto lonke, kumele ngikusho ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi siyibuke.
Umqondisi wayo uBarry Jenkins uguqula incwadi kaColson Whitehead evele iseqophelweni eliphezulu ayenze umdlalo owuchungechunge okuthintayo emoyeni.
Ukulingisa kukaThuso Mbedu kusezingeni eliphezulu.
Kuningi okuhle okuseza empilweni yakhe ngemuva kokumbuka kulo mdlalo,” kusho u-Oprah.
Ube eseluleka ababukeli balo mdlalo wathi bangawujahi, bazinikeze isikhathi uma sebewubuka ngoba ujulile futhi sonke isiqephu sisezingeni eliphezulu.
Ekhuluma naye engxoxweni ye-Oprah Daily ayifake emakhasini akhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana u-Oprah uthe uqala ngqa ukubona umlingisi okwaze ukulingisa ngendlela alingise ngayo uThuso kulo mdlalo.
Umbuze ukuthi ukwenze kanjani lokhu ngoba indawo ayilingisayo inzima.
UThuso uveza ukuthi kudingeke alulekwe ngokwengqondo ukuze ahlukane nendawo abeyilingisa ngokomoya ngoba kuningi okufanayo phakathi kwakhe nayo ikakhulukazi indlela abakhule ngayo.
Lo mlingisi uthe udinge ukwenza ucwaningo oluningi ngabantu abamnyama ngezikhathi zeminyaka yo-1800 e-USA ukuze acoshe konke angakuthola ngendawo abeyilingisa.
UThuso uthe kuningi okushintshile kuye ngemuva kokudlala indawo kaCora kulo mdlalo.
Ingxoxo yakhe ephelele no-Oprah:A post shared by Thuso Mbedu (@thuso.mbedu)
U-AKA uchaza ngobuhlungu bokushonelwa yingoduso
UMREPHA wakuleli osanda kushonelwa yingoduso u-AKA uthi namanje kusenzima ukubhekana nomshophi osanda kumehlela.
Lo mrepha uphefumule okokuqala kwabezindab ngokushona kwengoduso yakhe u-Anele “Nellie” Tembe, owashona ngo-Ephreli 11 emuva kokushayeka phansi esuka ebhilidini lehhotela laseCape Town, iPepper Club Hotel.Esitatimendeni esakhishwa umndeni wakhe nowakwaTembe ngaleso sikhathi kwavela ukuthi lo mrepha akekho esimeni esihle ngokomqondo nokwabiza ukuthi bamqaphe abasondelene naye.
“Usuku nosuku kuba sengathi ngiqwala intaba.
Ngimkhumbule kakhulu u-Anele, ngibuhlungu ekujuleni kwenhliziyo yami ngampilo ebesihlele ukuzakhela yona,” kusho u-AKA.
Lo mrepha ulobole uNellie ngenyanga edlule okuyizindaba ezathakaselwa abalandeli babo abaningi kuleli.
“Ukushona kuka-Anele kungithikamezile emoyeni nangokomqondo.
Izinkulumo ezakha isithombe esingesihle ngami (kulolu daba) zikwenza kube nzima ukubhekana nalesi simo, angikwazi ngisho ukukhuluma ngengcindezi imindeni yethu edlula kuyo,” kuchaza yena.
U-AKA uthe usazohoxa ezintweni ezithinta umsebenzi wakhe, okubalwa kuzo namakhasi ezinkundla zokuxhumana athe asaphethwe yithimba asebenzisana nalo okwamanje.
Ubonge bonke abamesekayo kulesi sikhathi esinzima ngokunjalo nabantu abamthumele imiyalezo yokududuza yena nemindeni yabo.
U-AKA uphawula kanjena nje ngesikhathi kufihlwa ingoduso yakhe, uyise uMoses Tembe wayikhahlela ngazo zombili imibiko yokuthi indodakazi yakhe ibinokhwantalala nokuthi ibinemicabango yokuzibulala.
Kunalokho wathi intsha yakuleli ihlaselwa usathane ngezidakamizwa nophuzo oludakayo.
Amaphoyisa asaphenya ngokushona kuka-Anele Tembe.
UWinnie Ntshaba nezinkundla zokucobelelana ngolwazi
UMLINGISI, uWinnie Ntshaba, uthi usezingxoxweni neziteshi zethelevishini ezahlukene ukuze izigcawu zakhe zokucobelelana ngolwazi ngezobuciko azisakaza kwiYoutube, zikhonjiswe kuzo.UWinnie, ozakhele udumo emidlalweni ehlukene okubalwa kuyo iGenerations neminye, uqale izigcawu zezingxoxo ezibizwa ngeRoundtable Talks.
Njengamanje uzisakaza ekhasini le miklomelo yemidlalo ewuchungechunge ayisungula amaRoyalty Soapie Awards kwiYoutube.
"Sesiqophe iziqephu ezimbalwa, esinye isiqephu sisiqophe ngesonto eledlule ngesikhathi sinesidlo sasemini nabanqoba kumaRoyalty Soapie Awards ngonyaka odlule.
Sibe no-2020 omuncu, ngakho sibone kungcono ukuthi sihlangane sibuyise nethemba kwabanye," kusho uWinnie.Ngesikhathi beqopha ngeledlule, izikhulumi bekungo-Angus Gibson, Bonga Percy Vilakazi, Lillian Dube noBongi MlotshwaUthe iRoundtable Talks iyinkundla lapho bekhuluma khona ngemisebenzi ehlukene kwezokungcebeleka, ukukhulisa abafuna ukungena kuyo nangokuhlomisa ngolwazi abalandeli bayo.
"Sifunda ngokuthi kudingekani ukuze ube umbhali wemidlalo, umshuthi nokunye.
Bonke abenza lo msebenzi bakhuluma ngohambo lwabo nezingqinamba ababhekana nazo nokuthi bamelana kanjani nazo.
Bahlomisa ababukeli ngokuthi uma kwenzeka lokhu kubo, bazophuma kanjani?
Yazi nami njengomlingisi ngiyakhula ngoba uke uphelelwe ithemba kodwa uma uzwa nozakwenu bekhuluma ngezinkinga zabo, uyabona ukuthi awuwedwa," kuchaza uWinnie.Uthe konke abakhuluma ngakho banethemba ukuthi kuzofika nasezindlebeni zikahulumeni, ushaye imithetho yokulawula imboni yabo ngoba ukholwa ukuthi kumele kube nemigomo elawula ukusebenza.Uqhube wathi ufuna lezi zingxoxo zingagcini kuphela ngokukhuluma ngezokungcebeleka kodwa nangezinye izinhlaka.
"Sifuna ukuthi zivuleleke kuwona wonke umuntu okungaba abasakazi, abasiki bengqephu, abadansi nezinye izimboni.
"UWinnie uphethe ngokuthi abantu bazombona kwithelevishini maduze kodwa akavumelekile ukudalula ukuthi kumuphi umdlalo okwamanje.
Bachaza ngokungaqokwa kukaKhuzani kumaSama 27
ABAHLELI bomcimbi wezindondo zomculo omkhulu kunayo yonke eNingizimu Afrika, iSouth African Music Awards (Sama), bageqa amagula ngembangela yokushaywa ngesithende kwesilomo sikamaskandi, uKhuzani "Indlamlenze" Mpungose.
Kuzokhunjulwa ukuthi uKhuzani ugile izimanga nyakenye nge-albhamu yakhe yakamuva esihloko sithi Ijele.
Nengoma afolose ngayo kule albhamu, Ijele, iqophe umlando.
Ngaleli cwecwe uqokwe kumaKZN Entertainment Awards, wahlabana ngomklomelo omkhulukazi weBest Maskandi, obuhambisana nesamba sika-R500 000 weKZN Most Loved Artist.
Ijele lithe nje liphuma laliculwa yinqwaba yabantu ngisho nangosaziwayo abahlonishwayo naphesheya kwezilwandle, uDJ Tira noBlack Coffee.
Ngisho noNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMhlonishwa uSihle Zikalala, ushayele uKhuzani elikhulu ihlombe ngaleli noni osekugidwa ngalo nasemakhaya.
Leli culo, eselifana nehubo lesizwe kumaskandi, libuye laqopha umlando ngokuhlukanisa unyaka oKhozini FM ngamavoti acela ku-1 million.
Wabe eseqopha umlando ngokuba wumaskandi wokuqala ukunandisa ezinhlelweni zezemidlalo, [email protected] (SABC 1) nakwiHomeground (Mzansi Magic).
Le mpumelelo yenze noMasipala waseNkandla,  okuyindawo adabuka kuyo uKhuzani njengoba engowaseMandaba, wamhlonipha ngesikhumba, isigingci nendondo ngenxa yamagalelo akhe ekuqhakambiseni le ndawo.
Nakuba kunjalo kodwa uKhuzani akabonakalanga nangokhalo kumaSama ekubeni ubelindeleke emnxeni weBest Maskandi, Best Collaboration, Best Male, Best Album nakwiRecord of the Year, obekuzomenza umaskandi wokuqala ukungena nokuhlabana uma ephumelela.
Ebuzwa ukuthi ubengenelile yini, uKhuzani wenqabile ukuphawula kodwa wathembisa ukubeka uvo lwakhe emuva kokuba sekuphawule abamaSama.
Okhulumela amaSama, uComfort Nkosi, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uKhuzani ubengenelile kwiBest Maskandi Album kuphela kodwa wangaqokwa.
Kunalokho kuqokwe uPhuzekhemisi ngecwecwe elithi Ziyangiluma Izinja, Imithente ngelithi Banathi Shaqa, Abafana BakaMgqumeni ngelithi Imfene Kamakhelwane, Ichwane Lebhaca ngelithi AmaGupta noThokozani Langa ngelithi Iqatha Eliziqobayo.
Echaza ngokushiywa ngaphandle kukaKhuzani, uComfort uthe iciko liqokwa ngenxa yamaphuzu amaningi eliwanikwa ongoti bamajaji kulowo munxa.
"Kuqaphele ukuthi udumo aluthi shu uma sijaja abazongenela amaSama.
Inkundla isuke ilingana futhi wonke umculi unikezwa ithuba elenele nelilinganayo nelabanye uma kujajwa," usho kanje.
Uthe amaciko angadlalwa emisakazweni noma anganandisi emicimbini emikhulu aphathwa ngendlela elinganayo nozakwabo abadumile.
"Ekugcineni kumayelana nezinga lomsebenzi ophrojusiwe nokuthi ongoti bethu babanikeza maphi amaphuzu abangenele.Sihalalisela abaqokiwe kwiBest Maskandi futhi sibafisela okuhle kodwa kumaSama 27," kuphetha uComfort.
UDJ unxusa uhulumeni ukuthi alekelele amaciko
UDJ Black Coffee usenxuse uhulumeni nomasipala ukuthi balekelele amaciko ngalesi sikhathi esinzima engaqashwa.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ehambele umcimbi wokwethulwa kwesikhangiso okuhloswe ngaso ukuthi kuhehwe izivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ukuthi zize eThekwini.
Lo mcimbi ubuseMax’s Lifestyle eMlaza.Lesi sikhangiso senziwe ngokuhlanganyela noMasipala weTheku ngaphansi komnyango wezokuVakasha.
"Kwamanye amazwe isifonyo yinto abangasazi nokuthi bake bayisebenzisa.
ERussia nje asisagqokwa.
Ngiyazwelana kakhulu namaciko akithi athwele kanzima kulesi sikhathi futhi ngisacela ukuthi uhulumeni awasize kulesi sikhathi esinzima kangaka.“Uthe naye ushayekile njengoba kwake kwaba khona isikhathi la ayengahambi khona kodwa manje sekungcono njengoba kukhona amazwe asebuyele esimweni esejwayelekile.“Emazweni afana noRussia, sekuyasetshenzwa kubanjwa amakhonsathi amakhulu," kusho Black Coffee.Ngokwakhe, uthe okumele kwenzeke lapha ekhaya ukuthi kube khona izithangami zokucushisa amaciko ngemali.
"Kumele uhulumeni nabo futhi omasipala bahlele izithangami zokucobelela ukuthi uma siphinda sihlangabezana nesimo esifana njengalesi yini okumele siyenze.
Okunye ukuthi kumele amaciko atshelwe ukuthi angayonga kanjani imali ukuze uma ehlangabezana nezikhathi ezinzima akwazi ukuzinakekela size sidlule," kuchaza yena.Uthe ukujabulele ukuba yingxenye yalo mkhankaso owethulwe umnyango wezokuVakasha, njengoba iTheku kuyidolobha akhulele kulona futhi lilihle.Uthe ngalesi sikhangiso uyathemba baningi abazobona iSouth Afrika ikakhulukazi iTheku liyindawo okumele bayivakashele.UMnuz Phillip Sithole, oyisikhulu kuMasipala weTheku, uthe kuyohlala kukubona ukuqhubeka bethuthukisa iTheku, yingakho bekhethe ukwenza isikhangiso esifana nalesi.“Akekho omunye umuntu ebesingahlangana naye ukwenza lo msebenzi.
UBlack Coffee yingane yethu eThekwini, ngakho siyabonga ngokuthi ahlanganyele nathi.
Siyathemba ukuthi lokhu esikufisayo ngedolobha lethu kuzokwenzeka,” kuchaza uPhillip.

ISAFUNA ukuzibonakalisa kakhulu kunakuqala endimeni yezokulingisa intokazi yaseShowe engumlingisi womdlalo waku-E.TV, iDurban Gen.UNelisiwe Sibiya (26) odlala indawo kaDkt Mbali Mthethwa kulo mdlalo uhlabane nendondo yakhe yokuqala ekulingiseni, emiklomelweni ebiseZambia ngeledlule.Uthweswe umqhele wokuba yi-Best Actress Africa kumaZikomo Awards.Elandisa leli phephandaba uthe akubanga lula njengoba abantu becabanga kwazise ukuthi ubehlalelwe ukuzibonakalisa amagalelo akhe njengoba kwakukhona ababeshaya amakhala ngokunikwa kwakhe indawo ephambili kwi-Durban Gen.“Angeke ngiqambe amanga ukuthi kulula konke ngoba kudingeka ukuthi ngisebenze kanzima njalo ukuze ngivale imilomo labo ababengingabaza,” usho kanje.Uthe waqala wazitshela ukuthi kudlalwa ngaye ngesikhathi ethola umyalezo wokuthi uqokiwe kule miklomelo.“Ngaze ngakholwa uma sengibona ngithunyelelwa yonke imininingwane yesimemo.
Ukuhlonishwa yizwe langaphandle kuyinto enkulu kumina ikakhulukazi njengoba ngimusha ekulingiseni.
Ngibonga angiphezi kuMvelingqangi nakubona bonke abantu abangivotelile,” usho kanje.Yize le ntokazi iyintsha ekulingiseni kodwa ayiyintsha kwezikaqedisizungu njengoba iphimbo layo laziwa ngemisebenzi ehlukene ake ayenza.Phakathi kwayo kubalwa ibika leLockdown elithi Mama kaBafana nokunguyena ocula kulona kanjalo ne-Diep City okuwumdlalo omusha okhinjiswa kuMzansi Magic usebenzisa iphimbo lakhe.“Angiwuyekile umculo kodwa ngathatha isinqumo sokuma kancane kuwona ukuze ngizimisele ekulingiseni.
Miningi imisebenzi engiyenza ngokuhlanganyela neBlack Brain Productions okuyiyona ekhiqiza iLockdown neDiep City,” kusho uNelisiwe.Mayelana nezothando uthe okwamanje akekho esimeni esikahle sokuba sebudlelwaneni ngenxa yokuxinwa umsebenzi.“Kunzima ngisho ukujola.
Ubani nje ongavuma ukuba nentombi enocingo oluhlale luvaliwe imini yonke njengoba ngisuke ngibhizi nomsebenzi imini yonke,” kusasho uNelisiwe.Uthe nangaphandle kwalokho ufuna ukuzisebenza yena kuqala ngaphambi kokuzibophezela ngezothando.Uphethe ngokuthi uzobuya engasadle zinkobe zamuntu emculweni, abantu abalinde nje.
UKhuzani uzithintele komaskandi efika eNdlunkulu eswenkile
UZITHINTELE kwabanye abaculi bakamaskandi uKhuzani ngokufika eNdlunkulu KwaKhethomthandayo engavunulile ngesikhathi beyobhonga emswaneni bengamaciko ngeledlule.Ngokohlelo lwabaculi bakamaskandi abebeye eNdlunkulu, bekuvunyelwene ngokuthi bonke abaculi abafike bevunule ngenhloso yokuhlonipha iSilo samaBandla ngokuhloba ngemvunulo.
UKhuzani ufike eswenkile nokuyinto okuthiwa ayehlanga kahle kwabanye abaculi.Okuphinde kwabacika kakhulu ukuthi kuphinde kuvele isithombe sikaKhuzani kwelinye lamaphephandaba egiya phambi kozakwabo beseNdlunkulu.Abaculi bakamaskandi abebekhuluma emakhasini kamaskandi bathe ibacasulile indaba kaKhuzani baze bamtshela ukuthi kuzomele ahlawule ngesenzo sakhe.Omunye wabaculi obekhuluma, uBhekeni, uthe bekumele engabe kuvezwe uSomnandi phambili ephepheni kunokuthi kuvezwe uKhuzani ngoba akavunulile futhi bayamhlawulisa ngesenzo sakhe sokungahloniphi.Ethintwa uKhuzani uvumile ukuthi abaculi bambuzile ukuthi kungani engavunulile?“Ngibachazelile ukuthi bekungeyona inhloso ukuthi ngifike ngingavunulile, inkinga ukuthi bengisuka eGoli ngesikhathi siya eNdlunkulu, angikwazanga ukudlula ekhaya ukuyothatha imvunulo yami.
Nalaba asebekhuluma kakhulu sebezifunela udumo nje ngami.
Angilibonanga necala kangako ngoba kwakungewona umyalelo waseNdlunkulu ukuthi sifike sivunulile kodwa yinto esasizihlelele yona njengomaskandi,” kusho uKhuzani.
Mayelana nenhlawulo, uKhuzani uthe akuzange kufike ekutheni ahlawuliswe futhi akekho obesamtshele ngayo.UTHOKOZANI Langa odume ngelikaSomnandi, uthe naye ubakhuzile abanye omaskandi ukuthi bangamlwisi uKhuzani ngoba leyo nto izodala uqhekeko phakathi kwabo bengomaskandi kanti babambisene kahle.
USonia Mbele uvuma iphutha elimqhathe nabasebenzi bohlelo
USEPHUMELE obala washicilela isitatimende umlingisi nomdidiyeli wohlelo olusha olukhuluma ngabefundisi nosolwa ngokuxhaphaza abasebenzi ngokubafukuzisa engabaholeli.
USonia Mbele ngempelasonto kuvele izinzolo zokuthi kuze kube yimanje akakaze abakhokhele abasebenzi bohlelo iPastors Wives angomunye wabadidiyeli balo.
Lolu hlelo seluze laqala ukudlala kwithelevishini futhi lunabalandeli abaningi kodwa izinhliziyo ziyaqaqamba kubasebenzi abangakaze baholele uDisemba, Januwari nofebhuwari.
Lokhu kuholele ekutheni abasebenzi balolu hlelo baqale bahudule izinyawo emsebenzini nokufake enkulu ingcindezi.USonia usephumele obala washicilela isitatimende ezivumela ngokwakhe ukuthi libekhona iphutha nangasohlangothini lwakhe ngoba noma eseneminyaka ekulo mkhakha wezokulingisa kodwa sincane isikhathi engumdidiyeli.
USonia uthe uyazi abantu bavuke ngalezi zinsolo ngempelasonto futhi bacabanga ukuthi ngezinye zezindaba ezihudulela phansi igama lakhe kodwa akunjengoba abantu becabanga.
"Sengibe umlingisi iminyaka ewu-25, emithathu kuyo bengiphinde ngibe wumdidiyeli, nokungenza ngibe yingane esakhasa kulo mkhakha.
Ngakho ngizowenza amaphutha, futhi iphutha engalenza ukungathumeli ngesikhathi isecelo sokukhokhelwa nokwenze bangakhokheleka abasebenzi.
Ngiyaxolisa ngalokho," kusho uSonia.Ephetha uthe okwamanje ungaphandle kwaseNingizimu Afrika ngokomsebenzi kodwa uzobuya futhi ukulungele ukusebenza nabantu abasafuna abaphathe, uyakwamukela nakulabo abamcekela phansi.

"UMasipala yiwo osigundele utshani, wasifakela nogesi enkundleni ngoba wazi ukuthi sizoba nomcimbi.
Obese kusele wukuthi sithole izimvume, okuyinto ebesibona ukuthi sizoyithola.
Yingakho siqhubekile nokukhangisa.
Sihambele uMnyango wezeMpilo, balokhu bebhala becisha.
Nowamapaki wathi kawukwazi ukusinika imvume singakayitholi eyakowezempilo.
Bebelokhu besisa le nale," kusho uMdu.Uthe baphoxekile ngoba bebefuna ukusiza umphakathi waseMkhumbane ngokuthi badale amathuba omsebenzi kubantu abasha basendaweni, bafukule nomnotho ngokusebenzisa amabhizinisi endawo.
"Bese siqalile senza izinhlolokhono zabaculi abazonandisa, senza nezinkundla zokucobelelana ngolwazi kodwa umkhandlu wadlala ngathi ngale ndlela.
Ukhona lo ohlalele ukusiny+*a .
"Uthe bafuna ukuqhubeka nomcimbi ngempelasonto ezayo kodwa abakabi naso isiqiniseko okwamanje.
"Sinqena ukubeka usuku bese siphinde siyaphoxeka.
Sizama neminye imizamo yokuthi sithole indawo ezimele ngoba khona akudingeki wenze yonke le midanti.
Noma kanjani kodwa umcimbi uzoqhubeka ngoba kawukho nowodwa umthetho wokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kweCovid-19 esiwephulayo.
Sidayise amathikithi angu-200 kuphela futhi enkundleni bekuzoba nabantu abangu-300.
"Uthe bazoxhumana nabathenge amathikithi abebiza uR150 eWebticket ngokubuyiselwa imali yabo, uma bengathandi ukuya ngosuku abazolunquma.Emcimbini bekuzonandisa uSjava, Naima Kay, Blaq Diamond, Skye Wanada, DJ Muntu, Langa Mavuso nabanye.

INTOKAZI eyazakhela igama icula eqenjini lo mculo wokholo iJoyous Celebration, uBrenda Mntambo, isinxuse ukuthi kukhulekelwe izifo zengqondo njengoba ziyingqinamba kwabaningi.UBrenda ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokukhipha ingoma yakhe ethi Khululeka,  ephume ngoLwesihlanu.Le ngoma uthi ikhuluma ngezifo ezihlukene ezithinta ingqondo, okumele zisukunyelwe.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokuthi le ngoma igcine iphumile.

Uthe i-albhamu yakhe ethi SANE izophuma ngo-Agasti.

ZIMAPEKETWANE izinto emsakazweni Ukhozi FM njengoba kuthiwa kukhona abasakazi abangeneme ngokuqokwa ngokugcwele kwesokuphatha isiteshi kukaSbongi Ngcobo.Ngeledlule, iSABC imemezele ukuthi uSbongi uzokwengamela Ukhozi FM esikhundleni esibizwa nge-business manager.Bese kuphele iminyaka engaphezu kwemibili ebambe njengomphathi ngemuva kokukhushulelwa kukaBonga Mpanza ukuthi eyobamba esikhundleni sokuphatha iSABC KwaZulu-Natal.UBonga, owagcina esulile eSABC, wayeyobamba isikhundla esashiywa nguZamambo Mkhize ngesikhathi ethatha umhlalaphansi.Isolezwe  lithole ngemithombo yalo engashayi eceleni ukuthi kukhona abangeneme ngendlela uSbongi aphethe ngayo, kangangoba baze bacela umhlangano nesikhulu esiphezulu seSABC, uMadoda Mxakwe nowengamele imisakazo kuzwelonke, uNada Wotshela.Obambe njengomkhulumeli weSABC, uMmoni Seapolelo, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi izikhulu zayo zimenywe emhlanganweni ukuba kuyobhungwa ngezikhalo ngoKhozi FM.
"Obekukhulunywa emhlanganweni kuyinto yangaphakathi, ngeke kuphawulwe ngakho," kusho uMmoni.Umthombo uthe umhlangano ubuseLangeni Hotel ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule lapho bekukhona abasakazi uNongcebo McKenzie, DJ Sgqemeza noTshatha.Omunye umthombo osebenza kuleli hhotela, ukuqinisekisile ukubona laba basakazi, wengeza ngokuthi "omunye wabo ubegqoke isudi eyisikotshi".Kuthiwa kubizwe nomphathi wezinhlelo, uZandile Tembe, ukuba azobeka akwaziyo ngendlela izinto ezihamba ngayo emsakazweni.Umthombo uthe kulindeleke ukuthi uMxakwe aqhamuke nezisombululo ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa.
"USbongi ubizelwe eGoli ngoLwesibili ukuthi kuyokhulunywa ngodaba lwakhe.
Asisazi isinqumo sitheni.
Angazi ukuthi uzobuya kuqhutshekwe kanjani nokusebenza ngoba sekunje.
Kuyimanje asitsheliwe ukuthi izinhlelo zizoma kanjani, sizwa emaphepheni yize umhlaka 1 useduzane," kusho umthombo.UMmoni uthe akukho ukuthi imimoya iphezulu kuKhozi FM futhi bayamthemba uSbongi.
Kuvalwa izitolo zomculo iMusica
ISIKHULU seRecording Industry of South Africa (RiSA) uNhlanhla Sibisi, sithi mkhulu umthelela ozoba khona ngokuvalwa kwesitolo esidayisa umculo iMusica.Ngokwesitatimende seClicks Group ephethe iMusica, kuvalwe izitolo ezingu-19 ekuqaleni konyaka wezimali futhi zingu-59 izitolo ezivuliwe okwamanje.Ngokubika kweReuters, iClicks Group ithe izitolo ezisele zizovalwa uma sekuphela izimvume zokusebenza emabhilidini ezikuwo ezinyangeni ezine ezizayo.
"Into ebuhlungu kakhulu lena," kusho uSibisi.
"Asikahlangani njengebhodi sikhulume kodwa isiphathe kabi le nto.
Sizohlangana siludingide lolu daba.
""Ukudayiswa kwamaCD bekulokhu kwehla minyaka yonke, ngicabanga ukuthi kungenisa imali elinganiselwa kuR90 million ngonyaka.
Inkinga ukuthi umculo wesintu awukakangeni ezitolo ezi-digital.
Kunama-albhamu ongeke uwathole digital kodwa owathola ezitolo okungeke kusenzeka manje.
Ama-albhamu amaningi omculo wokholo athengwa koMusica.
Umculo wesiBhunu nawo ubusagoloza ukungena kwi-digital futhi yingakho abantu bakhona abaningi bebethenga ezitolo," kuchaza uSibisi.Uthe yize befuna ukuthi abantu bathuthele ezitolo ezi-digital kodwa kusenezingqinamba eziningi.
"Abantu abaningi bayahluleka ukusebenzisa i-data ukuthenga noma ukulalela umculo.
Ukulalela umculo online ezindaweni ezifanele njengoSpotify yinto enhle esiyigqugquzelayo.
Ukubiza kwe-data kodwa yinto eyinkinga ngoba uma ishibhile abantu bazothenga noma balalele khona singabi khona isidingo sokukokotela ngoba kukhona izinkundla zokulalela mahhala kodwa  zifuna i-data kuphela.
"Uthe kumele baqale bakhulume nezinkampani ze-network ukuze itholakale yonke indawo kungabi khona izindawo enqamuka kuzo futhi ne-data ishibhe.
"Kumele ngabe siyakhala njengeNingizimu Afrika ngoba umculo uwusiko lwethu.
Asithembe kodwa ukuthi abaculi bazidayisele kuzokhula kodwa inkinga ukuthi bazogayaphi ngoba nalezo zinkampani kade zavala kusele ezincane.
Kumele sikhulume nohulumeni sithole izindlela zokusebenzisana futhi sikhulume neziteshi zemisakazo ukuthi azidlale kakhulu umculo wakithi.
Iziteshi zezifunda nazo azandise umculo wezifunda ezizisakazelayo."

UTHEMBISA ukuveza okukhulu ngendawo ayilingisayo kaPastor Charles, emdlalweni wethelevishini iDiepCity kuMzansi Magic, uChrispen Nyathi (27).UChrispen odabuka KwaBulawayo, eZimbabwe kodwa osezinze eNingizimu Afrika, uthi kuningi okuzovela ngabafundisi bamanga nemikhuba engcolile abayenzayo becasha ngokholo.“ Okwamanje abantu basabona uPastor ozilungele kodwa kusazovela okukhulu ngale ndawo.

Ngize ngaba nenhlanhla ngo-2019 ngithola indawo emfishane kwifilimu yaseHollywood, iRogue.
Emva kwalokho ngiphinde ngathola iziqephu ezine kwiThe Queen,” kulandisa umlingisi.Uthe emva kokuvela kwiThe Queen  uthathe isinqumo sokuthi angabe esavuma ukunikwa indawo yokuba wumlingisi owengeziwe emidlalweni, kanti uzoba nenhlanhla yokuthathwa kwiDiepCity.Indawo ayilingisayo uthe isondelene nempilo yakhe yangempela njengoba ekhonza ebandleni labasindisiwe iPentecostal Church, elixube izinhlanga ezehlukene.

Ubavale umlomo uRasta ngemidwebo yeSilo
UBAVALE umlomo abantu abamphendule ihlaya ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uRasta wodumo lokudweba osaziwayo etheleka kwaKhethomthandayo, KwaNongoma, ngoLwesine nemidwebo egculise abaningi yeSilo Samabandla.
ULebani “Rasta” Sirenji uqunge isibindi wahambela le ndawo ngesikhathi kunenkonzo yesikhumbuzo seSilo, wamukelwa kahle amabutho ejabulela imidwebo yakhe, amanye aze acela ukushutha izithombe naye.
Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngemuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokukhothama kweSilo uRasta wayexwayisiwe ukuthi angalinge adlalele kwiSilo ngemidwebo yakhe.
Kuze kwaqala ukusabalala kwezithombe okungezona ezakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuthiwa zidwetshwe nguyena, kodwa ubezimisele ngokuhlonipha Isilo, wacela abantu bamnikeze ithuba lokuqedela imidwebo yakhe yangempela.
Ekhuluma nesinye seziteshi zethelevishini uveze ukuthi bekungelula ukuthatha isinqumo sokuya KwaNongoma.
Nemdwebo yakhe ubebambe umoya ngayo kwazise uvamise ukugxekwa.
Izolo ekhuluma naleli phephandaba ukuvezile ukuthi abantu bayathanda ukwenza ihaba ngomsebenzi wakhe nokumenza agcine esethola nabagxekayo baze bamsabise.
Lokhu uthe akwehli kahle ngoba naye uyazizamela futhi ukwenza ngothando.
Isilomo somculi sishonelwe ugogo waso
UQALE unyaka ngezindaba ezingezinhle umculi waseThekwini kulandela ukushona kukagogo wakhe obesondelene naye kakhulu.
USnenhlanhla Sneziey Msomi owaduma kuma Idols SA, uveze ukuthi ugogo wakhe akasekho emhlabeni.
Ufake umbhalo nesithombe ebonakala ebambe ugogo wakhe uNkk Fikile Msomi (63) kubukeka sengathi ingesikhathi elele esibhedlela.
USneziey uthe ugogo wakhe ubenenkinga kashukela obungasalawuleki.Ebhala emakhasini akhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uveze ukuthi uzobambelela emkhulekweni njengoba kade benza nogogo wakhe esaphila.
"Kodwa sthandwa sami wangishiya, impela unguJehova othembekile.
Ngizobambelela emagameni omthandazo wethu wokugcina.
Ngizohlale ngikuthanda," kusho uSneziey.
Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi nangesikhathi ephezu komkhankaso wama-Idols SA, lo mculi wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi konke anakho yingenxa kagogo wakhe.Ukushona kukagogo kaSneziey kuthinte izinhliziyo zabantu abaningi njengoba bebazi ukuthi basondelene kangakanani.
Amazwi enduduzo nemiyalezo eyakhayo bekulokhu kungene njalo emakhasini alo mculi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezahlukene okubalwa uFacebook no-Instagram.

Lo wesifazane osesabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ezahlukene uveza ukuthi yena wamthwala izinyanga eziwu-9 uMampintsha kodwa usezoshiwa ngaphandle uma sebeshada.Ukhala ngokuthi uBabes Wodumo “uyisikhathi sini” njengoba esetshelwa ukuthi womenywa ngomshado omhlophe.

Umakoti uthi thina asigcine ukufika noma sofika ngomshado omhlophe.

Angibazi," kusho lo wesifazane.Eqhuba usole nabantu abaqopha lolu hlelo, Uthando Lodumo, okulindeleke ukuthi lukhonjiswe kwithelevishini, ukuthi abanalo iqiniso ngoba bekumele konke kuqale kuye kubekhona nakukhokhelwayo njengokuvela kwakhe ohlelweni.

Ngeke usindisiwe ushadele kubantu abakholelwa emadlozini abangasindisiwe bese ubungqo," kusho lo wesifazane.Uphinde washiya angalazi kuyise kaMampintsha amsola ngokuthi isigebengu esidala esasintshontsha esesiqhamuka nezihlobo zaseChesterville angazazi.
Uthe ukutheleka kulo mshado egqoke ophaca ukwenze ngenhloso ngoba bakhohlisiwe kwathiwa bazothengelwa izingubo kodwa lutho.
Uyise kaMampintsha uthe ugijime wahamba nonkosikazi wakhe ngasese kanti nabazali bakaBabes ubasola ngokuba yizigebengu ngoba bekumele bakhulume naye kuboniswane.Uphethe ngokuthi akamfuni noma ambone uBabes futhi akakufihli lokhu ufisa kwaziwe yizwe lonke ngoba abanalo iqiniso nomndeni wakhe.

UPhumeza nohlelo lokusiza izingane ezalahlwa abazali
IZINGANE ezingakaze zihlangane nabazali bazo, abazilahla zincane zizobonakala zizama ukubathola futhi zifuna ukuhlanganiswa nabo ohlelweni oluthi Abandoned.Lolu hlelo oluzokwethulwa nguPhumeza Mdabe, luzoqala ngoLwesibili oluzayo kuMzansi Magic (161), ngo-8 ebusuku.Ezinye zalezi zingane zakhulela emakhaya ezintandane ezinye emgwaqweni, zizothola ithuba lokubonakala zihamba noPhumeza zifuna abazali nemindeni yazo.
UPhumeza uthe ukujabulele ukuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo oluzoletha ukukhanya ezimpilweni zezingane ezidinga ukwazi ngomsuka wazo.
“Intsha esizoyisiza kakhulu eyatholwa ilahlwe emapaki, eziteshini zezitimela nezamabhasi, eyashiywa ezikhungweni ezahlukene zezintandane ezifuna ukwazi kabanzi ukuthi umsuka wazo ukuphi.
Ohlelweni kuzobonakala intsha eyalahlwa omama noma obaba ngezizathu  esingazazi.
Sifuna ukubasiza njengoba sonke kusijabulisa ukuthi sazi ukuthi sisuka kuphi singobani.
Nathi siyathemba ukuthi mkhulu umehluko esizowenza,” kuchaza uPhumeza.Uveze ukuthi lolu hlelo luzoba neziqephu ezingu-13, wathi okuzophinde kubonakale ngabazali abaphisana ngezingane, nabo befuna ukuhlangana nazo, ukuze bazazi.UNomsa Philiso obhekelele izinhlelo zakuleli kwaM-Net, uveze ukuthi ngolunye uhlelo olusha lolu abajabule ngalo njengoMzansi Magic.
“Uhlelo luzobathinta kakhulu abantu bakuleli ngoba kulona kuzobonakala izinto ezithinta umphefumulo kakhulu.
Siyathemba ukuthi abazobonakala kulona bazokuthola konke abakudingayo.
Siyabamema ababukeli bethu ukuthi bajabulele olunye uhlelo lwethu esaziyo ukuthi ngeke luze lubaphoxe,“ kusho uNomsa.
Uthe intsha ebabizile ohlelweni izobeka ababukeli esithombeni ngokuthi ibiyenzani ekukhuleni kwayo, futhi ikhulele kuphi kanjani.
Uthi uma sebemtholile umzali yilapho, eyobe esephendula yonke imibuzo ayobe eyibuzwa yingane yakhe, neyaholela ekutheni aze ayilahle.

Ibuya nokuhlukile ifilimu ebophele osaziwayo
ABALANDELI befilimu ethi Happiness is a Four Letter Word, bazokujabulela ukuzwa izindaba zokubuya kwale filimu esishintshe igama njengoba isizokwaziwa ngeHappiness Ever After.Ifilimu i-Happiness Ever After, izoqhubeka lapho  kwagcina khona i-Happiness is a Four Letter Word, njengoba ibophele abalingisi okukhona kubo uKhanyi Mbau noRenate Stuurman.Ifilimu yakamuva isuselwe encwadini ethi Happiness Ever After, ebhalwe uNozizwe Cynthia Jele.UNozizwe uveze ukuthi le filimu izoqhubeka ithathe izinhliziyo zabantu abaningi njengoba ibheka izihloko ezimnandi okukhona kuzo ezithinta uthando  nobungani.
“Kodwa ke kulokhu ababukeli bangalindela isiphetho esihle njengoba kuzoba khona abantu abazoba sothandweni olusha, okuyinto ababukeli abangayilindela ngamehlo abomvu njengoba kuzoba yinto ebingalindelekile nezoshiya abaningi bemangele,” kuchaza yena.
UKhanyi Mbau uveze ukuthi yize ifilimu yokuqala ihlukile kancane kule ncwadi okususelwe kuyo eyakamuva, kodwa ukubuya kwabalingisi abadala kuzokwenza ithakaselwe futhi basheshe babone ukuthi iya kuphi.
“Abakubona kwifilimu yokuqala nale entsha kuzobajabulisa kakhulu njengoba kuzoba yinjabulo yodwa ehambisana nezigigaba ezehlukene.
Sifuna ukuthatha ababukeli nabalandeli bethu sibanike into entsha.
Abantu ababuka ifilimu ethi Happiness is a Four Letter Word uma sekuqala le bazobuyiselwa eminyakeni emihlanu edlule ngokuthi kwagcinaphi bese siya kokusha okuqhubekayo manje,” kuphetha uKhanyi.AbakwaNetflix baveze ukuthi bamatasa baqopha le filimu manje eGoli, futhi maduze bazomemezela ukuthi izobonakala nini esiteshini sabo.
Owekwaito uthi akaxoshwe ungqongqoshe
WILLEM PHUNGULASEYINYUKELE kwelinye igiya impi ephakathi kukaNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko namaSiko uMnuz Nathi Mthethwa nomculi wekwaito u-Eugene Mthethwa.Lo makadebona emculweni usemkhankasweni wokuxoshisa ungqongqoshe njengoba ematasatasa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana enxenxa umengameli wezwe ukuba akhombe ungqongqoshe indlela eza ngayo.
U-Eugene uyilungu leqembu lekwaito iTrompies aphinde ahole inhlangano yabaculi iSouth African Music Industry Council.
Yize impi yakhe nongqongqoshe isuka kude kodwa seyidlulele kwelinye izinga njengoba esezama ukumxoshisa.
Akananazi ezinkundleni zokuxhuma ukuthi kumele umengameli amxoshe uMthethwa.
Uthi eminyakeni eyisikhombisa eqhoqhobele le sikhundla akukho akwenzele abaculi, wabe esemfanisa nento efile.
Uwaphindile amagama akhe ngesikhathi enengxoxo nesiteshi i-Newzroom Afrika.Ephawula ngalokhu uThokozani “Tzozo” Zulu ongumholi wamaciko KwaZulu-Natal, uthe kumshaqise kakhulu okushiwo u-Eugene ngongqongqoshe.
Uthe uMthethwa ubengungqongqoshe wokuqala ukwakha inhlangano eyodwa emele yonke imikhakha embonini yezobuciko, iCCFSA.
UT’zozo uthe yize abaculi bengeneme ngemigomo yezentela abayibekelwe uhulumeni ngesikhathi befaka izicelo zezibonelelo ngokuvalwa kwezwe kodwa bebesasebenza kahle nongqongqoshe ukulungisa isimo.
Uthe ukholwa ukuthi u-Eugene unempi yakhe yedwa nongqongqoshe engahlangane namaciko.
Uthe bekufanele ngabe uqale waxoxisana nabo ukuzwa uvo lwabo ngaphambi kokuba akhankasele ukuxoshwa kukangqongqoshe.“Kuyasixaka okushiwo u-Eugene.
NgoDisemba besinaye engqungqutheleni yokwakha imigomo yeCCFSA ayingxenye yayo.
Nguye owayephethe uhlelo kukhona ungqongqoshe noNdunankulu uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, kodwa akazange asho lutho,” kusho uT’zozo.Akukhona okokuqala la madoda akwaMthethwa ebhekane ngeziqu zamehlo.
Ngo-2019, emngcwabeni kamadebona womculo uDan Ntshanda, u-Eugene kuthiwa wamemezela ukuthi uthole ngezinhloli ukuthi angawuhambeli umgubho we-ANC wokuqeda iminyaka ewu-107 ngoba ungqongqoshe umkhandele itulo lokumsoconga.
Ungqongqoshe waphuthuma enkantolo wafaka amaphepha okwehliswa isithunzi ngu-Eugene, wagcina ngokwehlela ngezansi waxolisa lo mculi.
Kuwo lo mngcwabo u-Eugene kuthiwa wathi isizathu esenza uNgqongqoshe Mthethwa amzonde yingoba utshele umengameli wezwe ukuthi ungqongqoshe uxhaphaza imali yabakhokhi bentela benoTony Kgoroge  owayengumholi weCCFSA ngalelo sikhathi.

Kumnadi futhi kuhamba kahle emshadweni wabo
ABASHADIKAZI abancane abaduma ohlelweni Isencane Lengane, olukhuza ibuya kuMoja Love (DStv 157) , bathi ingane ayikakabi sezinhlelweni zabo yize beqeda iminyaka emithathu bashada.USiyacela Dlamuka noThando MaThabethe, asebeneminyaka engu-19, bazakhela udumo ngohlelo lwethelevishini Isencane Lengane, lapho beveza khona impilo yabo yokuthembisana umshado, kwaze kwba bayashada yize babesebancane.Isizini yesibili yohlelo lwabo izoqala ukubonakala ngoJuni kanti sebeqalile ukuqopha.Ekhuluma nephephandaba uSiyacela owayeneminyaka engu-16 ngesizini yokuqala, uthi imnandi impilo yasemshadweni futhi bayajabula ukuthi uhlelo lwabo seluyabuya kumabonakude.“Imnandi impela impilo yasemshadweni.
Ngeledlule besiqeda iminyaka emithathu sashada futhi sisahleli kahle.
Abantu bazozibonela konke okuqhubekayo uma seluqala ukukhonjiswa uhlelo lwethu,” kusho uSiyacela.Kuke kwaba nemibiko yokuthi imbangela yokuyeka kukaSiyacela isikole kwakungukuthi wayezela esikoleni ngoba ethi akalali ebusuku ebhizi nezinto ezenziwa ngabantu abashadile.
Ebuzwa ngokushiya kwakhe isikole emuva kokushada uthe akazisoli ngesinqumo sakhe njengoba eseqalile ukufundela umsebenzi wezandla.
Ngesikhathi bethintwa bebehleli ndawonye nomkakhe, nokuyilapho edlulisele kuyena ucingo uma ebuzwa ngaye.
UThando owenza ibanga leshumi kulo nyaka, uthe alikho elibi emshadweni kanti nasesikoleni usaqhuba kahle.“Ngifuna ukwenza izifundo zosonhlalakahle uma ngiphothula u-matric wami ngoba vele ngiyabathanda abantu nokubasiza,” usho kanje uThando.Uthe ukuthola umntwana akukho ezinhlelweni zabo okwamanje kwazise usazimisele ngokuqeda izifundo zakhe kuqala ngaphambi kokuba baqale umndeni.Uveze nokuthi leli gxathu alithatha lokushada uSiyacela, lamsiza kokunye njengoba nasesikoleni esezifundise ukuthi angabinabo abangani kodwa abenabantu azwana nabo nje.
Uhlelo lwabo lagxekwa ngabanye ababukeli ngenxa yeminyaka yalaba bashadikazi nangenxa yokwakwenzeka kulona.Laba bashadikazi babopha ifindo likasofasilahlane ngo-Ephreli wango-2019 kanti bobabili babefunda eNdlovana High, oLundi.

Kunalokho siphe abalaleli bethu abangu-15 uR1 500, ngamunye futhi kunabazohlomula ngemali yokukhulisa amabhizinisi abo," kusho uKhulekani.UPhinda Magwaza oyiHead of Brand, uthe amabhizinisi amaningi amancane ashayekile ngenxa yomvalelandlini futhi babone kungcono ukuthi bafake isandla ukuze asimame.
"Iqiniso ukuthi amabhizinisi amancane ondla imindeni eminingi emakhaya aselokishini.
Uma ucabanga amabhizinisi anjengezindawo zokucwala izinwele, ama-tuckshop namanye amabhizinisi aselokishini, aqasha abantu abasha abaningi nabazali abondla imindeni yabo," kusho uPhinda.Uthe lo mncintiswano wenzelwe bonke osomabhizinisi baKwaZulu-Natal abafuna uxhaso lwemali ukuze baqhube amabhizinisi abo.UKhulekani uthe amabhizinisi azothola uR15 000 ngalinye futhi bazokhetha amathathu.
Uthe abanikazi bawo noma amakhasimende angabhala achaze ngebhizinisi abona lidinga uxhaso bese ethola ifomu elikwi-website yabo noma emakhasini abo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthe abaphumelele bazomenyezelwa ohlelweni luka-Alex Mthiyane Indaba.
Uqhube wathi ngeke bagcine ngokuwasiza ngemali kodwa bazophinde bawavakashele basakaze khona ukuze bawamakethe.

Ngizolanda imali nemoto yami kubo," kusho uThah.Uthe kuyamjabulisa ukuthi ekugcineni uzobonakala kuZalo nokuyinto ayeyifisa kusukela umdlalo uqala.

Ubonakale nasohlelweni oluveza ngempilo kaShauwn, iKwaMaMkhize.
"Lokhu okwenzeka empilweni yami kukhombisa ukuthi yonke into inesikhathi sayo.
Izinto angisaziphoqi manje, ziyazenzakalela nokukhombisa ukukhula.
NakwiDurban Gen ngingase ngibonakale.
Ngibuye ngamandla, abantu basazongibona," kuphetha uThah.Imizamo yokuthola ukuthi uThah uzoqala nini ukubonakala igcine ingaphumelelanga njengoba okhulumela umdlalo, uNomfundo Zondi, engayiphendulanga i-email athunyelelwe yona ngoLwesihlanu.
Uzizwa ebusisekile ngokupikwa wuBlack Coffee
UKUZWAKALA kwenye yezingoma ezisecwecweni elisha likaBlack Coffee, kumenza azizwe ebusisekile umculi odabuka eThekwini, osesebenze nabaculi abaningi bakuleli abanohlonze.UTellaman (29), ogama lakhe langempela nguThelumusa Owen, uthi kumhlaba umxhwele ukuthi sigcine sifezekile isifiso sabo sokusebenzisana.“Siqale ngo-2008 ukuxoxa ngokusebenza ndawonye noBlack Coffee kodwa iphupho lethu selize lafezeka emuva kwesikhathi,” usho kanje.UTellaman ucula engomeni ethi Flava ekwi-albhamu entsha kaBlack Coffee, iSubconsciously.
Uveze ukuthi sonke lesi sikhathi bebengayitholi ingoma ebibagculisa bobabili, okugcine ngokuthi amthumele izinsimbi azithandile ekuqaleni konyaka odlule.Eqhuba uthe umatasa e-studio nokuqopha izingoma ezizozwakala kwi-albhamu yakhe yesibili, abheke ukuyikhipha kulo nyaka.“Ihlukile yona kunale yokuqala.
Kule, ngikhuluma ngezimo zempilo engidlule kuzona kanjalo nezabantu engisondelene nabo,” kusho uTellaman.Ephawula ngesimo seCovid-9, uthe yonke into inobuhle nobubi bayo.
“Nakusona lesi simo kubi ukuthi kukhona abangazange besakwazi ukuqhubeka nezinhlelo zabo eziningi, njengokwakha imizi nokunye ngenxa yokushoda kwemali kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi kukhona nokuhle okuphume kusona,” kusho yena.Uthe okuhle kube wukuthi umuntu ngamunye uthole ithuba lokuzihlolisisa ukuthi empeleni yikuphi okumele azithuthukise kukona noma akwenze kangcono njengenqubekela phambili.Lo mculi useke wasebenzisana ezingomeni nabaculi uNasty C, Shekhinah, DJ Speedsta, Aewon Wolf,  Gemini Major noShane Eagle.
Uthembisa lukhulu kwiThe River
INKAKHA yomlingisi uSeputla Sebogodi, iveze ukuthi indawo yayo kwisizini yesine yomdlalo iThe River ezoqala ngoMsombuluko, izoletha into abantu abangayilindele.USeputla ulingisa indawo kaMohumi Ditshwene, ongubaba kaTumi, obuye ngoba ezoziphindiselela kuLindiwe Dikana (Sindi Dlathu).
Uqale ukubonakala kulo mdlalo ngonyaka odlule, nalapho avela khona amasonto amabili wanyamalala.Kulo nyaka uphinde wavela, lapho Isolezwe lihabule ukuthi usebuye unomphela kulo mdlalo ngeke esanyamalala.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uSeputla, uthe indawo yakhe usuku nosuku izoshiya ababukeli bomdlalo bebambe ongezansi.“Lona ngomunye wemidlalo engadumazi nakancane, ukuba yingxenye yawo nje kusho lukhulu kimi.
Indawo kaMohumi izokhula kule sizini yesine ezoqala, futhi uzoqhubeka nokuba yisitha sikaLindiwe, ngoba kuningi afuna ukuziphindiselela ngakho kuye.
Ngiyabathembisa ababukeli ukuthi abaqhubeke nokubuka mdlalo ngoba kusazoshuba,“ kusho eSeputla.Uveze ukuthi nokuba seduzane nendodana yakhe uThapelo (Khabzela) nayo elingisa kulo mdlalo, kumenze wathokoza emoyeni.“Yize ngangingathandi angene kulo mkhakha wokulingisa ngenxa yezingqinamba engizaziyo, kodwa ukumbona enza kahle kangaka kuyangijabulisa.
Ngangifuna abe emkhakheni wamabhange abale izimali, ngoba wayenza kahle kuMaths nakuPhysics esikoleni.
Siyathemba ukuthi abantu bazoqhubeka nokuthakasela umsebenzi wethu sesindawonye,“ kuchaza yena.Isolezwe lihabule ukuthi kule sizini ziyanda izitha zikaLindiwe kunakuqala futhi uzojikelwa nangumyeni wakhe uZweli (Hlomla Dandala).Umthombo uphinde waveza nokuthi uTumi (Larona Moagi), uyashiya kulo mdlalo kanti kuzoba nomshado lapho kuzoba nesidumo, bese kufa othile.

APHELILE amahlathi okucasha kumsakazi woKhozi FM uSipho "DJ Sgqemeza" Mbatha obese kuphele isikhathi efunwa yisikhonzi senkantolo ngenxa yokukweleta kwakhe uMnyango wezobuCiko namaSiko KwaZulu-Natal imali elinganiselwa ku-R400 000.USgqemeza, owethula uhlelo lwasekuseni phakathi nesonto kulesi siteshi, utholwe yisikhonzi emsebenzini ngoLwesine ekuseni wanikwa amasamanisi ukuba awasayine.Inhloko yalo mnyango uNtokozo Chonco, ithe udaba lusukela ku-2017 lapho kwenzeka khona iphutha uSgqemeza wakhokhelwa imali engaphezu kwaleyo umnyango owawuzomnika yona.

"Kwenzeka iphutha isisebenzi esiseyithwasa sakhokha imali engaphezu kwaleyo okwakumele ayithole.

"NgoMashi 2020 sibe sesithatha isinqumo sokuthi ngoba akasayikhokhi imali esele futhi asisamtholi, sathi asimthumelele amasamanisi ekhaya kodwa nakhona singamtholi ngoba sengathi washintsha indawo yokuhlala.
Sigcine sesithi akukho okunye esingakwenza sizombheka emsebenzini.
Utholakele namhlanje (ngoLwesine) wasayina into yakhona.
Imali esikhuluma ngayo lapha ilinganiselwa kuR400 000.
"UChonco uthe iphutha laba ngasemnyangweni ngokuthi isisebenzi sabo sifake "o-zero abangaphezulu".
"Amaphutha anjengalawa akuwona ajwayelekile kodwa akuyona into ongeke uyilindele ukuthi ingenzeka.
Nakweminye iminyango kuyenzeka.
Isisebenzi esenza lelo phutha sesaqondiswa ubugwegwe ngokomnyango sathola incwadi yesexwayiso ngoba kwakungokokuqala.
"Kuthiwa ngesikhathi isikhonzi senkantolo nommeli womnyango bezama ukusayinisa uSgqemeza amasamanisi, onogada bazamile ukubavimba kodwa kwaze kwangenela abaphathi wagcina ewasayinile.Ethintwa uSgqemeza uphikile ukuthi uthole amasamanisi.Uphike nokuthi wakhokhelwa imali engu-R4 million kunoR400 000.Uchithe nokuthi ukweleta lo mnyango uR421 000.Kuthiwa uzovela enkantolo maduze.

UMnyango unikele ngezinsiza zokuziqeqesha kumabhokisa
UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMidlalo nobuCiko KwaZulu-Natal, uHlengiwe Mavimbela, ubalule ukubaluleka kwesithunzi samabhokisa  eyodlulisela izinsiza zokujima emajimini ahlukene ngempelasonto.UMavimbela ubekhuluma KwaNongoma ngesikhathi eyodlulisela izimpahla zokuziqeqesha zesibhakela kubaqeqeshi besibhakela abaphuma emajimini angu-10 kwangu-15 akulesi sifundazwe ngoMgqibelo.
Lo mcimbi obukade useNongoma Inn, ubuhanjelwe nayizingwevu zesibhakela u-Elijah "Tap Tap" Makhathini noThulani "Sugarboy" Malinga owaba ngowokuqala eMzansi ukuwina ibhande le-World Boxing Council (WBC).UMavimbela uqoke ukuwenzela KwaNongoma lo mcimbi ngenhloso yokuhlonipha uphromotha ongasekho uThulani Magudulela weLudonga Boxing Promotions, wakhona eHlalankosi obezinikele ethuthukisa ezamankomane kule ndawo.UMagudulela ushone kulo nyaka ngemuva kokugula isikhashana.Phakathi kwezinsiza uMnyango onikele ngazo kukhona ama-puching bag, amagilavu, ama-pads, gumshield nokunye.
"Silapha ukuzobuyisa isithunzi nokuzethemba kubashayisibhakela bakithi, ophromotha nabaqeqeshi.
UNdunankulu (uSihle Zikalala) usinikeze umsebenzi ngokuthi nakuba lona kuwumnyango wezeMidlalo nezokuNgcebeleka kodwa kubonakala sengathi ezemidlalo zigxile ohlobeni oluthize lwezemidlalo, zishiye ngaphandle olunye.
Ubeke eqhulwini isibhakela ne-karate.
Wengeza ngekhilikithi nombhoxo.
Kodwa esho lokho engasho ukuthi lena ekhona esiyibonayo sisenza kahle kuyona kufanele ifadabale kodwa ayidlondlobale," kusho uMavimbela.
"Ezamankomane zingomunye wemidlalo othi uma ngabe wenziwe kahle abantu bakhona bekwazi ukuphila impilo ngisho sebeyekile ukungena eringini.
Yingakho sithi ngeke sikwazi ukuba nobuhlakani obungaphezu kwesingabuthola kubaba uTap Tap nakubaba uMalinga abebekade beseringini.
Sithe uma sizulazula sazibona izinselelo ukuthi ziningi.
Sibonile ukuthi azikho izakhiwo okufanele bazisebenzise uma beziqeqesha.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, azikho nezinto okufanele bajime ngazo.
Abanye basebenzisa amasaka afakwe inhlabathi kube yi-punching bag.
Uyabona ukuthi bungakanani ubuhlungu ibhokisa elibhekana nabo ngoba umqeqeshi eqonde ukukhipha uhlobo lomshayisibhakela esilulindele.
Sibonile ukuthi njengoMnyango wezeMidlalo nokuNgcebeleka kubalulekile ukuthi singenelele.
"UNgqongqoshe uphinde waphakamisa ukuthi, ngesikhathi kusalindwe ukwakhiwa kwezakhiwo zokuziqeqesha, amabhokisa awazisebenzise izakhiwo zomasipala ezinjengamahholo omphakathi.
"Ezinye izinselelo esizibonile wukuthi bakhona abanentshisekelo (yesibhakela) kodwa izindawo zokuziqeqesha asinazo ngempela.
Ayikho into ebuhlungu njengokweswela indawo yokujima ngoba iyona eshoyo ukuthi uzophuma ubengumuntu onjani.
Indawo yokujima ilekelela ekutheni uthole nabaxhasi.
Uma ungenayo indawo yokujima esezingeni kwenza ubukeleke phansi," kusho uMavimbela.Omunye wabaqeqeshi abahlomulile, uSimangenduku Magwaza waseMandeni uthe basizakele kakhulu.
"Lezi zinsizwa zizosilekelela kakhulu.
Bheka nje besingasenawo ngisho amagilavu.
Besingasenalutho.
Kodwa manje isimo sizobangcono kakhulu.
Kodwa inkinga esibhekene nayo kakhulu eyendawo yokujima," kusho uMagwaza.
