UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs uGavin Hunt ukhethe ukugwinya itshe ngokuphazamisa umgqigqo weqembu lakhe kulandela ukushaywa yiChippa United esezembeni emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ngoLwesithathu ntambama eFNB Stadium.
IChippa inqobe lo mdlalo ngegoli likaBienvenu Eva Nga ngomzuzu ka-84, obekusaphele imizuzwana engenile enkundleni.
IChilli Boys ishaya iChiefs nje leli qembu laseNaturena belisandizela phezulu kulandela ukushaya ompetha beligi abasesicongwnei iMamelodi Sundowns, ebingakayinuki induku kule sizini.
Emdlalweni emihlanu edlule iChiefs inqobe owodwa, yadlala ngokulingana kwemibili, yadliwa kabili.
Ebuzwa ngenkinga yomgqigqo weChiefs ngemuva komdlalo uHunt uphendule kanje: “Nginempendulo elula kodwa angikwazi ukuyisho.
Yimpendulo elula kodwa.
Uma uliqonda ibhola uzokwazi ukuthi ngithini...kodwa nje impendula ilula,” kusho uHunt.
“Kodwa ke balwile.
Besiphethe ibhola ngasebhokisini labo isikhathi esiningi, kumele sifake iphasi yokugcina.
Kumele ibe ngcono iphasi yokugcina...kodwa uma sikhuluma ngomgqigqo, iyodwa impendulo.” UHunt uvumile ukuthi kunenkinga uma iqembu lakhe lizolawula umdlalo ngendlela eliwulawule ngayo kodwa lahluleka ukuvalela ibhola enethini.
Umphumela womdlalo wangoLwesithathu ugudluze iChiefs kunombolo 8 kwi-log wayibeka endaweni yesishiyagalolunye, kodwa isanomdlalo esandleni.
IChiefs izobhekana neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni olandelayo ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.
UNcikazi uchazekile  ngokwenziwe yi-Arrows
XOLILE MPISANEUBONGA uyanconcoza umqeqeshi weLamontville Golden Arrows, uMandla Ncikazi, njengoba leli qembu liqophe umlando liqeda endaweni yesine kwiDStv Premiership ka-2020/21 esongwe ngoMgqibelo.Abafana Bes’thende badlale ngokulingana ngo-0-0 neStellenbosch FC eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, baqeda isizini namaphuzu awu-47.
Ngesizini edlule baphelela endaweni yesi-12 namaphuzu awu-34.“Umdlalo wokugcina neStellenbosch ubunzima kakhulu.
Izitayela zethu zokudlala bezishayisana.
Thina besilibamba ibhola futhi sizama ukushaya amagoli kodwa bekusobala ukuthi bona bebezele iphuzu.
Bebezihlalele emuva bese bezama ukusizuma ngejubane, uma bethola ibhola,” kusho uNcikazi.“Bekulukhuni ukudiliza udonga abalwakhe emuva.
Sizamile ukubahlasela ezinhlangothini, sazama nokudlala ibhola eliphezulu kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.
Ngingasho kodwa ukuthi sidlale kahle yize noma sigcine sihlulekile ukuthola igoli.
Ngiyaziqhenya ngabadlali nangendlela abazinikele ngayo.
Besinabadlali abawu-13 kuphela abebekulungele ukudlala, abanye sibafake belimele.
Ngingabala uMakhubela (Ntsako), uSibisi (Nkosinathi), uMtshali (Lindokuhle) noMathiane (Matome).“Uma unabadlali abenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi bangene enkundleni noma bengeluleme kahle, kukhombisa ukuthi iqembu linekusasa elihle.
Ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngala badlali.
Ngifisa ukuthi leli qembu liqhubeke lidlondlobale.”Abafana Bes’thende bebedinga ukuthi bawunqobe umdlalo wokugcina ukuze bazibeke ethubeni elihle lokuqeda endaweni yesithathu, obekuzoholela ekutheni babeyingxenye yomqhudelwano weCaf Confederation Cup.Ukudlala kwabo ngokulingana kwenze bahluleka ukudlula i-Orlando Pirates, egcine inamaphuzu awu-50.
Noma kunjalo uNcikazi uyaziqhenya ngokuthi bakwazile ukwephula irekhodi leqembu abalenza ngesizini ka-2008/09, beqeda endaweni yesihlanu namaphuzu awu-46, izintambo zisaphethwe nguManqoba Mngqithi.Okunye okumhlaba umxhwele uNcikazi ukubona abadlali bakhe bephakanyiswa ohlwini lwabadlali abebesethubeni lokuwina izindondo kumaPSL Awards, nokubona abanye bebizelwa emaqenjini esizwe.“Kuyangithokozisa ukuthi uSifiso (Mlungwana) usethubeni lokungena eqenjini lama-Olympics.
Ngiyajabula ukuthi uSibisi (Nkosinathi) ubiziwe eqenjini lesizwe iBafana Bafana.
Maningi amarekhodi esiwaphulile kule sizini.
Kuningi kakhulu okuhle esikwenzile.“Sidumele ngokuthi siphucwe iqatha emlonyeni sekusele kancane siyodlala e-Afrika kodwa ngisaziqhenya.
Ukuba kwakukhona owangibhulela kusaqala isizini, wangitshela ukuthi sizoqeda endaweni yesine ngangizojabula kabi.
Angifuni ukungeneliseki ngesikwenzile njengoba isiphelile isizini.“Ngiyaziqhenya futhi ngozakwethu ebesisebenzisana nabo ukuthi sithuthukise leli qembu.
Ngiyambonga nosihlalo (Mato Madlala) ngokungipha ithuba lokuqeqesha iqembu.
Ngiyethemba ukuthi sikwazile ukumjabulisa,” kusonga uNcikazi.
Sekuphenduka usiko ukuphuma kumuncu kwezintandokazi kwiMadrid
IQEMBU elikhulu kunawo wonke eSpain iReal Madrid lisaqhubeka nomlando walo wokuphetha kabi ubudlelwano nabadlali abayizintandokazi kubalandeli bayo.
Kuleli sonto zishaqise abaningi izindaba zokushiya kukakaputeni weminyaka kwiLos Blancos, uSergio Ramos, okuvele ukuthi ngeke ayithole inkontileka entsha kuleli qembu.
Izolo uRamos evalelisa eqenjini asehlale kulo iminyaka engu-16, uthe naye kumethusile uma etshelwa ukuthi inkontileka ebibekwe yiMadrid ukuthi ayisayine, ibiphelelwa yisikhathi.
“Into yokuqala engifisa ukuyisho ukuthi bengingafuni ukushiya.
Bengisafuna ukuhlala kwiMadrid.
Besinezingxoxo zokuthi kwelulwe inkontileka yami kodwa zaphazamiseka ngenxa yeCovid-19.
Bezilokhu zishintsha izinto ebesivumelana ngazo kodwa abakaze bangitshele ukuthi ngizophelelwa yisikhathi sokusayina inkontileka entsha,” kuchaza uRamos.URamos (35), uthe iMadrid imnikeze inkontileka yonyaka owodwa ehambisana nokuncishiselwa umholo.
Uthe ubenganankinga nokuncipha komholo kodwa ubefisa kube yinkontileka yeminyaka emibili ukuze ezokhululeka benomndeni wakhe.
Iphephandaba laseMadrid, iMarca libika ukuthi leli qembu lihoxise inkontileka uRamos esevumile ukuyisayina.
URamos unqobe izindebe eziwu-22 eminyakeni ayidlalele iMadrid.
Kulezo zindebe kubalwa ama-UEFA Champions League amane, izicoco zeLa Liga ezinhlanu, amaClub World Cup amane kanye nezinkomishi ezimbili zeCopa Del Rey.
Ushiya leli qembu nje, seliqala ukuzakhela umlando ngokuphetha kabi ubudlelwano balo nabadlali abayizintandokazi kubalandeli beqembu.
Ngo-2018 kushiye cishe umdlali omkhulu kunabo bonke emlandweni waleli qembu, uChristiano Ronaldo, okwathusa abaningi ukuhamba kwakhe kwazise uhambe esayidabula inethi.
URonaldo uhambe kwiMadrid eshaye amagoli awu-451 emdlalweni ewu-438.
Ufike kwiSeria A washaya amagoli awu-21 kwisizini yakhe yokuqala kanti nakule sizini ephelelile ushaye into ecokeme elibasela izikhawu eziwu-29 ibhola enethini.
IMadrid ibiwadinga amagoli akhe kule sizini kwazise isishwebe kancane isicoco seligi kanti nakwiChampions League, kwacacela ngisho ingane incane ukuthi leli qembu ebeliphekwa wuZinadine Zidane, lishoda ngamagoli phambili.
Sisakhuluma ngamagoli, omunye umdlali olaxazwe yiMadrid kule sizini nguGareth Bale (31), ovutha engabaselwe emdlalweni yeEuro eqhubekayo njengamanje.
Lo mdlali ube nobudlelwano obubi noZidane owamfaka ohlwini lwabadlali afisa ukubadayisa, ukuze athole imali yokuthenga abadlali abasha.IMadrid yavimba isifiso sikaBale sokuyodlala eqenjini laseChina iJiangsu Suning ngo-2019, yajike yambolekisa kwiTottenham Hotspur kule sizini ephelile kulandela isikhathi ekhuhla ibhentshi.
Ngasemaphethelweni e-English Premier League, uBale ubengomunye wabadlali abayingozi phambi kwepali, okuyifomu aqhubeke phezu kwayo kwi-Euro.
Umqeqeshi okhuza ibuya kwiReal Madrid uCarlo Ancelotti, usheshe waphumela obala wathi uzomdinga uBale ngesizini ezayo, usezinhlelweni zakhe.
Ngenxa yobudlelwano obungebuhle phakathi kwabaphathi beqembu noBale akukacaci ukuthi lo mdlali uzimisele ngani ngesizini entsha.
Omunye umdlali ohambe kamuncu kuleli qembu nguMesut Ozil.
Lo mdlali kwethusa abaningi ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi usejoyina i-Arsenal.
U-Ozil wajoyina Ezimhlophe ngo-2010 esuka kwiWerder Bremen.
Ngesikhathi eshiya ngo-2013, uRonaldo wazwakalisa ukungenami ngokudayiswa kwakhe: “Ungenze ngaba wumdlali ongcono.
Uma udlala nabadlali abaseqopheleni eliphezulu nawe liyakhuphuka izinga lakhoU-Ozil uhambe kwi-Madrid enama-assist awu-61 kuyo yonke imidlalo ayidlalile kumasizini amathathu nokumenze wahamba esebizwa ngenkosi yama-assist.
IMadrid ibukhombisile ubunya nakonozinti.
Icishe ibe ngcono indlela okwahamba ngayo owayengukapteni u-Iker Cassilas kwazise wayesenamaphutha epalini futhi emmise kabi uDiego Lopes ngaphambi kokuthi leli qembu lisayinise uKeylor Navas.
UNavas washaya ingcwenga eminyakeni ayichithe kwiMadrid edla izicoco ezintathu ze-Eufa Champions League nesicoco esidowa seLa Liga kodwa naye washaywa ngesithende kalula sekufike unozinti omusha.
UNavas usedlalela iPSG eFrance.
Ekhuluma ngoMashi ngokudayiswa kwakhe wathi: “kunezinto ezenzeka engingazi zadalwa yini kodwa zenzeka.
Ngiyaye ngizame ukucabanga ngokuhle kuphela.
Ngikhumbula okuhle kuphela ngesikhathi sami noZidane, owayengilwela isikhathi esiningi futhi ngiyambonga ngokungethemba.
"IDiski Yomhlaba
Umqeqeshi weBucs usevivela eyamaqoqo yeCaf
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUKUBUYA kwabadlali ekulimaleni kususe ingcindezi kumqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uJosef Zinnbauer obhekene nomthwalo wokwenza kahle emiqhudelwaneni emithathu.EZimnyama ezibhaxabule iChippa United ngo-3-0 koweligi ngempelasonto eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eGqeberha, ngoLwesithathu, zizodlala owukuqala wamaqoqo eCaf Confederation Cup ne-ES Setif yase-Algeria ngo-9 ebusuku, e-Ohene Djan Sports Stadium, eGhana.KuGroup A, kukhona ne-Al-Ahly Benghazi yaseLibya ne-Enyimba yaseNigeria.NgoLwesithathu kuMashi 17, zizokwamukela i-Enyimba, e-Orlando Stadium.
Ngemuva kwalo mdlalo, zizobhekana neKaizer Chiefs koweDStv Premiership.Leli qembu libuye lazibekisela indawo kuma-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup.Ebuzwa uZinnbauer ukuthi kakumethusi yini ukudlala emiqhudelwaneni emithathu, uthe: "Kuzoba nzima kodwa okungijabulisayo wukubuya kwabadlali ekulimaleni.
Emasontweni edlule, bekungiphathisa ngekhanda ukushoda kwesikwati sami.
Benza kahle kakhulu oTshegofatso Mabasa, Gabadinho Mhango, Sam (Bongani) nabanye.
Nokho kumele sibanike isikhathi.
Kuhlale kuyinto ethokozisayo ukubona abadlali bebanga ijezi.
Ukuphelela kwesikwati sami kungenza ngikwazi ukulungiselela kahle yomithathu le miqhudelwano.
Ukudlala kule miqhudelwano kuzogqugquzela nabadlali bami.”Lo mqeqeshi ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi ukudlala kahle noma kabi kwezimbangi zakhe, iSundowns neChiefs kwiCaf Champions League akumfaki ngcindezi.
"Angibheki amanye amaqembu ukuthi adlala kanjani, okubalulekile kimina yiqembu lami.
Kuyajabulisa ukubona iqembu lakuleli linqoba emidlalweni yase-Afrika.
Ukwenza kahle e-Afrika, kwenza izwe lizethembe.
Abadlali bathole amava azosiza nakwiligi yakuleli,” kusho uZinnbauer.Emdlalweni wangempelasonto, eZimnyama bezinqoba okwesithathu kulandelana.
Zinyukele endaweni yesibili  kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-35, emuva kwemidlalo ewu-20.
Sezisele ngephuzu elilodwa kwiSundowns enemidlalo ewu-16.Mayelana nomdlalo weChippa, uZinnbauer uncome iqembu lakhe ngokudlala kahle.
"Kuyangijabulisa ukunqoba okwesithathu kulandelana nokuthola amaphuzu aphelele.
Udonga lwami lwasemuva lwenze kahle kakhulu.
UMakaringe (Fortune) noHotto (Deon) baphinde babhakuzisa inethi.
Kungijabulisile nokuthola kukaBen Motshwari igoli.
"Ngiyambongela ngokubizwa kwiBafana Bafana, kumfanele ukudlala eqenjini lesizwe.
Kula masonto edlule udlale kahle kakhulu.
Kuyajabulisa ukushaya kwakhe igoli  kungakapheli sikhathi esingakanani ebizwe kwelesizwe.”UDan " Dance" Malesela ocija amaChilli Boys, uthe: "Uma sizoqhubeka namaphutha anjena, impilo yethu izoba nzima.
Ukuba siye ekhefini sibambene ngeqanda nePirates bewungeke umdlalo uphele ngalo mphumela.
Kuningi okungahambanga kahle kulo mdlalo, kunabadlali abebecashile, bengawenzi umsebenzi wabo."
UMngqithi uphume nesifundo i-Al Ahly ibawashisa ijezi
UKUKHISHWA kwiCAF Champions League kumshiye nesifundo esibuhlungu umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uManqoba Mngqithi, okungenzeka ashintshe indlela abawuhlelela ngayo lo mqhudelwano ngesizini ezayo.ISundowns idlale ngokulingana ngo-1-1 ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypt emlenzeni wesibili kuma-quarterfinal ePitoli ngoMgqibelo ntambama.
Nokho ihlulwe ngo-3-1 uma sekuhlanganiswa imiphumela yemilenze yomibili.
Kowokuqala e-Egypt, AmaBrazilians aguqiswe ngezikaPitso Mosimane ngo-2-0.
Sekungokwesithathu iminyaka ilandelana iSundowns iphuma kuma-quarterfinal eChampions League.UMngqithi uthe isifundo abaphume naso ngesokuthi ukudlala ekuhambeni kuqala, okutholakala ngokuqeda phezulu eqoqweni, akusebenzi.
I-Sundowns ihlala ilwela ukuqeda eqhulwini ukuze izogwema ezinye izinkunzi kuma-quarterfinal kwazise awaqhathwa wodwa amaqembu aqede phezulu emaqoqweni.
"Mhlawumbe ukuqeda endaweni yesibili yikhona okulungile ngoba uma udlala owomlenze wokuqala ekhaya, kuba nzima ekuhambeni.
Uma ukhumbula sidlala ne-Ahly sayihlula emdlalweni wokuqala lapha, sashaya amagoli ayisihlanu.
Kodwa sesidlala ngakubo sathwala kanzima ukubehlula.
Kule midlalo elandelanayo kubukeka sengathi unethuba lokudlulela phambili uma uqala ekhaya.
Uma ubheka siqede phezulu eqoqweni kodwa siphumile," kusho uMngqithi"Mhlawumbe kuthumela umyalezo wokuthi le mpi yokuqeda phezulu eqoqweni ukuze uzodlala ekuhambeni kuqala, ayinazithelo.
Mhlawumbe kufanele ulwele ukudlala ekhaya kuqala lapho kungekho zinto eziningi okufanele uzibheke ezingenzeka.
Ulwela ukuwina umdlalo ophambi kwakho.
Kolandelayo usulwela ukungaphunyukwa onakho.
ISimba ishaye amagoli amathathu, izamile.
Kodwa ngebhadi ngoba iChiefs yenza kahle ekhaya, iphumelele ukudlulela phambili.
Yinto okufanele siyifunde ngoba silokhu sibhekane nenkinga efanayo," kusho yena.Ukuwashiswa ijezi kuma-quarterfinal kweSundowns kusho ukuthi isiyoze ibuyele kwiChampions League ngesizini ezayo kwazise akubukeki kukhona iqembu elizoyiphazamisa ekutheni iwine iligi yeDStv Premiership.Mayelana nendlela abaphume ngayo, uMngqithi uthe: "Besazi ukuthi ngeke kube lula.
Kodwa sizenzele thina ubunzima ngokungenelwa yigoli kade kuyikhona.
Sizame kanzima ukubacindezela kodwa bebehlezi emuva.
Angibasoli abadlali, ngicabanga ukuthi bakwenze konke okusemandleni kodwa osukwini sihlulekile ukuthola imiphumela ebesiyifuna.
Injalo iChampions League, ungenza konke kodwa kwesinye isikhathi kube nzima ukugqobhoza iqembu elihlezi emuva."
UMngqithi ufuna bazibhalele owabo umlando kowe-Al Ahly
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEITHIMBA labaqeqeshi leMamelodi Sundowns lizimisele ngokuqopha owalo umlando uma selibhekene ne-Al Ahly kowomlenze wesibili wama-quarterfinal eCaf Champions League kusasa eLucas Moripe Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.Lokhu kuvezwe oliholayo, uManqoba Mngqithi, kwabezindaba izolo ekuseni.
UMngqithi uthe abafuni ukubambelela ekutheni iSundowns yabhudluza i-Al Ahly ngo-5-0 ePitoli kumasizini adlule.
Uthe konke lokho sekuwumlando.
Ngaleso sikhathi uMngqithi wayeyiphini likaPitso Mosimane kumaBrazilians.
Manje uMosimane usewumqeqeshi we-Al Ahly.
AmaBrazillians abhekene nomqansa wokwehlula amaRed Devils ase-Egypt ngo-3-0 ukuze ezodlulela kowandulela owamanqamu kulo mqhudelwano.
Ngempelasonto edlule emlenzeni wokuqala, eCairo, ashaywa ngo-2-0.
"Umlando wokushaya i-Al Ahly ngamagoli amahlanu ngeke usisize ngalutho.
Kuningi osekwashintsha kuwona womabili amaqembu, kusukela kubadlali kuya kubaqeqeshi.
I-Sundowns inabadlali nethimba labaqeqeshi abasezingeni eliphezulu, abafuna ukuzakhela owabo umlando.
“Sigqugquzelwa yimpumelelo esiyithole sindawonye, efana nesibalo samagoli esiwashaye kwiChampions League nemidlalo esiyinqobile.
Siyiqembu elinentshisekelo yokunqoba, elinikana ibhola ngobuchule, elikwazi ukuhlasela nelingongcweti ekuphazamiseni izinhlelo zezitha zokuhlasela.
Ubufakazi balokhu yisibalo esincane samagoli asingenele.
Sihlale sikhonya enkundleni.
Umdlalo weCape Town City kuphela esahluleka ukwenza lokhu kuwo.
"Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi iSundowns kuphela engakwazi ukubuya, ishaye i-Al Ahly, sesike sakwenza lokho.
Ngeke kuthi ngoba nakhu sesidlala ne-Al Ahly siqale singabaze ikhono labadlali nempumelelo yethu.
Yebo, kuzoba nzima kodwa maningi amathuba okunqoba,“ kusho uMngqithi.
Uqhube wathi kumele bagweme amaphutha abaqhatha nenduku emdlalweni odlule.
"Owawubona umlenze wokuqala uzokutshela ukuthi ubani owakha amathuba amaningi phakathi kwiSundowns ne-Al Ahly.
Njengoba ngike ngasho phambilini, sashaywa amaphutha ethu, kwaba yishwa nje ukuthi kasishayanga negoli elilodwa.
Ngabe kukhulunywa okunye ukube ibhola likaMotupa (Aubrey) kalishayanga ipali.
Kukhona amanye amabili esawayeka ngekhanda kuhlanganisa nilekaMosa (Lebusa).
Kunamanye esasibazumile kuwo esawayeka.
"E-Egypt bamangala sihlasela ngaleya ndlela, babezitshela ukuthi sizohlala emuva silinde bona.
Asazi, mhlawumbe kulokhu bazohlala emuva.
Ibhola liyinkinga, singalishaya khona kunjalo igoli.
Nathi uma sizokhipha konke, singaqapheli singazifaka enkingeni.“Izindaba ezizokwehla kamtoti kubalandeli bamaBrazillians ngezokubuya ekulimaleni  kukaThemba " Mshishi" Zwane.
"Ngokombiko wodokotela, isimo sakhe sihle kakhulu.
Sekuphele isikhashana eziqeqesha nathi, nayizolo ejimini (ngoLwesithathu) wenze kahle kakhulu.
Uhlale ekhonya ngaso sonke isikhathi,“ kusho uMngqithi.
UBaloyi ukhala esonozinti eMzansi
ZAKHELE XABAU-BRIAN "Spiderman" Baloyi, owayengunozinti weBafana Bafana, ubona ukuthathwa konozinti bangaphandle kungayixazulula inkinga yepali eqenjini lesizwe.UBaloyi, ongomunye wonozinti abebengaconsi phansi kubalandeli baseMzansi eminyakeni edlule, ubekhuluma ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni umqhudelwano, iHollywood Bets U/15 Siyakhula Cup eMhlanga, eThekwini, ngeledlule.
Kulo mqhudelwano kuzodlala amaqembu angu-16 aseThekwini ngoJulayi 3-4 ezinkundleni ezingaphandle kwaseMoses Mabhida Stadium, iHollywood Bets ibambisene naMaZulu Community Trust neLa Liga.UBaloyi uthe ukuvimbisa onozinti bangaphandle kwamaqembu eDStv Premiership yikhona okudala inkinga uma sekufanele kuqokwe ozovimbela iBafana.
Le nkinga ikhalise nomqeqeshi, uMolefi Ntseki, esaqeqesha iBafana, wagcina encenga uCyril Chibwe waseZambia ogcine eqoke iChipolopolo.
Okwamanje kwiBafana kuvimba uRonwen Williams weSuperSport United.
"Lena yinkinga esesibe nayo iminyaka eminingi.
Kodwa njengenjwayelo, eMzansi silinda inkinga ikhule.
Inkinga ebesihlala sinayo bekuhlala kungeyabagadli ngenxa yokuthi abaphezulu kade bevela eZambia, Zimbabwe naseNigeria.
Manje amaqembu amakhulu, ngisho amancane nadlala kwiGladAfrica Championship, adlalisa abagadli bangaphandle okungeyona into embi," kusho uBaloyi.
"Eminyakeni embalwa edlule sekushintshile konozinti.
Amaqembu angaphezu kwesigamu kwiPremiership avimbisa onozinti bangaphandle.
I-Sundowns eminyakeni emine kuya kweyisihlanu kade ishaya ngonozinti abathathu noma abane bangaphandle.
Ngakho uma unamaqembu amathathu amakhulu evimbisa onozinti bangaphandle, kudlulele kwiMaritzburg United neChippa namanye, uzoba nenkinga.
"Ukuncintelwa ijezi konozinti, okudala ukwehla kwezinga kwabaseqenjini lesizwe, akuyona inkinga yaseMzansi kuphela.
I-Egypt iwubuyisile umthetho ovimbela onozinti bangaphandle ukuthi badlale kumaligi akhona.
"E-Egypt abanawo lo mthetho mahhala.
Kwesinye isikhathi kufanele sizibeke phambili siyizwe noma siyiligi.
Kufanele siwushaye nathi lo mthetho?
Mhlawumbe cha.
Asikawulungeli.
Okufanele sikwenze wukukhulisa abethu onozinti.
Kufanele sisheshe kakhulu ngoba isizukulwane sika-Itu (Itumeleng Khune) sesiyashabalala.
Kufanele siyinake indaba yonozinti.
Ngebhadi isikhathi sesihambile.
Esingakuqala manje kungalunga emuva kweminyaka eyisihlanu kuya kwengu-10," kusho uBaloyi.
"Ngicabanga ukuthi kufanele siyicabange eyokuthatha onozinti bangaphandle, abangakaze bawavimbele amazwe abo kodwa abaqeqeshwe bakhuliswa kahle bekhula.
Lokhu kungaba yisixazululo sesikhashana kodwa sibe nalo uhlelo lokukhulisa abethu.
Lena yinkinga ongekho umuntu ofuna ukukhuluma ngayo emaqenjini nakwelesizwe.
Amaqembu avele anqamulele ngokulanda unozinti wangaphandle," kuphetha uBaloyi.
Inzukazikeyi ngesicoco seGladAfrica
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEIPREMIER Soccer League (PSL) seyithole izinsongo zokusatshiswa ngokuthi luzofakwa enkantolo udaba lombango  wesicoco seGladAfrica  Championship.
Kuyiwe emidlalweni yokugcina kulesi sigaba kukhulunywa kakhulu.Amaqembu abethinteka kulokhu kukhuluma iRoyal AM, izolo ebambane ngo-1-1  neCape Town All Stars neSekhukhune edlule ngehubo lika-3-1 kwiJDR.ISekhukhune sifake isikhalo kwiPSL Resolution Chamber (DRC), sikhononda ngokungadlalisi kwePolokwane City  abadlali abahlanu abangaphansi kweminyaka engu-23.IDRC ibe seyiphuca iPolokwane City amaphuzu amathathu.
Nokho iSekhukhune idlulisele lesi sinqumo kumehluleli, obe esesinika amaphuzu amathathu.Izolo iPSL ikhiphe isitatimende ivezela abezindaba ukuthi alikho iqembu elizonikezwa indebe.
Ngaphandle kwendebe okubangwayo wukuthi iqembu elizoqeda phezulu lizokhuphukela kwiDStv Premiership.
"Kuyijoka leligi ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi iyayalwa futhi ikhipha isinqumo ngokushesha esizokwanelisa izinhlangothi zonke.
Njengoba lolu daba lusasezithebeni, kuwumbono ophusile ukuthi kubambezeleke ukunikezelwa kwenkomishi.
IPSL iyazibophezela ngokuthi lolu daba izoluxazulula ngokushesha", sifundeka kanjena lesi sitatimende.Ngokwe-log yeGladAfrika, iRoyal isonge iphezulu  ngamaphuzu awu-51, emidlalweni ewu-30.ISekhukhune siqede sikweyesibili ngamaphuzu awu-50.Emdlalweni, obuseChatsworth Stadium, eThekwini, i-All Stars, iyona ebone imbobo yepali ngegoli elishaywe uWaseem Isaacs ngomzuzu ka-79.
EleRoyal lishaywe uSamuel Manganyi seliyozilahla kunina.
Kube iphenathi kade kudlaliswe kabi uWandile Mabuza.Iqembu elizogcina liqeda endaweni yesibili lizodlala kweyokuhlunga nalelo elisendaweni yesithathu.
Okwamanje indawo yesithathu ibanjwe iRichards Bay FC ngamaphuzu awu-49.
La maqembu azobhekana nelizoqeda endaweni ka-15 kwiDStv Premiership, kubangwa khona ukukhuphukela esigabeni esiphezulu.

STHEMBISO NGOBESEUZOSHINTSHA ukwenza umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs kwiDStv Diski Challenge, u-Arthur Zwane, uma sebebhekene neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila ngempelasonto.
Umdlalo ungeSonto ngo-9.30 ekuseni eLucas Moripe Stadium, ePitoli.UZwane uveze ukuthi kulo mdlalo uzoshaya ngabadlali abangajwayele ukuthola isikimu.Ukhuluma kanjena nje, ngempelasonto  iqembu lakhe libe ngelokuqala ukuzibekisela indawo emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu kwiDiski Challenge Rewired.Lokhu abafana beChiefs bakwenze ngemuva kokuxebula ngo 3-1 iSwallows FC.KwiGroup B, iChiefs ihlezi esicongweni se-log yeDiski ngamaphuzu angu-15 emidlalweni eyisithupha.
Amaqembu asebanga indawo yesibili yi-Orlando Pirates neMamelodi Sundwons nabo abazobhekana ngeSonto ngo-12pm, khona eLucas Moripe.UZwane uthe ujabule kakhulu ngokuthi iqembu lakhe likwazile ukuzibekisela indawo emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu.“Abadlali bami kubafanele lokhu.
Basebenze ngokukhulu ukuzikhandla ukuze babe kule ndawo abakuyo njengamanje.
Bathembisa ukuthi bafuna ukufinyelela emdlalweni wamanqamu, ukuze banqobele iqembu, nabo uqobo lwabo ngokunjalo nabalandeli.“Manje ngeke sisabheka emuva.Sihamba ngomgudu ofanele futhi sesiwutholile nomgqigqo wethu.
Nokuzethemba kukhulu kakhulu manje,” usho kanje uZwane, obuye abe ngumsizi kaGavin Hunt eqenjini elikhulu lamaKhosi.Le nkakha yeChiefs, iphawule ngomdlalo wabo wokugcina wamaqoqo, abazowudlala neTshakuma.
Ithe: “Kulo mdlalo wethu wokugcina neTTM sizonikeza abafana abancane ithuba lokuthi badlale, okuyinto ezobasiza ekutheni bathole isipiliyoni.
Lokhu kuyingxenye yethu yokulungisela isizini ezayo.“Kodwa-ke uma sesidlala emdlalweni owandulela owamanqamu bazobuya bonke abadlali abajwayele ukudlala.
Sizoba neqembu eliqinile uma sesibhekene nanoma ngubani kowandulela owamanqamu.”Imidlalo yeDStv Diski Challenge yangempelasonto:NgoMgqibelo - Ngo-10am: AmaZulu FC v Cape Town City (King Zwelithini Stadium); Maritzburg United v TS Galaxy (Harry Gwala Stadium); Stellenbosch FC v Chippa United (Idas Valley); Lamontville Golden Arrows v Supersport United  (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium); Bloemfontein Celtic v Baroka FC (Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium); Swallows FC v Black Leopards (Dobsonville Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-9:30am: Tshakuma Tsha Madzivhandila v Kaizer Chiefs (Lucas Moripe Stadium).Ngo-12pm: Mamelodi Sundowns v Orlando Pirates  (Lucas Moripe Stadium).
Isikhulu sicasukile ngabashiywe ngaphandle kwiBafana
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUDINWE uyaveva umnikazi weCape Town City, uJohn Comitis, ngokushiywa ngaphandle eqenjini lesizwe kwezinsika zeqembu lakhe, uThabo Nodada noMduduzi Mdantsane.Ngesonto eledlule, umqeqeshi weBafana Bafana, uMolefi Ntseki, umemezele iqembu labadlali abawu-26 elizobhekana neGhana neSudan kweyokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezoba eCameroon ngonyaka ozayo.OweGhana uzoba ngoMashi 25 eFNB Stadium, kuthi oweSudan ube ngoMashi 28 ekuhambeni, e-El Hilal Stadium.Kulesi sikwati bashiywe ngaphandle uNodada noMdatsane phezu kokuba beyishukumisa kwiDStv Primiership.UCraig Martin kuphela odlala kumaCitizens oqokelwe kuleli qembu.UMdantsane ulele isithathu kwabahamba phambili ekushayeni amagoli kwiDStv Premiership.Uvalele ayisishiyagalolunye, walekelela kwamane emidlalweni ewu-17 ayidlalile.Nakuba uNodada esashaye amathathu kuphela kodwa ulime indima enkulu kumagoli awu-29 ashaywe amaCitizens.
Ugcine ukuqokelwa kwelesizwe ngonyaka odlule, elakuleli lidlala owobungani neNamibia.Ukushiywa ngaphandle kwalaba badlali kususe okukhulu ukukhuluma ngendlela uNtseki aqoka ngayo iqembu lesizwe.UComitis obezwakala ukuthi kumnengile ukushiywa ngaphandle kwalaba badlali, ubuze ukuthi kanti kumele baze benzenjani laba badlali ukuze bezofakwa eqenjini lesizwe?
"Ngiphoxekile futhi ngidiniwe ngokushiywa kukaNodada noMdantsane.
Ngihambisana nalabo ababuza ukuthi bashiywe kanjani ngaphandle laba badlali?
Bakwenze konke laba badlali.
UMdantsane ulele isithathu ngokushaya amagoli, enjalo nje udlala ingcwenga yebhola.
Angisayiphathi-ke ekaNodada, ngiye ngizibuze ukuthi wabadlelani abaqeqeshi beBafana.
Ungomunye wabadlali bezinga eliphezulu kuleli, engikholelwa ukuthi bangalenzela lukhulu iqembu lesizwe," kubeka uComitis.UComitis uthe ngala mazwi akaqondile ukudelela uNtseki noma umsebenzi wakhe.
Ube esebongela uMartin ngokuqokelwa kwelesizwe.
"Ngesingami abadlali beqembu elilodwa bangaqokelwa kwelesizwe badlule eshumini, inqobo nje uma bekufanele ukudlala kulo.
Ngimfisela inhlanhla uMartin, engathi naseqenjini lesizwe angenza kahle njengoba enza kithina.
Ungomunye wabadlali abanekusasa elihle.
Nathi kwiCity sisabheke lukhulu kuyena ukusisiza ekufezeni izifiso zathu zale sizini.”Umqeqeshi weTS Galaxy, u-Owen Da Gama, ungomunye ocashunwe ebuza ukuthi ushiywe kanjani uMdantsane.
Uthe ukube ungumqeqeshi weBafana, lo mdlali oyibamba kuthule umoya esiswini, ubezoba endaweni yokuqala ohlwini lwabadlali abezobaqokela kwelesizwe.Umqeqeshi waMaZulu FC, uBenni McCarthy, ubuziwe ngalokhu kwisithangami nabezindaba izolo lapho abemukela umklomelo womqeqeshi ovelele.
Uthe ubazi kahle ubuhlungu bokuzimisela bese ungaqokelwa kwelesizwe, kuvele kubizwe abantu abebengadlali.Uthe ukholelwa ukuthi uThabo Nodada noMduduzi Mdantsane beCape Town City bebekufanele ukubizelwa kwiBafana Bafana.

UWilliams nenselelo kwabavale izikhala kwiBafana
UNOZINTI weBafana Bafana, uRonwen Williams, uphonsele inselelo abadlali okuchitshiyelwe ngabo wathi ababhukule basebenzele impumelelo yeqembu.IBafana izokwamukela iGhana emdlalweni wokuhlungela i-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ozoba seFNB Stadium, eNasrec, kusasa ngo-6 ntambama.
Elakuleli libambene neGhana eqhulwini kuGroup C ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye emuva kwemidlalo emine.
Umdlalo wokugcina wokuhlunga iBafana izowudlala neSudan ekuhambeni ngeSonto.
Amalungiselelo eBafana aphazanyiswe ukungaphumeleli kwabanye abadlali abadlala phesheya kwezilwandle abanqatshelwe ukuza eMzansi ngamaqembu abo ngenxa yokudlanga kweCovid-19.
Laba badlali nguKeagan Dolly, Bongani Zungu, Dean Furman noThulani Serero.
Izindawo zabo zivalwe ngoVincent Pule, Thabang Monare, Lebo Maboe, Mothobi Mvala, Thabo Nodada noThabiso Kutumela.Ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu kweBafana kungandisa amathuba okungena kwi-Afcon.
"Siphoxekile ngokuthi abanye abadlali abafikanga esiluqale nabo lolu hambo.
Kodwa abadlali abafakiwe kufanele babhukule ngempela.
Ngeke kube lula ngoba sincane isikhathi esinaso ngaphambi kosuku lomdlalo.
Kodwa kade aqala amalungiselelo omdlalo.
Ithimba labaqeqeshi kade laqala ukusithumelela ulwazi ngeGhana.
Ngakho siyalazi iqhinga esizolisebenzisa nokuthi iGhana idlala kanjani.
Kusezandleni zethu singabadlali ukuthi sisize abasha bazinze, bafunde indlela esihlele ukudlala ngayo," kusho uWilliams.
"Siyakwazi ukubaluleka komdlalo.
Umqeqeshi (Molefi Ntseki) wasibuza ukuthi yini esifuna ukuyizuza, samtshela ukuthi sifuna ukuhlala phezulu eqoqweni.
Yileyo inselelo esiyibeke emahlombe ethu.
Okwamanje kubukeka kuthembisa.
Okunye esakusho wukuthi sifuna ukuwina yonke imidlalo yasekhaya.
Nalokho kusahamba kahle ngoba sisayiwine yomibili.
Sifuna ukuqhubeka nalowo mgqigqo.
"Emdlalweni wokuqala wamaqoqo iBafana yashaywa yiGhana ngo 2-0 ekuhambeni.Ukunqatshelwa kwabadlali ngamaqembu aphesheya kuyithintile neGhana esizodlala ngaphandle kwezethenjwa okuyizelamani u-Andre noJordan Ayew ezidlala e-England.
Abanye abanqatsheliwe yinjini uThomas Partey owashaya igoli kowasekhaya neBafana, Nicholas Opoku no-Emmanuel Lomotey odlala eFrance.
Umqeqeshi uCharles Akonnoro usebamemezele abadlali azochibiyela ngabo.
"Sifuna lingaphuki irekhodi lethu lasekhaya.
Uma singathola lokho, sizobe sesingene ngonyawo kwi-Afcon.
Ngiphoxekile ngokuthi abanye abadlali abafikanga kodwa sizobanqobela.
Sinethemba lokuthi le Covid-19 izodlula, sihlangane futhi siyiqembu," kusho uWilliams.Amaqembu amabili azoqeda elandelana phezulu eqoqweni azongena kwi-Afcon.
Eqoqweni leBafana uGroup C indawo yesithathu ibanjwe yiSudan ngamaphuzu ayisithupha.
Namuhla izodlala neSao Tome and Principe esemsileni njengoba ingakatholi maphuzu emidlalweni emine.
UMngqithi akayizwa eyokushaywa yiChiefs eqede ngomgqigqo wabo kwiligi
LUNGILE MAJOKAUMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns usale engakwamukeli ukuthi bahlulwe yiKaizer Chiefs emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obungeSonto ntambama eLoftus Versfeld.Kulo mdlalo iSundowns ebibheke ukuqhubeka nerekhodi layo lokungehlulwa kwiligi, iguqe ngo 2-1.

Kodwa ngikholwa wukuthi sizehlule thina,” kusho uMngqithi.ISundowns isazihola phambili kwi-log ngaphuzu awu-47, ilandelwa AmaZulu FC ngamaphuzu awu-44.

Sizobhekana nomdlalo ngamunye.
Siyadlala futhi ngoLwesithathu.
Sizolokhu sibangcono, kumele,” kusho uHunt.NgoLwesithathu iChiefs izokwamukela iChippa United eFNB Stadium ngo-5 ntambama.
ISundowns yona izobe iqhuthana ne-Arrows ngesikhathi esifanayo eLoftus Versfeld.
AmaProteas azimisele ukunyathela ngolusha eWest Indies
XOLILE MPISANEASETHELEKILE esiqhingini saseSaint Lucia amaProteas ukuzoqala amalungiselelo emidlalo yochungechunge lwama-test azoyidlala neqembu laseWest Indies.La maqembu agcina ukubhekana ngqo eWest Indies ngo-2010.
Ngo-2016 ayeyingxenye yomqhudelwano owawufake neqembu lase-Australia.
Bazodlala imidlalo yama-test emibili ezoba seDarren Sammy Cricket Ground khona eSaint Lucia.UDean Elgar, osanda kuqokwa ngokuphelele ukuba ngukaputeni weqembu lama-test kumaProteas, uthe kumele baqale uhambo olusha kule midlalo.“Kuyasijabulisa siyiqembu ukuthi sizophinda simele izwe lethu.
Phezu kokuba sizobe sivalelekile ehhotela ngenxa ye-Covid 19 kodwa okubalulekile wukubuyela enkundleni,” kusho uElgar.“Into esemqoka wukuthi sisheshe sijwayele isimo sezulu nendawo esizohlala kuyona, ukuze amalungiselelo ethu ahambe ngendlela.
Kumele sizimisele sisazilolonge ukuze le midlalo isithole sisesimeni esihle.
Lokho kusezandleni zethu.”AmaProteas angena kulolu chungechunge nje asehlele endaweni yesikhombisa uma kukleliswa amaqembu ama-test emhlabeni, iWest Indies isendaweni yesithupha.
U-Elgar uthe kumele balisebenzise leli thuba ukuze basuke kule ndawo engabafanele.“Kumele sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo, akulula kodwa ngoba sikhuluma ngabadlali abawu-18 abangafani.
Inhloso wukuthi sonke sikholelwe kuleli qembu nezinhlelo esisebenzela phezu kwazo.“Inselelo enkulu enginayo nginguaputeni omusha wukuthi ngenze bonke abadlali bangethembe futhi bahambisane nezinhlelo ezizoyisa leli qembu phambili.”Kulo nyaka amaProteas asedlale kabili kuma-test, ahlule iSri Lanka ngo 2-0 ngoJanuwari ase ehlulwa yiPakistan ngo 2-0 ngoFebhuwari.
Ngaphambi kwalokho babegcine bedlale ne-England ekuqaleni kuka-2020, bakhala ngaphansi ngo 3-1.U-Elgar uthe kabalitholanga ithuba lokuthi badlale into ehlangene ngenxa yokuthi imidlalo ibihlukene kakhulu.“Ubhubhane luphazamise okuningi.
Asikwazanga ukudlala isibalo semidlalo esanele,  ngakho-ke kunzima ukusho ukuthi sikuliphi izinga siyiqembu.
Njengoba sesithole leli thuba lokuqala kabusha, sifisa ukudlala imidlalo eminingi futhi sidlale kangcono,” kuqhuba uElgar.“Siyazi ukuthi kule midlalo yama-test esayidlala nePakistan kasidlalanga ngendlela esezingeni lamaProteas.
Kuningi esikufisayo kodwa asikho isidingo sokuthi sigagamele ngoba ukwakha iqembu kuthatha isikhathi.”
UMkhalele uyishaye emuva naphambili ngeseCosafa
UZWAKALE eyishaya emuva naphambili ngesikhathi esifanayo uHelman Mkhalele ebuzwa ngokubiza abadlali abasemgodleni weqembu eliya kuma-Olympic Games kodwa abanye ebebashiye ngaphandle.UMkhalele, oyiphini likaHugo Broos kwiBafana Bafana nokunguye ozobe ekhuzela isikwati kwiCosafa Cup eGqeberha ngenyanga ezayo, esikwatini asethule izolo eSafa House akambalanga u-Evidence Makgopa, ogqame ngamagoli amabili behlula i-Uganda kamuva.Ngesikhathi esifanayo, ubabizile ozakwabo esikwatini se-Under 23 okubalwa nesethenjwa sikanozinti weLamontville Golden Arrows, uSifiso Mlungwana, Bongani Sam we-Orlando Pirates, Sifiso Ngobeni weBloemfontein Celtic noSiyabonga Ngezana noHappy Mashiane beKaizer Chiefs.Bonke laba badlali bebelokhu beyingxenye yesikwati sikaDavid Notoane nobekulindelwe ukuthi bangasali ebhanoyini eliya eTokyo eJapan lapho bevula khona nosokhaya ngomhlaka-21.Nokho izolo ebethula uMkhalele kucacile ukuthi sebelikhombile eliya e-Asia, ikakhulu esebuzwa lo mqeqeshi waseNewcastle ukuthi umshiye kanjani uMakgopa,oqokwe njengomdlali ovelele kwiDStv Diski Challenge.“Sibabizile abanye abadlali besikwati sika-Under 23 ngokuxhumana nenhlokomqeqeshi esikwatini sika-Under 23, uDavid Notoane.
Usivumele ukuba sibabize,” kusho uMkhalele.Kucacile kodwa ukuthi laba ababiziwe sebesefiwe esikwatini esiya eJapan, sekubuzwa ngoMakgopa.“Angiqale ngokumbongela u-Evidence ngokuthi azethule ngokudlala kanjeya sibhekene ne-Uganda.
Lokho kwakhombisa ukuthi angadlala noma yisesigcawini esikhulu kanjani,” kusho uMkhalele, ozobe esizwa nguVeli Khumalo ocija isikwati sika-Under 17.“Asimbizanga ngoba usesikwatini esiya eJapan kuma-Olympics.
Lokho thina (esikwatini seCosafa) kusinika ithuba lokuqoka omunye umdlali.”ICosafa iqala ngoJulayi 7 kuya kuJulayi 18.KwiGroup A, iBafana Bafana iboshelwe neLesotho, Eswatini neBotswana.KwiGroup C kuboshelwe iZimbabwe, Namibia, Mozambique nezimenywa iSenegal yasentshonalanga ye-Afrika.KwiGroup C kuboshelwe iZambia, Malawi, Madagascar neComoros.Kula mazwe angu-12, mane azodlulela kumasemifinal ngoJulayi 16.

Bancishwe ikhefu abadlali bePirates
SITHEMBISO MKHIZENGEKE balithole ikhefu abadlali be-Orlando Pirates abahlulwe izimbangi zaseSoweto, iKaizer Chiefs ngo 1-0  koweDStv Premiership, eFNB Stadium ngempelasonto edlule.Ngokusho komqeqeshi wePirates, uJosef Zinnbauer, obedinwe egane unwabu, ubehlele ukuthi aphumuze abadlali bakhe njengoba kunekhefu leFifa.Nokho ukungcwatshwa yigoli likaSamir Nukorvic kumshintshise umqondo.
"Ngeke ngikufihle ukuthi besisophe ukuthi uma sesinqobile nginike abadlali bami izinsuku ezimbili zokuphumula.
Kodwa manje lokho ngeke kusenzeka ngoba angeneme ngenxa yomphumela.
Asikho isidingo sokuphumula ngoba kumele kusetshenzwe.
Sinezinto eziningi okumele sizizuze kule sizini.
Sihlalelwe nawumsebenzi wokujabulisa abalandeli bethu," kusho uZinnbauer.
Njengoba kuleli sonto abanye abadlali bePirates bezobe bejuluka ejimini ekomkhulu layo, eMayfair, uThulani" Tyson" Hlatshwayo, Innocent Maela, Ben Motshwari, Vincent Pule babizwe kwiBafana Bafana.
UDeon Hotto noGabadinho Mhango babizwe eNamibia naseMalawi ngokwehlukana.
Echaza mayelana nokusebenzisa uHotto njengomgadli wabeka uMhango noTshegofatso Mabasa ebhentshini, uthe:" Abanye abadlali bethu basanda kubuya ekulimaleni, ngaleyo ndlela abakakulungeli ukugijima umdlalo wonke."
Ukwehlulwa kweBucs kuyibeke endaweni yesine ngemuva kwemidlalo engu-21 namaphuzu awu-35.Iyeke ithuba lokulala endaweni yesibili, beyizogudluza iLamontville Golden Arrows.
Isele ngemuva ngamaphuzu amahlanu kwiMamelodi Sundowns enemidlalo emithathu engakayidlali ngenxa yokuxinwa eyeCaf Champions League neyeNedbank Cup.
UZinnbauer akakufihlanga ukuthi imcasulile indlela iChiefs epake ngayo ibhasi ekubeni ibidlalela ekhaya.
"Sibonile ukuthi asibukhali phambili ingakho sizame ukuphusha u" Figo" (uLinda Mntambo) noNtsiki (uNtsikelelo Nyauza), kanti noKabelo Dlamini noSiphesihle Ndlovu bazame konke okusemandleni.
Kumele sikhumbule ukuthi siyinqobile imidlalo emithathu eyedlule abalandeli bajabula kakhulu.
Uma ngalelo langa izinto zingahlangani isuke ingekho into ongayenza.“Kolandelayo eZimnyama zizobhekana ne-Al Ahly Benghazi yaseLibya, ngo-Ephreli 2, eMartyrs Of February Stadium koweCaf Confederation Cup.
Oweligi ziyoze ziwudlale ngo-Ephreli 7, neMaritzburg United, e-Orlando Stadium.
I-Arrows ibuyele kwamhlaba ihlulwa elisemsileni
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEI-LAMONTVILLE Golden Arrows iwuqale kabi umzuliswano wesibili weDStv Premiership ishaywa iBlack Leopards ngo-2-1 emdlalweni obusekhaya, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, izolo ebusuku.Kulo mdlalo amagoli eLidoda Duvha abhajiswe ezintanjeni u-Anas Mohammed ngomzuzu ka-31 nasesikhathini sikanompempe esiwombeni sesibili.Elokubika le-Arrows lishaywe ngesithende uMichael Gumede.Bekuwumdlalo wesibili i-Arrows ithola umpetshisi kwiligi.
Ibifike emdlalweni indizela phezulu ngemuva kokuthi ngoMsombuluko iqophe umlando ngokuba ngeyokuqala KwaZulu-Natal ukunqoba i-Q Innovation.
Idle i-Q2 yeDStv Premiership.
Emidlalweni eyisikhombisa iqoqe amaphuzu awu-16.Bese kuphele imidlalo emine yeligi Abafana Bes'thende beshaya kwasani oluphambi kwabo.Baye kowayizolo bephuma ekubhaxabuleni iStellenbosch ngo-3-1.Izolo esiwombeni sokuqala, konakale izinhlelo zomqeqeshi uMandla Ncikazi, zibulawa ukuphuma ngohlaka kwesiqongqwane, uNkosinathi Sibisi ongqubuzane kabi emoyeni nonozinti wakhe uSifiso Mlungwane.Kungene uGladwin Shitolo ofike wangenza lutho.Izinto zibhimbe kakhulu esiwombeni sesibili kuphuma ngekhadi elibomvu uPule Mmodi odlalise kabi uKenneth Mthatheni seliyozilahla kunina.Kulo mdlalo, iLeopards ihlasele zisuka, i-Arrows ibilibele ukulahla amabhola kalula.Esiwombeni sokuqala lilodwa ibhola eliyingozi elicishe lashaywa uVelemseni Ndwandwe ngoka-27.
Kusize unozinti weLeopards, uKing Ndlovu.Ngoka-31, kuthele izithelo ukwenza kahle kweLidoda Duvha, u-Anas eliqedela ngekhanda kade kukhahlele uLifa Hlongwane.UMumuni Abubakar noSibongiseni Mthethwa bebeyibulala yonke iminyakazo ye-Arrows esiswini.Ukufika kukaKostadin Papic ukuzolekelelana noLehlohonolo Seema, kubukeka kuzoba nezithelo ezinhle kwiLeopards ababalekela izembe.Esiwombeni sesibili, uNcikazi ufake uLindokohle Mtshali ofike wazama ukubamba isisu.I-Arrows iqalile yahlasela kubhoke uKnox Mutizwa, Michael Gumede, noMmodi.Ngemuva kokuphuma kukaMmodi, lehlile izinga layo, kwaqala phansi ukuhlasela kweLidoda Duvha.ILeopards obese kuphele imidlalo emihlanu iwukudla kwenduku, inyukele endaweni ka-15, ngamaphuzu awu-12.Ibhuleki selivalwe iMaritzburg United edonsa kanzima ngaphansi kuka-Ernst Middendorp.Kule mpelasonto kunemidlalo yeNedbank Cup, i-Arrows engasekho kuyona njengoba yakhishwa AmaZulu FC.ILeopards izobhekana naMaZulu kwiLast 16 yeNedbank Cup ngoMgqibelo.
UHunt unikwa ithemba ukungabibikho kwezihlwele emidlalweni yeCaf
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, uqiniswa idolo ukungabibikho kwezihlwele ezijwayele ukuthwalisa kanzima amaqembu akuleli emidlalwani  yeCaf Champions League azimisele ukuhamba ibanga elide kuyo.Kuyinto eyaziwayo ukuthi uma  amaqembu akuleli edlalela ekuhambeni kwiChampions League noma kwiCaf Confederation Cup, ubunzima aqala ukubuthwala ehla ngakho kodwa esikhumulweni sezindiza.Kwesinye isikhathi kuvela imibiko yokuncishwa noma ukunikwa izinkundla zokuziqeqesha ezingekho ezingeni.Kwesinye esikhathi imidlalo idlalelwe ezindaweni ezingenamahhotela asezingeni elifanele.
Asuke esalindwe nayiziwengu zezihlwele ezigcwala phama enkundleni.Kulo nyaka ezikaHunt zingene okokuqala esigabeni samaqoqo eChampions League.Njengoba ziphuma esigwebeni ebesizivimba ukusayinisa, zizogijima lo mqhudelwano ngeningi labadlali abasebancane, abangenaso naso isipiliyoni sokumelena nezinselelo zale midlalo.Ebuzwa uHunt ukuthi akanavalo yini ngalokhu uthe: "Sibazi kahle ubunzima esizobhekana nabo.
Ngiyazama ukuthi ngiqinise imiqondo nemizimba yabadlali bami.
Iqiniso esingeke siliphike ukuthi iningi lamazwe asenhla nezwekazi i-Afrika asibona sintekenteke.
Ngeke uhambe ibanga elide kule midlalo uma abadlali bakho bengaqinile emqondweni nasemzimbeni.
Okunginika ithemba ukungabi bikho kwabalandeli.
Amaqembu anjengeWAC Casablanca esiqhathwe nayo ku-Group C anabalandeli abayinkinga, abangagcina befaka ingebhe kubadlali.
Ukungabibikho kwabo kuzosisebenzela kakhulu.”Ngeledlule, abaningi bakuthathe njengokuqhubeka kokuhlukuyezwa kwamaqembu akuleli ukunqatshelwa kweMamelodi Sundowns ukungena e-Algeria ukuyodlala neCR Belouizdad nokuvinjwa kweChiefs ukudlala neCasablanca, eMorocco.La mazwe abekhala ngokudla lubi kweCovid-19 eNingizimu Afrika.Lolu daba lugcine lungenwe iCaf ethathe isinqumo esithe iSundowns neBelouizdad sebezodlalela eTanzania kuthi Amakhosi neCasablanca badlalele eBurkina Faso.
Yomibili le midlalo isizokuba ngeSonto.Phezu kwenkinga yesipiliyoni kwiChiefs, uHunt ongelona ivukana emidlalweni yase-Afrika, uthe bazimisele ukudlula esigabeni samaqoqo, baphume okungenani kwesomkhumulajezi.
"Ngeke ngithi nginengcindezi ngokwenza kahle kwiChampions League, okubalulekile ukuthi sidlale ngikuzigqaja, sibeke phambili isithunzi seqembu.
Kwamina uqobo ngingajabula ukuhamba ibanga elide kulokhu.
Kuzomele singaxhamazeli, sithathe umdlalo ngamunye.
Nakuba abadlali beshaywa isipiliyoni kodwa bajabule, bayakuqonda ukuthi kumele baziqophele owabo umlando,” kusho uHunt.Izolo ebusuku Amakhosi adlale kowokuqala kowamaqoqo neHoroya yaseGuinea.
Usekhonjwe indlela uNtseki kwesokuqeqesha iBafana
LUNGILE MAJOKAUSEXOSHIWE uMolefi Ntseki esikhundleni sokuqeqesha iqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana.Lokhu kumenyezelwe isikhulu esiphezulu seSouth African Football Association (Safa), uTebogo Motlanthe kwisithangami nabezindaba ngoLwesithathu eSafa House.
"Ngo-10 (ngoLwesithathu) isigungu esiphezulu seSafa sithathe isinqumo sokwehlukana kuthi  nomqeqeshi," kusho uMotlanthe.Uthe yena njengesikhulu esiphezulu ubesazohlangana noNtseki ukumazisangokusemthethweni ngesinqumo esithathiwe, badingide nodaba lwenkontileka ebingakapheli.Okugqamile kulesi sithangami wukuthi umengameli weSafa uDanny Jordaan ubengabonwa kuso.UMotlanthe ubehambisana nosihlalo wekomodi losomaqhinga, uJack Maluleka.Uthe isigungu esiphezulu sithume bona ukuthi bazoxolisa esizweni ngokuthi iBafana ayiyi kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) ezobanjelwa eCameroon ngonyaka ozayo.UNtseki uxoshwe ngemuva kokuthi ehlulekile ukufaka iBafana kwi-Afcon.
INingizimu Afrika ihlulwe yiSudan ngo 2-0 ngempelasonto edlule emdlalweni wokugcina wokuhlunga kuGroup C. Lokhu kwenze yaqeda eqoqweni isendaweni yesithathu ngamaphuzu awu-10.Amaqembu amabili aya eCameroon kube yiGhana eqhwakele neSudan esendaweni yesibili
UHunt usale engeneme  bedlula sekuvalwe amehlo koweCaf
USALE enganeme ngabadlali bakhe umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt,  bephuma ngembobo yenaliti koweCAF Champions League ngoMgqibelo ntambama.Amakhosi ahlulwe yiSimba SC yaseTanzania ngo 3-0 emdlalweni womlenze wesibili wama-quarterfinal eDar es Salaam ngempelasonto.
Ayekade enqobe ngo 4-0 kowokuqala kuleli.
IChiefs isizobhekana neWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco kowandulela owamanqamu oyimilenze emibili.
Owokuqala uzoba ngoJuni 18 eMorocco.
Owesibili uzoba seMzansi ngoJuni 25.
Komunye owandulela owamanqamu, i-Esperance yaseTunisia izobhekana ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypt ekhiphe iMamelodi Sundowns.Okushiye uHunt engagculisekile yindlela ezakhe ezidlale ngayo eTanzania.
"Sihlulekile ukudlala ngenxa yezizathu ezaziwayo.
Besilokhu siphisana ngebhola.
Kodwa okubalulekile wukuthi sidlulele phambili.
Yilokho okubalulekile emidlalweni yemilenze emibili.
Bekunzima kakhulu namuhla," kusho uHunt.Ngemuva komdlalo womlenze wokuqala eFNB Stadium, iningi belizitshela ukuthi iChiefs isiyogcina icala eTanzania.
ISimba, ekade yesekwa ngabalandeli bayo enkundleni, icishe yawona umcimbi kwazise umdlalo uphele sekubanjwe umoya.
"Ibingekho ingozi emizuzwini engu-20 noma engu-26 yokuqala.
Bathola ikhona, bashaya igoli okuyilona elisihlalise emuva.
Bashaya nelesibili ngaso isiwombe sokuqala elenze kwaba nzima.
Emuva kwalokho, simake kwaze kwaba sekugcineni.
Kade sazi ukuthi badlalela ekhaya, bazohlasela ngakho konke.
Badlale ngabadlali abane phambili," kusho uHunt.UHunt kufanele anganami ngendlela ezakhe ezinze ngayo emdlalweni weSimba.
Uma sizoqhubeka nokudlala ngendlela engagculisi zingagcina zingayinuki iTop 8 kwiDStv Premiership.
IChiefs ibambe indawo ka-11 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-30.
Idinga ukuqoqa amaphuzu emidlalweni emithathu esele ukuze izibeke ethubeni lokunyukela emaqenjini ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu.
NgoLwesithathu, Amakhosi azovakashela iBlack Leopards koweligi eThohoyandou Stadium, eGiyani, ngo-3 ntambama.
Izobe isidlala neLamontville Golden Arrows (Juni 2) bese isonga iligi neTS Galaxy ngoJuni 5.Emuva kwemidlalo yeligi izolungiselela iWydad edlale nayo kabili esigabeni samaqoqo.
IWydad ihlule iChiefs ngo 4-0 kowokuqala ekuhambeni.
Amakhosi awine owesibili ngo 1-0.
UTruter akaneme ngamagoli adedelwa yiZinyoni
STHEMBISO NGOBESEUZOLWA nokulungisa inkinga yodonga alubona lungaqinile umqeqeshi weSwallows FC, uBrandon Truter, njengoba ebona beqhubeka nokungenelwa ngamagoli angafanele emidlalweni yabo yakamuva.UTruter ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokuba iZinyoni zaseDube ziphinde zalahla amaphuzu amqoka ngesikhathi zibanjwa ngo-1-1 yiTshakuma Tsha Madzivhandila emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ngempelasonto, eDobsonville Stadium, eSoweto.Kulo mdlalo igoli leSwallows lishaywe nguZaphania Mbokoma kwathi elokulinganisa leTTM ebithela emuva njengembumba, labekwa enethini nguBulelani Ndengane kade kuyiphenathi edalwe nguPetso Maphanga kungenasidingo.Ukuhluleka kweSwallows ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele kuyenzele phansi njengoba isishoveleke endaweni yesihlanu kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-31 emidlalweni engu-18.UTruter ukhale kakhulu ngohluleka kwezakhe ukunqoba lo mdlalo, athe bekumele bawunqobe noma yikanjani kwazise badlale kahle.“Lona bekungumdlalo onzima kakhulu, emizuzwini engu-85 ebisidlaliwe ubungasho ukuthi amaphuzu agcwele asesemgodleni kodwa futhi saphinde sawudedela kalula sekusele imizuzu emibili nje ekutheni uphele.“Besekuwumdlalo wethu wesikhombisa siwudlala ngokulingana kule sizini, okuhle wukuthi siyakwazi ukushaya amagoli kodwa futhi aphinde asingenele ngendlela exakayo.
Kodwa-ke kuzomele siyilungise ngokushesha indaba yokuvuza kodonga lwethu lwasemuva.
Ngiyethemba ukuthi abadlali bami bazofunda lukhulu emaphutheni enzekile, kuzomele bakhule,” kusho uTruter obezwakala ukuthi isiqala ukumkhathaza indaba yokugqoza kokunqoba.ISwallows izobuyela enkundleni uma isigadulisana neChippa United emdlalweni weligi ngoMashi 20 eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eGqeberha.
UMaluleka usabheke ezinye izicoco kwi’Downs
XOLILE MPISANEUMDLALI wasesiswini weMamelodi Sundowns, uGeorge Maluleka, uthi usalindele lukhulu emva kokuwina isicoco seDStv Premiership kwisizini yakhe yokuqala naleli qembu.UMaluleka (32) usayine kumaBrazilians ngoJulayi ngonyaka odlule emva kokuphela kwenkontileka yakhe neKaizer Chiefs.Noma edlale imidlalo ewu-11 kuphela kwiligi kwisizini esanda kuphela, waqala emihlanu, uthe bekungelula ukuvele athole isikimu eqenjini elinabadlali abanjengo-Andile Jali, Rivaldo Coetzee, Hlompho Kekana nabanye.
"Ngijabule kakhulu, ukuwina izicoco kuyohlezi kujabulisa.
Bekuyisizini yami yokuqala neqembu kodwa ngikwazile ukuphakamisa indebe yeligi futhi," kusho uMaluleka.
"Kule midlalo engiyidlalile ngicabanga ukuthi ngenze kahle.
Umdlalo engingathokozanga ngawo esawudlala neBloemfontein Celtic kodwa ngigculisekile ngeminye.
"Konke kwenzeke ngendlela ebengiyilindele.
ISundowns inenqwaba yabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu.
Sisivikele isicoco seligi, okusho ukuthi siyabuyela kwi-CAF Champions League ngesizini ezayo.
Kwasiphatha kabi ukukhishwa yi-Al Ahly.
"Noma kunjalo siyaziqhenya.
Ngiyazama ukungazifaki ngaphansi kwengcindezi ngoba bekuyisizini yokuqala.
Abantu abaningi babethi ngeke ngidlale kodwa ngidlalile.
Nami ngiphonsile esivivaneni, ngijabule kakhulu.
"UMaluleka wayiwina kabili iligi neSuperSport United, wayinqoba kanye neChiefs njengoba esephinde wayithatha neSundowns.Uthe usalambele ezinye izicoco futhi unethemba lokuthi ziyeza uma ebheka adlala nabo nomsebenzi owenziwa ngabaqeqeshi uManqoba Mngqithi, Steve Komphela noRhulani Mokwena.
"Angisabheki emuva, ngisalindele okukhulu kunalokhu.
Ngiyethemba ukuthi kuningi esisazokuzuza naleli qembu," kuqhuba uMaluleka.
"Nabaqeqeshi bashaye into ecokeme ngokuthatha iligi ngesizini yabo yokuqala, kuyakhombisa ukuthi basezingeni eliphezulu.
USteve uthanda kwenziwe izinto ngendlela eqondile, uManqoba udlala indima yokuba ubaba noRhulani naye ukhona.
Bayahlangana bakhe amasu esizowasebenzisa enkundleni.
Bonke baletha okuthile okuhlukile okuphathelene nebhola noma impilo nje.
Ngibona ukuthi yilokho okwenze siphumelele."
UMngqithi udalula imfihlo yabo kwiDowns
UKWENGEZWA kukaSteve Komphela ethimbeni labaqeqeshi beMamelodi Sundowns ekuqaleni kwesizini, kudale ukungabaza ukuthi bazokwazi ukusebenza bebathathu ngokubambisana ngaphandle kokuxokizelana.UKomphela wethulwe waba ngumqeqeshi omdala (senior coach) ejoyina uManqoba Mngqithi noRulani Mokwena abethulwe kwathiwa bangabaqeqeshi abalinganayo ekuholeni iqembu.Yinto ebingakaze ibonakale kunobhutshuzwayo waseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi iqembu libe nezinhloko zabaqeqeshi ezintathu.Kodwa bagile izimanga behlanganisa imidlalo engu-20 yeligi bengayazi induku, kangangoba banqobe isicoco seligi besahlulwe wumdlalo owodwa kwengu-27 yeDStv Premiership.Baphume kuma-semifinal eNedbank Cup nakuma-quarterfinal eCaf Champions League.Engxoxweni ekhethekile neSolezwe ngeSonto, uMngqithi uveze imfihlo ebenze baphumelela ukubambisana bobathathu.
"Into esivumelane ngayo kuqala isizini wukuthi kufanele sisebenzele ukugeza igama lomuntu omnyama.
Siyindlu emnyama sidume ngokuthi kasikwazi ukubambisana.
Sidume ngokuthi sivele sibange amandla sibuye sikhwabanise uma sibekwe ezikhundleni zokuhola.
Bekufanele sibe yisibonelo sokuthi indlu emnyama yingakwenza okuhlukile, ingaklwebhani kodwa ibambisane,“ kusho uMngqithi.Lo mqeqeshi waseMvubukazi, eMzimkhulu sikhuluma nje, ubalwe nazo izinsizwa asebenza nazo, uMokwena noKomphela bamele iSundowns embangweni womklomelo womqeqeshi ovelele kule sizini.Isicoco esinqotshwe yiSundowns ngesika-11 emlandweni weligi yePremier Soccer League.
Yibisisinqoba okwesine amasizini elandelana.Nyakenye uMngqithi wubekhona besinqoba okwesithathu kulandelana eyiphini likaPitso Mosimane osekwi-Al Ahly.Empeleni kusekhona ukuhlukana phakathi kubathandi bakanobhutshuzwayo.
Abanye basamile ekutheni yima kuzocaca ngesizini ezayo ukuthi ngabe ngempela siyasebenza yini isixaxa mbiji, sikaMngqithi nozakwabo noma bebesashaya ngoshuni oshiywe nguMosimane.“Ngeke ngiqambe amanga ngithi uPitso akasishiyanga isisekelo lapha eqenjini.
Nami bengikhona lapho.
Yimi owazi kahle ukuthi ushiye senzeni.
Nokho umuntu oqonda ibhola ubonile ukuthi sithe ukuhluka isitayela sokudlala.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, kunenqwaba yabadlali abafike kule sizini esehambile.
Lokho kwenze sashintsha izindawo zabanye abaningi abakade bekhona.
Lokho kufanele kusheshe kutolike ukushintsha kwendlela yokudlala,’’ kusho uMngqithi.
IChiefs iphunyule sekuvalwe amehlo
SIBUSISO MDLALOSE noNHLANHLA SITHOLEKUQOPHEKE umlando eNaturena emuva kokuthi iKaizer Chiefs ingene esigabeni esandulela esamanqamu eCaf Champions League okokuqala emlandweni wayo, yize ishaywe yiSimba SC ngo 3-0 emdlalweni obudlalelwa eTanzania izolo ntambama.Amakhosi abeye kulo mdlalo ehamba phambili ngo 4-0 emuva kokuthi emlenzeni wokuqala obuseFNB Stadium, eGoli.
Lapha bekudingeka ukuba iSimba ishaye amagoli amahlanu, bese kuthi iChiefs ingabi nayo impendulo.Ephawula ngalo mdlalo umqeqeshi waMakhosi uGavin Hunt uthe konke kuhambe njengoba bebefisa, ukudlulela esigabeni esandulela esamanqamu.
“Bekungelula neze kulo mdlalo.
Kubengconywana esikhathini esingangemizuzu ewu-26 yokuqala.
Emuva kwalo bathole igoli lokuqala nokwenze sadlala ngaphansi kwengcindezi,”kuchaza uHunt.Ngalo mphumela uthe: “Empeleni lomphumela akusiwona owami ngedwa kodwa oweqembu lonke leChiefs.
Yize sinqobile kodwa kumele silungiselele imidlalo emithathu esele yeligi.
Mayelana nomdlalo wesigaba esandulela esamanqamu kubukeka izophazamisa izinhlelo zokuqala amalungiselelo esizini entsha, kodwa akusenani sizibona.”Komunye umdlalo i-Al Ahly iqhubeke lapho igcine khona iwashisa ijezi iMamelodi Sundowns ibambana nayo ngo 1-1 emlenzeni sesibili wama-quarterfinal eCaf Champions League obuseLucas Moripe Stadium, izolo ntambama.I-Al Ahly ibivele ize kulo mdlalo ihamba phambili ngamagoli njengoba emlenzeni wokuqala kuyiyona ebinqobe ngo 2-0 eCairo, e-Egypt, ngoMgqibelo odlule.Nokho ezikaPitso Mosimane zikhombise zisuka nje ukuthi azizile ukuzosinisa amahleza kulo mdlalo ngenkathi uYassir Ibrahim engqomfela phakathi ngekhanda ibhola ebeliyikhona ebigotshwe u-Amr Sulaya ngomzuzu ka-11.Okuqaphelekile kulo mdlalo ukubuya kwesiklwibhishi nesethenjwa seDowns, uThemba "Mshishi" Zwane nenjini yasesiswini u-Andile Jali abangadlalanga emlenzeni wokuqala e-Egypt, abadlake kangcono kakhulu kulo mdlalo.UMosa Lebosa uyena otholele iDowns igoli lokulinganisa ngomzuzu ka-29 engqomfela phakathi ngekhanda ibhola ebeligotshwe u-Aubrey Modiba kade kuyikhona.Nakuba ziye ekhefini zibambene ngo 1-1 kodwa kodwa iDowns yiyona ebiphethe umdlalo ngesiwombe sokuqala, nakwesesibili bekuyesifanayo kodwa kwala khona ukwenza.IDowns bekudingeka inqobe lo mdlalo ngo 3-0 ingangenelwa goli kulo mdlalo ukuze izibekisele indawo kowandulela owamanqamu, nokho okugcine kungenzekanga njengoba ezikaMosimane zibukeke "zipake ibhasi" kulo mdlalo.Ngemuva komdlalo uPitso Mosimane ocija amaRed Devils uphume enkundleni eqhasha ngaphandle kokuxhawula kubalingani bakhe beSundowns.
Ekhuluma nabezindaba emuva komdlalo uthe uphoxeke kabi ngemibiko ebibhalwe ezingqwembeni endleleni eya enkundleni.“Ngiyazibuza ukuthi kumele ngilenzeleni engcono leli qembu njengoba abalandeli balo bengithuka ngale ndlela.
Okungizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu ukungithuka ngomama.
Ngiyamazi umuntu obephehla lokhu, kodwa kulungile, ”kukhala uMosimane.
Isikhulu asizilungele izinselelo eziza nokunqoba iNedbank
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUNGENA ezintangeni umnikazi weRichards Bay, uSifiso "Jomo" Biyela uma ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe uzilungele izinselelo zokunqoba iNedbank Cup.INatal Rich Boyzs idlulele kuma-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup ngemuva kokuqumba phansi iTS Sporting ngo 2-1 emdlalweni weLast 16.
Emdlalweni wokuqala leli qembu eliphekwa uSimo Dladla lawashisa ijezi iKaizer Chiefs.Kuma-qaurterfinal ezikaBiyela ziqhathwe neChippa United edlule kwiCape Town City ngo-2-1.
Umdlalo ungoMgqibelo ngo-3.30pm eSisa Dukashe Stadium, eMdantsane.Amanye amaqembu adlala kwiGladAfrica Championship akuma-quarter final, iCape Town All Stars ezodlala nontanga bayo iPretoria Callies.INedbank Cup idume ngokuba nofishi abancane abadla abakhulu, ngo-2019, iTS Galaxy eyayidlala kwiGladAfrica, yamangaza izwe ishaya iKaizer Chiefs kowamanqamu ale nkomishi.Yaba yiqembu lokuqala elidlala kulesi sigaba ukunqoba lo mqhudelwano, nokudlala kwiCaf Confederation Cup okubikwa ukuthi inezindleko ezimba eqolo.Ebuzwa uBiyela ukuthi njengoba abafana bakhe beshisa ngalolu hlobo, ngabe uzivivele yini izindleko zokunqoba iNedbank Cup, uthe: "Eish, iqhinga liyozakha uma kwenzeka ngibhekana naleso simo.
Ukukhuluma iqiniso, bengingakulindele ukufika kulesi sigaba esesikuso.
Ubhekana nezinselelo ezifana nalezi uma unabadlali abanethelante, abalithandayo iqembu labo.”Uqhube wathi: "INedbank Cup kayikho ezinhlelweni zami, ekhanda kuduma isicoco seligi.
Sisembhidlangweni wokuqoqa amaphuzu awu-65.
Ngizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukujabulisa abadlali bami ukuze lifezeke leli phupho.
Ngingamane ngikhiphe amabhonasi uma kungiphoqa.
AmaNatal Rich Boys ngiwafuna kwiDStv Premiership ngesizini ezayo.”UDan "Dance" Malesela owanqobisa iGalaxy, iNedbank ngo-2019, uthe ukunqoba kweBay kwiKaizer akusho ukuthi kumele bayisabe.“Ngiwumuntu ongenandaba nokuthi amaqembu aqhathwe kanjani, nokuthi iqembu elithile lizodlala nobani.
Okubalulekile ukuthi sizodlala kanjani emdlalweni ozayo, kusiphoqa ukwenyusa izinga.
Kunamaqembu asatshwa kungafanele, uthole ukuthi uma sesidlala nawo awanasimanga,” kubeka uMalesela ngemuva kokuqhathwa kwabo.Nasemidlalweni yeligi iBay kuyihambela kahle.
Iqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-28 emuva kwemidlalo ewu-16.
Kuyibhedele ekugcineni iSwallows ibanjwa koweligi
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEIPHINDE yahluleka iSwallows ukuzibuyisela embangweni wesicoco seligi, ibambana ngo-1-1 neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni obuyizolo, eDobsonville Stadium.Igoli leSwallows  libhakuziswe enethini uZaphania Mbokoma ngomzuzu ka-31 ngemuva komnyakazo omuhle kaKamohelo Mahlatsi noRuzaigh Gamildien.Ele TTM kube iphenathi evalelwe phakathi uBulelani Ndengane esikhathini sikanompempe.IZinyoni zibulawe uPetso Maphanga ongene esiwombeni sesibili  owise uNdengane ebhokisini singekho isidingo.Usawoti esilondeni seSwallows uphinde wathelwa ukunqoba kweLamontville Golden Arrows eshaye iBlack Leopards ngo-3-1.I-Arrows inyukele kweyesine ngamaphuzu awu-32, Izinyoni zehlela kweyesihlanu ngawu-31.Izolo bekuwumdlalo weshumi  Izinyoni zidlala ngokulingana.
Zagcina ukunqoba ngoJanuwari zishaya iBaroka.Njengoba beziphuma ekushayweni okokuqala zidlala neTS Galaxy koweNedbank Cup, bekwethenjwa ukuthi zizokwazi ukuvala igebe lamaphuzu phakathi kwazo namaqembu angaphezulu.Esiwombeni sokuqala okugqame kuso unozinti weSwallows, uVirgil Vries obevimba izinguzunga zamashodi kaRhulani Manzini noFarai Madhanaga, kuhlasele zisuka yona iSwallows.Ukuhlangana kukaKamohelo Mahlatshi, Kgaokgelo Sekgota noGamildien kuzithwalise kanzima izitobha zeTTM.UNdengane weTTM  obematasa nokudlalisa kabi uMahlatshi usindele unompempe uPhilangenkosi Khumalo obekubonakala engazimisele ukukhipha amakhadi kwesokuqala.Kwesesibili ugcine elitholeli eliphuzi uNdengane.
Bese kungathi uyabukisa uKhumalo ngokukhipha amakhadi aphuzi.Nakuba ibhola belisezinyaweni zeSwallows esikhathini esiningi kodwa iTTM beyifika kuzwakale ebhokisini lezitha.Ukube  ubelele eVries ngabe kushintshwe iTTM isivalele amagoli amathathu kaManzini nelikaMadhanaga.Abaqeqeshi beTTM, uMpho Maleka noDavid Mathebula kuthe uma bebona ukuthi kuyonakala, esiwombeni sesibili babeuya noCelimpilo Ngema ongene esikhundleni sikaManzini noJoseph Malongoane abangene bayishukumisa bebambisene noLerato Lamola ongawuqedanga umdlalo.Ngoka-50, uNgema udedele ingizunga evinjwe uVries maqede walimala ihlombe.Ukungena kukaTokelo Ranti noThabo Rakhale kube nezithelo, iTTM bese ihlasela ingaqedi okudale ukutatazela kwabeSwallows.Zivele sezikhona izinkulumo ezithi insimbi seyiqalile ukushisa kubadlali nakubaqeqeshi beSwallows.
Amanye amaqembu aseyibambile indlela edlala ngayo.ISwallows isiyoze idlale neChippa United ngoMashi 20, eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium.ITTM izoqhubeka nokuhlala endaweni ka-14 ngamaphuzu awu-16, emidlalweni ewu-18.Kolandelayo iTTM izokwamukela iLamontville Golden Arrows, e-Old Peter Mokaba Stadium ngoLwesithathu.Imiphumela yeDStv Premiership:SuperSport United 0-0 TS Galaxy; Cape Town City 1-2 Stellenbosch; Chippa United 0-3 Orlando Pirates; Black Leopards 1-3 Lamontville Golden Arrows; Swallows 1-1 Tshakhuma.Imiphumela yeGladAfrica Championship:Cape Umoya United 0-2 Uthongathi; JDR 1-2 Cape Town All Stars; Bizana Pondo Chiefs 0-0 Richards Bay FC; Jomo Cosmos 1-3 TS Sporting; Polokwane City 1-0 University of Pretoria; Pretoria Callies 2-3 Royal AM; Sekhukhune 1-0 Free State Stars; Cape Town Spurs 1-1 Steenburg.I-LOG YE-DSTV PREMIERSHIPAmaqembuPWDLFAPtsSundowns16106026736Pirates20983241535SuperSport20974281934Arrows18882271732Swallows187101211331AmaZulu18774241928CPT City        19676292825TS Galaxy18585181723Baroka18567192521Chiefs17476172019Celtic19478192319Stellenbosch17467182218Chippa18378162316Tshakhuma17377102116Maritzburg173410132313Leopards183312143112
UMotsepe umelwe wukukhipha iCaf ehlazweni
“I-AFRICA idinga ukuhlanganyela ngobuhlakani, kanjalo nesiphiwo esikhethekile sabo bonke omengameli (bezinhlangano eziphethe ibhola) emazweni angamalungu (eCaf).”Lawa ngamanye amazwi kaPatrice Motsepe ngesikhathi emukela ukuqokwa kwakhe ukuba  ngumengameli omusha weConfederation of African Football Association eRabat, eMoroco ngoLwesihlanu.“Uma sonke sisebenza ngokubambisana, unobhutshuzwayo e-Afrika uzokuba nempumelelo nentuthuko engakaze ibonakale phambili,” kusho le njinga yezimayini ekleliswe yaba ngeyesishiyagalolunye kubantu abacebile e-Afrika.Uthe uthokoze kakhulu (ngokuqokelwa esikhundleni).
Ngakho izinto kuzodingeka zenziwe ngokukhulu ukushesha ngoba muningi kakhulu umsebenzi osadinga ukwenziwa.
Kuzodingeka senze isiqiniseko sokuthi ibhola lase-Africa aligcini nje kuphela ngokwaziwa lapha e-Africa kuphela  kodwa nasemhlabeni wonke.
“I-Africa ichitha izigidi zama-dollar minyaka yonke ithenga amalungela emidlalo yebhola komabonakude ukuveza amaligi angaphandle kwe-Afrika.
Kunesidingo sokuthi sizakhele eyethu imikhiqizo, ngaleyo ndlela sizophumelela.“Ibhola lase-Africa ngeke liphinde lifane nakuqala.
U-95% wezingxoxo zethu uzoba yibhola, ngiyavuma kuhle lokho, kodwa kuzofanele kube no-5% lapho sizoxoxa khona ngokubaluleka kwezinkampani ezizimele (ezingafaka imali ebholeni).
Sidinga ukubuyisa ukuziqhenya, isithunzi nokuhlonishwa kwe-Africa,” kusho uDkt Patrice Motsepe.UMotsepe ukhuluma kanjena nje, ubhekene nenselelo enkulu yokukhipha iCaf ehlazweni engene kulo iphethwe ngu-Ahmad Ahmad obe ngumengameli wokuqala wale nhlangano odabuka e-Afrika esemazansi.U-Ahmad ngowaseMadagascar, umiswe iminyaka emibili engazihlanganisi nebhola emuva kokulahlwa ngamacala enkohlakalo.“Ukubola kwesandla”sika-Ahmad kubonakale nangokuthi womahlanu amazwe abemele iCaf kwi-2018 Fifa World Cup aphume wonke esigabeni samaqoqo, obekuqala ukwenzeka eminyakeni engu-36.Kuqokwa u-Ahmad, ekhipha u-Issa Hayatou, waseCameroon obeseqhoqhobele esokuhola iCaf iminyaka engu-29, kwaba khona abasola umengameli weFifa, uGianni Infantino ngokuba nomthelela emiphumeleni yokhetho.Nasekuqokweni kukaMotsepe angaphikiswa, asifihliwe isandla sika-Infantino kwazise ubephambili emihlanganweni ebiseMorocco ngaphambi kokhetho.Kule mihlangano bebekhona bobane abebebanga, uMotsepe, u-Ahmed Yahya waseMauritania no-Augustin Senhgor waseSenegal abaphume embangweni bamukela ngaphambi kokhetho izikhundla zokuba ngamaphini, elesibili nelokuqala kaMotsepe.Kanjalo noJacques Anouma wase-Ivory Coast, osale ekhalela “intandoyeningi” ekhonjwa kwesokuba ngumeluleki oyisipesheli kaMotsepe.Ukukhipha iCaf ehlazweni, nazi ezinye zezinto ngokombiko we-AFP, ezimele uMotsepe ukuba aziqondise.Ukulwa nenkohlakaloIgama leCaf lingcolisekile eminyakeni edlule lilandelwa yizinsolo zenkohlakalo, ezinye zazo eziqinisekisiwe ophenyweni lweFifa kwazise wamiswa iminyaka emihlanu u-Ahmad.Okufanele kukhathaze uMotsepe wukuthi ngaphambi kokumiswa u-Ahmad ubesekwa yizifunda ezingu-46 kwezingu-54 zeCaf ukuthi abuyele ihlandla lesibili ekubeni ngumengameli.
U-Ahmad usolwa “ngokukhwabanisa imali, wukusebenzisa amandla ngendlela engeyiyo, wukwamukela nokunikezela ngezipho nokunye“.Indlela yokuphatha Umbiko wakamuva wocwaningo lwamabhuku olunzulu wePricewaterhouse Coopers uveze ukuthi iCaf inezinto eziningi ezikhokhela ngemali eqhamuka kuye ekhukhwini lakhe, okunika isithombe sokungaphathwa ngendlela kwezimali nenhlangano uqobo.
Amabhuku ayo kuthiwe “kawakholakali” okuningi ukusebenza kwemali akunawo amaphepha akusekayo.Emahhovisi ekomkhulu eCairo kuthiwa ashoda ngabasebenzi, okuholela ekutheni abakhona badonse kanzima futhi bangabi namdlandla.Ukungabonwa kwiTV kwemidlaloInhlangano ehamba phambili ukusakaza ibhola lase-Afrika ngesiNgisi eseGoli, iSuperSport, igcine ngo-2019 ukukhombisa imidlalo yamaqembu yeCaf ngenxa yengxabano ngezinkontileka.“Ezinselelweni ezibhekene noMotsepe wukwakha ubumbano kwiCaf nokulungisa indaba yemidlalo kwiTV,” kusho uKalusha Bwalya, oke wengamela inhlangano eyengamele ibhola eZambia futhi oke wanqoba i-African Footballer of the Year.Wukulungisa ezokuxhumanaUma ungena kwi-website yeCaf kuncane kakhulu okuthola okumayelana nezindaba zebhola lase-Afrika.Uma uvula inkinobho ethi “Competitions?
World Cup 2022” uthola uhla lwemidlalo, izinkundla namagama onondweba emidlalo yokuhlunga edlalwe ngoSepthemba 2019.
Ayikho kodwa imiphumela, amagama abashaye amagoli nezikhathi zamagoli.Imidlalo ezodlala ngoMeyi iqhathwe ngoJanuwari 21, 2020 kodwa namanje uhla lwemidlalo olukhona kalunayo imininingwane edingekayo.Indaba yonondwebaZihlale zivela izinsolo zesandla semfene konondweba emidlalweni yeCaf.Ayikho iVAR e-Afrika futhi no-Infantino uyayibona inkinga, useze wathi akuqokwe uhlu lonondweba beqophelo base-Afrika abazoholelwa yiFifa.Ukulungisa udaba lwemihlomuloAmaqembu amaningi agcina engayikhuthaleli imidlalo yeCaf ngoba imali yemihlomulo iqala ukungena emuva kwemizuliswano emibili (kwiChampions League), emithathu (kwiConfederation Cup).Nalawo maqembu abekezela aze ayonqoba isicoco seChampions League esihambisana noR37 million, akhala ngokuthi akuwenzeli mehluko otheni kwazise isigamu sikhokha amabhonasi abadlali.“Kuyichilo ukuthi abanikazi bamaqembu anqoba izicoco bangena emaphaketheni abo ukuqinisa amabhuku ezimali,” kusho u-Infantino.
Uvuma eyokubanjwa kweqhinga lokunqoba OweZinyoni
UMQEQESHI weSwallows, uBrandon Truter, uvuma eyokubanjwa kwamaqhinga abekade ezigelezela ngawo esaphuma kwiGladAfrica Championship ekuqaleni kwesizini.IZinyoni zitheleke kwiDStv Premiership zathwesa ubunzima inqwaba yamaqembu, zithela othulini athenjiwe okukhona kuwona iKaizer Chiefs.
Nokho itshe seligaya ngomunye umhlathi njengoba sezihluleka ukucosha amaphuzu agcwele.
ISwallows isidlale ngokulingana emidlalweni eyisihlanu yeligi ilandelana nakuba ingayazi induku kwengu-17 kwiPremiership.UTruter uveze ukuthi abaqeqeshi bamaqembu sebeyalazi "ikhubalo" lakhe.
"Iqembu libukeka liphephile ezembeni.
Manje sesiqala umjikelezo wokugcina walo mjaho.
Kufanele siqhamuke namasu amasha esizowasebenzisa eqenjini ngoba abantu sebeyibonile indlela esilihlela ngayo iqembu futhi bayakusebenzisa lokho.
Uyabona ngesibalo semidlalo esiyidlala ngokulingana.
Ngokwamaqhinga sekuqala ukuba nzima.
Kodwa kumnandi, kwenza ucabange ujule.
Awukwazi ukuthembela ekutheni unjena futhi izinto uzenza ngendlela ethize.
Kufanele kube khona esikwenzayo ezimeni ezithize emidlalweni.
Kodwa kumnandi.
Akukwenzi unethezeke," kusho uTruter.ISwallows izovakashela iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni weLast 16 yeNedbank Cup ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, kusasa ngo-6 ntambama.
"Wumdlalo onzima esizowudlala neTTM.
Angicabangi ukuthi iseyiqembu elifanayo nesidlale nalo ekuqaleni kwesizini.
Badlala kahle.
Ngicabanga ukuthi manje sebewine imidlalo emithathu ilandelana.
Ngakho kuzoba wumdlalo onzima.
Abadlali babukeka bezelwe kabusha ngaphansi kwabaphathi abasha.
Bafuna ukudlala.
Kunabadlali abasezingeni eliphezulu abangawushintsha umdlalo.
Kuzoba nezinguquko esikimini sethu, kodwa hhayi ngoba siwuthatha kancane lo mqhudelwano noma siwuthatha njengento engekho phambili kithina.
Sifuna ukwenza kahle kuyona yonke imidlalo kungakhathalekile ukuthi yiligi noma yindebe.
Sizobophela abadlali abangu-11 abakhona," kusho uTruter.I-TTM, esinabaphathi abasha, izintambo kuyona zisabanjwe uDavid Mathebula noMpho Makola njengoba uDylan Kerr esalinde imvume yokusebenza kuleli.
I-UEFA isongela amaqembu ezimpunyela aqala iSuper League
INHLANGANO ephethe ibhola e-Europe, i-UEFA, isisongele amaqembu ezimpunyela ase-Europe asememezele ukuthi azoba yingxenye ye-European Super League (ESL) ngokuthi bazowakhipha kuyo yonke imincintiswano engaphansi kwe-UEFA.
NgeSonto, amaqembu ahamba phambili e-Europe athuse iziphathimandla zebhola ngokunjalo nabalandeli ememezela izinhlelo zomncintiswano omusha ozobizwa nge-ESL.
Kulawo maqembu kubalwa ayisithupha ase-England (Manchester United, Manchester City, Liverpool, Arsenal,  Chelsea, neTottenham Hotspur), amathathu ase-Italy (Juventus, Inter Milan, AC Milan), namanye amathathu ase-Spain (Barcelona, Real Madrid, Athletico Madrid).
Onke lawa maqembu ajoyina i-ESL njengabasunguli, kanti uma isiqalile ngeke agawulwe yizembe futhi ngeke adinge ukuhlungela ukudlala kuyo minyaka yonke.
Ngokwemibiko yamaphephandaba ezemidlalo e-Europe, kuvela ukuthi iBayern Munich neDortmund banqabile ukuba yingxele yale ligi, okwamanje.
NePSG yaseFrance, equkethe abadlali abaphambili emhlabeni, kuvela ukuthi isaziqhathulula, kayifuni ukumataniswa nalo mncintiswano.
I-Juventus ibe yiqembu lokuqala ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izobe idlala kwi-ESL abathemba ukuthi izoqala ngesizini ezayo.Iphendula lezi zindaba i-UEFA nezinhlangano ezengamele amaligi emazweni ase-Europe, bathe bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuvimba lo mncintiswano.“Sizobheka konke esingakwenza ngokomthetho wezinkantolo ngokunjalo nangokomthetho wezemidlalo.
Ingqikithi yebhola isekubeni khona kokuncintisana kumdlalo, akukwazi ukuba okunye,” kusho UEFA esitatimendeni.
Ithe amaqembu azoba yingxenye ye-ESL azovalelwa ngaphandle kuyo yonke imincintiswano ye-EUFA yamaqembu okubalwa kuyo i-UEFA Champions League (UCL) ne-Europa League.
I-UEFA isongela kanjena nje kuyimanje iManchester City, Real Madrid neChelsea bakuma-semifinal e-UCL.
Kwi-Europa League nakhona kubusa amaqembu afuna ukudlala kwi-ESL njengoba kuma-semifinal kukhona iManchester United ne-Arsenal.
Ngaphandle kokuvalelwa ngaphandle kule mncintiswano, i-UEFA ithe abadlali abagijima kuleli qembu bangase banqatshelwe ukudlalela amaqembu esizwe.
Kuphinde kwayibhimbela   i-Arrows ibanjelwa ekhaya
ILAMONTVILLE Golden Arrows iphinde yahluleka ukubuyela emgqigqweni wayo eqale ngawo isizini ibanjwa yiBaroka emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, izolo ntambama.I-Arrows, ehlulwe okwesibili kule sizini emidlalweni yeligi iqunjwa phansi yiBlack Leopards ngesonto eledlule, bekulindeleke ukuthi ibuyise umfutho wayo oholele ekutheni idlale imidlalo engu-11 ingahlulwa kule sizini.
Umgqigqo omuhle we-Arrows unyomfwe yiCape Town City emasontweni adlule.
Izolo kuphinde kwacaca ukuthi Abafana Bes'thende badonsa kanzima ukubuyisa umfutho abaqale ngawo isizini oholele ekutheni baphenduke elinye lamaqembu esatshwayo kwiPremiership.IBaroka iyona ezinze kuqala, yangena iphindelela ebhokisini le-Arrows.
Nokho udonga lwasemuva lwe-Arrows luphumelele ukuyichiliza yonke iminyakazo.
Unozinti waBafana Bes'thende, uSifiso Mlungwana, utakule ezakhe echithela ngaphandle i-free kick ebiyingozi kaJoslin Kamatuka ngomzuzu ka-12.
Emuva kwalokho, i-Arrows iyibonile ingozi eyicathamelayo, yaqala yangena emdlalweni.
Nokho awekho amathuba abephakamisa amaphaphu kwazise iminyakazo eminingi iphelele odongeni lwasemuva lweBaroka.Esiwombeni sesibili, iBaroka ibuye nomfutho ofanayo neqale ngawo umdlalo, yafaka ingcindezi kwi-Arrows.
Nokho Abafana Bes'thende ngokuhamba kwesikhathi bakushintshile konke lokho, bangena ngawo wonke amazibuko befuna igoli.
Kodwa ke kucacile ukuthi iBaroka isebenzela ukuphuma nephuzu ngesikhathi unozinti wayo u-Oscarine Masuluke eselala phansi, enza sengathi ulimele, nobekuyimizamo yokuhambisa isikhathi.
I-Arrows ibilokhu izame njalo ukuthola igoli kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.
Womabili amaqembu agcine ehlomule ngephuzu.
Komunye umdlalo weligi obuyizolo eSisa Dukashe Stadium, eMdantsane, iChippa United neCape Town City nabo bashayane baze babukana umdlalo uphela ngo 0-0.

UMoseamedi uthemba umgqigqo wasekhaya weTeam of Choice
SITHEMBISO MKHIZELIMNIKA ithemba irekhodi lakamuva lokwenza kahle ekhaya, uJudas Moseamedi ongenye yezinsika zeMaritzburg United ephoqwa isimo ukunqoba kwiBaroka, kusasa, ngo-5 ntambama, eHarry Gwala Stadium.Ngenxa yokwazi isimo iqembu elibhekene naso, lo mgadli osashaye amagoli amane kule sizini yeDStv Premiership, uthe sebekudlulisile emqondweni ukushaywa kwabo i-Orlando Pirates ngo 2-0 kodlule.
Kuyabaphoqa ukuthi bawathole womathathu amaphuzu kwiBaroka ukuze basuke emsileni.
"Sisenalo ithuba lokusuka kule ndawo esikuyo.
Ngeke kusize ngalutho ukulahla ithemba.
Noma sidliwe kodlule kodwa kuyathokozisa ukubona ozakwethu benokuzethemba, begqugquzekile futhi kunokumamatheka ebusweni babo.
Ukudlalela ekhaya kwenza kube lula ukwehlula iBaroka.
Kumele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi siyaqhubeka nokungehlulwa ekhaya", kubeka uMoseamedi.Emidlalweni emithathu yakamuva, eHarry Gwala Stadium, iTeam of Choice, eqeqeshwa u-Ernst Middendorp, ishaye ngo-1-0 iBlack Leopards, yabambana ngo-1-1 neKaizer Chiefs, kowokugcina yabhaxabula iChippa United ngo-5-1.Ihleli endaweni ka-13 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-20, emidlalweni ewu-21.Uma isafuna ukudlala kwiDStv Premiership ngesizini ezayo kumele kule midlalo eyisishiyagalolunye eyisalele igweme ukulahla amaphuzu.Okungayiduduza ukuthi iphethe esandleni  umdlalo kwiLeapords esekugcineni ngamaphuzu awu-13, nemibili kwiChippa United anamaphuzu awu-17.Nokushaywa kweChippa United yiBaroka, ngoLwesibili, akubuzwa ukuthi kuzijabulisile azikaMoseamedi.
AmaChilli Boys abambe unombolo-13 ngamaphuzu awu-19.UMoseamedi uthe balindele umdlalo onzima kwiBaroka.
"Uma ubheka imiphumela yemidlalo yakamuva yeBaroka uyabona ukuthi bayiqembu elidlala kahle.
NakoweChippa, batshengisile ukuthi bayiqembu elinzima.
Okwethu okuzilungiselela ngokuphelele".Ukunqoba kweBaroka, ngoLwesibili kuyibeke  endaweni yesishiyagalombili.
UGoodman Mosele oshaye igoli lokunqoba iChippa maqede waqokwa njengomdlali wosuku, uthe: “Iseyinde indlela, lesi yisiqalo.
NgoLwesihlanu sinomdlalo onzima neMaritzburg, uma singaphinde sithole amaphuzu amathathu kungaba lula ukubheka phambili.”Kusasa iTeam of Choice izobe ilwela ukubuyisa izinduku kwiBaroka.
Emlenzeni wokuqala yashaywa ngo-2-1 ekuhambeni.

STHEMBISO NGOBESEISITOBHA  seJomo Cosmos, u-Ayanda Gcaba, sibona besenalo ithuba lokufica amanye amaqembu aphezulu kwi-log yeGladAfrica Championship.UGcaba usho kanje ngaphambi kokuba ezakhe zibhekane noThongathi FC emdlalweni ozokuba ngoMgqibelo ngo-3.30 ntambama ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.ICosmos eqeqeshwa ngumnikazi wayo u-Ephraim “Jomo” Sono, iyiqale ngegiya eliphezulu isizini ka-2020/2021, kepha kamuva kubukeka izinto zingayihambeli kahle njengoba ilahla amaphuzu.Ngempelasonto edlule ikhale ngaphansi kwiTS Sporting ishaywa ngo 3-1 , eTsakane Stadium.

Nakuba okwamanje sihlezi endaweni engeyinhle kodwa ngokubona kwami sisenalo ithuba lokuwafica amaqembu aphezulu.
Okuzomele sikwenze nje wukuthi siqinisekise ukuthi siyayinqoba imidlalo yethu ezayo.
Ngicabanga futhi ukuthi uma singanqoba imidlalo emibili kulandelana lokhu kungenza umehluko omkhulu kakhulu kwi-log.”Ngesikhathi  iCosmos igcina ukuhlangana noThongathi kwiligi ngoDisemba,  kwanqoba iCane Cutters ngo 1-0.Imidlalo yeGladAfrica Championship yangempelasonto:Kusasa - Ngo-3.30pm: Steenberg United v Cape United – (Idas Valley).NgoMgqibelo - Ngo-3.30pm: Uthongathi FC v Jomo Cosmos (Princess Magogo); University of Pretoria v Sekhukhune United (ABSA Tuks Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-3.30pm: Pondo Chiefs v JDR Stars (Princess Magogo); TS Sporting v Polokwane City (Kabokweni Stadium).

Kulo mqhudelwano obushisa phansi, uZakithi oqeqeshwa uVictor Vaz, ushaye intambo ngesikhathi esiwu-45.54.
Isibili sithathwe uLottering Darll wasesifundeni i-Eastern Province Athletics (EPA) noConrade Pieter we-Athletics Central Northwest (ACN).Ama-Olympics azokuba seTokyo, eJapan ngoJulayi.

Ingijabulisile indlela esidlale ngayo.
Njengamanje isifiso sami ukumela izwe lami kuma-Olympics.
Nomqeqeshi wami nabobonke abangiphethe sisazohlala phansi sibone ukuthi lokhu sikuhlela kanjani.
Ikusasa liyakhanya kubasubathi bakithi, isifiso ukubona abasubathi baKwaZulu-Natal begcwala emaqenjini esizwe.
Ngithanda nokubongela uMathanga (Mbuleli) nabanye  ngobungcweti abutshengisile enqoba ku-10 000m," kuchaza uNene.Lo msubathi odabuka eMnambithi uhambela phezulu kulezi zinsuku kulandela ukuthi eqokelwe eqenjini lesizwe le-relay eliya kumaWorld Athletics Relay ePoland angoMeyi 1-2.

"Lesi yisiqalo, kukhulu kuyeza.
Sisazohlangana sibone ukuthi abasubathi bethu sibajabulisa kanjani.
Kumele sivumelane ngokuthi sibakhuthaza  kanjani, siyaziqhenya ngabo.
