UMazinyo uyaziqhenya ngokutakula iMaritzburg
XOLILE MPISANEUMQEQESHI weMaritzburg United, u-Ernst Middendorp, uthi ukuvala ngqi emuva ikhona okubasizile ukuthi baphephe engozini yokudliwa yizembe.I-Team of Choice ingene emdlalweni wokusonga isizini, ewudlale nomkhaya AmaZulu, idinga iphuzu ukuze ingazifaki engcupheni yokudlala kweyokuhlunga.Emva kokungenisa amagoli amabili bedlala neSuperSport United, uMiddendorp uthe baqhamuke neqhinga elenze bagcine bebambene noSuthu ngo-0-0, baqeda endaweni ka-13 ngamaphuzu awu-30.“Ngiyasazi isimo ukuthi besinjani ekuqaleni kukaDisemba.
Emva kwemidlalo eyisithupha, besingenawo amaphuzu.
Emva kweyisishiyagalombili, besinamaphuzu amabili kuphela kwawu-24 ebesesiwadlalelile.
Siqede imidlalo ewu-15, okunguhhafu wesizini, sinamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye kuphela, kodwa manje sesiphethe isizini ngawu-30,” kusho uMiddendorp.“Sikhethe ukungena kulo mdlalo wokugcina nezitobha ezine emuva.
Bezingakhuphuki nakancane futhi zingavuli izikhala phakathi kwazo.
Zidlale ngokubambisana nabadlali ababili ebesiqinise ngabo isisu.“Ngesikhathi silungiselela uSuthu besibheke kakhulu ukuthi sidlale ngokusondelana, silekelelane, singazivuli izikhala ngasebhokisini lethu.“Besithi sizobathola kuma-free-kick namakhona noma silinde benze amaphutha bese siyabazuma ngejubane.
Siwatholile amathuba amabili noma amathathu.
Ukuba sidlale ngobuhlakani phambili besizolishaya igoli, sithole nomphumela obungalindelwe muntu.“Kodwa-ke AmaZulu enze kahle kakhulu ngokuqeda endaweni ewafaka kwiChampions League.
Iwona abewuphethe umdlalo imizuzu yonke ewu-95, kodwa ekugcineni sawabamba ngo-0-0 ngenxa yokuzikhandla.”UMiddendorp uthe kumele bazishayele ihlombe ngokutakula leli qembu emva kokuthi lihlale emsileni isikhathi eside kwisizini ka-2020/21.“Kuyamangalisa esikwenzile.
Asingenanga kwiChampions League, asisiwinanga isicoco seligi noma enye indebe.
Sahlulwa ekhaya emdlalweni wokugcina womzuliswano wokuqala, sibambe ibhuleki, kodwa manje sisindile ezembeni, asidinganga nokudlala kweyokuhlunga.
Kumele siziqhenye, sincome abadlali ngabakwenzile, nawo wonke umuntu odlale indima ekutheni sigcine siphumelele.”
UMulenga ukhalima ozakwabo ngaphambi kowe’Downs
UMGADLI waMaZulu, u-Augustine Mulenga, ugcizelela eyokugwema amaphutha kozakwabo uma sebebhekene neMamelodi Sundowns koweDStv Premiership eJonsson Kings Park Stadium namhlanje ngo-3 ntambama.Usuthu, oludlala ingcwenga yebhola ngaphansi komqeqeshi uBenni McCarthy, luthwele amathemba enqwaba yamaqembu kwiPremiership okuthi luvimbe iSundowns ingavuli igebe elikhulu lamaphuzu esicongweni.
Ukudlubulundela kusemanje kweSundowns kungasho ukushabalala kwamathuba okuwina isicoco kwamanye amaqembu asakholwa wukuthi awukapheli umjaho.ISundowns enemidlalo ewu-20, iqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-46.
Ilandelwa AmaZulu aseqoqe amaphuzu awu-40 emidlalweni ewu-22.
"Engingakugcizelela kozakwethu wukuthi singawenzi amaphutha amaningi ngoba bengasihlula ngawo.
Uma singabenza ukuthi bona benze amaphutha, nginesiqiniseko sokuthi sizoqoqa amaphuzu amathathu.
Kufanele nje sigweme ukwenza amaphutha amaningi.
Sonke sisebenza kanzima futhi siwubheke ngabomvu lo mdlalo neSundowns ngoba wumdlalo omkhulu.
Amaphuzu amathathu azosisondeza kubona ngoba basesicongweni se-log," kusho uMulenga.ISundowns ayikaze ihlulwe emdlalweni weligi kule sizini.
Ithole isibhaxu kwiMTN 8, CAF Champions League nakwiNedbank Cup ekhishwe kuyona yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) sekushaywa amaphenathi ngempelasonto edlule.
Imimoya iphansi ekhempini yamaBrazilians ngenxa yalokhu.Umqeqeshi wamaBrazilians, uManqoba Mngqithi, uthe ithimba elisiza ekululameni kwabadlali lisebenza kanzima ngenxa yokuthi bafinyelele esikhathini esengeziwe neTshakhuma ekubeni bevele benemidlalo ethothene.
"Ukuba besazi ukuthi sizohlulwa, bekungaba ngcono ukuthi kwenzeke lokho emizuzwini engu-90.
Kodwa akusekho ongakwenza ngakho.
Abadlali bethu bayazi ukuthi banomthwalo kuyona yonke le midlalo futhi sidlala yonke le midlalo ngenxa yempumelelo yabo.
Ukuba bekungenjalo ngabe nathi sidlala imidlalo embalwa njangamanye amaqembu esidlala nawo.
Kodwa ngoba bayaqhubeka nokwenza kahle, kufanele bamelane nomphumela walokho.
Siyakwazi okusimele.
Siyakwazi okuzokwenzeka eThekwini.
Ngeke kube wumdlalo olula kodwa kufanele silwe.
Ithimba lethu elibhekele isimo sabadlali lisebenza kanzima ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abadlali bethu basesimeni sokuya emdlalweni naMaZulu, benze okulindelekile kubona," kusho uMngqithi.Umdlalo womzuliswano wokuqala weligi wala maqembu waphela ngo-4-3 kunqoba iSundowns.

OweSekhukhune ufuna ukufaka ingcindezi ngombango wesicoco
STHEMBISO NGOBESEUMQEQESHI weSekhukhune United, uMacDonald Makhubedu, uthi akukho ukwenza ngokunye ngaphandle kokuqhubeka nokuwaqoqa egcwele amaphuzu ukuze baqhubeke nokushubisa umbango wesicoco kwiGladAfrica Championship.UMakhubedu ukhulume kanje ngemuva kokuba ezakhe ziphunyuke ngembobo yenaliti ngesikhathi ziguqisa ngo-1-0 iFree State Stars emdlalweni wamaphuzu obuseMakhulong Stadium, eTembisa ngempelasonto.Igoli leSekhukhune libekwe enethini nguThabang Sibanyoni ngomzuzu ka-67 esiwombeni sesibili.Ukunqoba kweSekhukhune kuqhubekile nokuyibeka endaweni yesibili kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-27 emidlalweni engu-16.IRichards Bay FC isazihola phambili ngamaphuzu angu-28.

Siyajabula ukuthi sikwazile ukunqoba lapha,” kusho uShai oqokwe njengomdlali ovelele kulo mdlalo.NgoMgqibelo, iSekhukhune izobuyela enkundleni iyobhekana ne-University of Pretoria emdlalweni ongo-3.30 ntambama e-Absa Tuks Stadium, ePitoli.
Kuzothatha isikhathi ukuhlanganisa iBafana
UMGADLI weBafana Bafana, uPercy Tau, uyibona izothatha isikhathi impumelelo ngaphansi komqeqeshi omusha, uHugo Broos, oshaye ngesithende 'amakhehla' esikwatini sakhe.UTau, ogijima kwiBrighton & Hove Albion kwi-English Premier League, e-England, ngomunye wabadlali abambalwa abasinde ezembeni likaBroos okubeke kwacaca ukuthi okudlisa iBafana wukuthi inabadlali abaningi abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-30.
Kubadlali abamqoka abasale ngaphandle esikwatini sokuqala sikaBroos kukhona ukaputeni uThulani Hlatshwayo, Bongani Zungu, Dean Furman, Sifiso Hlanti nabanye.
IBafana izodlala ne-Uganda emdlalweni wobungani ngoJuni 10.
Ebhentshini leBafana kuzohlala amaphini kaBroos uCedomir Janevski noHelman Mkhalele.
"Kuhlala kukhulunywa uma kufika umqeqeshi omusha noma izinto zingahambanga kahle.
Siyashintshwa isikwati.
Abadlali abadala yibona abadliwa yizembe.
Kodwa ke yisinqumo somqeqeshi.
Kuhlukile ngoba kunabadlali esengidlale nabo isikhathi eside, manje ukubakhipha nje kanjalo, ufake abasha, kuzothatha isikhathi (ukuhlangana kweqembu).
Kungcono ngoba sinalo mdlalo wobungani esizowusebenzisa ukuzama ukuhlangana ngaphambi kowokuhlungela oweNdebe yoMhlaba (ngoSepthemba).
Kodwa kunzima ngoba nami ngineminyaka engu-27 okusho ukuthi nami ngiyalandela.
Sizobheka ukuthi umqeqeshi omusha ufuna senzeni nokuthi ufuna sidlale kanjani.
Kodwa ngiyathemba ukuthi kuzoba ngcono," kusho uTau.Emuva kokubolekiswa kwi-Union SG, Club Brugge yaseBelgium ne-Anderlecht, uTau ugcine ebuyele kwiBrighton eyamsayinisa edlala kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngo-2018.
KwiSea Gulls udlale imidlalo emithathu kusukela ebuyele kuyona ngoJanuwari.
Nokho uTau, oseholidini kuleli njengoba kuvalwe isizini, uthe uzohlala alwele indawo yakhe kwiBrighton wathi eyokubolekiswa ayikakhulunywa.
"Angicabangi ukuthi kukhona ofuna ukwenza lokho okwamanje.
Ngisahlale izinyanga eziyisithupha kwiBrighton.
Uma bengibolekisa kuzobe kuyini isizathu ngoba angidlalanga imidlalo eyanele.
Ngakho ngibheke ukulwela indawo yami.
Yileyo inhloso yami futhi mina neqembu sisabona kanjalo.
Iqembu lisafuna ngihlale ngidlale.
Nami ngifuna ukulwela indawo yami.
Kuhlala kuthiwa ikusasa alaziwa.
Kodwa okwamanje sobabili siyavumelana ngokuthi ngizohlala ngilwele indawo yami," kusho uTau.
Kunconywa uNcikazi noKhenyeza ngomlando oqoshiwe
XOLILE MPISANEOWAYEGIJIMA kwiLamontville Golden Arrows, uMzuvukile Tom, uthi ubudlelwano obuhle phakathi komqeqeshi, uMandla Ncikazi, nomsizi wakhe, uMabhuti Khenyeza, yibona obenze leli qembu liqophe umlando kule sizini ephelile.Abafana Bes’thende baqede endaweni yesine kwiDStv Premiership, nokuyindawo ephezulu kunazo zonke selokhu bangena esigabeni esikhulu.U-Tom, owadlala imidlalo engu-168 kwi-Arrows, uthe bekusobala ukuthi laba baqeqeshi bayimbumba, nokwenze leli qembu lidlale into ehlangene.“Izinto ze-Arrows ngicabanga ukuthi zilunge ingakaqali nesizini.
Ngiyazi besisincane isikhathi sokucija abadlali ngaphambi kokuthi isizini iqale kodwa kuyacaca ukuthi kuningi okuhle abakwenza okube nomthelela ekutheni bayiqale kahle isizini,” kusho uTom.“Ngingaphinde ngimncome uNcikazi nabaphathi beqembu ngokuthi babuyise uKhenyeza azolekelela umqeqeshi.
UKhenyeza uyayazi futhi uyayithanda i-Arrows.
Ungumuntu ozimiselayo futhi okuzondayo ukuhlulwa.
Kusobala ukuthi lokhu ukudlulisele kubadlali.
Ngingasho ukuthi noNcikazi unomqondo ofanayo.“Indlela uNcikazi noKhenyeza abasebenzisane ngayo kule sizini ibiyinhle kakhulu.
Izithelo bezibonakala enkundleni ngendlela leli qembu ebelidlala ngayo.
Abadlali bebengadideki ngoba bebetshelwa izinto ezihambisanayo.
Indlela abebeshesha ngayo ukuliwina ibhola, baphinde bahlasele ngesivinini, ibikhombisa ukuthi bebezimisela ejimini.”Lo mdlali, owayegijima emuva ohlangothini lwesinxele, uqoke unozinti, uSifiso Mlungwana, nesitobha, uNkosinathi Sibisi, njengabadlali abamchaze kakhulu.“Ngizoqala ngoMlungwana ngoba ekuqaleni kwesizini ngangingamthembile neze.
Ngangibona sengathi wondlekile, ngithi lokho kuzomphazamisa emsebenzini wakhe.
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi ngibonile ukuthi cishe yindlela adalwe ngayo ngoba akukho obekukhombisa ukuthi uyivila.
Usebenze kakhulu kule sizini,” kuqhuba uTom.“Ngeke ngikwazi ukumshiya ngaphandle ukaputeni uSibisi ohole leli qembu ngendlela emangalisayo.
Ubengenavalo, engena shi empini noma kunzima.
Akasukile kakhulu egadeni kodwa indlela abegxuma ngayo awine amabhola ahamba phezulu ingihlabe umxhwele.“Ngiyabancoma nabadlali abancane abafike eqenjini elikhulu bangakhombisa ukwesaba.
Ngaphambilini bekuthi uma kukhushulwe abadlali abaphuma enkulisa yeqembu kuthathe isikhathi ukuthi bajwayele kodwa laba bangene khaxa.”Echaza ngokumele kwenziwe yi-Arrows ukuze lingehli izinga ngesizini ezayo, uTom uthe: “Ibhola liyagingqika ngakho-ke akumele uthembele kwisizini edlule.
Kuningi okuhle abangaqhubeka nakho kodwa futhi bayabadinga abadlali abathathu noma abane abazoqinisa isikwati.“Kubalulekile ukuthi umdlali nomdlali angakhululeki kakhulu endaweni yakhe, azi ukuthi kukhona omunye olambele ukudlala.
Wonke amaqembu aphumelelayo enza kanjalo.”
Owe-TTM uyigeze ubebebe iDowns beyiwashisa ijezi
IMAMELODI Sundowns iphazamise amathuba eChippa United ikhishwa yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) kowandulela owamanqamu weNedbank Cup eLoftus Versfeld Stadium, ePitoli, izolo ntambama.AmaBrazilians abuyiselwe kwamhlaba, nje bekulindeleke ukuthi azidlele amahlanga kwiTTM kulandela ukuziphuzela kwi-Orlando Pirates kuma-quarterfinal ngesonto eledlule.
Ukunqoba kwawo bekuzosho ukuqhubeka nethuba lezindondo ezintathu kule sizini.
Manje asesele nokulwela ukuvikela isicoco seDStv Premiership nokunqoba iCaf Champions League asengene kuyo kuma-quarterfinal.Ukuphumelela kweTTM kusho nokuphela kwethemba leChippa ebikade ibona ithuba lokungena ingasebenzanga kwiCAF Confederation Cup ngesizini ezayo uma iNedbank Cup igcina inqotshwe iSundowns ebukeka izovikela iligi ibuyele kwiCaf Champions League.
Ngokujwayelekile iqembu elinqoba iNedbank Cup lingena kwiConfederation Cup kodwa iChippa ibingangena noma ingawunqobanga lo mqhudelwano ukube ibizodlala neSundowns.IChippa sekufanele izilwele yona uma isibhekene neTTM kowamanqamu ngoMeyi 8 enkundleni ezomenyezelwa namuhla.
Iqembu elizowina lizojoyina elizoqeda endaweni yesithathu kwiDStv Premiership kwiConfederation Cup.Emdlalweni wayizolo iSundowns iqale umdlalo idlala ngokukhululeka, iphatha ibhola ngendlela eyithandayo.
Nokho abadlali beTshakhuma bebezama ngayo yonke indlela ukuyincisha amathuba okungena ebhokisini.
Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi iTTM ivulele injeje, eholele ekutheni kuphakame imimoya ebhentshini leSundowns.
Emuva kwalokho iTTM  iqalile ukudlala, yaphatha ibhola.
Nokho ibihluleka ukwakha amathuba acacile okushaya amagoli, ngaphandle kwamafree-kick abengaphandle kwebhokisi.Esiwombeni sesibili, iSundowns ibuye ngomfutho.
USiphelele Mkhulise ucishe wayibeka phambili edlulisa ibhola kunozinti weTTM, uWashington Arubi, kodwa walikhipha seliyongena u-Alfred Ndengane.
ISundowns iqhubekile nokungqongqoza kodwa ibingafuni lutho iTshakhuma.
Kwale noma sekuyiwa esikhathini esengeziwe, alikho iqembu elivume ukugoba uphondo, zagcina zihlukaniswe amaphenathi.
U-Arubi ubala ukhasha emapalini njengoba egeze namagoli abesefane nabaliwe, okukhona nelikaSibusiso Vilakazi.Noma sekukhahlelwa amaphenathi la maqembu abengafuni ukwenza izinto zibe lula njengoba bonke abadlali abayisihlanu iqembu ngalinye bewavalele phakathi.Ibhimbi kube ngukaputeni weSundowns, uHlompho Kekana iphenathi yakhe evinjwe ngu-Arubi.
Bese kusemahlombe kaThembisani Nevhulamba ukufaka iTTM kowamanqamu, nembala wangaphoxa wayivalela phakathi.
OweGalaxy ukhale ngonompempe behlulwa
STHEMBISO NGOBESEUMQEQESHI weTS Galaxy, u-Owen da Gama, ukhala ngezinqumo zonompempe njengoba iqembu lakhe lilokhu liqhubeka nokulahla amaphuzu amqoka emidlalweni yalo yakamuva kwiDStv Premiership.Ngempelasonto, iThe Rockects ihlulwe ngo-2-0 yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila emdlalweni wokubanga amaphuzu obuse-Emirates Airline Park Stadium, eGoli.Amagoli eTshakhuma eqeqeshwa nguMpho Maleka ngokubambisana noDavid “DVD” Mathebula, abekwe enethini nguBrandon Theron noThabo Rakhale ngokwehlukana kweziwombe.Ukunqoba kweTTM lapha kuyiphefumulise kancane empini yezembe njengoba isinyukele endaweni ka-14 ngamaphuzu awu-19 emidlalweni ewu-21.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, iGalaxy yona isahlezi endaweni yesishiyagalombili ngamaphuzu awu-26 emidlalweni ewu-22.Lona besekungumdlalo wesithathu weGalaxy ihlulwa kulandelana kwazise ngaphambi komdlalo wayo neTTM, ihlulwe yiMariztburg United ngo-2-0 yaphinde yaguqiswa ngo-2-1 yiBloemfontein Celtic.Ngemuva komdlalo, uDa Gama uzwakalise ukukhathazeka okukhulu ngendlela onompempe abathatha ngayo izinqumo emidlalweni yabo.“Njengamanje sibhekene nesimo esinzima kakhulu lapha ekilabhini njengoba imiphumela ingasivumi, ngaphezu kwalokho futhi nezinqumo ezithathwa ngonompempe emidlalweni yethu ziyashaqisa kakhulu.“Siyawakhanda amathuba futhi siwashaye namagoli kodwa ekugcineni lawo magoli agcine engabalwanga ngezizathu esingazazi.
Impela ziyethusa kakhulu izinqumo ezithathwa ngonompempe enkundleni,” usho kanje uDa Gama.Lo mqeqeshi uqhube wathi njengoba bephinde behlulwa kuzomele babuyele emuva ukuyolungisa izinto.“Lona bese kungumdlalo wethu wesithathu sihlulwa kulandelana nokuyinto eqalayo ukwenzeka selokhu ngithathe izintambo zokuqeqesha lapha eqenjini.
Lokhu ngikubona kufaka ingcindezi enkulu kubadlali bami njengoba abanye babo babuye benze amaphutha okungafanele ngabe ayenzeka kubadlali abadlala esigabeni esikhulu.“Kodwa-ke kuzomele sibuyele emuva siyolungisa izinto, ngaphezu kwalokho futhi kumele siyibongele iTshakhuma ngokunqoba lapha.”UMaleka uthe isimo abakuso njengamanje kwi-log siyabakhathaza kakhulu kodwa bajabulile ngokuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele kulo mdlalo.Uthe izinguquko abazenzile esiwombeni sesibili zibe nomthelela omkhulu ekutheni banqobe kulo mdlalo.
Isendalini iTeam of Choice
UKUKHULA ngesivinini esethusayo kwezikweletu kushayisa ngovalo ezikhulwini zeMaritzburg United kangangokuthi sezivule izandla kunoma ngubani ofuna ukuthenga iTeam of Choice.Lokhu kushiwo ngusihlalo waleli qembu, uFarouk Kadodia, ekhuluma neThe Witness, lapho eveze khona ukuthi ngaphandle kokwamukela ukudayisa, uma kukhona umasipala ozimisele ngokungena ezingxoxweni nabo nalapho abanankinga.NgokukaKadodia, izikweletu ababhekene nazo zingu-R9 million (okuyimali abebeyiboleka ukugcina iqembu lisesimeni esilindelekile kwiPSL).Phakathi kwezizathu uKadodia azibekile kugqame ukuphela kukaphawini wemali engena ngokubakhona kwabalandeli enkundleni.
Lokhu kudalwe yiCovid-19 kusukela ngoMashi 2020 kanti nesivumelwano sabo noMasipala uMsunduzi (ebese sineminyaka eyisithupha siqhubeka) asizange sivuselelwe ngaphambi kokuqala isizini esanda kusongwa.“Ukuvalwa kwezwe kusiphuce imigudu eminingi yemali yize ibingenkulu kodwa bekuzameka.
Ukuvaleka kukaphawini kaMasipala uMsunduzi kusibulele kakhulu nakho.“Njengakuwona wonke amaqembu inkinga enkulu amaholo abadlali.
Kuthe ukuba ngcono sidedela uRushine de Reuck eya kwiMamelodi Sundowns kodwa ukungabinalo uxhaso njengeChippa United, TS Galaxy, Lamontville Golden Arrows, AmaZulu neRoyal AM (abathola okuthile komasipala babo) kusishayile,” kubalisa yena.U-Kadodia uthe iTeam of Choice bayibona ibiza            u-R55 million.“Kuningi esikuzamile sivula izandla kwabafuna ukuthenga amasheya kodwa iningi beligcina lishaya amakhala ngoba libona ukuthi izibalo zethu azihlangani, ngeke benze inzuzo.
Ngingakusho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi eminyakeni engu-11 edlule izikhulu zeMaritzburg beziyithwele emahlombe,” kusho uKadodia.Ethintwa Isolezwe, uthe lolu daba lubucayi kakhulu ukuthi angaludingida ocingweni.
OweChiefs akayizwa eyokupaka ibhasi eGuinea
UMDLALI wasemuva weKaizer Chiefs, uKearyn Baccus, uncamela ukuthi behlulwe behlasela kunokupaka ibhasi uma sebebhekene neHoroya AC koweCAF Champions League.IChiefs izogijimisana neHoroya yaseGuinea emdlalweni wokugcina wesigaba samaqoqo kaGroup C eGeneral Lansana Conte Stadium, eConakry, ngoMgqibelo ngo-9 ebusuku.
Kulo mdlalo kufanele kuphume iqembu elizolandela iWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco kuma-quarterfinal.
IChiefs neHoroya bayalingana ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili kwi-log.
Amakhosi adinga ukudlala ngokulingana okunamagoli noma awine ukuze ezodlulela kuma-quarterfinal.
"Ngincamela ukuhlasela ngihlulwe kunokuhlala emuva ngidlale ngokulingana.
Ngakho, ngokwami uma sihlasela ngakho konke, sidlalela ukuwina, akukho okuzosilahlekela," kusho uBaccus.
"Umoya muhle eqenjini.
Siwulungele umdlalo.
Sifuna ukwenza kahle kwiChampions League njengoba singenzi kahle kwiligi okwamanje.
Siwubheke ngabomvu umdlalo futhi sijabule.
Sibheke uMgqibelo.
"IChiefs ifulathele uMzansi izolo ekuseni nabadlali abangu-18.
Ihambe ngaphandle kukanozinti uDaniel Akpeyi, nomgadli uSamir Nurkovic abathole amakhadi abomvu ngesikhathi leli qembu lihlula iWydad ngesonto eledlule.
ULeonardo Castro, obekubhekwe ukuthi atakule Amakhosi, usale kuleli kulandela ukwephuka ikhala eshaya igoli emdlalweni weligi ophele ngo-2-2 neStellenbosch ngoLwesibili.Uma iChiefs iphumelela ukwehlula iHoroya ekuhambeni, izoba yiqembu lokuqala laseMzansi elenze lokho.
IHoroya isibhekene namaqembu ahlukene akuleli emiqhudelwaneni yeCAF kodwa alikho eselike layishayela ekhaya.
Ngo-2018, idlale ngokulingana ngo-2-2 neMamelodi Sundowns esigabeni samaqoqo, kwathi ngo-2019, yathela isibhaxu sika-2-1 kwi-Orlando Pirates.
Nyakenye iHoroya ivulele isibhaxu sika-2-1 kwiBidvest Wits esigabeni samaqoqo kwiCAF Confederation Cup.Emdlalweni wokuqala wesigaba samaqoqo, iChiefs neHoroya badlale ngokulingana ngo-0-0.Isitobha seChiefs, uReeve Frosler, sithe umphumela wakamuva weChampions League behlula iWydad ubafaka umfutho nokuzethemba.
"Kubalulekile ukuhlala sigcwele ukuzethemba futhi sikholelwe kwesikwazi ukukwenza.
Sidlala ekuhambeni, kuzoba wumdlalo ohluke kakhulu.
Kufanele sibekezele, sikholelwe kithina ukuthi sizodlulela phambili," kusho uFrosler.
Kuvela okubhuntshise izingxoxo zeMaritzburg neDowns ngoMabunda
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUNQABE ukubolekiswa kwiMaritzburg United, uTiyani " Shuga" Mabunda olizwa ngendaba ijezi kwiMamelodi Sundowns.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi iSundowns bese iqede konke neTeam of Choice kodwa lo mdlali oyibamba esiswini washaya phansi ngonyawo, wathi akalibeki eMphithi.Ngokusho kwalo mthombo osondelene nalo mdlali isizathu esidale ukuthi anqabe wukuthi kwiMaritzburg ubengeke athole imihlomulo agixabezwa yona eChloorkop.Kuthiwa uMabunda uthe ufuna ukuyiqedela kwiSundowns inkontileka yakhe ephela ekusongweni kwesizini ka-2020/21.
"UMabunda usekwamukele ukuthi iSundonws ngeke iyivuselele inkontileka yakhe.
Osekumhlalise kuyo yimali.
UFarouk Kadodia (umnikazi weMaritzburg) bese eqede konke neSundowns, beyingenankinga ukuthi imdedele.
KwiMaritzburg kubukeka ebezolithola ithuba lokudlala,” kubeka umthombo.Kuthintwa uKadodia ukuvumile ukuthi bebefuna ukumboleka uMabunda kodwa kwavimba ezinto ezithile.
"Kuliqiniso ukuthi besimgaqele uMabunda ngesikhathi kusavulwe iwindi.
Kuvimbe izinto engingeke ngikwazi  ukuzidalula kwabezindaba.
Empeleni angithandi ukuphawula kakhulu ngalolu daba, kumele sikuhloniphe ukuthi uMabunda unenkontilela neSundowns," kusho uKadodia.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kweSundowns ayiphumelelanga njengoba lowo okhulumela iqembu uShupi Nkgadima engazange ayiphendule imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.Ngaphambi kokuqala kwale sizini, iSwallows beyifuna ukuboleka lo mdlali.
Ivinjwe ukuthi beyingeke ikwazi ukumholela imali ayithola kwiSundowns.Selokhu kuqale isizini, uMabunda owake waba semabhukwini eBlack Leopards nakwaweFree State Stars, ulizwa ngendaba ijezi kwiSundowns.Ubanga indawo esiswini no-Andile Jali, Hlompho Kekana, noRivaldo Coetzee osuswe emuva wafakwa esiswini.UMabunda izinto ziqale ukumbhedela ngesizini edlule edlala imidlalo eyisishiyagalolunye kuphela yeDStv Premiership neyisithupha yemiqhudelwano.
Wagcina ukuba nesizini enhle kweka-2018/19, edlala imidlalo ewu-22.Eminyakeni edlule uke waba ngelinye lamasosha ayeyizithenjwa zikaPitso "Jingles" Mosimane oseqeqesha i-Al Ahly yase-Egypt.UMabunda usenqobe neSundowns isicoco seCaf Champions League ngo-2016, isicoco seDStv Premiership kahlanu, kabili iTelkom Knockout neNedbank Cup ngokuhlukana kwemiqhudelwano.
Ulandwe phesheya 'ozofaka' iBafana kweyomhlaba
ULANDWE phesheya umqeqeshi ozothwala ijoka elisindayo, lokufaka iBafana Bafana kwi-2022 Fifa World Cup.Lokhu bese kunesikhathi kuhlongozwa ngegama lika-Carlos Queiroz, odabuka ePortugal, kodwa kuqale ukuqina sekuhoxa isithangami sabezindaba ebesizoba izolo ngo-10 ekuseni.Kulesi sithangami ibigcwele incwadi ukuthi kuzokwethulwa umqeqeshi kwabezindaba nasesizweni kodwa kuvele ukuthi “ngenxa yemigudu yokuhambelana kwamazwe omhlaba ehlukene, ngokwemigomo yeCovid-19, umcimbi uhlehlile”.Isigungu esiphezulu kuzwelonke seSouth African Football Association (Safa) sihlanganile izolo emhlanganweni ongabikwangwa kwabezindaba.Kulo mhlangano Isolezwe ngeSonto litshelwe ngaphambi kwawo yisikhulu esiphelu kwiSafa, uTebogo Motlanthe, ukuthi uzoba khona kodwa kasibange sisatholakala emuva kwawo ukuveza ukuthi kuvunyelwane ngani.Nokho imithombo yeSolezwe ngeSonto ivezile ukuthi eqinisweni, zikhale kuye uMotlanthe ukuthi akaqikelele ukuthi isonto elisombulukayo lingapheli engathuliwe  umqeqeshi.Kufanele ngoba ngoMeyi 12 iBafana ihlangana neZimbabwe, iqala imidlalo yokuhlungela iWorld Cup eseQatar.“Ihlanganile iNEC (isigungu esiphezulu seSafa kuzwelonke) kwaphuma isinqumo esithi lingapheli isonto ingaphothuliwe indaba yomqeqeshi,” kusho umthombo ongaphakathi kwiSafa.Umthombo uxinwa ngegama likaQueiroz, okuvele ukuthi umengameli weSafa, uDanny Jordaan ubese zamazamise zonke izinhlaka ukuthi abuyiswe.“Bahlanu abaqeqeshi obese kudingidwa ngabo, nguHugo Broos, Harve Renard, Benni McCarthy kodwa umgwamanda uvumelane ngoCarlos Quieroz, kwathi uPitso Mosimane walala isibili esivumelwaneni,” kusho umthombo uqinisekisa ukuthi uzokwethulwa kwelisombulukayo umqeqeshi.Isolezwe ngeSonto lingakuveza ukuthi babalelwa ku-200 abaqeqeshi abavela kuwo wonke amagumbi omhlaba, abafake izicelo zalo msebenzi onzima.Kusuke ku-100 kwayiwa ku-60 ngokusho komthombo, kwase kuyiwa kwabahlanu.Obekuseqhulwini kobekufunwa ngamava omqeqeshi,  wukuthi uke walifaka yini izwe emiqhudelwaneni emikhulu, abe negama elimisa ithemba lokuthi uzofika angene emjahweni, angalokhu ekhala ngesikhathi futhi  abe namava emidlalweni yamazwe ngamazwe.Ebuzwa ngakho konke lokhu uDominic Chimhavi okhulumela iSafa, uthe: “Mnewethu mina angihlali kwiNEC, ngizifanela nawe.
Kanginalo ulwaizi kuze kube nginikwa isitatimende okufanele ngisithumele kwabezindaba.
Ngeke ngikuphikise kukho konke okushoyo kodwa asethembe ukuthi ubuholi sebuyikhombile insizwa ethenjiwe,” kusho uChimhavi.Lize lashona elayizolo engasalubambi ucingo uMotlanthe, kanjalo nezinye izikhulu ezisesigungwini esiphezulu.Enye into ekhomba uQuieroz ngokuthi kubukeka kuzobekwa phambi abadlali be-Under 23 abaya kuma-Olympics eJapan kwazise baphethe isithunzi seVision 2022 kanti sebejwayelene.
IBaroka isibheke ukuqeda kwiTop 8
INTATHELI YESOLEZWEIBAROKA FC seyizolwela ukuqeda emaqenjini ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu kwiDStv Premiership.Lokhu kuzethemba komqeqeshi weBaroka, uThoka Matsemela, kugqame ngemuva kokuqeda umgqigqo waMaZulu FC abeseqhube imidlalo ewu-16 engayazi induku kwiligi.IBakgaga ibuyisele Usuthu kwamhlaba ilwehlula       ngo-1-0 wegoli likaRichard Mbulu ngoLwesibili eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza.“Bekuwumdlalo onzima kodwa ngincoma abafana, basebenze ngokuzikhandla.
Ngicabanga ukuthi siwahlelele kahle AmaZulu.
Iqhinga lethu lokubavimba bangakwazi ukudlala ibhola emuva lisebenze kahle.
Ngiyabajabulela abadlali ngendlela abadlale ngayo.
Ngibonga nethimba labaqeqeshi.
Siwajabulela kakhulu la maphuzu amathathu,” kusho uMatsemela.Amaphuzu amathathu anyusele ezikaMatsemela endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log (ngaphambi kwemidlalo yayizolo).
IBaroka isiqoqe amaphuzu awu-32 emidlalweni ewu-27.Emdlalweni wabo olandelayo bazobhekana nomkhaya, iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila, ngoLwesibili ePeter Mokaba Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.“ITshakhuma ngomunye umdlalo onzima.
Kumele siqinisekise ukuthi kukhona esikutholayo, ikakhulukazi amaphuzu amathathu ukuze sizosondela kwiTop 8.
Ukushaya iqembu elisefomini njengaMaZulu, ebeseliqhube imidlalo ewu-16 lingashaywa kodwa sakwazi ukulibamba, kuyasikhuthaza.”Eminye imidlalo esele yeBaroka kukhona owe-Orlando Pirates ekhaya bese ivala isizini neSwallows ekuhambeni ngoJuni 5.Amanye amaqembu aselwela ukuqeda kwiTop 8 ehambisana nokudlala kwiMTN 8 ngesizini ezayo kukhona iKaizer Chiefs, TS Galaxy, Cape Town City neBloemfontein Celtic.
UMcCarthy upiklela abebemngabaza eqashwa wuSuthu
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI waMaZulu, uBenni McCarthy, upiklela ababethi uzohluleka ukufeza iphupho likamengameli woSuthu, uSandile Zungu lokusonga iDStv Premiership lusemaqenjini amane aphezulu.Usuku lwangoLwesithathu balusonge begcwele ukumamatheka abalandeli boSuthu olumabheshu ankone nezakhamuzi zaKwaZulu-Natal.
Luqinisekise ukuthi ngesizini ka-2021/22 luzobe lubhukuda nezingwenya  kwiCaf Champions League.Le ngqophamlando yenzeke ngokucoboshisa iSwallows ngo-1-0, wephenathi eshaywe nguTapelo Xoki, osohlwini lwabadlali abagaqele umklomelo wokuba yisitobha esiye savelela kwisizini ka-2020/21.Ngala maphuzu amathathu, luqinisekise ukuthi akekho osazolususa kweyesibili.Lunamaphuzu awu-53, emidlalweni ewu-29.I-Orlando Pirates elele isithathu, noma ingawunqoba owokugcina, ezowudlala neTshakhuma kusasa, izogcina iphelela emaphuzwini angu-52.
"Ngiyazi ukuthi sisalelwe wumdlalo wokugcina kodwa sikufezile ebesiphupha ngakho.
Sizuze obekungalindelwe muntu.
Ngesikhathi umengameli waMaZulu ethi ufuna iqembu liqede iligi likwiTop 4, abantu bathi uyahlanya.
Ngesifanayo nakimi, ngifika, abantu bathi uZungu udlala ngemali yakhe, uthenga igama nje.
Ngixoshiwe kwiCape Town City, kangiyena umqeqeshi wezinga eliphezulu.
Ngaleyo ndlela ngizohluleka ukufeza phupho lakhe.
Esengifuna ukukwazi wukuthi njengamanje wubani ohleka yedwa,“ kusho uMcCarthy esonga izandla, waqhiyama.AMaZulu kawagcinanga ngokuqopha umlando wokuzibekela indawo kwiChampions League, abe yiqembu lesibili ukushaya iSwallows kwiligi.
UMcCarthy uqhube wathi akazi ukuthi angakuchaza kanjani ukujabula anakho.Uthe uyazi ukuthi kukhona abese bebangabaza ngenxa yokuhlulwa yiBaroka nePirates emidlalweni edlule.
"Uma sekuphele imidlalo ewu-16 ungahlulwa, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uzoqhuzuka.
Izimbangi zizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi zikwenzela umsebenzi ube lukhuni.
Ingqwele ihlulelwa ngokuthi ivuke izithintithe.
Lokho sikwenzile ngokushaya iSwallows engenye yamaqembu anzima.
Ukudlala kwayo ngokulingana kwengu-19, sifike sakuqeda.
Besinalo ithuba lokushaya amanye amagoli, kodwa siyalimukela leli esinqobe ngalo, lisifake kwiChampions League.“Kusasa uSuthu luzovala nomkhaya balo, iMaritzburg United abazobe belwela ukuvika ukuya emidlalweni yokuhlunga.
I-United isendaweni ka-13 ngamaphuzu awu-29.
Ngesizini ka-2014/15, la maqembu abhekana kowokugcina.
Sekuyindaba endala ukuthi iTeam of Choice yashovela ehlathini omkhaya bayo, ibashaya ngo-2-1, kowawuseMoses Mabhida Stadium.

"Siye kulo mdlalo sazi ukuthi sizobhekana neqembu elinzima.

"Siphinde salekelelwa iphutha lokuphuma zisuka kwesitobha ngekhadi elibomvu.

IDowns yenze okwehlule iBafana eSudan
UKUBE kuyashintshwana ngemiphumela, iMamelodi Sundowns ibingawudlulisela kwiBafana Bafana umphumela ewuthole idlala ngokulingana ngo 0-0  ne-Al-Hilal Omdurman, eSudan nokusho ukulahla amaphuzu okokuqala ngqa kweyamaqoqo eCaf Champions League ka-2020/2021.IBafana ingene ehlazweni ngesonto eledlule ihluleka wukungena kweyamanqamu e-2022 Africa Cup of Nations eseCameroon ngoJanuwari, emuva kokuvumela ukunenebulwa yiSudan ngo 2-0 kuleliya lizwe.Iqembu lakuleli liye emdlalweni lidinga iphuzu kuphela kanti abekhona amathemba emuva kokunqoba ngo 2-0 emlenzeni wokuqala lapha ekhaya.
ISundowns yanqoba ngo 2-0 emlenzeni wokuqala eTshwane, kanti isayinqobe yonke imidlalo yayo kwiGroup B nokuyibeka emaphuzwini angu-13, okusho ukuthi ibisivele izifakile esigabeni sama-quarterfinal.I-Omdurman isendaweni yesithathu ngemuva kweBelouizdad yase-Algeria, ekweyesibili ngamaphuzu ayisithupha.
Yize kungasho lutho ukulahla amaphuzu eSudan kweSundowns, kwazise isivele iqedile ngeyamaqoqo kodwa izimbangi zayo kwiDStv Premiership zizomincela ukuthi kutolike njengokubohla kwefomu, eziye ekhefini lemidlalo yeFederation of International Football Association zishaya ngayo.ISundowns evikela isicoco, yiyo yodwa engakehlulwa emidlalweni yeDStv Premiership kule sizini.
Ukungadlali kweyeligi kule mpelasonto kusho ukuthi izobuya ngoLwesibili neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, isele ngemidlalo emithathu ezimbangini zayo.ISundowns iqhwakelele esicongweni selog ngamaphuzu angu-40 kanti kwabayijaha eduze kubalwa izimbangi ezingajwayelekile ngasesicongweni, iLamontville Golden Arrows naMaZulu FC.
Kukhona ne-Orlando Pirates, ebuyela enkundleni neMaritzburg United ngoLwesithathu.Endaweni yesithathu ngemuva kweSundowns, ikhona neSuperSport United ubuholi bayo obulokhu buyiphike njalo imibiko ethi leli qembu liyadayisa.Ukungathembeli kubadlali beSundowns yize yenza kahle kwiligi nasemidlalwemi yeligi, ngenye yezinto ezilethele obengumqeqeshi weBafana, uMolefi Ntseki, ukugxekwa ngokubhacaza kweqembu lakhe.ISundowns isesethubeni lezicoco ezintathu kule sizini kwazise ngaphezu kweligi neChampions League, kusekhona neNedbank Cup ezohlangana kuma-quarterfinal ayo nePirates ngo-Ephreli 15 eLoftus.

STHEMBISO NGOBESEKULINDELEKE ukuba nangale mpelasonto uqhubeke nokushuba umbango wokunqoba isicoco seGladAfrica Championship nowokuvika izembe emaqenjini agijima kulesi sigaba esiphakela eseDStv Premiership.Njengoba imidlalo yeGladAfrica isiya ngasemaphethelweni kwazise sekusele imidlalo engaphansi kweyishumi, wonke amaqembu asedlalela ukufa nokuphila njengoba enezinhloso ezingafani.Phezulu kwi-log ugingqigongqo kumaqembu asembangweni weqhulu, iRichards Bay FC neSekhukhune United abalokhu beshintshana ngokuhlula kule ndawo.Kuzoyiwa emidlalweni yangempelasonto iBay iqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-38 emidlalweni ewu-22.
I-United iyalandela kweyesibili ngawu-36 emidlalweni ewu-23.Phakathi nesonto womabili la maqembu ahlulekile ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele.
INatal Rich Boyz iguqiswe ngo-2-1 yiFree State Stars kungalindele muntu eMhlathuze Sports Complex.
ISekhukhune sona sihlulekile ukubuya namaphuzu agcwele sibambana ngo-1-1 neTS Sporting, Kabokweni Stadium, eMpumalanga.Kulawo alandela ngemuva embangweni,  i-JDR Stars neRoyal AM nabo abangazibekile phansi embangweni wesicoco njengoba bekwazile ukuthola amaphuzu amathathu kweyabo imidlalo.
IJDR neRoyal AM sebeyalingana ngamaphuzu awu-36 ne-United, sebehlukaniswe amagoli endaweni yesithathu neyesine.
Amaqembu aphezulu kuleli sigaba abanga ukudla ubhedu bese ethola ithikithi eliya ngqo esigabeni esikhulu iDStv Premiership.
Abazohlulwa yilokhu bazokhalela kwindawo yesibili neyesithathu ukuze badlale emidlalweni yokuhlungela ukukhuphukela phezulu.Nasemsileni we-log izinto zishubile njengoba kubalekelwa ukwehlela kwi-ABC Motsepe League.
IBizana Pondo Chiefs eqeqeshwa nguClinton Larsen yiyona esabambe ibhuleki emsileni ngamaphuzu angu-16, iCape Town Spurs isendaweni ka-15 ngamaphuzu angu-23.Kusasa, la maqembu azongqubuzana ngo-3 ntambama eParow Park Stadium, eKapa.
ICape Town All Stars esendaweni ka-13 neSteenberg United esendaweni ka-14 bobabili basabambene ngamaphuzu angu-24.Ngale mpelasonto, umdlalo ozokube ubhekwe kakhulu kwiGladAfrica ophakathi kwabakhaya iBay noThongathi FC.
Umdlalo ukusasa ngo-3 ntambama ePrincess Magogo Stadium, KwaMashu.Kuzokube kungowamagqubu njengoba ngesikhathi egcina ukuhlangana la maqembu emzuliswaneni wokuqala, iBay ecijwa nguSimo “Govuza” Dladla yanqoba ngo-2-1 kumaCane Cutters aphekwa nguPitso Dladla, emdlalweni owawuseMhlathuze.Akungabazeki ukuthi iBay izofuna ukuvuka ngomkhaya bayo lapha ukuze iqhubeke nokuhlala esicongweni.
UThongathi lona luzokuya kulo mdlalo luhambela phezulu njengoba lusanda kubuya namaphuzu agcwele kulandela ukuqumba phansi kwalo ngo-3-2 i-All Stars emdlalweni obuseKapa.Imidlalo yeGladAfrica Championship ngempelasonto:Namuhla: Ngo-3pm: Cape United v Royal AM (Parow Park).Kusasa:  Ngo-3pm: Cape Town Spurs v Pondo Chiefs (Parow Park); Uthongathi FC v Richards Bay (Princess Magogo); Free State Stars v JDR Stars (Goble Park); TS Sporting v University of Pretoria (Kabokweni Stadium).NgeSonto: Ngo-3pm: Polokwane City v Cape Town All Stars (Old Peter Mokaba); Sekhukhune United v Jomo Cosmos (Makhulong Stadium).

Intatheli yeSolezweIKAIZER Chiefs ihlulekile wukungena kwiTop 8 yeDStv Premiership ngemuva kokubanjwa yiBaroka FC emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ogcine uphele ngo 1-1 ngoLwesine ntambama ePeter Mokaba Stadium, eLimpopo.Amakhosi abedinga ukunqoba ukuze akwazi ukungena kumaqembu ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu kwi-log kodwa ngenxa yalo mphumela asahleli endaweni yesishiyagalolunye ngamaphuzu awu-25.Lona bekuwumdlalo wesibili kulandelana ehluleka wukuthola amaphuzu agcwele.

.Esiwombeni sesibili, iChiefs ithole igoli ngomzuzu-58 ngemuva kwebhola elihle alifakelwe uKhama Billiat ngesithende.

Ngomzuzu ka-81 uMakgopa ushayele iBaroka igoli lokulinganisa emuva kwebhola eligotshwe kwesokudla.

XOLILE MPISANEUmshwibi wamaProteas, uKagiso Rabada, ubona lizokhuphuka izinga lokuzethemba kumaProteas emva kokuhlula iWest Indies kalula emdlalweni wokuqala wochungechunge lwama-test.AmaProteas anqobe lo mdlalo, obuseDarren Sammy Cricket Ground, nge-innings eyodwa nama- run awu-63 ngempelasonto.I-West Indies ikhishwe isashaye ama-run awu-97 kwi-innings yokuqala, yashaya awu-162 kweyesibili.
AmaProteas abhethe kanye ahlanganisa ama-run awu-322.URabada uthathe iwikhethi eyodwa kwi-innings yokuqala, wabuya esevutha kweyesibili, ethatha amahlanu.
Ubeqala ukwenza lokhu kusukela ngo-2018 Mashi.
"Kulo mdlalo uyaye ukale imisebenzi yakho ngokushaya ama-run awu-100 uma ubhetha noma ukuthatha amawikhethi amahlanu noma awu-10 uma uwumshwibi," kusho uRabada.
"Yikona osuke uzimisele ngako njalo uma ungena enkundleni.

"Iyona ndlela oqhathanisa ngayo ukuthi udlale kanjani nokuthi uzilungiselele ngendlela efanele yini.
Ubani ongeke ajabule uma enze into encomekayo?
Ngiyaziqhenya kakhulu ngendlela engisebenze ngayo," kusho yena.AmaProteas abeqala ukuwina umdlalo we-test ekuhambeni kusukela ngo-2017.
Adinga ukungahlulwa kwi-test yesibili ukuze alunqobe lolu chungechunge.
"Siseyiqembu elisha futhi sisakha.
Uma ubheka abadlali abanamava okuthenjelwe kubona, abakhulile kangako ngokweminyaka," kuchaza uRabada.
"Ngingazibala mina noma uQuinny (De Kock).

Ngeke sizikhukhumeze kodwa sizothatha konke okuhle esikwenzile, siqhubeke nokusebenza ngokuzikhandla.
"Kweminye imidlalo esihlulwe kuyona besizigwaza ngowethu ngokuthi sibuye silehlise izinga, umdlalo ugcine usiphunyukile.

IKAIZER Chiefs ibheke ukuqhubeka nomgqigqo wokucosha amaphuzu uma isibhekene neStellenbosch emdlalweni weDStv Premiership eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, namuhla ngo-5 ntambama.Ngempelasonto edlule, iChiefs ihlule iWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco ngo 1-0 emdlalweni wamaqoqo weCaf Champions League ingasaphelele enkundleni emuva kokuthola amakhadi abomvu kukaDaniel Akpeyi noSamir Nurkovic.
