Kuyona yomibili le midlalo, Amakhosi awangenelwanga yigoli.
Lokhu akubuzwa ukuthi kubuyisa ithemba kubalandeli bayo abafisa okungenani iqede kwi-Top 8 ekupheleni kwesizini ukuze idlale kwiMTN 8 ngezayo.Umgadli uLazalous Kambole ubona ukuhlangana kwezinto kwenyusa ukuzethemba eqenjini.
"Bekuwumdlalo onzima (neWydad) ngoba sidlale singasaphelele okwenze sashintsha indlela esidlala ngayo.
Kudingeke simise izinto ngenye indlela ngokomdlalo.
Kodwa okubalulekile ukuthi siwinile.
Iqembu lidlale kahle kakhulu," kusho uKambole.
"Kuzoba wumdlalo ohluke kakhulu neStellenbosch kodwa sizowenza umsebenzi wokuyicubungula siyiKaizer Chiefs.
Okufanele sikwenze nje wukuzinikela ngokuphelele, senze isiqiniseko sokuthi siqoqa amaphuzu agcwele.
Indlela esiyiyona, singehlula noma yiliphi iqembu uma sigxilisa imiqondo yethu.
Njengoba sidlalela ekhaya neStellenbosch, sinethuba elikhulu lokuwina.
Bayiqembu elihle elihlala lizimisela ikakhulukazi uma lidlala neChiefs.
Liyagqugquzeleka.
"Amakhosi asethubeni lokuzibekisela indawo kuma-quarterfinal eChampions League okokuqala emlandweni wawo.
Kudingeka ngoMgqibelo ekuhambeni ahlule iHoroya AC yaseGuinea emdlalweni wokugcina wamaqoqo ukuze ajoyine iWydad kwi-Last 8.Nokho kungayifaka engozini iChiefs ukudlala neStellies isicabanga ngoweChampions League.Umqeqeshi weStellenbosch, uSteve Barker, ukholwa wukuthi beangawacosha amaphuzu agcwele kwiChiefs.
"Sizodlala neChiefs ekuhambeni isaphuma ekutholeni imiphumela emihle.
Isidlale imidlalo emibili ingangenelwa yigoli.
Ihlule iPirates neCasablanca.
Kodwa ngibona ukuthi siyiqembu sesikhule kakhulu futhi sinyukelwe wukuzethemba.
Singehlula noma yiliphi iqembu noma yinini inqobo nje uma sizinikela futhi siqhubeka nokukholwa ukuthi singayiwina yonke imidlalo esiyidlalayo.
Siyethemba ukuthi sizodlala kahle, sizibeke ethubeni lokuwaqoqa womathathu amaphuzu," kusho uBarker.Ngempelasonto, iChiefs izomela iNingizimu Afrika kwiChampions League ihambisana neMamelodi Sundowns ebambane ngo 0-0 ne-Al Hilal yaseSudan.
ISundowns, esivele idlulele kuma-quarterfinal, izovala neCR Belouizdad yase-Algeria ngoLwesihlanu ePitoli.
IPirates, edlale ngokulingana ngo 0-0 ne-Al Ahly Benghazi kweyamaqoqo eCaf Confederation Cup, izophinda nayo ngeSonto ngo-6 ntambama e-Orlando Stadium.Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership NamuhlaNgo-3pm - Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila v Mamelodi Sundowns (Peter Mokaba Stadium).Ngo-5pm - Kaizer Chiefs v Stellenbosch (FNB Stadium).
USuthu selubheke ukubambelela kweyesibili kwi-log
STHEMBISO NGOBESEUKAPUTENI waMaZulu FC, uMbongeni “Shoes” Gumede, uthi bazimisele ukubambelela endaweni yesibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership kuze kusongwe isizini.Ngaphansi kukaBenni McCarthy, ongumqeqeshi, Usuthu ludlala ingcwenga yebhola njengoba luvulela isibhaxu kwamanye amaqembu.
Lokhu kufakazelwa wukuhlala kwalo endaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu angu-50 emidlalweni engu-27.Ngaphambi kokuba ezikaMandlakazi zibuyiselwe kwamhlaba ngempelasonto edlule yiBaroka FC, eziguqise ngo-1-0 eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza, bese zidlale imidlalo yeligi engu-16 zingayazi induku.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uGumede, oyisiqongqwane sasemuva oSuthwini, uthe ukuhlulwa kwabo yiBaroka akwehlanga kahle kubona kodwa wathembisa ukuthi bazovuka bazithathe.“Angifuni ukuqamba amanga, akwehlanga kahle ukuhlulwa kwethu yiBaroka ngemuva kwesikhathi eside singehlulwa, ngaphezu kwalokho besidlalela ekhaya.“Kodwa-ke ukwehlulwa yiBaroka sesikudlulisile sesibheke imidlalo yethu yokugcina elandelayo.
Nakuba kungeke kube yinto elula ukuyenza kodwa kuzomele nakanjani siyinqobe ukuze sizoqeda isizini sihlezi endaweni yesibili kwi-log,” usho kanje uGumede owafika oSuthwini ngo-2015 esuka kwi-Orlando Pirates.Lo mdlali, odabuka eMlaza, uthe kungabajabulisa kakhulu ukuyodlala kwiCaf Champions League.
Amaqembu aqeda endaweni yokuqala neyesibili kwi-log adlala kulo mqhudelwano.
“Nakuba singafuni ukuzifakela ingcindezi ngemidlalo yeCaf kodwa nathi singaMaZulu siyafisa ukuzibona sikulo mqhudelwano.
Lokhu kungalinyusa kakhulu igama leqembu futhi kusize nabadlali beqembu ekutheni bathole isipiliyoni sokuyodlala emidlalweni yeCaf.”Umdlalo olandelayo weligi waMaZulu uzokuba ngonzima kakhulu njengoba ezobhekana ne-Orlando Pirates ngoMeyi 27 e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.“Kuhlale kunzima ngaso sonke isikhathi ukubhekana namaqembu amakhulu ngakho-ke nakulo mdlalo wethu nePirates sibheke ukuthi ube ngonzima kakhulu.
Kodwa sizokwenza ngakho konke okusemandleni ethu ukuthi sibuya nomphumela osivunayo,”  kusho uGumede.
Egcina ukuhlangana la maqembu emzuliswaneni wokuqala weligi, abambana ngo 1-1 eJonsson Kings Park Stadium, eThekwini.
IDowns ivule igebe kwi-log ishaya iStellies, iBay yawasha ijezi
IMAMELODI Sundowns iqhubekile nokuvula igebe esicongweni se-log yeDStv Premiership ishaya iStellenbosch FC ngo 2-1 emdlalweni obuseDanie Craven Stadium, eStellenbosch, izolo ntambama.IStellenbosch yiso esibone inethi kuqala inethi ngonyawo lukaStanley Dimgba ngesiwombe sokuqala ngomzuzu ka-33, kwathi elokulinganisa leSundowns lashaywa wuGaston Sirino ngesiwombe sesibili, ngomzuzu ka-51.
Kanti elokunqoba leDowns lavalelwa phakathi wuPeter Shalulile ngomzuzu ka-90.Ukunqoba kweSundowns umdlalo kusho ukuqhubeka kwayo nokuvula igebe esicongweni se-log yePremiership.
Njengamanje isinamaphuzu angu-39 emidlalweni engu-17, ilandelwa yiGolden Arrows ngawu-35 emidlalweni engu-19.AmaSandawane asasele emuva ngemidlalo emibili, ngenxa yokuxinwa kwawo yimidlalo yeCaf Champions League.NgoLwesibili leli qembu lasePitoli lizobuyela kweyeChampions League ngokududulana neTP Mazembe eLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli, ngo-6 kusihlwa.Khonamanjalo iChippa United izibekisele indawo kuma-semifinal eNedbank Cup okwesithathu, emlandweni wayo emuva kokuhlula iRichards Bay FC ngo 2-1emdlalweni we-quarterfinal obuseSisa Dukashe Stadium, eMdantsane izolo ntambama.Amagoli eChippa ashaywe ngo-Anthony Laffor noRamasimong Maloisane.
EleBay elishaywe nguSiyabonga Vilane obekungelesithathu lakhe kulo qhudelwano ka-2021.
ULaffor ubeshaya igoli lokuqala kusukela ewelele kwiChippa ngoJanuwari.IChippa ifinyelele kuma-semifinal ngo-2017 nango-2019.Kuyiwa emdlalweni wayizolo uSimo Dladla, ocija iBay, akakufihlanga ukuthi yize sebekuma-quarterfinal kodwa into emqoka kubo wukwenyukela kwiDStv Premiership.Nangempela uphumuze ezinye izethenjwa, okubalwa kuzo nokaputeni wezakhe, uSiphamandla Mtolo.IBay ibuyela enkundleni ngoLwesithathu nePretoria Callies kanti iChippa ithembe umphumela wayizolo ukuthi uyivuse uma isibuyela neSwallows ngoMgqibelo.Imidlalo namuhla: Cape Town All Stars v Pretoria Callies, eDanie Craven ngo-3; Black Leopards v Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila, eThohoyandou ngo-6.
Umqeqeshi ucacisa ngezilomo kuRante noLebese
UMQEQESHI weTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila, uMpho Maleka, ucacisa ngezilomo zakhe uTokelo Ranite ozakhele ugazi kwi-Orlando Pirates noGeorge Lebese odume kwiKaizer Chiefs.URantie ufike kwiTshakhuma ekuqaleni kwesizini ngemuva kwesikhathi eside izinto zingamhambeli kahle echithwa amaqembu okubalwa kuwo iCape Town City neMamelodi Sundowns.Lokho kwenze akangashesha ukungena egiyeni kodwa uMaleka uthi useyaqala ukuba wumshini.“UTokelo!
NgoTokelo kufanele sibonge umlolongi wemiziba (fitness trainer) ngokuthi kade elokhu emuphusha, emkhuthaza ukuthi akhiphe amangwevu akhe,” kusho uMaleka.“Nguye obemfuna ukuthi enze okungaphezu kwabezicabangela khona.
Nokumdlalisa kwethu imizuzu ethe xaxa (engaphezu kuka-80 behlula iTS Galaxy koweligi ngo-Ephreli 10) yize bekuhambisana nezinhlelo zethu kodwa bekuncike nasekuzinikeleni.
Siyakubonga ukunikela akukhombisile.
Sethemba ukuthi uzoqhubeka asinikeze okungaphezulu.“Okumqoka wukuthi ube ngaseqenjini elinqobile ngokwakha igoli.
Njengomgadli siyazi ukuthi uma ungayibonswanga inethi uke uhalele ukuthi noma-ke usungakhela ozakwenu.
Ngilangazelele ukuthi lokho kumkhuthaze enze okuthe xaxa emdlalweni olandelayo.KwiTshakhuma uRantie kulindelwe abuyise ithalente lakhe ebeselicwila kungaqondakali ukuthi kubangwa yini.Empeleni ngemuva kokuganwa eminyakeni edlule uRantie uvele wacwila waphenduka neqaqa emaqenjini aphesheya kwazise uqale ukugqama khona.
Uficwa yisinyama nje uke waba semabhukwini eFC Bournemouth inyukela kwi-English Premier League.Nokho ugcine esethutheleka naseTurkey kwaya walahlekelwa nayindawo yakhe kwiBafana Bafana abebukeka enekusasa eliqhakazile kuyo.Esinye isilomo okulindelwe lukhulu kuso kwiTshakhuma nguLebese yena izinto eziqale ukumbhedela esekwiChiefs esolwa ngokuvilapha.Bekulindelwe ukuthi afike avuke ngaphansi kukaPitso Mosimane kwiSundowns kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya  wabolekiswa kwiSuperSport United.
Ugcine evumbuka e-USA kodwa kuthe izinto zisamhambela kahle, kwafika iCovid-19 yavala imingcele nokuholele ekutheni aze afike kwiTTM.“UGeorge silindele ukuthi abekhona emidlalweni esemthethweni esontweni noma amabili ezayo,” kusho uMaleka.
“Naye njengoba ngike ngasho ngoTK (Tokelo) usebenza kakhulu nomlolongi womzimba ukuze abuyele egiyeni lokudlala.
Ngokomqondo kodwa uyambambona ukuthi usekulungele.”
Injabulo iligi yabesifazane ithola abaxhasi
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEINKAKHA yeBanyana Banyana, uPortia Modise, ithi kufana nokuphenduleka kwemithandazo yeminyaka ukuthola uxhaso kwebhola labesifazane.
Izolo inhlangano eyengamele ibhola kuleli, iSouth African Football Association (Safa), yethule iHollywoodbets njengabaxhasi beligi kazwelonke yabesifazane esizokwaziwa ngeHollywoodbets Super League.Empeleni lezi zindaba zizwakale ngempelasonto edlule kodwa iSafa yanquma ukuzethulela abezindaba izolo.
Umengameli wale nhlangano, uDanny Jordaan, umemezele ukuthi iHollywoodbets ixhase le ligi ngo-R17 million esivumelwaneni sesizini eyodwa.Iqembu elizoba ngompetha lizoklonyeliswa u-R2 million, isibili sithole isigidi samarandi.Kuvele nokuthi wonke amaqembu ayingxenye yale ligi azothola u-R150 000.Ezinye izindaba ezijabulisile ngezithi umdlali ozoqokwa njengovelele ekupheleleni kwesizini uzokhala emuke no-R50 000.UModise, owaqokwa ngo-2006 njengomdlali ovelele kwiWomen's African Football Championship, uthe wethemba ukuthi ukungena kweHollywoodbets kuzoheha nabanye abaxhasi.
Le nsephe, eyayingalibheki ipali, kade yayikusho ukuthi ibhola labesifazane kuleli lizokhula kuphela uma izinkampani zifaka imali.
"Sekuphele isikhathi eside sizama ukuthi elakuleli libe neligi kazwelonke yabesifazane, yezinga eliphezulu.
Ukuqala kokungena kwabaxhasi kusho ukuthuthuka kwebhola labesifazane.
Ngesikhathi iqalwa le ligi ngesizini edlule, bekunzima kakhulu kubanikazi bamaqembu ngenxa yokuswela imali yokuhambela imidlalo.
Bazoke baphumule abanikazi bamaqembu.
"Okwenza ngicele nezinye izinkampani ukuthi zixhase ukuthi ekugcineni lezi zingane kumele zondle imindeni yazo ngokudlala ibhola.
Kakungafani nezikhathi zethu lapho esasiphuma kwesinye isikhathi singaphethe lutho," kubeka uModise owaba ngowokuqala kuleli zwekazi ukushaya amagoli awu-100 eqenjini lesizwe.Uveze nokuthi unethemba lokuthi iHollywoodbets akhona amalungelo ezowathenga okusakazwa kwale ligi eziteshini ezinkulu zikamabonakude kuleli.
"Ngithanda ukubonga iSABC ngokusakaza ibhola labesifazane ngezimpelasonto.
Nokho kakwanele, ngesikhathi iba miningi imidlalo esakazwayo, bazosondela nabanye abaxhasi.
Lokhu kuzophinde kudayise abadlali bethu emaqenjini ase-Europe.
Ngicela nokuthi iHollywoodbets neSafa babambisane ekumaketheni le ligi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana,“ kusho uModise.U-Jordaan uthe lolu xhaso luzolekelela abanikazi bamaqembu ekuthuthukiseni ibhola labesifazane kuleli.“Sijabule kakhulu ngalolu xhaso, luzoshintsha okuningi.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi iSafa iyaqhubeka nokubeka ibhola labesifazane ezingeni lomhlaba.
Ngikhuluma nje sinabadlali abawu-32 abenza kahle kumaligi ase-Europe," kusho uJordaan.Umqeqeshi weBanyana, uDesiree Ellis, uthe lolu xhaso luzokwenza ube lula umsebenzi wokuqoka abadlali bamaqembu esizwe.
UZuma uzimisele ngokulwela indawo kwiChiefs
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMDLALI weKaizer Chiefs uDumisani Zuma okungacaci kahle ngekusasa lakhe kuleli qembu, uthandazela ukuthi aqhubeke nebhola alidlale koweCaf Champions League uma sebebhekene neCape Town City.IChiefs izokwamukela iCity emdlalweni weDStv Premiership namuhla ngo-5 ntambama.Emidlalweni ewu-21 yeDStv Premiership esadlalwe iChiefs, uZuma oyibamba ohlangothini lwesokudla, usafakwe kweyisishiyagalombili kuphela.Wagcina ukudlala kwiligi ngoJanuwari, ezakhe zishaywa i-Orlando Pirates ngo-2-1.Kawukho nowodwa umdlalo awuqedile, nowePirates akawudlalanga wonke.Ngesikhathi iChiefs idlala neHoroya AC koweChampions League wangena sekusele imizuzu ewu-25.
Wafika wawushintsha umdlalo, Amakhosi akwazi ukubuya umdlalo wagcina uphela ngo 2-2.Mhlawumbe uma engaqhubeka nokwenza kahle uma enikwe ithuba lokho kungamakhela ugazi kumqeqeshi uGavin Hunt okubhekwe ayakhe kabusha iChiefs ngesizini ezayo.
"Kangilimele nakancane, engilwa nako ukulwela ukuba sesimeni esihle sokudlala.
Okuhle ukuthi manje ngihlale ngineqembu, ngiziqeqesha nalo.
Konke kuzolunga ngokushesha.
Ukuzethemba kwami kubuye kakhulu, ukungena ngisize iqembu ukudlulela kuma-quarterfinal eChampions League kwenze omkhulu umehluko.
Isifiso sami ukuqhubeka nendlela engigcine ukudlala ngayo, " kubeka uZuma.IChiefs iya emdlalweni weCity iphuma ekudlaleni ngokulingana neBaroka ngo 1-1.Kwi-log isendaweni yesishiyagalolunye, ngamaphuzu awu-25, emidlalweni ewu-21.Yagcina ukunqoba kwilog ngenyanga edlule ishaya iPirates ngo 1-0.AmaCitizens acijwa uJan Olde Riekerink, akweyesikhombisa, ngamaphuzu awu-30, emuva kwemidlalo ewu-22.Kumaqembu akwi-Top 8, iwona asangenelwe amagoli amaningi, awu-29.
Asevalele enethini awu-33.Kufanele ukuthi ezikaRiekerink zizoya kowaMakhosi zethemba ukuqhubeka nezikwenze kwiSuperSport United eziyibhaxabule ngo-3-0.
"Umdlalo wethu neCity uzoba nzima kakhulu.
Emidlalweni edlule yenze kahle kakhulu.
Nangesikhakhi siyishaya emlenzeni wokuqala yayinzima ngendlela eyisimanga.
Empeleni njengoba sezibheke ngasekupheleni kweligi, yonke imidlalo izoba nzima.
Singabadlali siyazi ukuthi iqembu likwesiphi isimo, kusiphoqa ukunqoba emdlalweni ngamunye", kuqhuba uZuma.URiekerink uthe ufisa sengathi bangaqhubeka nomgqigqo abawutshengisile bedlala neSuperSport.
"Uma singaqhubeka naleli phupho esinalo, neChiefs singayishaya.
Siyazi ukuthi izitha zethu ziyiqembu elikhulu, elinomlando, elinesikwati esiqinile futhi elidlala kwiChampions League.
Lifuna nokungena kwi-Top 8, kuzoba umdlalo wamaqembu anentshisekelo yokunqoba.
Nathi sinesikwati esihle, wonke amasosha ami azobe ephelele," kusho uRiekerink.
Ukhonjwa kuMaZulu oweMaritzburg United
SIBUSISO MDLALOSEISIKHWISHIKHWISHI somdlali wasophondweni lwesokunxele kwiMarizburg United, uMxolisi "Jomo" Kunene, sesingumdlali waMaZulu FC ngemuva kokusayiniswa yileli qembu elisembhidlangweni wokuqinisa isikwati salo ukulungisela isizini ka-2021/2022.Ngokusho komthombo weSolezwe ngeSonto osondelene nomdlali, AmaZulu aseqede konke noKunene, osekusele wukuthi ethulwe ngokusemthethweni ekuqaleni kukaJulayi nabanye abadlali abasha abasayiniswe yaye eqenjini"UKunene usesayinile kuMaZulu.
Lokho ngingakuqinisekisa.
Osekusele nje manje wukuthi kuphele le nyanga kaJuni bese emenyezelwa ngokusemthethweni nabanye abadlali asebesayiniswe ngaMaZulu nalabo okulindeleke basayine ingakapheli le nyanga.Yize esevele esayinile uKunene, kodwa okwenza kungabi lula ukuthi kumenyezelwe wukuthi inkontileka yakhe neMaritzburg iphela ekupheleni kukaJuni.
Empeleni uKunene  akayedwa osuka kwiMaritzburg United, kodwa bakhona nabanye abadlali abambalwa abasuka kwiMaritzburg abazobonakala kuMaZulu okusaxoxwa nabo," kusho umthombo.UKunene ukhonjwa kuMaZulu nabanye ozakwabo nje, vele itshe limi ngothi kwiMaritzburg United okubikwa ukuthi iyadayiswa.
Usihlalo weTeam of Choice, uphumele obala kuleli sonto ngezinhloso zakhe zokufaka iqembu endalini ekhala ngezindleko nezikweleti abhekene nazo ekuliphatheni iqembu.Ngaphandle kukaKunene, ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba abanye abadlali beqembu laseMgungundlovu, abangase bavumbuke oSuthwini maduze kubalwa uKwanda Mngonyama noThabiso Kutumela, oke wayamaniswa neMamelodi Sundowns neKaizer Chiefs.Imenenja yakhe, uVasili Barbis, weGlobal Finest Athletes,  ivumile ukuthi lo mdlali usesayine inkontileka nelinye iqembu kodwa wala waphetha ukudalula iqembu asayine kulo.
"Ngeke ngikwazi ukusho okwamanje ukuthi iliphi iqembu ayakulona uKunene, kodwa ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi sesiyisayinile inkontileka.
Ngicela uphinde ungithinte ngoJulayi 1, ngizobe sengikwazi ukukutshela igama leqembu," kusho uBarbis.UKunene (29), odabuka eNyanyadu, eDannhauser, wubengomunye wabadlali abamqoka beMaritzburg abesemabhukwini ayo amasizini amane.Ukuya kwakhe kuMaZulu kufaniswa nokubuyela ekhaya kwendodana yolahleko, kwazise leli nxele likhuliswe ezinhlakeni zoSuthu ngaphambi kokujoyina iSwallows FC ebisadlala kwiNational First Division (GladAfrica Championship), asuke kuyo waya kwiBaroka FC isizini eyodwa ngaphambi kokuya eMphithi.UBrilliant Mkhathini, obhekene nezokuxhumana kuMaZulu uthe: “Njengamanje asikakhulumi ngabadlali kuze kube yisikhathi esifanele kanti nabaphathi abakasho lutho ngezindaba zabadlali.”
UNcikazi uzolwa nenkinga yokugeja kwi-Arrows
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUFUNA kulungiswe inkinga yokugeja kwiLamontville Golden Arrows umqeqeshi waleli qembu uMandla Ncikazi.
UNcikazi ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokudedela amaphuzu agcwele bebanjelwa ekhaya yiBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ophele ngo-1-1 eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, ngempelasonto edlule.
Ukungawini kwaBafana Bes’thende kubalahlekisele ngethuba lokubuyela endaweni yesibili kwi-log njengoba sebehleli kweyesithathu.
Indawo yesibili ithathwe AmaZulu FC anqobe iStellenbosch bese kuqhwakela iMamelodi Sundowns.
UNcikazi obebonakala ephoxekile ngemuva komdlalo, uthe akajabhisiwe indlela abafana bakhe abadlale ngayo, uphoxwe ukuyeka kwabo inqwaba yamathuba.
"Siyeke inqwaba yamathuba, kumele ukube lo mdlalo siwunqobile.
Sizolwa nayo le nto yokuba buthuntu phambi kwamapali.
Kangisoli muntu, kumele sizigxeke sonke.
Mayelana nokudlala, abadlali bami badlale kahle uma kuqhathaniswa nomdlalo odlule (weSwallows).
Akusenani, leli phuzu lizokwengeza kokufunwa ukuzuzwa iqembu, lingcono iphuzu kunokwehlulwa," kubeka uNcikazi.Ngomdlalo weSiwelele bekungowesithathu i-Arrows idlala ngokulingana kulandelana.
Ibambane neCape Town City neSwallows.Yagcina ukunqoba ekuqaleni kukaMashi ishaya iTshakhuma ngo-2-1.Ngo-Ephreli 21, ezikaNcikazi zizovakashela iSuperSport United, eMasterpieces Moripe Stadium koqala u-5 ntambama.Amatsatsantsa a Pitori aphuma esibhaxwini esivuthayo sika-3-0 asithole kumaCitizens ngeledlule.Kwi-log yeDStv Premiership aya ngokwehla njengoba esesendaweni yesithupha ngamaphuzu awu-35, emidlalweni ewu-22.
Ake abalwa namaqembu amathathu phezulu.NoJohn Maduka ocija iCeltic ukhale ngamathuba ayekwe abafana bakhe.
"Lo mdlalo kumele ukube siwunqobe ngenqwaba yamagoli.
Ukungasebenzisi amathuba kusiphuce amaphuzu amabili wonke.
Siye kulo mdlalo sazi ukuthi i-Arrows idlala ibhola elifana nelethu.
Besiyivumela ize kithina bese siyayizuma.
Yingakho sithole amathuba amaningi.
Sizoqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima kuze kube iyalunga indaba yokushaya amagoli," kusho uMaduka.ICeltic izodlala neSwallows ngo-Ephreli 20 eSeisa Ramabodu Stadium ngo-5 ntambama.
EzikaMaduka zisendaweni yeshumi ngamaphuzu awu-24, emidlalweni ewu-22.
Umdlali weGalaxy ubona bengena kwiTop 8
STHEMBISO NGOBESEISIKHWISHIKHWISHI somdlali weTS Galaxy, uLindokuhle Mbatha, sibona besethubeni elihle lokubalwa namanye amaqembu eDStv Premiership azoqeda isizini ka-2020/2021 ekwiTop 8 nokuhambisana nokudlala emqhudelwaneni weMTN 8 ngesizini ezayo.UMbatha odabuka Osizweni, eNewcastle, ukhuluma kanje, kamuva nje iGalaxy eqeqeshwa ngu-Owen Da Gama, ikhombisa ukuba sefomini enhle kakhulu njengoba ilokhu iqhubekile nokuvulela isibhaxu kwamanye amaqembu agijima kwiligi.Emidlalweni emihlanu yakamuva, amaRockets awakahlulwa.
Anqobe iBloemfontein Celtic ngo 1-0, iBlack Leopards ngo 3-1, abuye ephula irekhodi leSwallows FC lokungahlulwa eyicoboshisa ngo 2-1.Emidlalweni emibili leli qembu likaTim Sukazi lidlale ngokulingana ngo 0-0 neSupersport United nango 1-1 neChippa United.
Njengamanje iGalaxy ihlezi endaweni yesikhombisa kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-26 emidlalweni engu-19.UMbatha uthe lokhu kungenxa yokuzikhandla kwabo bengabadlali kanti nokufika kukaDa Gama othathe izintambo kuDan “Dance” Malesela osekwiChilli Boyz, kwenze umehluko omkhulu.“Isizini asiyiqalanga neze kahle kwazise imiphumela emihle ibigqoza, kodwa-ke siyajabula ukuthi manje sesiqalile ukuwina imidlalo ilandelana nokuyinto ebingenzeki phambilini.
Nakuba ngingathandi ukuqhathanisa abaqeqeshi kodwa ngingasho ukuthi ukufika kukaDa Gama kwenze kwaba nomehluko omkhulu eqenjini.
Ngaphezu kwalokho ufikele kubadlali iningi labo alaziyo njengoba kade esiqeqesha kwiHighlands Park ngesizini edlule, nokuyinto eyenza ukuba umsebenzi wakhe nowethu singabadlali ube lula kakhulu uma sesisenkundleni,” kusho uMbatha owayegijima kwiPlatinum Stars nakwiMamelodi Sundowns.Lo mdlali ogijimisa okwenyamazane ezinhlangothini uqhube wathi: “Njengoba sesiqalile ukunqoba imidlalo ngibona lokhu kusibeka ethubeni elihle kakhulu lokuthi siqede isizini sikwi-Top 8, kodwa-ke uma sifuna ukwenza lokho kumele siqhubeke nokusebenza kanzima ukuze sifeze leli phupho.”NgoMgqibelo iGalaxy izobuyela enkundleni izobhekana neMariztburg United emdlalweni weligi ngo-5 ntambama eMbombela Stadium, eNelspruit.Akungabazeki nakancane ukuthi lo mdlalo uzobe ungowamagqubu kwazise ngesikhathi egcina ukuhlangana la maqembu emzuliswaneni wokuqala, iGalaxy yabukisa ngeTeam of Choice iyibhudluza ngo 3-0 eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.
I-United nayo iwadinga egcwele amaphuzu kwazise ibalekela izembe.
Ibambe indawo ka-14 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-14 emidlalweni ewu-18.
UJele uyayethemba iPirates kweyeCaf
UKAPUTENI we-Orlando Pirates, uHappy Jele, ubona isikwati abanaso singakuphinda okweminyaka edlule emqhudelwaneni weCAF Confederation Cup.IPirates izokwamukela i-Enyimba FC yaseNigeria emdlalweni wesibili wesigaba samaqoqo kaGroup A ozoba se-Orlando Stadium namuhla ngo-6 ntambama.
Emdlalweni wokuvula esigabeni samaqoqo, iPirates idlale ngokulingana ngo 1-1 ne-ES Setif yase-Algeria.UJele, okunguyena kuphela osele eqenjini elafinyelela kowamanqamu weConfederation Cup ngo-2015 beqeqeshwa ngu-Eric Tinkler, uthe isikwati abanaso kulokhu singakuphinda lokho.
Abafana bakaTinkler bahlulwa yi-Etoile du Sahel yaseTunisia kowamanqamu.
"Kuningi okufanayo phakathi kwaleli qembu nelango-2015 elafinyelela kowamanqamu.
Indlela esidlala ngayo nabadlali esinabo.
Siyasizana, siyalekelelana.
Kungenzeka sithubeleze sifinyelele kowamanqamu, siyiwine indebe.
Sinesikwati esihle.
Esikudingayo  manje yimiphumela," kusho uJele.Isikwati sikaTinkler sasithakwe ngabadlali okukhona kubona uLucky Lekgwathi, Sifiso Myeni, Thandani Ntshumayelo, Ayanda Gcaba, Kermit Erasmus nabanye.IPirates isendaweni yesibili kuGroup A ngephuzu kanye neSetif.
Emsileni kuhlezi i-Al Ahly Benghazi yaseLibya.
Eqhulwini kuhlezi i-Enyimba ehlule  iBenghazi kowokuvula.
"Amalungiselelo ahambe kahle.
Sithole iphuzu ekuhambeni.
Siyazi ukuthi kubalulekile ukuwina ekhaya.
Siyicwaningile i-Enyimba.
Siyazi ukuthi iyiqembu eliyingozi.
Siyazi futhi lapho ibuthaka khona.
Kufanele sisebenze kanzima ukuze siwine kusasa (namuhla).
Njengoba sengike ngadlala kwiCaf, kuwumsebenzi wami ukuthi ngibacathulise nabanye.
Lo mqhudelwano ubalulekile kimina, ubalulekile naseqenjini.
IPirates iyiqembu elikhulu.
Ulwazi oluncane enginalo kufanele ngiludlulisele kwabanye ozakwethu," kusho uJele.Endleleni ebheke esigabeni samaqoqo, i-Enyimba igudluze iBloemfontein Celtic yaseNingizimu Afrika.
Asikapholi isilonda seBaroka kumdlali weChiefs
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEKALIVUMI ukuphela igqubu kumdlali weKaizer Chiefs, uNjabulo Blom lokubanjwa yiBaroka FC bagcina bephunyukwe isicoco seligi ngomdlalo wokugcina wesizini eyedlule.La maqembu okuhlala kusiphuka isidindi uma etholene phezulu, namuhla azobhekana emzuliswaneni wesibili weDStv Premiership oqala ngo-3 ntambama, ePeter Mokaba Stadium.IChiefs eqeqeshwa uGavin Hunt, ihambela phezulu ngenxa yokungena okokuqala kuma-qaurterfinal eCaf Champions League.
Lokhu ikwenze ngokubambana ngo-2-2 neHoroya yaseGuinea ekuhambeni ngempelasonto edlule.
Izoya kwiBaroka sekudlule imidlalo eyisikhombisa yagcina ukwehlulwa.
UBlom oyibamba esiswini kuMakhosi, uthe bayilindele iBaroka.
"Ngijatshuliswa yizinga eliphezulu lokuzethemba eqenjini.
Lokhu kudalwe imiphumela yakamuva.
Kuhlale kunzima ukudlala neBaroka, uma ngicabanga ngayo inhliziyo iba buhlungu.
Wonke umuntu wayibona ngesizini edlule isiphuca isicoco seligi.
Yebo, iSundowns (Mamelodi) eyagcina isithathile kodwa yiBaroka eyama endleleni yethu.
Siyakwazi esikulindele kuyo, akumele siyeye.
Siyazi ukuthi iyiqembu eligijima ngendlela eyisimanga futhi elisebenza ngokuzikhandla.
Sizokhipha konke esinako,“ kusho uBlom.Kuwafa wafa womdlalo wokugcina wesizini ka-2019/20, uManual Kambala washayela iBaroka igoli lokulinganisa kungasalindele muntu.EleChiefs okwase kubhekwe ukuthi iChiefs izonqoba ngalo lashaywa nguKhama Billiat.
Bekungokwesibili iBakgaga ima endleleni yeChiefs.
Ngo-2011, isadlala kwi-ABC Motsepe League, yashaya Amakhosi ngo-1-0 wegoli likaThobani Mncwango kuma-quarterfinal yeNedbank Cup.Kule sizini, emlenzeni wokuqala, iChiefs yabambana neBaroka ngo-1-1 koweligi.
EzikaHunt zasizwa umkhonto owagwaza ekhaya kaGoodman Mosele sewuyophela umdlalo.Yize kulokhu iChiefs ingalweli isicoco seligi kodwa kusemqoba ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele njengoba ilwela ukungena kwiTop 8.
Isaqoqe amaphuzu awu-24 emidlalweni ewu-20 okuyibeka endaweni yesishiyagalolunye.
Uma iBaroka inqoba izoyigudluza iChiefs endaweni ekuyo.Njengamanje, ezikaThoka Matsemela zikweyeshumi nambili, ngamaphuzu awu-23, emidlalweni ewu-21.UBlom onemidlalo ewu-19 yeDStv Premiership, ubengekho kodlule weligi bebambana ngo-2-2 neStellenbosch, ngenxa yamakhadi.Uthe uyajabula ukubuyela kweyeligi.“Kwangiphatha kabuhlungu ukungabibikho sidlala neStellenbosch.
Ayikho into engangizoyenza, ngase ngithole amakhadi amane.
Ukunqoba kwethu koweChampions League, eGuinea, emdlalweni obunzima ngendlela eyisimanga, ngikholelwa ukuthi nakho kuzosisiza koweBaroka.
IChampions League ihlukile, uma sidlala kuyo sisuke simele izwe,” kusho uBlom.
Liyayishonela iChiefs elwela ukuqeda kwiTop 8
ZAKHELE XABATshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (1) 2Kaizer Chiefs (0) 1LIYAYISHONELA iKaizer Chiefs ezabalazela ukungena kwiTop 8 njengoba iphinde yalahla amaphuzu ihlulwa yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ePeter Mokaba Stadium, ePolokwane, izolo ebusuku.Igoli leChiefs lishaywe nguLebogang Manyama esiwombeni sesibili.
Awe-TTM abekwe enethini nguThabo Rakhale noThabo Mnyamana esiwombeni ngasinye.Amakhosi angene enkundleni ebheke ukuqoqa amaphuzu agcwele kulandela ukubanjwa yiBloemfontein Celtic ngempelasonto edlule.
Kule sizini iChiefs ingena, iyaphuma kwi-Top 8 ngenxa yokuhluleka wukugcina umgqigqo.
Ukuhamba kwemidlalo iChiefs ihluleka ukucosha amaphuzu kusho ukungena engcupheni yokungayidlali iMTN 8 ekuqaleni kwesizini ezayo.
Amakhosi asalelwe yimidlalo emine ukuthi azame ukuzibekisela indawo kulo mqhudelwano.
Umdlalo weTTM neChiefs, bekungowokuqala womqeqeshi uDylan Kerr esebhentshini kulandela ukulunga kwemvume yakhe yokusebenza eMzansi emahoreni ambalwa ngaphambi kokuqala komdlalo.Izolo, iChiefs ikhombise ukuwuphatha umdlalo usaqala kodwa ihluleka uma isifike phambili.
Emuva kwesikhathi eside onozinti bezipholele, uBruce Bvuma, obesemapalini eChiefs, uchilizele ngaphandle ishodi likaMnyamana ngomzuzu ka-22.
Ngoka-38 iChiefs ingene obishini uNjabulo Blom ethola ikhadi eliphuzi lesibili emuva kokudonsa uNdabayithethwa Ndlondlo ngaphandle kwebhokisi.
Leyo free-kick ishaywe nguMnyamana, yashaya ipali, yashayisa kuBvuma wayicosha.
Sekusele imizuzu emithathu, uRakhale ulibeke esifubeni, waqobela phakathi ibhola eligotshwe nguMnyamana kwesokudla.Esiwombeni sesibili, iChiefs ibuye yazama ukucindezela kodwa iTTM ibikhombisa ukuba yingozi uma ithola ibhola.
Unozinti weTTM, uWashington Arubi, ugcine ekutholile azokwenza echithela phezu kwepali ibhola elingqofwe nguSamir Nurkovic ngomzuzu ka-51.Ngomzuzu ka-65 unompempe uVictor Hlungwane unikeze iChiefs iphenathi emuva kokuthi u-Ayanda Nkili edlalise kabi uNurkovic ebhokisini.
Ishaywe nguManyama kodwa wayibamba u-Arubi.
UManyama uyilandelile, wamjika, wayiqobela phakathi.
Sekubalwa imizuzwana kuphele umdlalo, uHlungwane uyikhombe emlotheni emuva kokuthi uSiyabonga Ngezana ebambe ibhola ngesandla ebhokisini.
Ishaywe phakathi nguMnyamanaEmdlalweni olandelayo, iTTM ebalekela izembe izobhekana neChippa United kowamanqamu weNedbank Cup eFree State Stadium ngoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama.
Ngokunqoba lapha inyukele endaweni ka-14  ngamaphuzu awu-25.
IChiefs sekuzomele iyozama ukulwela amaphuzu agcwele uma isidlala neSwallows ngoLwesithathu oluzayo.
Ngalolu suku iTTM izobe idlala neSuperSport United.
UMotsepe ukhuculula insila eqaqele kwiCaf
INDLALA yemidlalo yeBafana Bafana kuthelevishini emidlalweni yasekuhambeni sekuzoba into endala uma kungukuthi imizamo kamengameli weConfederation of African Football (Caf), uPatrice Motsepe, iyaphumelela.UMotsepe owayevele ethembise izinguquko ezinqala ngesikhathi esakhankasela ukhetho, ukhiphe isitatimende ngeSonto lapho enaba khona ngemihlangano eyahlukahlukene nezinhlaka ezahlukene kunobhutshuzwayo wase-Afrika abelokhu ehlangana nazo.
Uqale ukwenza lokhu kusukela eqokiwe ngenhloso yokwenza ibhola lase-Afrika lihehe kwabakwamanye amazwekazi, liphinde lizakhele lona inzuzo ukuze kuzokwanda abaxhasi.Kuningi okungenzeki ngendlela okuqashelwe wuMotsepe nethimba lakhe njengoba bebelokhu bengena bephuma emihlanganweni nabaxhasi (bakhona nalaba abafisa ukufaka isandla), izikhulu zohulumeni kanjalo nomengameli.NgokukaMotsepe, ubuholi obudlule bebuphethe ngendlela engagculisi okufakazelwa yindlela umhlaba wonke oyibuka ngayo iCaf.Ukungaphathwa ngendlela ethembekile kwemali okuhambisana nokungabi-nabo abaphathi abaqotho, ngezinye zezizathu uMotsepe nethimba lakhe, bebone kungcono balande i-Price Waterhouse Coopers (PWC) ukuba izobasiza ngokuphenyisisa zonke izinkinga ebezibikwa phambilini ngeCaf.Umbiko wesikhashana wePWC uveze ubugebengu obusabekayo obebenzeka ngaphambilini.Indaba yokusakazwa kwemidlalo yamazwe kulapho kuvele khona inkinga kutholakala ukuthi kunemali eningi ekhokhwa ngendlela engaqondile ekubeni amazwe ase-Afrika kungewona wonke ahlomulayo ngalokhu.Sekungumlando ukuthi indodana ka-Issa Hayatou owayengumengameli weCaf isikhathi eside, ibibalwa kubaphathi benkampani yaseFrance okuyiyona ebiwaphethe wonke amagunya okusakazela i-Caf imidlalo yayo.Ngenxa yalokhu, imidlalo yeBafana bese kujwayelekile ukuthi uma isekuhambeni ingakhonjiswa kwithelevishini.
Kuyimanje imidlalo yeCaf Champions League neyeConfederations, yamaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika, kayikhonjiswa uma isekuhambeni.UMotsepe ukholelwa ekutheni uma zingalungiswa zonke lezi zinto, iCaf izohlonishwa emhlabeni.Izincomo eziphume emihlanganweni elokhu iqale ngoMashi zikhomba ukuthi kufanele ibhekwe indlela okuphathwa ngayo imiqhudelwano kanjalo nendlela abaqashiwe abasebenza ngayo.Kusemqoka ukuthi kufakwe imali ezinkundleni njengoba kushaywe umthetho othi wonke amazwe angaphansi kweCaf kumele okungenani abe nenkundla eyodwa esezingeni leFifa.Ubudlelwano obukhona nabaxhasi kumele buqiniswe kakhulu kunakuqala kuphinde kuqashwe abantu abawufundele ngendlela umsebenzi ngokwahlukana kwezinhlaka.IPatrice Motsepe Foundation isivele ixhase i-Caf Pan-African Schools Football Championship ngo-$10 million.Kusemqoka kuMotsepe ukuthuthukiswa kwebhola labesifazane bese kuqinisekiswa ukuthi isithunzi sonondweba sihloniphekile izwekazi lonke.Okukhulu kunakho konke uMotsepe akufunayo, ukuqala kokusetshenziswa kwemishini ye-Video Assistant Referee (VAR).Ukugcizelele ukuthi kumele kuthengwe le eshibhile kodwa esebenza kahle, hhayi le emba eqolo ekubeni izokwenza umsebenzi ofanayo.
Ngempelasonto edlule, kubonakale kusebenza okokuqala iVAR emidlalweni eyandulela owamanqamu yeChampions League.
UHunt uzibona ekhuza ibuya maduze ekuqeqesheni
ANGASE abonakale maduze ebhentshini uGavin Hunt osanda kuxoshwa yiKaizer Chiefs yize eyibeke kowandulela owamanqamu weCaf Champions League.UHunt uqashwe iChiefs ekuqaleni kwesizini ethatha izintambo ku-Ernst Middendorp okuyisinqumo esenze abalandeli bayo babuyelwa yithemba ngeqembu labo kwazise belihlehla nyova.Kusobala-ke nokho ukuthi izinto azizange zihambe kahle ngaphansi kobuholi bukaHunt yize iChiefs ibingavumelekile ukuthenga abadlali (ngesikhathi sakhe).Ukuhlulwa kweChiefs yiBlack Leopards ngoMeyi 26 yikhona okuphoqe Amakhosi ukuthi athathe isinqumo sokulihlukanisa ifindo leminyaka emithathu noHunt.Kuliqiniso ukuthi izinto azizange zimvume lo mqeqeshi kwiChiefs yize enomlando wokudla izicoco.
IChiefs imfaka amasondo nje isaphumelele ukuwina imidlalo emibili kwengu-17 yeligi ilandelana.Ukufaka iChiefs kweyandulela owamanqamu kwiChampions League akuzange kumsize uHunt ogcine exoshwa okokuqala empilweni yakhe yokuqeqesha esigabeni esikhokhelayo eNingizimu Afrika.Ethintwa Isolezwe  izolo emini uHunt uthe, yize engathandi ukukhuluma ngosekudlule kodwa ngeke afihle ukuthi ucabanga ngonobhutshuzwayo ubusuku nemini.
"Ngabe ngiqamba aluhlaza uma ngingathi ngiyalijabulela leli khefu engilitholile emuva kweminyaka eminingi.
Ngicabanga ngonobhutshuzwayo ubusuku nemini.
Nakuthelevishini ayikho enye into engiyibukayo ngaphandle kwebhola.
Ngisho elakudala yinqobo nje uma kungunobhutshuzwayo," kusho uHunt.Ebuzwa ngokuthi kungalindeleka nini ukuthi abonakale ebhentshini uthe, ukuphela kwesizini yikhona okuzocacisa okuningi.
"Kuhle ngoba isizini isizophela.
Kulapho izinto eziningi ezizokwenzeka khona.
"Angikwazi ukusho okuzokwenzeka kodwa isikhathi yisona esizocacisa ngekusasa lami.
Ngeke ngithathe ikhefu njengoba behlale benza abanye abaqeqeshi kodwa okuningi kuzocaca ngami maduze," kusonga uHunt.Uthe akafuni ukukhuluma ngokusekudlulile.Akhona amaqembu asemataniswa noHunt selokhu exoshiwe.
Phakathi kwamaqembu akhonjwa kuwona kubalwa iStellenbosch FC neSuperSport United.
La maqembu aphekwa uSteve Barker noKaitano Tembo ngokwahlukana.Kuthiwa iSuperSport izimisele ngokubuyisa uHunt oyakhele udumo edla izicoco eminyakeni edlule.
Imbangela yalokhu ukungenami kwayo ngokugcwele ngoTembo.Kuyavela nokuthi iStellies okuyiqembu langakubo uHunt kwazise ungowaseKapa, iyamnyonyobela kodwa konke kuncike ekutheni iyalivika yini izembe ebhekene nalo.
UNcikazi akaneme ngakubone kwezakhe zinqoba
LUNGILE MAJOKAUMANDLA Ncikazi  opheka iLamontville Golden Arrows, ufuna ukubona iqembu lakhe linciphisa amagoli angena ngakulona njengoba kuzobuyelwa ensimini ngemuva kwekhefu lekhalenda leFifa.Kuyiwe ekhefini i-Arrows ibambe indawo yesibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership ngamaphuzu awu-36 emidlalweni ewu-20.
Eqhulwini kuhleli iMamelodi Sundowns esiqoqe amaphuzu awu-40 emidlalweni ewu-18.UNcikazi uthe ngokwezibalo sebewenzile umsebenzi wokuvika izembe, okumqoka manje wukulwela ukuqinisa indawo yabo kwi-Top 8.Abafana bes’thende bazobuyela ensimini koweligi ngoMgqibelo lapho bezobe bevakashele iSwallows eDobsonville Stadium ngo-3 ntambama.
Umdlalo odlule weligi wala maqembu waphela ngo 1-1 eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium.UNcikazi uthe kuyamjabulisa ukuthi babalwa namaqembu ahamba phambili ngokushaya amagoli kodwa akaneme ngokuthi nasemuva bayavuza.
I-Arrows isivalele phakathi amagoli awu-30, yangenelwa awu-19.“Zikhona izindawo okumele sizilungise (njengoba bekunekhefu).
Asikho bukhali phambi kwamapali uma ngiqhathanisa namathuba esiwakhayo.
Siyakubonga ukuthi iqembu lingelinye lahamba phambili ekushayeni amagoli.
Sinawu-30 neCape Town City.
Kuhle lokho eqenjini.
Singathanda ukwehlisa kulawo asingenelayo.
Uma siphambili ekushayeni amagoli, singathanda ukuhamba phambili nasekuwavimbeni.
Sibonge ukuzinikela kwabadlali benza kahle kakhulu,” kusho uNcikazi.Uma iqembu likaNcikazi lingaqhubeka nesigqi sokungehlulwa, okungayibeka ethubeni lokuqeda emaqenjini amathathu aphezulu, ingazithola idlala emiqhudelwaneni yeCaf ngesizini ezayo, ibuye idlale nakwiMTN 8.
Ngaphambi kwekhefu badlale ngokulingana neCity neBaroka, bahlula iTshakhuma neBlack Leopards.UNcikazi owesekwa wuMabhuti Khenyeza ebhentshini le-Arrows uthe akafuni ukufakela abadlali bakhe ingcindezi.“Angijwayele ukufaka ingcindezi eqenjini ngokuthi sifuna ukudlala kuphi ngesizini ezayo.
Ngithatha into njengoba yenzeka ngaleso sikhathi.
Okuphambili wukuthi sesikuvikile ukudliwa yizembe ngokwamaphuzu esinawo  nezibalo.
Okulandelayo wukuthi sisebenzele i-Top 8.
Uma izibalo sezikhomba ukuthi sizoqeda kwi-Top 8, uma Lokho sekuqinisekisiwe sizobe sesibheka ukuthi iyiphi indawo ephezulu esingayithola kwi-Top 8.
Angibhekile okunye okungale kwalokho.
Uma amaphuzu esizobe sesiwatholile esinikeza ithuba lokudlala kunoma yimuphi umqhudelwano sizokwamukela lokho njengeqembu.
Asifuni ukushintsha izinhlelo ebesinazo kuqala isizini.
Uma ubheka izinto ezinkulu kakhulu, ungazithola usuphoxeka kakhulu.
Asifuni ukufaka abadlali bethu kulokho,” kusho uNcikazi.Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership ngempelasonto:NgoMgqibelo - Ngo-3pm: Swallows v Lamontville Golden Arrows (Dobsonville Stadium).Ngo-5pm: Maritzburg United v Chippa United (Harry Gwala Stadium); Cape Town City v Baroka (Cape Town Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-3pm: Black Leopards v AmaZulu (Thohoyandou Stadium); Bloemfontein Celtic v TS Galaxy (Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium).
IPirates ethubeni lama-quarterfinal koweCaf
I-ORLANDO Pirates izicabele indlela ebheke kuma-quarterfinal eCAF Confederation Cup ihlula i-Al Ahly Benghazi yaseLibya emdlalweni wamaqoqo kaGroup A e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto, izolo ebusuku.Amagoli abeke iPirates ebuhleni ashaywe nguNtsikelelo Nyauza, Tshegofatso Mabasa noKabelo Dlamini esiwombeni ngasinye.
Ngokunqoba izolo, iPirates izibeke esicongweni okwesikhashana ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili.
Umbuso wayo ubukade uncike emphumeleni womdlalo obuphakathi kwe-Enyimba yaseNigeria ne-ES Setif yase-Algeria esishicilele uzodlala ngo-9 ebusuku.
Ngaphambi kwemidlalo yayizolo, i-Enyimba yiyona ebikade izihola phambili kuGroup A. Amaqembu amabili azoqeda phezulu azodlulela kuma-quarterfinal.Emdlalweni wayizolo wePirates neBenghazi, ziqale ziphuthumana nhlangothi zombili.
Ukuxhamazela kwamaqembu womabili bekuholela ekutheni aphunyukwe yibhola kalula.
Nokho iPirates ibikade ikhombisa ukuba yingozi ngejubane nebhola layo elisheshayo.
Igcine izuzile ngomzuzu ka-26 ngesikhathi uNyauza evalela phakathi ikhona ewele kuyena emuva kokuthi abadlali beBenghazi behlulekile ukuyikhipha.
EZimnyama ziqhubekile nokufaka ingcindezi.
Ngomzuzu ka-41 uMabasa ungqofele phakathi ikhona kaDeon Hotto.Esiwombeni sesibili, iPirates iqhubekile nokukhombisa ukuba namandla kuneBenghazi.
Ngomzuzu ka-69 kugamanxe uHotto kwesokunxele, wagobela uMabasa ibhola ebhokisini olishaye lavinjwa ngunozinti, waliqobela phakathi uDlamini.
Emuva kwaleli goli iBenghazi izamile ukubuya, ithola nama-free-kick ngasebhokisini lePirates kodwa yahluleka ukushaya igoli.Emdlalweni olandelayo weConfederation Cup, iPirates izokwamukela i-ES Setif yase-Algeria ngo-Ephreli 21 e-Orlando Stadium.
KwiCaf Champions League iMamelodi Sundowns neKaizer Chiefs sebengenile kuma-quarterfinal.
Uma iPirates ingalandela kungasho ukuqhubeka nokuphephezelisa ifulegi kwamaqembu akuleli kule miqhudelwano yeCaf, okuyinto ebisivame ukwenziwa iSundowns kuphela kumasizini edlule.NgoLwesine, iPirates izodlala neSundowns kowama-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup.
UMcCarthy uchazwa wumlando oqoshwe ngabadlali boSuthu
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEABADLALI baMaZulu FC bafanele ukubhalwa amabhukwini omlando weqembu njengendlela yokubakhumbula, ngokwenza umsebenzi oncomekayo bebeka iqembu esicongweni seDStv Premiership.
Lokhu kushiwo ngumqeqeshi woSuthu, uBenni McCarthy, ngemuva kokuqoba izimbangi iLamontville Golden Arrows ngo 1-0 emdlalweni womkhaya baKwaZulu-Natal obuseSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont ngempelasonto.
Igoli loSuthu livalelwe phakathi nguLuvuyo Memela ngasekupheleni kwesiwombe sokuqala.
Ukunqoba koSuthu kulubeke eqhulwini kwi-log yeDStv Premiership ngamaphuzu awu-50.
Lube ngaphezulu kweMamelodi Sundowns nokho ebisenomdlalo  ne-Orlando Pirates izolo, obungashintsha izinto.
Ngemuva komdlalo ne-Arrows, uMcCarthy obehluleka nawukukhuluma ngenxa yenjabulo, uncome abadlali bakhe ngokungaphezi.
"Ngiyalithanda leli qembu labadlali boSuthu.
Angazi ngingayichaza ngithini injabulo enginayo.
Njengoba ngasho esithangamini sabezindaba, thina asikhulumi, senza izinto enkundleni.
Laba badlali kumele bafakwe amabhukwini omlando weqembu ngoba ukudlala ibhola elihle ngalolu hlobo akuhlale kwenzeka kuwona wonke amasizini.
Noma ngabe sihlale usuku olulodwa esicongweni kodwa kuwumuzwa omnandi, ogqugquzela abadlali.
Ekugcineni nathi size sahlala phezulu, akekho owayezitshela ukuthi iqembu lethu, elisuka endaweni yesi-13, lingaqhwakela.“Okwenzeka kwi-log yeDStv Premiership kuwumvuzo wokusebenza kanzima kwamasosha ami.
Anomqondo wokunqoba njengomqeqeshi wabo," kubeka uMcCarthy emamatheka.Uqhube wathi ufisa sengathi umbango wesicoco seligi ungaqhubeka kuze kufike imidlalo yokugcina yokuvala isizini.
"Kulo nyaka esibe neCovid-19, neDStv Premiership nobumnandi bayo ufisa ukuthi kuqhubeke kuze kufike umdlalo wokugcina.
Ngithemba ukuthi iPirates izosenzela ububele ngokuthi yenze okumele ikwenze.
Ngithemba ukuthi bazokwenza ukuze siqhubeke (kuheha) kanje kuzobe kuyophela.“ Mayelana nomdlalo we-Arrows, uthe bewunazo zonke izithako zomdlalo wasekhaya.
"Into engihlukumezile nje yingesikhathi unondweba ethi uSithebe (Siyabulela) uyi-offside kade engeyona.
Lesa sinqumo sibe wubugebengu.
Akusasizi ukukhala, wonke umuntu uyawenza amaphutha.
Ngaphandle kwaleli phutha, unondweba uwuphathe kahle lo mdlalo.
Nabasizi bakhe benze omkhulu umsebenzi,“ kusho uMcCarthy.
AmaZulu azoze adlale koweligi ngoMeyi 11 lapho ezovakashelwa yiBaroka FC eKing Zwelithini Stadium, eMlaza.
I-ASA ilekelela abahlulwa yizikhathi zama-Olympic
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUKWEHLULEKA kwabasubathi bakuleli ukuthi benze izikhathi ezifanele zokungena kuma-Olympic Games, sekuphoqe i-Athletics South Africa (ASA) ukuthi izijube ibalekelele njengoba kubhekwe ukuthi babuye nezindondo.Ngeledlule iSascoc imemezele isikwata sesikhashana sabadlali abawu-64, abasemathubeni okugcina bemele elakuleli kule midlalo okulindeleke iqale ngoJulayi 23  eTokyo, eJapan.Abeqembu labagijimi bawu-15 abasafakiwe.
Kulolu luhlu,  kazibonwa nangokhalo izinyamazane ezanqobela elakuleli izindondo zegolide kuma-Olympic, ayaseRio de Janeiro, eBrazil ngo-2016.Laba uWayde van Niekerk owaphula irekhodi ku-400m noCaster Semenya ku-800m.
USemenya ongasavumelekile ukugijima kuleli banga, udonsa kanzima ukwenza isikhathi sokuhlunga esiwu-15:10.00 ebangeni lika-5000m.Ngesifanayo noVan Niekerk ongakasigijimi isikhathi esingu-44.90 ku-400m  noma u-20.24 obekelwe ukungena ku-200m.
Kakubona kuphela, kukhona noGlenrose Xaba, Precious Mashele, Mbuleli Mathanga ukusho abambalwa abangakazibeseli izindawo.Umengameli we-ASA, uJames Moloi, wazise Isolezwe  ukuthi lesi simo sibaphoqe ukuthi benze umqhudelwano ozokwaziwa nge-ASA Track & Field Series ozoba ngoJuni 12, eGreen Point Stadium eCape Town.Uveze ukuthi banethemba lokuthi bakhona abazokwenza izikhathi ngaphambi kokuyozama enye inhlanhla kuma-African Athletics Championships aqala ngoJuni 23-27, eLagos eNigeria.
Wumqhudelwano wokugcina kumazwe akuleli zwekazi ukuhlungela ama-Olympic.
"Kusinda kwehlela, abasubathi bethu abaningi abakazenzi izikhathi ezibafaka kuma-Olympic.
Lapha ngibala nezethenjwa zethu, uWayde noCaster.
Sihlalele ethembeni lokuthi bakhona abazozenza eKapa," kubeka uMoloi.Emqhudelwaneni iNewtown Classic Qualifier, ebingempelasonto edlule eKings Park Athletics Stadium, eThekwini, uSemenya uphinde wwhluleka ukwenza u-15:10.00 wokungena kuma-Olympic ku-5000m.
Ugcine enze u-15:32.15.Empeleni akekho owakuleli owenze isikhathi esiphethe ithikithi eliya eTokyo, kuwona wonke amabanga obekuqhudelwana kuwo.Emasontweni edlule, uVan Nierkerk uthuse abaningi etshengisa izimpawu zokulimala ngenkathi egijima u-200m, kwi-Adidas Boost Boston Games, e-USA lapho eseziqeqeshela khona.
Uwuqale kahle umjaho, nokho waya esiphethweni esehamba kancane, exhuga.Amaphaphu ehliswe yiMenenja yakhe uPeet van Zyl, eveze ukuthi umonakalo bewumncane kakhulu.
Naye uVan Nieker ocijwa nguLance Brauman wase-USA, ulobe ekhasini lakhe le-twitter, eqinisekisa ukuthi ungumqemane.UVan Zyl ubuye watshela Isolezwe  ukuthi lo mgijimi uzobe engekho  emjahweni ozoba eGreen Point Stadium.
Uthe umatasa nemijaho yase-Europe, azama ukwenza kuyo izikhathi ezinhle.
UVan Niekerk, ucashunwe kwi-IOL Sport eveza ukuthi akanankinga yokushaya izikhathi zokuya eJapan, lokho uzokwenza maduze.

UMQEQESHI weBlack Leopards, uLehlohonolo Seema, ukholwa wukuthi usenalo ithemba lokuyisindisa ezembeni elibukeka seliloliwe phezu kwayo esigabeni seDStv Premiership.ILeopards isemsileni we-log ngamaphuzu angu-13 emidlalweni engu-22.

"Kuningi okuhle esiphuma nakho kulo mdlalo.
