Iyodwa into okungafanele siyenze okuwukuvikela leli phuzu esinalo okwamanje," kusho uSeema.
"Kodwa emizuzwini engu-10 esiwombeni sesibili besingakwazi ngisho ukuphuma ebhokisini lethu.
Wonke umuntu ubekade eselikhahlela ibhola.
Kade sekubonakala ukuthi sesithukile, nami sengibona ukuthi iphutha elincane elizokwenzeka kuzoba yinkinga.
Ebholeni eligcine liyiphenathi, kade silimakile laya engxenyeni enkulu yabo.
Ngicabanga ukuthi ngisho uVries (unozinti weSwallows) ulithintile ibhola kodwa thina besisahlezi ebhokisini lethu.
Emuva kwalokho sibe nengcindezi, satatazela, sesithatha izinqumo ezingafanele phambili.
"Emidlalweni eyisihlanu yeligi elandelayo, iLeopards izobhekana neStellenbosch (April 21), SuperSport United (Ephreli 24), Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (Meyi 1), Orlando Pirates (May 5) neKaizer Chiefs (Meyi 18).
UMcCarthy uphakamisa unozinti wezakhe kwabavelele
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUNOZINTI waMaZulu FC, uVeli Mothwa, ufanelwe wukubalwa nabazobanga umklomelo wovelele kule sizini yeDStv Premiership.
Lokhu kushiwo ngumqeqeshi wezakhe, uBenni McCarthy, ngemuva kokuthi yena nalo mdlali wakhe bethole imiklomelo yePremier Soccer League (PSL) ngokushaya into ecokeme ngenyanga kaMashi no-Ephreli.
UMcCarthy udle umklomelo womqeqeshi ovelele, kwathi uMothwa wathatha owomdlali obashaye bonke kulezi zinyanga.
UMothwa, akangenelwanga goli emidlalweni eyisithupha.Owegoli elivelele unikwe umgadli weKaizer Chiefs, uSamir Nurkovic  ngegoli alishaya behlula i-Orlando Pirates ngo-1-0 kowomkhaya.Kakukapheli sikhathi esingakanani lo mqeqeshi eklonyeliswe ngendondo efanayo phakathi kukaJanuwari noFebhuwari.Ngaleso sikhathi wahlonishwa nomdlali wakhe, uTapelo Xoki ngegoli elivelele.UMcCarthy uthe ukube kakujajwa ngokuthi yiliphi iqembu elinqobe inkomishi yeligi, uMothwa, amthathe kwiChippa United, ubezokhala amuke nowokuba ngunozinto wesizini.
"Ngiyazi ukuthi uDenis Onyango (weMamelodi Sundowns)  usemathubeni ukudla umhlanganiso.
Engikwaziyo wukuthi ukube uVeli udlala kwiSundowns njengoDennis, ongungwe ngabadlali bezinga eliphezulu, wubezokwenza okungaphezulu.“Uma uqhathanisa uSuthu neKaizer Chiefs neSundowns abanenkece nenqwaba yabadlali bezinga eliphezulu, lwenza kahle kakhulu ngalaba badlali olunabo.
Ngokwami uMothwa ukubadlali abathathu abafanelwe wumklomelo kanoznti ovelele.
Noma angangawunqoba, ngiyazi uzoqhubeka nokusebenza kanzima,” kusho uMcCarthy.
Mayelana nomdlali wesizini, uMcCarthy, uthe: "Eqenjini lami nginabo abafanele wukufakwa ohlwini lwabangase banqobe lo mklomelo.
(UMakhehleni) Makhaula obe nesizini enhle no(Augustine) Mulenga ohlale enomuzwa wokunqoba, owenza izimanga.
Nakuba kunjalo, uShalulile (Peter) kumele abe phezulu kulolu luhlu.
Ikushiya umangele indlela adlala futhi aqobela ngayo enethini amagoli.“USuthu luwuqale kahle uMashi lucoboshisa iSuperSport United.
Lulandele ngokunqoba imidlalo eyisithupha ngaphambi kokuthi lubambane nompetha beligi, iSundowns, okuyiwona wodwa umdlalo oluhlulekile ukubhakuzisa inethi kuwo.
Kulesi sibalo, lushaye amagoli awu-13, lwangenelwa ngamabili kuphela.
Ngokunqoba lo mklomelo kulandelana, uMcCarthy ulandela uBrandon Truter weSwallows, owuphakamise phakathi kuka-Okthoba noNovemba nangoDisemba noJanuwari.NgoLwesibili Usuthu luhlulwe yiBaroka ngo 1-0 emdlalweni weligi obuseKing Zwelithini Stadium.“Le nkundla ibiyikhaya leqembu kodwa kule sizini sidlale yonke imidlalo eKings Park Stadium futhi sayijwayela.
Sesijwayele konke ngayo.
Sithole imiphumela ethokozisayo khona.
Manje umdlalo wakho wasekhaya uthuthelwe kwenye inkundla, kunika iqembu odlala nalo ithuba lokuwina," kusho uMcCarthy.
OweDowns uncoma iPSL ngokuhlehlisa ukusongwa kweligi
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEINHLOKO yabaqeqeshi beMamelodi Sundowns, uManqoba Mngqithi ibonge iPremier Soccer League (PSL), ngokuhlehlisa ngesonto ukuphela kwemidlalo yeDStv Premiership.AmaBrazilians aqhubekile nokuzisondeza ekuqopheni umlando ngokuthi avikele isicoco seligi amahlandla amane, eshaya iTS Galaxy  ngo 1-0 ngempelasonto.
UPeter Shalulile ushaye igoli lika-11  kulo mdlalo obuseMbombela Stadium.
Usebambene noThabiso Kutumela weMaritzburg United noRuzaigh Gamildien weSwallows.
Ziholwa nguBradly Grobler weSuperSport United ngamagoli awu-13.Esicongweni amaBrazilians aseqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-57  emidlalweni ewu-26.UMngqithi uthe ukuhlehliswa ngesonto kokuphela kwemidlalo yeligi kuzobanika ukuphefumula.Imidlalo yeligi beyizophela ngoMeyi 29 kodwa iPSL yamemezela ukuthi seyizosongwa ngoJuni 5.
"Besihlale sikhala ngokuthi imidlalo yethu icinene.
Kulokhu umuntu kumele abonge isikhulu esiphezulu seligi ngokuhlehlisa imidlalo.
Sizothola ithuba lokuphefumula emidlalweni yeChampions League nakweyeligi.
Lesi sinqumo sePSL sisho ukuthi sibambisene sonke emizamweni yokukhonya e-Afrika,“ kusho uMngqithi.
Uqhube wathi bekubalulekile ukuthi bayinqobe imidlalo esele, ukuze bezocacisa ukuthi bafuna ukusinqoba ngempela  isicoco seligi.
"Kuyintokozo ukuthi ngaphansi kwale ngcindezi yeChampions League, kwiligi siyakwazi ukuqoqa amaphuzu.
Nakuba sisidinga isicoco seligi kodwa silawulwa yindlela yethu yokusebenza.
Imidlalo yethu siyihlukanisa ngamaqoqo.
OweGalaxy bekungowokugcina eqoqweni elandulela elukugcina, eselinemidlalo emine yokusonga iligi.
Kungaba kuhle ukuthi okungenani kuleli qoqo lokugcina sithole amaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye.
Kungajabulisa uma singawanqoba wonke la maphuzu,“ kuqhuba uMngqithi, obambisene noSteve Komphela noRhulani Mokwena ekuqeqesheni iSundowns.NgoMgqibelo abafana baseChloorkop bazobhekana ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypt, emlenzeni wokuqala we-quarterfinal yeCaf Champions League, e-Al Salam Stadium eCario.
Owesibili ungoMeyi 22, eLucas Masterpieces Moripe Stadium.UMngqithi uthe makhulu amathemba ngokuthi abe khona uThemba "Mshishi" Zwane kowe-Al Ahly.Ulimale ngesonto eledlule bebhekene neMaritzburg.
"Ngokombiko wodokotela, uZwane uzobe ekhona uma sesibhekene ne-Al Ahly.
Sithandazela ukuthi kuhambe njengokusho kwabo.
Ubengalimele kakhulu.
Simnike ikhefu ngoba sibalekela ukuthi kungaqhubekeli phambili ukulimala kwakhe.
Vele odokotela babeshilo ukuthi uzolulama esikhathini esingangesonto, kuya ezinsukwini eziyishumi.“
UMayo umagange ngokudlala kwiPremiership
UMGADLI weRichards Bay FC, uKhanyiso Mayo, uthi ukudlala esigabeni seGladAfrica Championship amasizini amane sekumqinise ukhakhayi ngokwanele, ukuthi usengazibamba ziqine esigabeni seDStv Premiership.UMayo (22), osanda kuhlabana ngomklomelo weNedbank Cup Most Promising Player muva nje, ungomunye wabadlali abamqoka beRichards Bay nezothembela kubo kumaPlay-Off okulwela ukukhuphukela kwiDStv Premiership, uma seyisombululekile inzukazikeyi yomdonsiswano osenkantolo wamaqembu eGladAfrica Championship.IRichards Bay iqede isizini yeGladAfrica isendaweni yesithathu kwi-log, lokho okuyibeka ethubeni lokuyodlana imilala neChippa United eqede endaweni ka-15 kwi-log yePremiership.UMayo oshaye amagoli ayisishiyagalolunye kuyo yonke imiqhudelwano kule sizini esanda kusongwa, wehlule uNjabulo Blom weKaizer Chiefs noMaloisane Mokhele weChippa United emunxeni weNedbank Cup Most Promising Player Award.
Lo mklomelo ngumphumela wokushaya into ecokeme emqhudelwaneni weNedbank Cup lapho ezakhe zifinyelele khona kuma-quarterfinal alo mqhudelwano zamangaza nabaningi zihlula iKaizer Chiefs kwiLast 16.“Kusho lukhulu kimi ukuhlabana ngomklomelo weNedbank Most Promising Player.
Lokhu kwenyuse izinga lokuzethemba kimi futhi kunginika ithemba lokuthi sekuseduze lapho engiphokephelele khona ebholeni elikhokhelayo.“Empeleni ngingasho ngaphandle kokungabaza ukuthi ukudlala kwami kwiGladAfrica amasizini amane sekungiqinise ukhakhayi ngokwanele, ngakho manje sengilangazelele inselelo yokudlala esigabeni esithe thuthu sePremiership.Umgomo ebengizibekele wona kule sizini owokuthi kube yisizini yami yokugcina le ngidlala kwiGladAfrica.
Okungenze ngazimisela ngokuthi ngisebenze ngokuzikhandla neqembu lami kumaPlay-Offs, ukulwela ukukhuphukela kwiPremiership,” kuchaza uMayo.Lo mgadli othembisayo noyindodana kaPatrick Mayo owayengalibheki ipali eminyakeni edlule, uthi nakuba kubaphathe kabi bengabadlali beRich Boys ukwehluleka kwabo ukunqoba isicoco seligi yeGladAfrica kodwa kubaqinisa idolo ukuthola elinye ithuba lokuzibekisela indawo kweyokuhlunga.
Wathi bazolwela ukufa nokuphila kule midlalo ukufeza isifiso sabo sokubona leli qembu likhushulelwa kwiPremiership.Ebuzwa yiSolezwe ngoMgqibelo ngokumataniswa kwakhe neKaizer Chiefs, uMayo uthe: “Kuyiphupho lanoma yimuphi umdlali webhola elikhokhelayo ukuzibona edlala kwelinye lamaqembu athathwa njengamakhulu kwiPremiership.
Yebo, ngike ngezwa kancane ngemenenja yami ukuthi sengathi iChiefs iyangifuna kodwa okwamanje akukho ebisangitshele khona ngokuqhubekayo.
Futhi-ke nami lokho angikufaki ekhanda njengoba umqondo wami ngisawugxilise ekusizeni iqembu lami iBay kumaPlay-Offs esisazowadlala.
Ngemuva kwalokho-ke sesiyobona ukuthi kwenzekani.”
USemenya uzogijima u-5000m kwekazwelonke
LUNGILE MAJOKAUCASTER Semenya ungenele ukugijima u-5000m emqhudelwaneni iSizwe Medical Fund ASA Senior Track and Field ezobanjelwa eTshwane Stadium kusukela ngoLwesine.USemenya akavumelekile ukuncintisana ebangeni alijwayele u-800m ngenxa yomgomo wenhlangano eyengamele ezokusubatha emhlabeni iWorld Athletics.Le nhlangano yanquma ukuthi abagijimi besifazane abane-testosterone ephezulu kunejwayelekile kwabesimame bangagijimi ku-400m kuya ku-1500m ngaphandle kokudla imishanguzo yokuyinciphisa.USemenya washaya phansi ngonyawo wathi ngeke ayidle leyo mishanguzo futhi lo mthetho ucindezela abantu besifazane.Usalulwa lolu daba njengoba eseludlulisele kwi-European Court of Human Rights.USemenya ungumpetha wama-Olympic ku-800m.
Njengoba lolu daba lungakapheli kusho ukuthi ngeke asivikele isicoco sakhe emqhudelwaneni ozokuba seJapan ngoJulayi.
UHunt usanethemba ngokuhlangana kwezinto kwiChiefs
UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, akuvumi alahle ithemba ngokuhlangana kwezinto eNaturena phezu kokuba sekusele amasonto ambalwa kusongwe isizini ka-2020/2021.Selokhu uHunt efikile kwiChiefs ekuqaleni kwesizini, abadlali ikakhulukazi abasemuva nonozinti, benza amaphutha aholela ekuhlulweni kweqembu.
Emidlalweni emithathu yakamuva yeligi, iChiefs ithole isibhaxu emaqenjini amabili avika izembe okuyiChippa United neTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM).
Kwemibili iphunyukwe ngamaphuzu ngenxa yamaphenathi adalwe ngumdlali wasemuva uSiyabonga Ngezana.
Ngempelasonto edlule, idlale ngokulingana neBloemfontein Celtic ikade isihamba phambili ngo 2-0.Njengoba Amakhosi ezohlala isonto lonke engadlali, uHunt ubona ithuba lokulungisa okonakele.
Azobuyela enkundleni ngoMeyi 12 eseyogadulisana neSwallows.
"Leli yikhefu elide kunawo wonke esesike sawathola.
Sinezinsuku eziyisikhombisa.
Sizoba nezinsuku ezimbalwa emuva kwesibhekane nakho kusukela ngoDisemba.
Sizothola izinsuku ezimbalwa zokulanda amandla, sibuye siqhubeke futhi," kusho uHunt.IChiefs isawine imidlalo yeligi eyisithupha kuphela kwengu-24 kule sizini.
Amathuba okuqeda kwi-Top 8 abukeka eshabalala.
Emidlalweni emine yokusonga isizini, iChiefs izobhekana neSwallows, Black Leopards (Meyi 18), Lamontville Golden Arrows (Meyi 26), TS Galaxy (Meyi 29).Mayelana nokuhlulwa yiTTM ngemizuzwana yokugcina, uHunt uthe: "Kunzima kakhulu ukuchaza.
Angazi.
Kuyaxaka lokhu engikubonayo.
Ngicabanga ukuthi bekusifanele ukuphuma siphethe okuthize esandleni.
Kodwa ukwenza amaphutha kanjena (kwenzelana phansi).
Kodwa sizoqhubeka nokulwa.
Emidlalweni emine esele kufanele sizame ukuwina, sibone ukuthi kwenzekani," kusho uHunt.
OweSundowns ufuna incazelo kumajaji ngawePSL
MTHOKOZISI MNCUSENIUMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns uManqoba Mngqithi uthi kumele amajaji emiklomelo yePremier Soccer League (PSL) aphumele obala ngokubhekayo uma eqoka abadle ubhedu.
Lo omunye wemibuzo ebijikijelwa uMngqithi kulandela ukuzitshwa kwakhe noRhulani Mokwena yize bedle isicoco seDStv Premiership, kwaqokwa uBenni McCarthy waMaZulu kwesomqeqeshi ovelele.Kube nemvunge kubathandi bebhola kuleli bebuza ukuthi kanti kuqokwa kanjani?
Umsindo uphinde wavuswa nayinkulumo kaMark Gleeson, uqweqwe lwentatheli okunguyena obephethe amajaji.UGleeson uyithintile indaba yombango onzima obuphakathi kwamajaji ngalo mklomelo kwacaca kodwa wathi uMcCarthy uyena ogcine enamavoti amaningi futhi abamqokile bebeka izizathu ezibambekayo.
Ekhuluma kuKhozi FM ngoLwesibili, uMngqithi uthe ufisa ukukwazi ukuthi kufinyelelwa kanjani ezinqumeni ukuze ezozama ngokuzayo ukuthi akhuphule amasokisi.
“Ngabe siqamba amanga uma sithi asibanga nawo umuzwa.
Yize sisuke singaqhubelani ngoba sifuna ukuthola imiklomelo ngayedwa njengabaqeqeshi beSundowns nabadlali.
Into esuke ibalulekile kithina ukunqoba indebe ngoba kungangisiza ngani ukuthola le miklomelo, iqembu lingawini lutho bese ngiphelelwa umsebenzi,” kusho uMngqithi.
Uqhube wathi: “Yize kunjalo ngingumuntu wokuqala ukumhalalisela uBenni ngokuthola umklomelo ngoba ngiyakholwa wukuthi  umsebenzi owenziwe uBenni noMandla (Ncikazi) kule sizini akukho nokuncane ukungabaza ukuthi bekumele bayithole imiklomelo ngomsebenzi abawenzile.
Okwesibili, angazi ukuthi kungani ungekho umklomelo weqembu elikhuphule izinga kwiligi.
Ngiyakholwa wukuthi AmaZulu noma iGolden Arrows abewufanele.
"Lo mqeqeshi ukholelwa ekutheni akukho lapho iSundowns eke yangakhombisa khona ukuthi izosithatha isicoco kodwa baze baqokwa kowomqeqeshi ovelele ngoMeyi/Juni.“Isifiso sami esikhulu ukwazi ukuthi amajaji abhekani ukuze abaqeqeshi bayithole le miklomelo.
Iqembu elinjengelethu elidlale kahle isizini iqala yaze yayophela, laphatha emidlalweni ewu-28 kwengu-30, langenelwa amagoli awu-14, lashaya amagoli angaphezulu kuka-44, ladliwa umdlalo owodwa isizini yonke, langahlulwa ekuhambeni, lavula igebe lamaphuzu awu-13 kunombolo-2.
Yini enye obekufanele yenzeke ukuze abaqeqeshi engisebenza nabo bathole umklomelo  wezinyanga eziningana kuqala ngaphambi kokufika kulesi sigaba sokugcina ngoba angikhumbuli kukhona isikhathi lapho iSundowns eyake yanganika ithemba lokuthi izoyithatha le ndebe.
Kodwa okuthuse kakhulu wukuthi enyangeni yokugcina yokuphela kwesizini ilapho esithole khona umklomelo wokuba abaqeqeshi benyanga.
Kimina lokho kukodwa kungishiya nongcobho wokuthi kukhona okungenzeki ngendlela efanale.
Lokho angikusho ngenhliziyo embi yokuthi angiphathekile kahle, yokuthi uBenni unqobile.
Wenze umsebenzi oyisimangaliso ukuthi asuse iqembu endaweni ka-12 ayibeke endaweni yesibili, aqophe umlando wokufaka AmaZulu kwiChampions League.
Aqophe umlando wokuqhuba imidlalo ewu-17 engahlulwa.
Lezo zinto zithi uBenni wenze umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu.
Sifuna ukuthola imigomo esizosebenzela phezulu kwayo ukuze siphase lesi sivivinyo, sazi yini edingekayo.”
UKekana usewukaputeni we-Downs
ITHIMBA labaqeqeshi kwiMamelodi Sundowns ngezwi loyinhloko yalo, uManqoba Mngqithi,  seliphumele obala lacacisa  ngeyokugcogcoma kwebhande likakaputeni elishintsha izandla kule sizini.Selokhu kuqale isizini ka-2020/2021 baningi abadlali abebeyizethenjwa zomqeqeshi uPitso Mosimane asebelizwa ngendaba ijezi eChloorkop.
Abanye bakhonjwe indlela yithimba elisha eliholwa uMngqithi, Rhulani Mokwena noSteve Komphela.
Leli zembe lidle ngisho ukaputeni uHlompho Kekana obengaconsi phansi kuMosimane futhi ejwayele ukuyitakula iSundowns ngesikhathi esinzima.
UKekana usengena ephuma esikimini seSundowns.
Lokhu sekuholele ekutheni kungaqondakali ukuthi ubani ukaputeni weSundowns kwazise abadlali abahlukene sebeyazitika ngebhande.
Emidlalweni eminingi yeligi neyeCaf Champions League ibhande belikuRicardo Nascimento.
Ngempelasonto edlule ngesikhathi iSundowns ibanjwa yiBlack Leopards ngo 1-1 koweDStv Premiership, uMosa Lebusa uyena obengukaputeni.
"Ukaputeni weSundowns nguHlompho Kekana futhi asinalo isekela.
Ibhande silinika noma ubani uma sibona kunesidingo.
Liphathwe nguRicardo isikhathi eside kodwa okwamanje akekho.
Bekungaba lula ukwenza uDenis (Onyango) ukaputeni kodwa uhlala kude kakhulu.
Ngakho sizama ukumonga ekugijimeni njalo ebheke kunompempe.
Sifuna agxile kulokhu okulindelekile kuyena.
Iqiniso lithi ukaputeni weSundowns kusenguHlompho Kekana, "kusho uMngqithi.ISundowns isahlezi phezulu kwi-log yeDStv Premiership ngamaphuzu angu-40 emuva kwemidlalo engu-18.
Ngokubanjwa yiLeopards, esemsileni we-log, idedele ithuba lokuvula igebe lamaphuzu ayisithupha phakathi kwayo neLamontville Golden Arrows esendaweni yesibili ngawu-36 emuva kwemidlalo engu-20.
Nokho kuze kube yimanje ayikehlulwa kwiligi kule sizini.
"Sidlale umdlalo ongenaso isivinini esifanele okwenze sakhathazeka kusukela uqala.
Kodwa ngenhlanhla sathola igoli elishaywe nguMosa.
Emuva kwalokho sithole amathuba amaningi kodwa sangawasebenzisa.
Ngisho ngesikhathi sekhefu sixabane kakhulu ngokuthi sibukeka njengeqembu eselivele liwuwinile umdlalo.
Anginethezeki ngokuhamba phambili ngegoli, ikakhulukazi uma ngibhekene neqembu elizumayo ngoba kukhona okuhlala kuzokwenzeka odongeni lwasemuva, lilisebenzise lelo thuba," kusho uMngqithi.
"Angikusho ukuthi besikhathazekile ngoba besibona ukuthi ijubane esidlala ngalo akulona esilijwayele.
Kungenzeka ukuthi sekuyazwela ukuthi sesidlale imidlalo eminingi esikhathini esifishane.
Mhlawumbe sithathe izinto kancane, sazitshela ukuthi umdlalo uzoba lula.
Bengikhuluma isonto lonke ngithi emhlabeni wonke kujwayelekile ukuthi iqembu elisemsileni lithole amaphuzu kwelihlezi phezulu, ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi silwe kanzima ukuze singabalwa lapho.
"Imidlalo yeligi isamile njengoba kunekhefu leFifa.
ISundowns izodlala neTshakhuma ngo-Ephreli 6 kuthi iLeopards yamukele AmaZulu FC eThohoyandou Stadium ngo-Ephreli 4.
Impumelelo yoSuthu nomthelela kuBenni
EMUVA kokuba AmaZulu ehlule iStellenbosch FC emdlalweni weDStv Premiership, okuwenyusele endaweni yesibili kwi-log, umqeqeshi waleli qembu, uBenni McCarthy, uthe akusho ukuthi “usezoqhiyama abheke phezulu abheme isigazu“.Lo mdlalo uSuthu eliwunqobe ngo 1-0 ubudlalelwa eDanie Craven Stadium, eStellenbosch, eKapa ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.Lokho kungenzeka ukuba kusho lukhulu ngekusasa lakhe oSuthwini,  okuyinto okungabuzwa ukuthi abalandeli beNyokan’eluhlazana bafisa ukuyizwa.UMcCarthy ungomunye wabaqeqeshi abamataniswa nomsebenzi wokucija iBafana Bafana, kodwa lokho kudala ukungazinzi kubalandeli boSuthu.Okwenza lokhu wumcabango wokuhlanyukwa wumqeqeshi ofike wakhipha iqembu ezembeni, walinyusela esicongweni seligi kangangoba selibanga isicoco, okuyinto engasaziwa  eMbelebeleni.Okudala uvalo kubalandeli wubungozi bokushiywa wumqeqeshi osenqobe imidlalo eyisithupha ilandelana, ongakaze ahlulwe kusukela kuqale u-2021 emidlalweni yeligi.“Imidlalo eyisithupha (beyinqoba kulandelana) nerekhodi elihle lemidlalo eminingi engangenelwa goli (kweyisishiyagalombili) yirekhodi elihle kuVeli (uMothwa, unozinti AmaZulu amhlwithe kwiChippa United ngoJanuwari).
Yinto enhle kakhulu,” kusho uMcCarthy.AmaZulu awadlalanga umdlalo omuhle eKapa kwazise abekade eseVenda esontweni elifanayo nakhona abuye namaphuzu amathathu kwiBlack Leopards kodwa uMcCarthy akayibukeli phansi injabulo.“Asibanga nomdlalo omuhle kodwa ngingumqeqesi ojabule kakhulu,” kusho uMcCarthy.Kungukukhuluma okwaziwayo ukuthi uMcCarthy yize edabuka eKapa kodwa indabuko yakhe iqala KwaZulu-Natal ngonina, okuyinto ezwakalayo ukuthi uyayithakasela cishe  engenza umlandeli angabi novalo lokuthi uzohamba.“Yizinsuku zentokozo esizweni saKwaZulu ukuthi iqembu labo liqoqe amaphuzu awu-40 kusasele imidlalo eyisishiyagalombili.
Yinto leyo esiyazi sonke ukuthi iyivelakancane kuMaZulu.
Ngakho ngiyafisa ukuthi kube wukuthi bajabule abantu ngaleli qembu labo,” kusho uMcCarthy.Yize AmaZulu abebhinciselwe nxanye kodwa iqinso wukuthi bakhona abadlali bawo abebefanelwe wukuklonyeliswa njengabagqamile ngokuphela  kulo mdlalo.Lo mklomelo ugcine unikwe uThapelo Xoki kodwa ubungawela kalula kuLehlohono Majoro, Siyethemba Sithebe noMothwa osindise iqembu lapho isho ukuqeda ngalo iStellies.
ISundowns izohlangana nePirates koweNedbank Cup
IMAMELODI Sundowns iyichilize kalula iPolokwane City endleleni yayo ebheke kuma-quarterfinal eNedbank Cup.Labo mpetha bangesizini edlule beNedbank banqobe ngo 4-0 emdlalweni eLast 16 obuseLoftus Versfeld, ePitoli ngoLwesithathu ntambama.Amagoli AmaBrazilians angene ngokushesha esiwombeni sokuqala.
Inkundla ivulwe uPeter Shalulile ogagayelwa mphako kulezi zinsuku phambi kwamapali, uLebohang Moboe, Lesedi Kapinga, no-Andile Jali okube yiphenathi.Asezotholana phezulu ne-Orlando Pirates kuma-quarterfinal emdlalweni obekelwe u-Ephreli 15 enkundleni esazomenyezelwa.
IPirates yona yagudluza iMaritzburg United ngo 3-1 emdlalweni weLast 16 emasontweni edlule.ISundowns ayigayelwa mphako kulezi zinsuku njengoba ifike kulo mdlalo isiqhube eyisikhombisa ingakahlulwa.
Isiqhube imidlalo engu-23 ingayazi induku.Emdlalweni olandelayo izotholana neStellenbosch FC koweDStv Premiership ngoMgqibelo eDanie Craven Stadium ngo-1 ntambama.
Akungatshazwa ukuthi nakulo mdlalo abalandeli bamaBrazilians bazobe bebheke ukuthi iqembu labo liqhubeke nokubhubhisa kwasani oluphambi kwayo.Imidlalo yama-quarterfinal yeNedbank CupNgoMgqibelo - Ngo-3.30pm: Chippa United v Richards Bay FC (Sisa Dukashe Stadium).NgeSonto - Ngo-3pm: Cape Town All Stars v Pretoria Callies (Danie Craven Stadium).Ngo-6pm: Black Leopards v Tshakhuma (Thohoyandou Stadium).Ngo-Ephreli 15 - Ngo-6pm: Mamelodi Sundowns v Orlando
I’Downs ifuna ukuzithoba inhliziyo ngoSuthu
IMAMELODI Sundowns ifuna ukusebenzisa AmaZulu ukudlulisa ubuhlungu bokukhishwa kwiNedbank Cup ngempelasonto edlule.AmaBrazilians, ahlulwe kumaphenathi yiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM), azovakashela Usuthu emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ozoba seJonsson Kings Park, eThekwini, namuhla ngo-3 ntambama.
Kusukela ekuhluleni i-Orlando Pirates kuya ekutholeni isibhaxu kwiTTM, iSundowns ishintshise abalandeli imibono ngokungase kwenzeke ngesicoco seligi.
Emuva kokuziphuzela kwiPirates, abaningi bavumile ukuthi akekho ozoyivimba ekudleni isicoco seligi ngenxa yezinga elikhombisile.
Kodwa emuva kowe-TTM sekushintshe konke lokho.
I-Sundowns isesicongweni se-log ngamaphuzu angu-46 emuva kwemidlalo engu-20.
AmaZulu asendaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu angu-40 emuva kwemidlalo engu-22.Umqeqeshi weSundowns, uRhulani Mokwena, uthe kufanele bavuke bazithathe.
"Wumdlalo obaluleke kakhulu lona.
Njengoba sishilo phambilini ukuthi le midlalo ingeyamanqamu futhi sizobhekana nayo ngaleyo ndlela.
Bekungelula ukuzilungiselela emuva kweshwa lokwehlulwa yiTTM kowendebe.
Kufanele sizithintithe, sikhombise ukuqina ngokomqondo, sikhiphe wonke amandla esinawo ukuze sidlale kahle ngoba uma amaqembu amabili amahle edlala, awubi nalo ithuba uma ungadlali kahle.
Kufanele sidlale kahle, sizinike ithuba lokuwina umdlalo.
Sibhekene neqembu elihle, elinethimba labaqeqeshi elihle, eliqeqeshiwe futhi elinabadlali abahle.
AmaZulu anabadlali abahle, yikho imiphumela imihle," kusho uMokwena.I-Sundowns ayikaze ihlulwe emidlalweni yeligi kule sizini ka-2020/2021.
Isibhaxu isasithole kwiMTN 8, CAF Champions League nakwiNedbank Cup.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, AmaZulu asahlulwe kanye emidlalweni eyisishiyagalolunye ngaphansi komqeqeshi uBenni McCarthy oqashwe ngoDisemba.
Awine eyisikhombisa, adlala ngokulingana komunye.
Ngesikhathi Usuthu lubhekene neSundowns emzuliswaneni wokuqala, lukhale ngaphansi ngo-4-3 ekuhambeni.Unozinti woSuthu, uVeli Mothwa, uthe: "Lona ngomunye wemidlalo okufanele silungiselele imiqondo yethu nakho konke esijwayele ukukwenza kuyona yonke imidlalo esiyidlalayo.
Yebo, iSundowns iyiqembu elihle kodwa ekugcineni abadlali abangu-11 ababhekana nabanye abangu-11 enkundleni.
Ngakho igama alidlali, kudlala abadlali kuphela."
Isikhulu sichaza ngokuxoshwa kwaso kwelePSL
OBEYISIKHULU esiphezulu seBloemfontein Celtic, uKhumbulani Konco, uyakuchitha ukuthi 'udilizelwe' udaba lukanozinti uPatrick Tignyemb oselufake leli qembu obishini.UKonco, ohlukane neCeltic ngoLwesibili, ubegonyuluka esithangamini nenhlangano yezintatheli zebhola iSouth African Football Journalists Association (Safja) izolo.
Ezinyangeni ezedlule kade esematheni kulandela ukudingiswa kweCeltic ekusayiniseni abadlali unyaka wonke yinhlangano eyengamele ibhola iFifa ngenxa yokuxosha uTignyemb waseCameroon esasalelwe yiminyaka emibili enkontilekeni yakhe ngo-2019.Kwaba nhlanga zimuka nomoya noma iCeltic isidlulisela udaba kwiCourt of Arbitration for Sport (CAS).
Kuvele ukuthi iqembu lisole uKonco ngokunqaba ukuxolisa kuTignyemb nakuba lokhu bekuyinto lo nozinti abeyifuna futhi engayifihli ngisho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UKonco uthe ukudilizwa kwakhe kusukela ekugejaneni ngamazwi nosihlalo uMax Tshabalala ngenxa yencwadi yezikweletu yeqembu.
"Indaba kaPatrick ayingeni lapha.
Iseceleni.
Yenzeka ngendlela eyenzeka ngayo.
Bekunemibiko ethi kufanele ngixolise kuPatrick.
Asiyicacise lento.
Uma icala selikwiCAS, akusekho ukuxolisa.
Okokuqala iFifa bese isithathile isinqumo, awukwazi ukubhala incwadi uthi ngiyaxolisa ngokwenza lokhu nalokhuya, asiyixoxe.
Ngesikhathi udaba lufika kwiCAS besingasekho isidingo sokuxolisa.
Nanamuhla ngisakholwa ukuthi iqembu lathatha isinqumo esifanele ngoPatrick ngendlela elenza ngayo.
Sesingaxoxa ke ngendlela okwafinyelelwa ngayo kusona.
Iqembu kwakufanele ngabe kade lasithatha isinqumo.
Enhliziyweni yakhe naye uyakwazi lokho," kusho uKonco.UTignyemb, owaxoshwa nayiChippa ayijoyina emuva kokuhlukana neCeltic, ugcine esebuyele eBloemfontein kodwa wagcina eqoqa amasakana akhe walibhekisa eCameroon ezeseka ngokuthi wesaba ukwenziwa isilo sengubo  ngoba uyingozi uKonco.
Abalandeli beCeltic bebemzwela ngalokhu, abanye befuna abuye kodwa wathi ngeke akwenze lokho uma kusekhona uKonco.Be kunemibiko yokuthi uKonco uxoxa naMaZulu kodwa uyichithile leyo.
Uyikhahlelile futhi neyesikhundla esiphezulu kwiPremier Soccer League (PSL) esisabanjwe nguMato Madlala iminyaka emithathu.
"Endimeni yebhola asinaso isifo sokulahla.
Asilahlani.
Ngakho uma kunesikhala ebholeni kufanele sivalwe futhi sizovalwa.
Siyakholwa wukuthi isikhulu esiphezulu esibambile senza umsebenzi oncomekayo.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi leso sikhundla sivaliwe.
Yikho kuze kube yinamuhla esaeyisikhulu esiphezulu esibambile.
Amaqembu emibuthanweni yeBoard of Governors engiyihambile akuphakamisa lokho, kwaba khona nabesekayo besho ukuthi isikhulu esiphezulu senza umsebenzi oncomekayo.
Yikho le ligi ikwazile ukuqhubeka emgonqweni ngosizo lukasihlalo nekomiti eliphezulu.
Uma kunesinye isikhala ebholeni kufanele nakanjani sivalwe," kusho uKonco.
IChiefs igudluze izimbangi esicongweni seDiski
STHEMBISO NGOBESEI-KAIZER CHIEFS, inyukele esicongweni kwiDStv Diski Challenge ku-Group 2 ngemuva kokuguqisa ngo-2-0 iBaroka FC emdlalweni obuseMakhulong Stadium, eTembisa, izolo ntambama.Amagoli anqobise abafana beChiefs womabili angene esiwombeni sokuqala.
Abekwe enethini ngu-Aden McCarthy ngomzuzu wesine noMduduzi Shabalala yena ovakashele inethi ngomzuzu ka-20.Ukunqoba kweChiefs eqeqeshwa ngu-Arthur “10111” Zwane, kuyenze yagudluza esicongweni izimbangi zayo i-Orlando Pirates esilele isibili.
Kodwa-ke womabili la maqembu aseSoweto ayalingana ngamaphuzu njengoba eseqoqe ayisishiyagalolunye emidlalweni emine.
Bahlukaniswe amagoli.IChiefs ikhombise zisasuka ukuthi ifuna ukuwunqoba umdlalo njengoba iqale ngokuhlasela ngamandla zibekwa ebhandeni.
Akumangalisanga  ngesikhathi ithola igoli lokuvula inkundla ngekhanda likaMcCarthy obethole ibhola ebeliyi-free kick ebiqhamuka kukaputeni uSabelo “Bibo” Radebe.Ngemuva kwaleli goli Amakhosi aqhubekile nokuhlasela njengoba kuthe ngomzuzu ka-14, uShabalala wahlulwa ithuba elilula lokushaya igoli esebhekene nonozinti weBaroka, uKatlego Molefe.Kodwa uShabalala ogcine eqokwe njengomdlali wosuku, ulilungisile iphutha lakhe eshaya igoli lesibili ngemuva kwebhola elide ebelisuka kuKamohelo Hoala lahlula unozinti weBaroka, labe seliwela ezinyaweni zakhe walibeka enethini.Ebona ukuthi amanzi angena endlini, uThabo Nkoana ocija iBaroka wenze izinguquko ezintathu kungakapheli ngisho imizuzu engu-30 umdlalo uqalile.Ngaphambi kokuthi kuyiwe ekhefini uRadebe uyeke ithuba elilula lokushaya igoli lesithathu esebhekene nonozinti kodwa ibhola lakhe laphuma kancane eceleni kwepali.Esiwombeni sesibili azibanga khona iziqubu ezitheni njengoba womabili amaqembu abehlaselana kodwa imizamo yawo iphelele emoyeni.Njengoba iChiefs inqobile lapha iqhubekile nokuzibeka ethubeni elihle lokuqeda ibalwa namaqembu amane azodlala imidlalo yowandulela owamanqamu.
KuGroup 2, iStellenbosch FC yisona esizihola phambili ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalombili.
Ngemuva kokukhona iMaritzburg United naMaZulu FC nabo abanamphuzu ayisishiyagalombili.
Imiphumela  yeDiski Challenge yayizolo:Mamelodi Sundowns 0-0 Black Leopards, Kaizer Chiefs 2-0 Baroka FC, Stellenbosch FC 5-0 TS Galaxy, Chippa United 1-0 Lamontville Golden Arrows, SuperSport United 0-0 Cape Town City.
USeptember ukhathazekile ngeshobolo le-United
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEAKAPHATHEKILE kahle neze uThabo September, ofaniswa nedlozi eliphilayo leSuperSport United, ngomkhuba waleli qembu osudonse inqwaba yamasizini, wokudedela ithuba embangweni wesicoco seligi ngemizuzu yokugcina.Kubukeka nakule sizini  i-United eqeqeshwa uKaitano Tembo, ishaywa induku eyodwa yokuphuma embangweni wesicoco seligi emzuliswaneni wesibili.Omunye angathi amanga ukuthi iqembu like laba ngekinye lamathathu asesicongweni isikhathi eside emzuliswaneni wokuqala.
Selehle laze lafika kweyesithupha ngamaphuzu awu-35, emidlalweni ewu-22.Sekuphele imidlalo eyisithupha lagcina ukuqoqa amaphuzu aphelele kwiDStv Premiership.
Lagcina ukuqoqa amaphuzu aphelele ekuqaleni kukaFebhuwari lishaya yona iCape Town City.USeptember owafika kuMatsatsantsa a Pitori  ngo-2006 njengomdlali wagaxa amakhokho emgibeni ngo-2016, uthi kule sizini ubezitshela ukuthi leli shobolo lizobaxolela.Uthe kule midlalo eyisishiyagalombili esele uma bengavuka bazithathe akhona amathuba okuqeda okungenani kumaqembu amathathu aphezulu.
"Kanginazo izibalo eziqondile zamasizini esihlale siphuma embangweni wesicoco seligi ngemizuzu yokugcina, kodwa sekuyisikhathi eside.
Kule sizini kubukeka lo mkhuba usheshe waqala kakhulu.
"Nakuba kunjalo, ngiyaziqonda izinkinga ezibhekene neqembu kule sizini, sinesikwati esincane kakhulu.
Okunye okusishayile ukulimala kukaGabuza (Thamsanqa) noBradley Grobler", kusho uSeptermber oke waba yiphini likaTembo nyakenye.Ziyaqina izinsolo zokuthi leli qembu elalaziwa ngePretoria City eminyakeni edlule, lisendalini.
Nokho izikhulu zalo, uKhulu Sibiya ongusihlalo noStanley Matthews oyisikhulu esiphezulu, bayakuphika lokhu.
Kuvela nokuthi ngenxa yalokhu kudayiswa okubikwayo, sekukhona amaqembu acathamela abadlali be-United.
Imibiko yakamuva ithi iMamelodi Sundowns, isihlwithe injini yayo uSipho Mbule obekudume ukuthi ufunwa iKaizer Chiefs.Kubuzwa uSeptember oseyinxusa leSuperSport ukuthi ngabe le mibiko ayiwo umthelela kokwenzeka enkundleni, uthe: "Kangifuni ukuphawula ngalawo mahebezi ngoba kangiwazi ukuthi ayiqiniso kangakanani.
Nakuba kunjalo lezo yizindaba zehhovisi, kangikholwa ukuthi zingabaphazamisa abadlali.
Siyaxoxa nabadlali, ekhempini umqondo wokunqoba usekhona.“I-United yagcina ukunqoba isicoco seligi kwisizini ka-2009/10 isaqeqeshwa uGavin Hunt.
Lo mqeqeshi washiya enqobe iligi kathathu neqembu.
Selokhu yagcina ukuyinqoba kayikaze iphume kwi-Top 8.
Ezinye izicoco ezinqotshwe aMatsatsantsa a Pitori, iTelkom Knockout (2014), Nedbank Cup (2011/12, 2015/16, 2016/17) neMTN 8 (2017, 2019).
UKekana ubalisa ngesikimu
UKAPUTENI weMamelodi Sundowns, uHlompho Kekana, ubhoboka ngobuhlungu bokuphendulwa isibukeli eqenjini.UKekana ubeyinsika yeSundowns kumasizini adlule kusaqeqesha uPitso Mosimane, ngedlule sekuqeqesha uManqoba Mngqithi, Rhulani Mokwena noSteve Komphela ubeselizwa ngendaba ijezi.
Maphakathi nesizini, uHlompho uhlulekile wukuzibamba wathi kuyoba kuhle uma ukungadlaliswa kwakhe kuphathelene nokwenzeka enkundleni kuphela.Emdlalweni wokugcina wesizini ka-2020/2021, uKekana ungenile wazophakamisa indebe yeligi njengokaputeni okungeyesihlanu kusukela afika kwiSundowns eminyakeni engu-10 edlule.
"Bekuyisizini engajwayelekile kimina.
Ekuqaleni kwayo silahlekelwe ngabafana ababili (Anele Ngcongca noMotjeka Madisha) abebekade besondele kakhulu eqenjini nakimina.
Ngokomphefumulo bekungeyona isizini enhle ngoba kuningi okwenzekile.
Okunye kwakho wukubukela iqembu lidlala okuyinto osekuneminyaka ngayigcina.
Bekuyindawo entsha engizithole ngikuyo kodwa ngadlula kuyona, ngadlala njalo uma ngidingeka," kusho uKekana ovuselele inkontileka ngeminyaka emine nyakenye.
"Kuhlala kumnandi ukuba senkundleni uma ungumdlali.
Ngihlala ngisho ukuthi kuyofika isikhathi lapho siyobheka khona emuva, sisho ukuthi iqembu silenzele konke okusemandleni.
Okwamanje silinde amathuba okuphinda sidlale.
Eqinisweni bekubuhlungu futhi kudina ukuhlala ngaphandle, ngibheke amathuba okudlala.
Bekunzima kodwa ngijabule ukuthi abadlali abasebancane abebekade bedlala belenzele umsebenzi iqembu.
Njengoba sihlala sisho kwiSundowns ukuthi akusho lutho ukuthi ubani odlalayo, kufanele alenzele umsebenzi iqembu.
"ISundowns iwine iligi ihlandla lika-10 kusukela kwasungulwa iPremier Soccer League (PSL).
Nokho ayilibonanga elidlalayo kwiCAF Champions League.
Ifulegi loMzansi liphakanyiselwe phezulu yiKaizer Chiefs ezobhekana neWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco kowomlenze wokuqala owandulela owamanqamu ngoMgqibelo.
"Basendaweni enhle kakhulu abazithola bekuyona.
Amathuba okufinyelela kowamanqamu makhulu kwiKaizer Chiefs ngoba ayesabi.
Ayikaze ifinyelele lapho ikhona.
Akukho okungako okulindelwe kuyona.
Kuhlala kumnandi ukudlala iChampions League ungabhekiwe.
Ngiyakholwa wukuthi banethuba lokudlulela kowamanqamu uma beqhubeka nokudlala ngendlela abajwayele ukudlala ngayo," kusho uKekana.
UKadodia usatshiswa amaphuzu okumele bawaqoqe ukuvika izembe
SITHEMBISO MKHIZENAKUBA umphumela wakamuva uthe ukulehlisa uvalo llokudliwa yizembe kusihlalo weMaritzburg United, uFarouk Kadodia, uthi akabuthi quthu ubuthongo ngesibalo   samaphuzu okumele bawaqoqe ukuze babe nesiqiniseko sokuthi iqembu liyadlala kwiDStv Premiership.
UKadodia utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ngeke akuphike ukuthi ukunqoba kwezakhe ngo-2-0 kwiTS Galaxy  emdlalweni odlule weligi,  kulethe enkulu injabulo ekhempini.Uthe nakuba ekholelwa ekutheni kwakumele baqoqe amaphuzu aphelele  emidlalweni abadlala kuyo ngokulingana neBloemfonten Celtic neKaizer Chiefs kodwa akaphathekanga kabi kakhulu ngoba akhona amaphuzu abawafaka emgodleni.Uveze ukuthi bahlalelwe yijoka lokuthola amaphuzu ayishumi noma ayishumi nane emidlalweni emine noma emihlanu ezayo.
"Isifiso sami ukuthi siqhubeke nalo mgqigqo wokunqoba.
Emidlalweni emibili eyedlule, ngaphambi koweGalaxy sidlale kahle, sase siyeka ukuqoqa amaphuzu abezosisusa kule ndawo esikuyo.
Isimo asikakabi sihle neze.
Nokho kuyajabulisa ukubona abadlali bezinikela ngakho konke ejimini nasemidlalweni.
Okuhle ukuthi umdlalo wethu olandelayi neChippa United  uzofika sibe nesikhathi esanele sokuwulungisela," kubeka uKadodia.
Umdlalo wabo neChippa ungo-Ephreli 3 eHarry Gwala Stadium.Selokhu kuqale isizini leli qembu izinto kazilihambeli kahle.
Lize laxosha u-Eric Tinkler labuyisa u-Ernst Middendorp okubukeka enza kangcono.
I-United isendaweni ka-14 kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-17 emuva kwemidlalo ewu-19.
Isanqobe  imidlalo emine, yashaywa kweyishumi.Zimapeketwane kanjena nje izinto, ungaphika ukuthi ngesizini ka-2019/20 isongwe isendaweni yesikhombisa ngaphansi kukaTinkler.ITeam of Choice ingelinye lamaqembu athathwa njengamancane anenhlanhla yokwesekwa ngobuningi izakhamuzi zaseMgungundlovu.Ngesikhathi abalandeli besavunyelwe ezinkundleni, iHarry Gwala Stadium ibigcwala phama abalandeli bezokweseka iTeam of Choice.
Abalandeli abavunyelwe ezinkundleni ngenxa yemithetho yomvalelandlini yokunqanda ukusabalala ngesivinini kweCoronavirus.Ebuzwa uKadodia ukuthi kakubanga nawo yini umthelela ukungabi bikho kwezihlwele, uthe: "Abalandeli bethu bawumgogodla weqembu.
Impela ukungabibikho kwabo kube nomthelela.
Kodwa-ke ngeke sama ngalokho, namanye amaqembu adlala ngaphandle kwabo.
Okwethu ukuvuka sizithathe.“
Inkakha incoma i-Arrows ngokubuyela ebholeni layo lamzukwana
SITHEMBISO MKHIZE"KANGINGABAZI ukuthi lapho ekhona, uRocky Madlala ongasekho ugxuma yedwa injabulo uma ebona Abafana Bes'thende belihlikihla kanjena ibhola"La mazwi Isolezwe liwatshelwe inkakha eyayidlalela iLamontville Golden Arrows, uNhlanhla "Popo" Mshibe ongomunye wabadlali abalima indima enkulu ngesikhathi inyuselwa kwiPremiership ngo-2000.UMshibe ikhono lakhe elabonwa uMadlala ngo-1996 wayengumphathi we-Arrows, bedlalela iHigh Parama Junior Aces yaseMlaza benoBheka Phakathi (ongasekho emhlabeni) , uthe kuyamjabulisa ukubona i-Arrows ibuyela ezimpandeni zayo, idlala ibhola elihehayo.Uthe abafana baseLamontville abaphekwa, uMandla Ncikazi, bamkhumbuza izinsuku zabo zakudala, beyihlikihla kuthule umoya nozakwabo abanjengoLucky "Y2K" Sibeko, Goerge Khanyile, Bonang Ngaka, Nhlanhla Mncube, noLesley Langa.NgoLwesithathu  leli qembu likaMato Madlala, lishaye ngo-2-1 iTshakhuma maqede lalala isibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership.
Ligudluze i-Orlando Pirates ngamaphuzu awu-35.
"Labafana badlala leli bhola elalithandwa uBra Mich (esho uMadlala).
Wayethanda ibhola elimnandi elihambisana nemiphumela emihle.
Kwakuba muncu ekhempini uma sihluliwe.
Sengathi umoya kaMadlala ovunguza ekhempini ye-Arrows ungaqhubeka njalo," kubeka uMshibe oke waqeqesha nezinkulisa ze-Arrows ngo-2008 kuya ku-2014.Mayelana nakubona kuyimfihlo yokwenza kahle kwe-Arrows, uMshibe onguthisa e-Ukukhanyakokusa Primary School, eNewtown A, eNanda, eThekwini, uthe: "Abekho abadlali abanamagama.
Abadlali bayo bakulambele ukudlala, basafuna nokuzakhela igama.
Ngisho nomqeqeshi, uNcikazi uyambona ukuthi usafuna ukuzakhela elakhe igama.
Akafuni ukuphoxa umama uMato, leli thuba ulibambe njengezikhali zamaNtungwa.
Okunye okusiza uMandla ukuthi iningi labafana adlala ngabo ubazi njengoba ezazi, eminyakeni edlule ubebaqeqesha kwizinkulisa zayo i-Arrows.
Nobuholi beqembu uyabona ukuthi bumeseka ndlela zonke.
Wonke umuntu ujabule, nabadlali bayabahlonipha abaqeqeshi.”Ngemuva komdlalo weTTM, uNcikazi uthe uthandazela ukuthi ezakhe zibambe umgqigqo ezikuwo.
"Angifuni kwenzeke okwasehlela emasontweni edlule.
Sanqoba  iQ2 kwathi emdlalweni olandelayo sashaywa iBlack Leopards.
Ngethemba ukuthi sizoya kolandelayo weCity (Cape Town City) imiqondo yethu  isesimeni esifanele,” kusho uNcikazi.Lo mdlalo ungoMashi 20 ozayo, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.
UTembo uzwelana noMbule ozibule kabi kwiBafana
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weSuperSport United, uKaitano Tembo, uzwelana nemdlali wezakhe uSipho Mbule othe eqala ukubizelwa kwiBafana Bafana yahluleka ukungena kwi-Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) engonyaka ozayo eCameroon.UMbule oyibamba kuthule umoya esiswini saMatsatsantsa a Pitori, ubebizelwe esikwatini esibambane ngo-1-1 neGhana sase sadliwa iSudan ngo-2-0 kweyokuhlungela lo mqhudelwano.Akazange alithole ithuba lokudlala.Abanye ozakwabo beSuperSport abebizwe nabo unozinti uRonwen Williams noBradley Grobler, owagcina ekhishiwe ngenxa yokulimala.UTembo uthe uyezwelana noMbule ngokuthi injabulo yakhe yokubizelwa kwiBafana iphenduke usizi.
"Siyazwelana sonke nesimo esehlele iBafana.
Nakuba engadlalanga uMbule kodwa ngiyakuqonda ukuthi ubengajabula ukuba yingxenye yeqembu elikwazile ukungena kwi-Afcon.
Kayikho into esingenziwa, ibhola linjalo.
Nokho akujiki ukuthi ngajabula kakhulu ngesikhathi ebizelwa kwiBafana noWilliams, noGrobler nakuba ephinde akhishwa ngenxa yokulimala," kubeka uTembo.Ngesikhathi uMolefi Ntseki eqokela uMbule eqenjini lesizwe, wagcizelela ukudlala kahle kwakhe nokukwazi ukubamba umgqigqo.Eqenjini lakhe usedlale imidlalo ewu-18 kwewu-21.
Ushaye amagoli amabili, wakha amahlanuAbanye abadlali abebeqala ukubabiza uNtseki, uVeli Mothwa ongunozinti waMaZulu, Craig Martin weCape Town City noBen Motshwari we-Orlando Pirates.Mayelana neDStv Premiership, uTembo uthe ikhefu leFifa libanike ithuba lokulungisa okuningi.
"Kule midlalo yakamuva senze inqwaba yamaphutha, enze sahluleka ukuqoqa amaphuzu.
Lokhu kusikhinyabezile kokuningi kwiligi.
Nokho akukubi kangako, kumele senyuse amasokisi.
Sisalelwe imidlalo eyisishiyagalolunye kuphela.
Kumele siqoqe amaphuzu enele.“EzikaTembo zisendaweni yesithathu ngamaphuzu awu-35.
Lokhu kuzenza zisale ngamahlanu kwiMamelodi Sundowns ephethe imidlalo emithathu esandleni.Emidlalweni emihlanu yakamuva, iSuperSport ihluleke yancama ukuthola amaphuzu aphelele.
Kulesi sibalo idliwe AmaZulu nePirates.Kowokugcina ibambane ngo-1-1 neStellenbosch.Izoze ibuyele enkundleni ngo-Ephreli 10 iyobhekana neCape Town City, eCape Town Stadium.NamaCitizens anenkinga efanayo, sekuphele imidlalo eyisikhombisa enganqobi.
Alele kweyesikhombisa ngamaphuzu awu-26, emidlalweni ewu-20.
Emlenzeni wokuqala, iSuperSport yanqoba ngo-2-1.
Uqine idolo oweBucs kubuya izethenjwa
UQINE idolo umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uJosef Zinnbauer, ngokubuya ekulimaleni konozinti bakhe uRichard Ofori noSiyabonga Mpontshane ngaphambi komdlalo omqoka womlenze wokuqala wama-quarterfinal eCaf Confederation Cup, abawudlala neRaja Casablanca, yaseMorocco namuhla ngo-3 ntambama, e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto.Kuke kwabanjwa kwayekwa ezintini zePirates isikhathi eside.
Kwenzeke emuva kokulimala kuka-Ofori noMpontshane.
Lokho kuholele ekutheni unozinti, uWayne Sandilands, asale dengwane, engenaye umlingani, obengavala isikhala sakhe uma bekwenzeka naye elimala.Nangenkathi iPirates ishaywa ngo 1-0 yi-Enyimba FC, eNigeria kowamaqoqo eCaf Confederation Cup, uSandilands wayevimba engenaye umlingani.
Nakuba eZimnyama zehlulwa kulowo mdlalo, kodwa zagcina zikwazile ukuzibekisela indawo kuma-quarterfinal omqhudelwano, ngenxa yamaphuzu ezase ziwaqoqile eqoqweni lazo.Empeleni ibivele iboshelwe izacile nakuyena uSandilands kwazise wubengakalulami kahle ekulimaleni kwakhe.
UZinnbauer ukuqinisekisile esingathangamini nabezindaba, ngoLwesihlanu ukuthi u-Ofori noMpontshane bazobe bekhona emdlalweni wanamuhla neCasablanca.“Bekuyinkinga njengoba bekulimele u-Ofori noMpontshane.
Kdwa bazobe sebebuyile bobabili ngeSonto (namuhla).
Sizobheka ukuthi ngubani ongcono kakhudlwana kubona,” kusho uZinnbauer.Uqhube wathi kubadlali abalimele, kabanaso isiqiniseko njengamanje sokuthi yibaphi abazobe sebeluleme.
Uthe cishe uHappy Jele uyabuya, noThabang Monare noma uThembinkosi Lorch.
Ngakho bazosebenzela phezu kwalokho.
Uthe sebebalinde isikhathi eside ngethemba lokuthi bebezokwazi izolo ukuthi bayabathola yini.“UTerrence Dzvukamanja yena akekho.
Kodwa ngethemba ukuthi uBongani Sam uyabuya.
NoGabadinho Mhango naye useluleme ngokugcwele.
Ngethemba ukuthi sizoba nabo bonke abadlali, bese sikwazi ukubona ukuthi yibaphi esizobasebenzisa ukuqala umdlalo,” kuqhuba uZinnbauer.
Ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi bazolwela ukuwunqoba umdlalo wasekhaya, ukuzehlisela umthwalo emlenzeni wesibili ozoba sekuhambeni.EZimnyama zidinga iwini emdlalweni wanamuhla womlenze wokuqala, ukuze zizibeke ethubeni elihle lokuzibekiseka indawo emzuliswaneni olandelayo, ikakhulukazi njengoba zizobe zidlalela ekhaya neCasablanca.
Ingelinye lamaqembu ahlonishwayo ebholeni lase-Afrika.
Umlenze wesibili zizowudlalela ekuhambeni, zizowudlalela eCasablanca, eMorocco, ngoMeyi 23.
I-Galaxy iphika eyokulaxaza uFransman
I-TS GALAXY iphika ukuthi ayisahlanganiswe ilutho noqweqwe lesitobha esinguBevan Fransman yize imibiko yangeledlule ikhomba ukuthi lo mdlali, owaduma kwiKaizer Chiefs, ungomunye wabachithiwe.UFransman (37) oseke wadlala kwiBafana Bafana amahlandla angu-19, uphelelwa inkontileka neGalaxy ngoJuni 30.
Lokhu kulandelwe ukuthi kuvele emaphephandabeni uFransman ebalisa ngokuchithwa kwakhe.Nakuba eqiwe imidlalo yeDStv Premiership embalwa kule sizini esanda kusongwa, kuvele ukuthi usohlwini olufanayo noReneilwe “Yeye” Letsholonyane, Myer Bevan, Mbulelo Wambi noXolani Mahola bonke abadedelwe ngoba bengazange benze ngokwanele ukuthi baqale imidlalo.“Angizazi izizathu zokudedelwa kwami kodwa ngeke ngiphoqe iqembu ukuthi liqhubeke nami ekubeni lona lingasafuni,” usho kanje uFransman kwiSoccer Laduma.
“Okusele manje ukuthi ngibheke okulandelayo empilweni yami.
Ukuthi ngizodlala ibhola ngize ngibe neminyaka emingaki, nami angazi,” kuqhuba yena sakubalisa ekuveza nokuthi usathanda ukudlala ngoba umzimba wakhe usamvumela.Ubuhlungu benhliziyo obuzwiwa uFransman obebusobala nasenkulumeni yakhe bucaciswe uMinenhle Mkhize wezokuxhumana kwiGalaxy izolo ekhuluma neSolezwe.“Siyamthanda kakhulu uFransman eqenjini okufakazelwa isibalo semidlalo ayidlalile kwisizini edlule kanjalo nanokuthi uyena obehola iqembu kweminingi yale midlalo.“Iqiniso lapha ukuthi izingxoxo phakathi kwethu naye ziyaqhubeka.
Yize siqhubeka kodwa kusemqoka ukuthi ngikubalule ukuthi zinzima (izingxoxo).“Kwesinye isikhathi kuze kube khona nokuhluthuka kwenhliziyo kwabanye kodwa sinethemba lokufika esisombululweni maduze.“Iqembu lizimisele ukumnika inkontileka yonyaka ehamba nesivumelwano sokuvuselela kodwa yena ufuna inkontileka ende.
Siyaqhubeka nezingxoxo ngethemba lokuthi sizofinyelela esiphethweni maduze,” kusho uMkhize.UFransman ufike esigabeni esikhulu eminyakeni engu-17 edlule ezodlalela iChiefs.
Phakathi kwamaqembu asedlale kuwona eNingizimu Afrika iMoroka Swallows, SuperSport United, Bloemfontein Celtic neMaritzburg United.Uke wadlala nase-Isreal kanti usuke kwiTeam of Choice wajoyina iHighlands Park (ethengwe iGalaxy nyakenye).
OweSwallows ayimphathisi ngekhanda eyenkontileka
ISIQONGQWANE seSwallows FC, uThabo “Festival” Matlaba, uthi ayimphathisi nakancane ngekhanda eyenkontileka yakhe naleli qembu athi usazimisele ukufeza lukhulu nalo emuva kokulijoyina ngesizini edlule.UMatlaba (33), ungomunye wabadlali abamqoka nabayizinsika kuleli qembu elibukeka lizolahlekelwa abadlali balo abaningana abamqoka ngewindi lokuhwebelana nokubolekisana ngabadlali.Yize inkontileka emfishane kaMatlaba ayisayine neSwallows ngesizini edlule iphela kule nyanga, kodwa kuvela ukuthi isivuselelwe ngeminyaka emibili nokusho ukuthi lo mdlali usazoba yingxenye yaleli qembu amasizini amabili ezayo.Lokhu kuqinisekiswe ngusihlalo weSwallows, uDavid Mogashua kwelinye lamaphephandaba abhala ngolimi lwesilungu kuleli sonto, lapho ecashunwe khona ethi: “UMatlaba usazoba yiNyoni kumasizini amabili ezayo, ngoba inkontileka yakhe enombandela wokuvuselelwa ngeminyaka emibili yenziwe ngenyanga edlule.”Ethintwa yiSolezwe ngoMgqibelo, uMatlaba ngokuvuselelwa kwenkontileka yakhe uthe: “Ngiyazi ukuthi inkontileka yami iyaphela kule nyanga, kodwa engingakutshela kona wukuthi lokho akungiphathisi nakancane ngekhanda ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi ngisazoba yingxenye yeSwallows nangesizini ezayo.Kuningi engisafuna ukukufeza neZinyoni, futhi abaphathi bazo banezinhloso ezinhle ngaleli qembu lokho kubonakele ngesizini yethu yokuqala kwiPremiership.
Ngesizini ezayo sizokwenza kangcono kakhulu kunangesizini edlule, lokho angikungabazi.Uyabona, hhayi ngoba ngiziphakamisa, kodwa iqiniso wukuthi indlela engidlale ngayo ngesizini edlule ingenza ngingabi nokuncane ukungabaza ngekusasa lami eqenjini.
Ya, sekungenzeka-ke nje okwenzekayo ngoba phela izinto ziyenzeka ebholeni, kodwa eyenkontileka yinto engangiphathisi nakancane nje ngekhanda,” kusho uMatlaba.Eqhuba uMatlaba uthe  angakusho entathelini njengamanje wukuthi yena uzohlangana nabaphathi beSwallows ngoLwesibili ukubhunga ngekusasa lakhe eqenjini.
“Kodwa engingakutshela kona ukuthi ngesizini ezayo ngizobe ngiseyingxenye yeSwallows,” kusho lo mdlali ngokukhulu ukuzethemba.Imizamo yokuthola imenenja kaMatlaba, u-Abbie Rasimphi weLiberate Resources Sports, ayiphumelelanga njengoba ubengalubamibi ucingo lwakhe.UMatlaba ubanga ijezi noSifiso Hlanti noKeegan Ritchie emuva odongeni lwasemuva, kanti uHlanti ubhekise amabombo kwiKaizer Chiefs kule sizini ezoqala ka-2021/2022.
Ngaphandle kukaHlanti, phakathi kwabanye abadlali beZinyoni okuvela ukuthi bayaphuma esidlekeni sazo, kubalwa uKgaogelo Sekgota, Ruzaigh Gamildien noNjabulo Ngcobo.
OweBay uthembisa ukuvuka bazithathe behlulwa isicoco
STHEMBISO NGOBESEUSIHLALO weRichards Bay FC, uSifiso “Jomo” Biyela, uthi ukuhluleka kwabo ukunqoba isicoco seGladAfrica Championship ngemizuzu yokugcina, ngeke nakancane kubenze badikibale beyiqembu.Ngempelasonto iNatal Rich Boyz izikhiphe yaziqeda nya embangweni wesicoco seGladAfrica ngesikhathi idlala ngokulingana ngo-1-1 neJomo Cosmos emdlalweni wokubanga amaphuzu obuseTsakane Stadium, Ekurhuleni.I-Bay, eqeqeshwa nguSimo “Govuza” Dladla, bekumele iwunqobe kumnyama kubomvu lo mdlalo wayo neZenkosi ukuze iqinisekise ukuthi isekhona embangweni wesicoco seGladAfrica ozocaca ngempelasonto esiya kuyona.I-Royal AM, enqobe ngemizuzu yokugcina i-University of Pretoria ngo-2-1, iyona esibukeka isethubeni lokunqoba isicoco njengoba iqhwakele ngamaphuzu angu-50.
Isidinga ukudlala ngokulingana emdlalweni wokugcina bese iba ngompetha beGladAfrica, okuhambisana nethikithi eliya ngqo kwiDStv Premiership.
I-Bay yona isihlezi endaweni yesine ngamaphuzu angu-46.
Isinethutshana lokuzibekisela indawo kweyokuhlunga.
Kodwa lokhu sekuzoncika ekutheni amaqembu angaphezu kwayo kwi-log adlala kanjani emidlalweni yawo yokugcina.
Amaqembu azoya kweyokuhlunga elizoqeda endaweni yesibili, nelizolala kweyesithathu.
Okwamanje kukhona iSekhukhune United neTS Sporting.
Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngokuhluleka kweqembu lakhe ukukhala lemuke nesicoco seGladAfrica phezu kokuba bese lihlale isikhathi eside liqhwakele kwi-log, uBiyela uthe okwenzeke kubona kube yinto ebuhlungu kakhulu futhi baphoxekile kodwa ayikho into ezokwenziwa kuzomele bavuke bazithintithe.“Siphatheke kabi kakhulu futhi siphoxekile ngendlela izinto ezigcine zenzeke ngayo ngemuva komsebenzi omkhulu owenziwe kusukela kuqala isizini.
Kodwa-ke umdlalo webhola unjalo nje, ayikho into ezokwenziwa uma isikhathi sethu sokukhuphukela esigabeni esikhulu singakafiki.“Into esibulale kakhulu ekutheni sigcine sihlulekile ukunqoba isicoco seGladAfrica kube yile midlalo yethu emithathu yokugcina esihlulekile ukuyinqoba.
Ngicabanga ukuthi ukube sikwazile ukuyinqoba ngabe sikhuluma okunye njengamanje.“Nakuba izinto zingahambanga kahle kodwa ngithanda ukubonga abadlali nomqeqeshi ngokusebenza ngokukhulu ukuzikhandla ekutheni iqembu libe kuleli zinga elikulo njengamanje,” kusho uBiyela obezwakala ocingweni ukuthi udumele kakhulu ngokuhluleka kwezakhe ukunqoba iGladAfricaLesi sikhulu siphethe ngokuthi: “Engingakusho futhi wukuthi ngeke nakancane sidikibale, sisazoqhubeka nokusebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuze iqembu ligcine lilifezile iphupho lalo lokudlala kwiDStv Premiership.
Ngiyethembisa ukuthi sizovuka sizithathe ngesizini ezayo.”
U-Hunt akafuni bayidelele iSimba ekuhambeni
UMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, ubona ukuxebula kwabo iSimba SC yaseTanzania koweCAF Champions League kuzozithoba izinhliziyo zabalandeli baleli qembu abamashele eNaturena ngesonto eledlule.Amakhosi adlule ngehubo lika-4-0 kowomlenze wokuqala wama-quarterfinal ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.
Lokhu kubeke iChiefs ethubeni elihle lokwedlulela kowandulela owamanqamu.
Umdlalo womlenze wesibili uzodlalelwa eDar es Salaam ngoMgqibelo ngo-3 ntambama.I-Chiefs icoboshisa iSimba nje bekusaphele amahora ambalwa abalandeli bayo begcwale izitaladi, babheka emahhovisi eNaturena ukuyokwethula incwadi yezikhalo kubaphathi bekhala ngokubhacaza kweqembu.
"Mhlawumbe lokho kusisizile ukuthi siwine, mhlawumbe sidinga amanye amamashi," kuntela uHunt ngemuva komdlalo.
"Kufanele sibahloniphe abalandeli, bezwa ubuhlungu.
Sonke siyabuzwa.
Bazwakalise izikhalo zabo.
Ngicabanga ukuthi ibalulekile indlela eyenziwe, yasingathwa ngayo.
Kubalulekile ukuthi sibhukule.
Ngicabanga ukuthi ukuwina namuhla kuzodambisa kancane.
Kodwa okwenzeke namuhla ebusuku akuncikile emdlalweni olandelayo.
Ibhola limayelana nalokho.
Kubalulekile ukuthi sisebenze kanzima, sinike abalandeli abakufunayo.
"Ekuhambeni, iChiefs idinga ukugwema ukungenelwa ngamagoli angaphezulu kwamane, uma yona ingashayanga lutho, ukuze izodlulela kowandulela owamanqamu.
Emuva kwesikhathi esingaphezu konyaka, abadlali beChiefs bazodlala phambi kwabalandeli kwazise sebebuyele enkundleni eTanzania.
EMzansi selokhu bavalwa ngesizini edlule ngenxa yokudlanga kweCovid-19.
"Kuseyisiwombe sokuqala, sisazoya kubona.
Ngiyazi ukuthi kunjani laphaya, inkundla izobe igcwele.
Kufanele sihlakaniphe, singahlali emuva kodwa sishaye amagoli.
Ngiyaziqhenya ngeqembu.
Sizozama ukushaya igoli laphaya.
Kodwa kulula ukusho kunokwenza," kusho uHunt.
"Bazolenyusa kakhulu izinga.
Bayiqembu elikhulu, banesithunzi okufanele basidlalele.
Nginesiqiniseko ukuthi bazobe benomqondo wokuwina nakho konke okuhambisana nawo.
Sengake ngaya laphaya.
Sadlala ne-Azam lapha (eMzansi).
Yaba yiqembu elihlukile isingakubo.
Kwaba sengathi inabadlali abangu-12 noma 13.
Ngakho kuzoba wumdlalo ohluke kakhulu.
Asidlule kulokhu esesikwenzile, sibuyele enkundleni yokuziqeqesha, siqhubeke nokulungisa okufanele sikuqondise.
Yilokho engingakwenza,“ kusho uHunt.
Umpetha wama-Olympic akakhohliwe yimuva
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMPETHA womhlaba ku-400m, uWayde van Niekerk, ubonge umqeqeshi wakhe omdala, uTannie Ans Botha, enqoba ku-200m, kwi-ASA Athletix Invitational Meet, ebingoLwesibili ntambama, eRuimsig Athletics Stadium, eRoodeport.U-Van Niekerk ushaye intambo ngo-20.10, ehlula ingqwele ka-100m, u-Akani Simbine, egcine iphume isibili ngo-20.29.Lo mgijimi, owaphula irekhodi lomhlaba ku-400m, ngesikhathi esingu-43.03, kuma-Olympic Games edlule, uthe: "Ngiyakujabulela ukuba ngaphansi kwethimba elisha labaqeqeshi.
Nokho angisoze ngalukhohlwa uhambo lwami no-Ans, ngifunde lukhulu kuyena.
Ngabe kangikho kuleli zinga ukube ubengekho eduze kwami.
Ngizoqhubeka nokumjabulisa.“Ekuqaleni konyaka uVan Niekerk uveze ukuthi usehlukene no-Ans, wajoyina umqeqeshi omusha, uLance Brauman, wase-USA.
U-Van Niekerk unqoba nje ubesehlale isikhathi eside engagijimi ezingeni eliphezulu kusukela alimala                ngo-2017.
Izinhlelo zokubuyela emiqhudelwaneni ziphazamisekile nyakenye ngemuva kokuqubuka kweCovid-19.
Uveze ukuthi selokhu abuya ekulimaleni ubeqala ukujima ngokuphelele inyanga nohhafu.Mayelana nokuthi usekulungele ukumela elakuleli kuma-Olympics aseTokyo, eJapan, ngoJulayi, uthe: "Okwamanje ngizothatha umjaho ngamunye, kangifuni ukuxhamazela, wumqeqeshi wami ozongitshela uma sengifithi ngokwanele.
Kuma-Olympics ngizogijima            u-400m, nakuba kunjalo ngeke ikusasa ulazi, kuhle ukuhlala uzilungiselele.“USimbine, ongumpetha ka-100m kumaCommonwealth Games, uthe kusukela ngonyaka odlule iyamjabulisa indlela agijima ngayo.
"Kuhlale kunokuqhudelana okuhle ukugijima eceleni kukaVan Niekerk.
Engikubheke ngabomvu manje ama-ASA Championships azoba semasontweni amabili.
Abantu abangelulekayo bahlakaniphile, ngethemba ukuthi ngizoqhubeka nokwenza kahle,“ kusho uSimbineImenenja kaVan Niekerk, uPeet Van Zyl, ithe izinhlelo zabo zisekutheni lo mgijimi ayibambe ku-400m kuma-Olympics.
"Simgijimisa u-200m ngoba senzela ijubane.
Maduze sizohlangana nomqeqeshi, uBrauman, ukuthola uhlu lwemijaho azozilungiselela ngayo ama-Olympic," kusho uVan Zyl.
ICarling izobuyisela abalandeli enkundleni
IZONGENA emlandweni ngokuba wumqhudelwano wokuqala kanobhutshuzwayo ukubuyisela abalandeli enkundleni eNingizimu Afrika iCarling Black Label Cup, okuzoqhuthana kuyo iOrlando Pirates neKaizer Chiefs.La maqembu aseSoweto azodudulana kulo mqhudelwano e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto ngo-Agasti 1.Kungenzeka la maqembu ahlangane aseshaya womabili ngenkanyezi ehambisana nokudla igolide kwiCaf Champions League.Lokho nokho kulele ekutheni iChiefs iqede ngeWydad Athletic Club eFNB Stadium, ngoMgqibelo ngo-6 ntambama.Ingabe isibheka kowamanqamu oseCasablanca ngoJulayi 17.Nokho okumqoka okwamanje ngeCarling, wukuthi izonika abalandeli ababili ithuba lokungena okokuqala enkundleni kusuka ngo-Ephreli wanyakenye kumiswa ezemidlalo emhlabeni wonke ngenxa yokubheduka kwecoronavirus ngoMashi.“Izoqopha umlando iCarling ngokuba wumqhudelwano wokuqala ukubuyisela abalandeli enkundleni.
Yebo kuzobe kungababili kuphela abazothola ithuba lokuba ngamaChampion Coach kodwa kungaba yinoma ngubani.
Nobani nobani angangenela.
Wukuthenga iCarling Black Label bese uthatha iselula ushaye u *120*660*ICODE YESIVALO SESIPHUZO#,” kusho uPhumudzo Manenzhe, owayengumdlali wePirates.Bavumelene noReneilwe Letsholonyane, owayedlalela iChiefs, ukuthi kungakuhle kulo nyaka ke kuhlabane abalandeli baKwaZulu-Natal ekubeni ngamaChampion Coach (abazoba ngabaqeqeshi bosuku ngo-Agasti 1).“Kulo nyaka iCarling ishaya ngonyawo oluhukile.
Kunezinto ezinhlanu ezibizwa ngamaGame Changers.
Ngamandla lawo anikwe abalandeli ukungagcini nje ngokubophela isikimi kodwa wukusihlela kungaba yi-4-4-2, 4-3-3 njalonjalo, okwesibili wukuqoka ozothatha amaphenathi eqenjini ngalinye, ukaputeni weqembu ngalinye, wukushintsha abadlali besebenzisa itwitter nokuqoka umdlali wosuku,” kusho uLetsholonyane ngokuvumelana noManenzhe.UCandice Vandenbosch noFarah Roskruge bona bakhuthaza abalandeli ukuthi bangene kwiwebsite yeCarling Black Label ukubona izinombolo zamava abadlali ukuze bezokwazi ukuhlela izikimu zabo.
ISundowns iqhubekile nokuzisondeza nesicoco seligi
SITHEMBISO MKHIZETS Galaxy (0) 0Mamelodi Sundowns (0) 1IMAMELODI Sundowns  iqhubekile nokuzicabela indlela ebheke ekuphakamiseni isicoco sesine seDStv Premiership kulandelana ngemuva kokushaya iTS Galaxy ngo 1-0 emdlalweni obuyizolo eMbombela Stadium.
Igoli elisondeze amaBrazillians ekunqobeni isicoco sokuqala kule sizini, lingqofelwe enethini uPeter Shalulile ngomzuzu ka-17 kade kuyikhona.Esicongweni aseqhwakele ngamaphuzu awu-57  emidlalweni ewu-26.Asedinga ukunqoba emidlalweni emibili elandelayo okungoweSuperSport United neBloemfontein Celtic, bese equkula inkomishi ngamaphuzu awu-63.Owokugcina azowudlala neCape Town City,  ngoMeyi 29.Isiwombe sokuqala siqale kuyiSundowns ebikhonya.
Nakuba ibingadlile ngokuhlasela kodwa beyenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ibhola lihlala likuyo, izindawo zayo beyiziqaphe ngeso lokhozi.Okunye okuqaphelekile ukuthi beyinethezekile uma iphethe ibhola.
Nezika-Owen da Gama bezingazibekile phansi, abadlali abanjengoBathusi Aubaas belokhu belungizile ezintini zikaKennedy Mweene.AmaThe Rockets kuzomele azisole wona ikakhulukazi kulesi siwombe.Ngoka-30, u-Aubaas ugobe ibhola elishaye esandleni sikaMosa Lebusa, unompempe uTshidiso Mkhwanazi wangacucuza, wayibeka emlotheni.UMweene wenze umsebenzi oncomekayo evimba iphenathi yesithenjwa sikaDa Gama, uLindokuhle Mbatha oye ebholeni engathi uyasaba.Isiwombe sesibili sibe induvanduva.
EzikaDa Gama zizamile ukuziqoqa, esiswini uMlungisi Mbunjana, Aubaas no-Ethan Brooks bevimba ukuchanasa kweSundowns.Bese kungathi uShalulile akekho, noGift Motupa ugcine  ekhishiwe.Kusaphele amanenjana kuqale lesi siwombe, uKhuliso Modau obe nomdlalo omuhle, ugobe ibhola elimnandi elihlale ezinyaweni zikaMotupa walibala ukucucuza esebhekene nonozinti weGalaxy, uWensten van der Linde, waze wamakwa uSpiwe Msimang.UModau usindele unompempe engakhishwa ngekhadi elibomvu kade edlalise ngesihluku uTumelo Modibe ogcine ephumile.Ukunqoba kweSundowns kubuye kwasho ukuvula igebe lamaphuzu ayisikhombisa kuMaZulu alele isibili kwi-log.
Bekuwumdlalo wesithathu leli qembu laseChloorkop linqoba kulandelana.Kodlule libhaxabule iMaritzburg United ngo-3-0.Ngaphandle kokuhanjelwa izinto kahle kweSundowns kwiligi, okunye okungabuzwa ukuthi kuyayijabulisa, ukuthi izoba nesikhathi sokulungiselela umdlalo wayo ne-Al Ahly yase-Egypy we-quarterfinal yeCaf Champions League.Lo mdlalo ungoMgqibelo, ekuhambeni, e-Al Salam Stadium Cario.IGalaxy izoqhubeka nokuhlala kweyesishiyagalombili ngamaphuzu awu-32 emidlalweni ewu-26.NgoLwesithathu izovakashela iLamontville Golden Arrows, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont.
UBenni usongela Izinyoni ngoweligi
SITHEMBISO MKHIZE AMAZULU asonga ngokuba yiqembu lesibili ukushaya iSwallows azobhekana nayo namuhla, ngo-5 ntambama kwiDStv Premiership, eJonsson Kings Park Stadium, eThekwini.Ziningi izinongo ezenza lo mdlalo ubhekwe ngabomvu.
Abaningi babheke ukuthi iSwallows okuyisizini yokuqala ibuyele esigabeni esikhulu, kungabe izokwazi ukuqeda iligi isahlulwe yiTS Galaxy kuphela?
Kwi-log, ikweyesihlanu ngamaphuzu awu-43.
Omunye umbuzo usekutheni kule midlalo emibili eyisalele, ingakwazi yini ukuntshontsha umcimbi, izibone seyidlala e-Afrika njengokufisa komqeqeshi wayo uBrandon Truter.
Iya kowanamuhla ihamba phambili kwiDStv Premiership ngemidlalo ewu-19 eyidlale ngokulingana.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi, Usuthu okuke kwaphela imidlalo ewu-16 lungashaywa, lubheke ukuya okukoqala kwiCaf Champions League.
Lusendaweni yesibili ngamaphuzu awu-50.
Abalandeli banobhutshuzwayo bafuna nokubona ukuthi lungakwazi ukuba iqembu lesibili ekushaya Izinyoni.
Kule midlalo emibili esalele ezikaMcCarthy, zingakwazi yini ukuvuka zizithintithe?
Kwemibili eyedlule zishaywe yiBaroka nayi-Orlando Pirates.
Nakuba luphuma kulesi sibhaxu kodwa uMcCarthy ukusho ngokuzethemba ukuthi kalikho kwiDStv Premiership iqembu elinamathuba adlula bona okulibhekisa Champions League.
Elinye iqembu elizodlala kwiChampions League ngesizini ezayo, iMamelodi Sundowns engompetha beligi.
"Siphuma ekuhlulweni emidlalweni emibili kulandelana.
Emasontweni edlule sishaywe iBaroka sidlalela ekhaya.
NgoLwesine olwedlule siphinde sabuyiselwa emuva iPirates.
Kuyasiphoqa ukubuya ngamandla.
Konke kusezandleni zethu ngokuqopha umlando wokudlala kwiChampions League ngesizini ezayo.
Lokhu kusiphoqa ukudlula kumnyama kubomvu kwiSwallows.
Kuzoba umdlalo onzima kodwa kangikuboni okungasivimba ekubeni yiqembu lesibili ukuyishaya," kusho uMcCarthy.
Uqhube wathi: "Kule midlalo emibili kuzomele silwele ukufa nokuphila.
Uma singashaya udaka, kungabe siwudicilele phansi wonke lo msebenzi ongaka.
Okunginika ithemba ukuthi siwumndeni enkundleni nangaphandle.
Sidumala siphinde sijabule ndawonye uma sinqoba.
Nemiqondo yethu isesimeni esihle.“ Sisekuzo ezithinta Usuthu, uhlehliselwe osukwini olungakaziwa umcimbi wokuhlonipha abenze kahle kwisizini ephezulu obuzoba ngoMgqibelo, eThe Zunguness Wedding and Conference Venue, eHowick.Kwisitatimende esikhishwe izolo, kuthiwe abaphathi bathathe lesi sinqumo ngenxa yokubuyiselwa kwezwe esigabeni sesibili somvalelandlini ngenhloso yokugwema ukusabalala kwe-Covid-19.
Usuku olusha lusazomenyezelwa.
UMcCarthy angeke ahlukane netshe lemali ngomdlali
UBENNI McCarthy opheka AmaZulu FC, akazimisele ngokuguga iphakethe ethenga intandokazi yakhe uZukile Kewuti kwiCape Town City.UKewuti ubolekwe nguMcCarthy kwiCity ezinyangeni ezedlule esephendulwe isibukeli.
Maphakathi nesonto ushaye into ecokeme Usuthu lubambana neMamelodi Sundowns koweDStv Premiership.
Ubedlala emuva kwesokunxele endaweni kaSibusiso Mabiliso obedonsa isigwebo samakhadi.
Njengoba sekubalwa imidlalo kuphele isizini ka-2020/2021, kulindeleke ukuthi uKewuti abuyele eKapa kwiCity.UMcCarthy, owanika uKewuti ithuba lokudlala kwiPremiership esekwiCity, uthe uyafisa ukumgcina eThekwini kodwa ngeke akhokhe izindodla zemali.
"UZuki ungumuntu engimhlonipha kakhulu.
Ngiyalibona ikhono lakhe njengomdlali, akufani nalapho esuka khona.
Ngiyalazi izinga lakhe, ngiyakwazi angasinika khona eqenjini.
Ngingathanda ukumgcina kodwa konke kuncike eqenjini esimboleke kulona.
Kodwa uma befuna imali eshisiwe ngoba nakhu edlalela mina futhi enza kahle ngaphansi kwami ngaphezu kwaseqenjini lakhe, bese sifunwa imfumba yemali, kuzoshintsha konke lokho.
Ungumdlali owengeze okukhulu kuMaZulu futhi ungene khaxa kusuka ngosuku lokuqala efikile.
Ngakho ngiyafisa ukumgcina kodwa konke kuzoncika emalini esizobizwa yona," kusho uMcCarthy.AmaZulu asendaweni yesithathu kwi-log ngamaphuzu angu-41 emuva kwemidlalo engu-23.
Abambene nomakhelwane iLamontville Golden Arrows esendaweni yesibili kwi-log yePremiership eholwa yiSundowns ngamaphuzu angu-47 emidlalweni engu-21.UMcCarthy ukuchithile ukuthi bajaha iSundowns.
"ISundowns isendaweni engcono, iphambili ngamaphuzu ayisithupha, nemidlalo emibili esandleni.
Uma iwina yomibili le midlalo, kuyashuba.
Asiqalanga ngesikhathi esisodwa sonke.
Ngiwuqale kamuva umjaho, manje ngizama ukuwuqedela.
Ngizilungiselela isizini ezayo lapho engizoqala khona nabanye.
Yilapho engizofuna khona abantu bangibuze ukuthi ngisembangweni weligi yini ngoba sonke sizoba siqale ekuqaleni.
Sizoyifaka ingcindezi iSundowns, sibone ukuthi kugcinaphi.
Uma iqhubeka nokwenza kahle sizoyibongela ngokuwina isicoco.
Uma kungakafiki kulokhu, akukapheli," kusho uMcCarthy.
Kusasa AmaZulu azokwamukela iTS Galaxy eJonsson Kings Park Stadium ngo-5 ntambama koweligi.
UMngqithi ubonga abadlali ngokunqoba ekuhambeni
UMQEQESHI weMamelodi Sundowns, uManqoba Mngqithi, uncome abadlali bakhe ngokuyibamba ishisa, bephula irekhodi leminyaka leTP Mazembe yaseDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC) lokungehlulwa ekhaya emidlalweni yeCaf.ISundowns inqobe ngo-2-1 ngamagoli ashaywe uPeter Shalulile noLyle Lakay.
EleMazembe obekungelokulinganisa livalelwe phakathi uTresor Mputu.Ihlezi ngokunethezeka esicongweni sikaGroup B weCaf Champions League ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye emuva kwemidlalo emithathu.
Womathathu amaqembu enawo kuleli qoqo okuyiMazembe, AL Hilal yaseSudan neCR Belouizdad yase-Algeria anamaphuzu amabili ngalinye.Lokhu kubeka iSundowns ethubeni elihle lokudlulela kuma-quarterfinal.
Ngaphezu kwalokho, inethuba lokugwema amaqembu anzima azoqeda esicongweni emaqoqweni amathathu.
Amaqembu amabili azoqeda phezulu eqoqweni ngalinye azodlulela phambili.
Azoqeda ehlezi eqhulwini, azoqhathwa nazoqeda endaweni yesibili eqoqweni ngalinye.IMazembe ibikade isidlale imidlalo engu-73 ingahlulwa ekhaya kwiCaf (Champions League neConfederation Cup).
Isibhaxu yasigcina ngo-2019 iguqiswa yiHilal kowandulela owamanqamu weChampions League.UMngqithi, oqale wabonga iCovid-19 ngokudlala bengekho abalandeli beMazembe, uthe bathole lomphumela ungenxa yokuthi kade bewulungiselele kahle umdlalo.
"Kuhlala kuhlukile uma abalandeli begcwele enkundleni.
Kodwa angifuni ukudla amandla abadlali.
Siwulungiselele lo mdlalo.
Besazi ukuthi sidlala neqembu elinzima.
Kodwa ukuzethemba kwethu kuphezulu.
Ngicabanga ukuthi sesidlale imidlalo engu-23 singahlulwa kule sizini okuyinto enhle kakhulu eqenjini nasendleleni esilungiselela ngayo.
Enkundleni kade zikhona izimo ezinzima abadlali ababhekane nazo.
Nami ngifuna ukwazi ukuthi igoli esilishaye esiwombeni sokuqala bekungelona yini?
Angisazi isizathu esenze lingabalwa.
Emqondweni wami sishaye amagoli amathathu namuhla," kusho uMngqithi.ISundowns iwine ingasaphelele kulandela ukuthola ikhadi elibomvu likaRicardo Nascimento ngomzuzu ka-74.
"Ngenhlanhla kule sizini sesike sabhekana nesimo esinje lapho besikade silandela khona ngo-1-0 koweligi ekuhambeni, sidlala ngabadlali abangu-10 kodwa sagcina siwine ngo 2-1.
Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi siyazilungiselela izimo ezinjena ngoba siyazi ukuthi ebholeni, ikakhulukazi kwiChampions League, ungathola ikhadi elibomvu ngento encane," kusho uMngqithi.Komunye umdlalo weChampions League, iKaizer Chiefs ihlule iPetro de Luanda yase-Angola ngo-2-0 kowamaqoqo kaGroup C eFNB Stadium.
Amakhosi ayalingana ngamaphuzu amane neHoroya AC yaseGuinea esendaweni yesibili.
Esicongweni kuhlezi iWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco esiwahlule womathathu amaqembu enawo eqoqweni.
U-Elgar ufuna bayiphinde ngesibhaxu iWest Indies
XOLILE MPISANEUKAPUTENI wamaProteas, uDean Elgar, akafuni bagculiswe ukunqoba umdlalo owodwa njengoba bedlala uchungechunge lwama-test neWest Indies.AmaProteas awine i-test yokuqala nge-innings nama-runs awu-63 kodwa u-Elgar uthe ufuna ezakhe zibhukule futhi emdlalweni wesibili.Uzoqala kusasa ntambama ngo-4 eDarren Sammy Cricket Ground e-Saint Lucia.Kubashwibi, u-Anrich Nortje wathatha amawikhethi ayisikhombisa kwi-test yokuqala, uKagiso Rabada wathatha ayisithupha, uLungi Ngidi ayisihlanu.
Kwababhethayo kwagqama kakhulu uQuinton de Kock ngama-runs awu-141.U-Elgar uthe nalabo abanqaka baphinde baqoqe amabhola enkundleni abawenzanga amaphutha kodwa akusho ukuthi sekumele bakhululeke ngoba iWest Indies izobuya isivutha ingabaselwe.
"Sonke sidlale ngokuzimisela emdlalweni wokuqala, ikakhulukazi uQuinton.
Senze konke ngendlela efanele futhi besingenazwelo.
Ngingasho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi sibuyise isitayela amaProteas ayedume ngaso ngaphambilini," kusho u-Elgar.
"Yisona lesi sitayela ebengilokhu ngikhumbuza abadlali ngaso.
Siyazi ukuthi sinawo la mandla ngaphakathi kithina.
Ngizohlezi ngigcizelela ukuthi la makhono siwaveze njalo enkundleni.
"Njengoba amaProteas ezongena kule test yokugcina ehamba phambili ngo-1-0, adinga ukudlala ngokulingana noma ayinqobe eyesibili ukuze adle umhlanganiso kuma-test.U-Elgar uthe okusemqondweni wakhe ukuthi bawuwine umdlalo, banqobe ngo-2-0.
"Kungaba yiphutha elikhulu uma singakhetha ukuzithela ngabandayo ngoba sesinqobe umdlalo owodwa.
Ngifuna siyishaye ngo-2-0 iWest Indies.
Angiboni ukuthi sesingazitshela ukuthi sesiphumelele.
"Njengokaputeni ngizimisele ukuthi ngiligqugquzele iqembu.
Umdlali ngamunye enze okungaphezulu kwesikwenze emdlalweni wokuqala.
Ukunqoba umdlalo owodwa akusho lutho.
Sizele ukuzowina imidlalo yomibili nokunqoba uchungechunge la.
Ngizowuphindaphinda lo mlayezo kubadlali," kusho      u-Elgar.
U-Grobler ujabhiswe ukungashayi amagoli awu-20
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMSHAYIMAGOLI ovelele kwiDStv Premiership, uBradley Grobler, weSuperSport United, ujabhiswe ukungafezeki kwephupho lakhe lokusonga isizini ka-2020/21 evalele enethini amagoli awu-20.Emcimbini wePremier Soccer League (PSL) obungeSonto wokuklomelisa abenze kahle kwisizini ka-2020/21 yeDStv Premiership, lo mgadli uklonyeliswe ngendondo yeLesley Manyathela Golden Boot, ngokuvalela enethini awu-16.Ngesizini ka-2019/20, uGabadinho Mhango waseMalawi, odlalela i-Orlando Pirates wacazelana lo mklomelo noPeter Shalulile waseNamibia ngokushaya amagoli ayilesi sibalo.
UShalulile wayesadlala kwiHighlands Park.UGrobler ohlale esembangweni walo mklomelo, ubeqeda ukucanasa kwabangaphandle.Ngesizini ka-2018/19 wawunqotshwe uMwape Musonda waseZambia, eshaya ayisibalo esifanayo, edlalela iBlack Leopards.
"Ngizizwa ngehlikelwe umthwalo, sekuphele inqwaba yamasizini ngifisa ukunqoba le ndondo.
Empeleni ufiswa yiwo wonke umgadli.
Noma ngijabule kodwa ngijabhile kancane ngokungafezeki kwephupho lami lokushaya amagoli awu-20.
Akwenzekanga lokhu ngenxa yezizathu ezithile.
Ngibulawe nawukugeja  inqwaba yamathuba abengangifikisa esibalweni  ebengisibhekile.
Kuzomele lokhu ngikulungise.
Nokho kuyajabulisa ukuthi siyawakha amathuba.
"Nakuba ngingafikanga ku-20, kodwa ukunqoba lo mklomelo kuyangigqugquzela ekutheni ngesizini ezayo ngizowuqeda lo mkhokha wokungafiki emagolini awu-20.
Ngesizini ezayo ngizolwa ngakho konke, ngithandazela ukuba nesizini enhle.
"Ukushaywa kwamagoli awu-20, kwagcina ukwenzeka ngeka-2011/12, enamathiselwa enethini uSiyabonga "Bhele" Nomvethe esadlala kwiMoroka Swallows.Sekuphele inqwaba yamasizini, abagadlali bamaqembu akuleli behluleka ukuphula irekhodi lamagoli awu-25, elenziwa uCollins Mbesuma waseZambia, ngo-2004/05, edlala kwiKaizer Chiefs.UMbesuma lo mklomelo waphinde wawunqoba ngo-2015/16, ekuMpumalanga Black Aces, enamathisela enethini awu-14.UGrobler ozalwa uLes Grobler owadlala kwiMoroka Swallows, uthe isizini ka-2020/21 kayibaphathanga kahle kwi-United.
"Maphakathi nesizini sike salala endaweni yesibili.
Sishaywe ukulimala namakhadi.
Nakuba singawatholanga amaphuzu ebesiwabhekile kodwa kungijabulisile ukusonga iligi sidlala ibhola elihle.
Ngifisa siqhubeke nalo mgqigqo nangesizini ezayo,“ kusho uGrobler.Amatsatsantsa a Pitori asonge isizini elele kweyesihlanu kwiDStv Premiership ngamaphuzu awu-45.
OwoSuthu ulobizela indawo yesibili kwiligi
UMDLALI osephenduke enye yezinsika kuMaZulu FC, uMakhehleni Makhaula, ugcizelela ubumqoka bokuthola amaphuzu aphelele uma sebebhekene neStellenbosch FC koweDStv Premiership namuhla eDanie Craven Stadium ngo-5 ntambama.
AmaZulu azongena enkundleni eshayela phezulu njengoba eseqhube imidlalo emihlanu engahlulwa.
Anyukele endaweni yesithathu kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-37.
Endaweni yesibili kuhleli omkhaya iLamontville Golden Arrows ngamaphuzu alinganayo, kuthi esicongweni kuqhwakele iMamelodi Sundowns ngamaphuzu awu-43.
"Umdlalo wethu neStellenbosch ubaluleke kakhulu, sidinga amaphuzu aphelele angasibeka endaweni yesibili.
Kubalulekile ukuthi sinciphise amaphuzu iSundowns esishiya ngawo.
Siyakuqonda ukuthi ukudlalela ekuhambeni neStellenbosch kuzoba nzima.
Emdlalweni odlule saya eVhenda, sakwazi ukubuya namaphuzu amathathu.
NakwiStellenbosch sinalo ithuba lokukuphinda lokhu.
"Okujabulisile ekhempini yethu maphakathi nesonto, wumuzwa wentshisekelo yokunqoba.
Amalungiselelo ahamba kahle, sazi konke ngezitha zethu, ngisho nobuthaka bazo," kuchaza uMakhaula.Emlenzeni wokuqala uSuthu lwanqoba ngo-2-1.Lo mdlali  oyibamba esiswini ukhuluma ngendawo yesibili, yingoba i-Arrows izoze idlale ngeSonto neBloemfontein Celtic, eSugar Ray Xulu ngo-3 ntambama.UMakhaula ofike ekuqaleni kwesizini ka-2020/21, ephuma kwiHighlands Park, ungelinye lamasosha amqoka kuMaZulu aqeqeshwa uBenni McCarthy.
Usegijime imidlalo ewu-18 yeligi kwengu-21 esidlaliwe.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, neStellies esiqeqeshwa uSteve Barker siyawadinga amaphuzu agcwele.
Sesihluleke emidlalweni emithathu kulandelana ukuqoqa amaphuzu aphelele.NgoLwesibili siyeke ithuba lokuwina siyeka iKaizer Chiefs ibuye kabili emdlalweni wagcina uphele ngo 2-2.
