UDlamini uzoqopha umlando eshova kwiTour de France
XOLILE MPISANEUZOQOPHA umlando umshovi wamabhayisikili wakuleli, uNicholas Dlamini, njengoba ezoba yingxenye yomjaho wamabhayisikili omkhulu kunayo yonke emhlabeni, iTour de France.Lo mqhudelwano waqala ngo-1903, uba minyaka yonke, ngaphandle kweminyaka owaphazanyiswa khona yizimpi zomhlaba.Owalo nyaka uzoqala ngoMgqibelo edolobheni laseBrest uphelele eParis ngoJulayi 18.UDlamini (25) ufakwe eqenjini, iTeam Qhubeka ASSOS, kanti uzobe engowokuqala womdabu wakuleli ukuthi angenele lo mjaho.Wakhulela emijondolo yaseCapricorn Park, eduze kwaseCape Town, waqala umdlalo wokushova amabhayisikili eneminyaka engu-12.Ikhono lakhe lamfaka kwiWorld Cycling Centre Africa esePotchefstroom, wagcina eseyingxenye yeTeam Qhubeka, ezinze eLucca, eItaly.Uqale ukushova okukhokhelwayo ngo-2018 kanti useke wangenela omunye umjaho omkhulu, iVuelta a Espana, kabili, ngo-2019 nango-2020.NgoDisemba 2019 uke waba sezindabeni ngesikhathi kusabalala i-video eyayimveza ehilizisana nonogada bakwiTable Mountain ababemsola ngokungabi nayo imvume yokungena ashove ibhayisikili epaki lakhona.Leso sigameko samshiya ephuke ingalo waze wadinga ukuhlinzwa.Ngaphandle kokungenela iTour de France, uDlamini uzophinde amele iNingizimu Afrika kuma-Olympics azoba seTokyo ngoJulayi.“Kufezeke iphupho ngokuthi ngifakwe eqenjini elizongenela iTour de France.
Ukushova kulo mjaho yiphupho engaqala ukuba nalo ngisemncane, angikakholwa kahle ukuthi selizofezeka,” kusho uDlamini“Lokhu kuyahambisana nenkolelo yeqembu yokulandela imfundiso yobuntu nendlela esingaguqula ngayo impilo yabantu.
Kuyamangalisa ukuthi ngiziphumela elokishini elincane kodwa manje sengibheke kwiTour de France.“Uma ngibheka emuva kusobala ukuthi bengingeke ngifinyelele lapho ngikhona ngaphandle kweTeam Qhubeka ASSOS.
Kubaluleke kakhulu konke abangenzele kona, nabakwenzele abanye abashovi base-Afrika.“Ngiyethemba ukuthi lokhu kuzonikeza bonke abantu abasha baseNingizimu Afrika ithemba futhi kubagqugquzele ukuthi bafeze amaphupho abo.“Ngifuna uma bengibona ngishova ibhayisikili lami nabo bafise ukulandela ezinyathelweni zami, bashove awabo futhi baphuphe okukhulu kunalokhu.”I-Team Qhubeka isibize uCarlos Barbero waseSpain ukuthi azovala isikhala sikaFabio Aru, okhethe ukuhoxa ngoba ezwa umzimba wakhe ungawulungele lo mjaho onzima.Uhlu lwabashovi beTeam Qhubeka ASSOS:Nicholas Dlamini (South Africa), Simon Clarke (Australia), Michael Gogl (Austria), Victor Campenaerts (Belgium), Max Walscheid (Germany), Sean Bennett (USA), Sergio Henao (Colombia), Carlos Barbero (Spain)
I-United iyithathisa okweyamanqamu imidlalo esele kwiDStv Premiership
IMARITZBURG United iyithatha njengeyamanqamu yonke imidlalo engu-15 ezoyicacisela ngekusasa layo kwiDStv Premiership.ITeam of Choice iyibambe emsileni kwi-log ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye emuva kwemidlalo engu-15.
Iwine imidlalo emibili kuphela emzuliswaneni wokuqala wesizini ka-2020/2021.
Namuhla ngo-5 ntambama, i-United izoqala umzuliswano wesibili uma seyamukela iBlack Leopards emdlalweni wePremiership eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.
La maqembu abelethene emsileni we-log kwazise iLeopards isendaweni ka-15.Umdlali wasesiswini weTeam of Choice, uTravis Graham, uthe umqondo asebenawo manje owokusebenzela ukuwina yonke imidlalo engu-15 ebasalele.
"Sinemidlalo yamanqamu engu-15 phambi kwethu.
Sidinga ukuyiwina yonke.
Yilowo umqondo esinawo eqenjini.
Iqembu lisalokhu lisebenza kanzima.
Wonke umuntu eqenjini uyakuqonda ukuthi sizodinga ukuzimisela okuphelele kithina sonke ukuze siphume kule nkinga.
Nginethemba lokuthi sizoziklomelisa ngokuwina," kusho uGraham owayengukaputeni we-Ajax Cape Town kumasizini edlule.IMaritburg inethuba lokulala isixebukile emsileni we-log.
Kudingeka yehlule iLeopards ngamagoli amathathu.
Nokho akubukeki kuzoba wumsebenzi olula kwazise iLidoda Duvha ibukeka isinomgqigqo kulandela ukuwina imidlalo emibili ilandelana.
Yethuse abaningi ibuya namaphuzu agcwele kwiLamontville Golden Arrows eThekwini ngesonto eledlule.
Ngempelasonto edlule ikhiphe AmaZulu kwiNedbank Cup.Ukusinda nokudliwa yizembe kweTeam of Choice kuncike ekushintsheni kwezinto kule midlalo engu-15 eyisalele.
"Kufanele singaxhamazeli.
Siyakuqonda ukuthi akuyona into enhle ukulengela ezembeni kodwa akufanele singenwe ngamanzi emadolweni.
Kufanele sigxilise imiqondo yethu emsebenzini ophambi kwethu, silwele amaphuzu amathathu," kusho uGraham.
IGalaxy inciphise amathuba ePirates okungena kweyeCaf
SITHEMBISO MKHIZETS Galaxy (1) 1Orlando Pirates (0) 0I-ORLANDO Pirates izinciphisele amathuba okubuyela e-Afrika ivumela ukushaywa yiTS Galaxy ngo-1-0 emdlalweni weDStv Premiership izolo, eMbombela Stadium.I-The Rockets idlule ngegoli likaMasilake Phohlongo alingqofele enethini ngekhanda ngomzuzu wesithathu esiwombeni sokuqala.EZimnyama zizoqhubeka nokuhlala kweyesine ngamaphuzu-46 emidlalweni ewu-28.Ukube zinqobile, bezizogudluza iLamontville Golden Arrows endaweni yesithathu ngamaphuzu awu-49.Lokhu bekuzoqinisa amathuba okubuyela kwiCaf Confederation Cup.Zisanda kukhishwa kabuhlungu kulo mqhudelwano, zishaywa yiRaja Casablanca yaseMorocco ngo-5-1 kwi-quarterfinal.Esiwombeni sokuqala iGalaxy isizwe ukushaya igoli zibekwa, izitobha zeZimnyama zingalindele lutho.Ngesikhathi abePirates besamangazwe yileli goli,          u-Abel Mabaso uphume ngekhadi elibomvu ngemuva kokudlalisa kabi uLindokuhle Mbatha singekho isidingo.Ngemuva kwalokhu kuqhamuke uMxolisi Macuphu, ongumgadli weThe Rockets, obethi ulinamathisela enethini laphuma eceleni kwepali.Kubukeka kubanengile abadlali beBhakhaniya ukuphuma kukazakwabo ngelibomvu.
Bavele baba nolaka, kugqame kakhulu uGabadinho Mhango.
Ulaka lwakhe ubebuye alukhiphele ezintini zezitha, nokho izitoba ezinjengo-Ebrahim Seedat zingazibekile phansi.Amaphaphu ePirates athe ukwehla, uSiphiwe Mahlangu weGalaxy naye ekhishwa ngekhadi elibomvu.Kwesesibili, iGalaxy kumele ibonge unozinti wayo, uMarlon Heugh ovimbe amabhola anzima.
Ngeke lusale ngaphandle nodonga lwakhe obeluphebeza abadlali beZimnyama abebengqongqoze njalo.
I-Galaxy bese ihleli emuva, idle ngamabhola okuzuma.I-Pirates iye kowayizolo ihambela phezulu kulandela ukuthi kodlule ishaye AmaZulu ngesonto eledlule.
NgoLwesithathu izovakashela iBaroka ePeter Mokaba  emdlalweni okumele iwunqobe uma izimisele ngokusondela ekudlaleni eyeCaf.Izosonga iligi neTshakhuma ngoMgqibelo, e-Orlando Stadium.Ngokunqoba kowayizolo, iGalaxy igudluze iBaroka kweyesishiyagalombili.
Inqoba lapha nje, bese ishaywe emidlalweni emithathu kulandelana.Umkhankaso wayo wukulwela ukuhlala kwiTop 8, uzoqhubeka ngoLwesithathu uma seyibhekene neStellenbosch eKapa.
Izovala neKaizer Chiefs ekhaya, eMbombela.
Kushanele uShalulile kumaPSL Awards
KUSHANELE umgadli weMamelodi Sundowns uPeter Shalulile emcimbini wePremier Soccer League (PSL) wokuklomelisa abenze kahle kwisizini yeDStv Premiership neGladAfrica Championship ka-2020/2021 ngokwahlukana.UShalulile ugoduke nemiklomelo yePSL Footballer of the Season neDStv Premiership Player’s Player of the Season kulo mcimbi obuseRandburg, eGoli, izolo ebusuku.Lo mgadli waseNamibia uhlomula nje ushiya ngemuva uzakwabo kwi’Downs, uThemba Zwane noThabiso Kutumela weMaritzburg United kuyona yomibili imiklomelo.
Ngokunqoba uqophe umlando ngokuba wumdlali wokuqala waseNamibia ukudla le miklomelo.Umklomelo wePSL Footballer of the Season uvotelwa ngokukhethekile ngabaqeqeshi bamaqembu adlala esigabeni esikhulu bese kuthi iDStv Premiership Player’s Player of the Season ivotelwa ngabadlali uqobo.
Umuntu akavumelekile ukuvotela aseqenjini elilodwa naye.Umqeqeshi waMaZulu FC, uBenni McCarthy nguyena oqokwe waba iDStv Premiership Coach of the Season kulandela ukushayela kwakhe umkhumbi woSuthu wawubeka endaweni yesibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership, okuyindawo ephezulu kunazo zonke leli qembu laseKZN eseke laqeda likuyona.U-Evidence Makgopa weBaroka FC ugoduke nomklomelo weDStv Premiership Most Promising Player of the Season kwathi uNjabulo Ngcobo weSwallows FC wathola oweDStv Premiership Defender of  the Season.
UZwane, ngesizini edlule, owathatha imiklomelo etholwe uShalulile, ugoduke noweDStv Premiership Midfielder of the Season.Igoli likaTebogo Mokoena weSuperSport United alivalele enethini bebhekene neStellenbosch FC, kube ilona elivotelwa njengeDStv Premiership Goal of the Season.
UDenis Onyango wamaBrazilians angompetha beligi, uqokwe njengonozinti ovelele.KwiMTN 8 i-Last Man Standing ihambe noDeon Hotto we-Orlando Pirates.Unozinti weTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila (TTM) uWashington Arubi uyena odle umhlanganiso kwiNedbank Cup Player of the Tournament, uKhanyisa Mayo weRichards Bay wadla oweNedbank Cup Most Promising Player of the Tournament.
Khonamanjalo iPSL ithe imiklomelo yonompempe neminye yeGladAfrica izobuye yenziwe.Isiyonke imiklomelo ihambe kanje;PSL Footballer of the Season:Peter Shalulile (Mamelodi Sundowns).DStv Premiership Player’s Player of the Season:Peter Shalulile (Mamelodi Sundowns).DStv Premiership Coach of the Season:Benni McCarthy (AmaZulu FC).DStv Premiership Young Player of the Season (U/21):Evidence Makgopa (Baroka FC).DStv Premiership Goalkeeper of the Season:Denis Onyango (Mamelodi Sundowns).DStv Premiership Defender of the Season:Njabulo Ngcobo (Swallows FC).DStv Premiership Midfielder of the Season:Themba Zwane (Mamelodi Sundowns).DStv Premiership Goal of the Season:Tebogo Mokoena (SuperSport United).DStv Premiership Top Goalscorer:Bradley Grobler (16 amagoli).MTN Last Man Standing:Deon Hotto (Orlando Pirates)Nedbank Bank Cup Most Promising Player:Khanyisa Mayo (Richards Bay).Nedbank Cup Player of the Tournament:Washington Arubi (Tshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila).DStv Diski Challenge Re-Wired:Player of the Tournament (Siyanda Nyanga, Mamelodi Sundowns).DStv Diski Challenge Re-wired:Top Goalscorer: Tahir Goedeman, Cape Town City (6), Kamohelo Hola, Kaizer Chiefs (6), Asanda Buthelezi, Maritzburg United (6) noBoitomelo Radiopane, Orlando Pirates (6).
Umqeqeshi ufuna iChippa ishintshe ukwenza
UKUBALWA kweChippa United emaqenjini asengcupheni yezembe njengoba kwenzekile kwisizini yeDStv Premiership esanda kusongwa, kufanele kube into ebigcina ukwenzeka, ngokubona komqeqeshi uLehlohonolo Seema.USeema ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokuthola iphuzu ngoMgqibelo kowokuhlunga abebewugijima neRichards Bay FC eMhlathuze Sports Complex.Leli phuzu libeka iChippa ebuhleni beDStv Premiership ngesizini ezayo kwazise (iRoyal AM) ayiyingeni eyokuba yingxenye yale midlalo kanti iRichards Bay ngeke isaphumelela ukufica iChippa ngamaphuzu.
Uma izinto zihamba njengoba kulindelekile, kungathathwa ngokuthi iChippa isinamaphuzu ayisikhombisa.
Ithole amathathu ihlula iBay emdlalweni wokuqala.
Kowesibili obekumele iwudlale neRoyal AM kulindeleke ukuthi iPremier Soccer League (PSL) ibanikeze amanye agcwele njengesijeziso seqembu laseThekwini elingazange lifike emdlalweni.
Bese kuba yiphuzu elitholwe iChilli Boys ngoMgqibelo.
I-Bay yona inamaphuzu amane.Uma kunjalo kuzosho ukuthi iChippa isiyigcinile indawo yayo esigabeni esikhulu kodwa konke kulele ekutheni amacala okubambene kuwona i-PSL neRoyal AM azoyela ngakuphi.USeema ubuye kwiChippa sekuzophela isizini edlule, sekucaca futhi ukuthi maningi amathuba okuthi idlale kweyokuhlunga.Sekufana nesiko kwiChippa ukuthi ibalwe nabalwela ukubalekela ukugencwa yizembe minyaka yonke okuyinto uSeema athi, iChilli Boys kumele iyisukumele.“Kunzima ukujabula ngoba asazi kuzogcina kwenzekeni kodwa okusemqoka ukuthi obekubhekene nathi sesikwenzile sakuqeda.“Okuphoxayo ukuthi iqembuu elifana neChippa elinosihlalo ozinekele njengoSiviwe (Mpengesi) lihlale njalo lisenkingeni efanayo.“Ngikholwa ukuthi sinakho konke esikudingayo ukuthi sigweme isimo esihlale sizithola sibhekene naso masizini onke.
Sinosihlalo ohlale ehleli nathi ngaso sonke isikhathi, ngakho ngiyakholwa ukuthi ikhona indlela esizokwenza ngayo ukugwema lesi simo kusukela manje,” kusho uSeema.
Akawuvali umlomo ngendlela abadlali bakhe abebegxile ngayo emsebenzini obubahlalele yize bekungaziwa ukuthi kuzogcina kwenzekeni ngemidlalo yokuhlunga.“Ngabe ngenza iphutha uma kungakhona engithi ngisola ngakho abadlali ngoba bakhombise ukukhula okuyisimanga ngesikhathi esinzima.“Ngiyohlale njalo ngibahlonipha futhi ngibakhonzile laba badlali enhliziyweni yami, ngabakwenzele leli qembu ligcina indawo yalo la kunoju khona,” kusho uSeema.IChippa kumele idlale owokugcina wokuhlunga ne-Royal AM eNelson Mandela Bay ngoLwesithathu.
USeema uthe ngoba akwaziwa okuzokwenzeka, bazobuyela ekhaya bayowuhlelela lo mdlalo.
AmaProteas angase ayizwe ngendaba iWorld Cup
SINGASE sishaye sizwele kumaProteas isinyathelo sikaNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, uNathi Mthethwa, ngoLwesihlanu wavukela iCricket South Africa (CSA) esiswini njengotshwala ngokusebenzisa isigatshana somthetho obizwa ngeSection 13 emqulwini wokuphathwa kwezemidlalo, iNational Sport and Recreation Act.Lesi sigatshana sika-13 sisho ukuthi iCSA iyophucwa amandla okwengamela ikhilikithi ezweni, kusuka ezinhlakeni zezinkulisa kuze kuyofika emaqenjini esizwe.Ngaleyo ndlela amaqembu esizwe ayaphuma emidlalweni yamazwe, kulokhu i-International Cricket Council (ICC) kusho ukuthi amaProteas asengozini yokuyizwa ngendaba iT20 World Cup, okuwumqhudelwano olandelayo.Okuveleli ngoLwesihlanu wukuthi isinqumo sikaMthethwa sifuphoqelelwe wukungavoti ngokuvumelana komengameli bezifunda abayisishiyagalombili beCSA.Bebevotela ukuvumelana ngomthetho omusha, obuzokwenza abaqondisi beCSA bazimele kanjalo nosihlalo wenhlangano.Abahlanu kwabayisishiyagalombili bavote ngokuphikisana bangavumelana, kwathi abathathu bangavota nhlobo.I-ICC T20 World Mens World Cup amaProteas abezodlala kuyo ise-India ngo-Okthoba noNovemba.IT20 World Cup ka-2020 yona egcine ihlehle ngenxa yokubheduka kweCovid19, yona kuthiwa izobuyiselwa khona e-Australia ngonyaka ozayo.“Senginqume ukusebenzisa amandla ami ngaphansi kwe-Act (yezokuphathwa kwezemidlalo).
Ngenza ngokulandela uSection 13, (5)(1)-(iii) wokungoqa nesabelo kwiCSA nokungayizisi (njengenye yezinhlangano eyengamele ezemidlalo kuleli)...,” kusho isitatimende sikaMthethwa.Lokhu kusho ukuthi ikhilikithi izoma ukudlalwa eNingizimu Afrika uma lokhu okuvela kuMthethwa sekushicilelwe kwiGovernment Gazette, okusho ukuba semthethweni.I-CSA kuze kube yimannje akukho okutheni esakushilo ngaphandle kokukhipha isitatimende, ivuma ukuthi ikubonile okushiwo ngungqongqoshe.Ukuchithwa nguhulumeni kweCSA kuzoyishovela nakakhulu obishini ngoba izoqhubeka ilahlwe ngabaxhasi kwazise isivele inuka iqaqa ngenxa yezinkinga zangaphakathi ebuholini benhlangano.Lezo zinkinga zihambisane nokumiswa isikhathi esingangonyaka kwesikhulu esiphezulu, uThabang Moroe owagcina ezibuyela ehhovisi ngodli.Kube nemibuzo nangekusasa likaChris Nenzani njengomengameli wenhlangano, naye ogcine esulile.Abaxhasi beminyaka bamaProteas, iStandard Bank vele kade bayilaxaza inhlangano neqembu lesizwe.
UHunt ucacisa ngekusasa likaBilliat eNaturena
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMQEQESHI weKaizer Chiefs, uGavin Hunt, usephumele obala ngekusasa likaKhama Billiat ozophelelwa inkontileka naleli qembu laseNaturena maduze.
Kuningi ukuqagela ngekusasa lalo mgadli waseZimbabwe osehlale amasizini amathathu kwiChiefs eyamlanda ngedumela kwiMamelodi Sundowns.
Ngokombandela wenkontileka ephakathi kukaBilliat neChiefs, iqembu livumelekile ukwelula ngenye isizini.
Okunye osekubikwe kaningi emithonjeni yabezindaba ukuthi uBilliat ungomunye wabadlali abanesipiliyoni abazodilizwa kwiChiefs ngoba besolwa ngokubhacaza, nokuyinto eholele ekutheni izinto zibhimbe kakhulu kunakuqala kule sizini.Kuvela ukuthi ufunwa uthuli ngamaqembu ase-Egypt, i-Al Ahly neZamalek.
Ephawula ngoBilliat ngemuva kokuthi iChiefs ibuyise isithunzi ngokuqumba phansi omkhaya baseSoweto, i-Orlando Pirates, ngo-1-0 koweDStv Premiership obuseFNB Stadium ngeSonto uHunt, uthe: "UBilliat usezinhlelweni ezinkulu zeqembu.
Iyangixaka le mibiko ethi akekho ezinhlelweni zeqembu.
Ngiyazibuza ukuthi ngempela abezindaba bakuthathaphi lokhu abakubikayo?
Okumqoka njengamanje ukuthi abuye ngamandla njengoba ephuma ekulimaleni.
Njengamanje useqalile ukugijima kancane.
Ngihlalele emthandazweni wokuthi cishe emasontweni amabili azayo alulame ngokuphelele bese simnika noma imizuzu engu-20 athi ukugijima kancane.“IChiefs ihleli endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kwi-log ngamaphuzu awu-23.UHunt, obekubonakala ukuthi kumjabulisile ukunqoba iPirates ebesimphendule ithofi, ubuye wancoma indlela uBernard Parker adlale ngayo enkabeni yesisu.
Naye uParker ikusasa lakhe aliqondakali eNaturena.
UHunt ubeqala ukwehlula iBucs.
Yamshaya kabili emdlalweni owawundulela owamanqamu eMTN 8.
Sekuhlanganiswe yomibili imilenze eZimnyama zanqoba ngo-5-0.
Emlenzeni wokuqala weDStv Premiership ziphinde zanqoba ngo-2-1.
Le miphumela yenze abanye babalandeli baMakhosi baqala bangabaza ubuholi bukaHunt.
Lo mqeqeshi uthe bazosebenzisa ikhefu lamasonto amabili lemidlalo yeFifa ukulungisa amaphutha nokwamukela abadlali ababuya ekulimaleni.
Igoli enqobe ngalo iChiefs libe lihle, liqotshelwa enethini umthakathi wezindaba uSamir Nurkovic, wahluleka wancama ukulivimba unozinti uSiyabonga Mpontshane.
IBucs ihlulwa nje bese kuphele imidlalo eyisithupha ingayazi induku.
Ukunqoba bekuzoyibeka endaweni yesibili kwi-log yeDStv Premiership.
Njengamanje ibambe indawo yesine ngamaphuzu awu-35.Umqeqeshi wayo uJosef Zinnbauer uthe: "Besiwafuna ephelele amaphuzu kodwa izinto azihlangananga.
Ingimangazile indlela iChiefs eqome ukusizuma ekubeni ibidlala esibayeni sayo.
Mina angeke ngiliphasise lelo bhola.
Bazamile abadlali bami nokho,“ kusho uZinnbauer.
I’Downs iqinise indawo esicongweni kweyeCaf
IMAMELODI Sundowns iqinise indawo yayo esicongweni kuGroup B weCaf Champions League ngesikhathi izigwazela ibhece kwi-CR Belouizdad yase-Algeria iyinikeza isibhaxu sika-5-1 emdlalweni wesibili wamaqoqo izolo ntambama.Leli qembu lasePitoli seliqhwakele eqoqweni ngamaphuzu ayisithupha bese lilandelwa yiTP Mazembe yaseCongo enamaphuzu amabili.
Elinye iqembu eliboshelwe kuleli qoqo i-Al Hilal yaseSudan nayo iBelouizdad abanephuzu elilodwa ngalinye.Lo mphumela usho ukuthi amaBrazilians asendleleni enhle ebheke esigabeni sama-quarterfinal somkhumulajezi uma izoqhubeka ngaleli giya.
Emdlalweni wokuqala aqumba phansi i-Al Hilal ngo-2-0.Umdlalo wayizolo ugijinyelwe eDar es Salaam, eTanzania, okuyinkundla ekhethwe yiCaf ngemuva kokuthi umdlalo wahlehliswa emasontweni edlule ngenxa yokuthi i-Algeria yanqabela iSundowns imvume yokungena kuleliya lizwe ibeka isizathu “sezempilo”.Njengokujwayelekile emidlalweni ye’Downs, uThemba “Mshishi” Zwane ubeyiphela endlebeni kwizitha.ISundonws iyibone kuqala inethi ngephenathi ebekwe uZwane umdlalo usanemizuzu emihlanu uqalile.
Idaleke ngemuva kokuthi uChouaib Keddad ebambe ibhola ngesandla, wathola ikhadi elibomvu.UZwane ubuye negoli lakhe lesibili esiwombeni sesibili ezakhe zahamba phambili ngo-3-1.
UPeter Shulile osaqhubeka nokuqhulula amagoli njengoba ebenza kwiHighlands Park ngesizini edlule, nguyena oshaye elesibili.Amanye amagoli eSundowns aqotshelwe enethini uLebogang Maboe noKermit Erasmus.
Elokubika lezitha lishaywe u-Amir Sayoud ngaphambi kokuthi umdlalo ushintshe.Umdlalo olandelayo weCaf uzokuba ngoMashi 6 ekuhambeni lapho iSundowns izobe ivakashele iMazembe, eLubumbashi.Khonamanjalo; iKaizer Chiefs edlale neWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco izolo ebusuku khona kwiChampions League, ithole isibhaxu sika-4-0.Umdlalo ugijinywe e-4 August 1983 Stadium, e-Ouagadougou, Burkina Faso.
Kwakumele ube seMorocco emasontweni edlule kodwa wahlehliswa ngoba iChiefs ingavunyelwe ukungena kuleliya lizwe ngenxa yezibalo eziphezulu zeCovid-19 kuleli.
Emdlalweni wokuqala kaGroup C, iChiefs ibambane ngo-0-0 neHoroya eFNB Stadium ngesonto eledlule.
Kolandelayo kwiChampions izodlala neqembu lase-Angola iPetro de Luanda ngoMashi 6.
Owayengumdlali weChiefs usola abadlali ngokuboza kweqembu
OWAYENGUMGADLI weKaizer Chiefs, uJustice Sithole, uwubhekisa kubadlali abadala umunwe ngokubhimba kwezinto kuleli qembu.Ngempelasonto, iChiefs iqhubekile nokuphenduka ihlaya ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngemuva kokuthelwa ngehlazo lika 4-0 yiWydad Casablanca yaseMorocco emdlalweni wesibili wamaqoqo weCAF Champions League eBurkina Faso.
Amakhosi adlale inyanga yonke kaFebhuwari ngaphandle kokuwina nowodwa umdlalo.
KwiDStv atabalasa endaweni ka-10 kwi-log yePremiership ngamaphuzu angu-19 emuva kwemidlalo engu-17.USithole owayeyibamba kwiChiefs ngesikhathi iwina indebe iMandela Cup (CAF Confederation Cup) ngo-2001, uthe abadlali abadala kwiChiefs bazithela ngabandayo.
"Kushoda ubuholi enkundleni kwiChiefs.
Uma abadlali abadala bengashintsha ukwenza, bakhombise ukuthi kufanele kusetshenzwe, ungaba khona umehluko.
Thina sisadlala, angisho ukuthi sasingcono, sasilandela abadlali abadala.
Izinto zaziqalwa yibona.
Uma kudingeka kugijinywe, sasibona ngabo.
Uma kudingeka kufakwe unyawo babekwenza kuqala," kusho uSithole.
"Manje kwiChiefs abafana abancane yibona abayekwayo ukuthi bahole iqembu ngendlela abadlala ngayo enkundleni.
Angicabangi ukuthi inkinga ikumqeqeshi (Gavin Hunt).
Ubophela abadlali abangu-11 enkundleni.
Yibona laba badlali abahluleke wukuwina isicoco seligi ngosuku lokugcina ngesizini edlule.
Yini eyenza bahluleke ukudlala manje?
Abadlali abadala kufanele bakhombise ukuzinikela enkundleni, abasebancane babone kubona.
"USithole udlale kwiChiefs esemncane eyibamba nabadlali abanamava okukhona kubona uDoctor Khumalo, Patrick Mabedi, Cyril Nzama, Brian Baloyi nabanye.Ukushaya udaka kweChiefs kule sizini sekuhlukanise phakathi abalandeli kwazise kukhona abakholwa wukuthi kufanele akhonjwe indlela uHunt.
Abanye bagxeka abadlali abanamava, okukhona kubona unozinti u-Itumeleng Khune, ngokwenzela phansi iqembu kule sizini.
Ijoka ligcina selihlala emahlombe abadlali abasebancane okukhona kubona uNkosingiphile Ngcobo noHappy Mashiane.Amakhosi azothola ithuba lokugeza igama lawo kwiChampions League uma esebhekene nePetro de Luanda yase-Angola emdlalweni ozoba ngoMgqibelo eFNB Stadium, eNasrec, ngo-6 ntambama.
IChiefs isathole iphuzu elilodwa kuGroup C elithole ngokubambana ngo-0-0 neHoroya.
"Kulo mdlalo uHunt kufanele aqoke iqembu eliqinile, akhohlwe ukungahoshelani okungenzeka ukuthi unakho nabanye abadlali.
Angadlalisi omakadebona kuphela bese ebafuna izinto ezingeke zenzeke njengokuthi abayowina ngo-5-0.
Izinto sezivele azisabavumi kwiChampions League.
Akabafake angalindeli lutho.
Kunalokho okumele akwenze uHunt, ukwakha iqembu langesizini ezayo.
"Emidlalweni weligi iChiefs izobuyela ngoMashi 10 lapho izovakashela iMaritzburg United eHarry Gwala Stadium, eMgungundlovu.Ngalesi sikhathi ingazithola seyehle kakhulu kwi-log uma amaqembu angaphansi kwayo eqoqa amaphuzu njengoba wona ezobe eyibambile kwiligi ngesikhathi isamatasa nemidlalo yeChampions League.
Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership kuleli sonto:Namuhla Ngo-5pm: AmaZulu v SuperSport United (Jonsson Kings Park); Orlando Pirates v Bloemfontein Celtic (Orlando Stadium); Maritzburg United v Black Leopards (Harry Gwala Stadium); TS Galaxy v Swallows (Mbombela Stadium).
Kusasa Ngo-3pm: Chippa United v Cape Town City (Sisa Dukashe Stadium).Ngo-5pm: Lamontville Golden Arrows v Baroka (Sugar Ray Xulu Stadium).
I-Galaxy isitabalasela ukuqeda kwiTop 8
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEISIQONGQWANE seTS Galaxy, uPogiso Sanoka, sithi ukubuswa emakhanda wumqondo wokufuna ukusonga iligi bekuTop 8 kuzokwenza bayithathe njengeyamanqamu imidlalo ebasalele.Namuhla ngo-3 ntambama, eSugar Ray Xulu Stadium, eClermont, iThe Rockets izobhekana neLamontville Golden Arrows.Womabili amaqembu aya kulo mdlalo ephuma esibhaxwini.I-Galaxy ishaywe yiMamelodi Sundowns, Abafana Be'sthende bathelwa othulini omkhaya babo, iMaritzburg United.Ngaphambi koweTeam of Choice, bebeshaywe nangaMaZulu.I-Arrows ilwela ukusonga iligi isendaweni yesithathu, iphethe ithikithi eliya kwiCaf Confederation Cup.I-Galaxy, engomakoti kwiDStv Premiership, ifuna ukusonga isemaqenjini ayisishiyagalombili aphezulu.
"Ukuhlulwa kwe-Arrows emidlalweni edlule kakusho ukwehlelwa yizinga.
Iyiqembu okuhlale kunzima ukudlala nalo.
Ukuba yinkinga kwayo kubonakala ngokufika kwalesi sikhathi sesizini isekhona emaqenjini aphezulu.
Endaweni esikuyo kwi-log, sishiyana ngamaphuzu amancane nezimbangi zethu.
Uma sifuna ukuzuza iTop 8, efunwa yiqembu, kuyasiphoqa ukuphuma kulesi siminyaminya.
Ngamanye amazwi, amaphuzu amathathu siwadinga kakhulu kune-Arrows.
"Nakuba izihlwele zingekho ezinkundleni kodwa ukudlalela ekhaya kuhlale kuletha ukuzethemba kubadlali.
Nakwi-Arrows kuzoba njalo, siyazi izoza kithina kanzima.
Kuzomele sibekezele kuze kube ukuthi siyayithola la incane ngakhona.
Emdlalweni wayo odlule yenze izinguquko ezimbalwa, yaphumuza abanye abadlali.
Silindele ukuthi babuye labo badlali, sibalindele," kubeka uSanoka osagijime imidlalweni ewu-16 kwiThe Rockets.Emlenzeni wokuqala, kayikho eyafuna ukugoba uphondo kula maqembu, abambana ngo-1-1.USanoka uthe unethemba lokuthi ozakwabo basisebenzisa kahle isikhathi abasihlalile bengadlali.Iqembu labo laligcine ngoMeyi 9 ukudlala.
"Kwesinye isikhathi uma sewujwayele ukudlala ezinsukwini ezisondelene, kuba lukhuni ukubuyela emgqigqweni uma sewuhlale kakhulu.
Nginethemba lokuthi ozokwethu leli khefu balisebenzise kahle.“Ngemuva kowe-Arrows, iGalaxy izodlala ne-Orlando Pirates eMbombela, Stellenbosch, eDanie Craven Stadium bese igcina ngeKaizer Chiefs ekhaya.Sisekuzo ezithinta iGalaxy kaTim Sukazi, igcine ihlukene noReneilwe "Yeye" Letsholonyane ogijime ewu-11 kule sizini.Lo makadebona, owazakhela udumo kwiChiefs nakwiBafana Bafana, ungomunye wabadlali abebedlala kwiHighlands Park ekupheleni kwesizini edlule uSukazi ethenge isitifiketi sayo sokuyibamba kwiDStv Premiership.
Uchazwa njengonganakiwe unozinti okwelulwe inkontileka yakhe
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUHLULEKE wukuzibamba uJazzman Mahlakgane oyimenenja kanozinti weBloemfontein Celtic, uJackson Mabokgwane, ngemuva kokuvuselela inkontileka naleli qembu.
UMahlakgane wazise Isolezwe ukuthi lo nozinti owazakhela udumo kwi-Orlando Pirates nakwiMamelodi Sundowns,  uvuselele inkontileka neSiwelele ngeminyaka emibili.
Inombandela wokuthi yelulwe ngomunye unyaka.
UMabokgwane oke waba nasemabhukwini eBidvest Wits nakwiMpumalanga Black Aces, ufike kwiSiwelele ngesizini ka-2019/20.UMahlakgane uveze ukuthi okumjabulisa kakhulu ngalokhu kuvuselela kukaMabokgwane, wukuthi kukhona abese bengabaza ikhono lakhe.
Uthe kuyamjabulisa ukuthi iSiwelele sikubonile ukubaluleka kwakhe.
"Usuku lwangoLwesihlanu lube mnandi empilweni yami.
UMabokgwane ungomunye wonozinti kuleli abanganakiwe, ngokwami unekhono eliyisimanga.
Buka nje, kule minyaka ewu-33 yobudala kodwa uhlula onozinti abaningi abancane ngokweminyaka kunaye.
Kwakhona nje ukuthi inkontileka yakhe inombandela wokuvuselelwa ngonyaka owodwa kusho lukhulu.
Ngimfisela inhlanhla," kubeka uMahlakgane.Lo nozinti ulime indima enkulu iSiwelele sifinyelela kowamanqamu eNedbank Cup abashaywa kuwo eZimnyama ngo-2-1 ngesizini edlule.Emidlalweni ewu-20, ezikaJohn Maduka zisanqobe imidlalo emine kuphela.
Zinamaphuzu awu-20.Okufanele wukushayisa ngovalo kubalandeli bazo wukuthi sezihluleke ukunqoba emidlalweni emihlanu.Zagcina ukunqoba ekuqaleni kwenyanga edlule zishaya iSuperSport United.
Kwi-log yeDStv Premiership, zisendaweni ka-12.
UMaduka utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi akanavalo ngekusasa lakhe kuleli qembu.
"Wukugagamela ukuthi sekubheda ngaleyo ndlela eqenjini.
Uma uzobheka kahle, sidinga ukunqoba imidlalo emibili noma emithathu bese sibuyela endaweni ehloniphekile.
Nakuba ngikuqonda ukuthi bekumele sinqobe kule midlalo emibili edlule (koweMaritzburg United neBaroka) kodwa kungithobe inhliziyo ukuthola  amaphuzu amabili.
Ngithokoziswa nawukuthi sibe nesikhathi esanele sokulungisela umdlalo olandelayo," kubeka uMaduna.Kolandelayo iSiwelele sizobhekana neTS Galaxy, ngeSonto, eSeisa Ramabodu Stadium.
Emlenzeni wokuqala iGalaxy eqeqeshwa u-Owen da Gama yanqoba ngo 1-0.
Kodlule iGalaxy ishaywe yiMaritzburg ngo-2-0.
UParker usefuna isikhundla kwiChiefs
UBERNARD Parker, oklame indima ebonakalayo kunobhutshuzwayo eNingizimu Afrika, uphupha ngokuba sezinhlakeni zeKaizer Chiefs, kuno kulangazelela ukuvuselelwa kwenkontileka yakhe njengomdlali weqembu.
UParker (35) ubalwa ohlwini lwabadlali abambalwa abaphelelwa yizinkontileka kwiChiefs uma kusongwa isizini, futhi uneminyaka egijima kuleli qembu elidume ngokuba nabalandeli abaningi eNingizimu Afrika.Abanye abadlali abasohlwini nguKhama Billiat, Philani Zulu noWillards Katsande kanti iTimeslive ibale noLebogang Manyama noBruce Bvuma, ongaconsi phansi kulezi nsuku.UParker ungukaputeni weqembu okwamanje kodwa indlala yamagoli nokubheda kwezinto eNaturena, kwenza abe mancane amathuba okuthi kuvuselelwe inkontileka yakhe.
Nokho imenenja yakhe, uMike Makaab, ithe lo mgadli ubheke ukulisebenzela kwezinye izinhlaka leli qembu.“UBernard uyafisa ukuhlala kwiChiefs.
Ufuna ukuqhubeka nokulisebenzela iqembu nangemuva kwezinsuku zakhe zokudlala,” kusho uMakaab.Ngokusho kukaMakaab, uParker usezinhlelweni zokuqala iziqu zokuqeqesha ukuze ahlale ehlomile uma kuqhamuka ithuba lokuqeqesha.“Sike sayikhuluma naye indaba yokuqeqesha, uyafuna ukungena kulo mkhakha.
Empeleni yinto azoyiqala ukuyifundela ngonyaka ozayo.
Uyakulangazelela ukuqhubeka nokuhlala eqenjini (Kaizer Chiefs),” kusho uMakaab.Ebuzwa uVina Maphosa okhulumela iChiefs, ngenkontileka kaParker nabanye abadlali, ugcizelele ukuthi abaphawuli ngezinkontileka isizini isephakathi.
UParker ufike kwiChiefs eminyakeni engu-10 edlule ebuya phesheya kwiFC Twente yaseHolland.Ufike kwiChiefs wanqoba izicoco okubalwa kuzo neligi kabili besacijwa nguStuart Baxter.
Nokho kusuka ngo-2015 iChiefs ayikaze iphinde inqobe isicoco kanti kulezi nsuku naye uParker ayamgqozela amagoli.
Eqinisweni uPaker usenesikhathi esingaphezu kweminyaka emibili elizwa ngendaba igoli emidlalweni yeDStv Premiership, futhi kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ugcine ukubhakuzisa inethi ngo-Ephreli ka-2019.Uficwa yile somiso nje, kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi liyabalwa negama lakhe kubadlali asebeke bahlabana ngeLesley Manyathela golden Boot.
UParker unqobe lo mklomelo wamagoli amaningi ngesizini, ngo-2013/2014.
Umengameli omusha weKZNA ushumayele ngobumbano
SITHEMBISO MKHIZEUMENGAMELI omusha weKwaZulu-Natal Athletics (KZNA), uSteve Mkasi, ufuna kukhonye abasubathi bakulesi sifundazwe emaqenjini esizwe amela elakuleli emiqhudelwaneni yomhlaba.UMkasi (osesithombeni) ongomunye wabasunguli bePhuma KZN AC, uqwaqwade emakhandaba uKhura Buthelezi, Patrick Hlongwane no-Ayanda Mngadi okhethweni lobuholi obelungempelasonto, eCoastal Hotel, eThekwini.Bese kusekuphele iminyaka emithathu iKZNA ingenabo ubuholi selokhu i-Athletics South Africa (ASA) yakhomba indlela obabuholwa uSello Mokoena.Izintambo bezibanjiswe umxazululi ozimele, uJay Reddy.UMkasi ucele ukubambisana kwakhethwe nabo esigungwini esiphezulu seKZNA.
Uthe ukwesekwa yibo kuzokwenza lesi zifundazwe sibalwe nezihamba phambili kuleli.
"Ngizizwa ngihloniphekile ngokukhethelwa esikhundleni sokwengamela iKZNA.
Ngaphandle kozakwethu kangilutho, ngicela sibambisane.
Ngifuna isifundazwe sethu sibalwe nezifana ne-AGN (Athletics Gauteng North), CGA ( Central Gauteng Athletics) neWPA (Western Province Athletics).
Ngifuna ukuthi kukhonye abasubathi bethu emaqenjini esizwe.
"Kungiphatha kabi ukuthi izwe elifana ne-Australia, elinesibalo sezakhamuzi aziwu-26 million likumazwe ahlonishwayo kuma-Olympic Games, bese kuthi elethu elinabantu abangaphezu kuka-50million lingabalwa ndawo.
Lokhu kumele kushintshe.
Sizokuqala khona lapha KwaZulu-Natal," kusho uMkasi.Emasontweni edlule, lesi sikhulu sathi uma singakhethwa singaqala ngokuvula kabusha inkulisa (Academy of Excellence) okumele kuphele izinyanga eziwu-18 seyikhona.
Okunye akubalula ukuthola abaxhasi nokuphathwa kahle kwezezimali.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMidlalo eKZN, uHlengiwe Mavimbela, umfisele inhlanhla uMkasi nazohola nabo iKZNA.Uphinde wabonga noReddy ngokubamba ngobuchule le nhlangano.Esigungwini esisha esizosebenzisana noMkasi kukhona iphini lakhe, uMandla Mngomezulu, usihlalo wabagijimi, uMartin Ngwenya, obhekele i-Cross Country uSabelo Ndlovu, owemijaho yasemgwaqweni uRay Khanyile.
Imidlalo ye-Track and Field yona ibhekwe uKhura Buthelezi.Amalungu engeziwe u-Anand Naicker, Thozamile Mazibuko, Simon Dlamini noPat Hlongwane.Iphini likasihlalo wabagijimi uSandile Mthembu, eleCross Country uSimphiwe Zulu, elemijaho yasemgwaqweni uMandla Makhathini, eleTrack and Field uNgane Nxumalo.Amanye amalungu angeziwe uSiyabonga Nkonde, Mduduzi Khumalo noThembelihle Khanyile.Unobhala wekomiti le-Cross Country ngu-Adelaide Xulu.Amalungu angeziwe u-Alen Hattingh, Busi Dlamini, Jessica Khomo noWillie Majombozi.
Unobhala wekomidi  lemijaho yasemgwaqeni uLani van der Mescht.Amalungu engeziwe uWelcome Mteto, Jabulani Gumbi, Maxwell Ncane, Sipho Mkhathini, Nana Nxumalo noKitty Konar.Unobhala wekomiti le-Track and Field, uMangethe Zwane.
Amalungu engeziwe uCelinhlanhla Zungu, Riaan Vosloo, Vusi Nxumalo, Mduduzi Vilakazi, Elias Mkhize noThula Ntshangase.
OweSundowns ubona bezovuka bazithathe
PHEZU kokuba iMamelodi Sundowns ikwazile ukwedlulela emzuliswaneni olandelayo wama-quarterfinal eCaf Champions League, kodwa iphini lomqeqeshi waleli qembu uRulani Mokwena, alikufihlanga ukuphoxeka kwabo ngokushaywa ngo 2-0 yiCR Belouizdad, yase-Algeria.Umdlalo ubuseLoftus Versfeld Stadium, eTshwane ngoLwesihlanu ntambama.IBelouizdad eyaxetshulwa ekhaya ngo 5-1 yiDowns emlenzeni wokuqala, kucacile ukuthi  ibingazile ukuzosinisa amahleza  emdlalweni ishaya amagoli amabili ngesiwombe sokuqala, eshaywa u-Amir Sayoud no-Ahmed Gasmi.Nakuba iDowns ibisivele iye emdlalweni isizibekisele indawo kuma-quarterfinal, kodwa iBelouizdad ibiwadinga kakhulu amaphuzu kulo mdlalo ukuze nayo yedlulele emzuliswaneni olandelayo.
Umphumela ubeke leli qembu lase-Algeria endaweni yesibili kwiGroup B weChampions League ngamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye, ngemuva kweSundowns ebiziqengqelezela phambili ngamaphuzu angu-13.“Sidumele ngokwehlulwa kwethu kulo mdlalo nangendlela nje esidlale ngayo, ikakhulukazi esiwombeni sokuqala, lapho esidedele khona amagoli amabili.
Asidlalanga neze kahle kulo mdlalo, iqiniso lihle.
Kodwa-ke sithole isifundo ngokwehlulwa kwethu njengoba sidlulela phambili emzuliswaneni olandelayo,” kusho uMokwena ekhuluma nabezindaba.Okuqaphelekile kulo mdlalo wukuthi iDowns iwuqale ngeqembu elishintshe kakhulu, kubonakala ukuthi kunikwa ithuba abanye abadlali asebenesikhathi bagcina ukuthola ijezi.Ezintini bekuboshelwe uRicardo Goss, emuva kunguRicardo Nascimento, uGeorge Maluleka ongavamile ukudlala kule ndawo noBrian Madiba Onyango, naye osenesikhathi eside agcina ukudlala ngenxa yokulimala.Esiswini ibophele u-Aubrey Modiba, Khuliso Mudau noHlompho Kekana, naye futhi osenesikhashana engadlali kuthiwa “uyaphunyuzwa”, phambili ihlasela ngoPeter Shalulie wodumo, uThapelo Morena ovame ukudlala emuva noSibusiso “Villa” Vilakazi.Ebuzwa ngalezi zinguquko uMokwena, uthe: “Angikholwa wukuthi sikhona isidingo sokuthi kube khona imibuzo ngezinga lalaba badlali, ngoba uGoss ungunozinti osezingeni eliphezulu, uModiba naye kanjalo ungumdlali osezingeni ovame nokubizwa eqenjini lesizwe.
“Ngokunjalo no-Onyango ungumdlali osezingeni eliphezulu odlala naseqenjini lesizwe laseKenya, ngakho-ke angisiboni ngempela isidingo sokushaya amakhala ngezinga lalaba badlali,” kuqhuba uMokwena.
Ufunge wagomela ukuthi ezakhe zizokwazi ukuvuka zizithathe emidlalweni elandelayo.Umqeqeshi weBelouizdad, uFrance Dumas, uzwakalise ukukuthakasela ukunqoba kwezakhe emdlalweni.
Ukubeke ngokucacile ukuthi kusho lukhulu kubona ukwedlulela kuma-quarterfinal omqhudelwano okokuqala ngqa.“Umsebenzi wethu omkhulu siwenze ngenkathi sishaya iTP Mazembe, njengoba manje sesishaya iSundowns nje.
Sithokoze kakhulu ngalo mphumela,” kusho uDumas.Njengoba isongwa eyamaqoqo eChampions League kule mpelasonto, kubhekwe ngabomvu ukuthi ngabe iDowns kungenzeka yini iqhathwe ne-Al Ahly, yase-Egypt, eqeqeshwa wuPitso Mosimane, nayo esikwazile ukuzibekisela indawo kuma-quarterfinal omqhudelwano.Empeleni isivele iqalile imvunge kubathandi bebhola baseNingizimu Afrika, abasha amashushu ngokubona lezi zingqungqulu zihlabana amalunda.
Qaphela uma kuthiwa thwasa ukuze ungazifaki enkingeni
KWENZEKE umhlola kufika izelamani zogogo abathathu asebengaphezulu kweminyaka engu-60, nezingane zabo nabazukulu bekhala izinyembezi ngamunye ngamunye esigodlweni eMlambomunye, bethi indlela abahlupheka ngayo sekuthi abazibulale.
Ngokungena ngokwehlukana ababili bathwasa omunye wasinda yena, ukuthi kanjani naye uyazibuza.
Ekuthwaseni kwabo eminyakeni engu-20 eyedlule akukho lutho olwaphinde lwalunga.
Kwalowo owabathwasisa akasekho emhlabeni lasheshe lamthatha ithongo lakhe okukhomba kona ukuthi wayedlala ngabantu.Lezi zalukazi esiganele kwaGumede waseNtshangwe nodadewabo oganele kwaNzama eCato Ridge bobabili bakhala ezimathonsi ngenxa yenhlupheko esibapheke iminyaka engaphezu kuka-20 selokhu bathwasa.
Omunye wabo kwathi angaphothula zashona zonke izingane zakhe kwasala eyodwa nayo esinomzukulu okungathi uphithanelwa yikhanda.
Ugogo uNzama yena indodakazi yakhe ngenhlanhla yagana kodwa  nayo yathwasiswa, ekuthwaseni kwayo yathi iqeda umkhwenyana wayekhala iphepha.
Kumanje  ilahlekelwe ngumsebenzi.
Kanti phambilini beyiwuthola umsebenzi kodwa usheshe uphele.
Bafika eMlambomunye belandelana ngenxa  yenhlupheko nosizo asebethe banikezwa lona kuba nhlanga zimuka nomoya.
Ugogo uGumede yena useke waya komunye wathi akalethe inkomo emhlophe khona ezomvulela idlozi, uma ebuza ukuthi uzoyithathaphi imali wathi akahambe ayoyiboleka ngoba idlozi lakhe lavalwa.
Uma ubuza ngodadewabo naye owathwasa njengaye, impendulo ithi udadewabo bamvala ngezizwe kufanale yena akhiphe imali engangezinkulungwane ezingu-50 zamaRandi ukuze ayomlahla izizwe bese emgeza emfuleni ongcolile ukuze zihambe nokungcola.
Bobabili bakhala ngokuthi abasazazi izingubo asebazishiya emifuleni bebhabazwa ngezinkukhu ngoba kuthiwa bakhishwa idlozi elibi abalifakwa ugobela owayebathwasisa.Yilezi zimangaliso engihlale ngikhuluma ngazo ngithi baningi abantu abathwasile kodwa akwenzeki lutho.
Abanye baba nenhlanhla yokuthi batshelwe ukuthi phuma lapha kudlalwa ngathi.
Izingane eziningi namhlanje ezifundayo ezehluleka ezikoleni kokunye zilahlekelwe ngumsebenzi ngenxa yendaba eba yisiphetho yokuthi akuthwaswe.
Engiqonde namhlanje ukudlulisela kuwona wonke umuntu wukuthi ngo-2021, ake ubalekele kude nale Covid yokuthwasiswa kwabantu kungekho sidingo.
Leli gama nalesi senzo ake kufane nesihogo esizokushisa uma ungene ungaboni.Bakhona okufanele bathwase kodwa nazi izinto okufanele ziqikelelwe: izibonakaliso namaphupho ikhona okungumnqamulajuqu ekuthwaseni.
Ukuphupha amabhayi namashoba nokuzibona ugida nezangoma, nokugula, ngake ngabhala khona lapha ngisho ukuthi yebo kusuke kukhomba ukuthi yamukela umsebenzi kodwa kufanele kube abanikazi bawo okufanele bakukhombe kumuntu ozoya kuyena kumbe bazozenzela.
Kunezinkulumo eziningi lapha ngaphandle kithina belaphi okuphika ukuthi ithongo liyakwazi ukuzenzela konke, imbangela yalokho ingoba asazi futhi sisenolwazi oluncane ngethongo nedlozi, nabathi bayalazi basuke bekhulumela emadwaleni olwazi olungaphelele.
Yinto yokucwaningwa kabanzi lena nokuzinika isineke futhi iphinde ibe ukuphathiswa kwakho, hhayi ukuzenzela.Ngakho baningi abantu abathintwe ngempade okungeyona, umuntu kuthi kudingeka ukuba adle impande yomndawe kodwa anikwe impande yesiNguni.
Lezi zinto azihlangani.Kukhona lapho ithongo lifuna izandla zowesifazane, kodwa usukeleke owesilisa akuthwasise, noma lifuna owesilisa owesifazane akuthwasise kuxabane konke.
Okukhulu wukuthi unayo yini leyo mpande efanele  edingwa yidlozi noma yithongo lalowo muntu?Okogogo bobabili, emndenini wangakubo kanina kwakukhona isalukazi esathwasa emanzini esingukhokho wonina  esivela siyisizukulwane sesihlanu saphuma nenyoka nezikhwana khona emanzini.
Lesi salukazi sasithwele abalozi ngqo, okwahamba sashona naso.
Akuphindanga kwaba khona okuvela kuyena kobunyanga.
Manje sesibuya ngalaba bazukulu, kodwa ukubuya kwaso sesibuya njengemimoya yeNdiki, okufanele sigezwe kubona.
Inkinga ukuthi ekugezweni kwabo kufanele bagezwe ngegazi lengwe, namaphakama amhlophe edlozi lomndawe, atholakala eMozambique kuphela.Kulapho-ke ogobela belahleke khona base bebona ithuba lokuthwasisa izalukazi.Lokhu kuyisifundo esikhulu sokuthi sibheke  ukuthi uma umuntu efika mpande yini ezomsiza, unayo yini, ngabe futhi usebenza ngaleyo mpande na?
Izigodlo eziningi uma ubuza impande ezisebenza ngayo kunzima, uthola ukuthi sithenga sonke khona laphaya eZimbuzini, kumbe koBerea, umuntu akakaze angene ngisho ehlathini ayoyibona ngamehlo impande imbiwa, namaphakama ukuthi akhiwa kanjani ehlathini.
Kokunye uphathisiwe yini leyo mpande nokuthi ukuphathiswa kwakho kwedlozi kuluhlobo luni?
Abantu abaningi bahlushwa idlozi lomndawe iningi lethu elithi siyakwazi ukulisebenza kanti libi ngokuthanda ukuzenzela.Ngakho qaphela, uma kuthiwa thwasa phakamisa izindlebe namakhala njengenyamazane, ngoba ayikho into ebuhlungu njengokuthi uhlupheke uze uyofa ngisho nesizukulwane sakho ngoba wenza okungekona.
Owakwenzisa uyobe engasekho uyobe ususele wedwa nezingane nesizukulwane sakho.Bhedlindaba “VVO” Ka La Phuzi MkhizeIsigodlo saseMlambomunye087 11 00 555.
Imfundo yethu kumele ibe nobunkipha bukoloni
IZIFUNDISWA ezimnyama futhi eziqavile zisakhala ngokuthi ulwazi olukhiqizwa emanyuvesi ase-Afrika, kumele luguqulwe lufane nolwabantu abamnyama abafundiswa khona.USolwazi Pikita Ntuli wake waphawula kwithelevishini ngokuthi amanyuvesi e-Afrika, ngokwezakhiwo akhona kodwa amanyuvesi obu-Afrika ngokwesiko-mpilo owekho eNingizimu Afrika.Amanyuvesi obu-Afrika kumele akhombise futhi aphakamise isiko-mpilo lase-Afrika emfundweni nasekuhlelweni kwawo.
Amanyuvesi obu-Afrika yiwo okumele akhiqize ulwazi nocwaningo oluqhakambisa ubu-Afrika kodwa ngeshwa awamaningi.
Amanyuvesi obu-Afrika kumele aphinde akhiqize ulwazi oluzolekelela ekuguqulweni kwezimo mqondo ezimbi ngezwekazi lethu, i-Afrika.
Akumele sibe namanyuvesi ase-Afrika kuphela.
Kumele sibe namanyuvesi obu-Afrika.
Izifundiswa ezimnyama okumele zenze lowo msebenzi azibonwa nangokhalo.Amanyuvesi e-Afrika okumele abe izizinda zokukhiqiza ulwazi afukanyelwe izifundiswa ezimpisholo ngokwebala kodwa ezivikela noma eziphatha isiko-mpilo laseNtshonalanga, njengezikhali zamaNtungwa.Isiko-mpilo laseNtshonalanga luvikelwa ngokuthi ulwazi olukhiqizwa kulezi zikhungo zemfundo ephakeme lunika udumo nenhlonipho kwizindlela zokucabanga nezokuphila zaseNtshonalanga.
Izindlela zase-Afrika zokucabanga nezokuphila zivezwa njengezidelelekile nezingabalulekile.
Kuyiqiniso elingephikwe ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika nase-Afrika jikelele, zisashoda kakhulu izifundiswa ezimnyama ezicabanga ngendlela yobu-Afrika emikhiqizweni yolwazi, phecelezi ucwaningo.
Singakusho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi ubuso balezi zifundiswa bumnyama bhuqe kodwa izimo-mqondo zazo zimhlophe.Injulalwazi uLious Althusser yake yabuza umbuzo onohlonze.
Yabuza ukuthi: “Yini efundwa izingane esikoleni?” Lowo mbuzo usabalulekile nanamhlanje.
Lombuzo ubaluleke ngoba lokho okufundiswa izingane ezikoleni kunomthelela omkhulu endleleni ingane noma umuntu azibona ngayo.UKarl Marx, wake wathi: “Laba abasemandleni ngokomnotho ezweni yibona abalawula imfundo nesiko-mpilo lesizwe.”Imfundo evuna ukubukelwa phansi kwabantu abamnyama idala ukuzibukela phansi ezinganeni.
Imfundo yethu eqinisweni isavuna abaseNtshonalanga njengesizinda sodwana sobuhlakani.
Ngoba njengokusho kukaMarx abasemandleni (abamhlophe), balawula ulwazi olukhiqhizwayo nolubonwa njengolubalulekile ezweni.
Kuzomele sizinuke amakhwapha sihlaziyisise ukuthi lemfundo esiyitholayo iyasisondeza yini na kubuthina njengama-Afrika?
Noma ilekelela kwisimo-mpilo elidume umhlaba wonke lokungathandwa kwethu njengabantu abampisholo.
Kungani iChina elifundile lingalahlekelwa ubuChina balo?
Kanye neNgisi elifundile alilahlekelwa ubuNgisi balo.
Yithina kuphela abantu bendlu emnyama abafunda babuye badedele okwabo.
Izifundiswa ezimnyama emanyuvesi zithi kumele kube ne-Decolonization ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.
Igama elikhulu futhi elisematheni kulezi zinsuku.
Konje yini uku-decolonizer ngesiZulu?
Kunzima ukuphendula lombuzo ngoba izifundswa zethu ezimnyama azikukhathaleli ukuchaza izinto ngolimi abantu abalizwayo.
Ngakho-ke, amagama esintu anaba ngalezingxoxo mpikiswano ebantwini ngolimi lwabo awekho.Kunamampunge asabalele ngamandla okuthi ukufunda kangcono nokuhlakanipha ukukwazi ukukhuluma isiNgisi kahle.
IsiNgisi esihle futhi esikhulu asichazi ukuthi uhlakaniphe kangcono.
Kumele sishintshe indlela esicabanga ngayo.
Siziqhenye ngobuthina nezilimi zethu.Uku-decolonizer, abanye bakubiza ngenkipha bukoloni.
Le nkipha bukoloni ichaza ukuthi njengabantu abamnyama kumele sizikhulule emakhamandeleni ezindlela zolwazi lwaseNtshonalanga.
Singavumi ukuthi abaseNtshonalanga basihambele phambili ekulobeni ngesiko-mpilo lwethu.
Ukuhanjelwa phambi njalo ngabaseNtshonalanga kufakazelwa indlela umlando wethu olotshwe ngayo.
Kungani umlando wethu oqukethwe emanyuvesi ukhiqizwe solwazi abamhlophe abanye abaphesheya?
Yihlazo lelo!
Kucace bha ukuthi lezo zifundiswa ezimhlophe ngeke zilande kahle ngomlando wethu.
Baphi abalobi nezifundiswa bakithi abazoloba ngathi, benathi?
Uphi umlando wamaZulu obhalwe amaZulu?
Kungaba ubuwula ukucabanga ukuthi ulwazi olukhiqizwe phesheya luyosiveza njengabantu abaphelele?
Imfundo nomlando wethu kumele kube nobunkipha bukoloni.
Imfundo enjalo imemezela ukuthi abantu abamnyama nabo bangabantu emhlabeni nezindlela zabo zinobuhlakani futhi ziphelele, azishodi ngalutho.
Imfundo enjalo iyovela ngathi akekho omunye oyosilamulela njengabampisholo.UKhanyile ufundisa e-Central University of Technology, Free State.

AbeRET mabashiye            i-ANC bakhe iqembu labo
MHLELI: Ake ngiphawule ngesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC esaziwa ngokuthi yiNEC nesinqumo saso sokucela abashushiswayo ngamacala enkohlakalo ukuba bazishenxele bona ezikhundleni noma baphoqwe ukuba bamiswe.
Lesi sinqumo ngisishayela ihlombe.
Sazi sonke ukuthi asizikhetheli abaholi kodwa sibhalelwa uhlu lwabazokhethwa.
Umbuzo wami uthi wubani lo mbhali walolu luhlu na?Kungani abaholi behamba bethi bakhethwe ngamagatsha ekubeni bezazi abakhethwanga ngamagatsha?
Akubuyiselwe amandla emagatsheni, ngikhuluma nje sinezimeya ezakhethwa wosomabhizinisi ngoba betshala imali yabo ukuze bahlomule amathenda.
Akungethusi ukufika kwenye yezimeya ehhovozi yathi kumakhansela sekuyisikhathi sensambatheka yento ebizwa ngeRadical Economic Transformation (RET) kanti kuzokwebiwa kusetshenziswa itemu leRET.Uma kungaphenywa ukuthi liqhamukaphi leli temu, ungathola ukuthi lasungulwa yiwo amaGupta lawa ngenhloso yokweba imali yethu eNingizimu Afrika.
Awasekho ke manje amaGupta, ashaye achitha nezikhwama zawo ezazishushunjiswa emagatsheni ukuze kukhethwe abaholi abafunwa yiwo.Yisikhathi senhlangano ukubuyisa uzinzo embuthweni.
Masethembe, emuva kwesinqumo seNEC, akekho osezonqatshelwa ubulungu.
Manje ngikhuluma nje, kunqantshelwe abantu abangaphezu kwamakhulu amathathu ubulungu eWard 78 ngoba kuhloswe ukubambelela emandleni okuphatha.Kunjena nje embuthweni, kwavunyelwa abaqoli bazicebisa nemindeni yabo, kumanje imizi yabo ungafunga ukuthi yizigodlo zobukhosi thizeni.Okumangazayo, kukhona abakujabulelayo lokhu abeRET.
Yisikhathi sabo manje sokuthi baphume iqembu labo lokweba imali yethu, bashiye i-ANC ngokuthula.
Ingamane ilahlekelwe yivoti kunokwebela abakhokhi bentela.

Yazi kabanzi ngeGEPF ungakathathi umhlalaphansi
UNGQONGQOSHE wezeziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, uphawule ngokuthi uhamba ngonyawo lonwabu umkhankaso kahulumeni wokudedela abasebenzi asebeneminyaka engaphezu kuka-55 ngesikhathi ethula isabelomali samaphakathi nonyaka ngo-Okthoba.
Akusimangazanga lokho thina esikulo mkhakha wokutshalwa kwemali nokuhlaziya ezomnotho ngoba lolu hlelo salubuka sangakholwa ukuthi lungethulwa luphothulwe esikhathini esifushane kangaka.
Kuningi okwakudingeka kwenzeke ngaphambi kokuba luqale.Okukhulu ukufundiswa kwamalungu esikhwama sempesheni kahulumeni iGEPF ngenqubomgomo yokuthatha impesheni ngaphambi kwesikhathi.Umbuzo esiwubuzwe abasebenzi bakahulumeni emasontweni edlule ngothi: “Uma senginikezwe imvume yokuthatha umhlalaphansi ongenanhlawulo, ngivumelekile yini ukuthatha isamba sami ngiyozitshalela sona?”Lo mbuzo ukuveze obala ukuthi abafundisiwe kahle abantu.
Kuzokhumbuleka ezifundweni esizethule ezingosini ezedlule ukuthi umuntu osebenza kuhulumeni unezindlela ezintathu zokonga imali yakhe uma eyeka ukusebenza.Ungathatha imadlana ethile ushiye ingxenye kwiGEPF ezoqhubeka ikuholele inyanga nenyanga uze ufe.Ungayithatha futhi imali uyifake enkampanini ezimele esiza abafisa ukonga imali yabo ngaphandle kwesamba sikahulumeni sempesheni.Ungayithatha yonke imali yakho uyifake ebhange bese uzilawula wena ekuyisebenziseni.Siye sabhala futhi nangobubi nobuhle bazo zonke lezi zindlela esizibalile.Okunye kwalokho yinhlawulo nezinsiza zokushiya imali kwiGEPF umuntu bese ehola ngenyanga.
Lapho sincome kakhulu uhulumeni ngesamba abhekela ngaso abamsebenzela baze badlule emhlabeni.
Kodwa okungekuhle wukuthi uma umuntu eshona eganiwe noma eganile, imali eholwa umyeni noma unkosikazi iyancipha ngesibalo esingu-50%.Angikuqinisekise ukuthi le mali akuyona imali eholwa ngoba kucatshangelwa izingane kodwa iqondene nabashadile.Sabuye saxoxa ngokuthi uma kwenzeka ngebhadi beshona kanyekanye abaganene, kulandelwa imigomo kahulumeni yomhlalaphansi.Ayikho imali yenyanga nenyanga eya emndenini uma beshone beneminyaka engaphezu kuka-55 futhi kungukuthi sebeneminyaka emihlanu bayeka emsebenzini.Lesi simo senza baphithane amakhanda abaningi.
Yisona esibavusele umbuzo othi uma nginikezwe imvume yokuthatha umhlalaphansi ongenanhlawulo ngingasihoxisa yini isinqumo sami sokwamukela lesi sinxephezelo?Siye saxhumana nabakwaGEPF abasichazele ukuthi uma ukhethe i-early retirement usuke usushade nohulumeni impilo yakho yonke.
Lokho besikwazi nathi.
Uma ufisa ukuhlukana nohulumeni ungathatha isamba sakho usiyise enkampanini efana neNkunzi Wealth Group noma kwabanye abazimele, noma uyifake ebhange.Manje umbuzo wokuhoxisa isinqumo sokuguqula uhlelo lokuhamba kwakho uphenduleke kanjani?
Kuthiwa uma ufisa ukubuyekeza isinqumo sakho ungaxhumana nomnyango wakwandabazabantu ufake isicelo sokumiswa kohlelo “olukushadisa nohulumeni”.
Uma isicelo sakho singakafiki kwaGEPF ePitoli, kungenzeka bamise inqubo yalo mshado bese ufaka incwadi kabusha yokwesula.Kubalulekile ukuthola ulwazi olunzulu ngoba kuningi ukuphambana kwemibono ngisho nakhona kwaGEPF.
Sikhuthaza abanemibuzo ukuba basithinte noma bathinte abakwaGEPF ukuze bachazeleke kahle.
* U-Owen Nkomo ungumqondisi nomsunguli we-Inkunzi Wealth Group.

Ngiyalwesaba usizi oluza nobuchwepheshe be-4IR
MHLELI: Ngibona kuyisikhathi sokuba sivule amehlo njengoba kungena ubuchwepheshe obubizwa ngeFourth Industrial Revolution (4IR) lapho izinto eziningi zizokwenziwa yimishini.Ukuba kuya ngami ngabe manje sesiyabona ukuthi kwakubalulekile ukufunda kwabadala senze izinto njengabo.Ngibona abantu abaningi bezophelelwa yimisebenzi ngenxa yokuthi lo mshini obizwa ngerobhothi ukwazi ukwenza imisebenzi yabantu abayishumi uwodwa ngehora elilodwa.Kuhle sibuyele kwesasikwenza emandulo silime sifuye ngoba bengibuka eminye yemishini ezofakwa ezimayini uma kumbiwa phansi.

Ikhwelo likaShenge alilalelwe esaphefumula
MHLELI: Ukubuyisana phakathi kwezinhlangano zombusazwe kubalulekile ngoba ukungezwani kuvimba indlela eya phambili.
UMntwana waKwaPhindangene, kade ayelishumayeli leli vangeli lokukhumelana umlotha.
Yebo kona baningi abadlula ngezikhathi zodlame kwi-IFP ne-ANC kodwa kumele impilo iqhubeke kwabasele ukuze kugwenywe isimo singaphinde senzeke.Owaba ngumengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu, uMnuz Nelson Mandela, emhlanganweni wokuqala ephumile ejele wathi makube noxolo izikhali ziphonswe olwandle.Abenhlangano yakhe bavuka umbhejazana kwathiwa ubulawa ukuguga.
Kulapho uMadiba abona khona ukuthi abantu ababenobuntu engakagwetshwa babengasekho.
Ababesekhaleni yibona futhi abaKwaZulu-Natal asebengabaholi namhlanje.
Akusikho ukuthi uMadiba uze wahamba emhlabeni engasiboni isidingo kodwa ubengaphansi kwengcindezi .Ukhombisile ngendlela abekhonze ngayo ubuholi bukaShenge ngokumbambisa isikhundla sokuba umengameli wezwe uma ephumile eNingizimu Afrika.
Ayekwenza kwakungehli kahle kosomathuba be-ANC.Wabamba elikhulu iqhaza ewuma emphinjeni umbuso wobadlululo; kukhona lapho owayengumengameli wombuso wobandlululo uMnuz P W Botha afuna ukuhlangana nabaholi abangawuthathanga uzimele geqe uMntwana wanqaba ukuya kulowo mhlangano.
Wathi ngeke aye engakakhululwa uMadiba nayegqunywe nabo ejele kuphinde kubuye abasekudingisweni.
Lokhu kwenzeke ngeminyaka yawo-1980.
UBotha waze wathi uShenge uzenza inkunzi ekhonyayo kwezinye esibayeni.Nango-1976 owabe eyimeya yaseSundumbili, eMandeni, uMnuz Gcaleka namakhansela angaphansi kwakhe bamnika inkululeko yaseMandeni, eSundumbili .
UMntwana wathi ufuna inkululeko mhla amabhunu akhulula ababesemajele noMandela nabasekudingisweni.
Wabuye wayichaza le nkulumo yakhe wathi ngeke abaholi bombuso wobandlululo bakhululeke; ngoba uma ucindezele umuntu umbambe ngobhongwane ngeke ube nethuba lokumdedela kube khona okuthathaya ngoba uzosala avuke.
Waqhubeka wathi nemali echitheka emingceleni yezwe iyokongeka ngoba siyobe singasekho isidingo sokuvimba ababethathwa njengamaphekula avukela umbuso.Kuyaxaka uma ebizwa ngomuntu owayehambisana nabacindezeli bamabhunu; bayalibala ukuthi waze waxoshwa eNyuvesi eFort Hare ngoba ezibandakanya ne-ANC.
Kwakuthi uma kuxoshwa abantu noma abafuna umsebenzi kuthiwe hambani niyowufuna kuButhelezi.Uwumuntu ongenanzondo.
Ngesikhathi bejikela owayengumengameli uMnuz Thabo Mbeki enhlanganweni yakhe wabakhuza wathi benza iphutha ngoba ungumengameli wabo bonke njengoba ephethe uMbuso kodwa-ke abamlalenga; kunjani namhlanje ePhalamende?
Mhla wathatha umhlalaphansi kuyoba yikwampunzi edla emini.Ngakho-ke kuyoba ngelikhulu iphutha uma kufika isikhathi lapho uMntwana ewelela khona kwelizayo amaqiniso engakhulunyiwe.

Luyinkinga uthando olwakhiwe ngomuthi
Distance GumedeNGIYAZI ukuthi singabantu senza izinto ngendlela engafani futhi sicabanga ngokungafani, kodwa ngiyafisa abantu bazijwayeze ukungayifaki imithi othandweni ngoba uthando olunomuthi phakathi aluphili kahle.
Akukhathaleki kungabe  usetshenziswa owesifazane okanye owesilisa.
Namhlanje ngifisa ukukhuluma nabantu abakhonze kakhulu ukusebenzisa imithi ukuze baqinise uthando noma ukuze benze uthando lusebenze.
Okokuqala kumele nazi ukuthi uthando umuzwa ozifikela wona akusiyo into ongayakha noma ongayiphoqa, yebo ngiyavuma ikhona imithi yokwakha uthando kodwa imvamisa lolo thando alupheli kahle ngoba kusuke kuwuthando lokuzakhela.
Uthando olwakhiwe ngomuthi luba nezinkinga eziningi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kokunye uthole ukuthi awusenayo imali yokulanda umuthi bese kuyaqala kuyamosheka okanye uthole ukuthi obumsebenzisela umuthi sebemvusile waphaphama umuthi awusazweli.Ngaphandle kokuthi umuntu osetshenziselwe umuthi ugcina esedansela esakho isigingci kodwa buningi ubungozi obungadalwa umuthi kuloyo muntu, okungaba ukuthi omunye uyamgulisa mhlawumbe aze ashone ngenxa yedliso, omunye umenze aphathwe isifuba esingapheli, omunye umphendule isilwane ngisho uthi uyochama afune ukuhamba nawe.Ngisho uya emcimbini ekhaya kini afune ukuhamba nawe agcine esekulusa engasafuni ngisho ubingelelwe abantu, isigcino akushaye uma ebona uhambisana nomuntu wobulili obungafani nobakho bese ekugcineni athi kungcono sife sobabili ngoba nginomona ngawe angifuni muntu eduze kwakho.Kuningi nokunye okungaba ingozi othandweni olwakhiwe ngomuthi, yingakho kubalulekile ukuzifundisa ukuthanda ngenhliziyo yakho nangothando olusuka ekujuleni, uma seluphelile futhi ungaphoqi isimo kodwa wamukele bese uqhubeka nempilo yakho.Ngiyazi sikhuluma nje baningi abantu abazitshela ukuthi basothandweni kanti olwamanga futhi lusazophela, ngiyafisa nalabo abazinikele ekwakheni uthando ngomuthi kube ukuthi sebeyayazi into abayifunayo nabayenzayo ngoba kubuhlungu ukudlisa ingane yomuntu uyiphendule isithithithi sakho ekugcineni uyilaxaze kanjalo ebese ilokhu ikulandela ngenxa yokuthi kunale nto owayifaka yona.Akusilona ke idliso elingena emlonyeni kuphela kodwa ziningi izinto ezenziwa abantu abomele ukuthandwa ngenkani.Abanye bashiqeka nezinto ezithweni zabo zangasese ukuze babe mnandi ngethemba lokuthi ngeke uthando luphele.Ngake ngasho ekuqaleni ngathi indoda iyakushiya noma umnandi, ngasho futhi ukuthi uthando lwakhiwa amagatsha amaningi ahlukahlukene, ayikho into eqinisa uthando ukudlula isimilo inhlonipho, ukuxhumana nokuzwana komoya negazi futhi nifane nabangani.Umuthi ningawufaki othandweni lwenu ngoba uzomosha izinto futhi inhlonipho nokunye kwalokhu engikubale ngenhla kungaqhamuki kumuntu oyedwa kodwa akuqhamuke nhlangothi zombili ngoba phela niyathandana.Ungazisebenzisela umuthi wakho uma ufuna ukuzihlanza wena ukuze ungabi nesigcwagcwa nakubantu futhi ukuze nezichitho zingangeni kalula kuwena ugcine usunesidina kumuntu wakho kodwa hhayi ukuthi uze uhambe impela uye enyangeni nesikhindi somuntu wakho sangaphansi ngoba uthi ufuna ezwe wena wedwa okanye induku ivuke uma elele nawe wedwa okanye uma nje eke wakhulunyiswa yindoda ethi iyamshela avele angene esikhathini ngokushesha.Lezo zinto ziyingozi ngoba zenza uhlale ungenamali kwazise phela wena usebenzela ukuthenga umuthi futhi zenza uthando luphele kabuhlungu impela.Asisebenzeni ngothando olukhona sikhohlwe olomuthi ngoba luchitha nesikhathi lunjalo nje.
I-NFP isalidinga ithuba lokukhombisa ubuqotho
MHLELI: ENingizimu Afrika angeke ukhulume ngepolitiki ungayibali iNFP noMengameli wayo uNkk Zanele Magwaza-Msibi uyathanda awuthandi.Ukusungulwa kwaleli qembu kwavula ikhasi elisha kwipolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika okwaba yiqembu lokuqala elathi lifika leza nokuhlukile okusha ebalazweni lepolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika.I-NFP iyiqembu lokuqala ukuphakamisa ukuthi abafundi abaphume ku-matric sebenezincwadi zokushayela mahhala, iNFP ingamavulandlela ngohlelo lwezolimo nokuxhasa imiphakathi ngogandaganda njengoba bonke omasipala sebekwenza, ukunakekela abangenabani.
Kumele siwazise umphakathi waseNingizimu Afrika lelo qiniso.Siyiqembu lokuqala ukuveza singafihli ukuhlonipha ubuholi bomdabu amakhosi nezinduna nokuhlonipha iqhaza labo emiphakathini yasemakhaya.Ukuqoqa okungenhla siyiqembu elikhuluma ngezinto ezithinta abantu ngqo, asikhulumi ngemilingo eshiwo ngabanye uma bekhankasa.Phezu kwazo zonke izinselelo esesibe nazo njengeqembu kusuka ngo-2014 kuhlabeka umengameli wethu ngokugula, 2016 sangangena okhethweni lwemikhandlu, kube wu-2017 abanye abazibiza ngabaholi befaka iqembu enkantolo kwaze kwazaleka ubambimbiswano ngomyalelo wenkantolo olwalubizwa nge-INEC noma Interim National Executive Committe eyasiyisa engqungqutheleni ngoDisemba 2019.
Siyababonga nabaholi ababeyibambe lapho kuze kube manje.Nakulo nyaka uphindile futhi uMlotshwa nahambisaba nabo basifaka enkantolo bethi ababazi ubuholi beqembu.
Uma besho nakulokhu amalungu eNFP asathembekile siyabonga kakhulu sengingasho ngithi sekuyantwela ezansi maduze nje leya NFP yango-2011 izobuya uma sekuhambe ababulali bayo.Zithembe NgobeseEnquthu
Kumqoka ukuthembana uma silwa nobhubhane
MHLELI: Ngithanda ukudlulisa umbono wami ngomgomo weCovid-19.Sekusuke enkulu inkulumo mpikiswano ngendaba yomgomo weCoronavirus.
Uhulumeni wakithi akakaphawuli ngalokhu.Kuningi abantu abakushoyo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngendaba yamakhambi okuvikela nokwelapha iCoronavirus.Yize singakugqugquzeli ukuthi uhulumeni aphendule yonke into eshiwo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, lokhu sibona sengathi kumele angenelele eze nezincazelo ezizogculisa isizwe ngale mishanguzo.Abantu abaningi abanakho ukucaciseleka kahle ngamakhambi okuzivikela nawokwelapha izifo.
Abanye baye babone kufana.
Lokhu-ke kunobungozi ngoba uma uhulumeni engabacaciseli, ngeke banqabe ukugonywa kuphela, bazogcina sebenqaba namakhambi okwelapha.Lokhu kuyosibeka kwenkulu inkinga ngoba kuyoba nzima ukusiza abantu abangasathembi lutho eqhamuka ezibhedlela ezelapha lesi sifo.Kuzogcina sekunzima nokufundisa abantu ngalesi sifo uma sebeze bakholwa wukuthi lesi isifo ngesakhiwe.Njengamanje iNingizimu Afrika iyingxenye yamazwe enza ucwaningo ngamakhambi amane okungenzeka alaphe lesi sifo.
Lolu cwaningo olwaziwa ngeSolidarity Trial luholwa yiNhlangano yezeMpilo eMhlabeni jikelele.Lolu cwaningo lufake la makhambi: Remdesivir, Chloroquine noma Hydroxy Chloroquine, Lopinavir neRitonavir, Lopinavir ehamba neRitonavir kanye ne-InterferonBeta-1a.Lolu cwaningo lwenziwa emazweni amaningi ehlukene, kumele uhulumeni abachazele kabanzi ngalo abantu ukuze kungabi bikho ukusola.
Uma siqhubeka kanje, abanye bazogcina bewenqaba nawo la makhambi yize kunobufakazi bokuthi ayasebenza.Ubungozi obukhulu obukhona, ngobokuthi noma angatholakala amakhambi okuzivikela kulesi sifo, kuyoba nzima ukugculisa abantu bakithi ukuthi ngempela leli khambi liyasebenza.Lokhu kuyobeka ingcindezi enkulu kubasenzi bezempilo, okuyibona okumele banike abantu la makhambi.Uhulumeni kumele ayicacise le nto, ngoba uma eqhubeka eyiziba izodala umonakalo omukhulu, abantu bazokholwa yilokhu abakuzwa ngalabo abangabambisani nala makhambi.
Abantu bazongamethembi uhulumeni, nakho konke akushoyo.Leli yithuba lokuba abaholi bafundise abantu ngocwaningo olwenzekayo emhlabeni ngalesi sifo, bese beyaveza ukuthi lusithinta kanjani thina lolu cwaningo.
Uma silwa nobhubhane, kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthembana.Sanele NgcoboEPITOLI

MHLELI: Ngithi ake ngidlulise kwelakho iphephandaba ngezinkinga nenkohlakalo okusihlasele eMlaza kodwa abantu bathule sengathi akonakele lutho.Konakele futhi ngendlela okuyiyona le nto isidinga umphakathi ukuthi uzithathele wona ngokwawo umthetho ngoba kule nto kungene kwathi shi abantu bezomthetho.Kunabantu abahamba beqola abantu imizi noma amakhaya.

Abashenxe omkhulu nogogo ePhalamende badedele intsha
MHLELI: Kwelakho kangisaqondi ukuthi kwenzakani eMzansi.

Abanye abantu kuya ngokuya badonsa kanzima.

Babengayanga nasesikoleni kungakaphathi i-ANC?
Sekwanele kwaphatha i-ANC noma kufuneka ozokwakha izindlu zangasese, sekufuneka ono-matric.

Ngisho abasebenza ezitolo sekufuneka wona ngokunjalo nakonogada.

Thanda Mnikaziwempuphu Chonco KWESAKWAMTHETHWA
Kumele seseke intsha yakuleli futhi siyilalele ukuthi ifunani
NAMHLANJE iNingizimu Afrika igubha usuku lwentsha.
NgoJuni 16 kusuke kukhunjulwa ukuzidela kwabafundi baseSoweto, ababezabalaza nokwaholela ekutheni abanye abafundi babulawe ngamaphoyisa, ngesikhathi bebhikishela isiphakamiso sokuthi kufundwe ngolimi lwesiBhunu.Izinselelo ezibhekene nentsha yanamhlanje azifani nalezo zango-1976.
Ngeshwa nentsha yamanje isabhekana nokucwaswa ngokwebala njengoba sibonile kugonyuluka abafundi abafunda ezikoleni zabelungu lapho abafundi babantu abamnyama besuke beyingcosana khona.Kuyadabukisa ukuthi ngo-2020 kusaliwa impi yebala kodwa le mpi isazoqhubeka uma kusazothi kukhulunywa ngayo kujahwe ukumbambatha, kube ngabacwasi abashaya imithetho yokuthi kumele siyikhulume kanjani le ndaba futhi kube khona abathi abantu abamnyama bayathanda ukukhala ngokucwaswa isidingo singekho.Ngaphezu kokucwaswa ngokwebala inselelo enkulu intsha yanamhlanje ebhekene nayo ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi.Miningi imizamo ekhona yokulwa nalokhu kushoda kwemisebenzi kodwa ziningi ezinye izinto eziyimixhantela yakho ezidinga ukulungiswa ukuze imizamo izothela izithelo.Eminye yale mixhantela ububha, ukungalingani kwemfundo etholwa yintsha yaseNingizimu Afrika, ukungafinyeleli kwamathuba kuyona yonke intsha, ukungabi bikho kwengqalasizinda kwezinye izingxenye zezwe, ukungabi nolwazi ngokushintsha kwezinto nomthelela wezobuchwepheshe, ingcindezi intsha ebhekene nayo nezinye izimo zempilo.Kuyadingeka ukuthi uma kukhulunywa ngokusiza intsha kubhekwe yonke into hhayi uhlangothi ololudwa kuphela.
Kumqoka nokuthi kukhunjulwe ukuthi abantu abathandi izinto ezifanayo ngakho akungathi uma kubekwa etafuleni iziphakamiso ngezinto ezingasiza intsha kwenziwe lokho ngendlela eyodwa noma kucatshangwe ukuthi wonke umuntu kumele lokhu okuphakanyiswayo kumsebenzele.
Akuyona yonke intsha efuna ukuzisebenza, akuyona yonke efuna ukusebenza ngezobuchwepheshe futhi akuyona yonke ezosebenza kwezikaqedisizungu.
Asiyeseke intsha ngendlela ezosiza yona futhi asizwe kuyona ukuthi iyiphi indlela edinga ukusizwa ngayo.
Asixazulule izinkinga, siyeke ukulwa sodwa singama-Afrika
MHLELI: Ngithanda ukuzwakalisa uvo lwami.
Mayelana nendaba ephume kwiSolezwe ngomhlaka-6 Septhemba.
Isihloko besithi: Kuvalwa izitolo zabokufika ngenxa yokwesaba.

Kungabe sisadiniwe ukuthi bahleli kule lizwe noma sesiyabantshontshela okungokwabo, abafike bazakhela kona mabefika kuleli?

Masifunde ukonga imali nokugwema izikweletu
NGIYATHEMBA ningene kahle onyakeni omusha.
Konje nithe uyanicika lo mbuzo?
Pho sizokwenzanjani ngoba sesijwayele ukubuzana phela ukuthi singene kanjani?Sethemba ukuthi imali isekhona emabhange akekho ozosibelesela ngeklabishi nophuthu, ngoba imali siyisebenzisa kahle.Ngiyacela njengoba kuqala unyaka sihlele kahle imali yethu, ukuze sazi izidingo ezinqala, izinto ezingenasidingo esichitha kuzo imali, siphinde songe.Kubuhlungu ukubona abantu beme kolayini abade ababheke komashonisa beyoboleka imali yokuya emsebenzini neyokuthenga umfaniswano wesikole sezingane.Ngangicelile ngoDisemba ukuthi, anothi uma senithenga inyama, iziphuzo negilosa bese nithenga nomfaniswano wesikole.Kulo nyaka ngicela sizwane nabangani esizodlala nabo izitokofela zokulondoloza imali.
Ngisho noma ungaqala ngokubeka uR100 ngenyanga, leyo mali iyawenza umehluko.Imali ayibekwa ngumuntu osebenzayo kuphela kodwa nabahola imali yesibonelelo kahulumeni bangabeka noma uR20 ngenyanga, ozokwazi ukubalekelela ezidingweni zabo.Ngiphatheka kabi uma ngibona odadewethu begcwele ezinxanxatheleni zezitolo uma kuphela inyanga, sekungene imali.Ngiye ngizibuze ukuthi ngabe babeka malini nokuthi baphoqelekile yini ukuyokhithiza ngosuku lokuqala enyangeni.Kulo nyaka ngiyacela ukuthi sonke sifunde ukulondoloza imali, lokho okuncane esikutholayo kufanele sikucaze kahle kube khona imali esiphila ngayo nemali esiyilondolozayo.Siyazi ukuthi umnotho wezwe awukhuli kahle ngakho kudingeka ukuthi sonke sizame ukuwuhlelela ngokucophelela.
Okokuqala esingakwenza wukuthi sizame ukonga imali bese sisukuma siyofesa sifune imisebenzi noma sivule amabhizinisi ethu.Akusimina ngedwa onigqugquzelayo ukuthi nonge imali, nesazi kwezomnotho kwa-Efficient Group, uMnuz Dawie Roodt, sicele abantu ukuthi bonge ngoba izwe lingase lingene kwinzikamnotho.URoodt uthe abantu bakuleli bakweleta uR1.8 trillion, okusho ukuthi abaningi abakwazi ukuzikhokhela kahle izikweletu zabo.Ngiyanicela ukuthi nibophe izifociya, ningaboleki imali komashonisa ngoba vele ngeke yande imali uma sekuphela inyanga, zamani ukuphila ngamasentshana akhona njengamanje.Kubalulekile ukuthi sizazi izimo zethu sezikweletu ukuze sizihlelele ukuzikhokha ngesikhathi esifanele nokuthi sikwazi ukuthenga enye impahla ezosakhela ikusasa elingcono.Uma ufuna ukwazi ngesimo sakho sezikweletu ungathinta izinhlangano ezihlukene okubalwa iTransUnion ku-0861 482 482 noma ku-www.transunion.co.za naku-www.clearscore.com*Ngiyaphinda ngiyanixwayisa ngokutshala imali ezinkampanini ezinithembisa inzuzo engakholakali.
Uma ningenaso isiqiniseko sokuthi inkampani enitshala kuyo imali isemthethweni noma cha ngicela nithinte iFinancial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA) okuyiyona elawula izinkampani ezisebenza ngemali eNingizimu Afrika.I-FSCA itholakala ku-0800 110 443 noma ngokuvakashela iwebsite yayo ethi www.fsca.co.za.
*Ngithintwe ngumthengi obefuna ukuthenga igolide kwenye inkampani manje efuna ukwazi ukuthi ngabe isemthethweni yini.-Uma inkampani ithi idayisa igolide noma okunye okumbiwa phansi ngiyacela nithinte iFSCA nibone ukuthi leyo nkampani ivunyelwe yini ukudayisa leyo mpahla ethi iyayidayisa nokuthi umsebenzi ewenzayo usemthethweni yini.-Mina ngazi ukuthi igolide limbiwa ezimayini kodwa zikhona nezinkampani okuthiwa zinegunya lokulidayisa kuhle ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi zivumelekile ukwenza lo msebenzi ngaphambi kokutshala imali yakho kuzona.
*NgoDisemba bengifonelwa ngabantu bekhala ngezitolo ezibadayisela ukudla okubolile nefenisha engekho sesimeni esifanele.-Uma udayiselwe ukudla okubolile kubalulekile ukuthi uqale ufake isikhalo kuleso sitolo esikudayisele ukudla okubolile.
Uthinte nehhovisi labathengi baso ngaphambi kokuthi ungishayele ucingo.
Mina ngingenelela uma kuwukuthi abakusizi ngalutho.-Uma uthenge ifenisha engekho esimeni esikahle nakhona kufanele uqale ufake isikhalo esitolo.
Uma bengakusizi, usungaxhumana nami.-Ungayithinta iConsumer Goods and Services Ombudsman (CGSO) etholakala ku-0860 000272 noma ku-www.cgso.org.za* Uma unenkinga edinga usizo lwezabathengi ungathumela i-email [email protected]
Ziningi izindawo ezidinga ukuhlanjululwa ngokwesintu
Lihle iqiniso, asingalokhu siya le nalena, ngabe sithi liyafa izwe?
Selifile.
Sesifike esikhathini lapho kufanele singama-Afrika sizibuze ukuthi inkululeko esasiyilwela ngakube eyokuhlala nokuthenga imizi yabelungu, ukuba sezikhundleni ababeziphethe noma kwabe kungukukhululeka kwemimoya yamathongo ase-Afrika, namagugu akhona njengalokhu saphucwa sakhohliswa ngakho?
Ngakube kwakungukubuyela emuva ezindleleni esasenza ngazo esathelwa ngobhici sangabe sisazibona?
Kuningi esingakubuza kulokhu esikubiza ngenkululeko.
Sithi izingane zethu zifunda ezikoleni zabamhlophe, zikhuluma isingisi, olwazo ulimi ziyalwesaba, luyasehlisa, sifunda amaphephandaba ezinye izilimi awethu do.Le mibuzo ngiyibuza ngoba izwe lithathwe labekwa ezandleni zomuntu omnyama okunguyena owalahlekelwa kodwa uma ubheka konakala ezandleni zakhe futhi nguyena okhuthaza ukonakala okwenzekayo.
Ngokwesintu sase-Afrika kwakuthi uma kuvele isehlakalo endaweni noma inxiwa lelo lingcolisekile, lalihlanjululwa.
Uma abababili kade bengabonanga ngaso linye kwakhona umsindo nokuxabana kwenziwe usiko lokuthelelana amanzi ukuze nezidalwa ezilele zibuyise izibusiso ezase zilahlekile.Ngikusho lokhu ngoba izwe liya ngokuya lishona phansi ngenxa yomlando ongazange walungiseka sesithe sikhululekile.
Ngesonto eledlule singakayi kude, bukela insambatheka eyenzeke ePhalamende.
Kuthiwa uwayengumengameli ngesikhathi sobandlululo, uMnu FW de Klerk, akaphume ePhalamende.
Lowo ongumengameli wamabhizinisi kahulumeni naye akaxoshwe.
Umbuzo engisale nawo emuva kwakho konke okwenzekile, ngakube bayimbangela yini yokuthi izwe nomnotho walo kube la kukhona namhlanje?
Impendulo ithi cha.
Ucha wami umi ekutheni sathatha izintambo zikahulumeni kunezindawo eziningi ezazingcolisekile namhlanje eseziyinkinga.Umnuz Pravin Gordhan njengamanje nguyena owengemele wonke amabhinisi kahulumeni.
Izinkinga zala mabhizinisi zisuka la: inkampani yezindiza, i-SAA yayithwala izikhali zokuyobulala okwakuthiwa amaphekulazikhuni, aphinde agibelise bona ababeyothatha izinqumo zokubulala ababelwelwa inkululeko.
IDenel yakha izikhali zokubulala amaphekulazikhuni, inhlangano yokusakaza iSABC yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlwanyela amanga ngokwenzekile, kwabe kungumshini wamanga wamabhunu.
I-Eskom kwabe kuyingodla kagesi owawukhanyisela bona kuphela, iTransnet eyingxenye ngezinqola zokuthutha esasingakwazi, nazo izikhali.Umbuzo uthi zonke lezi zikhungo zahlanjululwa yini?
Ngesikhathi uhulumeni usudlulela kwabamnyama kwakukhona konke lokhu kungcola.
Nabo abamnyama qobo bahlenzekile yini izandla zabo ngokwemindeni yabo?Kuningi okwenzeka ePhalamende.
Umengameli owuphahla nensika yobandlululo, uVerwoerd, wabulawelwa khona ePhalamende.
Lagezwa sathathwa isithunzi sakhe?
Imithetho eminingi yobandlululo beyishayelwa kulo.
Uma sekungena thina abamnyama kunhlanjuliliwe lokho?Ibhilidi likahulumeni, i-Union Building namhlanje okumiswe isithombe sikaMandela emagcekeni alo, lihlanjululiwe?
Ave isithombe sikaMandela simiswe phezu kokungcola kwangaleso sikhathi?Bukela okwenzeka emanyuvesi.
Sijabule sagxuma sabheka phezulu kuthiwa emanyuvesi sekuzofundwa ndawonye.
Ayephethe izifundiswa ezimhlophe ezazingafuni lutho.
Uyakhumbula eWits usolwazi omhlophe owaziwisa ebhilidini wancamela ukuzibulala inyuvesi izophathwa ngomnyama?
E-DUT namhlanje kufa abafundi belekanyana, akukho lutho olwenziwayo kwenzenjani?
Ngabe ngumlando noma ngabaphathiswe lenyuvesi?
Zikhona izimpendulo zakho konke lokhu.
Ngiyishiya kuwena umfundo uyetshise.Bhedlindaba
Akuqiniswe ezokuphepha emanyuvesi
MHLELI: Ake ngiphawule ngalolu daba lokungaqini kwezokuphepha ezikoleni ngoba maningi amacala asebikiwe mayelana nezitshudeni ezishonela emagcekeni esikole okuyinto engayinhle ngoba abazali basuke bethembe ukuthi izingane zabo zivikelekile.Siyizitshudeni sibhekene nezinkinga eziningi sizizwa singaphephile emanyuvesi.
Sekukaningi sizwa kuthiwa isitshudeni silimale singaphakathi enyuvesi.Kushone isitshudeni eDUT ngenxa yodlame nokungabibikho kwezokuphepha eziqinile futhi akukho okwenzekayo noma izinyathelo azithathiwe ukukhombisa ukuthi bazoboshwa ababulele isitshudeni.
Kungasijabulisa ukuthi abasezikhundleni kuhulumeni bangenele kulolu daba ngoba kubonakala sengathi bayahluleka abaphathi benyuvesi.Okubuhlungu wukuthi konke lokhu okwenzekile kwenzeke emakilasini okufunda.
Sesiyesaba nokuyofunda ngoba sizizwa singavikelekile futhi nabazali bethu bathukile ngalesi sigameko.
Kunzima uma sekwenzeka izinto ezifana nalezi.Emanyuvesi nasezikoleni kumele kunyuswe izinga lezokuphepha ukuze izitshudeni zivikeleke nokufunda kuqhubeke kahle.Sanelisiwe WenziETHEKWINI
Limuncu leli hlaya lamaphoyisa kamasipala

Umbuzo wami uthi ameleni laphaya njengoba ezihlalele ngaphakathi ezimotweni esikhundleni sokuthi ahlele ukuhamba kwezimoto kwisiminyaminya?

Inceku ihlulwe wumona ngoBeekay
MHLELI: Kwelakho eliyaye likhombise ukungachemi nelifundwa ngabantu abaningi ngenxa yolimi olunothile, ngiyacela ukuba ungiphe isikhandlana ngikhulise uzakwethu uMbhishobhi Themba Chonco ngakubhalile kwelakho lapho ethe khona “Alubhekisiswe uhlelo lukaBeekay.’’ Kuyiqiniso ukuthi inkomo iyalushayelwa ubisi lwayo.Emva kokufunda udaba olubhalwe nguGambushe nokuwumbono wakhe, yebo kuleli lizwe sinelungelo lokubeka imibono yethu kodwa ayingadumazi-ke abanye.
Uyabona lo mbono kaGambushe uyangidumaza ngoba uphuma kwinceku ezwakala ihlulwa wumona yaze yawukhiphela ngaphandle.Mhlawumbe Gambushe kuzofanele wazi ukuthi uhlelo lukaBeekay Mchunu (osesithombeni) akazisuseli yena ekhanda kepha usuke enikwe indlela ewumhlahlandlela eyinikwa umphathizinhlelo.
Uyabona umphathizinhlelo wayizama le ndlela yokufaka uDr Mahaye ekutheni asibuyisele esintwini nebala kwenzeka ngempela njengoba abalaleli balwamukela ngesasasa uhlelo lukaMchunu.Okunye okumele ukwazi Gambushe wukuthi lolu hlelo luwuhlelo olulalelwa kakhulu ekubeni lungena ngeSabatha kanye nje vo futhi lulele isithathu ezinhlelweni zoKhozi FM ngokulalelwa.Angithandi ingane yomuntu siyidlele umona nceku ngemisebenzi yayo emihle, empeleni njengoba mina nawe sizinceku simelwe ukuhalalisa imisebenzi emihle eyenziwayo.Angifuni ukuthi uMchunu asizwe kabi singabalaleli bakhe ngoba izinkomba zithi mina nawe siyamlalela okusho ukuthi uyasinika lokhu esikudingayo.Kumele engabe abalandeli bamaNazaretha bayakhala ngokuthi banikwa usuku olulodwa okuyaye kube yiSabatha ekubeni ezinye izinkolo zinikwa inkonzo yangesonto, kunokuba bakhale bayamemana.Sengiphetha uboke uvakashe eBuhleni uyolunguza ukuthi amasiko esintu kawekho yini kuleli bandla.Uma uphika Gambushe uthi iNazareth Baptist Church akusilo isonto eliphethe isintu, lilethe lelo phambili ukuze uBeekay alicubungule.Khabzela “KB” MzimelaEZWELIBOMVU
ILotto ngeke isathenjwa
MHLELI: Ake ngiveze umbono wami ngophenyo lweSpecial Investigation Unit (SIU), ngokusebenza nokwenzeka kwiLotto.
Njengoba iSIU imatasa iqoqa ulwazi lwamakhompyutha nemiqingo kwiLotto, ngineqiniso lokhuthi uphenyo balwenza ngoba bazi ukuthi vele amantshontso kade kwase edliwa.Lokhu kufumbathisana kuthiwa bekwenziwa ngamalungu asezikhundleni eziphezulu egixabeza abangani nezihlobo zawo imali.
Ngicabanga ukuthi yinto ekhona leyo sekuyikho nje ukuqoqa ubufakazi bese ziyochithana enkantolo.
Njengoba uphenyo luzogxila eminyakeni ewu-6 eyedlule, ngibona lokhu kuzokwenza iLotto ingathenjwa kakhulu kunakuqala.
Kodwa Ithuba, elengamele iLotto lapha eNingizimu Afrika, lizongathenjwa ukusebenza kwalo.
Ngikusho lokhu ngoba Ithuba alikaqedi ngisho iminyaka ewu-10 lisebenzisana nabakwaLotto.
Yingakho abantu bezoyingabaza iLotto neThuba.
Phela kuthiwa kayinuki ingosiwe.
Sesobabona bevela enkantolo abayosile, cishe abanye kade bengakayidli, abanye sebeyidlile ngalokho-ke bayobe badle icala benobhululu babo.
Kade besikelana amantshontso benqakisana nangamathenda, kungalandelwa indlela eqondile yokuwakhipha kwawo.
Sengathi kungavela konke okuyiqiniso ngalezi zinsolo.
Okubi nje wukuthi isithunzi nokwethenjwa kweLotto kuzokwehla kubantu.
Kuyangijabulisa nokho ukuthi abakwaLotto bahlezi bebuyisela emphakathini.
Phela kuvamile ukuba baxhase izinhlangano ezingayenzi inzuzo.
Nezikole banakho ukuzixhasa ngokulungisa ingqalasizinda yokudlala nangemifaniswano yokudlala.
Bayaxhasa nangezinto ezifana nemitapo yolwazi enobucwepheshe besimanje, okuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu leyo ukunciphisa umthwalo emahlombe kahulumeni.
Likhulu kakhulu iqhaza elidlalwa yiLotto emphakathini.
Kodwa iqiniso kwabanukwayo kumele livele futhi lizovela.Ngiyayithanda nendlela iSIU, amaHawks nophiko lwezokushushisa abaphapheme ngayo kule minyaka embalwa edlule.
Phela lezi zinhlaka kade sezifana nenja engenamazinyo.Sibahle NgobeseENQUTHU

UKhongolose uchizela abavoti bakhe
Mhleli: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele, ngenhlonipho ngiyacela ukudlulisa ilaka lami ngempatho esiyitshengiswa yiqembu elibusayo.Kuyacaca manje ukuthi ukungasebenzi kwentsha ezweni uhulumeni ukwenza ihlaya.UMengameli wezwe uthembise abantu izijumbana zokudla ukuze bathibe indlala, waphinde wabathembisa umhlomulo kaR350 engikhuluma nje kukhona abangakazitholi izimpendulo ngezicelo zabo, bebe bathenjiswa.Kuyadabukisa ukubona iqembu elibusayo lichizela abavoti balo ngalolu hlobo.Yayiqinisile ingwevu kwezokuhlaziya ipolitiki, uSolwazi Somadoda Fikeni, uma ithi abanye abantu bavotela igama leqembu kanti abanye bavotela izenzo zalo.Ngikusho lokhu ngoba kucacela ngisho ingane encane manje ukuthi uKhongolose ukhohliwe abavoti kodwa bafumbathisana bodwa emahhovisi thina emakhaya sibulawa indlala nevoti lethu.Kuyobaphinda okwabehlela mhla iDemoratic Alliance (DA) ikhala yemuka neNelson Mandela Bay neTshwane.Kwakuyizo izimpiko lezi esezibavale amehlo manje.
