Makubanjiswane.Ngicela umnyango wezempilo ulibuyekeze kabusha uhlaka oluzongena emakhaya luzosihlolela iCoronavirus.
Sinemibuzo yokuthi ngabe umnyango wezempilo ikakhulu lapha eGauteng ubathathephi labo abazosebenza, ubaqashe nini wabaqeqesha nini?
Futhi usebenzise ziphi izindlela ukubaqasha?
Ngicela lubuyekezwe lolu hlelo ukuze kusizakale bonke abantu ikakhulu abawalambele amathuba omsebenzi.
Kungakuhle kuthathwe i-ward ne-ward ngokukamasipala.Ngiyanxusa futhi bahlolwe ukuthi baphile kahle yini kwabona uqobo abanalo yini igciwane ukuze izwe lingatheleleki.
Ngisamile ekunxuseni isizwe ukuba sithobele umyalelo kamengameli wezinsuku ezingu-21 nemibandela yakhona.Madoda YendeEGOLI
Anoqaphela izicagogwana zamaqembu okhethweni
Uma kusondela izinketho, ziningi izigigaba ezivelayo ezinye zazo wukukhandwa kwamaqembu amasha isigubhukane ukuze nabasunguli awo bacoshacoshe emavotini ukuze badle bacwebezele izisu.
Nokho-ke angikho lapho.Njengelungu lokuqina leNFP, ngithi angikhuze bonke laba abakhanda izipaza zamaqenjana abo ukuthi abahlukane nokuthi uma bekhuluma nabezindaba bathi bavela kuNFP.Ngizobhekisa kakhulu eqenjini le-ABC naleli elethulwe ngesonto eledlule elibizwa nge-Apemo.Ngiyabaxwayisa ukuthi abadlale ibhola bangadlali indoda.
Le politiki yabo ayisasebenzi, abangafundi ukuma ngeNFP.
Amaqembu abo awekho ezingeni leNFP.
Kuyaziwa ukuthi iNFP ingunombolo-5 ngokwezibalo zabavoti nokumeleleka kuzwelonke ePhalamende.
I-ABC ne-Apemo kabekho ndawo, siyoqala ukubabiza ngamaqembu ezepolitiki angempela uma sebemelelekile ngokwezihlalo ePhalamende.
Okwamanje sisengasho ukuthi basengamaqhumamponjwana amaqembu.Abalandeli be-ABC ne-Apemo baye emaqenjini abo bevele bengasekho kwaNFP, bebevele sebentunta nendishi.
Ngakho belu ukungaphatheki, sebekhande izicagogwana zokududuza ebebezibiza “Ngomngani womngani wami”.
Ngifisa ukubakhumbuza ukuthi iNFP yehlula Inkatha Freedom Party ukuyiqeda.
Izinhlelo zonke zethu ziyaqhubeka.
Ngiyabonga.

I-Eff ifike kwezwakala yadlondlobala
I-EFF kulo nyaka ibigubha iminyaka eyisikhombisa selokhu yasungulwa ngo-2013 kodwa uma singabheka amagalelo esiwakhombisile, ungathi yinhlangano ekade yaba khona.Uma sibheka ukudlondlobala kwayo, kubonakale ngokuthi ikhuphule isibalo sayo samalungu ayimele eziShayamthetho nasePhalamende eCape Town.Ngo-2014, okwakuwunyaka wokhetho lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe, KwaZulu-Natal yahlomula ngezihlalo ezimbili kuphela, kwathi kuzwelonke yaba neziwu-25.Ngonyaka odlule KwaZulu-Natal ivuke nezihlalo eziyisishiyagalombili, kwathi kuzwelonke yathola eziwu-44.Lapha kubalwa nesibalo samakhansela elibe nawo ngo-2016, abalelwa ngaphezu kuka-800 ezweni lonke, KwaZulu-Natal bathola awu-64.Lokho kukhomba ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bayakholelwa kuyo.
IsiZulu sithi ingwe idla ngamabala.
Lokhu kufakazelwa yindlela edlondlobala ngayo ngokwezibalo.
Lokhu kuwubufakazi bokuthi isenza lokhu abantu abakudingayo nokubathokozisayo.Ngesikhathi isungulwa, abahlaziyi nabaphrofethi bamanga abayinikanga thuba, bathi izoshabalala kuhle kwamazolo ebona ilanga.Baze bayifanisa nezinye izinhlangano ezasungulwa ngaphambi kwayo.Ikhombisile kodwa ukuthi ize kule ndima yazi kahle ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika badingani.Ukufika kwe-EFF kwenze abantu abansundu babuyelwa yithemba ngoba iyabalwela ezimeni okubalwa kuzo ukuhlukunyezwa emsebenzini nasekucwasweni ngokwebala.Sekube nezinto eziningi esezenzekile okubalwa kuzo isitolo esakhangisa izimpahla zokugqoka i-H&M eyayilulaza isithunzi somuntu omnyama.Ukungenelela kwe-EFF kwenza lesi setolo sehlela ngezansi saxolisa ezweni ngesenzo saso.Muva nje isitolo iClicks sikhiphe isikhangiso esasibukela phansi isithunzi somuntu omnyama.Lokho kubange ukuthi kube khona imibhikisho, lesi sitolo savalwa izwe lonke.
Konke lokhu i-EFF ikwenza ngokulwela ibala lomuntu omnyama, ingakhathalele ukuthi ungowaliphi iqembu lezepolitiki.Yiso lesi sizathu esenza ukuthi ngithi ingene kulo mdlalo wepolitiki seyazi ukuthi izokwenzani futhi konke ekwenzayo ikwenza ngempumelelo.Umbuzo ongaqhamuka ngothi izenzo zayo zibenzelani abantu baseNingizimu Afrika?Ngabe sizobona le nhlangano idlondlobala isuka ekubeni yiqembu lesithathu elikhulu ekulawulweni kwezwe iba ngelesibili noma ngelokuqala na?Uma kodwa ubheka lapho isuka khona nesikhathi esikusona njengamanje, kuyabonakala ukuthi isithunzi somuntu omnyama sibonakala sivikeleka kakhulu, nabantu bebuyelwa yithemba.Sengiphetha nje, ngithi ngabe kuzokwenzekani okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya okulindeleke ukuthi lube ngonyaka ozayo?Ngabe ekwenzile i-EFF phambilini kuzoyizuzisa amavoti amaningi?Konke sekulele kubavoti ukuthi ngabe bafuna ivoti labo libenzeleni.Khumbulani NeneIkhansela le-EFF eMgungundlovu
Kubalulekile ukuphepha ezikoleni
KUPHELILE ukuphola.
Ziyavulwa izikole ngoJuni 1.
Ingabe sikulungele yini lokhu?Lona ngumbuzo osezingqondweni zabazali nabafundi bakaGrade 7 no-12 njengoba kuyibo abazoqala babuyele esikoleni uma kuqala inyanga ezayo ngokwesimemezelo soMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo.Noma ziziningi izingqinamba ezibhekene noMnyango wezeMfundo kuleli kepha ngiyakuncoma ukukhombisa ukuhleleka kwalo mnyango ngandlela thile.Noma isekhona imibuzo ngezinhlelo zokuqikelela ukuvikeleka kwabantwana kodwa ukuqala ngedlanzana ngaphambi kokubuyisela bonke abantwana emagunjini okufunda kukhombisa khona ukuthi icatshangiwe le ndaba.Kusekhona-ke esisazibuza khona ukuthi ngabe kuhleliwe yini ngaphambi kokuvulwa kwezikole.Kulokhu singabala ukuhlanzisisa ukuze kubulawe amagciwane athwele isifo iCovid-19.Kuzofanele kube nezibulalimagciwane nokunye okubulala amagciwane, kulungiswe nesimo samanzi ukuze abantwana bahlanze izandla njengoba imigomo yokuvikela lolu bhubhane isho.Ngokwemibiko ye-United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation (Unesco) okukhona ngaphansi kwayo iNigizimu Afrika, India, USA, China, Mexico, France, Turkey, Brazil, Australia, Egypt, Greece, United Kingdom, Canada, Saudi Arabia, New Zealand, Norway, Denmark, Lebanon namanye amazwe; zilinganiselwa ku-90% izikole ezivaliwe emazweni angu-186 ngenxa yegciwane iCorona emhlabeni jikelele.UTUMELO Moloi efutha i-hydrogen peroxide eyisibulalimagciwane.
Yena nozakwabo uBheki Rachilo noDada Maseko bagqugquzela ukuthi kufuthwe ezikoleni ukuze kuphephe abantwanaZikhona izikole emazweni ambalwa lapho abantwana sebeqalile ukubuyela esikoleni okuzofanela sibukele kuwo ukuze sinqande ukubhebhetheka kwalesi sifo ukuze nempilo ibuyele kweyejwayelekile kancane kancane.Lapha singabala amazwe afana neChina, Japan neDenmark.La mazwe ashintshe izinhlelo zawo zokuhlanzwa nokuphathwa kwezikole ukuze kuphephe abantwana.
Izikole zifuthiwe, zahlanzwa ngaphambi kokuthi abantwana baqale ukufunda.Nathi eNingizimu Afrika kasiqhelelene nokwenza uhlobo olunzulu nolukhethekile lokuhlanza nokubulala amagciwane ezikoleni nasemahhovisi.UTumelo Moloi nozakwabo uDada Maseko noBheki Rachilo beMist Hygiene, eThekwini naseGoli, babone ukubaluleka kwalo msebenzi bahlanganisa amakhanda bakwenza kwenzeka.“Siqala ngokuhlola ibhilidi, bese sisebenzisa imishini yethu ekhipha okusantuthu okumhlophe okuthwele i-hydrogen peroxide okuyiyona ebulala kwasani eyigciwane elingaba khona endaweni,” kuchaza uTumelo.Uthe abantu bavumeleka ukungena kuleso sakhiwo emva kwehora uma umsebenzi wokuhlanza sewenziwe.
Uthe uma sekufuthiwe, kubalulekile ukufaka imishini yokufutha abantu ngaphambi kokuthi bangene kuleso sakhiwo esesishlanziwe.Nesibulalimagciwane siyadingeka ukuze abantu noma abantwana bahlanze izandla okuyizo ezisabalalisa amagciwane ngokuthintathinta.Kuzobaluleka ukusebenzisana kwabaphathi bezemfundo nongqondongqondo bokuhlanza izakhiwo ikakhulukazi ezikoleni lapho abantwana bethu befunda khona.Uma kungabanjiswana, ukubhebhetheka kweCovid-19 singakunqanda ezikoleni ukuze imfundo iqhubeke.Lokhu singekwenze ngokuhlanza nje kuphela kepha nokuqikelela ukuthi:Abantwana bethu bagqoka izifonyo ngaso sonke isikhathi.Abafundi nothisha abagulayo bahlale futhi banakekelwe emakhaya.Baqikekelele ukungathintathintani kwabafundi nothisha.Sibakhumbuze ukugeza izandla ngaso sonke isikhathi ngensipho noma ngesibulalimagciwane kahlanu noma ngaphezulu ngosuku.Ukushiya isikhala phakathi kwabo.Ukungahlangani kwabafundi abaningi ndawonye, okusho ukuthi imidlalo yokuzilolonga ithi ukumiswa ezikoleni.Ukuqikelela ukuthi abafundi banikezwa ulwazi olubafanele nabazoluqonda nge-Covid-19.
* UPhindile Zulu uyiPublic Relations Specialist nePublic Facilitation Consultant KwaZulu-Natal, eGoli naseKapa.Umsebenzi wakhe wukuqinisa ubudlelwane phakathi kwamalungu ehlukene emphakathini nakwezamabhizinisi.

Luyancomeka ushintsho emsakazweni Ukhozi FM
MHLELI: Ngiyakhuleka kunina beSilo, nina beNkashana kaMenzi eyaphuza umlaza ngameva.
Ngiyathokoza ukuthola ithuba lokubhala kulo iphephandaba Isolezwe eliwela umfula ugcwele, yimi induna yamaBhinca kuzwe lonke Sizwe Ndlovu, Kwasjula.
Ngithanda ukuphawula okokuqala ngqa, selokhu umsakazo Ukhozi FM lwenze izinguquko, ngimshayela ihlombe obehlanganisa ithimba labasakazi abazogadla ngabo ezinhlelweni ezahlukene.
Ngithi kuye uwushayile umsebenzi wakhe kwezinye zezinhlelo, ngizoqala ngohlelo lwasekuseni Vuka Afrika.
Lolu hlelo lumnandi ngendlela eyisimanga, uyezwa ukuthi abasakazi bayinto ehlangene futhi bakwenza ukhohlwe yizinsizi zakho ekuseni uye emsebenzini ngomfutho.
Ngithanda indlela uSipho Mbatha enza ngayo uyakhombisa ukuthi uvuthiwe kulento yokusakaza.
Uke wadlala umyalezo (voice note) kaLinda Sibiya emoyeni, naye encoma uhlelo ngendlela olumnandi ngayo noMroza Buthelezi kanjalo noNolwazi Machi.Ngizocela ukuza ohlelweni lukaBheka Mchunu olwasemini, lolu hlelo lunezihloko ezakhayo.
Lapho akafakwa khona uMchunu ufike angene athi khaxa, unomfutho omnandi emini.
Qhubeka Mchunu wakhe isizwe ngezihloko zakho.

Ugologo nelanga akuyibulali iCorona
ZININGI izigigaba emlandweni womhlaba ezisikhombisa ukuthi izikhathi ezinzima njengalesi esizithola sikuso kuyenzeka ziveze ngokusobala isibindi nomoya wobumbano ezweni.Kusukela ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa okokuqala ukufika kweCorona kwelakithi ngoMashi 5 nonyaka, ngihlabeke umxhwele ngomkhombandlela nokwesekeka esikuthola ebuholi bethu, kusukela kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuye kuNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Zweli Mkhize, kuze kufike kuNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikalala.Isiqinisa idolo nendlela iminxa eyahlukene emphakathini esabele ngayo ekhweleni lokubambisana nohulumeni ekugwemeni umbhedukazwe ngenxa yeCoronavirus.Kubo bonke esesihlangene nabo kula masonto ambalwa edlule kuhlaluka ukuthi bazimisele ukufaka igxalaba ukuze siyinqobe le mpi - kusukela kubaphathi bamabandla, abaholi bomdabu, abelaphi bendabuko, abemboni yamatekisi, abezibhedlela ezizimele, izinyunyana zabasebenzi nabacoshela izindaba.Kuyathokozisa nokubona abamabhizinisi adayisa iziphuzo zabadala, abajwayele ukuvakashelwa yizindimbane zamakhasimende, bewulalela umyalelo wokusheshe bavale, ukuze kwehle ukuthelelana ngaleli gciwane.Siyazi ukuthi lesi akusona isinqumo esilula ngoba sibashaya.
Iqiniso wukuthi uma singashintshi ukwenza kuzolahleka imiphefumulo.Lo moya wokubambisana esiwubonayo ufakazela esihlale sikusho ukuthi ayikho impi uhulumeni angayinqoba eyedwa, ngaphandle kokubambisana nezinye izinhlaka zomphakathi.NgoMashi 25, bonke ongqongqoshe bazobe bephume ngobuningi babo, begasele ezifundeni lapho bewoshampeni khona, ngaphansi kohlelo luka-Operation Sukuma Sakhe, ukuyokhuluma nomphakathi mayelana neCoronavirus.
Le mihlangano ayizukuba nabantu abangaphezu kuka-100.Kufanele omunye nomunye kithina aqale ashintshe ukwenza manje.Kukhulu ongakuzuza ngokuzijwayeza imikhuba embalwa nje emihle ebukeka imincane kodwa engenza omkhulu umehluko, njengokuthi:· Umboze umlomo noma ikhala ngendololwane (ufingqe ingalo) uma ukhwehlela noma uthimula.
Ungavimba nangethishu, bese uyilahla lapho ingeke itholwe womunye.· Kubalulekile ukuqhela kwabanye abantu okungenani ngegxathu nesigamu (1.5m) ukuze bangatheleleki.· Geza izandla ngamanzi nensipho okungenani imizuzwana ewu-20 emanzini ahambayo uma ungena ekhaya noma ebhilidini; ngaphambi kokudla; noma uma uphuma endlini encane.
Uma kungenzeka, thola isibulala-magciwane.· Gwema ukuthinta itafula, isihlalo, udonga, isibambo sesicabha, ikhabethe noma udonga olunaleli gciwane bese uthinta umlomo, ikhala noma amehlo, ngoba ingangena kalula kanjalo iCoronavirus.· Akuphele ukwabelana ngokudla nangamapuleti nezipuni; nokusebenzisa iziphuzo ngebhodlela elilodwa, nokwabelana ngogwayi ngoba amathe ayabambelela kuwo.Siyababonga abamabandla asebevumile ukuvala izinkonzo zePhasika, bakhonzele ekhaya, noma kwiTV.Sicela labo abazoba nezinkonzo ezincane, abasebenzisa ama-microphone emabandleni, nabasakazi, baqikelele ukuthi bayawesula noma basebenzise amagilavu uma bewathinta ngoba nawo angaba yisidleke samathe aneCoronavirus.Sifisa nokuqondisa izinkoleloze ezikhulunywa abantu abathile mayelana naleli gciwane ukuze isizwe singaduki: Akulona iqiniso ukuthi iCoronavirus ayibahlaseli abantu abamnyama.
Ayikhethi bala; ihlasela noma wubani osondelana nayo.Akulona iqiniso ukuthi iCoronavirus iyaphela uma umuntu ethamela ilanga, noma ehlala endaweni eshisa kakhulu.Akulona iqiniso ukuthi ugologo, noma ezinye izinhlobo zotshwala ziyayelapha iCoronavirus.
Uma singasheshe sikhohlwe yila mampunge, senze lokho okufanele sizosondela ekuziqhelelaniseni negciwane.Akuyena wonke umuntu onomkhuhlane oneCoronavirus.
Isiqiniseko sokuthi uneCoronavirus noma cha usithola emva kokuthi kuthathwe isampula noma uketshezi ekhaleni (swab) luyohlolwa e-laboratory.Uma uzizwa unomkhuhlane onamandla ngokungajwayelekile, ukhwehlela, uphefumula kanzima, uphethwe yikhanda, kubuhlungu umphimbo namamasela, noma uke wasondelana nomuntu oseke wahlolwa kwatholakala ukuthi unayo iCoronavirus, vakashela umtholampilo ongasekhaya ukuze uxilongwe abezempilo.Bazokubuza imibuzo mayelana nomlando wakho wakamuva, kuthathwe isampula, uyiswe esibhedlela lapho uzobekwa khona wedwa kusalindwe imiphumela.Labo abanendawo eyanele ekhaya bazocelwa ukuba bazigqume ekhaya ngesikhathi kusalindwe imiphumela.
Uma imiphumela iveza ukuthi likhona igciwane, uzobe usuthathwa yi-ambulensi eyisipesheli, uyiswe esibhedlela esikhethekile, nesikulungele ukubhekana nabantu abaneCoronavirus.Sidlulisa ukubonga kubo bonke abasebenzi bezempilo ngesibindi ngomdlandla abawukhombisayo.
Bayinsika ekulweni nalolu bhubhane.
Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi ungabakhiphi inyumbazana labo abangase batholwe beneCoronavirus, kanjalo nalabo ababahlengayo.
Lesi yisikhathi sokuthi sibambane ngezandla.Shayela inombolo yamahhala ethi: 0800 029 999 ukuze uthole eminye imininingwane.
* UNomagugu Simelane-Zulu unguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal.
I-DA ifuna okukaKhesari kubuyele kuKhesari
MHLELI: Abelungu beDA bathi isikhathi sesifikile “azibuye emasisweni”.
Ilulwane uma lihlezi phansi libukeka njengegundane kodwa kungelona igundane.Uma lindiza libukeka njengenyoni kodwa lingeyona inyoni.
Uma ungabeka inyoni negundane bese ubuza ukuthi niyamazi lona bayoliphika bonke bathi cha cha cha asimazi.Ilulwane uma lihlezi phansi alikwazi ukusuka lindize ngoba aliyona inyoni ngokuphelele kufanele lishoshe lize liyokhuphuka ngodonga ukuze lindize.Ikomkhulu leDA liseNew York kodwa leli qembu eliholwa uMnuz Mmusi Maimane eNingizimu Afrika alikaze limthume emihlanganweni yalo eNew York ngoba unaleli bala okungelona elaseNtshonalanga.
Uyazisisa njengelulwane elizisisa egundaneni nasenyonini.I-DA uma kufanele ithumele ekomkhulu layo kuba abebala layo hhayi umholi wayo.Laba belungu bayazi ukuthi uyofika acwaseke ngebala lakhe.
Ubani owayesazi ukuthi kusekhona uMnuz Tony Leon kwiDA.Akaze aye ndawo kuphela ubebuka le sithunywa abafolose ngaso ukuthi senzani.
Okubuhlungu ukuthi abantu abebezenze amalulwane bahlambalaze isithunzi somuntu omnyama kwabaseNtshonalanga.Bazoqhubeka nokuthi singothathekile.
Ukwesula kukaMashaba ngibona kuzoba nomthelela ongemuhle kuMaimane othi akuyiwe engqungqutheleni.
UMashaba uzohamba nenqwaba yabantu lokho kusho ukuthi le ndoda izolahlekelwa abayesekayo kuleyo ngqungquthela bese iba yihlaya kwabaseNtshonalanga.Ngeke kungimangaze ukubona uNkk Hellen Zille noma * Leon engenela esokuphinda ahole leli qembu ngoba lona ubenziwa ihawu lengulube ukuze kuhehwe othathekile.UNksz Patricia De Lille angazihlomulela kulaba asebesaba ukubuyela ekhaya ngoba ngeke baqhubeke neDA uma abelungu sebemkhiphe ngokusemthethweni uMaimane nabo bonke abahola ezifundazweni njengoMnuz Zwakele Mncwango.Bafake abebala elimhlophe ngoba bafuna okukaKhesari kubuyele kuKhesari.Zinsizwa nezintombi zakithi ebezibhungukile akuqali ngani ukubhunguka futhi akekho umuntu oxoshwayo ekhaya uma esezule wadela wanethwa yizimvula zangaphandle.
Nani nizokwamukeleka ngemfudumalo ekhaya vele lalingeke lishintshe leli bala elinsundu libe mhlophe niyohlezi ninjena nje.Lindani M. NdebeleEmpangeni
UKZN : Isicelo sokuba kubhekewe izindaba zethu ngendlela efanele nokuthola umhlahlandlela ngezingxoxo
Kungithusile ukufunda umbhalo kaSolwazi Jonathan Jansen obunesihloko esithi ‘UKZN: It’s terrible seeing a varsity die, especially as it was preventable’ engosini yakhe ebishicilelwe yi-TimesLive ngomhla we-6 kuNhlolanja (February) 2020.
Njengomuntu owayeyiSekelashansela, ngicabanga ukuthi lo mbhalo wakhe bekufanele ube nokuqonda okungcono ngesimo, ungabi nehaba futhi uqinise kakhulu ezisombululweni.
Okulandela lapha ngezansi akubhekisiwe kuSolwazi Jansen noma embhalweni wakhe, nakuba ungihlupha, kepha kuyisitatimende esicacisa umbono weNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal (i-UKZN).
Ukuqubuka kwezibhelu okusanda kwenzeka emakhempasini ethu kulula ukuthi kuthatheke ngokuthi izingxoxo phakathi komKhandlu wabaFundi nabaphathi beNyuvesi sezifinyelele kwangqingetshe okusho ukuthi phakathi kwalezi zinhlangothi zombili alukho olufuna ukugoba uphondo noma okusho ukuqinisa ikhanda phakathi kohlangothi olulodwa noma zombili nokuthi ukuphazamiseka kwezinhlelo bekungagwemeka ukuba izinhlangothi zombili zikwazile ukuvumelana.
Iqiniso wukuthi akulula ngaleyo ndlela futhi umthelela mkhulu.
UMkhandlu Wabafundi nabaphathi beNyuvesi babhekene nesimo esinzima kakhulu.
Akugcini nje ngokutholakala kwesisombululo salokhu esibhekene nakho manje kepha kumele futhi siqhamuke nesu lokuhlanganisa izidingo zeNyuvesi zezimali kanye nezidingo ezibalulekile zabafundi esikhathini eside.
Okufanele kushiwo kuqala ilokhu okusobala: udlame nokusabisa kuphambene nenqubo nomqondo wempilo yaseNyuvesi.
Labo abenza lezi zenzo abamele muntu.
Izenzo zokusabisa nezokucekela phansi impahla aziyona ipolitiki yanoma yiluphi uhlobo; empeleni ziphikisana nepolitiki nokusebenzisa umqondo.
Aziyona indlela yokubhikisha kepha ziyizenzo zobugebengu kanti iNyuvesi izophokophela ukuthi izigilamkhuba zishushiswe.
Siselapho asichithe ulimi lwepolitiki olusetshenziswa budedengu kucashunwa ngokungafanele u-Franz Fanon.
E-Afrika yonke ukuqhakambisa udlame kuka-Fanon osekuvamile kuphikisana nezinjongo ezinhle; njengoba udlame luholelele kolunye udlame kanti umphumela walokho yiloku esikubona namuhla.Abasebenzi abazinikele base-UKZN basebenze ngokuzikhandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isimo esihle kubona bonke abafundi bethu, ngakho kuyasikhathaza kakhulu ukubona indlela izinto ezenzeka ngayo ezibuyisela emuva.
Indlela yokwenza izinto ngodlame edlangile kwezombusazwe nesilimaze impilo yabantu abaningi eNingizimu Afrika iyindaba yezwe lonke, hhayi i-UKZN kuphela noma ngivuma ukuthi isilimaza kakhulu ngaphezu kwabanye abantu.
Kepha kufanele iphele njengoba icekela phansi wonke umsebenzi omuhle wabangasekho abanikela ngempilo yabo.
Ayamukeleki futhi isenzela phansi sonke manje nangomuso.AmaNyuvesi kahulumeni ethu aneqhaza elimqoka ukulungisa umonakalo osukela emlandweni wethu.
Ngokunika imiphakathi eyayicindezelwe ithuba lemfundo yaseNyuvesi, senza umsebenzi wesizwe futhi sakha isisekelo somphakathi onokulingana nonekusasa eliqhakazile.
Kepha ayikho iNyuvesi engathintwa yizimo esebenza ngaphansi kwazo.
Lapha sibala konke kusukela esimweni somnotho sezwe nezinjongongqangi zikahulumeni kuze kufinyelele ezimweni zenhlalo yomphakathi wendawo ezithinta umuntu ngamunye nemindeni yonke.IsiFundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal (i-KZN) singesinye sezifundazwe ezinezinga eliphezulu lobubha ezweni, njengoba izinga labantu abadala lingaphezulu kwamaphesenti angama-60.
Inselelo yokuntuleka kwemisebenzi, ephezulu ngendlela ethusayo nakubantu abaneziqu, yenza abafundi abaningi baqhubeke bahlale esikoleni ngaphandle kwenhloso etheni, okulandelwa umphumela wokuvalelwa ngaphandle ngenxa yokukweleta noma yokungaphasi okuholela odlameni.
Kanti futhi kuyinto ehlale yenzeka.Isicelo esikhulu soMkhandlu Wabafundi ukuthi iNyuvesi ivumele izitshudeni emindeni yazo ngaphansi kuka-R350 000 zibhaliswe zingayikhokhile imali yokubhalisa noma yesikweletu esidala.
Inkinga esibhekene nayo ukuthi lezi zitshudeni zilinganiselwa kumaphesenti angama-78 azo zonke izitshudeni zase-UKZN.
Ngaphezu kwaloko kungasho ukuthi zonke izitshudeni zase-UKZN emakhaya azo okunengena imali engaphansi kuka-R350 000 zifunda mahhala, okungasho ukuthi uma i-UKZN ingase ikuvume kungadlula inqubomgomo ekhona kahulumeni, kubeke isikhungo esimweni esibi kakhulu kwezezimali.
Isikweletu sabafundi base-UKZN ekupheleni kukaDisemba wangonyaka wezi-2019 besiyi-R1,7 billion.
Noma kunjalo kepha siqhubekile senza izindlela (njengokukugunyaza ukubhaliswa ngokwezimali) okusho ukuthi asikho noyedwa umfundi waseNyuvesi obekufanele akhokhe imali ephelele yesikweletu esidala ngaphambi kokubhalisa.
Empeleni imali enkulu edingeka kumuntu okweletayo imiswe kuR45 000 kumfundi ngamunye bese kuthi amaphesenti angama-67 abafundi kudingeka bakhokhe imali eyizi-R10 000 umfundi ngamunye yesikweletu sakhe.
Umbono weNyuvesi kulolu daba uholwa umgomo wokwemukela abafundi kodwa ibe iqinisekisa ukuthi iNyuvesi ihlala isesimweni esihle kwezezimali futhi iyachuma, ikwazi ukuphatha izimali zokusebenza zansuku zonke ngendlela eyeseka ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo zansuku zonke, ukubhekana nezibopho zayo kwezezimali kubasebenzi, abafundi nezinkampani esebenzisana nazo futhi ikwazi ukulawula indaba yesimo sesikweletu esiphezulu – esiwedlula wonke amaNyuvesi eNingizimu Afrika.
Kuyacaca ukuthi okunye ukuvunyelwa kokubhalisa ngaphandle kwezimali ezidingekayo kungabeka iNyuvesi engcupheni yokugcina ivaliwe, okungalimaza wonke umuntu.
Noma kunjalo siyavuma ukuthi ukuntuleka kwezimali kusabalele kuwona wonke amakhempasi eNyuvesi futhi kungenza ukuthi abafundi abakweletayo bangaphumeleli ezifundweni zabo, okungabenza bavaleleke bangatholi thuba ngaphakathi noma ngaphandle kweNyuvesi.
Kuleli phuzu, isicelo sesibili esikhulu sabaholi babafundi ukuthi kumiswe uhlelo lokunqatshelwa ukubhalisa kubafundi abangaphumelelanga ezifundweni zabo.
Kepha iqiniso lithi abaphathi beNyuvesi banomsebenzi wokuvikela igama leNyuvesi ngokuqapha izinga nesithunzi seziqu zase-UKZN.
INyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natali inentshisekelo enkulu ngomsebenzi wayo kubantu bendawo eyakhele.
Sinerekhodi elihle ekwemukeleni izitshudeni nezinga eliphezulu lokuxegisa amatomu esimweni sezimali.
Izinga liphezulu kakhulu kangangokuthi iKZN inesikweletu esingaphezu kwe-R1 billion.
Kepha iqiniso ukuthi iphakethe leNyuvesi noma likahulumeni aliwona umthombo ongashi.
Eqinisweni akusekho lutho ndawo zombili.
Singawenza kanjani umsebenzi wethu wokuba yiNyuvesi yomphakathi waKwaZulu-Natali, siqhubeke sichume ngasezimalini sibe siqinisekisa ukuthi isibalo esikhulu sabafundi bethi abakhathazeki ngokwezimali nasezifundweni?
Seloku ngiqalile ukuba iSekelashansela ngisebenza ngokuzikhandla ngaso sonke isikhathi nabaphathi nabaholi bezitshudeni sizama ukubheka izidingo zabo nesidingo sokuqinisekisa ukuthi sihle isimo sezimali seNyuvesi.
Esibambelele kukona wukuthi esikushoyo akusiko ukusabisa ezingxoxweni kepha yiqiniso elimsulwa esingeke silibalekele.
Njengoba bonke abantu abaqotho baseNingizimu Afrika befisa ikusasa eliqhakazile futhi bebheka abaphathi bamaNyuvesi kube kufanele kodwa ngeke senze imilingo kanjalo nohulumeni noma izinkampani.Ithini ke indlela eya phambili?Okokuqala nje, sidinga ipolitiki engcono.
Udlame kufanele luphele, futhi luphele ngokushesha futhi unomphelo.
Kanjalo, umkhuba omdala wokufuna ngenkani nokwehlela ngezansi kufanele uphele.
Yebo, zonke izinhlangothi zifika ezingxoxweni nezinhloso kodwa ngeke sithathe kancane umsebenzi wethu sonke wokusimamisa iNyuvesi negama layo.
Lokhu kufanele kube seqhulwini kithina sonke kanti lokho kudinga izindlela ezintsha zokubambisana nobuholi obuqotho ngempela ngasohlangothini lwabaphathi beNyuvesi nabaholi babafundi.Okwesibili, ukulungisa lesi simo esikhona kudingeka ukuthi sibe neqiniso ngokuthi yikuphi iNyuvesi engakwazi ukukwenza nalokho engeke ikwazi ukukwenza.
INyuvesi ngeke ikwazi ukubhalisa bonke abafundi abangakwazi ukuthola imali yakwa-NSFAS ekubeni u-NSFAS uqobo ubheka izinto ezithize ngaphambi kokuthi uxhase labo bafundi abadinga usizo.
Kusukela ekuqaleni iNyuvesi izimisele ukusiza abafundi bango-2020 abazothola u-NSFAS.
Sikhulu isidingo sokuthi sithole isisombululo kwizinselelo ezikhona ngaleli qoqo labafundi ngoba basethubeni elingcono lokungabi nesikweletu uma benakekelwa futhi besekelwa ngendlela efanele yiNyuvesi ukuze baqede izifundo ngesikhath.
INyuvesi izibophezele ekubambisaneni Nobuholi Babafundi ngaleli qoqo ukuthola isisombululo.Okwesithathu, iNyuvesi izimisele ukusebenzisana nabo bonke abafundi abasalelwe yisifundo esisodwa noma ezimbili ukuthi baqede ukufunda.
UMkhandlu weNyuvesi uzocabangisisa ukuthi yisiphi isixazululo esemukelekile sokusiza laba bafundi baqede isikole, kuthi uma kunesidingo kwenziwe ezinye izindlela zokuhlola abantu uma kuwukuthi indlela ekhona yokuhlola iyabakhinyabeza abafundi.
Iphini LeSekelashansela  namaDini EzokuFunda NokuFundisa banikwe umsebenzi wokuqoqa amagama alezi zitshudeni ukuze abhekwe yizinhlaka ezifanele zaseNyuvesi.NjengoSekelashansela noMPhathi wase-UKZN ngiqinisekisa bonke abantu baseNyuvesi nesizwe sonke ukuthi singabaphathi sizoqhubeka ukwenza izinto ngendlela efanele ngokubeka umgomo nombono phambili.
*Kuloba uSolwazi Nana PokuIsekelashansela NoMphathi wase-UKZN
Umnyango uhlanganisa amasu azosiza ngesikhathi esilahlekile
NJENGOBA izolo bekuwusuku olubalulekile okubuyela ngalo abafundi bakaGrade 11 noGrade 6 esikoleni emuva kwesikhathi eside behleli emakhaya ngenxa yokuqubuka kweCoronavirus, sikuqonda kahle kamhlophe ukuthi mukhulu kangakanani umsebenzi omele uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal.Ngaphandle kokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuzama ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabafundi nabasebenzi bethu ezikoleni, sinomunye omthwalo onzima osemahlombe ethu wokuqinisekisa ukuthi sinendlela yokuvala isikhathi esilahleke ngesikhathi kungafundwa.Kungalesi sizathu ngesonto eledlule besihlangene sicwaninga uhlelo lwethu lokuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi bacijwa ngendlela efanele, i-Academic Recovery Plan.
Lapha besibheka zonke izindlela ezimqoka nezizoholela ekutheni izingane zethu zithole imfundo esezingeni elifanele nezokwenza kungazweli kakhulu ukuthi sekunesikhathi eside zihleli emakhaya.Ukucwaningwa kwalolu hlelo bekuhlanganise sonke isigungu esiphezulu sokuphathwa koMnyango i-senior management ukuze kuphunywe nezinqumo kanye nemiphumela edle ngokujiya nezosiza izingane zethu.
Ngingasho nje ngaphandle kokungabaza ukuthi ngasohlangothini lokuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi bethu ababuyela esikoleni namhlanje nalabo asebevele bebuyele okunguGrade 12 noGrade 7 sibalungiselele kahle kakhulu ukuthi bangasali emuva ngenxa yesikhathi eside sokuvalwa kwezikole okwadalwa wumbhedukazwe wesifo esaqubuka kwelaseChina ngoDisemba nyakenye kodwa esesisabalele umhlaba wonke.Yize sazi ukuthi ukuvikela ukusabalala kweCoronavirus edume ngeleCovid-19 kuncike kakhulu endleleni yokuziphatha nokunakekela kubantu, nathi njengomnyango senze konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi njengoba isibalo sabafundi sesizothi ukwanda kancane ezikoleni ngenxa yokubuya kwalaba bamabanga amabili kodwa ezokuphepha zihlala njalo zisezingeni eliphezulu.Phakathi kwezinto esizenzile nangesikhathi kubuya ithimba lokuqala, kube wukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi kabahlali ngokusondelana emagunjini okufundela kodwa bashiyelana ibanga elingaphezu kuka-1.5 metres ukuze kungathi omunye uma ethimula kumbe ekhwehlela kutheleke omunye.Siphinde saqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abafundi bethu sibathengela izifonyo okuzothi uma befika esikoleni bazifice bese beyazisebenzisa.
Siphinde futhi senza isiqiniseko sokuthi sihlinzeka ngamathanki amanzi izikole obekunzima ukuthola kuzo amanzi ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi abafundi nothisha bethu bayalithola ithuba lokuhlamba izandla ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuze bahlale njalo benezandla ezihlanzekile nokuyinto inhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni iWorld Health Organisation eyitusa kakhulu ekuvimbeleni ukusabalala kweCovid-19.Izibulalimagciwane zokuhlamba izandla nazo zikhona ukuze abafundi behlale njalo behlanza ngazo izandla.
Namagumbi okufunda kuyaqinisekiswa ukuthi zonke izinsuku ahlanzekile.
Siqinisekisile futhi nokuthi uma abafundi befika esikoleni bayabhekwa isimo sabo sokushisa khona uma kungukuthi kukhona oshisa ngokungajwayelekile sithathe izinyathelo ngokushesha ukuze simnike usizo ngokuphazima kweso.
Zonke lezi zinto ezisenzayo sizenza ngoba sikhathalele ukuphepha kwabafundi bethu okumqoka ukuthi bafunde ukuze kuthi uma iCovid-19 isidlulile kodwa bona babe ngabantu abazokwazi ukuba nekusasa eliqhakazile.Amathemba okuphepha nokuthola imfundo esezingeni aphezulu kakhulu.
Ngakho-ke sithi amaphaphu phansi.
Asiqinise kakhulu ekusebenzisaneni ukuze silinqobe igciwane.Kuleli qophelo ngiyafisa ukuphawula ngokudideka okuke kwaba khona kwezinye zezikole zethu uma kubikwe ngomuntu osehaqwe yigciwane.
Izikole eziningi bekuthi uma kuke kwabikwa zivele zikhiphe umyalelo wokuthi zizovala okungenani izinsuku eziwu-14.
Siyafisa ukucacisa ukuthi umthetho ohambisana nemigomo yezempilo uthi uma kunesehlo esibikiwe esikoleni, leso sikole kumele sivale amahora awu-24 okuyizinsuku ezimbili kuphela ukuze sihlanzwe kahle kubulawe amagciwane okungenzeka ukuthi akhona.Mayelana nokuhlolwa kwabantu kuleso sikole okubikwe kuso isehlo, indlela yokusebenza nemigomo yezempilo ithi kumele kuhlolwe kuphela labo abebeseduze nalowo okubikwa ukuthi unegciwane kunokuthi kuhlolwe wonke umuntu esikoleni.
Siyacela ukuthi sibambisane kakhulu kulesi simo.
Ukubambisana yikho okuyosenza sinqobe lesi sifo.Sengiphetha nje, siyafisa ukucacisa ukuthi sizoqhubeka nokusebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabafundi bethu nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abasali ezifundweni zabo.Kungokokuqala ukuthi isizukulwane esiphila njengamanje sibhekana nesimo esibhekene naso njengamanje.
Lokho kusho ukuthi izinto eziningi sizozifunda ngendlela.
Kodwa-ke yize kunjalo, ukuphepha kwabafundi kanye nabasebenzi bethu sizolokhu sikubeke njalo eqhulwini.Masilandele imigomo emenyezelwe nguhulumeni yokuphepha siqinisekise ukuthi siyasinqoba lesi sifo esisihlalise lubhojozi.

UNdosi kumele afunde isisoka kuKhabazela
MHLELI: Ngithanda ukuvumelana nomfundi welakho obhale ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi: UCele usazenza umkhuzi wamaphoyisa, oshicilelweni lwangoLwesithathu.Impela uNgqongqoshe uBheki Cele usengene wagamanxa ezintweni zokusebenza kwamaphoyisa kungafanele.

UShenge ulimele iqiniso naseNdlunkulu kaZulu
MHLELI: Ngizwakalisa ukudabuka kwenhliziyo yami ngenxa yefu elimnyama elisibekele ubukhosi bakaZulu njengoba kusanda kuhamba ngokulandela eduzane kwabaseNdlunkulu kaZulu.
Ngithi nje umndeni, izihlobo nabangani nesizwe sonke mabalale ngenxeba.
Ngizwakalisa ukubonga kuMntwana waKwaPhindangene onguNdunankulu kaZulu ngokukhalipha kwakhe nokumela iqiniso.
UMntwana akathandi ukuchema nabantu abangahambisani nokuphatheka, abantu abangondlovukayiphikiswa.
Siyabadinga abantu abanohlonze abazomela iqiniso njengoMntwana.
UMntwana selokhu ema eqinisweni ngisho ebandleni lamaNazaretha walimela iqiniso, wabuza ukuthi liphikiselwani izwi leNkosi uThingolwenkosazane eyabhala incwadi iqoka umholi webandla ozolihola uma lona selushintsha ibhantshi (selukhotheme).Okwenziwa yiNkosi yesizwe saMaqadi ixova ibandla, uMntwana wakuhlaba wakuhlikiliza.
Nanamhlanje akakaze aguquke kulokho okwashiwo nguThingo.
UMntwana waKwaPhindangene wafundisa abantu ukuthi bayithemba into ebhalwe phansi njengoba uThingo lwenza.
UMntwana akazange aphinde azihlanganise nebandla njengoba kusenombango oqhubeka ngaphakathi kweNazareth Baptist Church osasezinkantolo.
UMntwana wakubuka kukubi ukuthi uma abantu bengavumelani ngento ethile, bese ezihlanganisa nabo.
Wabona kuyichilo ukuthi uma yena njengoyise wesizwe azihlanganise nanoma yiluphi uhlangothi, wakhetha ukuma phakathi nendawo.
Wayebuka ukuthi uyoba yini emlandweni engumholi omkhulu kangaka, uma sekuphuma isinqumo sithi ’uhlangothi obuwumbimbi nalo lulahlwe yicala ngenxa yamanga’.
Wayeyophinda abe yini nje?
Izwe lembethwe yifu elimnyama ngenxa yokuphikiswa kwezwi loThingo.
Kwathi nabantu abakhulu ababekelwa ukubheka ukuthi abantu bangacindezelwa ngamanga nangobuqili, lokhu esibona amanye amakhosi amaningi asephakathi kwabantu abayizigangi.
iNkosi  Buthelezi kayizange ibe nendaba nobuningi babantu, kayizange ibe nendaba neminikelo yezinkomo neyezinqama eyayingathengwa ngayo, ukuze ilidele iqiniso inamathele emangeni nasehlazweni.
Ngibuka  umbango usungaphakathi endlunkulu lapho abantu sebengenwe wumoya wokuphikisa izwi leMbube, eshiye ikubhalile phansi okumele kwenzeke uma isikhotheme.
Ngokuzwa kwami kuseyiyo iNkosi uShenge ethi izwe lonke nendlunkulu makuhlonishwe izifiso zikaNdabezitha kulokho akushiyile.
Ngiyathanda nami ukusho  ukuthi ondlunkulu bonke nabaNtwana basezindlini zonke mabahloniphe izifiso zeSilo.
Mabahlale phansi babonisane ngomoya wokuthula nokwazisana.
Bahlonishwa yizwe lonke naphesheya kwezilwandle.
Ngiyafisa  uNdlunkulu waKwaKhethomthandayo  naMazinyane eSilo behlele ngezansi, balihloniphe izwi likaMdlokombane.
Bonke abaNtwana basendlunkulu mababambelele ehlombe likaShenge ngoba uyindoda ongayethemba kwezamaqiniso.
Ngiyathanda futhi ukuthi baye kuMntwana uThembi Zulu-Ndlovu ngokuthi angawudungi umsebenzi wasendlunkulu, kwazise yena sewagana.
Makaphawule lapho ephawula khona kepha angafaki umoya wendlakadla phakathi kwezindlu zeSilo.
Uma enze kanjalo uyofike athini koyisemkhulu abalwela lesi sizwe, basibumba saba yilokhu esiyikho namhlanje.
Sonke masikhulumeni ngazwi linye siwuZulu, sihloniphe izwi likaBayede, ukuze naye lapho ekhona alale ngokuthula.
Thina siyisizwe samaZulu sizogcina sibukelwa phansi ngezinye izizwe.
AmaNazaretha aphikisa incwadi ebhalwe phansi yinkosi, iqoka umholi okhethwe emazulwini.
Kwala noma izinkantolo zisho ukuthi akukho mkokotelo encwadini kepha sangavuma ukulalela.
Namhlanje umlando uyaziphinda ngokuthi iSilo siqoke iNgonyama bese abaNtwana nondlunkulu bebanga umsindo ngoqokiwe.
Ngithi nje nina bezulu eliphezulu mayihlale phansi ibambe umthetho!
Masimhloniphe sonke owaqokwa ngamakhosi asendlunkulu alele othulini lomhlaba.OKHATHAZEKILE
Unolimi olunesankahlu uCele kepha uhlulwa umsebenzi
MHLELI: Ukuhloniphana kuyathengana.
Uma ungihlonipha, nami kulula ukuthi ngikuthobele, ngakho ukuhloniphana kukabili.
Uma ungangihloniphi, ungithatha noma yikanjani kulula nakumina ukuba nawe ngikuthathe noma yikanjani.
Uma ukhuluma nami noma yikanjani, uyangiphoqa ukuba nami ngingayihluzi into engizoyisho kuwena.Uma ungihlonipha, kunento oyithintayo kinima engithobisayo bese ngiba nenhlonipho.
Uma ungikhombisa inhlonipho nento oyishoyo isuke seyizwakala kahle.
Akwenzeki ukuthi ngingaqondi ukuthi uthini ngoba ngididiswa yindelelo yakho.Angiqondile kufundisa ngenhloniphi, kepha ngithintwe wukuziphatha kukaMnuz Bheki Cele, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa (osesithombeni).
Lo ngqongqoshe uyimpi nje uma ekhuluma nabantu.
Lokho kwenza kube lula ukufinyelela ekutheni ukukhuluma kwakhe akunayo inhlonipho.
Unesankahlu ongasazi ukuthi sibangwa yini.
Ukhuluma ngendlela engatshali inhlonipho kubantu, kungenzeka ukuthi usuke eqonde ukugcizelela akushoyo kepha kithina kufika isankahlu sodwa.
Kuthina kufika ulaka esingazi ludalwa yini.Iqiniso wukuthi uCele uhlulwa wumsebenzi wakhe bese egijimela okaKhomishana wamaPhoyisa, eKhehla Sitole.
Akuwona umsebenzi kangqongqoshe ukutshela amaphoyisa ukuthi kufanele abophe uma sekwenzenjani.
Lowo ngumsebenzi kaSitole.
Kubukeka ugqozi lukaCele luhlala obala uma kukhulunywa ngokuvalwa kotshwala.
Lokhu kwenza umuntu azibuze ukuthi ushonaphi lo mfutho uma sekufanele akhulume ngezinto ezibucayi njengokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.
UCele akanawo umfutho ngezinye izinkinga ezikhungethe leli lizwe ezidinga ubuholi bakhe njengongqongqoshe wamaphoyisa.
Kuyadumaza ukuthi sinenkinga yokushushumbiswa kwabantu kepha ungqongqoshe akasho lutho ngalokho.
Kepha uma isihloko kuwutshwala, maye babo!
Uzomuzwa kahle ngoba ukhuluma aze ashintshe ngisho ebusweni.
Uma kukhulunywa ngokushushumbiswa kotshwala, uzombona kahle ukuthi akabhenywa, kepha uma kushushumbiswa abantu - kucweba iziziba.Asikwazi ukuba nongqongqoshe unomfutho wokulwa nento eyodwa.
UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthuli uthini ngongqongqoshe onjena?Sekukhanyela wonke umuntu ukuthi uCele uyamehlula umsebenzi wakhe.
Mhlawumbe udidwa wukuthi wake waba ngukhomishana wamaphoyisa manje akasakwazi ukuhlukanisa phakathi kwamandla kangqongqoshe nakakhomishana.Ngiye ngizwe kuthiwa ongqongqoshe banabeluleki, manje abakaCele bathule bathini engena egamanxa emsebenzini kaSitole?Umsebenzi kaCele ukubheka ukuthi umnyango wakhe usebenza ngendlela efanele yini.
Okwakhe ukuba yihlo labantu ekutheni ngabe amaphoyisa awenza ngendlela efanele yini umsebenzi wawo.
Manje yena ubuye umuzwe esezibiza ngephoyisa, ethi: “thina maphoyisa kwasha kwacima...” Ungqongqoshe akalona iphoyisa.

Masilwe nokwebiwa kokudla okuthengelwe abampofu
UBHUBHANE lwesifo iCovid-19, lusikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi ukungalingani kuyinselelo enkulu kakhulu ebhekene nezwe lakithi.
Sikhuluma nje, elakuleli laziwa kabi wumhlaba wonke njengezwe lapho kunegebe elikhulu phakathi kwabakhomba ngophakathi nabadla imbuya ngothi.
Osekusibangele inkinga, wukuthi imizamo eminingi uhulumeni azama ngayo ukuvala leli gebe, isiphazanyiswe kakhulu yilo mkhuhlane kwazise baningi asebelahlakelwe yimisebenzi.
Lokhu sekuholele ekutheni sande isibalo sabantu ababhuqabhuqwa wububha.
Kungihlaba umxhwele ukubona ukuthi izibalo zokuthuthukisa izinga lempilo yabantu, zikhomba ukuthi izwe lakithi lenza kahle kakulu kusukela ku- 1994.
Ngokombiko wokuthuthukiswa kwabantu we-United Nations Development Programme ka-2019, kumanje nje elakuleli lilele unombolo 113 emazweni angu-193 emhlabeni wonke.Ukube uhulumeni wethu awukusukumelanga kuhlinzeka abantu ababenganakiwe nguhulumeni wobandlululo ngezidingonqqangi, bekuzoba wumqansa omkhulu kwakuqala izinhlelo zokulwa nalolu bhubhane.Sobe siyazikhohlisa uma singakugqizi qakala ukuthi esinye sezizathu zokuthi bathole impilo inzima, njengoba kunalo mkhuhlane, yikho belu ukungalingani.
Yingakho ngithe angibonge uhulumeni kazwelonke ngokumemezela uchatha kubo bonke abantu bakithi abahola imali yesibonelelo.
Angisayikhulumi eyemali ebekelwe ukulekelela ngesikhathi esinzima labo abangasebenzi.
Sinethemba lokuthi izoba negalelo elikhulu emzabalazweni wethu wokulwa nobubhane.Lokhu kufakazela ngokusobala ukuthi uma sithi uhulumeni wethu ungonakekelayo, sisuke singasengi ezimithiyo.SinguMasipala weTheku, sikubone kufanele ukuthi sibeke eceleni imali enguR66 million ukulekelela labo abadla imbuya ngothi.Ngike ngavakashela zonke izinqolobane zethu zokudla, ngajabula kakhulu ngokudla okusezingeni eliphezulu esikunika abantu bakithi.
Senze isiqiniseko, sisebenza namakhansela ethu, ukuthi abazohlomula kulolu hlelo, ngabantu ngempela abakufanele lokhu kanti futhi senze umsebenzi omkhulu wokuthi izinkampani esiziqashayo ukusithengela ukudla, zinikwa lo msebenzi emva kokuthi sizinelise ukuthi zizowenza umsebenzi ngokugculisayo, ngoba sifuna ukugwema ukuthi kungabi nezinkampani ezizogxila ekutheni zenze inzuzo enkulu abantu bakithi bebe bengagculisekile.Senze futhi isiqiniseko sokuthi uhlelo lomnotho lweRET alusaleli emuva ukuze sikwazi ukuvala igebe kwabacebile nabampofuEThekwini bonke labo abazobe besilekelela ekwabeni ukudla, badonswe ngendlebe ukuthi akungakhishwa ukudla ngokuchema kodwa akube nobulungiswa.
Sinama-ward angu-110 kuwo yimizi engu-1 000 ezohlomula ngalesi sikhathi sikathaqa.
Lukhona uhlu olwakhiwe nokuzothi ngaso sonke isikhathi uma bemukela ukudla abantu basayine eduze kwemininingwane yabo.
Nathi futhi sizoqinisekisa ukuthi siyabashayela ucingo ukuthola ukuthi bathola ukudla okubafanele yini.Izigameko esizibonile kwezinye izingxenye zezwe lapho kube khona abasebuholini abagxekwa ngokweba ukudla okufanele kuye kwabaswele ziyethusa.
Ngithi lezo zenzo kufanele zigxekwe kuthi abenza lokho babhekane nengalo yomthetho.
Siwumphakathi, lapho sibona khona izenzo zenkohlakalo, asingathuli kodwa sibike kwabasemandleni ukuze sibhekane ngqo namasela.Siyacela futhi nemiphakathi yethu esingakafinyeleli kuyo nalolu hlelo, ukuthi isibekezelele ngoba lesi yisimo esingajwayelekile esisehle ngaphezulu.
Senza konke okusemandleni ukufinyelela kubo bonke abaswele.
Ngakho asiyeke imibhikisho enodlame necekela phansi impahla lapho abantu bekhala ngokuthi asikafiki kubo ngohlelo lokudla.
Asikudingi lokho, sidinga ukubambana ngezandla sibhekane nale nselelo ngoba udlame luyosibangela izinkinga eziningi nezingenza ukuthi luqhubeke ubhubhane.Njengoba umasipala wethu usuthathwa njengesizinda salokhu kufa, nginicela nonke ukuthi nihlale emakhaya bese nihlonipha yonke imithetho kathaqa.
Asikuqonde ukuthi inhloso ngalokhu wukuphephisa thina nanokulisiphula nezimapande zalo igciwane.Angithathe leli thuba ngibonge zonke izinhlangano ezingekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni ngokusabela ikhwela lethu lokuthi zelule isandla ngalesi sikhathi esinzima kangaka.
Uma siqhubeka nokusebenza ngokubambisana, nginethemba lokuthi leli gciwane liyogcina liwumlando kuleli.UMxolisi Kaunda oyiMeya yeTheku

Masingakuvumeli ukusetshenziswa wuSathane bakithi
MHLELI: Kunamazwi eBhayibhelini athi uSathane wumkhohlisi nomdukisi wezwe odukisa abantu.
Impela manje ngibona sengathi uSathane useyazenzela nje la kithina.
Akukona ukuteleka kwabantu lokhu futhi ungathi sebesetshenziswa wuSathane.Udlame olungaka, ulaka olungaka, ubudlova obungaka.
Hhayi akusekhona ukufuna izidingo phela lokhu kodwa sekuwukuziveza kukaSathane kubantu abangakholwa.
Izidingo zomphakathi sonke siyazifuna kodwa uma sekuliwa kangaka akuseyikho.
Le nto ngike ngayibona kwenye indawo ngidlula eDenny Dalton abantu bebhikisha.
Babeshaya izimoto zabantu ngamatshe bethulula ukudla emalolini.
Abantu babevutha bhe ngisho nezingane zesikole zivuka umbhejazane.
Akekho umuntu ozihloniphayo nohlonipha abantu ongenza into engayibona.Kwethusile nengikubone eRichards Bay abantu bejikijela izimoto zabantu ngamatshe.
Sike sakubona lokhu nakwezinye izindawo.Ngizocela abantu bake bazihlole ukuthi abasasetshenziswa yini omubi.
Phela uma esesebenza ungena engqondweni kuqala.
Akunqatshiwe ukuthi abantu babhikishe kodwa uma bekwenza lokho abangacekeli phansi impahla yabanye abantu abayeke nokulimaza abantu abangenacala.
Le nto isenza inhlekisa kwamanye amazwe.
EPhalamende ‘‘kunezinhlanya’’ zakhona nasemphakathini kukhona ezakhona kusho ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika konakele kakhulu.
Kahleni bakithi ake sibe nobuntu nokukholwa singavumi ukusetshenziswa uSathane kangaka sengathi asiphilile kahle emakhanda.Sazenza inhlekisa nje ezweni nakwamanye amazwe.
Kahleni bakithi asiyeke ukwenza okuphambene nokulunga.
Asiteleke kodwa esikwenzayo kungagcini sekuhlukumeza abanye abantu abangahlangene nezinto esisuke sithi siyazilwela.
Le lizwe liya ngokuya lishabalala.
Abantu babuswa wubudlova bavumela ukusetshenziswa wuSathane okubukeka sengathi uyachanasa.Nalaba abathi bafuna umhlaba awazi ukuthi bazowenzani ngoba abanye bayehluleka ukuwusebenzisa.
Badlala uSathane ofuna ukusibulalisa ngendlala.Malibongwe MatiwaneEMakhosini
Ngithulela isigqoko amaphoyisa aseNquthu
MHLELI: Sekukaningi noma sekuyinsakavukela umchilo wesidwaba ukuzwa kugxekwa ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa.

Sengixhumanile naye amahlandla amaningana uma kunezigameko zobugebengu endaweni yangakithi.Ngithi nje kuyena, siyalibona igalelo lakhe kwesokuba umphathi wesiteshi saseNquthu.

Vele abantu ngeke banithande bonke ningeyona imali.Skhumbuzo ButheleziENQUTHU, KWANDINDINDI
Ukwehla kwentela kudalwa yinzuzo eyehlile yezinkampani
Busi MavusoUkwehla kokuqoqwa kwentela okubangwe yisimo esihambelana neCovid-19 kunomthelela ezingqinambeni ezibhekene nesizwe.Imbangela yokwehla kokuqoqwa kwentela wukuthi izinkampani bezivaliwe, abasebenzi behleli emakhaya nabathengi okudale ukuthi intela engenayo kanye ne-VAT kwehle kakhulu bengekho.Kwisabelozimali esasiphuthuma, uNgqongqoshe weziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, wabika ukuthi izibalo zikahulumeni zikhomba ukuthi intela ezongena izoba ngaphansi ngoR300 billion (21%) kwisibikezelo sonyaka.
Enkulumweni yeMTBPS ezothulwa kuleli sonto, sizobekwa esithombeni ngezinga lokwehla kwentela eqoqiwe.Ukwehla kwentela engenayo kukhombisa ngokusobala ukubaluleka komnotho onempilo oneminxa ezimele enenzuzo futhi ekhulayo.
Asikho esinye isibambelo esizokhuphula imali kahulumeni ngaphandle kwalesi.
INingizimu Afrika inezinkampani ezingaphezulu kwezigidi ezimbili ezibhaliselwe ukukhokha intela.
Phakathi kwazo kunezingaphezu kuka-500 000 ezidlulisela kuhulumeni intela ekhokwa yizisebenzi, iPAYE, kuthi ezingaphezu kuka-800 000 ziqoqela uhulumeni iVAT.
Izinkampani ezinempilo ziyisisekelo somnotho wezwe.Umonakalo odalwe yiCovid-19 nokwehla kwemali yentela engenayo ngo-21% yizimo ebezingalindelekile futhi zifikele phezu kwesimo somnotho ebesivele singesihle ezweni.
Intela eqoqiwe yehle ngoR42bn kunesibikezelo sango-2019/20 futhi ngonyaka ongaphambili ibingaphansi ngoR13bn.
Inkinga yentela engaphansi kwezibikezelo iyinkomba yokuthi inzuzo yezinkampani namaholo abasebenzi kwehlile ngendlela evelele.Ukudlangala kwenkinga kubonakala uma siphosa amehlo kwintela ekhokhwa yizinhlangano ezisemthethweni.
Uma kuqhathaniswa neminyaka eyedlule, intela engenile yehle ngo-25% kweyango-2007/8, ngo-18.1% kweyango-2015/16, ngo-16.5% kweyango-2018/19.Imbangela yokwehla kungaba wukuncishiswa kwezinga layo intela ebikhokhwa yilezi zinhlangano ibe wu-28% ngo-2012, isenzo esasondeza iNingizimu Afrika ezingeni lentela ye-OECD eliwu-20.6%.
Kodwa umthelela omkhulu wukuthi izinkampani bezingayitholi inzuzo efana neyangeminye iminyaka, ikakhulu ngaphambi kwenkinga yemali ka-2008 eyakhungatha umhlaba wonke.Izinkinga zemali esibhekene nazo ezweni kazikwazi ukuxazululeka ngaphandle kokubhekana nezinkinga zemikhakha ezimele.
Inqubomgomo yezomnotho kufanele ivumele imikhakha ezimele ukuthi ikhule ukuze ikwazi ukwandisa amathuba omsebenzi, ikhuphule amaholo abasebenzi ithole nenzuzo engcono.Uhulumeni ube yinsika futhi ewugqugquzela yena umnotho kule minyaka engu-10 edlule kodwa manje kuyacaca ukuthi uma kuzophumelela ukusimamisa umnotho, imikhakha ezimele kumele nayo isimame.
Okusho ukuthi izinhlelo zokuguqula isimo sikahulumeni esithikameza ukusebenza komnotho kumele zifeziwe.Sibona kuyinto enhle ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa agxile ekuxazululeni izinkinga zamandla kagesi emyankeni emibili ezayo ngenxa yokuthi eminyakeni ewu-10 edlule, isimo sikagesi sibe nomthelela omkhulu ekwehleni kwamandla ezinhlangano ezisemthethweni.
Uma uhulumeni engaxegisa izintambo avumele labo abasebenzisa ugesi abanamandla ukuthola izimvumo zokuzikhiqizela ugesi kungalekelela ekuxazululeni inkinga kagesi futhi kuthuthukise ikusasa lezinkampani.Ngokunjalo, kufanele kuqiniswe izinhlelo zokufinyelela kwizingqalasizinda yokuxhumana, i-broadband ne-spectrum.
Kwakuhlongozwe eminyakeni engu-10 edlule ukuthi kukhululwe i-spectrum ngokuthi ithengiswe.
Kumele izinkampani zikwazi ukuqasha abasebenzi basemazweni angaphandle abanamakhono angatholakali kuleli ukuze ukulahleka kwamakhono ngenkathi belifulathela leli abanamakhono kungakuphazamisi ukusimama komnotho, isikhathi esithathwayo ukukhipha izimvumo zamanzi nezemvelo sehliswe, kuphothulwe iMPRDA ezonikeza imboni yezimayini ithemba ikwazi ukutshala izimali zokuhlola umhlaba, nokuthi kwakhiwe ingqalasizinda ezokhuphula amandla omnotho ukuze kuhambe imphahla ngaphakathi kwezwe futhi ihanjiswe ngemkhumbhi emazweni angaphandle.Ukwakhiwa kwezinhlelo zengqalasizinda kuseqhulwini lokufukula umnotho kodwa kumele sikhumbule ukuthi ingqalasizinda ekhona kumanje ingasebenza ngendlela engcono kunalokhu okwenzekayo.
Ingqalasizinda yezitimela nezamachweba eTransnet ingasetshenziswa kangcono uma imikhakha ezimele ingathola ithuba lokubambisana nohulumeni itshale imali futhi ithole nokusebenzisa engasebenzi ngokugcwele.UMboweni ukubeke obala ukuthi inkinga yesimo semali kahulumeni ibucayi.
Kufanele kube nezinhlelo eziqinile ukwehlisa izinga lokusetshenziswa kwemali nguhulumeni, ikakhulukazi imali engena ezinhlelweni ezingakhuthazi ukutshala imali.
Kubalulekile futhi ukuthi imikhakha ezimele ithole ukwesekwa ukuze isimame okuhlanganisa nokukhula kwemali yentela engenayo.
Sonke siyasikhumbula isikhathi ngaphambili kuka-2008, imali yentela eyayingena yayingaphezulu kwemali eyayisetshenziselwa ukufeza izidingo zesizwe ngokuphindaphindiwe, uhulumeni wakwazi nokuba nenzuzo.
Lowo mphumela wawungenxa yokukhula kwemikhakha ezimele nohulumeni enamandla okuqoqa intela efanele.Inqubomgomo yemali kaMboweni kumele ihambisane nohlelo lokufukula umnotho likaRamaphosa kuqiniswe ukufeza izinhlelo zokuguqula isimo sikahulumeni uma sizophinde sibuyele kulezo zikhathi.UBusi Mavuso, yisikhulu esiphezulu seBusiness Leadership South Africa
Abantu kumele bafundiseke ngengozi yotshwala
MHLELI: Ngithi angidlulise ukukhathazeka kwami ngokuphuza kwabesifazane.
Indlela asebephuza ngayo utshwala iyethusa.
Sesiphila esikhathini esinzima lapho abesifazane bephuza kakhulu kunabesilisa kangangoba abantu besilisa bagcina sebenakekela izingane.Kwesinye isikhathi uyaye uthole umuntu wesifazane esexabana nabantu ngenxa yotshwala, abanye bagcina sebelimazene.
Sekukaningi ngizwa kuthiwa kukhona abashonile ngenxa yokulwa bephuzile kodwa lokho akubethusi odadewethu, bayaqhubeka nokuphuza kuze kweqe.Abagcini ngokuphuza utshwala, sebedla nezinye izidakamizwa eziyingozi.
Odokotela bathi ezinye zalezi zidakamizwa ziqeda inzalo kumuntu wesifazane.Baye baphuze utshwala ngenxa yokuthi babona ozakwabo bephuza nabo babone kungcono baphuze besaba ukuthi buzophela ubungani.
Kuye kube buhlungu uma sebephuza imali yezingane yesibonelelo sikahulumeni, bangabe besazifeza izidingo zezingane.Ababoniseki ngobungozi botshwala bavele bacabange ukuthi wena uzibona ungcono kunabo.Abesifazane nabesilisa kumele bafundiseke ngobungozi botshwala nangokuthi bakhulume uma kunengcindezi ababhekene nayo engabenza bagcine sebecwile otshwaleni.Gugu CeleMehlomnyama
Uhulumeni wethu angaze avumele utshwala pho?
Mhleli: Kuyiqiniso elingeke liphikwe ukuthi abaholi bethu kubahlule ekugcineni ukulwisana nalolu bhubhane oluhlasele izwe lethu.Abakwenze ekugcineni ngenkathi bexegisa imithetho kufane nokudlala ngegeja kuziliwe, ngokuthi kuxegiswe eminye yemigomo emayelana notshwala.Yebo bebecabangela umnotho ukuze ufukuleke kodwa sekungavulelwa utshwala pho?
Sekungaze kuvulelwe utshwala pho kuzo zonke izinto.
Yini ejahiwe ekuvulweni kotshwala?
Yebo, siyazi kukhona abakhala ngokuthi kuzolahleka imisebenzi kuphinde kuwe komnotho wezwe.
Yebo umnotho ubalulekile kodwa ngeke ubaluleke ukwedlula impilo yabantu.Kuthe ngesikhathi umengameli ememezela ukuvulwa kotshwala ngavele ngafikelwa yizinyembezi, ngaphinde ngafikelwa yisililo.
Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi ngizwa kukhala imikikizo namahuthi ezimoto.Ngize ngazibuza ukuthi hlobo luni lobuholi esinabo ezweni?Uyabona, sinobuholi obucabangela izisu zabo nezisu zongxiwankulu.Ngiyazibuza ukuthi ezintweni zonke zokuxegiswa komnotho kungaze kuxegiswe utshwala pho?
Ngiyafisa ukuba ubuholi benhlangano ebusayo buvuke emaqandeni manje.
Lobu buholi esinabo akusibona obashiywa ngowayengomengameli wokuqala ngaphansi kwentando yabantu, uMnuz Nelson Mandela.Ubuholi bukaMandela babucabangela izisu zabantu abahlwempu.
Mina ngifisa ubuholi bukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa buyeke ukudonswa ngekhala ngongxiwankulu.Phela sisemazingeni aphansi siyabuka nje futhi siyakhala ngobuholi bakhe manje.
Kubuhlungu ukubona abaholi benhlanhlatha phambi kwethu.
Eyokuvulwa kotshwala ivele yafana nokugwazwa kwethu ngemuva ngoba ukhuvethe luzozicanasela ezweni lethu.Ngiyafisa ukuba ubuholi bethu bucabangele impilo yabantu kuqala kunokucabangela inzuzo.
Sidinga abaholi abanonembeza nabaziyo ukuthi yini ethokozelwa ngabahlali.Khabazela KB MzimelaEZWELIBOMVU
Wafakelwani uDkt Xhakaza kuKhozi FM?
Mhleli.
Kwelakho eliphuma zonke izinsuku nelizikhipha zishisa zingakapholi.
Ngivumele ngibeke ilaka lami ngabaphathi boKhozi FM abasaqubeka nenzondo ngebandla lamaNazaretha.Okungikhathazayo isihloko esiphume kwelakho langeSabatha esithi "Adinwe ayaveva amaKristu ecikwa ngowakwaShembe".Okungihlekisayo ukuthi  lo muntu abakhuluma ngaye bethi ubakhubile uDkt Xhakaza ovame ukushintshana nDkt Mahaye ekuhlaziyeni izindaba zamaNazaretha.
Kodwa lona wakaXhakaza ungaphansi kweNazareth Church Of God, lolu hlangothi olungasekho nhlobo  ezimisweni zenkolo yobuNazaretha kepha sebesezimisweni zomholi wabo uMfundisi MelusiI Mpanza.
Okungenze ngabhala lana ukuthi kunjena nje kungenxa yomphathi-zinhlelo uZandile Tembe ohlulwa wukuba umholi oqotho.
Phambilini inkolo yobuNazaretha ibihlaziywa uDkt Mahaye  eyihlaziya ngobukhulu ubunyoninco.
Kuthe kungavuka isilwane savuka sama ngezinyawo kuDkt Xhakaza waputshukiswa esezoshintshana noDkt Mahaye.
Okwasikhathaza wukuthi uDkt Xhakaza ubengasahlaziyi inkolo kodwa bese ehlasela amazwi kaDkt Mahaye.
Mina engikubonile kuDkt Xhakaza wukuthi wahlulwa isilwane wafuna ukuyohlaziya inkolo yobuNazaretha ekubeni bona sebeyinkolo enezimiso zobuKristu.
Angibasoli oMfundisi Vusi Dube ngokumsola ngokuthi ukhuluma okungamfuni, kepha mina ngingasho ngingananazi ukuthi ukhuluma okumfunayo ngoba bayakholelwa enkolweni yobuKristu.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi abasekho ezimisweni zebandla lakwaShembe,  phela bona kade bazihlukanisa bazivulela elabo ibandla eliholwa uMpanza hhayi owakaShembe.
Okungikhathazayo kakhulu ukuthi sekuba sengathi uDkt Xhakaza uyilungu lebandla lamaNazaretha kanti akaselona nhlobo.
Ngifisa ukwazi ukuthi abaphathi bomsakazo Ukhozi FM babengenwe yini ngesikhathi benika uDkt Xhakaza ithuba ngoba uDkt Mahaye  ubehlaziya inkolo yobuNazaretha ngale kokugxibha inkolo yobuKristu kunalokho ubeqhakambisa ubumbano nokuzalana kwenkolo.
Kwesinye isikhathi siyabadinga abaholi bomsakazo abazoyilalela into abasuke beyifakile, ngoba kunjena nje yingoba abaphathi abayilaleli into abayenzile, lokhu kusitshela ukuthi sifunzwa ngenkani singabalaleli ukuba silalele.
Uyabona umunwe wami ukhomba ubhekisa kuZandile Tembe ongumphathizinhlelo ngokufaka amasobho amaningi ekubeni ukudla bekumnandi  ohlelweni iTendelomcimbi olushayelwa uBheka Prince Mchunu ngeSabatha.
Bengifisa ukuba uDkt  Xhakaza agxile entweni ayiyele emoyeni bese eyeka ukuhlasela izinkulumo zikaDkt Mahaye  nenkolo yobuKristu.
Ngiyaneseka kakhulu Mfundisi  Dube ngokuthi akakhishwe ohlelweni uDkt Xhakaza ngoba sifunzwa ukudla ekubeni singakufuni ngenxa yabaphathi boKhozi FM.
Khabzela KB MZIMELA EZWELIBOMVU
Abama-80s abahlukane nokutinyela ama-2000
KUNEMPI engingayazi ukuthi iyolanyulwa wubani phakathi kwabazalwe ngeminyaka ka-2000 nabeka-1980.
Zaze zalufela ubala izingane ezincane ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, zingenzanga lutho.Ziningi izinto ezingezinhle ezihlala zibhalwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngezingane ezizalwe ngeminyaka ka-2000.Imvamisa le mpi iba phakathi kwezintokazi zama-80’s ezihlala zifaka izithombe zazo ziswenkile, bese zifuna ukuqhathaniswa nezingane zika-2000.Yilapho obona khona ukuthi inkulu indaba ngalezi zingane, indlela ezigqoka ngayo nemfashini yesimanje yehluke kakhulu kuneyangama-80’s.
Okumangazayo wukuthi kunabantu beminyaka ka-1990 ongeke ubezwe bethi vu ngabaka-2000 ekubeni yibona abasondele eminyakeni yabo.
Babodwa abakhala ngokuthi abaka-2000 bayashesha ukuqoma nokukhulelwa futhi abalazi ihlazo.Kumangaze ngoba kunenqwaba yabaka-2000 enabazali baka-1980 abacishe balingane nabanye babo, okukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi nabo badlulile kulesi sigaba sobungane nokudideka.
Kwamanye amakhasi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ikakhulu kuFacebook sekwaba yisitayela ukufaka isithombe sakho bese usho iminyaka onaye maqede uzibongele ngokuthi noma umdala usabukeka kangcono kunabaka-2000, okungawenzi umqondo.Kuyihlazo okwenziwa ngabaka-1980 kulezi zingane ngenxa yokubona namathuba ezibe nawo empilweni.
Kuyacaca ukuthi konke okusuke kushiwo kuhambisana nomona ngoba lezi zingane zigxekwa ngesingisi esikhulu ezisikhulumayo, ukugqoka izimpahla ezibizayo, amathuba ezikhula ekhona nangokukhula ngokushesha.
Alikho nelincane iphutha elibekwa licace ngama-2000 ngaphandle kokuthi konke okubi kudalwa yibona.Uma izintokazi zama-80’s zingazehlisa kuningi ezingakufunda kulezi zingane ngisho emakhaya.Iningi lama-2000 likwazi ukwenza imisebenzi yezandla, ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe ngobuchule, yizindlela ezilula nokuzenza izitayela zasemakhanda, yizindlela zokugqokela izitayela zemfashini, ukuzenza izinzipho, ukuziphaqula zibuka kwi-internet.Ngaphandle kwalezi zinto ziningi nezinye izinto abama-80’s abangazifunda yize ukuphendulana nomuntu omdala kungeyona into enhle kodwa ama-2000 ayakwazi ukuqophisana nawe ngenkulumo besebenzisa izibonelo ezisencwadini, uze ulibone nawe iphutha lakho.Lokhu kuyakhombisa ukuthi abacindezelekile kangakanani ngokomqondo.
Noma ngabe abaka-1980 bangakhalipha kanganani kodwa akukho abazokufundisa ama-2000 kuzwakale kahle ngoba yonke into ayithatha ngolaka nokujaha ukuzigxeka lezi zingane.Lesi yisikhathi sokwamukela ukuthi impilo ayisafani futhi indlela okhululiswe ngayo ngeke ifane nokukhuliswa ngayo izingane ezincane kunawe.
Kunezinto ama-2000 azazi kangcono kunabazalwe ngo-1980 futhi akulona ihlazo ngenxa yegebe leminyaka elikhona phakathi kwabo.Le nto yaqalwa wumuntu oyedwa, walandelwa yinqwaba efuna ukubukwa ngokudicilela phansi isithunzi sabanye.Uma umuntu efisa ukuguqula lesi simo angaqala ngokuveza okuhle okwenziwa yingane yangakubo ka-2000.
Phansi ngokuhlukunyezwa kwama-2000 ezinkundleni zokuxhumana engenacala!
Uyekeni umkhuba uzonehlisa isithunzi ezinganeni.
Kuya ngamagama enkehli oSuthwini

Sizihlalele hleke asinaqembu kwiBafana Bafana
MhleliKwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele ngithi ake ngibeke owami umuzwa ngeqembu lesizwe iBafana Bafana, ngisuswa indlela leli qembu elenza ngayo uma libhekene namanye amaqembu awontanga yalo, noma kungaba nzima kangakanani ukuthi sivume ukuthi empeleni thina kule lizwe asinalo iqembu lesizwe kodwa sinenhlangano nje eyabunjelwa ukudla imali yesizwe ngendlela ephucukile ngokukhuthuza abakhokhi bentela engabe isiza ukwelekelela abantulayo noma uhulumeni ayeke ukugolozela nokuqologa abasebenzi bakhe ngokungabakhuphuleli imiholo, nangokungabanikezi imihlomulo yabo uma beqeda unyaka ngoba ethi ayikho imali, kodwa bebe besebenzile, okunalokho yizona izikhulu neziphathimandla zikahulumeni nabangani babo abasondelene nabo kodwa zibe zingalethwa izidingo kubantu ngoba behlangene nalo Safa abadla nawo imali,Akakwazi ukungangeneleli uhulumeni aphenye ukuthi yini ebanga ukuthi iqembu lesizwe angumnikazi walo phela lo hulumeni ngesabelo mali esingena kwezemidlalo.Okwenza ngisho kanje ukuthi uhulumeni uyangenelela uma kukhona okungamgculisi ngokuphathwa kwamaqembu ezemidlalo njenge-rugby, cricket namanye ngoba efaka imali kuwo, pho kungani angazihluphi uma iBafana Bafana  inezinkiga ngandlela thize baphenye ukuthi lokhu kubangwa yiniUmengameli weSafa uMnuz.
Jordaan akazange azihluphe ngokuza kwabezindaba  ngoLwesithathu lmhla ka 31 Marhi  ngo 12 emini ngesikhathi bezomemezela ukuxoshwa komqeqeshi weBafana Bafana uMolefi Ntseki, kodwa wakhetha ukuthumela izithunywa ngoba esaba imibuzo azobuzwa yona abezindaba.Nokuthi uma bexosha abaqeqeshi kodwa bona ababaqashayo baxoshwa nini.Imibuzo  okumele abhekane nayo uJordaan nethimba lakhe, mhla kwangena abantu abalaziyo ibhola nokuphathwa kwalo, nabanamaqembuu ahlonishwayo eNingizimu Afrika, noma abalidlalile ibhola ngokomlando kuyoba yingamhla le lizwe liba neqembu lesizwe elihlonishwa nakwamanye amazwe.Mhlawumbe kuyomele le mali eya kwiSafa iyiswe emaqenjini ePSL nakoGlad Africa kuthuthukiswe namaqembu ebhola ngoba wona siyayibona into ayenzayo.Mhlonishwa NseleEMgungundlovu

Akuphele ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane
MHLELI: Njengophiko lwabantu besifazane eqenjini iNkatha (IFPWB) asiqale sisho ukuthi siyakwamukela ukuboshwa kowesilisa osolwa ngokubulala izingane zakhe ezintathu eThekwini.Njengabesifazane eqenjini sikhathazekile ngezigameko lapho abantu besilisa bekuthola kunzima satshe ukwamukela uma abesifazane abasebudlelwaneni nabo bebatshela ukuthi ucu alusahlangani entanyeni akuhlukwane.Bebone kungcono ukuthi baziphindiselele ngokuthi baqothe imbokodo nesisekelo ngisho izingane imbala.
Siyazwelana kakhulu nayo yonke imindeni elahlekelwe zihlobo zayo ngenxa yodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane.Sithi asiphinde futhi sizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwethu okukhulu mayelana nezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane ngesihluku.
Lokhu sikusho ngemuva kokubulawa kwesitshudeni sasenyuvesi yase-UCT u-Uyinene Mrwetyana kanye nomshayisibhakela wesifazane waseMdantsane uLeighandre Jegels kanye nabanye okungabikiwe ngokubulawa kwabo.Lezi zigameko zokubulawa kwabantu besifazane zenzeka esikhathini lapho izwe laseNingizimu Afrika lisenkingeni yokubhekana nezinga eliphezulu lokwanda kodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane, lwenziwa ngabantu besilisa.
Abantu besifazane sebephenduke iziboshwa uqobo ezweni labo ngenxa yokwesaba ukwenzakaliswa ngabantu besilisa.Nathi siyavumelana nalabo abathi udaba lodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane kumele luthathwe njengesibhicongo senhlekelele ezweni okumele kubhekwane naso ngokushesha.
Sinxusa-ke zonke izinhlaka zomthetho kuleli zwe ukuthi nazo zenze konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ziyalwa nalesi sihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kuphinde kubulawe abantu besifazane.
Izinhlaka zomthetho kumele zisheshise ukwenza uphenyo kuwo wonke amacala abikwayo nasebikiwe athinta ukuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane.
Simelene nokuthi kuphele iminyaka kungafinyelelwa esiphethweni samacala okuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane.Isikhathi manje lesi sokuthi uqine umthetho ovikela abesifazane.
Bonke abahlukumezi kumele bajeziswe kanzima uma ngempela leli zwe lizimisele ukuvikela abantu besifazane.Ngakho-ke kungumsebenzi kahulumeni wakuleli zwe ukuthi avikele abesifazane kubahlukumezi.Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi nawo awubambe iqhaza ekulweni nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane nezingane.
Ngaphandle kokuthi zonke izinhlaka zibambisane ngeke inqotshwe impi yodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane.
Siyakholelwa kakhulu futhi ekutheni kumele kube nokushintsha komqondo kubantu besilisa babone ukuthi kuyinto embi ukuhlukumeza abantu besifazane.Siwuphiko lwabesifazane eqenjini iNkatha sithi sekwanele manje ngodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane.
Into esiyidingayo nje kuphela uhulumeni ozimisele ekutheni aqhamuke namasu amasha angumkhombandlela ocacile oqondene nokulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane.UMntwana Phumzile ButheleziMPL,uSihlalo kazwelonke wophiko lwabesifazane eqenjini iNkatha (IFP Women’s Brigade)
Iqiniso malingafihlwa, uhlulekile uRamaphosa
MHLELI: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele, ngibona uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa (osesithombeni) esehlulekile, sekusele inkani nje.Usefisa ukuthi bamxoshe naye, akukho asangasenzela khona.
Uyabona ukufika kwakhe kusizele nezinkinga eziningi eNingizimu Afrika.Ngingabala inzondo nodlame okubhekiswe kwabokufika, ukuphela komsebenzi, ukungavuleki kwamathuba omsebenzi, ukwenyuka kwentengo yokudla, kaphethroli, nentela, ukucishwa kukagesi, njalonjalo.
Ngingabala kushone ilanga, yikho ngithi uRamaphosa usehlulekile futhi leli lizwe alisenalo iphambili, limile nje endaweni eyodwa.Ngelinye ilanga uhulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika uyobona kudala ukuthi abokufika yibo abayimbangela yokucwilisa lo mkhumbi waseNingizimu Afrika.
Emabhizinisini nasemsebenzini kukhonya bona.
Abakuleli sebehlala bebalisa nje njalo.
Okubuhlungu noma ungafunda, uhlala naso ekhaya isitifiketi sakho.Emsebenzini abafuni ukusikhuphulela imali, balokhu bethi umnotho wehlile.
Sidonsa kanzima kuleli lizwe.
Ngenkathi i-ANC ithatha izwe ngo-1994, sasinethemba lokuthi sophila kangcono kanti siyazikhohlisa.Abaholi be-ANC bahlala bekhuluma minyaka yonke ukuthi bazovula amathuba omsebenzi.Ngikhuluma nje kunoThuma Mina kodwa bathunywa uma kwenziwani?Sidonsa kanzima kanjena nje, kuzophela iminyaka engu-26 sathola inkululeko.
Okuhamba phambili ukubulalelana izikhundla, inkohlakalo, ukucinywa kukagesi nemibhikisho.
Ingabe yikho lokhu esakuvotela?Thanda Mnikaziwempuphu ChoncoeMpangeni
Asicatshangelwe sonke phela uma kuthathwa izinqumo
MHLELI: Kwelakho ngicela ukudlulisa ukungenami kwami ngezinqumo zikahulumeni.
Ngizoqala ngamabhasi abizwa ngeRea Vaya.UNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe awabathathe abantu ekuseni ngo-5 agcine ngo-5 ntambama.Umbuzo enginawo abafowethu abawonogada kanjalo nalaba abasebenza ezitolo nasemagaraji ngabe ubacabangelile yini uMbalula uma ethi amabhasi awagcine ngo-5 ntambama?Owesibili umbuzo uthi njengoba kujahwe kuvulwe izikole izingane zethu ziphephe kangakanani njengoba kwavalwa izikole isibalo sisephansi sabanesifo kodwa zivulwa sebeyizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane.Ngabe uhulumeni ujaheni ukuvula izikole?
Kuyasibulala ukubukela kwamanye amazwe ngoba wona anezinto eziningi esingenazo thina.Ngokwami ngibona uhulumeni enza ngamabomu uma ethi akuvulwe izikole empeleni uyazi othisha bazoteleka ebese engabaholeli usehlulekile ukubaholela behleli ekhaya.Kodwa-ke ngiyafisa abaholi bethu uma bezothatha izinqumo baqale babhekelele umphakathi uzokwenza njani?Kunzima ukubona onogada beshayisa qede bahambe phansi.Njengoba sekusheshe kube mnyama balubhada phansi amabhasi engasekho ngoba akulula bagibele amatekisi njengoba ebiza kangaka awaseSoweto.Isigcino bangasebenzela wona ngoba akekho ongazi onogada bangena u-6 ekuseni baphume u-6 ntambama.
Manje kuthiwa abahambe ngani?
Kunzima ukuba semazingeni aphansi ngoba izinqumo ezithathwayo zivele zilwe nawe.Thanda ChoncoeGoli
Bubhekwe yizinselelo ubuKhosi bamaZulu
MHLELI: Sekube kuningi ukuqagela ngekusasa lesizwe samaZulu, njengoba kuqeda kukhothama Isilo.
Abanye bayazibuza ukuthi, ngabe ozohlala esihlalweni sobukhosi uyophatha kanjani, uma kuqhathaniswa neSilo esiqeda kukhothama?
Abanye bathi Isilo besingenzi lutho ukuvikela umlando waKwaZulu nokubumba uZulu.
Anginakuphawula-ke ngalokho.
Engizophawula ngakho yilokhu kokuthi sekuzogcwanekela okuyizizwana ekubuseni kobuholi bomdabu.
Nohulumeni usezongena agamanxe ekubuseni kwezomdabu.
UCogta usuzongena uthi-shi ekulawuleni amakhosi nezinduna zomdabu kuleli.
Phela ubuKhosi baKwaZulu yibona obuhlonishwa kakhulu kuleli uma uqhathanisa nezinye izizwe, futhi uhulumeni ubengahlomeki noma ikanjani kusabusa uBhejane phumes'qiwini.

Laba bantu abathi balwela amalungelo abantu, basazobunyakazisa ubuKhosi bukaZulu.

Indoda eqotho ayimbulali umuntu ethandana naye nezingane zayo
MHLELI: Izwe lakithi eNingizimu Afrika lihlaselwe isihlava esibi esinyantisayo sokubulawa kwabesifazane nezingane bebulawa ngabantu abathi bayizithandwa zabo.Kepha-ke uma sifuna ukulungisa izwe kuhle silibheke iqiniso macala wonke singambambathi bantu bakithi.Isinqumo sokuthi ubulale umuntu omthandayo nabantwana bakho yingoba vele uyazazi ukuthi uyisehluleki ,wasizwa amakhathakhatha nosisi bakho nobabekazi bakho ukuthi akuthande.Wena isisoka usuke ungenaso, ulimu lwakho lumbaxa mbili.Bantu baseNingizimu Afrika lezi zinto engizibalula ngenhla yizinto engicabanga ukuthi nazo zingaba yimbangela yokuba odadewethu nomama bethu bebulaliswe okwezimpukane.Amadoda aqotho asekhona, siyacela ukuthi lapho sihlangana khona noma ikuphi ke sixoxe le ndaba khona umuntu ezosizakala, ezoshintsha umqondo mhlawumbe naye obesecabanga ukwenza okubi.Angifuni nje nokuyifaka eyamaphoyisa nejele ngoba akumele nokuba kuze kufike nje lapho.Angihambisani nokuthi sekwanele ngento embi kepha ngithanda ukuba ivinjwe iphele, singabheki ngale kwayo ukuthi kumele kwenzakeni.Mpha Omnyama ShabalalaEMnambithi, kwaMteyi
Amakhansela anonya uma ekhipha ukudla
MHLELI: Ngithi angibhale kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele njengesakhamuzi ku-ward 105 ngaphansi kukaMasipala weTheku ngizwakalisa ukudumala kwami ngento eyenziwe yikhansela lakule ndawo.Ikhansela lilethe ukudla ebusuku kanti abantu abahlomulile ngabangaswele njengoba iningi labo linabo abasebenzayo emindenini.Okubi nokuyinto engiphathe kabi wukubona imindeni ephethwe yizaguga neminye eholwa yizintandane isala ngaphandle ngenxa yokukhetha iphela emasini okwenziwe yikhansela nobhululu balo.Lokhu kushiya isithombe ngobuholi balo masipala njengoba abantu bezobulawa yinkemane kodwa kukhona izijumbana zokudla ezikhishiwe zaya kwabathile abathandwa yizinhliziyo zabo.Ubani obhalisa abantu abadinga izijumbana zokudla?
Iyiphi indlela abayisebenzisayo ukukhetha abantu okumele bahlomule?
Leli gciwane ukufika kwalo kuthinte wonke umuntu kodwa bengithi asibhekelele labo abaswele ngempela singacabangeli abangani bethu.IMeya yeTheku uMxolisi Kaunda ngibe nesiqiniseko sokuthi kwayona kayilwazi unya olungaka olwenziwa ngamakhansela kamasipala.Okubuhlungu uma kuvotwa bangena kuyona le mizi yabantu abaswele bezoyikhohlisa ukuba ibavotele.
Leli khansela eliphethe izindawo ezihlanganisa iMfume, iFakazi, Ohlongeni naseMdumezulu alinasizo emphakathini kodwa ligijimisa intuthuko endaweni yangakubo eMfume.
Ngeke ngithuke uma ngizwa ukuthi abantu abaningi abahlomulile abaseMfume.Okubi ukuthi abantu abazona iziwula.
Lokhu abakwenzayo bakumele nangonyaka ozayo uma sebencenge amavoti.OkhathazekileEFakazi
Sicela uMbalula afike azozibonela
MHLELI: Ngibhala ngenxa yokuphatheka kabi mayelana nezinto zokuthutha umphakathi waseRockville, Soweto.
Umphakathi uma uya edolobheni usebenzisa amatekisi nawo ahlukene kabili kodwa ahluleka khona kunjalo.Ngizoqala ngalawa akhokhisa R16 ahlale egcwele nje uma edlula eMoroka Police Station, angaphela amahora amathathu ulokhu ukhombe phezulu.
Bese kuzoba akhokhisa R15.50.Kumele uhambe imizuzu engamashumi amathathu uya lapho egitshelwa khona, into enzima kithina esihamba kusempondozankomo.
Nobugebengu buningi eSoweto kodwa kuthukela nje uyithole eduzane.
Ngibona kufanele ngabe ayabahlangabeza abantu ngaso sonke isikhathi.Esiwabonayo yilawa asendaweni asivusa noma silele.
Angazi ukuthi yini eyenza ukuthi lawa aya eGoli angabukeli kulawa asendaweni.Siyafana nabantu abangenamatekisi eRockville.
Bese ngiza kwiRea Vaya.
Ungawabona ephithizela impela uze wethembe usengaphandle.
Ngena-ke ngaphakathi esiteshini uzodela, mancane amahora amathathu ulindile.E-T1 yakhona azoqhamuka kodwa angami eThokoza Park, adlule ngehubo.
Emva kwamahora amabili kungene eyodwa, nakhona ithathe abantu abangamashumi amabili nanhlanu ngoba ilawulwa wumthetho womvalelandlini.
Nihlale nilinde amanye amahora amaningi.
Niyawabuka njalo afike ajike khona eThokoza Park abuyele edolobheni engenamuntu.Uma ubuza ukuthi kungani esibona sibangaka engasithathi bakuphendula ukuthanda kwabo nje abasebenza khona.
Okufike kusixake wukuthi uma siya edolobheni ayasidlula kuthiwa ayolayisha eThokoza Park, uma siseThokoza Park asidlule ethi ayolayisha edolobheni.Ngokwami ngibona sengathi abaphathi bawo bavele bathathwa nje bafakwa emsebenzini bengazi lutho.Uma ibhasi nebhasi ingalayisha abantu eThokoza Park ingabashiyi abantu ibabona, ibuye futhi ibalayishe nasedolobheni ingabashiyi, ingaphela le nto yokugcwala kwabantu eziteshini ngoba ayikho ibhasi ezobe ishiya abantu.Le nto yabo isenza sephule umthetho kahulumeni wokuqhelelana ngenxa yamabhasi akwaRea Vaya.
Ngibona iMoroka, Thokoza Park, Dlamini neRockville benelikhulu ishwa mayelana nezinto zokuthutha eziphethwe ngabantu abangawuqondi umsebenzi wokuthutha umphakathi.Ngiyacela uNgqongqoshe uFikile Mbalula avakashele eThokoza Park kusukela seligamanxe ihora lesithathu ntambama khona ezobona ngikhuluma ngani.Akafike angangeni ngaphakathi esiteshini ahlale ngaphandle abale amabhasi adlula engalayishi lapho abantu benyathelana ngaphakathi bewalindile abese ebona-ke ukuthi umthetho wokuqhelelana kasiwephuli ngenhloso.OkhathazekileEThokoza Park, eSoweto
ISilo esibusayo masihlonishwe njengoyise
MHLELI: Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kuzomele bakuqondisise ukuthi iSilo siphethe amabutho ngakho-ke sidinga ukuhlonishwa.
Ukuze sihlonishwe kumele naso sizihloniphe.
Ngalawo mazwi angiqondile ukuthi asizihloniphi kodwa sekumele iSilo sikwazi ukuhlukanisa phakathi kokuba ngumuntu nje nokuba yiSilo.ISilo singesethu, sibusa thina ngakho-ke asizukuzimela izinto ezizokwehlisa isithunzi saso  nesasendlunkulu yakithi kwaZulu.
ISilo esibusayo, uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, asihlonishwe bakwethu njengoba bekuhlonishwa uyise.
Asikho iSilo esiphoswa imibuzo yizintatheli, kungezona zodwa nayinoma ngubani nje.
Inkosi iba nondunankulu nomkhulumeli  kanjalo nendlunkulu yonkana.
Lokhu kuwuphawu lokungasihloniphi iSilo, kuyasijivaza isithunzi saso.
Asikhumbule ukuthi iSilo naso singumuntu, sizophendula ngokunganaki kanti sesiyinyathela emsileni ngoba sixinwe ngemibuzo bese kuthiwa siphoxile, sijike sigxekwe bese sehlelwa yisithunzi.
ISilo sethula inkulumo, hhayi ukuthi sibuzwe imibuzo!
Mameshane….
Bengobani labo ababuza umlomo ongathethimanga!!!
Sicela abeluleki beSilo benze umsebenzi wabo, ayingashintshi inqubomgomo yasendlunkulu ngoba lolu shintsho luzojivaza isithunzi sendlunkulu.Abezepolitiki mabaphume bephele okwembewu yamazambane endlunkulu uma bengezile ngezinhlelo zokuletha isabelo zimali.Izinqumo nemihlangano yasendlunkulu akube ngeyendlunkulu, hhayi phatha phatha uNdunankulu uZikalala usenomhlangano nendlunkulu, kade sayibona ingqondo ye-ANC nokufuna ukuqeda isithunzi sendlunkulu.
Ngizobala okumbalwa; ngo-2015 ihhovisi likaNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu lahlongoza ukuthi izibongo ezalahlekelwa ukuba yizilo kwazo ngesikhathi seLembe mazifake izicelo zibuyelwe ukuba yizilo.
Eminyakeni eyedlule uhulumeni wahlongoza ukuvalwa koMkhosi woMhlanga, kuningi nje.
Konke lokho luyabuka ubuka!
Siyacela kuBayede oNgangezwelakhe ukuba angavumeli izinto ezizojivaza isithunzi sasendlunkulu yakithi kwaZulu, ikakhulukazi amaqembu ezepolitiki ngoba yiwona azoyiwisa bhu phansi.
Sesiyozitshela ukuthini izizukulwane ezilandelayo ngendlunkulu uma izofa ngathi?
Ipolitiki isilibulele izwe, sicela kuwe Ndaba ukuthi usigadele ngobunono bekati ubuqhawe nomlando beLembe nendlunkulu.Ngiyojabula uma le mizwa yami ingafinyelela endlunkulu nasemphakathini ukuze nabantu baphefumule ngayo kuphinde kube noshintsho ngoba nginesiqiniseko ukuthi bayidlanzana abamzila munye nalesi sinqumo yikhona ukuthi abazi ukuthi bazomemeza bani kusabele bani.

Ihobeleni Inkatha ngodaba lukadoti eThekwini?

Yini evimba amakhansela eNkatha ekutheni ahlangane nalaba basebenzi ukuzwa uhlangothi lwabo?
Kungani Inkatha yethemba ukuthi izoxazulula le nkinga ime le kude?Inkatha yaziwa futhi siyethemba ukuthi isakholelwa ekuzisizeni nasekuzethembeni.

Indaba yoR350 yinhle kodwa...
MHLELI: Kwelakho elifundwa yizindimbane zabantu nelizikhipha zisashisa.
Ngivumele ngibeke ilaka lami ngenkulumo kamengameli ebeyibhekise esizweni.
Uyabona kudlaliwe ngathi kule nkulumo yakhe ka-2021.
Ziningi izinto ezibalulwe nguMengameli wethu uCyril Ramaphosa kodwa ubona ukuthi izinto ezingekho.
Engifuna ukukuqinisa kuyo yile ndaba yoR350 ojatshulelwe ngabantu abaningi khathi ethi welula izinyanga zokuholwa kwabo.
Kungabe kuhloswe ukuthi sibe ngokhangezile na?Lokhu ngikubuziswa ukuthi lndaba yoR350 yinhle impela kubantu abangenangqondo, kepha abanengqondo bayabona ukuthi kudlalwa ngathi ngoba imisebenzi yethu ithathwa ngabokufika.
Kazi yini esiyikweleta abokufika kuleli lizwe lethu na?
Ngoba babukeka bezichanasela kuzo zonke izinkalo zomnotho wethu.
Zolo lokhu, kuke kwathiwa inkankane nenkankane alidle umnyundu wangakubo, okungihlekisayo bona abaholi bethu babavikela baze bathi banelungelo lokusincintisa isinkwa esingekho ezweni lethu.
Namanje ngisasho ngithi lena yoR350 izosenza abantu abazodla imbuya ngothi, izosenza abampofu nabangazazi ukuthi bazokhalaphi.
Bengilindele ukuthi umengameli uzothi akukhishwe abokufika kuzo zonke inkalo zokusebenzela, laba abangenamvume bayiswe emakubo, ngoba yithi esikhokha intela nesidlala indima enkulu ekufukuleni umnotho wezwe.
Ngibabona laba bantu bokufika befana nabantu abazontshontsha umnotho wethu, bawuyise emazweni abo.
Bengifisa ukuba isizwe sethu ke-siyihlolisise kahle le ndaba yoR350 ngoba sibhizi sijabulela bona ekubeni imisebenzi ithathwa abokufika.
Okumele sikwenze ukuba sibumbane, sibe yimbumba singamesabi uhulumeni, simele iqiniso.KHABZELA KB MZIMELA EZWELIBOMVU

Kazi uNtencane wabadlelani kuKhozi FM?
Mhleli: Kwelakho eliwela umfula ugcwele, ngicela ukudlulisa ilaka lami ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo ohlelweni lukamaskandi oKhozini FM, uSgiyangengoma.Abasakazi bethu uTshathugodo noZimdollar ababenzi ubulungiswa ngomculo walo mfana omncane oshisa izikhotha kuzwelonke igama lakhe uNtencane.Lo mculi ukhiphe ingoma ethandwa izwe lonke kodwa abasakazi basayidlale kabili nje vo ohlelweni lwabo.
Umbuzo wami uthi uvinjelwani umfana omncane ngoba izwe lonke liyamthanda?
