Imikokotelo yemiyezane yehlisa isithunzi
MHLELI: Into eyenziwa ngamaqili esikhonza nawo lapha ebandleni lamaNazaretha yimbi.
Lokhu ngikusho ngoba kunabantu abazama ngamandla ukwedukisa izwe nabantu abazofuna ukukholwa ngokweqiniso.Bese abantu bakholwa ngamanga nangenkohliso balandele izinto ezingekho neziphambene nokulunga.Ngisho ngoba inkosi Mduduzi Shembe umhlaba wonke uyazi ukuthi yabekwa yizigebengu ukuthi ihole ibandla ngokungemthetho.
Kwaphikiswa uThingo nasekutheni lowo owakhethwa ngokwezwi nangokomthetho webandla angaliholi ibandla.
Lokho kuholele ekutheni izinkantolo ezintathu zimlahle ngecala.Laba bantu bazame ngawo wonke amandla ukwakha lesi sithixo sabo baze basakhela nesitifiketi esiwumbombayi, esimenza abe sengathi ungumholi osemthethweni ukuze kukhohliswe abantu abangazi lutho ngalobu Nazaretha.
Namhlanje sekuphindile, bakha imikokotelo yemiyezane bathi ungosolwazi womhlaba wonke.Engifisa ukucacisela umhlaba wukuthi laba bantu sebenamahloni, okuthi isithixo sabo ebebekhohlisa ngaso umhlaba besibiza ngoNkulunkulu, silahlwe yicala, sekumele sehle esihlalweni ebesihlezi kuso ngokungemthetho.
Abasazi ukuthi bazothini ebantwini.
Yikho sebekhethe ukuzakhela izikole zasehlathini ezizomethwesa imiyezane, kube sengathi ubuholi bakhe busemthethweni.Nalo qhibukhowe ongumnikazi wesikole wehlulekile wukuchaza into ezwakalayo ukuthi isikole sakhe sinawo yini amalungelo asezingeni lokwethwesa umuntu iziqu zokuba ngusolwazi nokuthi sibhaliswephi isikole sakhe.
Umhlaba kumele wazi ukuthi laba bantu abakade bethweswa imiyezane bobathathu okuyinkosi Mduduzi Shembe, inkosi Mqoqi Ngcobo noMfu Friend Nzama balahlwe yicala, baze banikwa umgomo wokuthi bakhokhe zonke izindleko zenkantolo.
Sebekhethe ukufihla la manyala abo ebusweni bomhlaba ngemiyezane ewumbombayi.Naye umnikazi wesikole ungumngani walo uNyazi.
Umhlaba okumele ukwazi wukuthi laba bobathathu bebehlonishelwa ukubhidliza nokonakalisa umsebenzi kaShembe.
Ngaphezulu kwako konke bahlonishelwa ukuphikisa izwi likaShembe.
Ngokuphikisa izinkantolo bakhombise umhlaba ukuthi bona bangaphezulu komthetho wakuleli lizwe.
Noma bangenzani abakuthandayo ngesikhathi abasithandayo kodwa umthetho ngeke bawenze lutho.Okungijabulisayo wukuthi umhlaba uyamazi manje umholi osemthethweni.
Ngibonga nephephandaba lethu ngokusinceda lisedlulise ulwazi ebantwini emhlabeni wonke jikelele.Sakhile Mthembu
Kuyalimaza ukungabi nohlelo lokusebenzisa imali
UKE uzibuze nje ukuthi kungani imali yakho iphelela ezandleni?
Kuyenzeka uzigxeke ngendlela osebenzisa ngayo imali kodwa uphinde into efanayo?
Ziningi izizathu zokuthi uchithe imali ngaphezu kwalokho okufanele.
Esokuqala ukungabi nohlelo lokusebenzisa imali noma ibhajethi.
Uma ungayihleleli imali engenayo kulula ukuyichitha noma kanjani ngoba awunavalo lokuthi izophela ungakalufezi uhlelo lwakho.
Ukungabi nebhajethi kuyindlela esheshayo yokuqeda imali.Lokhu kwenziwa isizathu sesibili esiqondene nokuba khona kwemali.
Ukuzigxeka ngokusebenzisa imali budlabha kwenzeka uma ingekho imali ngesikhathi ubuyekeza ukuthi wenzeni ngayo.
Uma isikhona imali zonke izinto obuzifisa zifika izinqotho zithi khipha imali.
Uma ungaziniki isikhathi sokucubungula ukuthi yini oyidingayo ugcina usuthenga izinto ongazidingi.
Nomusa uyanda uma unemali ugcine uphisana ngayo.Esinye isizathu esibhebhethekisa ukuchitha imali budlabha wumuzwa wokuthi kunesidingo sokuthi usebenzise imali.
Izikhathi zonyaka ezifana noKhisimusi zinomthelela omkhulu ekuchitheni imali kungenasidingo.
Imvama uthola abantu sebeboleka imali ekuqaleni konyaka ukuze baphindele emsebenzini noma bakhokhele isikole.
Okunye okugqugquzela ukuthenga okungahleliwe wumuzwa wokuthi into izophela noma izobe isibiza ngokuzayo.
Lo muzwa usetshenziswa abahwebi futhi uyabasebenzela isikhathi esiningi.
Kukangaki uthenga izinto ongeke uzisebenzise manje ngelithi ziyobe sezibiza uma usuzidinga?Abadayisayo bagqugquzela ukuthi thenga manje ngoba ngeke isaba khona impahla.
Uma uthenga ngekhadi ungakhiphi ukheshi awubuzwa ubuhlungu bokuphuma kwemali.
Akufani nokukhokha ukheshi.
Kepha nokheshi uyinkinga uma uphethe imfumba yawo.
Singathi nje inkinga akulona ikhadi noma ukheshi kodwa wumqondo wokuthi imali iningi ngisho kungenjalo.Enye into eyenza sithenge ngokungahlelekile umuzwa esiba nawo ngempahla esiyithengile.
Yingakho ubona abantu bekhombisa wonke umuntu ezinkundleni zokuxhuma impahla abayithengile.
Ukunconywa abangani kwenza ubone usezingeni eliphezulu ungazisoli ngemali oyichithile.
Uma usufuna lo muzwa futhi kufanele uphinde uthenge bese uvezela izwe likubone.
Akuyona into embi ukuthenga into ekujabulisyo kodwa kuba yinkinga uma sekuwumkhuba.
Uma sewenzela ukubukwa abantu uzithola usungena esikweletini.Ngisho kuthiwa unemali eningi kangakanani uma uyichitha ngokungacabangi izophela.
Bangaki abantu esizwa ukuthi bawina izizumbulu ze-lotto kodwa abangasenalutho?
Uthini ngabakhokhelwa izizumbulu zamathenda kodwa uhlangane nabo sebeboleka imali emuva kwesikhashana?
Uma ungenahlelo kungekudala uzobe ungenamali.
Ngisho kuthiwa imali incane uyaludinga uhlelo ukuze uyisebenzisele izinto ezibalulekile.
Uhlelo lusiza ngokuthi nemali ozijabulisa ngayo uyihlelele ungachitha imali ongenayo.
Ukwenza uhlelo singakufanisa nokuba nama-debit order akusiza ukuthi ukhokhele izidingo ngesikhathi.
Inkinga ukuthi uhlelo lwenziwa uwena futhi lulawulwa uwena.
Kudinga ukuthi ube wumuntu oqotho ukuze ululandele ngendlela.
Nokulujwayela kuba lula ngoba usuke ubona imithelela emihle.Kodwa nohlelo alwanele uma ungaziqapheli izilingo esikhulume ngazo.
Kufanele uhlelo lwakho lucacise ukuthi uzomelana kanjani nezilingo.
Kuyasiza ukwazi ukuthi izimpahla ziyabiza uma zisafika kuthi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi zibe sendalini.
Ngesinye isikhathi uthola ukuthi awuyidingi into ngendlela obucabanga ngayo.Konke lokhu akulula futhi akumnandi.
Kepha ngokufanayo akumnandi ukuthi ithi ifika imali yakho ibe inyamalala.
Uma kunzima ukuzithiba kungcono wenze uhlelo lokuthi ibhange likubambele imali ethile.
Nakho lokhu akumnandi kodwa kuqinisekisa ikusasa elinenkululeko yomnotho.

Umasipala uphushela ngaphandle abakuleli ekuhwebeni edolobheni
MHLELI: Kuyihlazo okwenziwa ngezinye zezikhulu zeTheku, ezigijimela ukunikeza abantu bokufika izimvume zokuhweba enkabeni yedolobha nakwezinye izindawo ezingaphansi kwalo masipala.
Kuthi abantu bakuleli lizwe uma befake izicelo zezimvume zokuhweba edolobheni batshelwe ukuthi izimvume zezicelo zabo azikalungi.Abasiki bebunda bathi izikhulu zeTheku zithi abantu bokufika abanqeni ukubafumbathisa ukuthola izimvume zokuhweba ekubeni abantu baseMzansi kabazimisele ukubafumbathisa noma ukukhipha enye imali ngaphezulu kwaleyo esemthethweni okuyimali yentela yonyaka.
Abakuleli kufanele ngani ukuthi bafumbathise uma befuna ukuhweba edolobheni ekubeni beyizakhamizi zezwe ngokugcwele?Imeya kuhlangene nezinye izikhulu zeTheku bayazimukela izicelo zabantu bokufika ngenhloso yokuhlangana kudingidwe izimfuno nezikhalo zabo ezimayelane nokuhweba edolobheni kepha abazimisele ukwamukela izicelo zabantu bakuleli uma befuna kubhekelelwe izimfuno nezikhalo zabo njengabahwebi edolobheni.Lesi senzo sezikhulu sesivule umsele wokulekelela kokuphushelwa ngaphandle kwabantu bakuleli kwezohwebo lwedolobha.
EGoli abantu bakuleli sebaphushelwa ngaphandle kohwebo lwedolobha, nedolobha iTheku nalo liyalandela.Lezi zikhulu eziqhoshe ngemisebenzi eholela kahle, amahhovisi ashaya umoya, nokulethelwa itiye namakhekhe njengamakhosi, ngolunye usuku nazo ziyophushelwa ngaphandle kumahhovisi okuphatha iTheku, leyo misebenzi ithathwe ngabantu bokufika ngoba banikeza izimvume zokuhweba ngaphezu kokunika abantu bezwe.
Iqiniso lithi ukuhweba kuletha amandla omnotho, amandla omnotho akunikeza amandla okuguqula izinto nemithetho.

Sekuntwela ezansi ngezokuvakasha eThekwini
Msawakhe MayiselaKuyiqiniso elingephikwe ukuthi ubhubhane lomkhuhlane iCorona, lushiye kukhalwa nxa zonke.
Kusazothatha isikhathi ukuthi isimo sibuyele kwesijwayelekile, ikakhulukazi kwezamabhizinisi nemboni yezokuvakasha.
Bekukhala ibhungane emahhotela, ezindaweni zokudlela, nakweziheha abavakashi nezinye.
Lokhu kuholele ekutheni abaningi balahlekelwe imisebenzi namathuba okuziphilisa.Njengawo wonke amadolobha emhlabeni iTheku, nalo lincela umunwe.
Kulahleke izigidi zemali ngenxa yesimo ebesingakavumeli ukuqoqwa kwemali ekhokhelwa ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo zemiphakathi namabhizinisi.
Kuphoqelekile ukuthi kubuye kuthathwe enye imali engxenye ukuze kuliwe nobhubhane.
Lokhu kusebenzile kakhulu ekuvikeleni inhlalakahle yabadla imbuya ngothi.
Siphoqelekile ukuthi ngesikhulu isivinini sakhe uhlelo lokuvuselela umnotho ngoba leli dolobha livamise ukuba negalelo elingu-10% emnothweni kazwelonke okhiqizwe ngaphakathi.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi uma kuma iTheku, kungenza ukuthi kume izwelonke.Njengomasipala onakekelayo, kudingeke ukuthi senze izaba zokuthi kwehle umthwalo emahlombe amabhizinisi ngokunjalo nezakhamuzi, uma kuziwa ekukhokheleni izidingo zikamasipala.
Kusihlaba umxhwele ukubona ukuthi lezaba, ziholele ekutheni sikhule isibalo sabantu abalala emahotela ethu nokuyinto okufanele siyishayele ihlombe.
Indlala ibihlasele.
Nangempelasonto isibalo sezimoto ezilibhekise eThekwini, siya ngokukhula, okusho ukuthi akusekude phambili.Singabe senza elikhulu iphutha uma singabubongi ubuholi bukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ngokunjalo neNational Command Council.
Singakhohlwa kanjani nguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sihle Zikala, neProvincial Command Council abasebenze ngokungenamkhawulo ukuthi sifinyelele lapho esikhona.
Abasebenzi bezempilo nabezokuphepha ngaphandle kokuzinikela kwabo, ngabe asihambanga ibanga elingaka ukulwa nokubhebhetheka kwalesi sifo.
Izakhamuzi zethu nazo sizibonga kakhulu ngokuthobela imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe, nokwenze ukuthi umkhuhlane ungadali umonakalo omkhulu.Kusukela kumenyezelwa ukwehlela esigabeni sesibili sokuvalwa kwezwe, iMeya yeTheku uKhansela Mxolisi Kaunda, yasiyalela ukuthi sivule izikhungo zokuzijabulisa, emitapoyolwazi, namapaki ngokukhulu ukushesha ukuze impilo ibuyele kwejwayelikile.
Zikhona izikhungo ezingakavulwa-ke nokho ngenxa yokuthi azikahambisani nemithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe kulesi sigaba.
Senza konke okusemandleni ukuthi nazo zigcine zivuliwe.
Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC), Ushaka Marine World neMoses Mabhida sezivuliwe nazo.Kumele sikuqonde ukuthi amabhishi ethu avuliwe kodwa asikakuvumeli ukuthi abantu babhukude.
Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi izinhlambi zethu zikulungele ukuthi zihlenge imiphefumulo uma kwenzeka kuba khona abagwilizayo.
Ngakho kumanje simatasatasa siyaziqeqesha ukuze zikwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wazo ngempumelelo, ngaphandle kokubeka impilo yabantu engcupheni.
Okunye futhi ukuthi abeNatal Sharks Board, abakaphothuli ukufaka amanethi avikela ukusondela koShaka lapho kubhukudwa khona.
Kuzothi singaqeda wonke lo msebenzi, bese siyakwazi ukuvumela abantu ukuthi babhukude ngo-Okthoba.
Sicela imiphakathi yethu ibekezele ngoba asiqondile ukuvimbela injabulo yezakhamuzi nabavakashi, kodwa kuwumsebenzi wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu uphephile emabhishi ethu.Ukwehlela esigabeni sokuqala sokuvalwa kwezwe, akusho ukuthi sibe budedengu.
Kufanele siqhubeke sifake izifonyo, siqhelelane, sihlanze izandla sihloniphe yonke imithetho yokuvalwa kwezwe ngoba impi asikayinqobi.
Masiqikelele ukuthi utshwala asibuphuzi budedengu ngoba ukwenze njalo, kungase kusibuyisele emuva.Ezokuvakasha kulo masipala wethu sizithatha njengegolide lethu.
Ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi abavakashi sibamukele ngezandla ezifudumele.
Lokhu kosiza ukuthi nangomuso, babuye bavakashe bashiye imali, bese beba ngamanxusa ethu ezokuvakasha, sihlomule sonke.Asisebenze ngokubambisana ukugcina idolobha lethu lihlanzekile.
Udoti asiwulahle ezindaweni ezifanele noma kungekho obonayo.
Iqiniso ukuthi uma idolobha lethu lingcolile, akukho sivakashi esoba netshisekelo yokuzosivakashela.
Ngakho gcina iTheku lihlanzekile.
* UMsawakhe Mayisela ukhulumela uMasipala weTheku
Makuvalwe ukudayiswa kukagwayi owumbombayi
Mhleli: Sekukhulunywe kakhulu ngengwiji khwebu eyenziwe uhulumeni wakuleli yokuvala ukuthengiswa kukasikilidi phezu kokuba uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa, ebememezele ukuthi sekuzovunyelwa ukuthengiswa kwawo.Nakuba kunesizathu esicacile sokuvala ukudayiswa kukasikilidi okuwukuvikela izimpilo zabantu, kulesikhathi esinzima lapho kuhlasele ubhubhane i-Covid-19.
Ngibona uhulumeni wakuleli ebe budedengu kakhulu ngokuvala ugwayi ekubeni esahlulwa ukulawula ukuthengiswa nokusabalala kwawo emphakathini.Nakuba sekuyisikhathi eside uvaliwe usikilidi kodwa iqiniso ukuthi abantu basawuthola ugwayi futhi manje bawuthola ngamanani aphansi kakhulu.
Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi ezitolo zabengabadi ugwayi awutholakali kodwa ezitolo zabokufika ugwayi usabalele kakhulu kangangokuba sekuthengiswa nezinhlobo ezingaziwa njengeD’s, iphakethe lawo elithengiswa ngeshumi lopondo kuphela nokwenza kube lula kwababhemayo ukuwuthenga.

Wenze kahle uMboweni angayiniki nendibilishi ikhomishini kaZondo
MHLELI: Kungithokozisile ukuzwa uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali kuzwelonke, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, ethi ngeke isathola ngisho indibilishi le, ikhomishini ephenya ngezinsolo zokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.
Lokhu kudinga ukushayelwa ihlombe.
Sekucacile ukuthi ikhomishini kaJaji Raymond Zondo, yinto engenamsebenzi nje, kepha imunca imali yabakhokhi bentela.
Ikhomishini kaZondo seyidle imali engaphezu kukaR800 million.
Inabameli abahola imali elinganiselwa kuR40 000 ngosuku.
Sesibongile, ayihambe ikhomishini ngoba vele ibukeka iyinkundla yokugega abathile kwezepolitiki.
Uma kukhona ubufakazi enabo ngokuphulwa komthetho kayinikeze uphiko lwezokushushisa, kuboshwe abasolwa.
Kwakufanele u-Advocate Thuli Madonsela adlulisele ubufakazi bokwephulwa komthetho kwiNPA.
Kungasungulwa ikhomishini ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi uma kwenziwa kanjalo kuleli, kusuke kushoniswa ilanga.
Sibonile ngeKhomishini yamaQiniso nokuBuyisana.
Ngubani owake wathathelwa izinyathelo ngobufakazi obavela kuyona?Namanje kunabantu abasakhala ngokugilwa kwabo ngesikhathi sobandlululo.
Amaqiniso avela kwikhomishini kodwa akwenziwanga lutho.
Kuvele ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wajuba uMnuz Sydney Mufamadi, ukuba aphenye amanyundululu ngezobunhloli.
Kuvele manje kwikhomishini kaZondo ukuthi waphenya wanikeza uRamaphosa umbiko.
Esikhundleni sokuthi kube khona abalandelwayo ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo ezatholakala, umbiko waphanyekwa kwisizindalwazi sehhovisi likamengameli.Ziningi izibonelo zokusungulwa kwamakhomishini kungabi nazinyathelo ngemiphumela yophenyo.
Kuphela nje kubukeka sengathi kusuke kubhubhudlwa imali.
Nakuyo ikhomishini kaZondo sibone kuqashwa amabhilidi abantu okuthiwa banikela esikhwameni sikaRamaphosa, iCR17 esamsiza ukuba anqobe ukhetho lukaKhongolose ngo-2017.Izwe lixakekile.
Kwembulwa kwembeswa emnothweni wezwe.
Nazi nezikweletu zisimele ngenhla.
Abantu baselwe imisebenzi.
Izibalo zakamuka zabangasebenzi zikhuphuke kakhulu ngenxa yokubheduka kweCovid-19.
Sidinga ukuthi leyo mali encane esinayo ifakwe ezinhlelweni zokudala amathuba emisebenzi.
Nginxusa abaholi bethu ukuthi mababuyelwe ngonembeza - bagweme inkohlakalo.

I-DA ngeke ibe yikhambi lokuxazulula izinkinga zabamnyama
OKWENZEKA kwiDemocratic Alliance (DA) kumele kusijulise ngemicabango yezizathu nezinhloso zaleli qembu nokuthi lezo zinhloso zingaba namiphi imithelela kwipolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika.Kuyishwa ukuthi sibona ukukhishwa inyumbazane kuleli qembu koMmusi Maimane, Herman Mashaba, Zwakele Mncwango, Mbali Ntuli nabanye abaholi abamnyama njengethuba lokubabuza ngokubabhuqa sithi “benithi nenzani?” Ngeshwa sisehlulekile ngukubukisisa ngeso elinzulu okuyizinhloso zaleli qembu.
Ngenkathi kahulumeni wobandlululo abamhlophe bakuleli babe neqhinga nohlelo olunezinhloso, phecelezi i-agenda.
Umbuzo okumele sizibuze wona manje ngothi kulawa maqembu akhona ezepolitiki, yini inhloso yawo ngabantu abamnyama?
Kwehluke okwempumalanga nentshonalanga amasiko nezinkolelo zabantu abamnyama nabamhlophe nokwenza kube nzima kakhulu ukuthi lezi zinhlanga zingabona ngaso linye izinkinga ezibhekene nezwe futhi zibe nezixazululo ezifanayo.
Yingakho ngibona kungaba yiphutha elikhulu ukucabanga ukuthi iDA ingaba yikhambi ekuxazululweni kwezinkinga zabantu abamnyama.
Owayengumholi weDA, uMnuz Tony Leon, ukuvume esidlangalaleni ukuthi iDA isemkhankasweni wokuzivuselela emuva kokuhluleka kohlelo lokuvivinya ubuholi bosopolitiki abamnyama ekukhuliseni amandla eqembu ngaphandle kokuphambuka ezinhlosweni zayo.
Phela iDA yaqalwa ukuze ibe sophondweni lokuvikela ingcebo yedlanzana labamhlophe ngokunjalo nokuvikela umnotho wosomabhizinisi.Inhloso yokubuyiswa kukaNkz Helen Zille ukuzolungisa okonakele kubukeka kukhipha leli qembu emgqigqweni wenhloso yalo.
Phela nguye uNkk Zille owaphathiswa yingqungquthela yaleli qembu ngo-2007 umsebenzi wokulikhulisa ngokuheha abaholi nabalandeli abamnyama.
Emuva kokuba iDA inhlanhlathiswe nguMaimane nokuphethe ngokuba ilahlekelwe ngabalandeli bayo abangumsinsi wokuzimilela okhethweni luka-2019, leli qembu seliphoqeke ukuthi likhiphe inyumbazane abaholi abamnyama ukuze liqhubeke nelaqalelwa kona.
Muva nje, iDA yethule umkhankaso wayo wokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya luka-2021 nosiqubulo sawo sithi “Sekuyisikhathi soshintsho”.I-DA isemkhankasweni wokwakha amaqhinga namasu okuthatha ukubuswa kwaleli lizwe ezandleni zeqembu elibusayo.
Lokho kungasho ukubuswa ngabamhlophe njengoba kwakwenzeka ngaphambi kwenkululeko.
Umehluko kuyoba wukuthi uhulumeni weDA uyobe uvotelwe nanguquqaba lwabantu abamnyama asebenengekile ngamanga osopolitiki, inkohlakalo, ubugovu, ubuvila nokulwisana ngaphakathi kwendlu emnyama.
Inselelo isikwi-ANC, njengomholi womphakathi nomphathi hahulumeni, ukuthi isheshise elayo uhlelo lokuzakha kabusha.
Bonke abaholi namalungu athinteka ekuqhwagweni kombuso, kwinkohlakalo nakumacala anzima kufanele bashenxe ezikhundleni ngokushesha futhi bamiswe ukuba yingxenye yezinhlaka nezinhlelo zenhlangano ukuze iqhubeke nokuba yiqembu elinenhloso yokuhola, ukuthuthukisa nokuhlomulisa abantu abamnyama kwezomnotho ngobuqotho nangenkuthalo.
Umsebenzi we-ANC ethenjiwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izinhlaka zemiphakathi yaleli zwe zibumbene ukuze zifuqe inhloso yezwe ngaphandle kokubandlulula, ikakhulukazi izinhloso zomphakathi omnyama.Kusuka ngo-1912 ukusebenza kwe-ANC kwakhelwe phezu kwezimiso ezintathu.
Okokuqala; i-ANC yakhelwa ukukhulula uquqaba kuhulumeni wobandlululo bese ihola uhulumeni wentando yabantu.
Okwesibili; i-ANC yayisebenza ngokulawulwa yimigomo nezimiso zentando yabantu okuhlanganisa ukusebenza ngokuvulelekile, ngokuhlanganyela, ngobunye nangokwethembana nemiphakathi.
Okwesithathu; i-ANC ibilokhu ingumholi womzabalazo wenkululeko yesizwe sonkana njengoba manje isisophondweni lokuphathwa kwezwe.Namanje i-ANC isamelwe yijoka lokuthi ihole umkhankaso wokufezekisa inhloso yabantu abamnyama.
Uma singakubhekile ngeso lokhozi ukusebenza kweDA, inkululeko yabamnyama izulelwa ngamanqe.
* UMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uwungoti kwezokuphatha nomhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele
Amabandla awalekelele kwiCoronavirus
Mhleli: kwelakho ngithi ake ngilobe ngale mbedumehlwane ehlasele umhlaba wonke.Ngiyezwa amakholwa esethi yizinsuku zokugcina.Kuyacaca azisekho ezinye izinsuku, sesifike ekugcineni uJesu useyabuya.Ngabe ngiyezwa ukube amakholwa aguqa ngedolo akhuleke ngamandla anxuse uMdali ukuthi asisize sinqobe leli gciwane.Ngisadidekile namanje ukuthi iqhamuke kanjani iCorona, silokhu sizwa ukuthi iqale eChina.Kusobala uma selingene kahle lizoqala ngathi esisemakhaya ngoba impilo yakhona inzima asisebenzi, nensipho kunzima ukuyithola namanzi.Uma uhulumeni esekhombisa ukusukuma, ngiphoxeke kabi ngilalele Ukhozi FM, lapho uNdunankulu Sihle Zikalala nabahlaziyi bebezwakala bekhala ngomnotho nangezivakashi ukuthi ngeke beyivale imingcele ngoba kuzosho ukuthi izivakashi azisezungena kuleli kuyacaca yimali ebalulekile kunempilo yabantu.Ngaleso sikhathi wayeseyedwa umuntu oneCorona, ukube kwasheshe kwavalwa yonke imingcele mhlawumbe ngabe alisabalele kanjena.Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi onke amaqembu ezepolitiki namabandla ahlangane manje kuliwe neCorona.Nabefundisi abahlale bevela kwithelevishini benza imilingo sekuyisikhathi sayo-ke manje.Asibabone bethandazela abantu liphume libaleke igciwane noma basuke besikhohlisa?Kuyathusa ukuzwa usuku nosuku kunyuka isibalo sabahaqekile yiCorona.
Uma uzizwa ukuthi uyakhwehlela kuhle uzihlalele kini, uyeke ukulokhu uzogibela nomphakathi etekisini noma ukhwehlela sivikele thina nabanye bakithi.
Uyazi abantu ababambi ngisho umlomo uma bekhwehlela.Ngiyacela bantu bakithi silalele emisakazweni, sifunde nasemaphephandabeni nakwithelevishini ukuthi senzenjani ukuze lingasabalali leli gciwane.Uma singalaleli esikutshelwayo ukuze sizivikele sizoba senkingeni.Ngiyafisa kube nomgomo wokugwema ukutheleleka mhlawumbe kungaba ngcono uma singagoma.Ngabe esinjani esingagomeleki bakithi?Kazi ngempela adlani amaShayina le enzima kangaka.Emabhasini njengamaRea Vaya eGoli kugcwala kuze kungabi nandawo yokubeka unyawo nasezitimela, abanye baze belenge ngaphandle, kusobala uma oyedwa engahaqeka eSoweto kuyobe sekumoshakele.Sibonga imizamo kamengameli.Ake akhohlwe wumnotho sobuye siwubone silwe nokunqanda ukubhebhetheka kweCorona.Okubalulekile wukuphila kwabantu.Zikhona izigwili nabahola imali eningi kuhulumeni, kanjalo namabandla kufanele angenele anikele sekuyisikhathi sokulekelela imiphakathi.Thanda ChoncoKwesakwaMthethwa
Baphelelwa wumhlaba abanamanga kolukaJub Jub
MHLELI: Ngithi angibhale ngombono obekwe nguJabulani Zenzo Khumalo mayelana nohlelo lukaJub Jub, Uyajola 9/9.
Ngicela ningavumeli abamosha izinto.
Siyaluthanda lolu hlelo nomndeni wami.Okwenzeka ohlelweni akuphathelene namadoda kumbe nokucindezelwa kwabanye.
UJub Jub uyasebenza futhi uceliwe ukuthi enze lokhu akwenzayo.
Izifo zibhebhetheka kanje wukungathembeki kwabantu akukhathaleki ukuthi abesifazane noma amadoda.Lolu hlelo lwenza abangathembekile bazibone bephelelwe wumhlaba.Amasoka abantu abaziwa ngakho.

Masizigqaje ngomsebenzi omuhle owenziwe yiMbube
Ndabezinhle Sibiya USIZI olukhulu luhaqe isizwe sonke ngemva kokukhothama kweSilo samaBandla wonke - uGoodwill kaBhekuzulu.Kumasipala iZululand, lapho okukhona izigidlozo zeSilo, okuhlanganisa iKwaKhethomthandayo kubukeka kunomunyu ongenamkhawulo.
Isimo esiyiso kwenza ngicabange ubuhlungu obungechazwe obuzwiwa yiziNdlovukazi nabaNtwana baseNdlunkulu emva kokushiywa emhlabeni yiSilo.
Akekho umuntu emhlabeni ongapholisa isilonda esibuhlungu kangaka.Isilo samaBandla wonke sithathe isihlalo sobukhosi ngo-1971 saqhubeka ezinyathelweni zamakhosi wonke abumba isizwe sikaZulu.
Uma ngijula ngokomcabango ngifisa ukwazi indlela labo abebesebenza neSilo abathinteke ngayo.
Ngibala amakhosi aseNdlunkulu, osopolitiki kuwo wonke amazinga, osomabhizinisi nezisebenzi zonke zikahulumeni kwisifundazwe, uhulumeni kazwelonke nomasipala.Selokhu ngithole izindaba zokukhothama kweSilo ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni, nginemicabango eminingi.
Kubuya okwenzekile nengikubonile eminyakeni njengoba iSilo besenza imisebenzi yesizwe.Akumina ngedwa engizizwa nginenhlanhla yokuthola imfundiso enhle neziyalo zeSilo samaBandla.
Baningi ozakwethu abasebenza emazingeni ahlukene kahulumeni abangasho okuningi abakufundile.
Bangachaza kabanzi ukuthi iSilo samabandla siyishintshe kanjani impilo yabo.
Ngikhumbula ngo-2009, ngaphambi kokubekwa kukaNdunankulu wesihlanu kuhulumeni wentando yabantu.
Umholi owakhethwa waba ngundunankulu wesibili we-ANC, uDkt Zweli Mkhize wacela ihhovisi lakhe ukuba lihlele umhlangano phakathi kwakhe neSilo samaBandlaWanquma ukuba umhlangano awusebenzisele ukuthola izeluleko zeSilo ngamacebo okwakufanele asetshenziswe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinhlelo zikahulumeni zifinyelela ngokuphuthuma kubantu.
Waphinde wasebenzisa lo mhlangano neMbube ukuqala ukubhala inkulumo yesifundazwe okwakuzoba ngeyokuqala.
Isilo saqopha umlando kulo mhlangano sizinikela ngokuthi sizosebenzisana kanjani nohulumeni wesifundazwe.
Ngokusho kweMbube, injongo yalokhu kwakungukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinhlelo zonke ziyafinyelela kubantu futhi kuba nemfundiso yokusebenzisana.Yize kunefu elimnyama eligubezele isifundazwe kodwa kumele sizigqaje ngomsebenzi omuhle owenziwe yiSilo siwenzela isizwe sonke.
Kuyo yonke imicimbi yokugubha iminyaka iSilo sisesihlalweni sobukhosi bukaZulu, besihlale sigqugquzela ubumbano.Besihlale siveza ukuthi siyaye sithokoze uma sibona izintombi nezinsizwa, omama nobaba bebahle behlobile size sithi ; “Umoya wami uyavuseleleka.
Ngizwa nginokuziqhenya nokuzigqaja ngokuba ngumZulu.”Kwenye yezinkulumo esayethula kugujwa iminyaka engu-40 sisesihlalweni sobukhosi, sabonga abaholi bezepolitiki kuwo wonke amaqembu, sabonga izinhlangano zomphakathi, abaholi bezenkolo, abaholi bezinkampani ezizimele naboholi bezendabuko.
Sagcizelela sathi imigubho yeminyaka engu-40 kumele ifaniswe nemcimbi yokubonga wonke amaqhawe aKwaZulu-Natal.
Saqhakambisa amaqhawe asebenze kanzima eletha intuthuko KwaZulu-Natal.
Saveza ukuthi ukulethwa kwentuthuko yinto esasiyikhathalele kakhulu.Saphinde sathi sinesiqinisekiso sokuthi wonke amakhosi, izinduna, izimeya namakhansela kuzoba nokusebenzisana naso ukuletha intuthuko emakhaya.
Imbube yayihlala ithi ukunqoba kwesizwe kuncike ekutheni sibe nobuholi obusimeme, obubambene futhi obuzimisele.Kuyo yonke imicimbi sasiye sithi ubuholi kuwo wonke amazinga kumele bubeke phambili imfundo.
Sasigcizelela ukuthi ukuba khona kwentuthuko kuncike kakhulu kwimfundo.
Ngamanye amazwi sasichaza ukuthi kufanele sibe yisizwe esiyikhuthalele imfundo ngoba ngaphandle kwayo ngeke ize ibe khona inqubekela phambili.Komunye umcimbi kahulumeni imbube yabuza yathi abazali bathule bathini uma izingane zikhulelwa zibe zifunda isikole?
Saphinde saphonsa le mibuzo elandelayo:Ubhekelani eceleni umzali uma ebona ingane yakwamakhelwane edolobheni ngesikhathi sesikole?
Uthule uthini wena thisha uma ingane oyifundisayo ikhuleliswa ngomunye uthisha?
Uma sethula umyalezo kubasebenzi bakahulumeni sasijwayele ukuthi abasebenzi bakahulumeni wentando yabantu kufanele babeke phambili izifiso zabantu okuyibona abangobasi.
Sasithi imiholo yezisebenzi zikahulumeni ikhokhwa ngumphakathi ngakho, umphakathi unelungelo lokufuna intuthuko futhi unelungelo lokukhalaza kuhulumeni uma ubulungiswa bungekho.
Siphinde sithi, empeleni kuliqiniso ukuthi intando yabantu isengcupheni uma izingane nabafelokazi bebulawa yindlala.
Kukhona lapho sathi abaholi bomasipala kuwo wonke amazinga baneqhaza elikhulu abangalibamba ukusebenzisana nohulumeni ukuletha intuthuko.
Sabala abefundisi bezenkolo, abaholi bomphakathi, amakhosi, izinduna namakhansela.Sathi uma ungumholi womphakathi kufanele wazi ukuthi endaweni ohlezi kuyona zingaki izintandane.
Kufanele uxhumane nezinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuze zingenelele ukuze izingane zingabhuqabhuqwa yindlala.
Enye into ebihamba phambili kwiSilo samaBandla ngukusebenzisana nohulumeni ukwehlisa isibalo sabantu abangenwa yigciwane lengculazi.
Yingakho ngoDisemba 4 , 2009 samemezela ukuqalwa kosiko lokusoka abafana.Sasijwayele ukukukuveza ukuthi impi yokulwa nalezi zifo ngeke iphumelele uma kuzobhekwa amanesi nodokotela bodwa.
Sasigqugquzela ukuthi emalokishini nakuzo zonke izigodi abaholi baphume umkhankaso wokugqugquzela amalungu omphakathi, ukuthi azibophezele ekusizeni abagulayo bangabandlululwa futhi badle imishanguzo ngemfanelo.Sasikhumbuza isizwe ukuthi kwakuyisikompilo lobaba mkhulu ukunakekela umakhelwane wakho nesizwe sonke.
* UMnuz Ndabezinhle Sibiya ukhulumela uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube
Sekufike esiphethweni ngoKhongolose
MHLELI: Kunamaqiniso okumele siwakhulume noma ngabe abuhlungu kangakanani.
Elinye lalawo maqiniso ababayo wukuthi iqembu likaKhongolose sekufike esiphethweni ngalo.Ukwehluleka kwalo ukuqeda inkohlakalo nokweba okwenziwa ngabaholi balo sekufinyelele lapho abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kumele bathi uKhongolose awulale ngokuthula.Akekho umuntu kulo mhlaba ongakwazi ukuwuhlenga kulesi simo.Inkohlakalo ikhona kuwo wonke amazinga okuphatha.

Cubungula izinto ukuze ungadlali abelaphi mbumbulu
KUNINGI okwenzeka ngakuthina lapho sithi siyozwa ukuthi izinkinga ezisiqaqele zibangwa yini.
Lokho kwenza kwethu bese kuba yikhona okwenza abelaphi bendabuko basho noma yini ngoba bebona sixakekile.Okunye okukhulu kube ukwazi ukuthi yini lena esiyifuna kakhulu bese sikhohliseka kuthiwe sizoyithola.
Akothi uma uyohlola utshelwa otshelwa khona bese usebenzisa amandla engqondo owawaphiwa nguMdali ukucubungula lokho otshelwa khona.Umuntu ukuphuma kwakhe eyozwa ngokumkhathazayo uma engena esigodlweni somelaphi ungena vele edidekile, edidekile nesintu sesimlahlekele, sekulula-ke atshelwe noma yini.Uma ngithi qhathanisa okukugulisayo kumbe okukuhluphekisayo, notshelwa khona ngiqonde ukuthi ngeke izingane zakho zithi zingagani, niyaxabana nomama kumbe ekhaya ugingqika nezimoto amabhizinisi ayawa kade zolo lokhu kuhamba kahle, bese kuthiwa bethela, noma idla igobongo, kokunye yembula, noma idlozi alikho ekhaya kumbe asilungise umsamo.Noma kungashiwo lokhu kuthathe-ke wena bese ukuqhathanisa nenkinga yakho kumbe izinkinga onazo njengomsuka.
Ukhumbule kunomehluko phakathi kwezinkinga nomsuka wazo.
Konke kunomsuka.Uma ushaywa uhlangothi, kumbe uvaleka amehlo noma ukuyozwa ngenkinga yokushaywa uhlangothi kumbe ukuvaleka amehlo hamba uyothola umsuka kwakho ukuthi kudalwe yini.Kodwa ngenxa yokudideka nokujaha bese kuba lula kube khona ukukhohliseka.
UNkulunkulu usiphe ingqondo yokucabanga okwenza sehluke ezilwaneni nakwezinye izidalwa ezingaphansi komthunzi welanga.Ngakho sonke isikhathi kufanele sihlale sikusebenzisa lokhu kunanoma yini esiyibonayo nesitshelwa yona.Siyahamba-ke siyohlola uma sesitshelwa esitshelwa khona asisakusebenzisi lokhu.
Uthi wazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi yini ephambene kuwena kodwa ungabe usacabanga ngengqondo ukuthi lokhu osutshelwa khona kuhlanganaphi nalokhu okukuhluphekisayo.Iningi lethu lijaha imali, kungakho sigcina sesenza izinto eziphambene.Uzwe emisakazweni nasemaphephendabeni kuthiwa kukhona indandatho yenhlanhla, kukhona indanadatho yomshado, kukhona umuthi wokuthi ucebe kumbe uwine i-lotto uzibuze uma usebenzisa ingqondo umnikazi walokho yena akayidingi yini leyo mali ngoba ngabe uqala ngaye kuqala ukubona ukunotha nokuceba ukuthi lokhu akhuluma ngakho kuyasebenza futhi kunomphumela wengcebo.Kungakho-ke abantu abaningi begcina bethi angisahambi ukuyohlola, hhayi ngoba ebaleka kodwa kunguyena ozosile kugobela ngokuthi avume into engakhi ngqondo uma usuqhathanisa nokuhlupheka kwakho.Engizama ukukusho namhlanje ukuthi ezintweni esizenzayo empilweni yethu ukucabanga nokusebenzisa ingqondo engiyithatha njenganesikhali esasiphiwa nguMdali sikushiya ngemuva siphike nesithanda ukukuzwa nokukutshelwa khona.Le nto ifana ncamashi nabantu abahlale beqhosha ngokuthi bayakholwa, bona bayathandaza.
Ukukwenza lokho akunankinga futhi akunanxa kuphela musa ukukwenza bese ungabe usasebenzisa ingqondo.Ezinye izinto ubothatha isikhathi ngokuhlala phansi uzibuze zona.
Musa ukuthatha iBhayibheli njengencwadi ezokusindisa, ezinye zezinto elizishoyo zibuze, ujule ngazo, ungathi kwabe kungumlingo kodwa zibuze ngokuqhathanisa impilo yakho nesimo esikhona.Kuningi esikhule kuthiwa asingakubuzi kodwa othi uma usukhulile wabona izinto emhlabeni wafunda, bese ubona ukuthi kungani kwakuthiwa lezi zinto ungazibuzi.Kunabantu abakubona kuyicala nento engavumelekile ukuthi uzibuze nokuthi uma kuthiwa uNkulunkulu, nezulu kukhona kulaphi nendawo, uma isibhakabhaka sinje nomhlaba kuthiwa uyindilinga, akufanele ukuninga ngengqondo ngalokho.Ngoba ujahe ukukholwa uzozitshela ukuthi kungumoya futhi kuyicala nesono ukukubuza lokho.
Uthi wazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi kukhona umthetho othi: Hlonipha uyihlo nonyoko kodwa lokho ungakubuzi ukuthi ngakube ubani “uyihlo” ngubani “unyoko” na?Kumnandi ukushumayela nokububula ucula, ukhohlwe ukusebenzisa isikhali uMdali akupha sona ukuthi ucubungule ngaso izinto eziphambi kwakho.
Ngikholwa ukuthi noMdali uyaye azibuze ukuthi le ngane yami kungani ingasebenzisi isikhali engayinika sona “ingqondo” ekwenzeni izinto zayo?
Akukho lapho kuthiwa khona ungabuzi futhi ungafuni ngengqondo.Kukhona konke ukuphuma kwakho uyofuna izimfihlakalo ngempilo yakho nokukuhlukumezayo, nezinqumo ozithathayo ngokuzokwenza empilweni yakho ukuze uphile impilo othi ngengcono, sebenzisa lokhu okuthiwa “ukuzibuza nokuqhathanisa” okwenziwa “ingqondo” ekuthatheni izinqumo.
Ungabuswa imizwa yokuthi ufuna bakubone abanye wenzani, nokuthi utshelwe ukuthini wangakucabangisisa, okuyokuba isinqumo esibuhlungu sikangunaphakade.Engiqonde ukukusho nakhu: uyohlola, otshelwa khona kumunyunge ngengqondo ukucabe ngamathambo engqondo, ungagwinyi nje.
Uyaphuma uya esontweni, uyokhonza, uyathandaza, uyakholwa usukhethe iNkosi, zibuze futhi nakhona lapho, ngabe kuyikhona noma uzijabulisa emini ebusuku ukhihla isililo na?Sebenzisa umqondo ukuze ugweme ukuyobuza enganeni ube umdala.BhedlindabaEsigodlweni saseMlambomunye087 11 00 555.

Ngitusa okwenziwe wuMshengu eMenzi
Mhleli: Kwelakho elifundwa wumhlaba wonke ngithi angidlulise injabulo yami mayelana nesimemezelo esenziwe uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu sokungakhokhwa kwemali yesikole eMenzi High, eMlaza.UMshengu wenze into encomekayo ngokuthatha isinqumo sokuyokwethula umkhankaso wabo wokubala izinsuku zokuqala kwezivivinyo kulesi sikole esinomlando omuhle ngezinga lokuphasa kwabafundi bakwa-matric.IMenzi High ibalwa ezikoleni ezenza kahle KwaZulu-Natal kwazise phela ihlezi ikhiqiza * -100% kuleli banga nokuyinto esiyenze iminyaka ilandelana.Lesi sikole siyisibonelo esihle kwezinye.Othisha bakhona bayazinikela emsebenzini wabo.
Bangena ngo-6 ekuseni baphume sekuhwalalele futhi babuye bafundise nangempelasonto.Okunye okungijabulisa kakhulu okubalulwe wuMshengu wukuthinta indaba yokulungisa ingqalasizinda esingekho esimeni esifanele.UMshengu uthembisile ukuthi bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthuthukisa isikole.
Uphinde wathi bazoletha amakhompyutha awu-60 kanye nezinsiza zokufunda.Ukwandiswa kwamakhompyutha kulesi sikole kuzosiza abafundi ukuthi bafunde babe nolwazi ngobuchwepheshe besimanje.Lokhu kusho ukuthi abafundi ngeke basale ngaphandle kwi-4th Industrial Revolution okukhulunywa ngayo kakhulu kulezi zinsuku.
Okunye wukuthi ukwandiswa kwezinsiza zokufunda kuzosiza othisha nabafundi ukuthi bangasaleli emuva ngomsebenzi wabo.
Lokho kusho ukuthi izinga lokuphasa ngeke lehle kulo 100%.Ngikwethulela isigqoko Mshengu, qhubeka nomsebenzi wakho omuhle wokuthuthukisa imfundo ezweni lethu.Ukuba nongqongqoshe osemusha wezemfundo KwaZulu-Natal kuzoba nomthelela omuhle kakhulu.

'Kungamanga ukuthi ubuholi bebandla buhamba ngobukhosana'
MHLELI: Ngicela ukuphawula ngengikuzwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana obekukhulunywa ngabathile okufaka nomholi waseBuhleni.
Kunokukhuluma okukhulunywe wuMfundisi uShozi eKhenani lapho ethe “ufisa sengathi uSibisi angeze afa kodwa omele othini, ukuze abonwe yisizukulwane ngoba wathatha ifa lenye indlu waliyisa kwenye indlu”.
Nomholi waseBuhleni kuyo indawo efanayo ukukhulumile ukuthi ifa lenye indlu kalidliwa kwenye indlu, kuyaziwa ukuthi uma kuhamba ubaba kuthathe inkosana, wuyena inkosana yoThingo, nasesiZulwini lokho kuyaziwa”.Lezi zinkulumo zingivusela imibuzo.
Owokuqala ukuzwa kuShozi ukuthi “uSibisi walithatha kanjani ifa lenye indlu waliyisa kwenye” njengoba kunguyena owabhala lezi zincwadi ezimbili ebezibangwa enkantolo?Uma isono sikaSibisi kungukuthi waba ngufakazi encwadini ebibangwa, yena engumfundisi wayeyo kwenzenjani uma umholi wakhe amhloniphayo ethi akasayine njengofakazi?
Uma kungukuthi isono ukuhambisa incwadi kummeli uButhelezi, yena wayeyokwenzenjani ethunywa wumholi wakhe?Ngiyafisa ukwazi kuShozi ukuthi njengoba enesikhundla sobufundisi, enza kuso isifungo phezu kwentaba (nanxa ukugcotshwa kwakhe kwaba nokukhuluma kwaze kwavela igama loJazibhantshi) ngabe uyayifunda yini incwadi kaMathewu 7:1-5 “Ningahluleli ukuba ningahlulelwa.
Ngokuba ngokwahlulela enahlulela ngakho nani niyokwahlulelwa ngakho, nangaleso silinganiso enilinganisa ngaso nani niyakulinganiselwa ngaso.
“Ubhekelani ucezwana olusesweni lomfowenu, kepha ugongolo olusesweni lakho awuluboni na?
Ungasho kanjani kumfowenu ukuthi: “Ake ngikhiphe ucezwana olusesweni lakho; bheka, ugongolo lusesweni lakho.
Mzenzisi, khipha kuqala ugongolo esweni lakho, khona-ke uzakubonisisa ukukhipha ucezwana esweni lomfowenu.” UShembe akabagcobelanga lokho abefundisi kodwa ukuba benze ukulunga, bashumayele umbuso wezulu olikhaya labangcwele hhayi amagqubu nobudlova nobundlavini.
Ngifisa-ke ukubheka kumholi waseBuhleni la mazwi.UNkulunkulu ubemuphe ithuba eliyingqayizivele lokuthi ame phambi kwabantu abaningi kangaka ukufundisa ngombuso kaNkulunkulu.
Kodwa ufundisa imbubhiso.
Bonke laba bantu ababaphambi kwakhe basuke besuke emakhaya badela imali yabantwana babo, ngenhloso yokuzophiliswa umphefumulo.
Konke lokho akwenzekanga, baphindele emakhaya beyizoni ezinenzondo namagqubu asuselwa emangeni akhulunywa epulpiti.Uma umuntu into engayazi njengalokhu umholi engazi lutho ngobuholi bebandla kuhle adedele abaziyo bakhulume ngakho, yena ashumayele ivangeli lombuso ozayo elezelwa nguShembe ezweni, ayeke ukwehlulelana ngento engathi shu.Kungamanga ukuthi ebandleni kusuka ubaba kuhlale indodana kodwa umholi uyagcotshwa akazalwa.
Kungamanga ukuthi ubuholi bebandla buhamba ngobukhosana, buhamba ngokugcotshwa.
Kuyaxaka-ke ukuthi bese efuna ukucasha ngamasiko esiZulu ekubeni sisekukholweni hhayi esiZulwini.
NgokwesiZulu yena ngeke alihola ibandla kodwa ngoba sisekukholweni siyambekezelela, asiphiwe amandla okumahlulela.Ngiyafisa afunde incwadi kaDeteronomi 23 vs 2.
Ngifisake bangibuzele kuye ukuthi njengalokhu iNyangayezulu yayingeyona inkosana yenkosi iLanga kwabangani ukuthi ihole ibandla ngaphansi kwalezi zifundiso zakhe?

Ngenxa yemigwazo kusekude buphele ubugebengu
MHLELI: Ngivumele ngiphawule ngokubhebhetheka kobugebengu eNingizimu Afrika.
Ezinsukwini ezintathu ezedlule sekutholakale ukuthi kukhona intombanzane edlweguliwe yabulawa.
Kuphinde kwaphuma ukuthi kukhona indoda ehlala eWyebank ebulale izingane zayo ezine.
Sekungathi isonto nesonto kukhona abantu ababulawayo noma abantshontshwayo kuleli lizwe.Ngibona ukuthi inkinga iqala ekutheni singabantu baseMzansi Afrika siyathula sibuke uma lezi zigameko zenzeka.
Isibonelo, uma umuntu egijima ngesivinini esidlula amakhilomitha abekiwe, uthola ukuthi uzokhetha ukufumbathisa iphoyisa esikhundleni sokuthi aye enkantolo.
Lezi yizimo ezinje ezenza ukuthi abantu bacabange ukuthi ubugebengu into enhle.Esinye isibonelo, isenzo sokuthi abantu benza umgunyathi uma befuna izincwadi zokushayela.
Uzwe ngephoyisa likutshela ukuthi uma ungangifumbathisanga into encane ngeke ukwazi ukuba nezincwadi.Ngesinye isikhathi uthola ukuthi umuntu akakwazi ukushayela kodwa ngokuthi unemali yokufumbathisa ugcina ezitholile izincwadi zokushayela.Ngenxa yokuthi singabahlali bala eMzansi Afrika senza umathanda sithembe ukugwaza, kusekude ukuthi buphele ubugebengu.
Sihlezi sikhala ngokuthi osopolitiki banobugebengu kodwa nathi sibe sinabo.
Inja iyawaqeda amanzi ngolimi.Ubugebengu bungancipha ezweni lethu uma nathi njengabahlali sizofunda ukulandela imithetho ebekiwe.
Kumele siyeke ukufumbathisa nokuntshontsha ukuze sizokwazi ukuphatha kahle izwe lethu.
Njengabahlali baseMzansi kumele kube yithina esihola indlela ukuze sizophila ezweni elikahle.
Mina ngikholelwa ukuthi ushintsho luqala ngawe.
Asiyeke ubugebengu ukuze buzoncipha nakuhulumeni.Minenhle Khazi
Igcokama liwumele ngeqiniso umculo wakithi
MHLELI: Ngiyakhuleka kunina beSilo.
Ngizocela ukwethula isigqoko njengomholi wamabhinca ongacheme namculi.
Ngihlale njalo ngibheka okuhle okwenziwa ngabaculi kanjalo nokuqhakambisa umoya wokuthula noxolo kubalandeli bomculo wakithi nothinta amasiko ethu, umaskandi.Ngithi angincome ngibonge into enhle kakhulu, sibonile umculi kamaskandi, Igcokama Elisha Manqele, emela bonke abaculi bawo lo mculo eya KwaKhethomthandayo, KwaNongoma.
Ubehambisana nobukhosi baseMdletsheni kanjalo noNgizwe Mchunu.
Bafike bashiya enhle inkabi kade kugezwa amakhosi aKwaZulu.
Ngizothanda ukuthi kuwe Gcokama Elisha, lokhu okwenzile qhawe lakithi ubonise izwe lonke ukuthi ngampela uwumele umaskandi ngezithukuthuku zakho nangayo inkani yakho.
Ngiyafisa umhlaba wonke kanjalo nohulumeni uqobo bakuhloniphe unikezwe indondo yeqiniso ezokwenzelwa wena nje uqobo.
Yonke impumelelo yakho ingeyeqiniso, kayinawo ugcobho wephunga lokukhohlakala, kodwa usebenzisa iqiniso lokwesekwa ngabalandeli bakho beqiniso.
Yingakho izibusiso zehlela phezu kwakho.
Le nto oyenzile iwuvala unyaka wonke, ukuyokhuleka ekhaya leSilo nenkabi sengathi abaculi bangabukela kuwe, ngiyathokoza.Sizwe Ndlovu KWAS’JULA
Yaba budlabha iMeya yeTheku ikhuluma
MHLELI: Kwelakho ngicela imvume yokuveza umbono ngengikuzwe enkulumeni yeMeya yeTheku ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezedlule, konke lokho kwadalwa yizibhelu zaseLamontiville (lapho kwangqongqiswa izimoto zikamasipala ezingu-6).Ngokomlomo kaMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda izinxushunxushu zaqala mhla izakhamuzi zizakhela emhlabeni kamasipala, imeya yathi umphakathi wagxumeka imikhukhu endaweni engafanele.
Kulo mhlaba abakha kuwo abantu kuhamba amapayipi kagesi okwenza kube lukhuni satshe ukuba kwakhiwe kuwona.
Elami lithi, kungani umkhandlu ungenzanga imizamo thizeni utholele abantu indawo ephephile ukuze bakhe?Kungani balinde kuze kube nje ekubeni bebengasigwema lesi simo?Inkulumo yemeya yakhombisa ukuxhugela komholi, ukube yayekela oyikhulumelayo akhulume ngalolu daba mhlawumbe wayengalubeka kangcono kunayo.
Abakhulumeli bafihle lukhulu ngabaqashi babo.Uma ubona ukuthi umphakathi wakha lapho kunezintambo zikagesi namapayipi, kungani ulinde kuze kushiswe impahla engaka?Kungani ingasigwemanga isimo?
Imeya iyazi nje ukuthi yona nomkhandlu bangamangalelwa wumphakathi othintekayo ngalokhu.Kodwa-ke akusiyona inkinga yaseThekwini kuphela lena iseNingizimu Afrika yonkana.

Uphosisile ungqongqoshe ezishaya isifuba emsakazweni
MHLELI: Bengilalele Ukhozi FM Abasiki bebunda ngoMashi 24, lapho bekumenywe khona uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka.
Waze walikhuluma iphutha ubaba emdala emsakazweni kulalele izwe.
Uthi uhambela zonke izindawo ngendaba yamanzi.
Kodwa uyazi ukuthi uphuma ubheke ngaphi uma uya KwesaKwaMthethwa njengoba amanzi esihlupha kangaka khona?
Sinabo impela ompompi kodwa abangakithi eShayamoya amanzi aphuma uma kuthanda bona ompompi labo.
Amaloli amanzi azithathela ngesawo isikhathi.
Nenyanga iyaphela ulindile, iloli isathela kwezinye izindawo okanye kuthiwa inenkinga le esithelelayo.Usizi lumi lodwa nje ngakithi, manje angazi uHlomuka usuke ehambela maphi ama-ward okanye ujika kuMasipala Umfolozi ebese etshelwa ukuthi ngaphansi kukamasipala konke kuhamba kahle, ebese ebamba lokho ayomemezela emsakazweni?Sesingamtshela-ke thina, sinenkinga yamanzi, sinenkinga yomgwaqo, angiyiphathi eyetiyela okuphela ishumi nanhlanu iminyaka limile KwaLamula.
Lutho ukufika ngakithi.
UHlomuka akayeke ukukhuluma emsakazweni ukuthi uhambela yonke indawo ngoba akalazi usizi esibhekene nalo emakhaya.
Ukube wake waya KwesaKwaMthethwa, nginesiqiniseko ubeyozisholo yena ukuthi akasophinde ahambe ngemoto yakhe kulowa mgwaqo.
Ngakithi abanye baze basole ukuthi ompompi bavalwe ngamabomu ngoba kukhona abanikwe ithenda lamaloli amanzi ukuze badle ngokuzothelela umphakathi.
Sengacishe ngibavumele nami abasho njalo ngendlela athatha isikhathi ngakhona ukuphuma kompompi.Mina  angazi kusuke kutheni kubaholi bethu uma bebizwe emsakazweni,  bafike bancome i-ANC ngokusebenzela abantu nangobuholi bayo ukuninika izidingo.
Kwakhona ukufaka omasipala ngaphansi komlawuli kusiza ngani ngoba eMkhanyakude sihlupheka nabo abantu bakhona.Esikhundleni sokukhuluma iqiniso athi cha mphakathi sesehlulekile ukuninikeza izidingo zenu, bonke bangena basho okufanayo.
Uma kungena abantu bemphikisa ashintshe inkulumo, athi bekezelani sekuzolunga.
Usho njalo iminyaka emihlanu isizophela, aphume kungene omunye naye asho okufanayo.
Uma nalowo omusha ephikiswa naye uthi akubekezelwe sekuzolunga.
Amanzi asiqali manje ukuwahluphekela.
Ngize ngithi kwakungcono ngakithi kusenezigwedlo.
Sasingalali singagezile kungakaphathi uhulumeni omnyama.
Ngangingazi ukuthi kophela imnyaka engamashumi amabili sisabalisa kanjena.
Thina yindlu emnyama kulokhu kuthiwa asibekezele sekuzolunga.

Ngimbona engusomathuba uNdlovu weTop 10 yoKhozi
Mhleli: Ngibhala nje ngidiniwe ngento eyenzeka kuKhozi FM lapho lusigqugquzela kangaka ukuthi sivote noma yikangaki, sivotele ingoma yonyaka.
Nangempela singaMabhinca besenza njalo.Ekugcineni ngo-19:00, kuzoqhamuka umbiko othi kayisekho iTop 10.Ngiyavuma-ke uma kube nezinkinga ngaphakathi.
Ingabe Ukhozi FM luqale ukwazi mhla ka-31 Disemba ebusuku yini ukuthi iTop 10 kayisezuba khona?Ingabe bekuvele kudliwa izimali zethu?
Kudala yini batshelwa ukuthi ngeke ibe khona?Omunye umbuzo ngizowubhekisa ku-Owen Ndlovu ovule icala.
Kuyasiza empilweni ukuzisebenzela kusenesikhathi bese ubeka imali ungahluphekeli kwabanye abantu ngento engathi shu.Ngimbona ebe ngusomathuba uNdlovu.
Ngimbona esetshenzisiwe kule nto.
Ngokuthi naye uzilambele, wasukumela phezulu.Okungenza ngisole indlala kumhlonishwa, wukuthi iTop 10 iba khona minyaka yonke.Uma ebengesiye usomathuba, kungani icala engalifakanga enkantolo ngoMashi noma ngoJanuwari, kuthi kushaya uDisemba inkantolo isisithathile nesinqumo.Kungani elinde uDisemba bese eqhamuka nezindaba zasenkantolo?Ngibona sengathi kunabathile abahluleke wukwamukela ukuthi uNtencane uzohlukanisa unyaka, kwase kwakhiwa iqhinga.Kubuhlungu okwenziwe nguNdlovu.
Ngiyathemba lapho ekhona uyaziqhenya, ujabule uma ezwa uMzansi wonke ukhala ngokwenzeke ngoDisemba 31.Sesingamshayela ihlombe uNdlovu, sithi izifiso zakhe ziphumelele lapho abantu bekhala izinyembezi ngenxa yakhe.Thina-ke Mabhinca kasiqali ukudliwa izimali zethu noMlamuli Nxele wazidla qede washadelwa, walokhu ethi zizobuya, kuze kube yimanje, kazikaze zibuye.Kanjalo noKhozi FM, sekucacile ukuthi luhamba phambili ngakho ukusiwaka njengoba belubhizi lusigqugquzela ukuthi sivote lube lwazi ukuthi kunecala.Nawe-ke Ndlovu uyephulile imimoya yabantu abaningi ngenxa yokwehluleka wukubeka imali kusenesikhathi njengoba usuzobanga ngokuthi nguwe owasungula iTop 10.Njengoba sibaqamba kangaka abantu, siqhamuka neziteketiso ezize zidlalwe Ukhozi FM, sekumele sithi masikhokhelwe ngalokho?Thanda ChoncoEMPENGENI
Umculo kaSomnandi uyakukhulisa uhambe kahle empilweni
MHLELI: Kwelakho Isolezwe ngivumele ngizwakalise umbono wami ngamacwecwe KaSomnandi (Thokozani Langa) agxila empilweni yaseGoli.USomnandi phela abantu abaningi abamazi ukuthi udume kangaka nje ngobani ababone ikhono lakhe nokuthi la ekhona ufika nje usukaphi nomculo?USomnandi wakhipha icwecwe lakhe lokuqala ephrojuswa umalume wakhe uMusa Shabalala ngo-1994 kwi-albhamu Izindaba.Kuthe ngo-1998, wahlangana noPhathaphatha Ngcobo owaziwa ngokudlala i-keyboard kumaskandi.
Ngo-1999 wakhipha Impucuko.Kwathi ngo-2004 ecwecweni lakhe elalithi Makabongwe wenza ingoma enezinhlamvu ezithi eSoweto ngathola uthando ngathola i-true love, iqhubeke.
Kwathi ngo-2006, kwaba nengoma enezinhlamvu ezithi Wabona thina sibuya eGoli sicwebezela nawe wayeka isikole walandela thina, iGoli leli kwanyama kay’pheli.Kwathi ngo-2008 kwanengoma ethi Sibuya emakhaya le siyofuna umsebenzi edolobheni iGoli lincane, weGoli laphenduka iTopiya, siyafa indlala.Ngo-2011 ecwecweni lakhe elalithi Protection Order kwanengoma ethi IMbabala eyayithi Impilo inzima eGoli mungasebenzi wobuza kimi ngathwala kanzima, ngangihlala kusukela ekuseni kuze kuyoshona ilanga umlomo umhlophe, ngangilala phansi kombhede ngibizwa ngembabala, ngaphenduka umokoti ehostela ngiphekela abantu.Kwathi ngo-2012, wakhipha yona ingoma ethi Nganginemali kule minyaka edlule yadliwa intombi yaseSoweto, intombi yayiphila impilo ebizayo.Ngo-2013 wakhipha icwecwe elalithi Inyakanyaka eyayikhuluma ngalo iGoli.Kwathi ngo-2015 ecwecweni lakhe elalithi Khuzeka mshana waba nengoma ekhuluma ngeGoli.Kuthe ngo-2018, wakhipha Iyabuza induna nayo eyayinengoma ekhuluma ngeGoli.Umculo kaSomnandi uyakufundisa futhi uyakukhulisa ngokomqondo, ukuveza kucace ukuthi indlela eya empumelelweni idlula ebunzimeni.Nandosi SangweniKWACEZA
Osomathuba badunga isimo e-UKZN
KUSUKELA kuJanuwari isikhungo sethu esisithandayo, iNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal (UKZN), singundabamlonyeni, hhayi ngenxa yomlando omuhle wamagalelo okufundisa kodwa ngenxa yokuba yinkundla yodlame nezinxushunxushu.
Kumanje umonakalo empahleni ulinganiselwa kuR31 million.
Uhlelo lokufunda luphazamisekile.Lezi zenzo zodlame nezokucekela phansi impahla emabaleni enyuvesi nokwesabisa ziyanyanyeka futhi siyazigxeka.
Sinxusa abenzi baloku ukuthi bayiyeke le nto.
Udlame alusona isixazululo kulezi zinselelo esibhekene nazo.
Sizikhathalele ngempela izitshudeni ezinezinselelo zemali kanti senza konke okusemandleni ukusiza lezo zitshudeni ukuthi zibhalise.Yingakho sisabela ekhweleni labaphathi benyuvesi, sanikela ngoR1 million ku-15% odingekayo emalini yokubhalisa izitshudeni.
Sinxusa leli qeqebana ukuthi nalo lenze njalo.Abaholi bezitshudeni nabaphathi benyuvesi kufanele banconywe ngokuloku bazisa zonke izinhlaka ukuthi kwenzekani nangokunxusa bonke abalingani ukuthi baphose esivivaneni ngezinkinga zemali yezikweletu zezitshudeni ezindala nemali yokubhalisa.Kuningi okwenzekayo kulolu dlame esikhungweni esasifunda kusona.
Abanye baphatha indaba yokuthi, njengakwezinye izikhungo, lokhu sekuyibhola lezombusazwe.
Uma wesekwa yizitshudeni kusho ukuthi uzowina ukhetho lwango-2021 loHulumeni baseKhaya.Kubukeka sengathi kukhona iqeqebana elifuna ukuthatha amatomu okulawula imali yesikhungo.
Kodwa okukhulu kakhulu wukuthi abantu abahamba enyuvesi ngendlela engabonakali nabaphuma ngesamagundane sengathi bangene ngebhaxa lezinkinga ezikhona, bafuna ukukhuza ibuya.Inkinga ngamaqembu asanda kusungulwa ezimeni ezinje wukuthi avame ukufeza izidingo ezithile, imvamisa okungezosomathuba, esikhundleni sokuthi aqhamuke nesixazululo.Izinhlelo ezinje njalo kuba ngezokuthi kuhlomule abantu abangaphakathi noma abangaphandle enyuvesi abanamagqubu noma abanezinhloso zabo.Isibonelo nje yi-UKZN Education Committee esanda kusungulwa.
Sibalula yona njengesibonelo ukukhombisa lokhu esikushoyo ngoba ayizifihlile, iyaziwa.Laba ngabaholi, abanye abaziwayo abanye kabaziwa, bemiphakathi ethile abafafaza uhla lwezimfuno emphakathini kodwa inkinga wukuthi abakaze baphumele obala baxoxisane nenyuvesi futhi inyuvesi kayibazi.Leli komiti kuWhatsApp walo linezifundiswa eziqashwe yinyuvesi.Kepha okugqamayo wukuthi kuleli qembu kugcwele kakhulu amandiya.
Lokhu kuyinkinga.
Kusho ukuthi lezi zifundiswa zifuna izisombululo zangaphandle, indlu yazo ibe isha.Okunye okudunge amanzi kakhulu yingenkathi omunye okuthiwa ungelinye ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu saleli komiti enquma ukuthi njengoba ayefundisa kulesi sikhungo, uzokhipha umehlokaboni kaR10 000 ukuze kubanjwe umbhikishi oshaye isifundiswa esihlonishwayo, uSolwazi Erwin Brüning.
Yini inhloso yalo muntu ngalesi senzo sakhe?USolwazi, oyisibabuli seMathematics, uthandwa kakhulu.
Akekho umuntu osile emabaleni esikhungo nangaphandle ongavuma isenzo esinje kanti inyuvesi ilandele yonke imigudu ukusiza amaphoyisa.Okubi wukuthi le video isisabalele emphakathini, nosekuphazamise uphenyo lwamaphoyisa.Lowo mklomelo, oqhamuka nabazibiza nge-UKZN Education Crisis Committee, bengaxhumananga nenyuvesi, ubhebhezela uhlevane.Le nto ebucayi idinga ukuyekelwa ezandleni zomthetho nabo bonke abomthetho kanti yibona okufanele bakhiphe umehlokaboni.Ngokufuna ukubukwa ezindabeni, ukuqhakambisa leli qeqebana kwenza umuntu azibuze ukuthi yini inhloso yalo?Esifisa ukukwazi kuleli komiti, elibukeka lifisa “ukuhlenga i-UKZN”, wukuthi lalithuleleni ngesikhathi kunezinkinga esikoleni sezobudokotela ngenkathi izitshudeni zamandiya zibhaliswa njengabantu bomdabu?
Lathini kubulawa isitshudeni sesifazane somdabu emabaleni asenyuvesi?
Laphosani esivivaneni ngenkathi izitshudeni ezidinga usizo zicela usizo lwabafundi ababefunda enyuvesi kudala nakuleli sonto ngenkathi uMphathinyuvesi ehlaba ikhwelo losizo lwemali?Siphila lapho indaba yobuhlanga inkulu khona.
Kungabe senza okubi njengaleli qeqebana uma singavikela izidingo zeqeqebana kodwa singazinaki ezabanye noma ezenyuvesi yonke?Asidedele abaholi benyuvesi yethu nabaholi bezitshudeni ukuthi baxazulule le nkinga.
Abaphathi benyuvesi sebevume izinto ezinkulu eziningi kuze kube manje kanti nabaholi bezitshudeni kufanele babone ukuthi ngeke kuvunywe zonke izimfuno zabo, ikakhulukazi lezo ezizowisa isikhungo ngokwemali nokuphathwa kwaso.

Bathengi yazini okuzonisiza ngalesi sikhathi seCoronavirus
KULELI sonto ngifonelwe enye insizwa ebikhathazekile emuva kokuthi imali ebiyifake kwenye i-akhawunti kuthiwa ayiveli.
Ingishayele ucingo isegatsheni lebhange elithile ikhala ngokuthi abasebenzi abanaso isiqiniseko sokuthi imali yayo izobuya.Ngiyicele ukuthi ikhononde egatsheni ebikulo, icele nokuthumela i-email ngoba nami angazi ukuthi imali yayo izobuya nini.Kubalulekile ukuthi uma kukhona okungahambanga kahle ebhange usheshe ubike egatsheni okulo, ukhononde ngokubhala i-email.Ngiyazi abaningi benu bazokhala ngokuthi abanawo ama-email kodwa kuyasiza ukukhala nge-email ngoba akekho ophikayo ukuthi uke wakhala noma usulandelela uyakwazi ukusho ukuthi ulandelela luphi udaba.
Khumbula akusizi ukushesha ushayele amaphephandaba uma unenkinga ngoba amabhange alawulwa wumthetho wokuthi awazikhulumi izindaba zawo nabanye abantu, akhuluma namakhasimende awo kuphela.
I-Prudential Authority (PA) intswinye iSasfin Bank emuva kokuthi iphule eminye imigomo yeFinancial Intelligence Centre Act ka-2001.
I-PA ithe iSasfin ayintswinywanga ngoba isolwa ngokushushumbisa imali kodwa kunemigomo ethile ekade ingalandelwanga.ISasfin izohlawuliswa uR500 000.
Ibuye yayalelwa ukuthi iqeqeshe abasebenzi abathile ukulandela i-Financial Intelligence Act.
I-PA ithe iSasfin iyakulandela eyalelwe ukuthi ikwenze.
I-Consumer Goods and Service Ombud (CGSO) iyalele abantu ukuthi bayeke ukuthenga impahla kwiSA Trampoline emuva kokuthola izikhalo kubathengi abaningi.I-CGSO iveze ukuthi abathengi bese bekhokhe izibambiso eziphakathi kukaR3 200 noR6 400 kwiSA Trampoline kodwa abayitholi impahla yabo.Abanye sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu belinde impahla obekuthiwa izothunyelwa kungakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kuya kweziwu-14.
UNksz Magauta Mphahlele we-CGSO Ombud uthe udaba uselubike kwi-National Consumer Commission ukuze iphenye bese ijezisa inkampani.“Siyacela abantu bangalokothi bathenge impahla eSA Trampoline ngoba sisayibikile kwiConsumer Commission.
Umthetho uthi asixwayise abantu ngezinkampani ezingalaleli uma sithole izikhalo ngazo ngakho nalapha senza njalo.
Sizoqhubeka nokushicilela amagama ezinkampani ezithatha imali yabantu ngaphandle kokubanika impahla abayithengile,” kusho uNksz Mphahlele.
Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bangathuli uma izinkampani zibaphatha kabi kodwa bakhononde.
Ucele abantu ukuthi bazibhekisise izitolo abathenga kuzo nge-internet, babheke ukuthi impahla isithunyelwe yini ngoba eziningi zinohlelo oluvumela ikhasimende ukuthi libheke impahla yalo.I-CGSO itholakala ku-0860 000 272.
I-Financial Sector Authority (FSCA) ixwayise umphakathi ukuthi ungalokothi usebenzisane noMnuz Christiaan Burger Venter obuye abizwe ngelika “Mr Venter” ozibiza ngoMqondisi we-BVG Financial Solutions.
I-FSCA ithole ukuthi uVenter uhambe ethi usebenzela yona aze athathe imali kubantu ekubeni engathunywanga yiyo.Ithe i-BVG yinkampani enika abantu usizo lwezimali esemthethweni kodwa iyaziqhelelanisa noVenter osebenzisa inamba ethi 067 084 7982  ne-email ethi [email protected]Kuthiwa uVenter uthembisana inzalo ka-20% no-35% ngosuku lwemali osuke uyitshalile.Kunxuswe abantu ukuthi bangasebenzisani nezinkampani ezingenalo igunya lokubanika usizo lwezimali ngoba uma sezicwilile kunzima ukuzithola.I-FSCA ibuye yaxwayisa abantu nge-First Cash esebenzisa isitifiketi somkokotelo ukunika abantu usizo lwezimali.Ukuthola ulwazi lokuthi inkampani ivumelekile yini ukunikezana usizo lwezimali ungathinta i-FSCA ku-0800 110 443  noma ku-www.fsca.co.za* Uma unenkinga edinga usizo lwezabathengi ungathumela i-email [email protected] ubhale ezabathengi endaweni yesihloko.
Ngifisa kuphenywe indlela yokuqasha abasebenzi bakadoti
MHLELI: Ngiyabonga ngokungipha isikhala ngidlulise ukudumala kwami ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo siphelelwa wumsebenzi ngoba singenawo uR2 000 wokunika amakhansela emsebenzini wakwadoti ngaphansi koMkhandlu weTheku.
Amakhansela ayayazi indaba kaR2 000.Ngiqale ukusebenza ngicosha udoti kusuka ngo-2009, angikaze ngilenze iphutha emsebenzini.
Inkinga engiyibonile kulo msebenzi wethu wukuthi kuqhutshwa kakhulu ipolitiki kangangokuba uma bekunento ethinta inhlangano yethu, amakhansela abesifonela sishiye yonke into siyokwenza umsebenzi wenhlangano.Ake ngikhale ngoMhlonishwa uMxolisi Kaunda (osesithombeni) nezinye izikhulu ezisemkhandlwini, sibabizile sabanika lonke ulwazi lwenkohlakalo, ukuthi kunabantu abafakwa ngamakhansela benzelwa izincwadi zomgunyathi ngenye inkampani ebiyenza umsebenzi kadoti eThekwini.Kunamakhansela aphambili, engingeke ngiwabale ngamagama kodwa avele aqhuba ngendlela yawo kaR2 000 namantombazane akwandabazabantu kuMasipala weTheku.Uma befuna ukukholwa yile nto engiyishoyo, akubizwe umsebenzi ngamunye noma kuthiwe kababhale bafake emabhokisini, nizoyibona le nto engiyishoyo.
Abangene bengezwani namakhansela bangene ngenhlanhla, amakhansela abebafuna emnyango.Into engikhala ngayo seyingilahlekisele ngomsebenzi ngenxa yekhansela eliqhuba izinhloso zalo.Abanye abaqashiwe siyabazi bathandana nezingane zamakhansela, abanye bayizihlobo namakhansela.UKaunda uyayazi yonke le nto kodwa uyivuma kanjani ngoba wathi uzolungisa.Wavuma kwenziwe inkohlakalo phambi kwakhe, kwenzekani?Izingane lezi zami nabazukulu bami sebezokondliwa ngubani njengoba ngiphelelwe wumsebenzi?Kunzima okwaseThekwini ngoba nalaba esithi bathembekile akunjalo, silinyazwa bebhekile.
Saze saluthwala usizi singonile muntu.Angisho ukuthi abantu abangaqashwa, ngikhala ngezincwadi zomgunyathi ezenziwa yinkampani ebiyenza umsebenzi wokuqoqa udoti eThekwini.Kungani umthetho ungababophi abantu abenza umgunyathi nabantu abaya kozilanda izincwadi bebe bazi kahle ukuthi abakaze basebenze kule nkampani.
Sicela ubulungiswa kule nto yokuqashwa kwabasebenzi bamgwaqweni.Uma kungenzeki lokho kuze kudlula lesi simo se-Corona, lonke ulwazi ngobugengu bokuqashwa kwezihlobo zamakhansela, ngizoyinika ithimba loklebe eKZN namagama ezikhulu esazixhuma nezaziyo ngale nto ngizowaveza.Konakele kulo mkhandlu weTheku, inkohlakalo inuka phu.
Uma ungezwani nekhansela khohlwa, indaba yakho ifana nento efile.Sengifisa nokuthi yonke le nto ifinyelele nakuNdunankulu, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala.ObengumsebenziETHEKWINI
URamaphosa ugida ndawonye
Bonke DumisaININGI labahlaziyi liyigxekile inkulumo kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, bathi uphinda-phinda into eyodwa.
Bakhala ngokuthi ayikho into entsha ayishilo, abanye bathi lokhu kufana nokufaka iwayini elidala ebhodleleni elisha.Ngingomunye walabo ababekubalulile lokhu ngaphambi kokwethulwa kwale nkulumo, ukuthi akukuningi okusha uhulumeni angakusho ngokufukulwa komnotho ngoba ayikho imali eningi angayisebenzisa ukujabulisa abafisa ukuthi kusetshenziswe imali eningi ibe ingekho ukufukula umnotho khona manje.UMengameli Ramaphosa wathi isu likahulumeni lokuvuselela nokwakhiwa kweNingizimu Afrika kabusha lincike ezinhlakeni ezinhlanu:Ukwakha amathuba amasha emisebenzi:Ngokwandisa ukwakhiwa nokuvuselelwa kwengqalasizinda ebalulekile ezweni kanye neminye imibhidlango engandisa okuqashwa kwabantu abaningi.Ukuvuselelwa nokwandiswa kwezimboni zohlobo oluphambili ekukhiqizweni kwezinhlobonhlobo zezimpahla, ikakhulukazi ekukhuliseni izimboni ezincane ezisafufusa kule mikhakha.Ukugqugquzela ukuguqulwa kwezomnotho ukuthi kube nezinguquko ezibonakalayo; okungenza kube nabatshalimali abaningana abazongena kwezomnotho, ukuze kukhule umnotho ezweni.Ukulwa ngomfutho nobugebengu nenkohlakalo yogimbelakwesabo; futhi kulungiswe kuphinde kwenziwe ngcono amakhono nendlela uhulumeni enza ngayo izinto.Uhulumeni uzimisele ukulungulisa umonakalo owenzeke kwezomnotho wezwe ngenxa yobhubhane lwesifo, iCovid-19 esilimaze kakhulu ezomnotho, kwalahleka imisebenzi engaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili ezinyangeni ezintathu zokuqala ngemva kokugunyazwa komthetho obuvala izwe.Kungakho uhulumeni wenza izinhlelo ezinhlobonhlobo ukwenza izibonelelo ukuhlangabezana nalabo abangasebenzi nezinkampani ezahlangabezana nezinselelo zemali ngenkathi kuvalwe yonke into.Ukuvuselela ezomnotho, uhulumeni uthe uzimisele ukwandiswa ukukhiqizwa kwezamandla nogesi kungakapheli iminyaka emibili.Ukwenza isimo esihle ezweni ukuze kwakheke amathuba amasha emisebenzi abalelwa ku-800 000, ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo, nokuvala ezinye zezikhala ezivulekile ngemva kokulahleka kwemisebenzi.Ukwenza isimo esingcono sokutshalwa kwemali ukuze kube lula ukuthi kwakhiwe noma kuvuselelwe ingqalasizinda ebalelwa kwizigidi zezigidi zezigidi (trillion) zamaRandi kule minyaka emine ezayo.Kunyuswe imikhiqizo yezimpahla ezenziwa ngaphakathi ezweni, kuphinde kwenziwe ngcono izimboni lapho kukhiqizwa khona izimpahla eziningi ezinesidingo.
Ingqalasizinda esikhuluma ngayo lapha ifaka ukwakhiwa kwezikole, eyokuhambisa amanzi, nokwakhiwa kwemizi yemixhaso.
Kumanjenje uhulumeni usezinqumele ukwakha izindlu zemixhaso ezingaphezu kuka-190 000.Kunemisebenzi engaphezu kuka-60 000 yokulungisa ingqalasizinda nemigwaqo emazingeni omasipala.Kuzokwakheka amathuba emisebenzi angu-75 000 kwezolimo kulabo abafufusayo.Kunamathuba angu-100 000 kwimfundo yabantwana ezinkulisa, abangakangeni ezikoleni, nabafunda ngokugcwele.Uhulumeni uthe uzokwenza amathuba awu-300 000 kwabasha abazosiza kwezemfundo ngezindlela ezehlukene.Uma kumele ngikhulume iqiniso njengomuntu esefa, ngingakubeka ngingananazi ukuthi umengameli wethula inkulumo ngoLwesine olwedlule ngoba wayengaphansi kwengcindezi ethi uhulumeni makasho okuthile ngokuthi umnotho uzofukulwa kanjani.Osombusazwe bayakwazi ukubhala amakhasi awu-15, bakhulume ngaphezulu kwehora noma amabili begida ndawonye.
Yilokho-ke uRamaphosa akwenze ngoLwesine.Inkulumo ebaluleke kakhulu yileyo ezothulwa uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali uMnuz Tito Mboweni ngoLwesithathu oluzayo, lapho ezoba ethula isabelomali samaphakathi nonyaka, asho ukuthi kule minyaka emithathu ezayo imali izokwabiwa kanjani.Yileyo nkulumo ezocacisa ukuthi mungakanani umonakalo odalwe yiCovid-19, nokuthi bahlela ukuthi siphume kanjani kulolu taku.
Kumele sikhumbule ukuthi imali ayimili ezihlahleni, uhulumeni ngeke asebenzise imali angenayo.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa umhlaziyi wezomnotho futhi ungummeli wasenkantolo enkulu
Asigwemeni ukuthola izingane ezingahlelelwe
MHLELI: Kwelakho elingashayi eceleni ngithi ake ngiphawule ngodaba lwabantwana abazalwa bengahlelelwe, abafikela phezu kwezinkinga eziningi.Wuthola ukuthi umfana uzalise intombazane thizeni ebe engasebenzi efunda.Abazali bakhe bamphikele, ekubeni babengekho laba bantu bethandana.Ingane ithi ifika emhlabeni isithwala amacala engawazi, sekufanele ikhule ingenayise ngoba uyise wayiphika sekufanele ikhuliswe ngunina eyedwa.Unina uyowa evuka eyizamela izidingo zayo engakasakwazi nokuqhubeka nezifundo zesikole uma kade efunda.Umfana yena aqhubeke nezifundo aze ayofundela umsebenzi othize, engasafuni nokuthi ingane ibizwe ngaye.Ingane uma ikhula ibona ezinye izingane zikhuluma ngoyise nezinto ezinhle abazenzela zona.Uma yona ifika ekhaya, ibuza unina ngoyise wayo, angayiphenduli kahle, ayikhace ayithembise ukuyifaka induku.Empeleni kumele ngabe uhlala nayo phansi ayichazele ukuthi uze angabi khona nje uyise kwenzekani.Ingane izokhula ibe nenhliziyo embi, ibe nenzondo izonde nabantu abangenzile lutho.Sengathi abantu kungathi uma sebengena ebudlelwaleni bothando basebenzise okokuzivikela ukuze kungadaleki inkinga yokutholakala kwezingane ezingahlelelwe.Kugcina sekudaleka izigebengu, ezibamba inkunzi namaphara ahluphayo antshontsha izimpahla ekhaya ayozidayisa ukuze athole imali.Uma nje siphila masizicabangeleni ngempela, masingalethi izingane ezingenasidingo emhlabeni sizozihluphekisa, zithwale amacala ezingawazi.Le nto engikhuluma ngayo akuyona inganekwane kodwa yenzeka imihla namalanga.Asisigwemeni lesi simo bakwethu ngoba yisikhathi esiphila kuso yonke into iyakhokhelwa.Edmund Ngcobo
Ukunyuka kukagesi kuzoba nemiphumela emibi
ININGIZIMU Afrika inohlaka olubizwa ngeNational Energy Regulator of South Africa (Nersa), okuyilona olucubungula izicelo zalabo abafuna ukubamba iqhaza embonini yezamandla, okubalwa kuyo kakhulukazi ugesi.I-Nersa yiyo ecubungula izicelo ze-Eskom uma ifuna ukunyusa intengo kagesi.
Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinqumo zokunyusa intengo kagesi azithathwa budlabha nje, kungabhekwanga zinhlangothi zonke ukuthi izinqumo ze-Eskom zingaba namiphumela mini engahlukumeza kabi abasebenzisi bakagesi.Ngo-2018 i-Eskom yenza isicelo sokunyusa intengo kagesi kakhulu.
Ngaphezu kwesicelo sokunyusa intengo kagesi njengokujwayelekile minyaka yonke, i-Eskom yaphinda yacela ukuthi ivunyelwe ukuthi ikwazi ukwengezela ngokuqoqa imali engangoR66.7 billion ngaphezulu.I-Eskom yathi lo R66.7 billion ongezelelwayo yimali eyalahlekela i-Eskom eminyakeni emithathu elandelanayo okuwu-2014/15, 2015/16, 2016/17, lapho i-Eskom yaba nezinkinga ukuqhuba umsebenzi, kwafuneka icele ukutakulwa uhulumeni ngemali ukuze ikwazi ukuqhubeka nokukhiqiza nokusabalalisa ugesi.Impikiswano enkulu yaqala lapho iNersa ithi hhayi iyaphikisana nesicelo se-Eskom ngezizathu zokuthi inani elicelwa yi-Eskom ukwenyusa intengo kagesi lalikuzomba eqolo kakhulu kubasebenzisi bakagesi abangabasebenzisi bakagesi emakhaya; kanti futhi le ntengo ephezulu kakhulu yayizoba nemiphumela emibi kakhulu ekwandiseni izindleko zokuqhuba umsebenzi emabhizinisini amaningi.
Imiphumela yalokhu yayizonyusa kakhulu ukwehla kwamandla emali.
Lokhu kwakuzokwandisa ukulahleka kwemisibenzi nokulahleka kwamathuba emisebenzi.I-Nersa yaphinda yathi asikho isidingo se-Eskom sokuthi ifune ukugixabezwa ngoR66.7 billion, ngesizathu sokuthi imali eyabalahlekela ngale minyaka emithathu ebaliwe.
I-Nersa yathi i-Eskom iyazenzisa nje, ikhala izinyembezi zengwenya, ngoba yathola ukutakulwa nguhulumeni ngezizumbulu.
I-Nersa yathi bazothatha le mali uhulumeni atakula ngayo i-Eskom njengemali ejwayelekile ekhokhwe abasebenzisi bakagesi.
Ngenxa yalezi zathu, iNersa yavumela i-Eskom ukuthi izovunyelwa ukubuyisa kuphela uR32.69 billion emalini eyabalahlekela eminyakeni emithathu.I-Eskom yavuka injebomvu ngalesi sinqumo seNersa, yagijimela enkantolo ifuna isinqumo siguqulwe.
Noma-ke ngingavumelani nale nto ye-Eskom yokuthanda ukugijimela ezinkantolo, lapho ichitha izigidi ngezigidi ikhokhela abameli ngokungenasidingo; kodwa-ke nazi izizathu i-Eskom elwela lelo nalelo senti engalithola:* I-Eskom kunemali eningi okumele ngabe iyayithola kodwa engayitholi ngoba kunabantu abaningi abangawukhokheli ugesi ngoba bewuntshontsha.
* Kuthiwa eSoweto abantu abakhokhela ugesi ngokwethembeka bangabalelwa kwabathathu kuphela ebantwini abayishumi (30%).
* Uma i-Eskom izama ukuvala ugesi kulabo abangakhokhi, labo bantu bagijimela ezinkantolo ukuthi ivinjwe i-Eskom ekuvaleni lowo gesi.
UMthethosisekelo wezwe lakithi usetshenziswa budedengu yilabo galakajana ukuthi bangavalelwa ugesi; uma kuthiwa kunabantu abadala kakhulu noma kunezingane ezincane kakhulu kulowo muzi okumele kucishwe khona ugesi, izinkantolo zimame zivune labo abangakhokheli ugesi becasha ngezingane nezaguga.
* Kuneminyango eminingi kahulumeni engawukhokheli ugesi, kunezikole eziningi ezingawukhokheli ugesi.
Kunabantu abaningi okuthiwa badla imbuya ngothi, kuthiwe mabathole ugesi mahhala kodwa uthole ukuthi iningi labo lihamba ngezimoto zikanokusho.
* Kuphinde kube nosomabhizinisi abantshontsha ugesi, lapho uthola ukuthi lokhu kwenzeka ngenxa yenkohlakalo ngokubambisana nabasebenzi bakhona kwa-Eskom.
Kanti-ke sekuzwakele ezigcawini ezehlukene mayelana nenkohlakalo nobusela obuhlukene ngaphakathi kwa-Eskom, okuyikho konke okusifake kule nkinga esikuyo yokuhlala kucishwa ugesi.Yizo zonke lezi zizathu ezenza i-Eskom ibe magange ukuthi kuhlale kunyuswa intengo kagesi, lapho kwaziwa kamhlophe ukuthi kushaywa edonsayo kule lizwe.Kujeziswa labo abawukhokelayo ugesi, kuthiwe abakhokhe imali emba eqolo, kube kukhona iningi elintshontsha ugesi umathanda.Abasebenzisa ugesi bangase bazithole bezalelwa yinja endlini, bavuke umbhejezana, ngoba sebekhathele ukuxhashazwa yi-Eskom enyusa intengo kagesi njalo nje, engakhathalele ukuthi kunabantu abaningi abadla imbuya ngothi futhi bengasebenzi.Okubuhlungu ngezinkinga ze-Eskom ukuthi ukucima kwayo ugesi ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi kubulala ezomnotho wezwe.Ecaleni eselithathe isikhathi eside, neselibe nobugingxigingxi obuningi, iNkantolo eNkulu iNorth Gauteng, ePitoli, ithathe isinqumo sokuthi abakwaNersa kumele baphinde balufakele izibuko lolu daba lwesinqumo sabo sokuthi banqabele i-Eskom ukuthi inyuse intengo ngokumba eqolo kubasebenzisi bakagesi, ngoba ifuna uR66.7 billion, hhayi lo R32.69 iNersa eyabavumela ukuthi bangawuthola.Uma iNersa ingagcina ivumile ukuthi intengo kagesi inyuke ngendlela i-Eskom efuna ngayo, sizothola abantu abaningi behlukumezeka bengakwazi ukuwukhokhela.Iningi labo lizozithola selandisa labo abawuntshontshayo.
Akungashaywa edonsayo.
* USolwazi Bonke Dumisa umhlaziyi ozimele.

Ngithuswe yisinyathelo sikaDJ Tira

UMboweni uhlalelwe wumsebenzi onzima
MHLELI: UNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Tito Mboweni, uhlalelwe wumsebenzi wokwethula isabelo-mali esizokhanyisa ukuthi imali yokuthenga imigomo yeCovid-19 izovelaphi njengoba engalindelekile ukuthi anyuse intela ngenxa yesimo somnotho.Okunye okubhekwe ngabomvu wukuthi zilekelelwa kanjani ezempilo nezemfundo ngemali ukuze zibhekane nombhedukazwe weCovid-19.Kungokokuqala selokhu sabuswa ngokwentando yabantu ukuthi ungqongqoshe abe nengcindezi yokwethula isabelo-mali izwe libhekene nezinselelo kwezomnotho, inqwaba yabantu abangasebenzi kanye nobhubhane iCorona.Kuningi osekushintshile kusukela uMboweni ethula isabelo-mali ngonyaka odlule ngenxa yeCovid-19 elahlekisele abantu ngemisebenzi nomnotho wezwe uqumbeke phansi.
Ukungasebenzi kwabantu kusho ukuncipha kwentela eqoqwa uhulumeni.Njengoba bekuvalwe izwe uhulumeni ulahlekelwe imali eningi okubuye kwangezwa wukuvalwa kotshwala nogwayi okuyizinto ezifaka itshe lemali esikhwameni sikahulumeni.Esikulindele kuMboweni ukuthi ethule isabelo-mali esizobuyisa ithemba ngokuvuka komnotho.
Okubalulekile wukuthi abantu basheshe bazibonele umnotho ubuyela emgqeni ngokudaleka kwamathuba emisebenzi.Kodwa-ke ngabe senza iphutha uma singalindela ukushintsha kwesimo ngokushesha kwazise mkhulu kakhulu umonakalo odalwe yiCovd-19.
INingizimu Afrika izithole seyiboleka imali okuyinto ekade ingayihlelele.
Lokhu kwenzeke kade vele izwe lidonsa kanzima ngenxa yezikweletu ebelinazo.
Ukusimama kahle komnotho kulindeleke ngo-2025 ngakho okwamanje wukuthi uMboweni akhombe indlela ezosibeka lapho.Siyakuqonda nokuthi uMboweni ucindezwa nawukuthi umnotho weNingizimu Afrika ubekwe kuvobe.
Lokhu kusho ukuthi izinkampani zomhlaba ngeke zisiboleke kalula imali futhi kwazinkampani zikahulumeni ngeke zibathole abatshalimali bakwamanye amazwe.Ukhiye womnotho usenkampanini kahulumeni i-Eskom edonsa kanzima.
Lokhu kuyinkinga ngoba uMboweni akakwazi ukuyekelela le nkampani yehluleke.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi akakwazi ukulokhu equlele imali kuyona lungabonakali ushintsho.
Kade sathenjiswa ukuthi kunohlelo lokutakula i-Eskom, kepha sekuthulekile.
Kungakuhle uMboweni asicacisele ukuthi sekuhanjwe kwafikwaphi nalolo hlelo.Mazwakhe MkhizeENTSHANGWE
Bashaye udaka abaphathi boKhozi
MHLELI: Ngicela ungiphe lesi siqeshana ke ngizwakalise ukukhalaza kwami mayelana nezinguquko ezenziwe emsakazweni wethu esiwuthandayo Ukhozi FM.
Abaphathi balo msakazo bashaye udaka ngohlelo lwantambama lolu abalunike uSelby benoSiya Mhlongo.
Umuntu ofana noSiya kalumfanele neze loluya hlelo.
Ludinga abantu abafana noTshatha Ngobe.
Akubuyiselwe uTshatha kulolu hlelo njengoba ebelwenza phambilini.
Lokhu thina balaleli bekusenza sithi noma siphuma emsebenzini ntambama, sikhathele noma kukhona okusiphazamisile osukwini kodwa sazi kahle ukuthi sizolalela uhlelo oluzosenza sihleke.
Belunemigosi eyenza ukhohlwe okwenzeke osukwini ngalelo langa.
Manje uSiya akanakho lokho, hhayi ngoba engakwazi ukusakaza kodwa loluya hlelo kalumfanele nhlobo.
Bese kuba ezemidlalo; sicela abaphathi boKhozi balungise izinkinga zabo nabasakazi bezemidlalo, sesifile yindlala yokungazizwa ngokuphelele, kungenjalo sizokwehla isibalo sabalaleli ngenxa yalolu daka olushaywa ngabaphathi boKhozi.Nkosinathi Khumalo
Ungayibona imihlola eyenzeka ebandleni laseSiphingo
MHLELI: Ngiyasha esifubeni, ngivumele njengoba kuqala unyaka ngibhadlaze le ndaba ifundwe yisizwe sonke.
Mhlawumbe uma sengiyithulule lapha neziphathimandla zebandla iHouse of Love and Care zizosukumela phezulu.
Siyaphela ubugebengu egatsheni laseSiphingo.Iyangidina into eyenzeka lapha.
Ungayibona imihlola.
Sekuze kuthiwe abantu abeze bazobeka noma yimalini ezinyaweni zomfundisi ukuze babusiseke.
Kubuye kuthiwe abaphonse noma yimalini lapha epulpiti khona izwi alifundile umfundisi lizoletha izinhlanhla emizini yabazalwane.
Kubuye kuthiwe abantu abasho ukuthi benza mabhizinisi mani ukuze babe nezibusiso, umfundisi awathandazele.Kuningi nje.
Umama umfundisi usulwa ubuso ngamavolontiya.
Uma kungena umfundisi kuthiwa abazalwane abasukume bashaye izandla noma kungena umkakhe.
Kanti sikhonza bani lapha, bona noma uNkulunkulu?Kunamantombazane anda­wonye axabana nomama umfundisi ewasola ngokuthi afuna umfundisi.
Athe esehambile ebandleni kwa­thiwa yiwona abeshela umfundisi.Kunengane enele yathola umsebenzi iyafundisa umama umfundisi wayishelela umfana wakhe, bayajola kumanje - sikuphi kanti lana?
Enzeka kanjani amanyala anjena esontweni?Kuqala indlu esikhonzela kuyona kwathiwa yathengwa yibandla iyakhokhelwa.
Manje sekushintshiwe - njalo umzalwane ngamunye ekupheleni kwenyanga ukhipha uR200 ngoba sekuthiwa indlu iqashiwe.
Okusho ukuthi labo R200 umuntu uyobakhipha kuze kuyovalwa.
Angithi uyabona babona ukuthi uma bethi yathengwa kuzohamba, kuhamba kuphele ukuyikhokhela.
Kungcono basibambe ngokuthi kuqashiwe.
Kumanje kuthiwa umzalwane ngamunye akakhiphe R1 500 wendlu yesonto ezokwakhiwa.
Kulowo mzuzu akukho siza kodwa sebeqalile abazalwane bayakhokha.Laba abangenalutho angithi bahlezi benganakwa muntu.
Omunye umzalwane ushonelwe yingane.
Kuthe uma ecela ukufihlelwa wumfundisi, kwayiwa emabhukwini kuyobhekwa ukuthi uyakhokha yini ebandleni wasindiswa wukuthi njalo ngenyanga uyawukhipha uR200.
Kulowo mzuzu umama umfundisi wayengamazi kwalo womama oshonelwe yingane ngoba abazalwane ubazi ngokuthi banani.Abaholi bebandla ake basondele - sengathi umelusi wethu usephuma kakhulu endleleni esiyaziyo.OkhathazekileEMLAZA
Masihlukane nezinkulumo ezingamanga nezidukisayo
MHLELI: Ngicela ukuxwayisa umphakathi ngokuthi upheze ukusabalalisa ulwazi olungacwaningiwe ngongoti abamele leyo mikhakha futhi olungamanga.Ngiloba kuleli phephandaba nje, ngidumele kakhulu ngenkulumo eqoshiwe ezungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ematanisa imibhoshongo yamaselula i-5G nobhubhane oluhlasele umhlaba iCorona.
Ngicela ukucacisa ukuthi akusilo iqiniso ukuthi imibhoshongo ye-5G isabalalisa iCorona.
Kuzo zonke izincwadi engizifundayo angikaze ngihlangane nalolo lwazi, ngakho-ke angiqondi le nkulumo iqhamuka kuphi.Okungiphatha kabi kakhulu ukuthi izodukisa isizwe ngoba ngiyicaphuna njengemfundisoze.
Asihlukane nokusungula amahemuhemu angelona iqiniso nezinkulumo esizenza lapho sihlezi khona kamnandi phansi kwezihlahla, bese sizishicilela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoba sizibulala thina uqobo nesizukulwane sethu ngaleso senzo.
Sinongoti abaqeqeshiwe kwezobuchwepheshe ngakho-ke asingazihlaziyeli ngoba sizofaka iNingizimu Afrika, ehlathini elimnyama.
Kunomlobi obhale  kule nkundla kuleli phephandaba ecela ukuthi umengameli asitshele iqiniso ngalezi zinsolo.
Angiphikisani nalo mbhali ngoba ubefuna isisombululo ebona sidunguza oswini.
Kepha bengizothi asingamfakeli uhulumeni ingcindezi ngokuthi sisungule izinto ezingamanga sisodwa  bese sifuna kube ngumengameli ozochaza.Kuyathusa futhi kuyadumaza ukuthola ukuthi lezi zinsolo sezisabalele kangaka nje kanti zisuka ekhanseleni loMkhandlu weTheku ku-ward 24 uMnuz Sifiso Mngadi.
Lokhu akulindelekile ukuthi kwenziwe umholi womphakathi futhi osesikhundleni esihloniphekile sokuba yibukhansela.Okushayisa ngamahloni akathandi ukuhoxisa inkulumo yakhe axolise, kunalokho uqinisa ikhanda futhi ukubeka kucace ukuthi akazisoli.
Iphutha aliphuthi, ngicela wehlele ngezansi Madlokovu, uvume kushelele ulimi.

Angiwuboni umehluko selokhu ngaqala ukuvota ngo-1994
MHLELI: Ngicela noma ngabe wubani ongakazwi ukungiphendula umbuzo wami othi: Uma sivota sizothi sivotelani?Ngokwami angisiboni isidingo sokuyokuma kulayini ngizingcolise isithupha sami ngo-ink ngoba ukuvota angikuqondi ukuthi kusho ukuthini kimina.
Lokhu ngaqala ukuvota ngo-1994 kodwa namanje angiwuboni umehluko.
Sengisola nokuthi ukuvota wukucebisa abathile osuke ubavotela.Ngokwami angisiboni isidingo sokuvota kodwa hlawumbe ukhona ongangiphendula ekutheni eminyakeni ewu-26 sivota impilo yethu ishintshe ngani?Into engiyibonayo wukuthi uma uvota uvotela ukuthi abaholi badle kahle, benze kahle inkohlakalo.
Ngikhuluma nje onogada badlala izinkampani zibaholela amakinati, abanye badlala ama-labour broker, abanye badlala abanikazi bamapulazi, abanye abasebenza ezindlini badlala abaqashi babo nabanye abaningi abenza imisebenzi abaholelwa kuyo amakinati.
Ngabe ukuvota kusayowenza umehluko kulabo bantu?Manje sidlala ukunqanyulelwa ugesi, nakhona iminwe ikhomba thina kuthiwa sitshontsha ugesi.
Umbuzo uthi uzolithenga ngani ikhadi likagesi ungasebenzi?Uhulumeni akenzele izintandokazi zakhe, abokufika, eziyomvotela, thina inhlupheko sesiyayiqonda kasisenandaba nayo.
Miningi kabi iminyaka ewu-26 lungekho ushintsho.
Seluzoba khona manje ngoba sekuzovotwa?Ngokwami bangcono abokufika ngoba badayisa nezidakamizwa futhi banezitolo.
Bona bangavota ngoba bayawubona umehluko.
Sesizowabona amakhansela nabaholi bezosicela ukuthi sivote.
Uma kwenzekile ngaqondana nabo bekhankasa ngisazowubuza umbuzo othi uma sivota sivotelani, yini entsha ezokwenzeka engenzekanga emnyakeni engu-26?Ngokwami akuvote abahola imali yezibonelelo zikahulumeni nabasebenza kuhulumeni ngoba bangcono bona khona okuncane abakutholayo.Thanda Mnikaziwempuphu ChoncoeMpangeni

MHLELI: Ngifisa ukudlulisa injabulo yami mayelana nesinqumo esithathwe yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseGoli ebiholwa yiPhini lejaji uPhineas Mojapelo, ukuthi alingabe lisasetshenziswa emphakathini ifulegi elidala laseNingizimu Afrika.Ngibonga iNelson Mandela Foundation ngokusukumela lolu daba futhi ikwazi ukuthi ilwe ne-Afriforum mayelana nalolu daba ngoba ngale kwalokho lo mkhuba bewuzoqhubeka wenzeke.Ngokwami, ukusebenzisa ifulegi lakudala kulesi sikhathi kutshengisa umyalezo wokukholelwa kulona, ukucwasa nobukhulu kwabantu abamhlophe phezu kwabamnyama.
Njengoba ijaji libekile esinqumeni senkantolo ukuthi ifulegi lingasetshenziswa ezikoleni ngenhloso yokufundisa ngomlando wakuleli kodwa ngale kwalokho akuvumelekile.Sihle lesi sinqumo ngoba ifulegi elidala lavinjelwa mhla sithola inkululeko, kwethulwa elisha ngalokho kwakusho ukuthi siyadlula kokudala okwakungukuhlukunyezwa, ukucindezeleka nokunye.Ngithemba ukuthi abantu bazosihlonipha isinqumo futhi bayeke ukusebenzisa ifulegi elidala.Kumele bahloniphe umthetho wakuleli namaqhawe omzabalazo.Sphelele MthethwaKwaNongoma

MHLELI: Ngibhala lapha ngiphatheke kabi ngokungahlonishwa kwezitshudeni zasemaTVET College.Le nto ngiyinakisise kahle kulo nyaka ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo ePhakeme neSayensi, uDkt Blade Nzimande (osesithombeni), ememezela ukuthi izitshudeni zizothola ama-laptop ne-data ukuze zikwazi ukufunda kahle emakhaya ngesikhathi kuvalwe izwe ngenxa yeCovid-19.Lokho akaze kwenzeke kodwa kwagcina kuthole izitshudeni zasemanyuvesi kuphela.

Ngibona Uzalo lugqugqezela ubugebengu ezweni
