#Ezobuhle: Ukudla okunempilo kungayigwema injubaba
NOMA owesifazane angamuhle kanjani kodwa kuhlala kunezinto ezimkhathazayo emoyni, njengokuqothuka kwezinwele.Lokhu akwenzeki nje kubantu abafaka imithi yokulula izinwele, abaxhuma izinwele zokufakelwa, kodwa inkinga yokuqothukelwa izinwele ibhekene neningi labesifazane.Sekwaze kwaba negama elijwayelekile lokuteketisa izinwele eziqothukayo, njengoba zibizwa ngenjibaba, noma injibs, kwezinye izindawo.
Izinto zokugeza nokugcoba ekhanda zihlala zikhangiswa, futhi zigagulwa ngamagama kodwa kukancane zibuyisa izinwele, okuze kuholele ekutheni abantu bagunde.Ongoti bezokudla bashumayeza ivangeli elihlukile njengoba bekhuthaza bonke abantu ukuthi badle ukudla okufanele nokunezakhamzimba ezibalulekile ezingasiza umuntu angaqothuki.UNkk Ella Mthethwa we-Ellagance Wellness Health Boutique, uveze ukuthi inkinga yokuqothuka kwezinwele kubantu abaningi iqala ngaphakathi emzimbeni womuntu.Lokhu kuqothuka uthi kungadalwa izinto eziningi, njengokushoda kwezakhamzimba egazini ezitholakala ngokudla nokumele zilekelele ukuhluma kwezinwele.“Ukudla nezinto umuntu azigcobayo kumele nakanjani kuhambisane, izithelo nemifino kudlala enkulu indima.
Imvamisa abantu abanaki ukuthi badla hlobo luni lokudla nokwenza bagcine begxile kuhlobo olulodwa.
Uma kukhona izakhamzimba ezishodayo egazini, azizofinyelela lapho kumele kukhule khona izinwele.Kunanoma yimiphi imikhiqizo neyesikhumba, kumele uqale ngokuzilungisa ngaphakathi wenze i-detox, bese udla ngendlela izinto ezinama-vitamin, amaprotein, calcium, iron ungakushiyi,” kusho uNkk Mthethwa.Uthe bakhona nowoyela bemvelo abantu abangabasebenzisela izinto ezahlukene emakhaya.
I-marula, olive oil, caster oil, coconut oil nabanye abahloliwe.
Mayelana nokudla, uthe akudingi ukuthi kuze kube okubizayo, kodwa nokutholakala ekhaya engadini kubalulekile ngoba kunezakhamzimba zemvelo, akuthakiwe.
: Okuhle ngawo ukuthi udleka kalula nezinhlobo ezahlukene zokudla.
Okumangazayo ukuthi uqukethe nama-vitamin abalulekile njengo-E noB ohambisana namafutha adingekayo.Uzokusiza ukuqinisa izinwele zakho zingaphuki kalula, zihlale zinempilo futhi nesikhumba sekhanda siphefumula kahle.
Uyakwazi nokuwuxuba nezinye izinto wenze umxovo wezinwele.
: Nawo udleka ngezindlela ezingefani futhi noma uluhlaza ungakwazi ukuchitha isizungu ngawo kodwa ube wenza umsebenzi omkhulu.
Ugabe ngo-vitamin A. Uzokusiza ukuthi izinwele zakho zingaqhumi noma ziqothuke kalula.
: Izinhlobo ezahlukene zezinhlanzi zasolwandle ziyasiza nazo.
Iningi lazo liqukethe ama-protein, zinc, iron, calcium, omega fatty acids kanjalo novitamin C. Konke lokhu kubalulekile emzimbeni womuntu ngoba kudingwa yigazi, isikhumba kanjalo nezinwele.
: Linama-protein ne-keratin equkethe uhlobo oluphambili lwama-protein asiza esikhumbeni, izinwele nezinsipho.Uyakwazi nokulihlanganisa nokotapheya ukugcobe ekhanda, uconsisele i-olive oil.
Ngelinye ilanga ungalisebenzisa nobhanana noma noju.
Ungowesifazane wokuqala ezindizeni zempi
UMajor Mandisa Mfeka okhulele eNtuzuma ngaphambi kokuthi bathuthele eMalvern, ungumshayeli wendiza wokuqala ofunde ngobuchule bokulwa ngayo, iCombat Pilot, uthe unina nogogo wakhe bebemthatha ngemoto bayombukisa izindiza kusukela eseneminyaka emihlanu.
Ubezifela ngokubuka izindiza, engazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga indiza iyobe isuswa nguye.“Ayikho into ebingichaza njengokubuka ibhanoyi lisuka, ngihleli emotweni.
Uma kuwumbukiso wamabhanoyi bengithokoza kakhulu.”UMajor Mfeka uthe ngaphambi kokuthi angene embuthweni wezomoya wayethanda ukuba ngudokotela, yize ayengazi ukuthi ufisa ukuba udokotela owelapha ziphi izifo.
Konke lokhu kwabuye kwaguquka.“Ngelinye ilanga ngacabanga ukuthi ukuba wudokotela kwakungelona iphupho lami kodwa yiphupho likababa.
Nguye owayefisa ukuba udokotela kodwa wagcina ebe nguthisha.
Ngazibuza ukuthi konje mina ngifuna ukwenzani futhi yini engiyithandayo.
Ngaqala lapho ukufunda ngezinto engingazifundela uma nginesayensi neMaths,” kusho yena.Uthi uzakwabo ayefunda naye wathi ufuna ukuba yi-aeronautical engineer.“Ngezwa ngiwuthanda lo msebenzi nami wokuba unjiniyela okhanda izindiza.
Umalume wafika nencwadi eyayichaza ngemisebenzi ongayifundela uma unezifundo zesayensi neMaths.
Ngathi ngisapheqa amakhasi ngibuka, ngabona isikhangiso sombutho wezokuvikela wakuleli wezomoya.
Ngabona izifundo ezidingekayo nginazo, ngajabula, ngasithatha ngaleso sikhathi isinqumo.Ungene embuthweni ngo-2008, ngo-2010 wangena esikoleni sokufundela ukushayela amabhanoyi, iCentral Flying School, esiseLangebaan, ngaphandle kwaseCape Town.UMajor Mfeka ungumshayeli wendiza yempi kwiSouth African Air Force.“Lo mkhakha kusengowamadoda, uma ukuwona abesifazane ababonwa kanti kumnandi ukuba nozakwenu besifazane ozoxoxa nabo.
Yize ngingedwa, ozakwethu abangibandlululi,” kusho yena.Le ntokazi ithi ukufinyelela kulesi sigaba kuseyisiqalo, isafisa ukuqhubekela phambili.“Amantombazane asemancane afisa ukungena emkhakheni wokushayela izindiza kumele azijwayeze ukuya emibukisweni yezindiza, kulapho othola khona ulwazi,” kusho yena.
‘Abazali bangisiza ngophiyano’

Usiza intsha ngolwazi lwemfundo
INTOKAZI yaseMabomvini eMsinga, ephinde ibe yisitshudeni eDurban University of Technology (DUT), isizakhele ugazi ngokusiza abafundi bakamatric ukuthi bazi kabanzi ngemisebenzi abangayifundela, ukuze bakhethe kahle emanyuvesi.UNksz Luyanda Ndlovu (23), ongumsunguli wenhlangano engenzi inzuzo iSehlukosami Foundation, ulandele igama lakhe alethiwa nguyise eseneminyaka ewu-16 ngenxa yokubona indlela eyehlukile ayenza ngayo izinto.“Ubaba wangiqamba wathi nginguSehluko ngoba ethi izinto engizenzayo zihlukile futhi ngihlukile kwezinye izingane.
Yingakho ngiqambe inhlangano yami ngokuthi iSehlukosami njengoba ngifisa ukuletha ushintsho oluhlukile kubantu bakithi nasezindaweni zasemakhaya,” kubeka uNksz Ndlovu.
Uqhube wathi ufisa ukuthi inhlangano igqugquzele izingane asebenzisana nazo ukuthi zilethe ushintsho emakhaya azo nasezimpilweni zazo.
Le ntokazi eyenza unyaka wokugcina ezifundweni zeNautical Science, isiza izikole ezisemiphakathi ehlukene ngezinhlelo zokuqeqesha abafundi ngemisebenzi abangayifundela uma beya emanyuvesi.
Iphinde ilekelele amantombazane asuke eya kwi-matric ball ngezingubo nokunye asuke ezokudinga ngalolu suku.
Uthe waqala ngokugqokisa abafundi bakamatric ngo-2019 ababengenayo imali yokuthenga izinto zokugqoka kulowo mcimbi.
Emuva kwalokho wagqugquzeleka wabe esebhalisa inhlangano yakhe kuwona lonyaka.
“Ngikholelwa ekutheni empilweni kumele usize omunye umuntu naye abone ukuthi bakhona abantu abanobuntu,” kulandisa uNksz Ndlovu.Uthe uma wenza into oyithandayo uye unganaki kakhulu izinto ezingakukhubaza emsebenzini wakho.
“Ingqinamba kuke kube ukuthola uxhaso lwezezimali nezinto zokusebenza ngoba kuye kudinge ukuthi sihambele izindawo ezikude.
Siyahlupheka kakhulu ngezinto zokuhamba.
Lokhu kubuye kuphazamise ezinhlelweni esisuke sifisa ukuzenza,” kulandisa uNksz Ndlovu.Uqhube wathi uyakholelwa ekutheni abantu abasha banamuhla kumele babeke induku ebandla njengamaqhawe ango-1976, asilwela asishiya nefa lokuthi sithole imfundo elinganayo.
“Kumele nathi sibe ngamaqhawe njengabantu abaphambi kwethu, sibahloniphe ngokuba sizimele, sihloniphe nefa abasishiyela lona.” Uthe okunye bake babe nezinkulumo ezakhayo enkundleni yokuxhumana kwi-Instagram lapho abasuke bekhuluma ngezinto ezenzeka emanyuvesi.
Ufuna ukuthuthukisa ezokuvakasha elokishini
UFUNA ukuthuthukisa ezokuvakasha elokishini uDkt Phumzile Nembe Kganye, ongumnikazi wendawo yokuhlala izivakashi Ekhaya Lentokozo B&B, KwaMashu.Le ndawo yavulwa ngokomthetho ngo-2010 ukuze ihlalise abantu ababezobuka imidlalo yeNdebe yoMhlaba eyayiseNingizimu Afrika, ngoba eminye yayidlalelwa eThekwini.“Ngesikhathi sizwa ukuthi kuzoba neNdebe yoMhlaba sabona ukuthi abantu bazodinga indawo yokuhlala eThekwini, namaphethelo sabe sesishintsha ikhaya lethu salenza indawo yokuhlala izivakashi.
Kwakumele silandele imigomo yezokuvakasha sibe nesitifiketi esishoyo ukuthi sikulungele ukuhlalisa abantu,” kusho uDkt Nembe Kganye.Uthe selokhu baqala ukusebenza ngo-2010 babenezingqinamba zokuthi izivakashi azifiki kakhulu elokishini waze wavula enye indawo eManzimtoti.“Sinezindawo zokuhlalisa izivakashi ezintathu ezimbili ziKwaMashu, eyodwa iseManzimtoti bese siba nendawo yokuhlalisa abafundi esenkabeni yeTheku.
Kubalulekile ukuthi sithuthukise ezokuvakasha elokishini ngoba siba nemicimbi emikhulu futhi kukhona abantu abangathandi ukuhlala enkabeni yedolobha abafuna ukuba selokishini,” kusho uDkt Nembe Kganye.Abanye osomabhizinisi bavamise ukukhala ngengqinamba yemali yokuqala ibhizinisi kodwa uDkt Nembe Kganye uthe akazange abhekane nenkinga yemali ngoba waqala ngokushintsha umuzi wakhe wawenza indawo yokuhlala izivakashi.“Izingqinamba engibhekane nazo ngezokuthola izivakashi ngoba abantu bakithi ubungakabangeni umkhuba wokubekisa isikhala kusenesikhathi.
Bebevele basishayele ucingo ngelanga abafika ngalo eThekwini sebebuza ukuthi nginayo yini indawo.
Abanye bafika ebusuku, abanye bashaya ucingo nango-2 ezintatha.
Abanye abayiphathi kahle ifenisha, abawulandeli nomthetho wokuthi akubhenywa kodwa baningi abahloniphayo,” kusho uDkt Nembe Kganye.Ezinye izivakashi uthe zilethwa ngabantu asebeke bahlala eKhaya Lentokozo futhi baphatheka kahle.Uthe iCovid-19 imshayile kakhulu ngoba ubenabasebenzi abayisithupha kodwa manje usele nababili.“Abanye siphoqelekile ukuthi sibadilize ngoba singakwazi ukubaholela uma singazitholi izivakashi.
Sisele nababili ngoba indawo ehlala izivakashi kufanele ihlale ihlanzekile, kulungiswe ingadi ukuze uma sekuvulwe ezokuvakasha ngokuphelele abantu bakwazi ukuzohlala lana,” kusho uDkt Nembe Kganye.Uthe kulezi zindawo zakhe bayayenza nemicimbi.
ITheku lizosingatha ingqungquthela yeForbes
KULINDELEKE abesifazane bemikhakha ehlukene engqungqutheleni enkulu e-Afrika, ezobe iqala ukusingathwa yiTheku ngonyaka ozayo.I-Africa Forbes Leading Women Summit izoqondaniswa ne-International Women’s Day ngoMashi 8 eThekwini.
NgoLwesihlanu kumenyezelwe ngokusemthethweni esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini.
Kulesi sithangami, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, onguNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha KwaZulu-Natal, uthe uyajabula ukuthi le ngqungquthela izobanjelwa esifundazweni.Uthe lokhu kusho ukuthi isifundazwe sesizakhele igama ngokuba yinkundla yokuletha imicimbi ehlonipha amagalelo abesifazane abanohlonze.Le ngqungquthela ezoba seNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, izohambisana nomcimbi wokuklomelisa ngezindondo emikhakheni engu-12 kwabesifazane abavelele.Kule mikhakha kubalwa owezesayensi, ezobuchwepheshe, ezamabhizinisi, ezobuciko neminye.Kulindeleke ukuthi le ngqungquthela ibe yinkundla yokucobelelana kwabesifazane ukuthi baphumelela kanjani emikhakheni obekwaziwa ukuthi ngeyabesilisa.UNksz Methil Renuka onguMhleli weForbes Africa neForbes Woman Africa, uthe abangabazi ukuthi le ngqungquthela izoba yimpumelelo futhi izoletha izinguquko ezinqala.“Sizoba nezikhulumi ezivela emazweni ahlukene e-Afrika okuzohlomulisa bonke abazohambela le ngqungquthela.“Siyakujabulela ukuthi unyaka nonyaka ingqungquthela iyakhula futhi siyanda nesibalo sabayithamelayo.“Cishe iningi labesifazane abavelele e-Afrika seliyazi ukuthi le ngqungquthela izofika nezinto ezintsha kulona,” kusho uNksz Renuka.Kule ngqungquthela kulindeleke ukuthi kube nezinkulumo ngezihloko ezahlukene, ezizokwethulwa yizikhulumi ezivelele emikhakheni ehlukene.Lona unyaka wesine kubanjwa le ngqungquthela eqhakambisa ubuholi babesifazane emikhakheni ehlukene.Kusukela yaqalwa le ngqungquthela ibiba seGoli.
Njalo ngonyaka iphephabhuku iForbes ikhipha uhlu lwabesifazane abavelele emikhakheni eminingi ngokwamazinga neminyaka yabo.NgoJuni nonyaka kukhishwe uhlu lwabangu-30 abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-30 abavelele emikhakheni ehlukene yamabhizinisi e-Afrika.Bakhona nabakuleli abafakiwe kulolu luhlu, okubalwa uMnuz Sihle Ndlela onenkampani iMajozi Bros Construction ayisungula noMnuz Simphiwe Majozi.Kubalwe noNksz Vere Shaba ongumnikazi weShaba and Ramplin Green Building Solutions, okuyinkampani egxile kwezobunjiniyela nokuhlobisa izindlu ngaphakathi.UNksz Shaba uke waba sohlwini lwabaqokwe kwiWomen in Excellence Awards for Young Achievers eGauteng.
Inhloso yokukhipha lolu luhlu minyaka yonke, wukukhuthaza abanye besifazane abafuna ukungena ebhizinisini.
Abamele iKZN kokaMiss Empress SA
UNksz Zamalinda Nsele (19), waseMnambithi noNksz Andile Gebashe (24) wase-Adams Mission, bamele isifundazwe kuMiss Empress South Africa ozokhethwa ngoDisemba.
Lo mncintiswano phambilini ubuwaziwa ngoMiss Eagle SA kanti ngowesibili lo nyaka selokhu ushintshwe igama.UNksz Nsele owenza unyaka wokuqala kwiBachelor of Science e-University of KwaZulu-Natal, uthe wumncintiswano wokuqala lona awungenele.
Phambilini uke wangenela eyangakubo okubalwa uMiss Youth Breaking Bounderies aphume kuwo kwiTop 3 nokaMiss Mnambithi Traditional, aphume kuwo isibili.
Uthe okwenze angenele lona, ubone uhambisana naye njengoba kufuneka umuntu othanda ukusebenzela umphakathi.“Ngiyathanda ukuba yisibonelo nokusebenzela umphakathi.
Nginethemba lokuthi lo mncintiswano uzonginika ithuba lokusiza umphakathi.
Kumanje sengiqalile ukusiza ezikhungweni zezintandane, ngibuye nginikele ngezingubo kulabo abaswele,” echaza.Uthe ubebheka umncintiswano omkhulu angawungenela ngesikhathi ebona okaMiss Empress SA.
UNksz Nsele uthe uyathanda nokuthuthukisa abesifazane, athemba ukuthi ukuwina lo mncintiswano kuzokwandisa amathuba alokho.
Ngaphandle kokumodela uphinde abe yinxusa leMotofind.co.za kanti isifiso esikhulu sakhe wukungelela uMiss South Africa.UNksz Gebashe oneziqu zePublic Management, azithola eBerea Technical College, uthe ngalo mncintiswano ufuna ukukhombisa ukuthi akubona ubuhle kuphela obudingeka kwabamodelayo.
Uthe ziningi izinhlelo zokusiza umphakathi azimisele ngazo uma ephumelela.“Ngakhuliswa umama eyedwa, angikaze ngibe nomuntu wesilisa ekukhuleni kwami.
Lokhu kunginike umdlandla wokuthi ngisize abanye, ngibakhuthaze nangempilo.
Kumanje ngisungule izinhlelo zokukhuthaza abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngaphansi kwe-Andile Gebashe The Motivator,” kusho uNksz Gebashe.Ophethe isicoco kulo mncintiswano, nguNksz Tshepo Makupu (26), waseFree State, okhethwe eSun Coast Casino ngonyaka odlule.
UNksz Makupu ube ngowokuqala ukuthatha isicoco emuva kokuba umncintiswano ushintshe igama.
Uneziqu zeConsumer Science nenkampani yokukhiqiza enabasebenzi abangu-49.
Kumanje unenhlangano i'Palesa Ya Setshaba’ ehlose ukweluleka abantu abanezinkinga ezahlukene.
Ungumbhali wencwadi ethi The Magic Mind.Zingu-25 izintokazi okulindeleke ukuthi zibange isicoco ngoDisemba.Umncintiswano ubheke abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 no-25.
Abangenele lo mncintiswano kumele bavotelwe ekhasini lomncintiswano ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.
Ufuna ukuthuthukisa abesifazane kwezesayensi
UKUSHODA kwamathuba omsebenzi akumthenanga amandla owesifazane waseMnqobokazi, eHluhluwe, osenenkampani egxile ekwenzeni imisebenzi yezobuchwepheshe nezesayensi.UNKSZ Thando Gumede ( 28), owathweswa iziqu zeBachelor of Science in MicrobioBiology and Hydrology eNyuvesi iZululand ngo-2015, uthi kuqale kwaba wumqansa ukufeza iphupho lakhe ngoba abanye abantu bebengakholelwa kulo.“Izikole zabantu abamnyama zinezingqinamba zokuswela izinsiza yingakho ngabona kungaba wusizo ukuthi ngivule iBased on Science Guidance and Technologies.
Kule nkampani silekelela abafundi sibuye sibafunise izikhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.
Uma izitshudeni seziphothule iziqu zazo, siyaye sizilekelele ekutheni zithole izikhala zokuthi ziqeqeshelwe umsebenzi ezinkampanini ezigxile kulo mkhakha,” kuchaza uNksz Gumede.Eqhuba uthe umsebenzi wabo waselabhoretri bavamise ukuwufaka kwi-App esetshenziswa yizitshudeni ngenhloso yothuthukisa ulwazi ngalo mkhakha.
Le App inemininingwane yemifundaze esuke ikhishwe yizinkampani ezahlukene.“Bengihlale ngizibona ngisebenza ezibhedlela ngesikhathi ngisakhula.
Isifiso sami kwakuwukusebenza ema-labhoretri azo ngenhloso yokuthi nami ngibe neqhaza engilibambayo ekulweni nezifo eziyinkinga emphakathini.
Kodwa-ke angivumelanga ukutheneka amandla njengoba kwagcina ngokuthi ngiqoke ukuzisebenza,” kubeka lo somabhizinisi.Uthe isikhath basebenzisana nezikole zamabanga aphansi naphezulu eMkhanyakude, kanjalo nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme.“Isifiso sethu wukuba sithole abaxhasi abangakwazi ukufaka isandla sifinyelele ezindaweni ezahlukene.
Ngoxhaso singakwazi ukunyusa isibalo samaphrojekthi kanjalo namathuba omsebenzi entsheni eswele naleyo elahlekelwe wumsebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19,” kubeka uNksz Gumede.Ithe kumaphrojethi abamatasa ngawo kumanje, bagqugquzela ukuthuthukisa ikhono labesifazane kwezobuchwepheshe njengoba kugcwele kakhulu abesilisa.Phakathi kwezinkampani abasebenzisana nazo ubale umnyango wezeSayensi nobuChwepheshe, umnyango wezeMfundo, iSouth African Agency for Science and Technology Advancement (SAASTA), iNational Research Foundation nesifunda saseMkhanyakude.
Uphelelwe wumsebenzi wabuyela kwakufundele
Zanele Mthethwa UKUBHEDUKA kobhubhane iCovid-19 kumbuyisele emsebenzini abewufundele owesifazane waseThekwini ophoqeleke ukuqala ibhizinisi ngenxa yokuphelelwa umsebenzi.UNksz Nokwanda Zondi (30) waseWestridge, eThekwini, uthole kumele aqale ibhizinisi ngokushesha njengoba iCovid-19 imlahlekisele ngomsebenzi ngo-Ephreli.Ubesebenza efemini ekhiqiza imifaniswano, okuphoqeleke ukuthi idilize abasebenzi ngenxa yokushaywa yilolu bhubhane olugadle kwazwela emnothweni.Esikhundleni sokuthi abalise ngokungasebenzi, uNksz Zondi ucabange ngokushesha ibhizinisi elihlukile, elihambelana nothando lwakhe lokudla.
Uqale ibhizinisi lapho ehambisela khona amakhasimende izithako ezinhlobonhlobo zokudla ukuze abantu baziphekele emakhaya.“Bese ngivele nginawo umqondo waleli bhizinisi ngoMashi, ngize ngaxoxa ngalo kwabanye abangani bami.
Ngithole ukuthi kukhona abalenzayo kwezinye izifundazwe futhi yibhizinisi elingakwazi nokukhula.”Uthe ngesikhathi ephelelwa umsebenzi ubone kuyithuba lokuzama leli bhizinisi.
Ukubona isasasa lokupheka emakhaya kubantu ngesikhathi kuqala uthaqa, kumnike isibindi wabona ukuthi lingamsebenzela leli bhizinisi.
Uveze ukuthi yize ekuthanda ukupheka futhi ekufundele, ubone sebebaningi kakhulu abenza lo msebenzi.“Amakhasimende ami ngabantu abazihlalela ngabodwana noma imindeni emincane.
Kuyenzeka umuntu afune ukupheka isidlo esithize kodwa ahlulwe ukuzihlanganisela izithako.Mina ngibahambisela izithako nezikalo zokudla baziphekele ekhaya.
Ngesonto ngiba nezidlo eziyisihlanu engigxila kuzo kodwa kuyenzeka umuntu azicelele isidlo esithize,” kusho yena.UNksz Zondi ofundele ukupheka eDurban University of Technology, uthe wukungawutholi umsebenzi awufundele okwenze wagcina esebenza efemini.Ubevele ekuthanda ukupheka nokuziqalela ibhizinisi lokupheka, wabona kuyithuba lokubuyela kulokhu abevele ekufundele.Uthe ibhizinisi lakhe ulibona likhula ngoba akekho omunye amaziyo owenza okufanayo eThekwini.
UmkaNcwane uchaza ngokubhala incwadi ngempilo yabo
‘UKUBE ngaphiwa ukucula bengizoqhubeka lapho agcina khona umyeni wami kodwa bekumele ngisebenzise ukubhala ukuze igama lakhe lingafi.”Lawa ngamazwi kaNkk Ayanda Ncwane ongumfelokazi obegane umculi wowokholo uSfiso Ncwane, osekhiphe incwadi ekhuluma ngempilo yabo.Le ncwadi esihloko sithi For The Love Of Sfiso Ncwane ikhuluma ngokukhula kwabo nempilo yasemshadweni neyodumo.
UNkk Ncwane uthe usebenzise isikhathi sokuzila kwakhe ukuhlanganisa le ncwadi, aveza kuyo ngisho obekungaziwa ngomyeni wakhe.“Ngikhethe ukusebenzisa isiphiwo uNkulunkulu angiphe sona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi nezizukulwane ezizayo ziyazi ukuthi kwake kwaba noSfiso Ncwane.
Ngikhethe ukubhala incwadi ngiqhubeke nemicimbi ebesivele siyenza naye, ngikhiphe nomsebenzi wakhe ahambe engakawukhiphi.
Incwadi ikhuluma ngempilo yethu, izinto esidlule kuzona nempumelelo yethu,” echaza.Uveze ukuthi kwakuyinhloso yakhe noNcwane ukukhipha incwadi uma sebehlanganisa iminyaka engu-10 beshadile, obekuwunyaka odlule.“Inhloso bekuwukuthi sizokhipha ebesingakaze sikuveze ngempilo yethu ngoba abanye babona kumnandi sesishadile bengazi ukuthi sidlulephi ukusiza abanye abashadile abasebancane.
Ngebhadi akwenzekanga kodwa kwasala ijoka lokuthi ngiqhubeke nokubhala incwadi futhi ngakufaka nalokhu esasivumelene ngakho noNcwane,” kusho yena.UNkk Ncwane okusahlengezela izinyembezi uma ekhuluma ngokushona komyeni wakhe, uthe akalufisi usuku lwangoDisemab 5 okwashona ngalo umyeni wakhe ngo-2016.
Njengoba sekusele amasonto ambalwa kufike lolu suku, uthe uyabikelwa ngoba akuvumi ludlule.
Ngonyaka odlule uthe walala usuku lonke ezivalele endlini, ekhaliswa nayimiyalezo abeyithunyelwa ngabantu bemduduza.
Namanje akanazo izinhlelo ngalolu suku, athe ugubha kuphela usuku lokuzalwa lukamyeni wakhe.Ekhuluma ngokuzila kwakhe nezinkulumo ezisuke emuva kokushona komyeni wakhe, uthe yizona ezimenze wabhala incwadi.
Uthe yize abanye bebemgxeka kodwa ubengeke azivalele endlini unomphelo kodwa bekumele aqhubeke nomsebenzi futhi unesiqiseko sokuthi nomyeni wakhe uyajabula ngalokho.“Sengiphila izimpilo ezimbili ngoba phambi kwabantu kumele ngiziqinise ngimamatheke ngisebenze ukuze kuphile abantu abathembele kimina.
Nginezingane ezimbili okumele ngizondle, obekungeke kungisize ukuhlala ngikhala,” kusho yena.Uthe ayikho indlela ewumgomo yokuzila futhi asikho isikhathi lapho kuphola khona.
Lokhu kumenze ukuthi ahlangane nabanye abafelokazi abasebancane ikakhulukazi emakhaya.
Uveze ukuthi abafelokazi bayehlulelwa futhi bayahlukunyezwa ngisho emabandleni nasemindenini yabo.
Incwadi isiyatholakala e-Exclusive Books naku-Amazon kanti uhlela nokuyethula ngokusemthethweni maduze.
Okumjabulisayo ukuthi indodana yakhe endala ithanda ibhizinisi lomculo bese kuthi encane ikhonze ukucula, athe kumnika ithemba lokuthi ngeke lishabalale igama likaSfiso.
Udumo lwekhishi elingumahamba nendlwana
USEZAKHELE udumo owesifazane waseNdwedwe, nowashiya umsebenzi wakhe ngoba ezwa sengathi awusenazo izinselelo kanti usedayisa ukudla enxanxatheleni yezitolo zakule ndawo.UNksz Laminile Ngidi ofundele ukuba wumpheki wasebenza nasemahhotela amaningi, usevule ikhishi elingumahamba nendlwana elidayisa ukudla okunjengamasemishi, chicken wraps namasaladi eBoxer Centre, eNdwedwe.Le ntokazi ine-Advanced Diploma yeProfessional Chef eyifundele eChristina Martins Culinary Art Centre, nenye yeProfessional Chef eyithole eRoyal Hotel, iyeke umsebenzi isiqeqesha abanye eZimbali Lodge ngo-2013.“Ngiwumuntu oyithandayo inselelo bekuthi njalo uma sengizwa ukuthi umsebenzi awusenayo inselelo, ngiwushiye.
NaseZimbali ngenza okufanayo kodwa ngicabanga ukuthi okunye kwakwenziwa ukuthi ngangingenazo izindleko eziningi.
Kwakulula kimi ukuthi ngenze noma yini engiyithandayo,” kusho uNkk Ngidi.Uthe ngesikhathi eseyeke umsebenzi wasungula inkampani ephekela imicimbi kodwa izinto azihambanga ngendlela.“Ngaba nezinselelo eziningi engangingazibonanga ukuthi zizoba khona, uma sengizisebenza.
Ngangicabanga ukuthi ikhono lami lizongivulela amathuba kanti ngasohlangothini lwebhizinisi izinto azihambi kanjalo.
Ngagcina ngiyekile, ngabuyela ekhaya nokuyinto engangingayihlelanga.
Ngangingathandi ukuthi ngiqale phansi ngibe yingane ezokondliwa ekubeni sengikhulile.
Ngaqala ngadayisa amasemishi phambi kwamahhovisi akwamasipala, ngifuna ukubona ukuthi izinto zizohamba kanjani.”“Ngangingafuni ukudayisa ukudla ngoba bakhona omama abakudayisayo.
Ngangifuna ukuqhamuka nento engekho futhi ezokhombisa ukuthi ngikufundele ukwenza ukudla kodwa kube yinto umuntu osemsebenzini angathanda ukuyidla.”Uthe ubone ukuthi ukudla kwakhe kuyathandwa ngesikhathi esethola ama-oda ngocingo kwabasebenza ezindaweni eziseduze, bembuza ukuthi uzofika nini.“Ngabona lapho ukuthi kumele ngivule ikhishi eliwumahamba nendlwana ukuze ngikwazi ukusebenza kahle.
Izinto bezihamba kahle impela futhi ngiqashwa nangabantu abafuna ukuthi ngibenzele i-starter noma i-finger lunch.
Izinto zonakale ngesikhathi kuvalwa izwe ngoMashi,” kuchaza umpheki.Waphoqeleka ukuthi acabange okunye angakwenza ngoba amahhovisi amaningi abengasebenzi, ngakho engenawo amakhasimende abengathenga ukudla.“Ngase ngiqala ngibhaka amakhekhe ngoba abantu bebengafuni ukuba wuvanzi beyowathenga ezitolo.
Lolu hlangothi lwebhizinisi lamakhekhe liyakhula kangangoba manje sengiyabona ukuthi ngeke ngisakwazi ukumelana nomthamo wamakhasimende ngingedwa ngoba emini ngisuke ngingekho ngidayisa ukudla, sengicabanga ukuthi kuzomele ngibe nomsizi,” kusho yena.Uthe okunye okumenze waduma kakhulu ukuthi unekhasi leFacebook lapho efaka khona izinhlobo zokudla, iBusa with MaBusani.
Unebhizinisi elithi yena  obewashela abantu izingubo
UDONSE ngendlebe abantu besifazane ukuthi basungule amabhizinisi abo uNksz Luyanda Radebe (34) onelondolo ebizwa ngokuthi Amahlubi Laundry, eKwaBester eNanda.UNksz Radebe uthe wayengenamali ngesikhathi esungula inkampani yakhe ngoMashi ka-2018.“Ngiqale inkampani yami ngingasebenzi, bengiphila ngemali yesondlo sezingane zami ezintathu ewuR1 300.
Ngangigqoka ingubo eyodwa ngoba nezimpahla zokushintsha ngangingasenazo.
Ngo-2017 ngafikelwa yiphupho lokuthi ngiqale ilondolo,” kusho uNksz Radebe.Uthe njengoba wayengenamali waqala ewashela abantu abaseduze naye wakwazi ukuyibeka imali encane ukuze athenge imishini.“Ngenhlanhla yami abantu ekade ngibawashela bebetshela abanye ukuthi ngiwasha kahle bese nabo balethe izimpahla.
Ngikwazile ukukhula ngilokhu ngithenga izinsiza zebhizinisi kancane kancane.
“Kubalulekile ukuthi singabantu besifazane sisungule amabhizinisi ethu ngoba nemisebenzi ayikho kahle.
Ukuqala ibhizinisi akudingi izizumbulu zemali kufanele uzimisele ukuthi uzosebenza kanzima,” kusho uNksz Radebe.Uthe kubalulekile nokuya esontweni ngoba yena uyindodakazi yentethelelo ebandleni lamaNazaretha eBuhleni.“Kukhona inhlangano engisizayo iProject Preparation Trust (PPT) engilekelela ukukhangisa ibhizinisi lami nangokungenzela ama-brochure nezinye izinsiza zokukhangisa ibhizinisi.
Kubalulekile ukuthi siye ezindaweni zokukhonza ngoba ziyaselapha emoyeni,” kusho uNksz Radebe.Phakathi kwezingqinamba abhekane nazo ngesikhathi eqala ibhizinisi ubalule ukubiza kwemishini nerenti yendawo asebenzela kuyo.“Uma unalo uhlelo lwebhizinisi noma ubhekana nezingqinamba uyakwazi ukubekezela.
Kufanele ukhumbule ukuthi uma uwusomabhizinisi ngeke ube nemali ngesikhathi usaqala kodwa usebenzele ekuthengeni izinsiza.
“Ngikwazile ukubeka imali ebengiyenza ngakwazi ukuqasha abantu abahlanu.
Nginamalondolo amabili manje eKwaBester naKwaSeme.
Ngizimisele ukukhula ngoba nginamaphupho,” kusho uNksz Radebe.Uthe abantu besifazane bayakwazi ukubhekana nezingqinamba ezihlukene ngoba yena uwumuntu wesifazane okhulisa izingane zakhe yedwana kodwa unanebhizinisi futhi ukwazile ukudala amathuba omsebenzi ngakho nabanye kufanele bazame.
Ukhululwe wabuyela ekudanseni
‘UNKULUNKULU muhle ngezikhathi zonke.
Kwasekuqaleni ngesikhathi ngizinikela emaphoyiseni ngangishilo ngathi anginacala”.Lawa ngamazwi omdansi wase-Afrotainment, uNhlanhla “Sgaqa” Chiliza ngemuva kokuthi iNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ichithe icala lokudlwengula abebekwe lona ngoLwesihlanu.USgaqa (31) ubesolwa ngokudlwengula intombazane ena-13 engumakhelwane wakhe ngo-Agasti.Leli cala lihoxisiwe ngemuva kokungatholakali kobufakazi obumatanisa uSgaqa naleli calaEngxoxweni abe nayo neSolezwe ngeSonto uthe ngesikhathi evalelwe ejele eWestville abantu abetoke nabo bebemkhuthaza ukuthi akathandazele ukuthi kuvele iqiniso.“Abafowethu lapha phakathi bebengixoxela izitori zabo.
Besho ukuthi baningi abantu abagcina begwetshelwa into abangayazi.
Ngazinikela emaphoyiseni ngoba ngifisa ukuthi umthetho udlale indima yawo,” kusho uSgaqa.Uthe leli cala limphazamisile emsebenzini njengoba abaphathi bakhe bathatha isinqumo sokummisa ekudanseleni izihlwele.“Bese ngingasekho emehlweni abantu.
Bese ngisiza ekufundiseni umdanso ozakwethu.
Bekunzima ngoba nangasekhaya kunezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa abantu abasha ebengizihlelile engigcine ngingaseyona ingxenye yazo,” kusho uSgaqa.Ubonge umndeni wakhe, ozakwabo base-Afrotainment, abangani nomphakathi wangakubo ngokumeseka.Uthe nasemsebenzini bebelinde isinqumo senkantolo ngoba abahambisani nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane.“Emsebenzini ngisebenza kakhulu namantombazane ngakho bekumele babe nesiqiniseko sokuthi ngabe aphephile ngempela uma enami.
Emuva kwecala ngibuyele kwengidume ngazo umdanso.
Sihambele umcimbi waseRichards Bay ngoLwesihlanu abantu bangamukela kahle.
Ekuseni sivukele e-Estcourt, ntambama siya eGoli,” kusho uSgaqa.Ebuzwa ngesinqumo somndeni wammangali wokulidlulisela phambili icala uthe uma umthetho ubavumela abenze njalo kodwa nalapho iqiniso lizovela.Umphathi wase-Afrotainment, uDJ Tira ukhiphe isitatimende ngemuva kokuchithwa kwecala.Uthe: “Sivumele uMnuz Chiliza ukuthi ahlabe ikhefu emsebenzini ukubhekana nezinsolo.
Siyajabula ukunazisa ukuthi usebuyele emsebenzini kusukela namhlanje.
Sesilangazelela ukumbona ejabulisa abantu eNingizimu Afrika nakwamanye amazwe.”Udadewabo kammangali uthe bathathe isinqumo sokuthi udadewabo angaphinde ahlale kule ndawo okwenzeka khona isehlo.
Wadlelwa umuzi esaphaza imali yokulingisa
INKAKHA yomlingisi esineminyaka iyibambile kwezokungcebeleka, iveze ukuthi ike yabhubhudla imali yaze yadlelwa umuzi nemoto.UBaby Cele uthi lokhu okwamenza akafisi kwehlele abalingisi bamanje.Umlingisi olingisi kuZalo kuSABC1, ubekhuluma emcimbini obuhlelwe wumsakazi woKhozi FM, uDudu Khoza, iDinner with Dudu obuseCoastlands Hotel eMhlanga.“Abantu abazi ukuthi sengake ngadlelwa umuzi nemoto ngenxa yokungabi nayo imali.
Okuhle ukuthi ngakwazi ukuvuka ngizicoshe.
Sasiyibulala imali kwiSarafina ngama 80’s.
Sasihola 500 dollars ngesonto.“Imali sayibhubhudla sithenga izimpahla ezibizayo kungathi sidla zona," kusho uBaby.Inhloso yalo mcimbi bekuwukuhlanganisa abasendimeni yezokungcebeleka ukuze kuhlonyiswane ngolwazi, kukhulunywe nangezinselelo.UBaby benoMinnie Dlamini-Jones, bebegxile esihlokweni sezinselelo zezezimali ezikhungethe abesemkhakheni wezokungcebeleka.“Izingane ezisencane kulo mkhakha zingavumi ukudlala abantu abafuna ukulala nazo ukuze zithole imisebenzi.
Uzwe kuthiwa uBaby usemdala sifuna abantu abasebancane, ngoba nakhu kwesinye isikhathi befuna ukudlala ngezingane," kusho uBaby.Uthe kunzima kwezikaqedisizungu kodwa ufuna abalandela kuyena befunde ngamaphutha awenza.UMinnie uvumelene noBaby ukuthi indaba yemali iyinselelo kule ndima.“Ngikhuluma nje angikwazi ukuthenga umuzi ngesikweletu ngenxa yokuthi ibhange lithi angiqashwe ndawo.
Bathi imali ingena ngendlela engafani.
Kwenye inyanga imali iningi kokunye kuyazibhedela.
Okubalulekile nesengakufunda wukuthi uma imali iningi, ungayibhubhudli uthengana nezikhwama ezibizayo bese uyakhohlwa ukuthi kusasa izophela," kusho uMinnie.UMinnie uthe ukusekwa wumndeni wakhe yikhona okwenza akwazi ukubhekana nezinselelo eziningi ezikulo khakha.Kulo mcimbi bekunezikhulumi ezihlabahlosile okubalwa kuzo uLinda Bukhosini, Mphrofethi Nomusa Dhlomo, Sindi Mabaso-Koyana nabanye.
Kwababenandisa bekukhona uKholeka, DJ Happy Girl, Khanyo Mkhize nabanye.Bekungokwesibili uDudu ehlanganise abesifazane ngale ndlela.UDudu uthe ufuna ngonyaka ozayo ukhuphukele kwelinye izinga lo mcimbi obuwubukhazikhazi.
Qaphela umonakalo ongadalwa yisifonyo esikhunjeni sakho
Uma sewuziphaqule kahle waba muhle ungakhohlwa uma sewugeza ukuphinde uqinisekise ukuthi ubuso bakho buhlanzeke ngendlela.Ungoti wesikhumba eMhlanga, uDkt Cebi Sibisi, uthi isifonyo sithi sivikela iCovid-19 kodwa futhi sibe sidala umonakalo esikhumbeni.“Ngesikhathi uphefumula umoya osuke uwuphefumula ngaphakathi kwesifonyo uyashisa bese wenza kube nokushisa okukhulu okungena esikhumbeni sakho okugcina kwenza ukuthi kuvaleke nezimbobo zokuphefumula esikhumbeni.“Izindwangu okuthungwa ngazo izifonyo azifani, nazo zinomthelela ekutheni abantu bavumbuke izinduna.“Kubalulekile ukuwasha isifonyo njalo nobuso ubugeze bese ubugcoba ngaphambi kokuthi ulale,” kusho uDkt Sibisi.Ungoti kwezokuziphaqula uNkk Futhi Mkhize uthe ngesikhathi umuntu efaka iziphaqulo bese efaka isifonyo ngaphezulu kusuke sekukuningi esikhumbeni.
Yingakho nokushisa kuzwela ngokushesha nokwenza abantu abaningi babe nenkinga yezinduna kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi.“Kunama hormones atholakala ngasesilevini kumuntu okuthi uma ethintekile bese kuqubuka izinduna.“Isifonyo njengamanje sihlala sikhuhla isikhumba naso isilevu kube nokushisa okweqile bese isikhumba sihluleka ukumelana nokushisa uqubuke noma kuvumbuke izinduna.
Indlela esizayo ukulandela izigaba ezifanele zokugeza ubuso,” kusho uNkk Mkhize.Cleanser:Sebenzisa noma yiluphi uhlobo lwecleanser yokugeza ubuso noma ehambisana nomkhiqizo owusebenzisayo.
Thatha imizuzu noma emibili uzihlikihla ubuso ngezandla zombili esinye sigxile ngakwesobunxele bese esinye sikhuhle ngakwesokudla.Sebenzisa amanzi antukuntuku uma usugeza ubuso bakhoI-Exfoliator:Sebenzisa uhlobo lwe-exfoliator lomkhiqizo owugcobayo noma ozihlanganisele wona ekhaya bese usebenzisa izandla zombili ukukhuhla sakucindezela.Lokhu kuzokusiza ngokususaisikhumba esonakele nodoti ohleli esikhumbeni ongakwenza izinduna.
Ungasebenzisa ushukela onsundu noju uma ungenakho okwasesitolo, bese ukugeze emuva kwemizuzu emihlanu kuya kweyishumi.I-Mask:Uma sewukwenze konke lokhu okungenhla, imask seyizofika izokhuculula okokugcina idonse namafutha asuke emaningi esikhumbeni, amanye asuke engezwe i-exfoliator exutshwa ngowoyela.I-Toner:Sewungafaka i-toner ezokusiza ukuzohlanza okokugcina iphinde ilekelele ekutheni izimbobo zesikhumba zivuleke ngendlela efanele.I-Moisturizer:Gcoba imoisturizer oyisebenzisa, uma kusemini uqinisekise ukuthi inayo neSPF okungenani ungathenga omunye umkhiqizo wokuzivikela elangeni uwuconsisele uma usugcoba.
Uthole umklomelo ophezulu wesayensi
UKUFUNDA ngokuzikhandla kumvulele amathuba umfundi wesifazane osemncane eDurban University of Technology (DUT), oqophe umlando ngokuba ngowokuqala ukuxhaswa ngomklomelo wesayensi we-United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (Unesco).UNksz Lethiwe Mthembu (27) waseFolweni, wenza iPhd kwi-Analytical Chemistry, okulindeleke ayiphothule ngo-2019.
Uthole umklomelo iL’Oréal - Unesco Fellowship for Women Scientists from Sub-Saharan Africa, oxhasa abesifazabe abakwisayensi.
Unyaka wesishiyagalombili selokhu kwaqalwa lo mklomelo, oqalayo ukutholwa ngowase-DUT.Echaza ngalo mklomelo uNksz Mthembu uthe wafaka isicelo ngoMeyi, waphendulwa kwathiwa uwutholile.
Uzoxhaswa ngo-500 Euros, okungaba imali elinganisela ku-R80 000 ngokweRandi.
Le mali izomsiza ukulekelela ocwaningweni lwakhe oluyingxenye yezifundo zePhd.“Bengivele ngixhaswe yiNational Research Foundation kwiPhd kodwa le mali bekungeyezidingo ezibhekene nami ngqo.
Lo mklomelo uzosiza ukuthi ngithenge konke engikudingayo ukwenza ucwaningo.
Uma senza iPhd sikhuthazwa ukuthi sisheshe siyiqede, yingakho ngikujabulela ukuthola lo mklomelo ngoba uzongisiza kakhulu.”Unyaka wesibili lona awenzayo kwiPhd, athe uthemba ukuthi uzoyiqeda ngo-2019 , yize inomsebenzi omningi angakawenzi.
Mayelana nokuwina lo mklomelo, uthe bekufuneka umfundi wesifazane owenza ucwaningo oluhlukile nolusezingeni.
Kubhekwa nokuthi ukhona yini umsebenzi wakho osuke washicilelwa.
Uthe kuphinde kubhekwe ukuthi uyakwazi yini ukuveza umsebenzi wakho ezingqungqutheleni, kubhekwe nemiphumela emihle ezifundweni.“KwiPhd yami ngenza ucwaningo olubheka ukusetshenziswa kwe-acid ephuma uma kukhanywa emakhasini omoba uma kukhanywa ushukela.
Ngibheka ukuthi le acid ingasetshenziswa kanjani ukwenza amanye amakhemikhali angasiza kwezolimo nasemikhiqizweni yezimonyo.”UNksz Mthembu owaphothula * -matric Odumo High eMandeni, uthe umfowabo omdala obemkhuthaza ukuthi aqhubeke afunde.
Yibona bobabili kubo, athi bakukhonzile ukufunda.
Uthe umfowabo onguthisha, naye wenza iHonours Degree.
UNksz Mthembu uqale ngeDiploma ye-Analytical Chemistry eMangosuthu Univeristy of Technology wabuye wenza neB Tech kusona lesi sikhungo.
Ubebuye alekelele ngokufundisa abanye abafundi.Uthe ngocwaningo alwenzayo ufisa ukudala amathuba emisebenzi, aphinde alekelele nasekulondolezeni nokuhlanzeka kwemvelo.
Ufisa bande abesifazane abashayela izindiza
IFISA kwande abesifazane abasemkhakheni wamabhanoyi intokazi yaseThekwini eshayela izindiza, ekhule kuyiphupho layo ukungena kulo mkhakha.ULindelwa Mdaki (25) waseWestville eThekwini, uthi ukuba nomzali owayesebenzela inkampani yamabhanoyi iSouth African Airways (SAA), kwaba nomthelela omkhulu ekutheni kufezeke iphupho lakhe.Le ntokazi eyaqala ukufundela ukushayela amabhanoyi ngo-2016 eKishugu eNelspruit, isanda kuthola ezinye iziqu zayo zeCommercial Pilots License ngenyanga edlule, ishayela amabhanoyi ombutho wamaphoyisa iSAPS, esikhumulweni sezindiza iWonderboom Airport ePitoli.“Sekuyisikhathi manje sokuguqula indlela abantu besifazane abaphupha ngayo ngempilo yabo ngoba sesiside isikhathi bephila ngaphansi kokuvalelwa amathuba.
Sekuyisikhathi sokushintsha ukwenza nokuguqula indlela ecabanga ngayo imbokodo ukuze iphakame,” kusho le ntokazi.Phambilini lo mkhakha bewugcwele abantu besilisa bezinye izinhlanga.Le ntokazi ebonga ithuba elitholile lokungena kulo mkhakha ongajwayelekile kwabamnyama, ithe bekungeke kube lula ukuthi lifezeke iphupho layo leminyaka ukuba ayilutholanga uxhaso nokwesekwa umndeni wayo.“Ukuthola ukwesekwa ngabantu abakuthandayo kuyasiza kakhulu empilweni.
Njengoba umndeni wami, ikakhulu abazali bangiseka mhla ngibatshela ngamaphupho ami, isenzo sabo yiso esangigqugquzela  ukuthi  ngisebenze ngokukhulu ukuzikhandla.
Ngangifuna ukubapha isipho abayohlezi beziqhenya ngaso.”Ithe isifiso sayo manje wukubona abantu abamnyama ikakhulu besifazane bengena ngobuningi babo kulo mkhakha.“Ziningi izingqinamba ezikhona ezenza abantu abamnyama bangakwazi ukungena kulo mkhakha wezamabhanoyi.
Kwesinye isikhathi kuke kuphoqe ukuthi abanye bamise kancane izifundo zabo uma sebephelelwe yimali njengoba kungesibona bonke abantu abathola ithuba lokuxhaswa ngomfundaze.”Uthe intsha enothando lokuphumelela kumele izibambe ziqine.
Ubiza abesifazane abamnyama kwezemali
USAFUNA ukubona abanye besifazane abamnyama bejoyina umkhakha wezemali owesifazane osedlulisela ulwazi lwakhe kwizitshudeni.UNksz Hlengiwe Ndlela (33), ufundisa ophikweni lwe- Accounting, Economics nakwiFinance e-University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN).Ukukhuliswa ngunina obesebenza ezindlini, kwamenza wasebenza kanzima ukuze athole umfundaze ngaphansi kwe-Ernst & Young Inc. Wenza izifundo zeBCom Accounting e-UKZN.
Zacishe zambhedela izinto ekhulelwa, esenza unyaka wesibili.“Umndeni wami wawuphoxekile futhi udiniwe.
Bamangala uma kuqala unyaka olandelayo ngibatshela ukuthi ngiyaphindela enyuvesi,” kuchaza uNksz Ndlela.Uthe waphumula amasonto amabili ngemuva kokubeletha.Ziningi izingqinamba ezimlandelile ngemuva kwalokho, okwenza kwaba nzima ukuphothula iziqu.“Ngaqala ukubhalisela iziqu ngo-2008 ingane inezinyanga eziyisikhombisa.
Kwakunzima ngoba ngangihlushwa abazanyana, okwenza ngiphazamiseke.
Ngangiqala ukufeyila,” kusho uNksz Ndlela.Uthe indlela inkampani yomfundaze eyayimethembe ngayo, ayizange imlahle ngisho esefeyilile.
Iziqu waziphasa eseyenza okwesine, esenze ama-Articles, okuyindlela yokuthola ukuqeqeshwa ngokomsebenzi kulo mkhakha.
Ngaphambi kwalokho wake wafundisa eMyeka High naseSiyathuthuka High eNanda phakathi kuka-2009 no-2010.
Ukubekezela kwenza agcine ekuphasele ukuba yiChartered Accountant ngo-2014.
Eseqedile ubuyele khona kwa-Ernst & Young waba yi-Assistant Manager.UNksz Ndlela ongomunye wabasunguli be-1Woman1Girl Mentorship Programme, akhuthaza izingane zamantombazane ukuthi zilandele amaphupho.“Angisakhulumi kuphela ngemfundo kwizitshudeni kodwa ngixoxa nazo njengosisi omdala odlule ezintweni eziningi.
Ukukhulelwa kwami ngisenyuvesi kwacishe kwangilimaza, nazo ngiyazixwayisa ngokuziphatha.
Ngihambela izikole ngichushise abafundi abafuna ukulandela lo mkhakha wemfundo.
Kumanje kusekhona imikhakha abafundi abangazi ngayo,” kusho uNksz Ndlela.Yize abanye bethi amathuba kulo mkhakha aseyashabalala, uNksz Ndlela uthi basadingeka abesifazane abamnyama.
Uveze ukuthi ngokwezibalo zakuleli kumaChartered Accountant angu-44 000, angaphansi kuka-3 000 angabesifazane abamnyama.Echaza ngokungena kwakhe e-UKZN, uthe kwakudingeka abazofundisa emkhakheni wakhe ngo-2017.
Uthe akujwayelekile ukuthi abakulo mkhakha bafunde bafike kwiMaster’s ngoba kuthatha iminyaka eminingi ukuphothula ukuqeqeshwa.
Ubhalisele iMaster’s kusona lesi sikhungo, wathweswa iziqu.
Kumanje wenza iPhD kuwona lo mkhakha.
Uzogxila ekucwaningweni kwamabhuku.UNksz Ndlela okhulele eNanda, uyilungu le- Association for the Advancement of Black Accountants of Southern Africa,South African Institute for Chartered Accountants,Advancement of Women Chartered Accountants neMeals on Wheels Community Services.
Seligcwele ibhasi eliya koweSolezwe
SELIGCWELE ibhasi eliya emcimbini omkhulukazi wabesifazane ohlelwa yiSolezwe, Intandokazi kwazise abakwa-Intercape batshele leli phephandaba ukuthi abantu sebezigcwalise zonke izindawo.Intandokazi izoba ngoSepthemba 1 eWild Coast Sun Hotel & Casino, ePort Edward.Indikimba ithi New Beginnings, All Things Bright and Beautiful.UNksz Zama Majola obhekelele ezokukhangisa kwiSolezwe uthe amalungiselelo omcimbi ahamba kahle kwazise abesifazane sebelibhukhe lonke ibhasi.Uthe amathikithi asatholakala eComputicket ngoR400.“UR400 uhlanganisa ukudla nesikhwama esigcwele izipho,” kusho uNksz Majola.Uthe ibhasi lakwa-Intercape lizosuka emahhovisi eSolezwe ngo-7 ekuseni ngoSepthemba 1 selibheke eWild Coast Sun Hotel & Casino.Mayelana nokukhethwa kwendikimba ethi New Beginnings, All Things Bright and Beautiful uthe lokhu bakwenze ngoba uSepthemba 1 wukuqala kwentwasahlobo lapho izimbali zisuke ziqhakaza futhi kusho ukuqala kwempilo entsha.Ugqugquzele abesifazane ukuthi bagqoke izingubo ezinezimbali noma okunemibala egqamile.Uhlelo lweNtandokazi luzobe luphethwe umsakazi woKhozi FM ongaconsi phansi kubantu uDudu Khoza.Isikhulumi sosuku ngumbhali wezincwadi zikaHlomu Senes, uNkk Dudu Busani-Dube.Abahambele Intandokazi bazojatshuliswa wumculi wowokholo, uDumi Mkokstad ozoshaya amanoni akhe amaningi okuhlanganisa elithi Mbize.Abesifazane bazonikwa amasu okupheka ngumpheki wakwaSpekko uNkk Zanele van Zyl, baphinde banikwe amasu okuzivocavoca nokuphila kahle nguNkk Zanele Maphumulo.Intandokazi ixhaswengabakwaSpekko.
Umpheki namathiphu ezidlo zikaKhisimusi
BANINGI abasacabanga ukuthi bazothathani bahlanganise nani ngoKhisimusi njengoba kudlisa izibiliboco.
Kujwayelekile ngalesi sikhathi ukuthi abantu bafune ukupheka okwehlukile, kungabi yizidlo ezijwayelekile.
Umpheki uNkk Zanele van Zyl osanda kwethula incwadi ethi Cooking With Zanele, unamathiphu ezinye izidlo ezihlabahlosile ezingajatshulelwa umndeni ngalo Khisimusi.
UNkk van Zyl ophinde asebenze nabakwaSpekko, usiphathele izidlo ongazenzela zona ngalo Khisimusi, okukhona ne-dessert ehlukile.“Izidlo engizikhethile ezingadingi izithako eziningi,” echaza.Inkukhu echochobalisiwe1.
Inkukhu echochobalisiweOkudingayo:*Inkomishi yeButtermilk noma amasi*125ml weLemon juice*10ml Whole grain mustard*10ml Chicken spice*5ml Paprika*15ml weFresh rosemary eqotshiwe*15ml weThyme*Amaqhezu amathathu ka-garlic ogayiweIndlela yokwenza:Endishini enkulu xuba izithako bese ugcoba inkukhu ngaphandle nangaphakathi.
Goqa inkukhu ngephepha lokubhaka (foil) bese uyifaka kuhhavini upheke imizuzu engu-45.
Susa i-foil uphinde upheke imizuzu engu-15 ize ishintshe umbala inkukhu.
Ungayiphaka ne-rice noma imifino.Apricot Jam Gammon2.
Apricot Jam GammonOkudingayo:*2 kg weGammon*U-carrot ombili oqotshiwe*Izigaxa ezimbili zika-anyanisi obomvu*Ilitha yamanzi*Uhhafu we-apricot jam*250 ml we-Apple juice*50g we-White rice vinegar*50g kashukela onsundu*15ml weBabercue Spice*Amaqhezu amathathu ka-garlic ogayiwe*Uginger ogayiwe*Salt and pepperIndlela yokwenza:Ebhodweni elikhulu bilisa iGammon kanye no-carrot no-anyanisi upheke imizuzu engu-30.
Uma sekuvuthiwe beka eceleni kuphole.
Ebhodweni hlanganisa ujamu, apple juice, ushukela, white rice vinegar, garlic, ginger, usawoti no-pepper.
Yeka ebhodweni kuze kushube.
Hluba isikhumba enyameni.
Thela enyameni ingxube kajamu bese ufaka inyama kuhhavini ubeke ku-180 degrees.Isaladi lethanga no-Beetroot3.
Isaladi lethanga no-beetrootOkudingayo:*500g wethanga eliqotshiwe*Izigaxa ezine zikaBeetroot oqothiswe wabiliswa*500g wamahlamvu kaLettuce*Izigaxa ezimbili zika-anyanisi obomvu*60ml oweBalsamic Vinegar*60ml we-Olive Oil*IFeta cheeseIndlela yokwenza:Basa uhhavini uwubeke ku-180 degrees.
Chelela ithanga ngo-olive oil bese ufaka kuhhavini imizuzu engu-15.
Beka eceleni kuphole.
Geza uBetroot ukuze ungavuzeli kwisaladi.
Endishini enkulu ufake ithanga eselivuthiwe, uLettuce, Beetroot no-anyanisi.
Xuba i-olive oil neBalsamic vinegar bese uvuvuzela kwisaladi, ubeke ngaphezulu iFeta cheese nezinhlamvu zethanga ukuze kubukeke kahle.4.Cheese TartOkudingayo:*2 Izinkomishi ezimbili zeCream cheese*500g we-fresh berries*1 Inkomishi yeCondensed milk*Izinkomishi ezimbili zika-flour*250g webhotela*125g kashukela*5ml kasawotiIndlela yokwenza:Beka uhhavini ku-160 degrees.
Esitsheni sokubhaka faka amabhisikisi ayizimvuthu afike esinqeni sesitsha.
Xuba uflawa, ushukela, usawoti nebhotela bese ubhaka kuze kushintshe umbala bese uyapholisa.Sebenzisa i-electric mixer ukuhlanganisa i-cream cheese, condensed milk nama-berries.
Thela le ngxube kumabhisikidi ubeke efrijini kuze kuqine.Thela ngaphezulu amanyeama-berries.
Izinguquko kwiVW Tiguan
ENYE yezintandokazi yezimoto zakwaVolkswagen iTiguan izoshintsha indlela ebukeka ngayo uma isitheleka eNingizimu Afrika ngasekupheleni konyaka.Ingaphambili lizobe lishintshile njengoba inobhampa omusha futhi izobe inamaLED headlights kuzona zonke izinhlobo.Izofika inezinhlobo ezintathu okuyiTiguan, Tiguan Life neTiguan R-Line.Izinto enazo kodwa kuya ngenhlobo yakho, kubalwa amarimu aphakathi kuka-17 inch no-19 inch (20 uma uthanda), park distance control, Harmon Kardon sound system, adaptive cruise control, lane assist nokunye okuningi.Izinjini zihlukene kathathu okuyi-1.4TSI enamandla angu-110kW netorque engu-250Nm.
Inogearbox oyi-6 speed DSG.Eyesibili ngekadizili i-2.0TDI efuqa 130kW no-380Nm kanti isebenzisa i-7 speed DSG.
Eyokugcina yi-2.0 TSI ekhahlela 162kW no-350Nm.
Nayo isebenzisa ugearbox oyi-7 speed DSG.Sizokubikela ukusuka nokuhlala ngayo uma isitheleka.
Ucwaningo luveze ezimnandi ngokuvalwa kukagwayi
UKUMISWA kokudayiswa kukagwayi kwehlise isibalo seziguli eziphuthunyiswa ezibhedlela zidinga usizo oluphuthumayo lokwelashelwa izifo zamaphaphu ngo-63%.Lolu cwaningo lwenziwe uMnyango wezeMpilo eWestern Cape nophiko olubhekele izimo eziphuthumayo nemindeni esibhedlela iGeorge Regional, ngokuqhathanisa isibalo seziguli ezivakashele kulesi sibhedlela zidinga usizo ngo-2019 nango-2020 ngesikhathi kuvaliwe ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli.
Omunye wabacwaningi, uNkk Piero Saieva, uthe lolu cwaningo lwenziwe kucutshungulwa imininingwano yeziguli ezivamise ukungena esibhedlela iGeorge Regional zidinga usizo oluphuthumayo lokwelashelwa isifo samaphaphu, i-Emergency Centre attendance for Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)  phakathi kuka Januwari 2019 kuya ku-Agasti 2020.Imiphumela yalolu cwaningo ishicilelwe emqingweni wezempilo i-African Journal of Primary Health Care & Family Medicine.
Abacwaningi bebeqhathanisa amakhadi eziguli agcinwe kumakhompyutha, ama- eletronic card, bebheka ukuthi ukuvakashela kweziguli ezibhedlela kuyefana yini.I-COPD isifo samaphaphu esenza ukuthi umuntu akhwehlele ngendlela engelawuleki.
Uma ubhema ukukhwehlela kuvuka ngamandla ukhwehlele kuze kunciphe umoya ungakwazi ukuphefumula kahle, kudingeke ukuthi uphuthunyiswe esikhungweni sezempilo.
Ngesikhathi kuvalwe ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli, abanye abantu bebengawutholi ugwayi okuholele ekutheni kunciphe ukuvakashela kwabo kulesi sibhedlela ngenxa yale nkinga.
INyuvesi yaseCape Town nayo yenze olwayo ucwaningo olusondelene nalolu, yona yathola ukuthi ngesikhathi kuvaliwe ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli, ababhemayo bebewuthola ugwayi kodwa ubudayisa ngemali enkulu.
Ngokwalolu cwaningo bekwenzeka ukuthi ibhokisi elinogwayi ongu-20 ebelidayiswa ngemali ephakathi kukaR25 kuya kuR45 ligcine selidayiswa ngoR144.
Ugwayi ngamunye ubudayiswa ngoR5.69c obekuholela ekutheni abanye babantu ababhemayo behlise ukubhema ngoba imali yokuwuthenga bebengenayo.Lolu cwaningo lwenziwe kubantu abangu-12 118, u-42% wabo uzame ukuyeka ukubhema ngenxa yokubiza kukagwayi ngalesi sikhathi.
U-39%, uphumelele ukuwuyeka.
UDkt Sharon Nyatsanza weNational weCouncil Against Smoking, uthe lolu cwaningo luveza ngokusobala ukuthi kubalulekile ukulawulwa kokubhenywa kukagwayi ukuze abantu babe nempilo enhle.
Mancane amathuba okuba namahlule kwabagome ngeJ&J
PHILI MJOLILUYAQHUBEKA  uhlelo lokugomela iCovid-19 kusetshenziswa umgomo wakwaJohnson&Johnson obumisiwe kuleli.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, uthe ukugonywa kwabasebenzi bezempilo okwenziwa ngaphansi kohlelo locwaningo, iSisonke Protocol, luzoqhubeka ezikhungweni ezingu-95 zokugoma ezikuleli.Uthe isikhungo esigunyaza ukusetshenziswa kwemithi kuleli, iSouth African Health Products Authority (Sahpra)  senza isiphakamiso ePhalamende sokuthi ukugoma kuqhubeke kodwa kuqashwe.Uthe njengamanje imigomo ekhona, okuzogonywa ngayo ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo, ingu-500 000.Lo mgomo wamiswa kusagonywe abasebenzi abangaphansi kuka-300 000 kwabangu-1.2 million.
"Ukugoma esigabeni sokuqala kulindeleke ukuthi kuphele ngoMeyi 16.
Sizimisele  ukugoma abasebenzi abasele ngobuningi babo, yize kuke kwaba khona ukuphazamiseka.
Sinxusa abasebenzi bezempilo nabelaphi bendabuko abangakabhaliseli ukugoma ukuthi babhalise kwi-website yoMnyango wezeMpilo," kusho uDkt Mkhize.Ukugoma ngalo ngomo kwamiswa kuleli ngemuva kokuthi kutholakale abesifazane abayisithupha e-United States benesifo esingajwayekile, sokuba namahlule egazini okusolwa umgomo, okubizwa ngeVaccine Induced Thrombotic Thrombocytopenia (VITT).
Manje sebeyisishiyagalombili abesifazane abajove ngawo base beba neVITT.
"Ngesikhathi kumiswa ukugoma ngalo mgomo kwakusanikezwa ososayensi ithuba lokuthi bacwaninge bese bekhipha isinqumo sokuthi lo mgomo ungasetshenziswa kanjani.
Ucwaningo luveze ukuthi amathuba okuthi umuntu abe nalesi sifo ngoyedwa kwabayisigidi.
Abesifazane okungenzeka bangenwe yilesi sifo ngabaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 kuya ku-48.
Nakhona kuthiwa amathuba okuthi igazi libe namahlule mancane.
Ososayensi emhlabeni benze isiphakamiso sokuthi kuqhutshekwe nokugoma ngalo mgomo,"  kusho  uDkt Mkhize.Uthe kuleli uphiko olwenza ucwaningo ngemithi, iSouth African Medical Research Council  (SAMRC), wuMnyango wezeMpilo neSahpra nezinye izikhungo zezempilo bazobe bewuqaphile umgomo .
"Bonke ababhalisele ukugoma ngalo mgomo bazonikezwa ifomu eshoyo ukuthi yibuphi ubungozi balo mgomo.
Bazoyisayina ngaphambi kokuthi bagome,"  kusho uMkhize.
Balinganiselwa ku-8 million ababulewe yiCovid-19 emhlabeni
PHILI MJOLISIPHINDAPHINDEKE kathathu isibalo sabantu ababulewe yiCovid-19 emhlabeni  kunaleso esisaziyo.Lokhu kuvezwe yinhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni  iWorld Health Organisation (WHO) esithangamini nabezindaba sakamuva.Izibalo ezikhona njengamanje zithi bangu-3.4 million abantu ababulewe yileli gciwane emhlabeni selokhu sabheduka eChina ekupheleni kuka-2019 kodwa iWHO ithi izibalo eziyizona ziphindaphindeke kathathu kulezi.UDkt Samira Asma, osophikweni olucubungula ulwazi kwi-WHO, uthe nakuba abanye abantu bengabulawanga yiCovid-19 ngqo kodwa bebengeke bashone ukube belungekho ubhubhane oluholele ekutheni bangakutholi ukwelashelwa isifo abanaso  base beyashona.
"Izibalo zabashone ngenxa yaleli gciwane luphindaphindeke kabili noma kathathu kunokubikwe ngokusemthethweni,"  kusho uDkt Asma.Uthe ngokombiko owenziwe yile nhlangano ngo-2020, kuvela ukuthi okungenani bangaphezulu kuka-3 million abanye abantu abashonile ukufa kwabo okweyamaniswa neCovid-19 ngqo.
Ngaleso sikhathi izibalo ezisemthethweni zababulewe yigciwane uthe zazikhomba ukuthi bangu- 1.8 million abashonile.Ebuzwa ukuthi ngabe izibalo zababulewe wubhubhane uma ehlanganisa nalabo bantu manje zithini, uphendule ngokuthi: "Ngicabanga ukuthi kuphephile ukuthi ngithi isilinganiso esiyiso kungaba ngabantu abaphakathi kuka-6 kuya ku-8 million".Uthe iWHO ibisebenzisana namazwe ukuze iqonde izibalo zangempela zabantu ababulewe wubhubhane.
Uthe lokhu bebekwenzela ukuthi bazihlinzekele ezinye izimo eziphuthumayo ezingavela ngesikhathi esizayoUqhube wathi:" Ukungafani kolwazi kudalwe yizinto eziningi phakathi kwazo ukusilela emuva  kokushicilelwa kwababulewe yigciwane kwamanye amazwe.
Elinye iqiniso ukuthi  abanye abantu abazange bahlolwe ukuthi babulewe yigciwane noma cha, abanye  baze bashona bengazange belashelwe lona ngoba abazange bakwazi nokufinyelela ezikhungweni zezempilo ukuze bahlolwe ngenxa yemigomo yomvalelandlini ebikhona.
Abanye babulewe ezinye izifo ngenxa yokuthi abakwazanga ukuthola ukwelashwa ngoba kubhekenwe nobhubhane."
Ezothando: Ngakhipha isisu umyeni wami akasanginiki ukuphumula
UMBUZO: Nginenkinga kababa wabantwana bami engithandane naye kusuka ngo-2015 ongafuni ukondla izingane zakhe.
Uma ngimqonda ngesenzo sakhe ungitshele ukuthi mina angimthandi.
Usengumuntu osephuza kakhulu nosethanda amantombazane okuyinto engikhathazayo ngoba ngisamthanda.
Ngicela usizo.Hlengiwe, KwaDukuzaImpendulo:Yibhekisise kahle le nto ayishoyo yokuthi awumthandi.
Kusobala ukuthi zikhona izimpawu azibonayo kuwe ezingakhombisi uthando.
Bunjani ubudlelwano benu?Yicabangisise kahle le nto ukuze uzitholele izimpendulo ozidingayo.
Kwesinye isikhathi izenzo zethu zikhuluma ukudlula amazwi ethu.Nalokuphuza kwakhe nokuthanda amantombazane kuyindlela akhala ngayo noma indlela azama ukukhohlwa ngayo ngokwenzekayo phakathi kwenu.Yini le azama ukuyibalekela kangaka aze azinikele empilweni yotshwala namantombazane?
Uma ngabe ungakazitholi izimpendulo ozidingayo namanje akukho okudlula ukuthi umhlalise phansi ubaba wabantwana bakho ukuthola ukuthi yini ngempela emenza acabange ukuthi awumthandi.Umbuzo:Sineminyaka emibili sishadile nomyeni wami.
Emva kwezinyangana sishadile ngathola ukuthi ngikhulelwe ngasikhipha isisu engazi ngoba ngangingazimisele ukuphinda ngibe nomunye umntwana ngenxa yokuthi sobabili sifike nabantwana kulo mshado.
Angikaze ngikuthole ukuphumula seloku athola ukuthi ngenzani.Ungikhumbuza njalo ngisho nokuthi ngabe isingakanani ingane ukube angiyikhiphanga.
Ukhala ngokuthi ngamncisha ithuba lokuba ubaba.
Ngenzenjani ngempela ukuze akhohlwe, nomshado wethu ubuyele esimeni?Igama ligodliwe, eMorningsideImpendulo:Isinqumo sokuba nabantwana nokungabi nabantwana akusona osithatha uwedwa emshadweni.
Kwakumele umazise kwasekuqaleni umyeni wakho ukuthi awuzimisele ukuba nabantwana.
Kube yinto enivumelana ngayo.Ungamsoli kakhulu umyeni wakho ngokuhlale ekukhumbuza ngoba naye yindlela yakhe azama ukudlulisa ngayo ubuhlungu.Okubalulekile njengamanje ukuthi uzehlise uxolise kumyeni wakho, bese nithola ukwelulekwa.Ngaphandle kweziluleko kuzonithatha eside isikhathi ukudlula kulesi simo futhi kugcine kuwuqedile ngisho nomshado wenu.Umbuzo:Ezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule besinezinkinga nomama wabantwana bami wacela ukuthi ke sithathe ikhefu okwesikhashana ukuzama ukulungisa izinto phakathi kwethu.
Kodwa kunokuthi izinto zibe ngcono ngibona ziya ngokuba zimbi kakhulu.Useqale ngisho nokuphuza into entsha kanti ngelinye ilanga ngiyobona abantwana bami ngazithela kumuntu wesilisa engangingamlindele.Ngeke ngikwamukele ukuthi useqhubekele phambili nempilo.
Kanti kuchazani ngempela ukuthatha ikhefu uma ngabe omunye ezoqhubeka nempilo yakhe?Mnguni, eThekwiniImpendulo:Kusobala ukuthi umama wabantwana bakho useziqhubekela nempilo yakhe.
Indaba yokuthatha ikhefu kwakuyindlela yakhe ehloniphekile yokuthi hlukanani.
Ngeke ke umphoqe umuntu ukuthi abe nawe engasathandi.Sibona kukuhle ukuthi nivumelane kusemanje ngendaba yabantwana nokuthi bazohlala kubani omunye ababone kanjani.Kubalulekile ukuthi ube nobudlelwano obuhle nabantwana bakho ngisho ungasathandani nomama wabo.Akumelanga baphazanyiswe okwenzeka phakathi kwenu.Qhubeka nokuba wubaba oqotho kubona ngisho umama wabo eseziqhubekela neyakhe impilo.
Sikufisela inhlanhla.

Kuningi okushintshiwe kwiCorolla
I-TOYOTA Corolla yimoto engadingi kwethulwa ngoba abantu abaningi bayayazi futhi isineminyaka yaqala ukusetshenziswa emhlabeni naseNingizimu Afrika.Le moto yethulwa okokuqala ngo-1966, ingenye yezintandokazi zakuleli futhi ezinesandla ekufukuleni umnotho.
Okuyenza ibe yimoto ebalulelekile yingoba ibikhiqizwa efemini yakwaToyota eProspecton, eThekwini kwaze kwaba wunyaka odlule kodwa ukwakhiwa kweCorolla Quest, esuselwe kwiCorolla endala, khona kusaqhubeka.IToyota yamemezela ukuthi izotshala ezinye izigidi zamarandi efemini yayo ukulungiselela ukukhiqiza imoto entsha kusukela ngonyaka ozayo.
Le Corolla yesizukulwane sika-12, ifana neCorolla hatch uma uyibuka, ikakhulukazi ngaphambili.Uma uyibuka ngohlangothi ikhasa phansi kwazise bayehlise ngo-20mm.
Amarimu ayo makhulu angu-18 inch.
Ngemuva bayenze yabukeka kahle ngamalambu amancane nobhampa onombala omnyama.
Ngaphakathi isihlalo somshayeli usihlela ngogesi futhi ivulekile abagibeli abayisweli indawo yokuhlala.
Sikhulu isikhala ebhuthini, uyakwazi nokusandisa ngokulalisa izihlalo zangemuva.
Uyakwazi nokuyivula ungaphakathi ibhuthi.Ngaphambili alukho uxhaxha lwamabhathini.
Kukhona itouchscreen enkulu eme yagqama okuyilapho ulawula khona umsakazo, ikuvezele indlela edla ngayo uphethroli nekhamera ngemuva uma uhlehla.
Uphinde ukwazi ukuxhuma iselula nge-apple carplay okanye i-Android Auto uma uthanda.
Okumnandi ukuthi kukhona izimbombo ezimbili zokushaja nge-USB.Okunye enakho yi-aircon, yize kungeyona lena yokuthi oseceleni azikhethele yena awakhe amazinga okushisa nomshayeli naye akhethe athandwa nguye njengakwiCorolla hatch, amawindi kagesi, yisiteringi osisethayo ukuthi sime kanjani, isibuko sokujeqeza emuva esizidimelayo nokunye.Injini iCorolla XR ehamba ngayo ingu-2.0 litre ekhona nakwiRAV4 yakwabo.
Ikhipha amandla angu-125kW netorque engu-200Nm.
Isebenzisa ugearbox ozishintshayo oyiCVT.
Ngebanga lika-100km bathi isebenzisa amalitha kaphethroli angu-6.0 kodwa ngesikhathi sihamba ngayo ibidla angu-7.7.Emgwaqweni ihamba kahle ayishodi ngamandla.
Kunama-paddle shifters ngemuva kwesiteringi uzishintshele wena igiya uma uthanda.
Kunebhathini lokuyifaka ku-Sport , lapho usheshe uwezwe amandla uma ufaka amafutha futhi ngaleso sikhathi isuke ishintsha nokuduma ibe nomsinjwana.Emakhoneni iyabambelela lokho okusizwa ukuthi ikhasa phansi futhi inamasondo amakhulu.
Nakwi-suspension yayo bayishintshile nokuyenza ibambelele kangcono emgwaqweni.Uma uhamba ngayo uzizwa uphephile ngoba kuningi enakho okusiza umshayeli.
Iyakusiza ukuhlala emzileni ngokuthi izijikise yona isiteringi mbijana uma iphuma, iyakwazi ukuhamba ngejubane elilodwa izinciphise ijubane uma kukhona imoto ephambi kwayo, iyasho uma izoshayisa futhi iyasho uma kunemoto eceleni.Inama-airbag ayisikhombisa, indawo yokufaka isihlalo sengane ne-ABS, EBD, BAS, VSC neHAC.IToyota ilinyuse kakhulu izinga leCorolla ngenxa yezinto enazo yenyuse nentengo yayo.
Yigama abalethembayo futhi uma ufuna eshibhile, ikhona iCorolla Quest esuselwe kwiCorolla endala.InaniCorolla 2.0 XR CVT - R 433 700Ifika neservice plan yamasevisi ayisithupha noma u-90 000km futhi kumele iseviswe njalo emuva kokuhamba u-15 000km noma izinyanga ezingu-12.
Ine-warranty yeminyaka emithathu noma u-100 000km.
Ngeke kugwemeke 'ukuvalwa' kwezwe: Mkhize
UKWENYUSELWA kwezwe ezigabeni zokuvalwa kwezwe eziphezulu yinto engeke igwemeke.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, ucashunwe kweminye imithombo yezindaba ethi maningi amathuba okuthi lokhu kwenzeke njengoba zilokhu zikhula izibalo zabahaqwa yileli gciwane kuleli.Ngeledlule izibalo zabahaqwe yileli gciwane zike zaba ngu-3000 ngosuku.
Uqhube wathi umkhandlu wongqongqoshe ababhekelele iCorona kuleli, iNational Command Council (NCC) eholwa uNgqongqoshe wezekuBusa ngokuBambisana, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, nezinhlaka ezithintekayo bazoba nomhlangano babonisane ngesinyathelo okumele sithathwe ukuze kunqandwe ukusabalala kweCovid-19.
"Uma izibalo zikhuphuka izigaba zokuvalwa kwezwe zizokwenyuswa, uma zehla kuzoxegiswa," kusho uDkt Mkhize.Seziqalile neziphakamiso zokuthi uhulumeni ubheke ukuthi ngeke yini kumiswe ukudayiswa kotshwala nogwayi ngoba kunenkolelo yokuthi kunomthelela ekutheni abantu bathelelane ngaleli gciwane.Imboni yabadayisa utshwala kuleli, iSouth African Liquor Brandowners Association (Salba), ne-Vinpro ithe  uma uhulumeni engathatha isinqumo sokumisa ukudayisa utshwala futhi uzobe ebeka engcupheni  imisebenzi engu-200 yabasebenza kule mboni.UMnuz Sibani Mngadi, weSalba,  uthe uhulumeni akakaze aziveze izizathu ezibambekayo zokuthi kungani evala ukuthi utshwala budayiswe, ababuthengayo babuphuzele emakhaya  ngezimpelasonto.Ngeledlule ikhabhinethi lelule isikhathi sokuthi leli lizwe lithathwe njengeliyinhlekelele okuzophela ngoJune 15.UNdunankulu waseGauteng, uMnuz David Makhura, ngeledlule umemezele ukuthi sesingenile isivunguvungu sesithathu kulesi sifundazwe.I-National Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD) ngeledlule imemezele ukuthi iFree State ingesinye sezifundazwe isivunguvungu sesithathu esesifikile kuyo nakuba izinombolo zabahaqwa yileli zingakafinyeleli esibalweni esibekiwe esisho lokhu kodwa ukwenyuka kakhulu kwezibalo zakhona sekukhomba khona.Izibalo zakamuva zabahaqwe yiCovid-19 kuleli, ezikhishwe wuMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli ngoMgqibelo, zikhomba ukuthi bangu-2750 abantu abahaqwe yileli gciwane emahoreni angu-24 okuholele ukuthi isibalo sabahaqwe yileli gciwane senyukele ku-1 611 143.
Ababulelwe yizifo ezisondelele nalesi sifo ngesikhathi esifanayo bangu-59 okuholele ekutheni isibalo sabahaqwe yileli gciwane senyukele ku-55 183, kubo abangu-20 bashone eGauteng, abangu-18 abaseNorthern Cape , abayisishiyagalombili abaKwaZulu-Natal, abayisithupha abaseWestern Cape,  abahlanu abaseFree State, eMpumalanga kushone ababili.
Ugwayi oluhlobo                       lwe-e cigaratte  awukuyekisi ukubhema
UGWAYI oxutshwe nokusamanzi okuthiwa usiza abafuna ukuyeka ukubhema obizwa nge-eletronic cigarette (e-cigaratte ) kawusizi ekutheni uyeke ugwayi ojwayelekile kanti futhi uyabiza.I-electronic cigarette kuthiwa iyindlela esetshenziswa ngabakhiqizi ukuze bahehe intsha ukuze ingene ithi shi ekuyisebenziseni.
Ngakho kumele kube nendlela yokulawula ukusetshenziswa kwayo ngokuthi umthetho sivivinyo, iControl of Tobacco and Electronic Delivery System Bill ka-2018, wenziwe ube ngumthetho olawula ukusetshenziswa kwayo.USolwazi Olalekan Ayo wophiko lwesayensi ethinta ezempilo eNyuvesi iSefako Makgatho, uthe ucwaningo olwenziwe iHealth 24 ngo-2018  olubheka iminxa eminingi nge-e-cigarette, lukhomba ukuthi abantu abasebenzisa lolu hlobo lukagwayi olubhenywa ngokumunca isisi sikagwayi esiphuma sesinephunga lejusi, abayeki ukubhema.
Uma kwenzekile bayeka kuba isikhashana kodwa babuye babuyele ekubhemeni ugwayi ojwayelekile.
"Esikutholile ngesikhathi senza ucwaningo ukuthi ngesikhathi lufika lolu hlobo lukagwayi, abakhiqizi bathi luwumuthi osiza ekutheni abafuna ukuyeka ugwayi bayeke kalula kodwa lokho akulona iqiniso ngoba lokho akwenzeki kwasebeke bawusebenzisa.
Abantu abaningi abake bawusebenzisa uma kwenzekile bayeka ugwayi babuye babuyele kuwo futhi ngemuva kwesikhashana bewuyekile.
Abanye kuvela ukuthi bakusebenzisa kokubili ngesikhathi esisodwa, uma besendaweni engakuvumeli ukuthi babheme ugwayi ojwayelekile babhema i-e cigarette.
Uma besendaweni abakwaziyo ukubhema ugwayi ojwayelekile babheme wona," kusho yena.Uqhube wathi ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abantu ababuye babuyele ekubhemeni ugwayi bangu-60%.U-17% ukusebenzisa kanye kanye.
"Kubukeka sengathi abakhiqizi balo gwayi bahlose ukuheha abantu abasha ukuze bangene kuwo ngoba wona awulawulwa, ayikho intela abayikhokhayo.
Zingu-240 izitolo ezidayisa ama-e cigarette kuleli.
U-40% wazo uqhele ngamakhilomitha angu-10 ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, u-65% wazo uqhele ezikhungweni ngamakhilomitha angu-20,"  kusho yena.USolwazi Israel Agaku ongumcwaningi oke abhale imiqingo yezempilo ngalolu hlobo lukagwayi, uthe abakhiqizi be-e cigarette baye bathi ushibhile uma uqhathaniswa nogwayi ojwayelekile.
"Ucwaningo olwenziwe ngo-2018, luveza ukuthi umuntu obhema zonke izinsuku ongabhemi ngokweqinile ubhema amabhokisi kagwayi angu-219 ngonyaka.
Ngaleso sikhathi ibhokisi likagwayi elilodwa belibiza uR30.94c, okusho ukuthi ngonyaka usebenzisa uR4 387 kanti i-e cigarette isebenzisa izinto eziningi.
Kuzo kuhlanganisa amalahle (batteries) ashintshwayo,  ijusi engu-100 ml kuya ku-200 ml ngesonto, nokunye okwenza ukuthi kuphume okusantuthu nakho okushintshwayo, konke lokho kwenza ithuluzi elilodwa elibhenywayo," kusho yena.Uqhube wathi umuntu obhemayo njengamanje usebenzisa uR6 933  ngonyaka kanti osebenzisa i-e cigarette usebenzisa uR8 781 kuya kuR19 781.UNkk Zanele Mthembu weSmoking Free Org,  uthe ulwazi abaluthole kososayensi luzobasiza ekutheni balwele ukuthi lo gwayi ulawulwe ngoba njengamanje kunabathi bawusebenzisa noma ikanjani ngoba bezitshela ukuthi uyelapha futhi ushibhile.
Ezobuchwepheshe | Sihlaziya iSPARK 5 egadla ngamakhamera amahlanu
ESIKHATHINI sanamhlanje akusekho lula ukukhetha iselula ngenxa yezinga lobuchwepheshe obuqukethwe amaselula amaningi abizwa ngama-smart phone, kusukela kwashibhile kuya kwabizayo.
Eminyakeni edlule kuqaphelekile ukuthi sandile isibalo sabantu abasebenzisa ama-smart phone eNingizimu Afrika kanti lokhu sekuholele ekutheni kunyuke isibalo sezinkampani ezikhiqiza amaselula ezisezingeni eliphezulu kuleli.
NgoMashi ka-2020, ngesikhathi kuqala ukuvalwa kwezwe njengendlela yokunqanda ukusabalala kwe-Covid-19 kuleli, inkampani yaseChina, iTecno, yamemezela ukuthi amaselula ayo asezodayiswa eNingizimu Afrika.Ngokocwaningo, ukuthengwa kwama-smart phone eNingizimu Afrika, Nigeria nase-Egypt, kunyuswe yizinga lamaselula abiza amanani aphansi kodwa aqukethe cishe yonke into oyifunayo kwiselula.Ngenyanga edlule ngithole ithuba eliyingqayisivele lokuvivinya enye yamaselula akhiqizwe yiTecno Mobile, iSPARK 5, ephume ngoSepthemba nonyaka.Into yokuqala engichazile ngale selula yibhokisi layo.
Ngiyazi abantu abaningi abakunaki lokhu, kodwa indlela iselula ethulwa ngayo ebhokisini layo ibalulekile.
Ifika ngebhokisi elikhulu, elingeke likufakele amahloni uma kungathiwa le selula uyithenga njengesipho sohlekisana naye, ingane yakho, noma uzithengela wena nje.
Ngifake isithombe ngezansi ukuze uzibonele ukuthi bekumele ngiphawule ngebhokisi layo (packaging).Ngaphakathi kuleli bhokisi akuphumi iselula kuphela, ihambisana nama-HiPods H2 earphones, okungama-earphones asebenza nge-bluetooth.
Anomsindo ogcwele ama-HiPods H2 kanti okuhle ngawo ukuthi uyakwazi ukuwasebenzisa uma kungena ucingo futhi uma uwumuntu othanda ukuzivocavoca uyakwazi ukukwenza lokho engaphumi ngoba ayabambelela ezindlebeni.
Ama-earphones aphuma nebhokisi lawo elisebenza njenge power-bank yoku-charger.Into evame ukubhekwa abantu abaningi uma bethenga iselula namhlanje yizinga lekhamera.
ISPARK 5 igxile kakhulu ekuqhikizeni izithombe namavideo amahle njengoba iqukethe amakhamera amahlanu.
Inamakhamera amane ngemuva, neyodwa yama- ‘selfie’ engaphambili.Kwamane angemuva iqukethe ehamba phambili ewu-13MP, ewu-2MP yokushutha okuseduzane, iMacro lens ewu-2MP kanye ne-AI (Artificial Intelligence) Camera.
I-AI Camera ifakelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuphuma izithombe eziveza imibala yosuke ukushutha njengoba injalo.
Ukuvivinya lokhu ngithathe izithombe ezimbalwa ukubheka izinga lale khamera.Ngaphandle kwekhamera, iSPARK 5 iqukethe i-battery ehlala isikhathi eside ingacishi.
Iphethe amandla awu-5000mAh, okusho ukuthi ingahlala u-16 hours ukhuluma ocingweni ingacishi, noma uchithe u-14 hours ubuka ama-video ingacishi.Lokhu kuhambisana nosayizi wayo omuhle wokugcina amafayela eselula owu-32GB.ISPARK 5 sisebenza ngobuchwepheshe be-Android, okuwubuchwepheshe okujwayelekile kubantu abasebenzisa ama-smart phone okubalwa kuwo iSamsung neHauwei.
Le selula iqukethe eyayo injini ngaphezu kwalokho iHelio A22 chipset yeMediaTek.Sekuhlangane uthola iselula esheshayo uma uyisebenzisa, kumnandi nokuthinta i-screen sayo ngoba silandela kalula okwenzayo futhi sinama-graphics agqame kahle.
Bakwenzela umsebenzi ube lula ngama-App abakufakela wona, ikakhulukazi awakwa-google, kodwa uyakwazi ukuwasusa uma ungawathandi uzifakele awakho.Le selula uyakwazi ukuyivula (unlock) ngomunwe nangobuso (facial recognition).ISPARK 5 ungayithola ngoR2999 kulezi zitolo: Chatz Connect, Vodacom 4U, Cellucity, GAME, Hi store, Foschini, Totalsports naseTechX.
Hlola ukuthi ngabe inhliziyo yakho isebenza ngendlela kule Covid-19
Dkt Bongani Nxumalo Umbuzo okumele uhlale sizibuza wona ngukuthi yini ezobangela ukuthi uma usuhlaselwe wubhubhane lomkhuhlane iCovid-19 ugcine usuya kwagoqanyawo?Kuyacaca ukuthi iningi lethu lizohlaselwa yiCovid-19, lokho kumele singakubalekeli.Okusalayo ukuthi uma igciwane selikuhlasele kuzokwenzekani kuwe?
Uzosinda noma uzodlula nawe?Baningi abantu abazama ngazo zonke izindlela ukuphuza, bahlafune izinhlobonhlobo zezingxubevange zezithako okuthiwa zingakusiza ukuqinisa umzimba, bezilungiselela isimo abangasazi.Okusalayo ngukuthi leli gciwane likuhlasela kuzwele imithambo yegazi, inhliziyo namaphaphu.
Esinye sezizathu esenza kube ngabantu asebekhulile abadlula naleli gciwane ngukuthi abaningi babo:* Banemithambo yegazi entekenteke nenezivimbo ezehlukene.
* Amakhemikhali asegazini labo awasabhalansile njengalokhuya besebasha.
* Amaphaphu abo nawo ayantengantenga.
Babodwa asebahlaselwa yisifo sofuba iTB abanye abazazi ukuthi banayo iTB, abanye banengxenye noma izingxenye zamaphaphu ezingasasebenzi, kuningi okungenzeka emaphashini ongakwazi.Uma bethi konke kuya enhliziyweni, bakhuluma iqiniso.
* Imithambo yegazi namaphaphu konke kuyadingana nenhliziyo engumqemane ukuze igazi lemukelwe liphinde likhishelwe emzimbeni ukuze siqhubeke siphile.Uyazibonela lapha ukuthi inhliziyo eqhugayo izovele ikwenze kube nzima ukuphefumula ugcine usucinana, iphika lidlange, igazi liye ngokujiya libe muncu; ukucinana kuye phambili ugcine ngokushona.Umyalezo wanamhlanje uyaphinda uthi hlola ukusebenza kwenhliziyo yakho.Inhliziyo ezungezwe ngamanzi, inhliziyo ephuma esipolweni, inhliziyo eshayela phansi, inhliziyo engqangqazelayo, inhliziyo egijima ngokweqile, inhliziyo eshaya ilokhu ibamba amabhuleki, inhliziyo evuzayo, ngingabala ngifikephi; konke lokhu kuzokwenza uthwale kanzima uma uhlaselwa yilo mkhuhlane.Ukuyohlola ukusebenza kwenhliziyo kubalulekile, kungaba umehluko phakathi kokusinda nokushiya umndeni wakho, izingane nabazukulu, udlule emhlabeni nalo mkhuhlane iCovid-19.2.
Umhlume ugeqa ngokucishe kufane kwabesimame nabesilisa.Baningi abafika njalo bezobuza umehluko wesifo umhlume kwabesimame nabesilisa.Impendulo ilele ekukhumbuleni ukuthi abesifazane nabesilisa banomuzwa ofanayo oqala ekupheleni komgogodla bese ukopela emathanjeni esinqe.
Lo muzwa uhlukana kabili, ingxenye ilawula umbhobho wendle bese enye ingxenye yawo iyolawula izakhiwo zobulili.Umhlume uqala emzimbeni ngokuthi kulimale lo muzwa, empeleni lo muzwa kuhlangene nokungasabalali ngokwanele kwegazi emzimbeni yizona zimbangela zesifo umhlume.Ake sibuke izimbangela zomhlume kwabesifazane:* Ukuqumbelana, kube nzima ukhanule kakhulu uma uya kozikhulula.Ukuba nzima uma ubeletha, kwesinye isikhathi umntwana abe mkhulu bese ekhuhla lo muzwa uze uhuzuke, endleleni yengane uma isiyophuma.
* Kwesinye isikhathi ngaphandle kokuba mkhulu komntwana, kuvamile ukuthi ekuteteni kube nobunzima, kuthathe isikhathi eside ngokwedlulele.Lo muzwa uba ulokhu uthinteka ugcine uhuzuka, yilokhu kuhuzuka okugcina kukuphembela isifo umhlume.Yingakho uyaye uthole ukuthi emuva kokuteta ungasenandaba nocansi, abanye besifazane bagcina sekuba nzima ukuvukelwa, ubhontshisi unciphe ushintshe ugqunqe, abanye baze bathathe isikhathi eside kakhulu ukufika kuvuthondaba abanye akufikeki mpela mpela.Yilesi simo esibangela abantu besilisa bahlale besolwa ngokuthi abakwazi ukufikisa abathandiwe babo kuvuthondaba, kube ngathi inkinga ingakubona kanti isiphetho nguye umlingani wakho owalimala wahuzula lo muzwa waze wagcina esenesifo umhlume.Baningi abesimame esebephila nalesi simo.
Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi baningi abalingani babo besilisa abazibuza ukuthi yini indaba othandiweyo wabo engafiki kuvuthondaba noma kube nzima ukufika khona.Abanye bazisola ngapha nangapha bezitshela ukuthi yibo abahlulekayo, abahluleka ukwenza umsebenzi ngendlela; baningi lapha abaze bazisole ngokuthi banezinduku ezingenele mhlawumbe ngobude noma ngobubanzi kanti imbangela akusibo, yibona ebesifazane abanenkinga ngenxa yalokhu kugula.
* Ezinye izimpawu yiqolo elibuhlungu, izinyamana eziphuma embhobheni wendle okuthiwa ngama-piles nokuqumbelana okungapheli okuhambisana nokusuza njalo obekungajwayelekile ukwenzeka kuwe.Umhlume njengoba wenza nakubantu besilisa uyakwazi ukuqhubeka uhlume nakwezinye izindawo, lapha imbangela isikhathi esiningi kusuke sewukungafikeleli ngokwanele kwegazi kulezo zindawo njengasezinyaweni, imilenze, amadolo, amanyonga neqolo.Kubantu besilisa njengoba sijwayele ukusho imbangela umuzwa lona ebesikhulume ngawo kwabesimame umehluko kuba yinduku ekhophozelayo, ithambe, iwele phakathi, inciphe ngobude nangobubanzi, isheshe ikhafule kokunye ivele ingafuni ukunyakaza mpela mpela.
Ezinye izimpawu iqolo elibuhlungu nokusuza njalo.Ekwelapheni umhlume kungaba owesilisanoma kwabesimame into iyodwa uyelapheka.
Okumele ukwenze ukuya kudokotela wakho noma kulowo ofisa akwelaphe uzosizakala.Ngiyafisa ukugcizelela ukuthi kumqoka ukwelapha imbangela noma umsusa wakhona.
Udokotela akakunikezi imbiza eyodwa ezoshaya konke ngesikhathi esisodwa kodwa uma imbangela kungukuhuzuka komuzwa; sikuvuselelela lo muzwa ukuze izinto zibuyele ngononina.
Ukuvuselelwa kwalo muzwa kuthatha isikhashana kuncika eminyakeni yomuntu lowo nasebunjalweni besibindi salowo ohlaselekile.Noma kunjalo, umehluko uwubona ngalolo suku uqala ngalo ukwelashwa.Mpilonde!
