Sasivala isitolo ngoba sisafuna ukufunda nokunye okuningi, kodwa lingawile siqhubeka".Eqhuba uthe odadewabo yibona abathumela amakhekhe eThekwini naseMgungundlovu bese yena egxila eGoli.
"Senzela nemicimbi ngokubheka inani lamakhekhe adingekayo.
Kodwa inhloso enkulu ukusebenzisa namahhotela amakhulu senze lelo nani elidingeka ngaleso sikhathi ukuze ehluke kwamanye," kusho uNksz Maphanga.
Ukuba nohlelo lwakhe lokubhaka ngenye yezinto ezingamjabulisa ngelinye ilanga.
Yize kuyisikhathi sikathaqa kodwa uveze ukuthi amakhekhe amaphathi yiwona angenisile ngalesi sikhathi nahamba phambili ngoba abantu bajabulisa imindeni yabo.
Ukukhishwa yisisu kungasho ukuthi uneCovid-19
UKWENYUKA kwezibalo zabantu abavakashela odokotela bekhiswa yisisu kukhomba ukuthi igciwane le-Covid-19 lisekhona emoyeni futhi liyakwazi ukudala inkinga yokukhishwa yisisu ezinye izimpawu zingabi khona.UDkt Morgan Mkhatshwa, oyinhloko yokusebenza kwansukuzonke kwiBonitas Medical Fund, uthe uma kwehla izibalo zabahaqwa yi-Covid-19, kukhomba ukuthi umphakathi usufundile ukulandela imigomo yokunqanda ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane, wathi kodwa ukwanda kwabantu abahlushwa yisisu kukhomba ukuthi lisekhona.Uthe okunye okubuye kufake ingcindezi yesisu ukuthi phakathi kukaNovemba noMeyi, amagciwane aholela ekutheni abantu baphathwe isisu asuke ekhona emoyeni.UDkt Mkhatshwa uthe umkhuhlane wesisu ojwayelekile  i-igastroenteritis  ubonakala ngokuhlambuluka kwesisu, amajaqamba esiswini,  ukuphalaza, ubuhlungu bekhanda, ukucanuzela kwenhliziyo nokomela amanzi.Uthe lezi zimpawu zivela kumuntu phakathi kwamahora angu-24 kuya kwangu-72 ethole igciwane.Uthe ngokujwayelekile lezi zimpawu ziyaphela ngemuva kwezinsuku ezintathu noma ezine, akujwayelekile ukuthi umuntu angazizwa kahle kuze kuphele isonto.Uthe igciwane lesisu elijwayelekile nelingene ngokudla agulisana ngendlela efanayo.Uthe ucwaningo ngeCovid-19 luveza ukuthi u-10%  wabantu abadala abahaqwe yiCovid-19  bakhishwa yisisu, baphalaze okuhambisana nenkinga yokuphefumula, nokukhwehlela kodwa kwabanye kuyenzeka sihambe sodwa.
"Ngeshwa akulula ukwazi ukuthi isisu esikuphethe umsuka waso uyini, ngaphandle uma uzobuye ube nezimpawu ezifana nobuhlungu besifuba kanye nokungalizwa iphunga nobumnandi.
Uma ube nalezo zimpawu kuba lula ukuhlukanisa," kusho  yenaUthe uma usola ukuthi izimpawu zesizu onazo kungenzeka ukuthi zisho ukuthi une-Covid-19, kumele ufonele udokotela wakho.
"Udokotela usuke ezokweluleka ngokuthi uyozihlola ukuthi awunayo yini iCovid-19, uma ebona ukuthi lezi zimpawu onazo zisondelene neCovid-19.
Amagciwane athinta uhudo athelelana kalula ikakhulukazi emahoreni angu-72 okuqala, kubalulekile ukuthi uzinakekele," kusho yena.Uthe ukusondelana nomuntu onawo ngokuthintana ngemilomo noma ukuthinta lapho kade ethinte khona kungaholela ekutheni nawe ulithole leli gciwane.
Ungoti uxwayisa ngokhwantalala
Mbali KhanyileABE-SOUTH  African Depression and Anxiety Group baxwayisa abantu ngokuthi abagweme ukhwantalala njengoba amaholidi  okuphela konyaka enezinto eziningi eziholela ekutheni bagcine benengcindezi.UNksz Collen O’Day  ongungoti ezifweni zengqondo, uthe  kuningi okungaholela ekutheni abantu bagcine beba nokhwantalala kula maholidi nokuholela ekutheni bagcine bephathwa yizifo ezihambisana nokuphazamiseka kwengqondo.“ Uma kungamaholidi okuphela konyaka kuvamise ukuthi kube nezinhlelo eziningi ezidinga imali nesizenza nabangani nemindeni yethu.
Lezi zinhlelo ziba yimbangela yokugula kwabantu okudalwa yingcindezi abazithola sebephila ngaphansi kwayo.
Ukuhambela imicimbi nokuba matasa ngokuvakasha ngokunye okuba nomthelela enkingeni yokhwantalala,” kusho uNksz O’Day.Uqhube wathi  nalabo abahlala ngabodwana babhekana nengwadla  yokubulawa umzwangedwa oholela ekutheni babe nokhwantalala.Uthe  kumele abantu  bazinike isikhathi esanele sokuhambela ongoti abeluleka ngokwengqondo uma bezizwa bengekho esimeni esikahle emoyeni.
Uthe utshwala akumele bube yisisombululo kubantu abazizwa benokhwantalala.“ Izinkinga zanda kakhulu kubantu abacwila otshwaleni ngenhloso yokuzama  ukukhohlwa yikho konke okusuke kubakhungethe.
Ngokwemibiko ye-Anxiety and Depression Association of America abantu abaphathwa wukhwantalala bavame ukucwila ezidakamizweni ngenhloso yokuzama ukugwema ukhwantalala.
Lokho akusiwo umkhuba omuhle ngoba uzandisa kakhulu izinkinga,” kusho lo ngoti.
Nakhu ongakwenza ukuze ugweme ukhwantalala kula maholidi:– Khuluma uma kukhona okungakuphethe kahle.
Zama ukungafihli uma uphatheke kabi.
Thola umuntu othembekile nongakhuluma naye ukuze akweluleke enkingeni obhekene nayo.– Gwema umzwangedwa.
Uma udliwa umzwangedwa zama ukuzisondeza kubantu abangakwenza uzizwe ujabulile emoyeni.– Thola ezinye izindlela zokuxhumana nomndeni nabangani bakho uma uqhelelene nabo.
Zijwayeze ukusebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana ukuze ungagcini nokukhuluma nabantu osondelene nabo ngocingo kuphela.– Qikelela ukuthi aweqi emalini  oyihlelele ukuyisebenzisa kula maholidi.
Lokhu kungakusiza ekugwemeni ukuphathwa wukhwantalala lokuphelelwa yimali engakapheli amaholidi.
Kugweme ukujabulisa abantu ngemali yakho yokugcina.–  Hlela izinto kusenesikhathi ukuze ugweme ukhwantalala lokuhlela  ngomzuzu wokugcina.
Zihlelele izinsuku zokuthenga igilosa  yakho ukuze ungazitholi usutatazela ngoba ungagcina umosha imali ngokuthenga izinto ongazidingi ngenxa yamatata.– Qikelela ukuthi uyawunakekela umzimba wakho.
Isikhathi esiningi uma kuyilesi sikhathi sonyaka abantu abakubheki  abakudlayo nabakuphuzayo.
Zama ukugwema isikalo sokudla okuningi kakhulu.
Zijwayeze ukudla okunempilo bese uzama ukugwema ukudla oswidi kakhulu neziphuzo ezihlohlozayo.
Zijwayeze ukuzivocavoca.– Hambela kude notshwala  nezidakamizwa
Sinyukile  esabanokhwantalala ngenxa yeCorona
BABALELWA ku-1 400 abantu bakuleli abashayela ucingo esikhungweni esisiza abanezinkinga zengcindezi yomphefumulo, iSouth African Depression and Anxiety Group (SADAG) ngosuku selokhu kwahlasela iCovid-19 kuleli.Le nhlangano uthi iningi lalaba bantu abashaya ucingo banovalo nokwesaba ngoba bengazi ukuthi ikusasa libaphatheleni, abanye behluleka ukumelana nobuhlungu bokushiywa izihlobo zabo.UNkk Cassey Chambers walesi sikhungo, uthe ngaphambi kokuthi kufike iCovid-19, bebethola izingcingo ezingu-600 ngosuku kodwa manje sebethola eziphakathi kuka-1 200 kuya ku-1 400.UNkk Chambers usho lokhu ngesikhathi echaza ukuthi ngabe ukufika kweCorona kuyishintshe kanjani indlela ebebesebenza ngayo njengoba sekuphele unyaka ikhona kuleli.
"Lokho kusitshela ukuthi sidinga ukubhekana nenkinga yokuphazamiseka komqondo, i-mental health, ngendlela ehlukile kuneyakuqala ngoba baningi abantu abadinga usizo kunakuqala," kusho yena.Uthe abantu abaningi abashaya ucingo njengamanje abehlulekayo ukumelana nobuhlungu bokushiywa izihlobo, nabehluleka ukumelana nobunzima bokuphelelwa yimisebenzi.
"Inkinga esinayo ukuthi ukuphazamiseka komqondo emiphakathini yethu kuthathwa ngokuthi umuntu uyahlanya kanti lesi sifo sihlasela umuntu oyedwa kwabathathu kuleli.
Ukuphazamiseka komqondo akusho ukuthi uyahlanya kusho ukuthi uphatheke kabi ngale ndlela yokuthi awukwazi ukumelana nakho.
ICovid-19 isikhombise ukuthi kusamele sifundisane ukuthi ukuphumela obala kwaziwe ukuthi awuphathekile kahle kuyindlela yokuzelapha futhi akulona ihlazo.
Ziningi izinto ezishintshile ngokufika kweCovid-19.
Besinendlela yethu yokududuzana uma sishiywe izihlobo, manje asisakwazi ukufika phakathi nesonto siduduze, sikhalisane obekwehlisa ubuhlungu kulabo abashonelwe.
Nangomngcwabo asikwazi ukwenza izinto ngendlela ebesenza ngayo," kusho yena.Uthe uma beqhathanisa izibalo zika-2019 no-2020, ngo-2019 bathole izingcingo ezingu-225 000 kwathi nyakenye lesi sibalo saphindaphindeka kabili saba u-450 000.Izingcingo ezingu-95 000 uthe bezivela kubantu abazizwa benomuzwa wokuzibulala.
"Ngeshwa asinazo izibalo zokuthi bangaki abazibulele ngalesi sikhathi, kumele sizwe sihlanganise ukuze sibe nezibalo eziyizo,"  kusho yena.
Kubalulekile ukuthatha umshwalense ozovikela ibhizinisi
KUFANELE ngabe abantu sekuyinto abayenzayo ukuba nomshwalense ozobavikela ezimeni abangazihlelele.Uma ubheka indlela abantu abangawunaki ngawo umshwalense kulesi sikhathi (owendlu nowemoto), kuyabonakala ukuthi owebhizinisi ngeke ubonakale ubalulekile.AbakwaBonnet Brokers bakhiphe nanka amaphuzu abalulekile okumele abantu abasebhizinisini bawazi:- Njengoba umshwalense wemoto ubhekelela imoto yakho uma kwenzeka ingozi,  umshwalense webhizinisi nawo ubhekela ibhizinisi lakho nezimpahla.
Ibhizinisi lakho liyimpilo kuwena nabasebenzi okwenza kubaluleke ukuthi ube nomshwalense obhekela wena nabasebenzi bakho.
Uma ibhilidi osebenzela kulo liba nengozi (ukusha noma ukuwa ngenxa yokuzamazama komhlaba), kubalulekile ukuba livuswe singakapheli isikhathi eside ukuze umsebenzi uqhubeke.
Uma unomshwalense webhizinisi uyakwazi ukulungisa isimo esinjalo ngokushesha.- Ukonakala kwempahla yokusebenza kunomthelela ekuweni kwezinkampani eziningi ikakhulukazi ezintweni ezinjengemoto yokusebenza.
Uma imoto yomsebenzi iba sengozini bese iya kolungiswa okungathatha isikhathi esingaphezulu kwenyanga, uma  unomshwalense, uyakwazi ukuthola imoto yokubambisa kulowo msebenzi kuze kubuye imoto yakho.- Izinkampani ezithutha izimpahla zamakhasimende azo kubalulekile ukuba zibe nomshwalense obhekela lezo zimpahla ngesikhathi zisendleleni.
Lokhu kubizwa ngeGood in Transit Cover.
Uma impahla yekhasimende ilimala isendleleni umnikazi webhizinisi othutha impahla engenawo umshwalense, kumele ayikhokhele ngokugcwele ngentengo ikhasimende lakhe ebelizoyidayisa ngayo.
Lokhu kunganika ibhizinisi elithuthayo ingcindezi.- Uma ubheka embonini yokuthuthwa kwabantu njengamatekisi noma ye e-hailing, uma  umgibeli elimala esemotweni, uyakwazi ukubopha umninikazi wemoto.
Lokhu kungasuka emalini encane kuze kube semalini ebiza izigidi.
Uma unomshwalense obhekela abagibeli (Passenger Liability Cover), kuba yiwo okhokhela abakubophayo.- Ukuba nomshwalense obizwa nge-3rd Party Cover, kuvikela umnikazi uma umsebenzi wakhe noma impahla yakhe ilimaza impahla yomphakathi noma ekahulumeni.
Uma uthutha uphethroli bese iloli liyasha lone umgwaqo, uhulumeni uyakwazi ukukubopha afune imali yokulungisa lowo mgwaqo.
Uma imoto yomnikazi webhizinisi ingena emzini womuntu ilimaze nabantu, i-3rd Party Cover ibhekelela ukuboshwa okungaqhamuka kuleyo ngozi.- Ukuvikeleka kwabasebenzi benkampani nakho kunomshwalense okubhekelelayo.
Uma umsebenzi elimala enkampanini, umshwalense webhizinisi uyakwazi ukubhekela izindleko zokulimala komsebenzi
Hlala ngendlela efanele emotweni
ISIKHULU seMasterDrive, u-Eugene Herbert, sithi uma umshayeli noma umgibeli engahlali kahle noma ufase ibhande ngendlela efanele ubuchwepheshe bokubavikela bungadala umonakalo omkhulu.Uthe abashayeli nabagibeli abafasa kahle amabhande futhi abahlala kahle banciphisa amathuba okufa ngo-67%.
"Lokhu kukhombisa ukubaluleka kokusebenzisa ezokuphepha ngendlela.
Abantu abaningi, bengazi noma bazi, bahlala ezimotweni hhayi ukuvimba ubuchwepheshe bokuphepha ukuthi busebenze kahle kuphela kodwa ngendlela engadala okunye ukulimala.
"Uthe nazi izindlela ezinobungozi zokuhlala:- Izinyawo kudashboard: Ama-airbag aphuma ngesivinini esifinyelela ku-250km/h.
Uma iphuma izinyawo zikwi-dash, esikhundleni sokukuvikela ingaphula amathambo emlenzeni, okhalo noma emgogodleni nokungaholela ekutheni ufe.- Ukuhlala ugone ingane noma isilwane: uncisha ingane ithuba lokuthi ifase ibhande uyenze ukuthi iphume ngewindscreen ngesivinini imoto ehamba ngaso.
Uma i-airbag iphuma izoshaya ingane noma isilwane ngesivinini esingu-350km/h.- Ukuhlala ngemuva ungalifasile ibhande: engozini abantu abangalifasile ibhande nezilwane bazoshaya ezihlalweni zangaphambili ngesivinini imoto ebihamba ngaso.
Lokhu ngeke kulimaze abangemuva kodwa kungabulala abagibeli abangaphambili.- Ukungalifasi ngendlela ibhande: ibhande kumele lifaswe naleli elincane elingezansi okhalo leli elide lihlale ngasentanyeni.
Kumele lingahlali entanyeni noma ngaphansi kwengalo.- Gwema ukuhlala uqethuke ingalo iqonde ibambe isiteringi.
Awuboni kahle phambili futhi isiteringi awusibambi kahle.
Hlala ngendlela yokuthi uma uqondisa ingalo isihlakala sithinta phezu kwesiteringi futhi ingalo iyagoba kancane.
Isithelekile iSUV entsha yakwaMazda
IMOTO: MAZDA CX-30IGCINE ithelekile eNingizimu Afrika iSUV encane yakwaMazda, iCX-30 eyaqala ukwethulwa emhlabeni ngo-2019.
I-CX-30 yaqala ukubonakala embukisweni wezimoto iGeneva International Motor Show, eSwitzerland, ngoMashi ngo-2019, yaqala ukudayisa kwamanye amazwe ngu-Ephreli.Isikhulu sakwaMazda Southern Africa, uCraig Roberts, sithe bayajabula ngokwethula le moto eyakhelwe abantu abasebancane.
Kusukela yethulwa isihlomule ngemiklomelo ehlukene okubalwa kuyo isicoco se-2020 Car of the Year eThailand, yaba kowamanqamu we-2020 World Car of the Year futhi yathola izinkanyezi ezinhlanu zokuhlolelwa ukuphepha ngabe-Euro NCAP.Le moto ingena phakathi kwamaSUV akwaMazda iCX-3 neCX-5 nokuyisigaba samaSUV esikhombisa ukuba yintandokazi ubathengi emazweni ahlukene.
Ifika ngezinhlobo ezintathu izinogearbox ozishintshayo i-Active, Dynamic ne-Individual.
Zinenjini engu-2.0 SKYACTIV-G enamandla angu-121kW netorque engu-213Nm.Zonke zifika namaLED headlamps, ama-airbag omshayeli, abagibeli, awasedolweni kumshayeli, awaseceleni, Head-Up Display, MZD Connect infotainment system, Apple CarPlay/Android Auto nokunye.I-Active neDynamic zinamarimu angu-16 inch kuthi i-Individual ibe nangu-18 inch.
Ngaphakathi i-Active neDynamic zinendwangu ngaphakathi ezihlalweni kuthi i-Individual ibe nezihlalo zesikhumba.AmananiMazda CX-30 2.0L Active 6AT  R469,000Mazda CX-30 2.0L Dynamic 6AT R499,000Mazda CX-30 2.0L Individual 6AT R540,000Zifika neservice plan yeminyaka emithathu engakalelwe ibanga olihambile, warranty yeminyaka emithathu, roadside assistance yeminyaka emithathu necorrosion warranty yeminyaka emihlanu.
Kufunwa abathintane nabaneCovid-19 yase-India nase-UK
SELUQALILE uhlelo lokubheka bonke abake bathintana nabanezinhlobo ezineCorona -19 ezitholakala e-India nase-UK kuleli.USolwazi Koleka Mlisana, ongusihlalo wekomiti eleluleka ongqongqoshe abasemkhandlwini obhekele iCovid-19 kuleli, iMinisterial Advisory Committee (Mac), uthe lolu hlelo luqalwe ngemuva kokuthi kuvele imiphumela eqinisekisa ukuthi kunabantu abane bakuleli abatheleleke ngeB.1.167 yase-India, nabangu-11 abaneB1.1.7 etholakala e-UK.USolwazi Mlisana uthe nakuba lungakabi khona ulwazi oluphelele abangakwazi ukulusebenzisa ukuze bakwazi ukuqhathanisa kahle la magciwane kodwa abakwaziyo wukuthi elase-India lithelelana ngokushesha, ekubeni nakuleli kune-501Y.V2 nayo etheleleka ngokushesha.
"Ukuzishintsha kwaleli gciwane kuzohlale kwenzeka.
Okumele sikuqaphele singabantu wukuthi silandela imigomo ebekiwe yokuqhelelana, sifake izifonyo sigeze nezandla.
Leyo yimigomo esiza kunoma yiluphi uhlobo lwegciwane olufikile," kusho uSolwazi Mlisana .Uthe uhulumeni kumele enze isiqiniseko sokuthi abaphuma kwamanye amazwe bayahlolwa ngaphambi kokuthi bangene kuleli.
"Ukuhlolwa engikhuluma ngakho kangisho ukubheka izinga lokushisa.
Ngisho ukuhlolwa okusezingeni elingaphezulu kwalokho, okuvezayo ukuthi kalikho yini leli gciwane kumuntu," kusho yena.Uqhube wathi abakwaziyo njengamanje bengososayensi wukuthi igciwane lakamuva elitholakale kuleli, uma like lakungena likunikeza ukuvikeleka okungatheni liphinde likungene nokuthi ungabe usangenwa ngamanye amagciwane atholakale kwamanye amazwe.
"Emzimbeni wakha ngamasosha akuvikelayo, yize kunjalo kusamele uqhubeke ufake isifonyo.
Okunye okungasisiza wukuthi uhlelo lokugoma luphuthume ngoba siyazi ukuthi yonke imigomo ekhona iyavikela ekutheni umuntu uma engenwe yileli gciwane angali kakhulu aze adinge ukuya ezibhedlela,"  kusho yena.USolwazi Shabir Madhi, waseWits University, ongungoti wezifo ezidalwa ngamagciwane, uthe ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane e-India kakudalwanga wukuthi wukuthi lisabalala ngokwedlulele kodwa kudalwe wukuhlangana kwabantu abaningi ndawonye, okuholele ekutheni babe baningi abantu abahaqekayo ngesikhathi esisodwa.
"Nakithina lokho kungezeka uma sizoqhubeka nokulungiselela ukhetho.
Uma kulungiselelwa ukhetho kusho ukuthi kuzoba nokuhlangana kwabantu abaningi.
Asikwazi ukuvumela isimo esinjengaleso senzeke kuleli.
Uma sikuvumele lokho, ekugcineni kuzoba nenkinga," kusho uMadhi.Uthe okwaziwayo ngegciwane eselizishintshile elitholakala e-India wukuthi lisabalala ngokushesha okungalinganiselwa ku-60% ekubeni  elase-UK lisabalala ngo-40%.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, unxuse umphakathi ukuthi ugweme ukuya ezindaweni ezinabantu abaningi ukuze unqande ukusabalala kwaleli  gciwane.
Bafuna kulandelwe isayensi abakagwayi
KUHLUKENE imibono ngomthethosivivinywa ohlongozwayo, olawula ugwayi.
UMnyango wezeMpilo ubuvule uhlelo lokuthi kuphawulwe ngawo, kuxhunywana ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe.Ngeledlule uMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli uvule ithuba lokuthi abathintekayo kulo mkhakha baphawule ngokuthi ngabe ezomnotho zizothinteka kanjani, iSocio-Economic Impact Assessment System (SEIAS), uma umthetho ohlongozwayo, iControl of Tobacco and Electronic Delivery Systems Bill, iphasiswa ube wumthetho ngokugcwele.Lokhu kwenziwe kwaqondaniswa nenyanga uMeyi, ngokwekhalenda lezempilo ehlelelwe ukuthi kwenziwe ngayo imikhankaso yokulwa nokubhenywa kukagwayi kuleli, i-Anti-tobacco Campaign.ISouth Africa Tobacco Transformation Alliance (Satta), iyakuchitha ukuthi lo mthethosivivinywa wenziwe ube ngumthetho.Phakathi kwezinye izinto eziqukethwe wumthethosivivinywa wukulawula ukubhenywa kukagwayi, ukudayiswa kwawo, ukukhangiswa kwawo, yizinto okumele zibhalwe emaphaketheni awo nokuthi kumele abukeke kanjani.USihlalo weSatta, uMnuz Ntando Shadrack Sibisi, ephawula ngokuqukethwe wumthethosivivinywa, uthe kuyingozi nobudedengu ukuthi umnyango ucabanga ukugunyaza umthetho ozokwenza ukuthi kuqine imithetho, ekubeni vele le mboni idonsa kanzima ngenxa yokuthi ilahlekelwe yinzuzo, okuholele ekutheni idilize abasebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19.“Kuyinto eyaziwayo ukuthi le mboni ikhinyabezekile ngenxa yokuthi uhulumeni uke wakumisa ukudayiswa kukagwayi kuleli, ngesikhathi ukuvalwa kwezwe kusesesigabeni sesihlanu.
Ukuhlasela kweCovid-19 kuleli kusifundisile ukuthi kumele kulandelwe uphenyo lwesayensi.
Nakulokhu sithi ucwaningo lwesayensi yilo okumele lusho ukuthi yini okumele yenziwe ngalolu daba,"  kusho uSibisi.Abadayisa ugwayi ezimakethe ezincane, abeSouth African Informal Traders Alliance (Saita), bathi bayakwemukela ukuthi lolu daba luke lubekwe ezithebeni kudingidwe ngalo.UNobhala weSaita, uMnuz Michael Mokgoja, uthe ukubekwa kwemibono ngalolu daba kufike ngesikhathi esikahle njengoba sekunolwazi olukhomba ukuthi eminye imikhiqizo kagwayi, engashiswa uma ubhema inobungozi obuncane kuneshiswayo.
"Lolu lwazi lukhomba ukuthi ngempela sidinga ukuholwa wucwaningo lwesayensi, oluzosinika ubufakazi obuyibo ngalolu daba,"  kusho uMokgoja.
Kuyingozi ukuvala umshwalense
KUMELE ukucabangisise kabusha ukunciphisa izindleko zakho zenyanga ngokuhoxisa umshwalense wemoto ukuze ungabi senkingeni uma kukhona okwenzekayo kuyo noma uma kunguwe odala ingozi.Lokhu kushiwo nguKutlwano Mogatusi wezokuxhumana eWesBank Motor othe uma uthenga imoto okokuqala kumele umshwalense kube yinto eseqhulwini lezindleko zakho.Uthe umshwalense yindlela yokuvikela imoto yakho kuwena ezindlekweni ongangena kuzo uma iba sengozini noma intshontshwa.Ukukhokha umshwalense nyanga zonke kukunikeza ukuthula emqondweni kokuthi imoto yakho izokhokhelwa uma uba kwenzeka usenkingeni, kusho yena.
"Uma imoto yakho inomshwalense enkampanini eyaziwayo uzovikeleka uma iba sengozini, ilimala ngenxa yesimo sezulu, umlilo noma yebiwa.
Uma kunebhadi lokuthi ingozi kube yiphutha lakho futhi kulimale enye imoto, kumshayeli noma abagibeli noma umuntu ohamba ngezinyawo, umshwayelense kumele ubhekane nalokho futhi.
"Uthe ngenxa yokuthi awukwazi ukubona ukuthi kuzokwenzekani empilweni ngomuso, umshwalense ubalulekile.
Uthe futhi uma uzama ukulungisa isicelo sokukhokhelwa wumshwalense womuntu olimaze imoto yakho, ungafonela umshwalense wakho kube yiwo osingatha lolu daba nokuyinto ekunika ukuphumula.
"Umshwalense oyiwo uzovikela imoto yakho ezimeni zezulu, ukwebiwa, umlilo, ukulimaza enye imoto noma ukulimala kanzima engozini.
Lona ubizwa nge-comprehensive insurance cover futhi ujwayele ukuthi ube yimpoqo uma uthenga imoto ngesikweletu sesikhungo esifana neWesBank.
"Uthe umshwalense oyiwona uhlanganisa ukulungiswa kwemoto noma ishintshwe, ukukhokhelwa ngomonakalo owenze kwezinye izimoto, ukubolekwa enye imoto uma eyakho iyolungiswa nokuthola usizo uma ufelwa yimoto emgwaqweni.
Uthe uma ufaka isicelo sokukhokhelwa, kumele bakusize bakululeke kahle baphendule nemibizo onayo kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi uyifundisise imigomo nemibandela.
"Ukwazi ukuthi yini engathinta imali oyikhokha nyanga zonke kungasiza ukuthi uthathe isinqumo ngomshwalense.
Lokhu kuqala ngemoto oyishayelayo, ekanokusho izofuna ukukhokhelwa kakhulu bese kuthi endala noma eyisekeni futhi ebiza kancane izofuna uyikhokhele kancane.
Ngisho umbala wemoto unomthelela kumshwalense, omhlophe ubiza kancane.
"Uthe eNingizimu Afrika izinga lokwebiwa kwezimoto liphezulu futhi kunezimoto ezithathwa kakhulu nokuyinto engaba nomthelela emshwalenseni ngoba izinkampani zibheka ubungozi bokukhava imoto yakho.Uqhube wathi imali oyikhokhayo ingathintwa yiminyaka yakho, ukuthi uhlala kuphi futhi usebenzaphi neminyaka yelayisensi yakho.
Nendlela ophatha ngayo imali nomlando wakho wesikweletu unomthelela.Uthe uma uneminyaka engaphansi kwemihlanu ushayela, uthathwa njengomuntu ongakabi namava futhi usemathubeni amaningi okuba sengozini.
Uthe kubalulekile nokusho ukuthi ubani oshayela njalo imoto yakho.
"Ukuphepha kwemoto yakho kungenza yehle imali oyikhokhayo.
Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi imoto enamathuba amancane okuthi igqekezwe futhi nezinto ezifana nama-airbag, amabhuleki e-ABS, ikhamera ngemuva nokuthi imoto yakho iyabika uma ungalifasile ibhande kungasiza ekunciphiseni umonakalo uma kunengozi."
UMaGumede nohlelo locansi kwithelevishini
KUZOQOSHWA iziqephu zethelevishini zohlelo locansi olingaconsi phansi kubafundi baleli phephandaba.
ILawu likaMaGumede elizokwethulwa uDistance Gumede lizoqoshelwa Ekhaya Guest House eBallito, eThekwini kusukela ngoJanuwari 29 bese likhonjiswa  kwiMpumalanga Broadcast Television (MBTV) etholalaka ku-504 kwiStarsat .
UNomsa Qwabe Coutaud ongumnikazi walesi siteshi uthe kuzobe kukhulunywa ngezihloko ezahlukene eziphathelene nocansi.
Lolu hlelo okulindeleke luqale ngoMashi 6 ngokusho kukaNomsa, luzogxila kwezocansi ebudlelwani nakumuntu uqobo.
"Asizokha phezulu izihloko kodwa sizokhuluma sigxile ngezinto abantu abaningi abangakhulumi ngazo.
Sizobheka ukuthi ucansi lungamsiza kanjani umuntu nemiphumela yalo emihle kubantu,"kusho uNomsa.Eqhuba uthe uhlelo lokuqala bahlele ukulivula ngoMusa Mseleku wodumo lwesithembu, nokuzohambisana nesifundo kubantu.
UNomsa uthe bahlose nokusiza kuphenduleke nemibuzo okungenzeka ukuthi abantu abaningi banayo ngempilo yasekamelweni yabantu abasesithenjini.
Ngaphandle kwakhe uMseleku kuzofakwa nezinye izihloko ezizosiza nemndeni esenabazali abangakwazi ukuvuleleka bafundise intsha ngocansi.
"Sihlose nokufundisa intsha ngokubaluleka kocansi kumuntu nokuthi kuhambisana namiphi imiphumela ngokwengqondo, emphefumulweni nasenyameni.
Siyazi imvamisa uma kukhulunywa nentsha kugqugquzelwa ukuzithiba kuphela kodwa kulabo esebekhulile bazofunda ngokungabasiza nasebudlelwaneni bezothando, emsebenzini nasekhaya,"kusho uNomsa.UDistance uthe konke sekumi ngomumo ngasohlangothini lwakhe futhi usekulungele ukuqopha lolu hlelo emuva kwezivumelwano abenazo nabanikazi balesi siteshi.
Yize Ilawu likaMaGumede likhula ngesivinini kodwa nokuthola ithuba lokufundisa bukhoma kuthelevishini ngezocansi kuyamjabulisa uDistance.
Lolu hlelo uthe uvumele phezulu ukulenza ngoba ebona nomphumela ozoba muhle ukusiza imndeni njengoba abantu abaningi benezinkinga ekamelweni.
“Abantu banezinkinga ekamelweni kodwa bagcina bengasizakali ngoba akulula nokukhuluma nabangani bakho osondelene nabo.
Yingakho lezi zinkundla ezifuze lezi zibalulekile futhi ziwusizo,’’kusho uMaGumede.
Kuyingozi ukusebenzisa izikhuthazi kwababhalayo
MBALI KHANYILENJENGOBA sekusele usuku olulodwa kuqale ukubhalwa kwezivivinyo zika-matric, ziningi izindlela ezisetshenziswa abafundi ukuze babe nomdlandla abanye bafunde kuze kuse.Ukuze bangalali abanye basebenzisa iziphuzo ezinikana amandla ngenhloso yokuthi umqondo ungakhathali uma betadisha.Inkinga ngalo mkhuba wukuthi uyajovana futhi awubi nomthelela omuhle ngokusho ngongoti bezempilo.UMnuz Ndabe Myeza ongungoti oweluleka ngokwezengqondo, uthe kumele abafundi bakugweme ukudukela emikhiqizweni okuthiwa ikhuthaza umqondo noma ikunika umdlandla ngoba igcina ibagulisa abanye.“Iziphuzo ezikhuthazayo zivamise ukwenza inhliziyo ishaye ngamandla, okuholela ekutheni ugcine usuzizwa untekenteke ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.
Abafundi kumele bahambele kude nazo.”Uthe kumele bazinike isikhathi esanele uma befundela izivivinyo ukuze bangagcini sebezithola bengaphansi kwengcindezi, sebezama ukubamba yonke into okumele bavive ngayo.Amathiphu abangawase-benzisa abafundi abalungiselela izivinyo:- Gwema ukufunda ngokweqile ukuze ungazitholi usukhohlwa wokufundile uma usubhala.
Umqondo uyaphunyuzwa futhi awukwazi ukubamba yonke into ngesikhathi esisodwa.- Bheka indlela yokufunda ekusebenzelayo nehambisana nawe.
Gwema ukwenza imikhuba oyibona yenziwa ngabanye abafundi ngenhloso yokuvivela izivivinyo ngoba yikho okungagcina kuholela ekutheni ungaphumeleli.- Zihlelele kusenesikhathi ukuze ungazitholi usutatazela ngomzuzu wokugcina.- Qikelela ukuthi ukuphethe konke ozokudinga uma usubhala izivivinyo ngaphambi kokusuka ekhaya.- Gwema ukufika ekuseni kakhulu esikoleni uma uzobhala ukuze ungazitholi usutatazeliswa ngabanye abafundi ababuzana ukuthi ufunde wagcina kuphi.
Kugweme nokugeja isikhathi sokuqala kwesivivinyo ukuze ungabhali usutatazeliswa yisikhathi.- Zama ngakho konke ukuhambisana nesikhathi uma ubhala ukuze ungazitholi usunenkinga yokungaliqedi iphepha.
Ufunde imibuzo ngokuyiqonda.
Lokhu kuzophinde kukusize ekutheni ube nesikhathi esanele sokubhekisisa izimpendulo zakho ngaphambi kokuthi uphume ekilasini obubhala kulo.
Qala ngokuphendula imibuzo oyiqonda kangcono.UMFUNDI ka-matric waseChief Luthayi High eMpumalanga, uZithulele Tshagala, ematasa nezifundo zakhe njengoba kusasa eqala ukubhala izivivinyo Isithombe: BONGANI MBATHA
Qaphela izingane uma ushayela ngasesikoleni
NJENGOBA abafundi bebuyele esikoleni kuleli sonto, kumele abashayeli balindele izinguquko emigwaqweni.Ingcabha isele kubashayeli ukuthi bacabangele izingane futhi bagweme imikhuba engadala ukuthi kube nezingozi ezinganeni ngoba zona aziyazi imithetho yomgwaqo.Umphathi weMasterDrive u-Eugene Herbert, ukhiphe uhlu lwezimo okumele zibhekwe ngabashayeli:- Izingane ezicashe emuva kwemoto ethutha umphakathiUma zehliswa emotweni, izingane zingacasha emuva kwemoto yomphakathi.
"Ngaphezu kwalokhu, maningi amathuba okuthi zingene emgwaqweni ngaphandle kokuqalaza.
Uma usondela ngasemotweni yomphakathi ngasesikoleni, hamba kancane uqalazisise ngaphambi kokusondela futhi ulindele ukuthi kungaqhamuka ingane kungazelele.
"- Izingane ezihamba ngamabhayisikiliIzingane ezihamba ngamabhayisikili uma ziya esikoleni, zingase zingene emgwaqweni noma zenze iphutha elingaba nobungozi uma umshayeli enganakile.
"Shiyela abahamba ngamabhayisikili isikhala esingaphezu kuka-2m futhi unciphise ijubane uma uzobadlula.
Lindela ukuthi izingane ezihamba ngamabhayisikili zinga yiqoqo futhi zenze amaphutha.
Ziningi izingane ezihamba ngezinyawo ezingase zenze amaphutha, ngokungaboni kahle isivinini nebanga lemoto uma ziwela umgwaqo.
Kunalokho umshayeli kumele athathe izinqumo ezizowavumela lawa maphutha ezingane.
"- Hlonipha imithetho yomgwaqoIMasterDrive iphakamisa ukuthi uhambe nejubane lika-30km/h noma ngaphansi uma ungasesikoleni.
"Hlonipha imithetho yomgwaqo nabalawula izingane emgwaqweni ukuze kungabi khona ngane encishwa ithuba lokufunda ngenxa yengozi.
Kutuswe isinyathelo ngolwezibeletho
IKHOMISHINI yokuLingana ngokoBulili, isishayela ihlombe isinyathelo soMnyango wezeMpilo sokuthi uphenye ngezinsolo zokuthi kunabesifazane abakhishwa izibeletho ngempoqo ezikhungweni zezempilo, KwaZulu-Natal naseGauteng ngoba benegciwane lengculazi.NgoFebhuwari ikhomishini yethula umbiko ngabesifazane abakhishwa izibeletho ezikhungweni zikahulumeni zezempilo KwaZulu-Natal naseGauteng ngenxa yokuthi babenesandulela ngculazi.
Yayithole isikhalo ngo-2015.
Kulo mbiko ikhomishini yathi abesifazane baphucwa ilungelo lokuzikhethela ukuthi bayathanda yini ukuba nezinye izingane noma cha.Ngeledlule uNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMpilo uDkt Zweli Mkhize uvele ngaphambi kwekomiti lasePhalamende lezempilo, abesifazane, intsha nabaphila nokukhubazeka ngalolu daba, ezochaza ukuthi  umnyango wakhe usuhambe kangakanani  ngophenyo njengoba ikhomishini yayenze izincomo zokuthi uphenye.UDkt Mkhize ngemuva kokuphuma kombiko wamemezela ukuthi usesungule ithimba elizophenya ngezinsolo eliholwa ungoti wezifo ezithinta umgudu wenzalo kwabesifazane, uSolwazi Motshedisi Sebitloane waseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal.UDkt Mkhize uthe uphenyo seluqalile kodwa luphazamisekile ngenxa yokuthi kuhlasele iCovid-19  lusaqalwa.UMqondisi jikelele woMnyango wezeMpilo  uDkt Sandile Buthelezi, uthe kwabesifazane abangu-18 abafaka izikhalo  bathole abayisishiyagalolunye.
Ithimba kulindeleke ukuthi lithole amafayela abesifazane, libheke imibiko yabo yezempilo, libheke  ukuthi bawasayina yini amafomu okuthi bafuna ukuvala inzalo, uma bawasayina kubhekwe ukuthi zazikhona yini izizathu zezempilo ezazenza ukuthi kube nesidingo sokuvalwa inzalo, lithole abasebenzi bezempilo abathintekayo.UNkk Tamara  Mathebula usihlalo weKhomishini  yokuLingana ngokoBulili uthe: “Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi kukhona okwenziwayo  siyethemba ukuthi ngeke kusaba khona ukubambezeleka kophenyo nokuthi uphenyo luzoholela ekutheni kwenziwe ubulungiswa ngalolu daba.”Uthe bazobheke ukuthi uphenyo luqhubeka kanjani.“Abesifazane abathintekayo sicela babambisane nethimba eliphenyayo.
Kumele bathinte amahhovisi ethu akhona kuzo zonke izifundazwe  uma befuna ukufaka izikhalo,”  kusho yena.Owesifazane waseMlaza othi wakhishwa isibeletho kwesinye sezibhedlela abelethela kuso, uthe ulinde ukuthi bajeze abasebenzi bezempilo abamphuca ilungelo lokuzikhethela.
Uthe abahlengikazi abebedinwe ukuthi ukhulelwe ebe enesandulela ngculazi  uthe bamsayinisa ifomu ayezitshela ukuthi eyokuthi uzohlinzwa ngoba isibeletho sakhe sinenkinga.“Ngezwa ngemuva kweminyaka ngabeletha ukuthi isibeletho anginaso ngoba nganginezinhlungu engangicabanga ukuthi ezesibeletho .
Ngemuva kokuhlolwa ngatshelwa ukuthi sakhishwa.
Ngaphucwa ilungelo lami lokuzikhethela, Ngizizwa  ngingaphelele.
Uyise wezingane zami angikaze ngimtshele ukuthi isibeletho sakhishwa,”  kusho yena.
Ukugqoka izimpahla ezikumpintshayo kunomthelela ebuchosheni: abacwaningi
AMABHULUKWE asondele emzimbeni kwabesifazane, yiwona asesitayeleni kwabesifazane futhi bambalwa abesifazane abangawathandi njengoba ebathaqaza kuvele ukuma kwemizimba yabo okwenza bazizwe kahle, kubuye nokuzthemba.Kodwa ngebhadi lamabhulukwe nezinye izingubo ezima kanje, konobubi obungezokwehla kahle kwabesifazane.Ongoti abenza ucwaningo enyuvesi yaseToronto, bathole ukuthi lolu hlobo lwesitayela lungenza owesifazane angabi bukhali kahle emqondweni.Bathi bacwaninge abesifazane bathola ukuthi abagqoke izingubo ezingababambi bavuleleka kahle emqondweni, kwathi labo abagqoke okusondele kakhulu emizimbeni yabo baba nenselelo kulokhu.Bathole nokuthi laba besifazane bezinto ezimpintshayo bakuthola kunzima ukuthatha izinqumo ezinqala nokubhekana nezinselela abasuke bebhekene nazo.Bathi kucacile ukuthi uma abesifazane begqoke okubampintshayo, basuke benake kakhulu okwenzeka emizimbeni yabo kuze nzima ukunaka ezinye izinto abasuke bebhekene nazo ngaleso sikhathi.Byakugcizelela ukuthi empeleni indlela umuntu agqoke ngayo iba nomthelela endleleni agcina ebuka ngayo izinto ngaleso sikhathi.
Benze isibonelo ngowesifazane ogqoke ijazi elimhlophe eligqokwa wodokotela,bathi uma ehlolwa ukusebenza kobuchopho bakhe, uba nobuhlakani obedlulele.Namadoda agqoka ngokuzimisela, aba ngosomabhizinisi abakhaliphile abakwazi nokuthatha izinqumo zamabhizinisi eziphusile.
Lokhu kona kwavela ocwaningweni olwenziwa ngo-2014 yinyuvesi yaseYale.Inhloso yokwenza lolu cwaningo bekuwukuhlola ukuthi mthelela muni oba khona endleleni abesifazane abacabanga ngayo uma begqoke ngendlela ethile.Bawu-80 abesifazane okwenziwe kubo lolu cwaningo.
Bebeneminyaka engaphezu kuka18 no-35.Lolu cwaningo lushicilelwe kwi-Psychonomic Bulletin & Review yakamuvanje.
Kukhalwa ngeCovid-19 kushoda igazi kuleli
MBALI KHANYILEINHLANGANO iSouth African National Blood Services ikhala ngeCovid-19 eholele ekutheni kwehle isibalo sabantu abanikela ngegazi kuleli.Lokhu kuvezwe nguMnuz Mohamad Goolam wale nhlangano emcimbini iWellness Day, ebihlelwe wumasipala weTheku ngenhloso yokuqwashisa abantu ngokuzinakekela eMoses Mabhida, eThekwini.UGoolam uthe igazi eselitholwa yile nhlangano kubantu abanikela ngalo, sekuba yigazi elishesha liphele njengoba belihambisa ezibhedlela.
"Ngokujwayelekile siqoqa igazi elingu-500 units kodwa kulezi zinsuku sithola elingu-100 units kuphela.
Lesi sibalo esesisithola siphela ngosuku olulodwa njengoba ngokujwayelekile igazi esiliqoqayo lisilonda izinsuku ezinhlanu.
Kuwumqansa kulo nyaka njengoba lesi sikhathi esesikuso samaholidi silidinga igazi eliningi ngenxa yesibalo sezingozi eziningi eziholela ekutheni kudingeke igazi elizolekelela abasuke bophe kakhulu ngesikhathi belimala," kubeka yena.Uthe umcimbi iWellness Day usemicimbi asebethembele kuyo ukuqoqa igazi njengoba kumqoka ukuthi bayihambele ngoba babhekene nengwadla.UMnuz Vusi Mazibuko weMoses Mabhida Stadium, uthe inhloso yomcimbi ukukhuthaza abantu ngokuzinakekela njengoba iCovid-19 ishintshe izinhlelo eziningi kubantu."
Yize kuneCovid-19 sivumelekile ukuthi sizivocavoce futhi siqikelele ukuthi sidla ukudla okunempilo ukuze silwe naleli gciwane.
Njengoba abantu abaningi bebenezinkinga zemali kulo nyaka ngenxa yesimo esizithole sikuso, sonke sibone kufanele ukuthi umcimbi ube nabamabhange ngenhloso yokweluleka ngezikweletu ezingenaso isidingo.
Okumele kube mqoka kubantu wukuthi asigcini nje kuphela ngokuba yinkundla yezemidlalo njengoba siphinde sikhombise ukuzikhathaza ngesimo sempilo yabo ngemicimbi efana nale," kusho uMazibuko.Kulo mcimbi obekuphinde kube nemibukiso yemikhiqizo eyahlukene yokunakekela imizimba bekuphinde kuhlowe igazi, amehlo, isifo sashukela nezinye izifo.IMeya yeTheku uMnuz Kaunda, ithe leli dolobha linezinhlelo zokuthi kushaye u-2030, seliyindawo okuphileka kamnandi kuyo eyaziwa njengedolobha elinakekela impilo yabantu.Uthe lezi zinhlelo zidinga ukuthi wonke umuntu abambe iqhaza ekutheni ziphumelele.
Umculi osinde kwiCovid-19 ufisa kwelulekwe uma bethola imiphumela
UKUTHOLAKALA kwabantu abanobhubhane lweCovid-19 okubalwa nosaziwayo sekuyinto ejwayelekile kodwa ingcindezi yomqondo yiyona eyenza kube nzima kakhulu ukwamukela.
Iningi labantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana liveza ukuthi ukusabalala kwama video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu beveza ngokugula kwabo kwenza kube nzima ukwamukela.
Uvalo luqala nangesikhathi umuntu ezizwa esenezimpawu zaleli gciwane nakho okusuke kuhambisana nemicabango yokwesaba.
Phakathi kwabanye bosaziwayo esebeke baba neCovid-19 kubalwa nomculi ophinde abe ngumhlengikazi, uKhanyisa Mbuthu weqembu Iziqhaza.
UKhanyisa uthe ngesikhathi ethola izindaba zokuthi uneCovid-19 wacishe washayeka phansi ukwethuka. "
’’Úhlobo lomsebenzi engiwenzayo bengikulindele ukuthi kungenzeka ngigcine ngigula.
Kodwa kwaba isimo esihlukile kwangathi bengingazi uma sekufanele ngiyohlolwa.
Kwathi uma kubuya imiphumela ngacishe ngaquleka, okubuhlungu ukuthi akekho umuntu okululekayo ngesimo ongabhekana naso,"kusho uKhanyisa.
Eqhuba uthe ngokwesipiliyoni sakhe ukululekwa ngokomqondo ngendlela efanayo nanoma ngabe umuntu uhlolela siphi isifo yikhona akubona kungehlisa ingcindezi kumuntu.
Lokhu uthe ukubone ngesikhathi kufanele ahlolwe kanjalo noma esethola imiphumela.
"Abantu abaningi bacindezelwa nayindlela efika ngayo imiphumela.
ISMS ingena noma yingasiphi isikhathi.
Yangena kimi ngoJulayi 7 ngingalindele nokuyinto eyangethusa kakhulu.
Enye yezinto engicabanga ukuthi ingenziwa kangcono indaba yokutshela umuntu imiphumela ngoba abantu abefani bamukela ngezindlela ezahlukene,"kusho uKhanyisa.
Echaza ngesimo sakhe uthe sesingcono kakhulu kodwa umfutho wegazi yiwona abona ukuthi wenza abantu bagcine sebegula kakhulu.
"Ukuthuka kwenyusa umfutho wegazi, inhliziyo ishaye ngamandla.
Uma inhliziyo isishaya ngamandla kusho ukuthi seyiphampa igazi kakhulu, sekuhamba isikalo segazi esidlulele emthanjeni yegazi.
Inkinga iqala lapho bese kuba nzima ngisho ukuphefumula kumuntu’’.
’’Engingakusho ukuthi leli gciwane alidingi uthuke, kumele uzilungiselele ngokomqondo,"kusho uKhanyisa.
Ephetha uKhanyisa uthe uyafisa ukusinda kwakhe kube yisibonelo emphakathini, ukuthi kuyasindeka kuleli gciwane.
Ukufikisa umlingani kuvuthondaba akudingi uhalakasha lwenduku
DKT BONGANI NXUMALOSisesikhathini sonyaka lapho imindeni nabathandanayo bezoba ndawonye, abanye bazohlangana emva kwesikhathi eside bagcinana.
Abazukuhlangana nje kuphela kodwa bazoba ndawonye isikhathi eside uma uqhathanisa nezinye izikhathi.Abantu besilisa ezindaweni ezehlukene baphansi phezulu bayazilolonga, bayazibhila ngezindlela ezehlukene, bazicijela ukuthi bafike babe 'yizikhokho' ekujabulisaneni ngokocansi ngalawa maholidi.Izimo ezinjena azibhekene kuphela nabafowethu abasuke bengekho emakhaya isikhathi eside kodwa  nalabo abahlale besemakhaya banenselelo efanayo.Indaba yovuthondaba wutalagu abanye abaluzwa ngendaba, asebeluzame isikhathi eside kodwa lutho!Kokunye sebaze bazitshela ukuthi mhlawumbe baloywa ngukhokhovu olwashona seluvaleke amehlo nomlomo.Sake sachaza kule ngosi ukuthi uvuthondaba lufika njengomnkenenezo, kube sengathi kunokubanda eqolo nasemgogodleni, zonke izicubu zomzimba zivele zivume ngengoma eyodwa; uzizwe usuphimisela amazwi ongeke wazi ukuthi afike kanjani ezindebeni zomlomo kokunye uze umemeze uthi, ‘alibongwe igama leNkosi, wamuhle Jehova, Ameni!’Umbuzo obalulekile uthi sifika kanjani kuvuthondaba?
Yini eyenza abanye bafike kathathu emzuliswaneni owodwa ekubeni kukhona abaluzwa ngendaba akufikeki mpela mpela.Impendulo yale mibuzo ilele ekukhumbuleni ukuthi ucansi akusiyena ungena uyaphuma sengathi uxova udaka ngezinyawo.Ucansi akusikhona ukujaha omunye ngomunwe, umvalele ekhoneni umuntu wabantu, ugcine ufake amagciwane esithweni sakhe sangasese.Angikhohlwa ukugcizelela ukuthi ucansi akusikhona ukuhlasela amabele, upheke izingono ngebhodwe lendlala ngoba wezwa kuthiwa ungabowakhohlwa amabele.Ucansi ngukulungisana ngendlela efanele, kusukela engxoxweni yamehlo, ezandleni ezifukamele inkulumo, kuze kuyofika ekudlaliseni ubulili.Fikani ekwabelaneni ngobulili ngokungqongqoza kancane kancane!Lokhu akudingi halakasha lwenduku, kuphela ulwazi lokuthi uthi qo qo kuphi bese ulandelisa kuphi?Uyabona umuntu owazi ukungqongqoza ngendlela ehlelekile ngeke umkhohlwe empilweni yakho!Akuyi nhlobo ngokuthi uphethe umshiza nohalakasha lwenduku, akungeni ndawo lokhu.Uyazi nawe ukuthi uma usondela enkosini uyagaqa uhlonipha.Nakhona uma nizijabulisa awuvele ufuhleleke nje ungene kepha ungena uhlonipha, ushaye indesheni ukuze ungene kamnandi nithokoze nobabili.Ngaso sonke isikhathi kumele ukhumbule ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi nobabili nomlingani wakho kumele nijabule, makungajabuli wena wedwa.Uma wenze njalo, uyozwa ngemikhemezelo nemisinjwana yokuzwakalisa ubumnandi ezobe ifakazela ukuthi umsebenzi ushaya khona nakuwe sekunzima ukuqinisela.Ngena kahle nje unyakazise igumbi laseNtshonalanga, Nyakatho, Ningizimu neMpumalanga ulokhu uwaphindaphinda amagumbi.Uma uzimisele ngokuthola unqambothi lovuthondaba zifundise ukulalela umlingani wakho yikhona uzokuzwa uma uthinta lapho kumnandi khona kakhulu noma uma uthinta ngendlela ewunqambothi.Uyozwa izwi elithi ‘Uyesabeka Ongabonwayo!Khumbula ungaxhamazeli, thatha isikhathi sakho, landela isigqi somlingani wakho ahamba ngaso, nithokoze nobabili.Ngalesi sikhathi uzithinta ngenduku yakho lezi zindawana, izandla zakho zona zilumbanisa imizwa esezihlathini, ekhanda, emabeleni, entanyeni, ucumbaza izindlebe, amazwi amtoti emlonyeni!Nakanjani uyozwa senikhuluma izilimi, nozwakala nobabili senithi, ‘ngiyabonga akukaze kubenje’….. qathatha senifikile kuvuthondaba!Tshela mina iliphi-ke iqhaza lohalakasha kabhomubhomu wenduku la?Mpilonde!

IFord itshale uR15.8bn wokwakha iRanger entsha
IFORD Motor Company of Southern Africa imemezele ukuthi izotshala uR15.8 billion efemini yayo eSilverton, ePitoli, ukulungiselela ukwakha iRanger entsha.Le nkampani ithe ibheke ukuthi iRanger entsha iqale ukwakhiwa ngo-2020.
Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngonyaka odlule abakwaFord nabakwaVolkswagen bamemezela ukuthi bazosebenzisana, okusho ukuthi iVW Amarok entsha izokwakhiwa endaweni efanayo neRanger.Ukutshalwa kwalesi zigidi sezigidi, kusho ukuthi kuzodaleka amathuba amasha omsebenzi angu-1 200 efemini namanye angu-10 000 kwezinye izingxenye.
Kuzophinde kukhuphuke umthamo wezimoto ezakhiwa khona usuka ku-168 000 ngonyaka uya ku-200 000 njengoba zidayiswa nasemazweni angaphezu kuka-100.AbakwaFord abakathi vu, ngeRanger entsha ukuthi izoba njani.
Kugqugquzelwe abanovalo lokugomela iCovid19
KUGQUGQUZELWE abantu abanovalo lokugoma ukuthi bangesabi, ngenkathi kugonyelwa iCovid-19 ePeople’s Park, eMoses Mabhida, eThekwini, izolo.Kulolu hlelo, oluqale ngoMsombuluko, bekugcwele abantu asebekhulile abaqhamuka ezindaweni ezahlukene zakuleli dolobha.USomlomo weTheku, uNkk Weziwe Thusi, uthe umkhandlu uhlele ukugoma abantu abadala abangu-330 000.Phakathi kwezinye izindawo ezinhlanu athe kuqhutshwa kuzo lolu hlelo, ubale iPinetown Civic Centre, KwaMashu Indoor Sport Centre, Amanzimtoti Civic Centre nezibhedlela, iClairwood nePrince Mshiyeni eseMlaza,Uthe izindawo okugonyelwa kuzo zizokwanda uma kunyuka isibalo sabantu ababhalisela ukugoma.“Sihlele ukuthi sigome abantu abadala abangu-67% ngaphansi kwalo mkhandlu.
Siyabanxenxa bonke abantu abadala ukuthi bagome njengoba benezifo ezingamahlala khona ezibeka impilo yabo engcupheni.
Sicela nabaholi bomphakathi babe nesandla ekusilekeleleni ekutheni sigqugquzele abantu abadala ngobumqoka bokuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo,” kubeka uNkk Thusi.UDkt Nandipha Phahla (53) waseMhlanga, ongumsebenzi wezempilo, obengomunye wabantu abebeyogonywa izolo, uthe kumele abantu bazi ukuthi akukho zinkinga abazohlangabezana nazo uma begoma.“Ngibhalisele ukugoma esigabeni sokuqala ngoFebhruwari kodwa ngabe senginquma ukudedela ozakwethu abasebenza ngabantu ngoba mina ngiwumsebenzi ozinze kakhulu ehhovisi.
Kulesi sigaba sesibili, ngisukumele phezulu njengoba ngingomunye wabantu abazogoma namhlanje (izolo).
Kubalulekile ukuthi sigome sonke uma sisazimisele ngokuphila,” kubeka uDkt Phahla.UMnuz Falake Mkhwanazi (62) waseNkandla kodwa ozinze eThekwini ngokomsebenzi, uthe ubone kumqoka ukugoma njengoba emdala ngokweminyaka.“Ngingumuntu ozilandela kakhulu izindaba futhi bengilokhu ngibona imibiko engemihle yabantu abebethathwa yileli gciwane.
Yingakho ngingahudulanga izinyawo ngenkathi kumenyezelwa ngohlelo lokugoma,” kubeka uMkhwanazi.UNkk Nana Cele (64) waseMbilo uthe ubone kukuhle asheshe azivikela kwiCovid-19 kunokuthi alashwe sesimkhahlamezile emzimbeni.“Njengamanje sibheke kwisivuvu sesithathu ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bangalindeli ukuthi balashwe ngoba sebegula,” kuphetha uNkk Cele.
Ungajahi ukuba umapakisha ngokushesha uma wenza amasquats
KUYINTO ejwayelekile ukuzwa abantu besifazane abaningi becobelelana ngamasu ahlukene okwakha izinqa.
Iningi labesifazane emakhasini ahlukene ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lihlala likhuthaza amasquats okuwuhlobo lokuzivocavoca sakuqojama.
Lolu hlobo lokuzivocavoca kubukeka kuyilona olihamba phambili ngoba abesifazane bathi libenza babe ngomapakisha ngokushesha.
Ongoti bezokuzivocavoca bathi kuyiqiniso ukuthi ukwenza amasquats kunomthelela omuhle impela kodwa okungasho ukuthi kumele enziwe ngokweqile ngoba angaba nobungozi.
Ungoti kulo mkhakha, uNksz Sam Xulu wePhoenix Health & Wellness eThekwini, uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi kwakha izinqa kodwa kuyazibumba kahle zibukeke ziyimbulunga okuyinto ethandwa kakhulu abesifazane uma sebezibuka begqokile.
"Iphutha elenziwa abantu abaningi ukufuna ukubona umehluko ngesikhathi bese umuntu awenze kuze kweqe kulimale amamasela.
Uma uzokwenza lolu hlobo lokuzivocavoca ungaqala kancane wenze ngokuthi uzikalele abe wu-50 kuya ku-100 ngesikhathi ekuseni".
"Khetha izinsuku, uma kade uwenze ngoMsombuluko dlulisa uLwesibili noLwesithathu ukunikeza umzimba isikhathi sokululama.
Ngesikhathi uqojama usukuma ushona phansi kudabuka amamaseli fibre bese evuvukala.
Yingakho kuba sengathi kuputshuka izinqa.
Kusuke kubumbeka amamasela, nokuyingozi ukuwadabula zonke izinsuku," kusho uNksz Xulu.
Ephetha uthe ukuzivocavoca kuyefana nse nokuzelapha ngemishanguzo, konke kunesikalo nesikhathi esibekiwe.
Ukuphuza amanzi kakhulu nokulekelela ngokudla okunempilo kungenye yezinto uNksz Xulu athi zibalulekile.
Lokhu uthe kuzosiza ukuthi zelapheke ngendlela izicubu zomzimba ezisuke zithintekile ngesikhathi ushona uvumbuka phansi.
Ukusebenzisa izinsimbi ngesikhathi wenza lolu hlobo lokuzivocavoca uthe akunankinga kodwa kufanele umuntu aqaphele isikalo nendlela enzangayo.
Ziyaba nokhwantalala izingane: Sadag
KUGQUGQUZELWE abazali ukuthi banake izingane zabo ezineminyaka ewu-15 kuya ku-19 kwazise ucwaningo luveza ukuthi iningi lazo liyazibulala.Njalo ngoFebhuwari 14 kuya kuFebhuwari 21, iSouth African Depression and Anxiety Group (Sagad) iqwashisa ngokuzibulala kwezingane ezineminyaka ewu-15 kuya ku-19.Ngokocwaningo luka-2020 lweWorld Health Organisation (WHO), kuvela ukuthi izingane ezikule minyaka zisengcupheni yokuzibulala ngenxa yokhwantalala.UDkt Frans Korb onguSihlalo weBhodi leSadag futhi ongudokotela wengqondo, ucele abazali ukuthi bayeke ukuzitshela ukuthi izingane azihlaselwa wukhwantalala ngoba akusilo iqiniso leli.“Izingane ziyaba nokhwantalala ikakhulukazi kulesi sikhathi sokufunda online, ukungayi esikoleni, ukuhlala ngawedwana, ukushonelwa nezinye izimo zempilo.
Ucwaningo luthole ukuthi izingane ezineminyaka ewu-15 kuya ku-19 zisengcupheni enkulu yokuzibulala.
Sikhumbuza abazali ukuthi ukhwantalala alukhethi bala, minyaka, bulili, inkolo nesimo somnotho.
Luphatha noma wubani,” kusho uKorb.Uthe ziningi  izingcingo abazithola kulayini wabo wokugwema ukuzibulala ngakho abazali kubalulekile ukuthi basondele ezinganeni zabo.UNkk Cassey Chambers obhekele ukusebenza kweSadag, uthe abazali othisha nabanakekela izingane abavamisile ukukhuluma ngokuzibulala.“Siyabagqugquzela abazali, abagada izingane nothisha ukuthi bakhulume ngodaba lokuzibulala.
Ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi izingane okukhulunywa nazo ngalesi sihloko azibi nomqondo wokuzibulala.
Ukugwema ukukhuluma ngokuzibulala yikhona okungaholela ekutheni izingane zizibulale ngoba zisuke zingazi ukuthi zizoxoxa nobani ngezingqinamba ezibhekene nazo,” kusho uNkk Chambers.Uthe ngoFebhuwari 24 bazoba ne-webinar yamahhala ezolekelela othisha ukuthi bakhulume ngodaba lokuzibulala, eyabazali izoba ngoFebhuwari 25 ngo-1emini.Uma ingane ibhekene nezingqinamba eziningi ingashayela u-0800 567 567 ukukhuluma nabaluleka ngengqondo, ingathumela ne-sms ku-31393 lapho izoshayelwa khona ozoyiluleka.
Zingaya kwi-website ethi:www.sadag.org.
Uhlu lwezindawo zokugomela iCovid-19 KwaZulu-Natal
UNGQONGQOSHE wezempilo kuleli uDkt Zweli Mkhize umemezele izindawo zokugomela iCovid-19 KwaZulu- Natal izolo njengoba selithatha elinye igxathu uhlelo lokugonywa kwabantu eNingizimu Afrika.
UMnyango wezeMpilo uzobe uqhuba uhlelo lokugonywa kwabantu emasontweni ezayo.
UDkt Mkhize ubememezela izindawo zokugomela iCorona kuzwelonke nokuyilapho eveze nezezifunda eziyishiyagalolunye zaseKZN.Zimi kanje izifunda:iLembe DM - General Justice Gizenga Mpanza HospitalZululand DM - Vryheid HospitalUmzinyathi DM - Dundee HospitaluMgungundlovu DM - Mediclinic Pietermaritzburg HospitalUthukela DM - Ladysmith HospitaleThekwini MM - Netcare St Augustine's HospitalBawu-339 655 abasebenzi bezempilo asebegonyiwe.
Ukubhalisela ukugonywa kwabantu abaneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-60 kwavulwa ngenyanga edlule.
I-Electronic Vaccination Data System (EVDS) ivumela umuntu ukuba afake imininingwane yakhe njengengxenye yohlelo lukahulumeni iSisonke.Ukubhalisa ungalandela le link: https://vaccine.enroll.health.gov.za bese ulandela imiyalelo.Ungashaya no  *134*832*ID number#  noma 134*832# uma ungenayo inamba ye-ID.
Ungaphinda ubhalise kuWhatsApp ngokuthumelela igama elithi REGISTER ku 060 012 3456.Landela imibandela ufake yonke into edingekayo.Faka indawo lapho ufuna ukugonyelwa khona kungaba ekhaya noma emsebenzini.
Ungalushalazeli ucansi ngesikhathi sezinkinga
UKUYA ocansini isikhathi esiningi kuhambisana nenjabulo nokugijima kwegazi emzimbeni nemcabango emihle ejabulisa imizwa yomuntu.
Lokhu uma kungahambisani noma kukhona lapho kushayisana khona kwenza kubenzima ukuthi umuntu alulangazelele ucansi.
Ukuhlasela kweCovid-19 nokuphila ngaphansi kwesikhathi sikathaqa kuhambisana nezinkinga eziningi kubantu.
Lokhu kwenza abanye abantu bagcine sebegxila kakhulu ekucabangeni ngezinkinga umqondo ulibalele ngemcabango yocansi nokwenza kubenzima ukuthi izithandani zivukelwe kalula.
Ungoti wezempilo nezobudlelwane uDkt Nomcebo Mthembu uthe yonke imicabango yomuntu ihambisana nokusebenza ngendlela komqodo, lokhu okusho ukuthi uma umqondo ugxile kakhulu ezinkingeni nemizwa yocansi iyacindezeleka ngoba akukho okujabulisa umuntu ngaleso sikhathi.
UDkt Mthembu uthe yingakho behlala bekugcizelela ukuthi abantu bangalushalazeli ucansi uma benezinkinga.
Ukwenza ucansi uthe kungenye yezinto ezelapha umuntu nomqondo uswabuluke kube khona okumjabulisyao phezu kwezinkinga.  "
Kunama hormones athintekayo uma wenza ucansi, yingakho umuntu kubakhona ubumnandi abuzwayo nobumjabulisa ezwe nasemzimbeni kumnandi kahle.
Ukungalwenzi ucansi ngoba kusenezinkinga obhekene nazo akukusizi, kunalokho ucansi yilona olungasuzi ukwehlisa ingcindezi ngaleso sikhathi,"kusho uDkt Mthembu.
Eqhuba uthe uma abantu behlala ndawonye kuyenzeka abanye bagcine sebengalukhuthaleli ucansi noma omunye angabe esasicabangela isithandwa sakhe athathe ngokuthi sihambisana naye ngokwezinkinga zasendlini nemicabango.
"Ucansi ngesinye isikhathi alusho ukuya embhedeni kuphela.
Ziningi izindlela zokulenza lwehluke, ukushintsha indawo olwenzela kuyo.
Ngesinye isikhathi akudingi nibe sekhaya.
Lungaqala ngaphandle, nihambe niyoshaywa umoya epaki noma emnyango egcekeni nibambane ngezandla nixoxe izindaba zenu.
Imizwa izokhula ngokubambana ngezandla nokugijima kwegazi, indlela enibukana ngayo izogcina ithinta imizwa nizibone seningena enkonzweni yasekamelweni," kusho uDkt Mthembu.
Ephetha uthe ucansi aludingi ucatshangwa kakhulu nokuhlelelwa ngoba konke kuqala ngemizwa yabantu nemicabango efanele emqondweni womuntu.
Ziya ngokuba ngcono izibalo zokuthengwa kwezimoto
YIZE ukuthengwa kwezimoto eNingizimu Afrika kuya ngokuba ngcono kodwa inkinga ayikapheli.Lokhu kushiwe yisikhulu seNational Association of Automobile Manufacturers of South Africa (Naamsa) uMichael Mabasa ngesikhathi ephawula ngezibalo zokudayiswa kwezimoto ngo-Okthoba.
"Yize ziqina izibalo zezimoto ezithunyelwa kwamanye amazwe kodwa silokhu sinovalo ngemibiko yokubuya isibili kweCovid-19 e-Europe nokungase kuphazamise isikhathi esisele kulo nyaka," kusho uMabasa.INaamsa ithe izibalo zango-Okthoba zikhombise ukuthi kuqhubekile ukwehla kokuthengwa kwezimoto njengoba zibe ngu-38 752.
Lesi yisibalo esehle ngo-13 216 noma u-25.4% uma kuqhathaniswa no-51 968 owadayiswa ngo-Okthoba wonyaka odlule.Kuzona zonke izimoto ezidayisiwe ezingu-38 752, ezilinganiselwa ku-32 478 noma u-83.8% udayiswe emagaraji u-9.4% uthengwe yizinkampani eziqashisa ngezimoto, u-3.8 uthengwe nguhulumeni kwathi u-3.0% kwaba ngowezinkampani.Izimoto ezincane ezithengiwe zibe ngu-26 793 nokuyisibalo esehle ngo-9 106 noma u-25.4% uma kuqhathaniswa no-35 899 owathengwa ngesikhathi esifanayo nyakenye.Ukuthengwa kwamaveni namatekisi kume ku-9 644.Isibalo sezimoto ezidayiswe ngaphandle sehle ngo-7 792 noma u-18.9% uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngonyaka odlule.
Zibe ngu-33 474 kanti ngonyaka odlule zazingu-41 266.Uma kubhekwa unyaka wonke kuze kube yimanje isibalo sehle ngo-119 803 noma u-35.3% uma kuqhathaniswa nonyaka odlule.ULebogang Gaoaketse, oyiNhloko yezokuXhumana kwaWesBank Vehicle and Asset Finance uthe u-Okthoba ube yinyanga yesine kulandelana isibalo sokuthengwa kwezimoto sikhuphuka.Uthe sikhuphuke ngo-1 516 uma kuqhathaniswa noSepthemba.Izimoto ezidayise kakhulu yilezi:–  VW Polo Vivo - 2 259–  Ford Ranger - 2 203–  VW Polo - 2 195– Toyota Hilux - 1 390–  Toyota Fortuner - 1 349– Toyota Hiace - 1 265
Ongakwenza ukugwema ukudunwa imoto
ISIKHULU seMasterDrive, u-Eugene Herbert, sithi ukunyuka kwesibalo sokudunwa kwabantu izimoto kumele kwenze abashayeli babe mehlomane kakhulu kunakuqala.UHerbert uthe izibalo zobugebengu zaphakathi kukaJanuwari noMashi 2021 zehle ngo-14.4%.
Uthe okukhathazayo wukuthi kunyukile ukudunwa kwezimoto namaloli.
Ukudunwa kwezimoto kunyuke ngo-4.9% kuthi okwamaloli kwanyuka ngo-24.6%.
"Ukudunwa kwabantu izimoto kulokhu kunyuka njalo uma kukhishwa izibalo zobugebengu.
Lesi sigameko esihlukumeza umoya futhi esidla imali yinto okubonakala sengathi abantu bakuleli ngeke basibone sehla maduze.
Kubalulekile ukuthi abashayeli bakuvume ukuthi ukuze bagweme ukugilwa kuncike ekutheni bamehlomane kanjani futhi bazi nokuthi yini okumele bayenze uma bebona sengathi basengozini.
Ukuhlale wazi ukuthi kwenzakani eduze kwakho kubalulekile, ukuze ungagilwa.
"Uthe eGauteng, KwaZulu-Natal naseWestern Cape kube nezigameko eziningi.
Abantu badunwa kakhulu emalokishini yize umehluko umncane.
Izimoto ezingama-sedan, hatchback, amaveni yizo ezidunwa kakhulu.
"Uma wazi ukuthi ushayela imoto edunwa kakhulu ezindaweni eziyingozi kubalulekile ukuthi uhlale wazi ukuthi ngubani oshayela emva kwakho nokuthi unesikhathi esingakanani ekhona.
Ungalokothi ujike esangweni lakwakho noma endaweni engenamuntu uma kunemoto elokhu ikulandela.
Qaphela abantu abaseduze kwesango lakho uma  uhamba noma ubuya futhi uma kukhona umuntu osolisayo thinta amaphoyisa kunokuthi ushayele yize kukhona ongakuboni kahle.
Yima eceleni nesango usalinde livuleke.
"Uthe okunye wukuthi enxanxatheleni yezimoto paka uhlehlele odongeni ukuze kungavumbuki muntu ngemuva kwakho uma usalayisha izimpahla.
"Uma kungekho muntu endaweni yokupaka, cela unogada akuphelezele uye emotweni.
Ezimpambanweni zomgwaqo qaphela abantu abazimele.
Ungalokothi uzivimbe uma usezimpambanweni zomgwaqo noma erobhothini kodwa shiya isikhala phambi kwakho nemoto oyilandelayo ukuze uchushe kalula."
Kusenovalo ngezimoto ezihamba ngogesi
ABASHAYELI baseNingizimu Afrika basemanqika ngokuthenga izimoto ezihamba ngogesi, ngokusho kocwaningo i-2020 South africa EV Car Buyer Survey.Lolu cwaningo lwenziwe yi-AutoTrader ngokubambisana neGeneration.e futhi luveza ukuthi abathengi bakuleli bacabangani ngezimoto ezihamba ngogesi.Isikhulu se-AutoTrader uGeorge Mienie sithe bangu-2% kuphela abathengi abanezimoto zikagesi kuthi u-13% uke wazishayela.
"Kodwa kuzonyuka ukuthandwa kwezimoto ikagesi.
Ucwaningo luveza isikhala phakathi kwendlela abathengi abacabanga ngayo nokuthi imboni yona icabangani ukuze kusizakale abantu abanjengamagaraji, abakhiqizi bezimoto, abakhangisi nohulumeni.
"Ucwaningo luveza ukuthi kusenovalo ngezimoto zikagesi.
"U-61% wabantu abaphendulile bakhale kakhulu ngokugqoza kwengqalasizinda yokushaja kwathi u-60% wabaphendulile wathi isikhathi sokushaja siyinkinga," kusho uMienie.Uthe u-26% ukhale ngovalo lebanga ongalihamba ngebhethri nokuyinto eyayiphezulu phambilini.
Uthe iningi lithe lingathenga izimoto ezingahamba ibanga elide ngebhethri.
"U-39% wabaphendulile uthe imoto kagesi kumele ikwazi ukuhamba ibanga eliphakathi kuka-300 no-500km ukuze bacabange ukuyithenga.
Ngakolunye uhlangothi u-40% uthe bafuna izimoto ezihamba ngaphezu kuka-500km.
"Uthe okunye obekukhathaza abathengi yintengo ephezulu kodwa manje sebethi bazimisele ngokukhokha kakhulu ngenxa yokuthi kushibhile ukuzinakekela kunezikaphethroli noma udizili.U-74% uthe uzothenga izimoto zikagesi eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo.
Ifemu yakwaVWSA ikhiqize imoto ka-4 million eNingizimu Afrika
IVOLKSWAGEN Group South Africa (VWSA) igubha ukukhiqiza izimoto ezingaphezu kuka-4 million efemini yayo ese-Uitenhage, ePort Elizabeth.Izimoto zokuqala zakhiqizwa eminyakeni engu-72 edlule ngoNovemba ka-1948 ngesikhathi ifemu kusengeyeSouth African Motor Assemblers and Distributors (SAMAD).Imoto yokuqala yakwaVolkswagen eyakhiqizwa kwaba yiVW Beetle eyakhiwa ngo-Agasti ka-1951.Kusuka lapho le femu isiyakhe izimoto eziningi okuhlanganisa yona iBeetle, izinhlobo ezahlukene zeTransporter, Golf, Jetta, iPolo nezakwa-Audi.Njengamanje kwakhiwa iPolo edayiswa kuleli kanjalo nakwamanye amazwe aphesheya.
Kuphinde kwakhiwe nePolo Vivo edayisa kuleli.Selokhu kuqale unyaka kwaVWSA sebekhiqize amaPolo angu-75 521 adayiswe kwamanye amazwe namanye angu-12 804 namaPolo Vivo angu-17 038 adayiswe kuleli.Obambe njengoMqondisi wokukhiqiza kwaVWSA uBernd Schaberg uthe bayaziqhenya ngalokhu futhi kukhombisa ukuzinikela kwabo.
"Ngalokhu kuzimisela nginesiqiniseko sokuthi sizozuza okunye okukhulu," kusho yena.
Obaba abahlanu abaphethe isitayela
Ababona nje obaba okuba mnandi ukuba seduze kwazo, kodwa nesitayela basiphethe.
Njengoba kusasa (June 21) kuwusuku lokubungaza obaba iFather's Day, sibuka labo baba abamnene futhi abaphethe isitayela.Lo mlingisi uke wamenyezelwa njengophethe isitayela ukwedlula wonke amadoda yiphephabhuku iGQ ngaphansi kwesigaba iBest Dressed Man of The Year ngo2019.Uphethe isitayela nokuthi uyazifela ngokuthenga imikhiqizo eyenziwe kuleli lizwe.UWiseman Mncube uyazifela ngezimpahla zokugqoka ezikhiqizwe kuleli Isithombe: Instagram.

Lo menzi wamafilimu okwazi ukugqoka noma yini ayenze ibukeke isesitayeleni ngendlela yokuthi nabanye bafune ukubukeka njengaye.UThapelo Mokoena uhlale eziphihlile ngesitayela.

Akagqoke aconse kodwa uyakwazi ukuhlanganisa noma yini namateku kubukeka kuheha futhi kusesitayeleni.
Noma umbona kuphi, ngabe unamanga uma uthi wake wambona egqoke kabi yize esuke eshaye amateku ngezansi kwayo yonke into asuke eyigqokile.Ngisho angagqoka isudi, uhleli ezogqoka namateku kodwa kukho konke ngeke umbone egqoke kabi u-AKA Isithombe: Instagram.
