EyeCovid icindezela abangcwaba ngesiko
UKUSHAYWA kwemithetho kathaqa kubantu akudalanga nje isiphithiphithi sokuphambana kwezidumbu emakhazeni  kodwa kushiye nezazi zamasiko nemindeni eminingi iphithene amakhanda ngokungagcinwa kwamasiko ahambisana nesifo emakhaya.
Izinhlanga ezahlukene eNingizimu Afrika zinamasiko ahlukene enziwayo ekhaya uma kushoniwe nokuyinto engeyona imfihlo.
Eminye yemingcwabo ithi ayifane cishe kwizinhlanga ezahlukene kuleli ngenxa yendlela okwenziwa ngayo uma umuntu ezibulele.Uma kushone iwele, kushone isangoma, oshone ngengozi yemoto, oshone ngesikhali nezinye izindlela.
Kuzona zonke lezi zindlela zokushona abantu abagcina amasiko abalenzi iphutha lokungayilandeli imigudu yakhona ngoba kungenzeka kuvule umkhokha ekhaya noma kuvuleleke ukufa kwabanye noma kudale izinkinga ekhaya.
Ongoti bezamasiko bathi yize isimo sibonakala ukuthi siyaphoqa ukusetshenziswa kwale mthetho eNingizimu Afrika kodwa kuzophithana izinto eziningi kuhlanga lwabamnyama.Ungoti wezemasiko uMnuz V.V.O Mkhize uthe iphutha libe sekuqaleni ngesikhathi uhulumeni ethatha izinqumo ngokubheka indlela eyodwa yokungcwaba nengayona inkinga kwizinhlanga ezingawagcini amasiko.
"Bekufanele umengameli nethimba lakhe nabezempilo bashaye le mithetho bebe bambisene nabalaphi bendabuko nabantu bamasiko.
Kubhekwe ukuthi ngokwezinhlanga nezifundazwe kungcwatshwa kanjani ngaphambi kokushaya le imthetho ecindezela abantu abamnyama kuphela ngoba iningi labo eligcina amasiko,"kusho uMkhize.
Eqhuba uthe akekho umuntu ophikisana nemithetho nongasiboni isimo ezweni kodwa akumele konakale izinto emakhaya.
"Kunezinto eziyinkinga ekhaya njengokungcwaba umnumzane wekhaya engazange angene emzini wakhe kulaba abangangcwabeli ekhaya.
Kulaba abangcwabayo noma isidumbu singasalalanga ekhaya ngoba ubene Covid 19, umndeni awunikwe imizuzu yokungenisa isidumbu ekhaya sibikwe ngembuzi ngoba sivele sigoqiwe ngeke sivulwe.
Lapho imithetho ihlonishiwe nesiko lagcinwa,"kusho uMkhize.Ungoti nomele abalaphi bendabuko eNingizimu Afrika uMnuz Sazi Mhlongo uthe kuyichilo ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika inososayensi abasezingeni eliphezulu kodwa abanikezwanga ithuba lokucwaninga nokuqhamuka nekhambi.
Abalaphi bendabuko uthe okwabo akukhulumeki ngoba uhulumeni akabazi nokuthi bayini ekubeni nezifundiswa uqobo zikhuliswe ngamakhambi esintu.
"Izinto zesintu ziphelelwe yisithunzi kubaphathi bezwe.
Uma kukhulunywa ngezinto zesintu ungathi kunephunga elibi elibanukelayo ngoba sebephucuzeke kakhulu.
Bafuna ukuvala konke ngesintu namasiko abantu abamnyama ekubeni bayavota banamalungelo futhi ngenkululeko kwakulwelwa bonke abantu hhayi izifundiswa kuphela,"kusho uMhlongo.
Ephetha uthe bayafisa le mithetho ibuyekezwe kubenezindlela zokubhekelela abantu abamnyama namasiko abo.
"Akukwazi ukuthi kungaze kuyongcwatshwa isidumbu somnikazi womuzi onamakhosikazi amathathu nezingane engazange angeniswe ekhaya.
Izingane uqobo zizoba nenkulu inkinga ekukhuleni kwazo kuningi okungazohamba kahle ekhaya,"kusho uMhlongo.Okudinga ukubuyekezwa ngokwesintu-Uma kushone umuntu oyisangoma kumele umndeni nogobela abaphethe umngcwabo banikezwe ithuba lokwenza isiko lakhona.
Umgidi ungenye yezinkonzo ezibalulekile kanjalo nokubhodlozwa kwendlu yaso isangoma kwezinye izindawo.-Iwele nakanjani kumele livunyelwe ukungena emgodini ngoba lisuke lingazongena ebhokisini futhi nalo ibhokisi lisuke ligoqiwe ngendlela ephephile.- Indoda enesithembu ngokwesintu kufanele ingene kuyona yonke imizi yayo ngaphambi kokuthi iyongcwatshwa nokungadala izinkinga ngisho ekhaya nasezinganeni uma kungenziwe.-Imindeni kunezinto engakwazi ukuzenzela emakhazeni ngaphambi kokuthi sigoqwe isidumbu nokuyinto abamasiko abathi kumele ivunyelwe.-Ubaba wekhaya uma ezongcwatshwa kuhlatshwa inkomo agoqwe ngesikhumba kodwa lokhu sekuvaleleka ngaphandle nokuyinto ezodala izinkinga emndenini egcina amasiko.-Unkosikazi nezingane nabo ngokunjalo kusetshenziswa izindlela ezithile uma kugoqwa isidumbu kweminye imizi bagoqwa ngecansi nokuyinto engasenzeki njengoba kuneCovid 19.-Kunanezinkolo ezisashaya ngesiko lakudala ezingangcwabi ngebhokisi nokubonakala ukuthi nazo zicindezeleke kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi.
Iqine njengensimbi yaseJalimane iHyundai Santa Fe
I-HYUNDAI igubha iminyaka engu-20 yaqala ukwakha iHyundai Santa Fe, ngokwenza ushintsho kulolu hlobo olukhona noluqale ukudayiswa ngo-2018.Yize sekunenqwaba yamaSport Utility Vehicle (SUV) ahlukene akwaHyundai kodwa iSanta Fe ngeyokuqala ngqa futhi yiyo ephezulu ngokukleliswa kwawo.
Eyesizukulwane sokuqala yenziwa ngo-2000 njengoba sekungeyesizukulwane sesine nje.ISanta Fe entsha ifika negrille eyenza igqame namadaytime running lights athi uma ekhanya ame njengo-T. Amarimu ahlukene ngosayizi njengoba kukhona angu-18 inch, 19 inch noma u-20 inch.Ubude bayo obungu-4 785mm buyenza ivuleke ngaphakathi futhi inezihlalo ezilayisha abagibeli abayisikhombisa.
Kuhlaleka kahle ezihlalweni zangemuva kodwa kwezokugcina kungena izingane.
Isikhala ebhuthini evuleka ngogesi, siba ngu-634 litres uma ulalise izihlalo.Kumele bashayelwe ihlombe abakwaHyundai ngokwenza ingaphakathi eliseqophelweni eliphezulu wena owabona izimoto zikanokusho zaseJalimane, ekubeni kungeyaseSouth Korea.Kunenqwaba yezikhala zokubeka izinto ezinjengeziphuzo, inezimbobo ezine zokushaja (ezimbili ngemuva) okukhona nomgodi ojikijela kuwo iselula ishaje ngaphandle kwentambo.
Okunye engikuthandayo ngayo ukuthi uqwembe lokuvikela ilanga phezulu uyakwazi ukulidonsa kuvale iwindi lonke futhi likhulu kahle.Yakhiwe yaqina nakwidashboard bese iba nezihlalo eziyisikhumba.
Ngaphandle kwetouchscreen infotainment system engu-8 inch lapho okwazi ukuxhuma khona iselula nge-Apple CarPlay/Android Auto, amehlo avele ahehwe ngamabhathini kwicentre console.
Igiya alijwayelekile kodwa linamabhathini alula ukuthi ulisebenzise.Igiya lingumshini ozishintshayo oyi-8 speed dual clutch transmission.
Lisebenza kahle nenjini engu-2.2 litre turbodiesel enamandla angu-148kW netorque engu-441Nm.Izinhlobo zihlukene kabili okuyi-Executive ne-Elite.
I-Elite ihluke ngokuthi idonsa ngawo womane amasondo.
I-Executive esichithe isikhathi inamadrive modes amane okuyiComfort, Sport, Eco and Smart.
Emgwaqweni infotonfoto, ithule ngaphakathi futhi kudizili ibidla amalitha angu-7.8 ngo-100km.Uma uhamba ngayo uzizwa uphephile ngoba inezinto eziningi futhi iyakukhombisa uma uhlehla ukuthi kunemoto eqhamuka noma okunye, inama-airbag, Anti-Lock Braking System (ABS), Electronic Brake Force Distribution (EBD), Electronic Stability Program (ESP), neVehicle Stability Management (VSM).IntengoSanta Fe R2.2 Executive 8sp DCT –R769 500Santa Fe R2.2 Elite 8sp DCT AWD –R869 500Ifika neservice plan yeminyaka eyisithupha noma u-90 000km, warranty yeminyaka eyisikhombisa noma u-200 000km neroadside assistance yeminyaka eyisikhombisa noma u-150 000km.
I-Corona yenze sehla isibalo sabahlolela umdlavuza
SEHLILE isibalo sabesifazane abaziyisayo ukuze bahlolwe ukuthi abanawo yini umdlavuza webele.Inkampani eyakha imishini yekuhlola nokwelapha izifo, iKeystone Radiology, ithi kulo nyaka isibalo sabesifazane abahlolwayo sehle ngo-50%.UDkt Pierter Henning weKeystone Radiology, unxuse abesifazane ukuthi basebenzise * -Okthoba - inyanga eyaziwa ngeyokuqwashisa ngomdlavuza webele - ukuya ezikhungweni zempilo bazihlole.“Ukubheduka kweCovidi-19 kuholele ekutheni sehle isibalo sabesifazane abazihlolela umdlavuza.
Lokhu kungaholela ekutheni ngokuhamba kwesikhathi babe baningi abesifazane abatholwa ukuthi banalo mdlavuza futhi ususezingeni eliphezulu, okuzoholela ekutheni abanye umdlavuza wabo ungabe uselapheka.
Umdlavuza webele uyelapheka uma usheshe watholakala,” kusho uDkt Henning.UNkk Thamo Mbatha-Gasa waKwaMakhutha, oke waba nomdlavuza webele, uyavumelana noHenning ukuthi iningi labantu alikwazanga ukuya ezikhungweni zezempilo ngenxa yeCorona.Uthe bekumele ayokwenza i-papsmear ngoMeyi, wajikiswa esibhedlela bathi babhekela iziguli ezineCorona kakhulu.“Ngangingaqhubeka ngichaze ukuthi mina ngidinga ukuhlolwa ngenxa yesimo sami kodwa ngoba nami ngangesaba ukuthi kungenzeka ngithole iCorona esibhedlela, ngajika ngabuyela ekhaya.“Ngize ngaya esibhedelal futhi kuleli sonto ngoba sengizwa ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle esibelethweni sami.
Imiphumela ithi kunesigaxa esikhula ngendlela engavamile, esenginovalo lokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi wumdlavuza,” kusho uNkk Mbatha-Gasa.Uthe iCorona yenze ukuthi abantu bakhohlwe wukuthi kunezinye izifo ezibulalayo njengawo umdlavuza.UNkk Mbatha-Gasa uthe ngo-2012 wathola ukuthi unomdlavuza ena-32 okwakuyinto engavamile ukuthi umuntu ongangaye abe nomdlavuza webele.“Kwase kunesikhathi ngizwa sengathi nginethumba phakathi ebeleni kodwa elingaphumeli ngaphandle.
Nganginganaki nje ngoba kwakungebuhlungu.
Ngaze ngathi ngiziyele emtholampilo ngihambise ingane ngathola iphepha elinemininingwane yomdlavuza, kwayima ngethuka ngibona ukuthi izimpawu ezichazwa kulo nami nginazo.”Uthe umdlavuza wase uhambe kakhulu kwadingeka ukuthi ibele lisuswe lonke bese eqala i-chemotherapy.“Ngaqala ukugula sengenza i-chemo, izinwele zaphuma ngaba nembungculu.
Ngaqale ngazitshela ukuthi ngizofihla ngingawutsheli umphakathi kodwa ngagcina sengithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngibhale kwiFacebook, ngitshela abantu ukuthi uma behlangana nami bangangibuzi ngezinwele zami futhi nemibuzo eminingi ngeke ngikwazi ukuyiphendula.“Ukuxhaswa engakuthola yikho okwangenza ngaba nesibindi sokubhekana ngqo nomdlavuza, kwaba uwafa wafa wagcina unqotshiwe ngo-2014,” kusho uNkk Mbatha-Gasa.
Ibuye ibe nobungozi i-antifreeze emotweni
YIZE ukusebenzisa i-antifreeze noma icoolant emotweni kusiza ekugcineni amazinga okushisa enjini ekahle kodwa kungayibulala imoto uma unganakile.URewald Ranft onguSihlalo weMotor Industry Workshop Association (MIWA), uthe abantu abaningi bakholwa ukuthi i-antifreeze iyasiza ukugcina amanzi kwiradiator nasenjinini ukuthi engabi yiqhwa uma kubantu.
"Yize lokho kuyiqiniso kodwa iphinde ibe nomsebenzi wokwenza amaphathi ukuthi abe manzi njenge water pump.
ISummer coolant yona inciphisa amathuba okuthi injini ishise ngokweqile uma kushisa.
"Uqhube wathi izinjini zakamuva zinamaphaseji amancane okudlulisa icoolant ukuze injini ihlale ipholile.
Uthe lokhu akugcini kuphela ngokwenza ukushisa kube kahle kodwa kusiza nokuthi kungabi khona izinto eziwukungcola ezinamathela khona nokuthi iguge ngenxa yokoma.Uthe yize ukusebenzisa i-antifreeze noma isummer coolant kungaba yimpendulo yokuthi injini ibe kahle kodwa kumele abantu bangasebenzisi noma yiyiphi abayibonayo.
"Kungaholela ekutheni kube nomonakalo omkhulu kumaphathi enjini afana newater pump, radiator ngisho necylinder head.Uqhube wathi iSouth African Bureau of Standards (SABS) inemigomo emibili ye-antifreeze.
Eyokuqala yiSANS/SABS 1251 lapho kumele ixutshwe khona namanzi ahlanzekile ngokufaka isikalo sika-50/50 (1:1) noma u-33.3/67.7 (1:2).
Eyesibili yiSANS/SABS 1839 okuyicoolant esivele ifakwe amanzi ngokwesikalo esingu-40/60 futhi esikulungele ukusetshenziswa ngaphandle kokuphinde ixutshwe.Uthe nanka amathiphu angasiza:- Thenga enegama endaweni ethembekile ugweme eshibhile okungenzeka ukuthi isixutshiwe.- Uma une hydrometer ukubheka icoolant.
Futhi bheka izinto okungenzeka ukuba ziyantanta kwicoolant nokuthi ubheke izinto ezimhlophe ikakhulukazi kumaradiator e-aluminum.- Icoolant kumele ishintshwe kanye ngemuva kweminyaka emibili noma emihlanu.
Ukuba necoolant eyisikalo esikahle kubalulekile.
Ukuba nencane kungenza ukuthi injini ishise ngokweqile.- Khumbula ukuthi i-antifreeze inobungozi kubantu nasezilwaneni.
Yenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyilahla kahle i-antifreeze.
IMelika izonikelela i-Afrika ngemigomo yeCovid-19
UMENGAMELI wakuleli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uthe inkampani ekhiqiza umgomo weCovid-19 iJohnson & Johnson (J&J) ithembise ukuthi izoyiletha ngokushesha eminye imigomo kuleli.Isikhungo esibhekelele ukuphepha kwemithi e-United States, iFood and Drug Association (FDA), imemezele ngoLwesihlanu ukuthi uphenyo lwayo luveza ukuthi imigomo engu-16 million, ekhiqizwe esikhungweni esikhiqiza imigomo yakwaJ&J eBaltimore,  yonakele ngoba inezinsalela ze-AstraZeneca.I-AstraZeneca kwatholakala ukuthi ayikulungele ukugoma abantu bakuleli ngenxa yegciwane eselizishintshile.
Ingu-2 million imigomo ekuleli ethintekayo kule, okuthiwa inezinsalela ze-AstraZeneca.
Leyo migomo umengameli uthe izolahlwa.URamaphosa,  obekhuluma  emhlanganweni iG7 obuse-United Kingdom, uthe  i-Aspen ithe isiqalile ukulungisa imigomo okumele ithunyelwe kuleli kuleli sonto.Uhlelo lokusatshalaliswa kwemigomo kuleli luhamba kancane ngenxa yokuthi imigomo ifika kancane kodwa uRamaphosa uthe kuzolunga ngoba useke wakhuluma nanomengameli wase-US uMnuz Joe Biden ukuthi izwe lakhe linikele ngemigomo ezogoma abantu base-Afrika.“Ngesikhathi sikhuluma noBiden ngikucacisile ukuthi imigomo ezonikelwa yi-US kumele kube ngezosiza e-Afrika neNingizimu,”  kusho yena.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo  obambile uNkk Mmamoloko Kubayi-Ngubane, uthe ukulahlwa kwale migomo kuzoluphazamisa kakhulu uhlelo lokusatshalaliswa kwemigomo kuleli.UDkt David Manyae, ungoti wezokuxhumana kwamazwe emhlabeni eNyuvesi yaseJohannesburg, uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi amazwe athathe isinqumo sokuthi kuxegiswe imithetho kudedelwe amazwe azikhiqizele imigomo yamazwe awo.“Njengamanje azidingeki izimpi nokuklolodelana ngokuthi yiliphi izwe elingcono phakathi kwamazwe aseNtshonalanga neChina.
Into edingekayo ukuthi kusindiswe abantu bonke kungakhathalekile ukuthi bahlala emazweni acebile noma cha,"  kusho yena.USolwazi Mosa Moshabela weNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uthe ukonakala kwemigomo okuthiwa kwenzekile emigomeni yakwa J&J kusho ukuthi inezinsalela zeminye imigomo, akukhona ukuthi yakhiwe ngezithako ezonakele.“I-FDA ikwaze ukuthola ubufakazi kwi-batch eyodwa ukuthi inezinsalela ze-AstraZeneca eminye kuyasoleka ukuthi nayo intintekile,"  kusho yena.
Zikhona izimoto ezibiza ngaphansi kukaR50 000
UMA usemakethe yemoto futhi ufuna ebiza ngaphansi kukaR50  000 ungazi ukuthi uzokwenze njani, kumele ungakhathazeki ngoba zikhona.Isikhulu sakwa-AutoTrader uGeorge Mienie, sithe  ngokocwaningo lwabo ziningi izimoto ezibiza ngaphansi kwale mali ngisho neMercedes-Benz E-Class.Uthe amakhasimende kumele enze ucwaningo kuqala ngaphambi kokuthenga.“Kubalulekile ukubheka zonke izinto.
Senze uhla oluveza ukuthi yiziphi izimoto ezitholakala ngayiphi imali.
Siphinde senza  okungaphezulu ngokuthi sibheke nokuthi yiluphi uhlobo ongaluthola.”Uthe lokhu kungajika umqondo wekhasimende ngoba mhlawumbe kungenzeka ukuthi lifuna imoto encane kodwa libone ukuthi iSUV ingaba wumqondo omuhle.Uthe ucwaningo lwenziwe ezimotweni ezikleliswe kwi-AutoTrader ngo-Okthoba futhi luveza iminyaka, ibanga imoto elihambile nentengo.IMercedes-Benz E-Class ibiza uR40 381, yabhaliswa ngo-1996 kanti isihambe u-246 253km.Uhla lumi kanje:Ama-hatchback angaphansi kukaR50k*Volkswagen Citi R42 985 - 2004 (unyaka)Tata Indica R39 571 - 2010Opel/Chevrolet Corsa Lite R41 384 - 2006Ama-sedan angaphansi kukaR50k *Mercedes-Benz C-Class R40 510 - 2000BMW 3 Series R31 378 - 1999Mercedes-Benz E-Class R40 381 - 1996AmaSUV angaphansi kukaR50k*Cherry Tiggo R36 267 155 - 2009Fiat Panda R31 400 - 2007Nissan X-Trail R49 900 - 2005Ama-single cab angaphansi kukaR50k*Nissan 1400 R47 475 - 1999Fiat Strada R45 900 - 2010Ford Ranchero R49 990 - 1997Ama-double cab angaphansi kukaR50k*Isuzu KB R44 900 - 1995Ama-coupe angaphansi kukaR50k*Mercedes-Benz CLK R45 400 - 2000Audi TT R44 900 - 2001Lancia Flavia R49 900 - 1968
Ifitha khaxa empilweni iHonda Fit
UNGADIDEKI uzitshele ukuthi yimoto entsha kanti iHonda Fit yiHonda Jazz kodwa esibizwa ngeFit eNingizimu Afrika.Kwamanye amazwe iJazz ibibizwa ngeFit njengoba nakuleli isizobizwa kanjalo.
IJazz noma iFit yaqala ukwethulwa ngo-2001 yazakhela igama kwaHonda njengoba manje sekwethulwa eyesizukulwane sesine.Ithe ukuba nkudlwana kancane kunendala bese iba mfishane.
Izinto efika nazo zihlukene ngokwezinhlobo zayo ngoba zine.
Ngaphandle iComfort yona inamasondo angu-15 inch anamakhava bese kuthi ezinye izinhlobo zibe namarimu angu-16 inch.
Yiyo futhi engenawo amalambu angamaLED kanjalo namafog lamps.Ngaphakathi yakhiwe yaqina bese iba nesikhala esikhulu sokuhlala abagibeli nempahla.
Isikhala sebhuthi singu-309 litres kodwa uyakwazi ukusandisa ngokulalisa izihlalo sigcine sesingu-1 210l.Ngaphambili inezinye izikhala zokubeka izinto neziphuzo.
IComfort inomsakazo onescreen esingu-5"bese ezinye izinhlobo zibe ne-9 inch touchscreen infotainment system ebukeka kahle.
Yilapho udlala khona umsakazo, ubone ingemuva uma uhlehla uphinde ukwazi ukuxhuma iselula nge-Android Auto noma i-Apple CarPlay (ngaphandle kwentambo).I-instrument cluster ishintshile isidigital futhi ingu-7 inch.
Isiteringi sinamabhathini okulawula umsakazo, cruise control (adaptive cruise control kwezinye izinhlobo).Ngaphansi kwebhonethi kunezinhlobo ezimbili zezinjini.
Eyokuqala ngekaphethroli engu-1.5 litre enamandla angu-89kW netorque engu-145Nm.
Isebenzisa ugearbox ozishintshayo oyiCVT.
Ngo-100km bathi idla amalitha kaphethroli angu-5.5.Eyesibili ngeyihybrid okuyinjini kagesi ehlanganiswe nekaphethroli engu-1.5 lire.
Bathi ayinawo ugearbox kodwa izishintsha buthule.
Amandla ayo angu-80kW netorque engu-253.
Uma ihamba injini kaphethroli ishaja ibhethri kanti ngo-100km/h bathi idla amalitha angu-3.7.Ngesikhathi yethulwa le moto eKapa ngoLwesithathu engikuqaphelile kuzo zombili ukuthi zihamba ngendlela ecishe ifane kodwa umehluko omkhulu wukuthula kweyihybrid nokuthi iyonga kuphethroli.
Injalo nje ihybrid ibuye ibe nezinto ezithe xaxa njenge-adaptive cruise control, iyakusiza ukuhlala emzileni ngokuzijikisa isiteringi futhi iyazikhanyisa ibuye izicishe amalambu uma kunemoto eqhamukayo.Zombili kodwa zithule ngaphakathi umsindo ziwubanga uma unyathela ngamandla futhi endaweni enyukelayo.Zintonfontofo kangangokuthi ngisho uhamba ngo-120km/h awuzwa uze ubone uma ujeqeza ijubane.Kwezokuphepha zineVehicle Stability Assist, Brake Assist System, Hill Start Assist ne-Automatic Brake Hold.Izinga linyuke kakhulu kwiFit futhi yimoto okumele uyiqalaze uma usemakethe.IntengoFIT 1.5 DOHC i-VTEC Comfort CVT - R319 900FIT 1.5 DOHC i-VTEC Elegance CVT - R359 900FIT 1.5 DOHC i-VTEC Executive CVT - R389 900FIT 1.5 DOHC i-MMD e-CVT Hybrid - R469 900Ziphuma neservice plan yeminyaka emine noma ephela uma usuhambe ibanga eliwu-60 000km, iwarranty yeminyaka emihlanu noma ephela ngemuva kuka-200 000km ne-AA Roadside Assistance yeminyaka emithathu.
IFit Hybrid yona inewarranty yeminyaka eyisishiyagalombili noma u-200 000km.
Amathiphu okushayela uma kuphele ugesi
ISIKHULU seMasterDrive, u-Eugene Herbert, sithi abantu kumele behlise umoya uma beshayela ezindaweni ezinesiminyaminya esidalwa wukunqamuka kukagesi okuhleliwe.U-Herbert uthe abantu kumele bazazi izikhathi okuzonqanyulwa ngazo ugesi ezindaweni abahlala kuzo.
"Yize kucasula kodwa kumele sikwamukele ukuthi ukunqamuka kukagesi okuhleliwe yinto ekhona.
Ngena emotweni uzilungele izingqinamba lokhu okuzidalayo bese uzama ukumelana nazo ngendlela ephephile.
Uma uvumela ukubuswa ukucasuka ushayela, isimo siba yingozi.
"Uthe nanka amathiphu angasiza abashayeli:- Zama ukugwema izindlela okunqanyulwa kuzo ugesi ngesikhathi ohamba ngaso.- Zinikeze isikhathi esithe xaxa sokuhamba ukuze ungabi nengcindezi uma ushayela.- Ungashayeli ngale komugqa ophuzi esiminyaminyeni.
Lokhu kwenza isimo sibe bucayi futhi kube yingozi ukubuyela emgwaqweni nokuyinto engacasula nabanye abashayeli.- Yize izimpambano zomgwaqo kumele zithathwe njenge four-way stop kodwa lokhu akwenzeki nokuphoqa ukuthi kubaluleke ukuhlolisisa ngaphambi kokunqamula.- Uma bona kunzima ukwehlisa umoya esiminyaminyeni, thola izindlela ezizokusiza ukwehlisa umoya njengokudlala umculo ngaphambi kokuhamba.- Lalela abantu abalawula izimoto emgwaqeni futhi ubahloniphe.- Uma kukhona umshayeli oshayela kabi, kungcono umzibe umdlulise kunokucasuka.
Qasha umakhi obhaliswe kwiNHBRC ugweme izinkinga
UKUBA nomuzi kuyisifiso sabantu abaningi nokwenza umuntu engabe esacabangisisa uma ethola indawo yokwakha agxume ahlale.Izindawo eziningi ezingomazakhele zivamise ukuba nenqwaba yomakhi futhi kuyinto ejwayelekile emalokishini nasezindaweni zasemakhaya ukuthatha noma ngubani odume ngokwakha.Kokunye lokhu kuhambisana nezinkinga zokungapheli kwendlu, ukuwa kodonga noma indlu ingabi yilokhu obekulindelekile.
Izizathu zalokhu zihambisana nezinto eziningi njengokungabi nalwazi olwanele kumakhi agcine efuna ukwenza nezinto angazifundelanga nangagunyaziwe ukuzenza.
Inhlangano kahulumeni ebhekele umsebenzi wokwakha ngokusemthethweni eNingizimu Afrika iNational Home Builders Registration Council (NHBRC)  ithi kuyiphutha ukwakhelwa umuntu ongabhalisiwe kule nhlangano.UNkk Noxolo Mnculwane weNHBRC KwaZulu-Natal uthe uma uqasha umakhi qinisekisa ukuthi ubhalisiwe, indlu yakho uyayibhalisela nepulani yayo ukuze ithole isitifiketi esizokusiza uma usufuna ukuyidayisa.
“Lokhu kuzokusiza ngisho umakhi esebaleka noma engayakhi kahle indlu.
Sikhona ukuvikela amakhasimende, siqinisekise ukuthi nomakhi baqeqeshiwe futhi bayayilandela imithetho yokwakha.
Noma ngabe uqasha inkampani noma umuntu oyedwa akube obhalisiwe ngoba usuke sewuqinisekisiwe nomsebenzi wakhe, nawe indlu yakho izohlolisiswa ukuthi uzoyakha ngendlela yini kusukela iqalwa ize iyophela,” kusho uNkk Mnculwane.Ephetha uthe uma bethola ukuthi inkampani inabasebenzi abaxegayo kwamanye amakhono bayabasiza mahhala babaqeqeshe, namakhasimende asizwa mahhala ukuthola uhlu lomakhi abagunyaziwe.ISekela Sihlalo leNdlu yabaHoli beNdabuko KwaZulu-Natal inkosi uThabisile Zulu lithe umhlaba wamakhosi awudayisi kukhokhwa imali ebizwa ngemali yokukhonza ehlukana ngezindawo.Kodwa uma abantu ababili bevumelana ngokudayiselana umhlaba kunezigaba okumele bazilandele.“Kuyenzeka umuntu adayise inxiwa lakubo, lokho kumele kwaziwe komkhulu.
Kuzobe sekucishwa umuzi omdala kubhaliswe kabusha umndeni omusha, nawo kumele ukhokhe imali yokukhonza bese ungena emabhukwini uthole nerisidi ephuma eMnyangweni wokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu.
Sikhuthaza nesivumelwano sasemaphoyiseni umdayisi afike nesakhe nothengayo ngokunjalo ukuze kusale enkosini ubufakazi bokuthi badayiselene,” kusho inkosi uZulu.Okunye akucacisile ukuthi imali ekhokhwa komkhulu ayilingani kumuntu wendawo nomuntu osuka kwelinye idolobha ezokwakha kuleyo ndawo ngezizathu ezehlukene.
Ukuthola incwadi yakomkhulu enesigxivizo soMnyango nezoMdabu kusho ukuthi umuzi wakho usungawakha ngendlela oyithandayo ubaliwe endaweni futhi uyingxenye yemizi efanele ukuthola intuthuko noma ngabe uyafika.
USihlalo wekomiti lezokuHlaliswa kwabantu kuMasipala weTheku uMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo uthe ukuthenga indawo kuwumqondo omuhle kodwa kunephutha elincane elenziwa abantu abangazi noma indawo ekamasipala noma ingaphansi kwamakhosi.
Izindawo eziningi ezisathuthuka nezisemakhaya uthe kungabukeka kulula ukwakha kuzona kodwa kuyenzeka indawo ibe ngekamasipala kodwa isendaweni yenkosi.“Into yokuqala uma uthenga indawo ngaphambi kokukhokha, thola kumasipala wangakini ukuthi ngabe ingaphansi kwamakhosi noma ekamasipala.
Uma kungekamasipala wayithenga wakha, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kungaba nenkinga ngoba indawo isuke ibekelwe isakhiwo esithile noma kungafanele kwakhiwe kuyo ngezizathu eziningi.
Kuyenzeka kwezinye izindawo kube namanzi ngaphansi noma amapayipi amakhulu angaba yingozi,” kusho uSabelo.
Eqhuba uthe nokulethwa kwengqalasizinda kuhambisana nemibandela.“Ukulethwa kwengqalasizinda akukhethi izindawo kodwa nakhona uma indawo owakhe kuyona ingakuvumeli ukufakwa kwamanzi nogesi noma umgwaqo ngenxa yomhlaba owakhe kuwo ngeke kwaba lula.
Inkosi nomasipala yinto yokuqala abayibhekayo ngaphambi kokuthi ukhokhe kumuntu okudayiselayo.
Ezinye izindawo kuyenzeka ukuthi zisenenkinga yokuthi kunombango phakathi kwamakhosi nomasipala.
Ngeke ukwazi ukuthenga kuzo,” kusho uSabelo.

Kufunwa indlela yokuvikela owesifazane kwiHIV
ABESIFAZANE yibo abatheleleka kakhulu ngegciwane lesandulela ngculazi besebancane, uma beqhathaniswa nabesilisa abalingana nabo.
Kodwa lokhu kakusho ukuthi yindlela abaziphatha ngayo ngoba yehlukile kuneyabesilisa.Lokhu kushiwo uDkt Nkosilesisa Mpofu osebenzakwi-United Nations Disease Control Centre eseNingizimu Afrika, echaza ngezizathu eziholela abantu besifazane basuleleke kakhulu ngengculazi.Uthe abantu besifazane kabakwazi ukukhuluma nophathina babo mayelana nokuthi kusetshenziswe ikhondomu ngoba abanye basuke bencike kubo ngokwemali, bese kuba nzima ukuthi bakhulume ngokukhululeka ngoba besaba ukushiywa.Uthe amantombazane amancane ajwayele ukuthandana nabantu abadala kunawo ngoba edinga ukwesekwa ngokwemali.
Uqhube wathi yilokhu okuwabeka engcupheni yokungenwa yingculazi ngoba ayehluleka ukukhuluma ngezindlela eziphephile zokuya ocancini namadoda amadala.“Kwesinye isikhathi amantombazane yiwo asuke efuna ukuthandana nabantu abadala ngenxa yokuthi azalwa emindenini eswele.
Asuke azi ukuthi amadoda athandana nawo anabesifazane abaningi athandana nawo kodwa engenayo inkinga yalokho ngoba ayazuza.”Uthe kakusho ukuthi abafana kabakwenzi okwenziwa ngamantombazane.
Kodwa bona babuye bavikelwe yindlela imizimba yabo eyakheke ngayo.“Ubuntu bendoda kabukhongozeli.
Uma esokile kwehlisa amathuba okuthi angenwe yigciwane.
Intombazane eqalayo ukuyaocansini iba sengozini enkulu yokuthola igciwane ngenxa yokwakheka kwesitho somzimba wayo.“Amantombazane yiwo okuvamise ukuthi ashade esemancane, bese elahlekelwa yithuba lokufunda, ancike emadodeni ngokwemali nakho lokho kunomthelela.”USolwazi Sinead Delany-Moretlwe oyi-Associate Professor and Director wesikhungo esicwaninga ngegciwane lengculazi eWits Reproductive Health and HIV Institute, ukholwa wukuthi kudingeka ubuchwepheshe bokuvikela owesifazane ezifweni zocansi buphinde bumvikele ekutheni akhulelwe.Uthe lokhu ukusho ngoba amantombazane aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 kuya ku-24 yiwo asengozini yokuthola igciwane kuleli njengoba izibalo zikhombisa ukuthi angu-1 745 amantombazane angenwa yigciwane njalo ngesonto.
Isendleleni iVW Amarok entsha
SIYASONDELA isikhathi okuzokwethulwa ngaso iVW Amarok entsha ezokwakhiwa eNingizimu Afrika okokuqala ngqa kusukela ngonyaka ozayo.I-Amarok yaqala ukudayiswa ngo-2010 njengoba isishintshwa nje.
Entsha izokwakhiwa ngokubambisana nabakwaFord nokuyilapho izokhiqizwa efemini yakwaFord eSilverton, ePitoli.
Izokwakhiwa endaweni efanayo neFord Ranger futhi zombili kulindeleke ukuthi ziqale ukudayisa ngo-2022.Ngesonto eledlule ngesikhathi kunomncintiswano iSpirit of Amarok Media Challenge esinye sezikhulu zakwaVW eNingizimu Afrika sifanise umncintiswano njengendlela yokuvalelisa i-Amarok ekhona emakethe.ISpirit of Amarok umncintiswano owaqalwa ngowayengumpetha wezimoto zomjaho uSarel van der Merwe ngo-2004.Wasungulwa ngenhloso yokuthi abantu bathole ithuba lokuvivinya amava abo okushayela ama-4x4.
Ngesikhathi kwethulwa iVW Amarok eNingizimu Afrika ngo-2010, ibe ngabaxhasi bayo kwase kusetshenziswa yona.Kulokhu bekusetshenziswa ama-Amarok ango-3.0 litre V6 anamandla angu-190kW netorque engu-580Nm.Ngonyaka odlule awubanga khona ngenxa yokubhebhetheka kwegciwane iCoronavirus.Emncintiswaneni, uSarel uhlela izingqinamba ezahlukene ukuvivinya ubuchule bokushayela ama-4x4.
Kukhona isigaba sokuchusha emapalini ube uqwala intaba ukalelwe isikhathi nokuthi uma uthinte ipali ulahlekelwe ngamaphuzu.
Uma uqede ngokushesha noma sekwedlule isikhathi ulahlekelwa ngamaphuzu.Ngaphandle kokuchusha emapalini uqwala izintaba ematsheni nasesihlabathini, bekuphinde kuncintiswane ngokushayela uhlehla uchusha emapalini, ukushayela ngesivinini obhuqwini, ukushayela ngesivinini nincintisana nezinye izimoto nokunye.I-Amarok ikhombise ukuba yisiqwalantaba esingenankinga ngenxa yokuphakama kwayo, ukudonsa ngawo womane amasondo, yidiff lock nebhathini lika-Offroad elenza ukuthi uma yehla entabeni izibambele yona amabhreki.Ngesikhathi kuncintisana abezindaba abangu-16 bezinkampani ezehlukene eNingizimu Afrika, kuthe sekuhlanganiswa amaphuzu ngemuva kwemizuliswano engu-13 ethathe usuku lonke, kwanqoba umbhali walolu daba noSibonelo Myeni owethula ingosi yezimoto kuKhozi FM

KUYAJABULISA ukuthenga imoto ngoba usuke ufeza elinye lamaphupho akho.
Kuleyo njabulo, kubalulekile ukuqinisekisa ukuthi konke okusayinayo uyakuqondisisa nemigomo yenkontileka uyayazi, futhi uyayamukela.Ezinye zezinto ezibalulekile ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imoto oyithenge ngokugcwele noma osayikhokhela inawo umshwalense.Isimo somnotho asisihle kahle lokho kwenza abathengi abakhokhela izimoto bathwale nzima.Ongoti bathi yize kunjalo, akuwona umqondo omuhle ukuhoxisa umshwalense wemoto yakho ngoba uthi uzama ukonga imali.Uma uqhathanisa ukonga imali ngokungakhokheli umshwalense nenkinga ongabhekana nayo uma imoto osayikhokhela iba sengozini ingenawo umshwalense, kuyabonakala ukuthi ukungabi nomshwalene kuyingozi.Izazi zithi kuhle ukhumbule ukuthi uma imoto yakho usayikhokhela, inkontileka yakho nebhange ikubeka ngokusobala ukuthi ngazo zonke izikhathi kumele imoto ibe nomshwalense ogcwele (comprehensive), uze uqede ukukhokhela isikweletu sebhange.Uma ungenawo umshwalense, amabhange amaningi ayakwazi ukukusiza ngokukunika umshwalense wesikhashana okusiza wonge.Ukwehlisa amanani owakhokha ngenyanga, lo mshwalense awubi nayo I -3rd Party Liability okusho ukuthi ubhekelela imoto yakho kuphela.I-3rd Party Liability ibhekelela impahla noma imoto elinyazwa yimoto yakho uma uba sengozini futhi kunguwena osephutheni.Uma ingekho bese uba sengozini kunguwena osephutheni, umnikazi wemoto kumele akhokhele ukulungiswa kwemoto noma impahla elimele ngesikhathi sengozi.I-3rd Party Liability ingcono kunokungabi nhlobo nomshwalense.
Okunye futhi okwenzekayo ukunyusa imali ye-excess okujwayele ukwehlisa inani lemali yestolimendesomshwalense.
Kumele uyikhokhe ngokugcwele i-excess uma ulungisa emva kokuba sengozini.Uma ungenawo nhlobo umshwalense emotweni esakhokha ebhange, njengomnikazi ibhange likuphoqa ukuthi uyikhokhele ngisho ingasekho (uma intshontshiwe) noma ingeke isalungiseka (uma isengozini).Kubalulekile ukuthi uthintane ngokushesha nebhange lakho uma usuba nenkinga yokukhokhela umshwalense.Uma kuba yibhange elikubambayo ukuthi umshwalense awunawo emotweni yakho, banalo ilungelo lokuyiqeda inkontileka yakho yokukhokhela imoto bayiphindisele emumva.
Nalapho bayidayisa esidlangalaleni okuthi uma idayiswe ngemali engaphansi kwaleyo oyikweletayo, bakuphoqe ukuthi uyikhokhele size siphele isikweletu.Qinisekisa ukuthi imoto yakho ihlale inomshwalense ngisho usuqedile ukuyikhokhela.

Sesinyukele ku8005 isibalo sabantu asebebulewe yiCovid-19 kuleli
IZOLO kulalwe sekushone abantu abangu8005 eNingizimu Afrika futhi sekuhaqeke abantu abangu493 183 yiCovid-19.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke, uDkt Zweli Mkhize, ngoLwesihlanu uqinisekise ukuthi bawu193 abantu bakuleli ababulawe yizifo ezihlobene neCovid-19 emahoreni engu24 eyedlule.
"Bayisishiyagalombili abase-Eastern Cape, bangu103  abaseGauteng, bangu36 abaKwaZulu-Natal, 33 baseWestern Cape nabangu13 abaseMpumalanga.

Ngokwezibalo eziqinisekiswe wuMnyango wezeMpilo, iGauteng neKwaZulu-Natal baphinde bazihola phambili ngokuba nesibalo esiningi sabantu asebehaqwe yigciwane leCorona emahoreni engu24.

Uyazigqaja ngamabheshu esimanjemanje
UKHULE ebukela uyise enza amabheshu uMnuz Nkazimulo Ngidi (37) onenkampani ekhiqiza amabheshu esimanje ebizwa ngokuthi Amabheshu Innovators.UNgidi waKwaSonkombe eNdwendwe, uvamise ukukhangisa Amabheshu akhe nemvunulo yesintu kwiDurban Business Fair.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi ukhule ebuka uyise enza amabheshu futhi uyise ubesebenzela eDalton, eThekwini.“Ubaba nguyena owathi angingene kulo mkhakha ngoba bengithanda ukwenza imvunulo yesintu.
Ngifike nokuhlukile ngoba ibheshu engilakhayo liyawasheka, alidingi ukuphalwa ngesandla noma uke wanethwa.
"Ngivule inkampani yami Amabheshu Innovators ngo-2013.
Kuhamba kahle futhi ayathengwa amabheshu ethu nemvunulo yabesifazane,” kusho uNgidi.Uthe amabheshu akhe enziwa ngomshini, okwenza ahluke kulawa ajwayelekile wukuthi isikhumba sishukwe kahle futhi asishwabani noma singanethwa lihlale libukeka kahle ibheshu.Imvunulo yabesifazane uthe yenziwa ngabesifazane asebenzisana nabo baseNdwedwe, wathi kufanele aqinisekise ukuthi udala amathuba omsebenzi kwabanye.Ngonyaka odlule uNgidi uwine umklomelo webhizinisi elincane elenza kahle embukisweni, iDurban Business Fair.Kulo nyaka uthe iCovid-19 imphazamisile emsebenzini wakhe, waze waphoqeleka ukuthi amise abasebenzi kuze kube isimo sibuyela kwesijwayelekile.Uveze ukuthi usebenzisana nophiko olweseka amabhizinisi kuMasipala weTheku neProject Preparation Trust (PPT) KZN okuyinhlangano esiza osomabhizinisi abancane ukuthi bakhule, badale nemisebenzi.
Uthi iPPT imsiza ngokukhangisa ibhizinisi nokumenzela i-website.Uthe abafisa ukwazi ngemikhiqizo bangabheka ikhasi lakhe leFacebook elithi Amabheshu Innovators -Pty Ltd.UMnuz Mphathi Ndlela obhekelele ezokukhangisa e-Amabheshu Innovators uthe kubalulekile ukukhangisa ngoba abantu babezitshela ukuthi amabheshu nemvunulo yinto yabantu abadala kodwa manje abantu abasha yibona abathenga kakhulu.
Ukudla okulekelela amasosha omzimba.
UKUDLA ngendlela efanele nezokusiza uthole umsoco oqinisa amasosha omzimba kulezi zikhathi ezinzima zeCovid19, yinto eshunyayelwayo.Kodwa kubafundi abazobhala izivivinyo zokuphela konyaka, lokhu kubaluleke ukwedlula zonke izikhathi.Nakothisha imbala, lesi akusona isikhathi sokuvuka udle noma yini engeke iwusize umzimba wakho, ukuthi ubhekane nengcindezi ekhona yokwesaba ukuhaqwa yilo mkhuhlane.
Kunjalo nje, kumele ubhekane nokweluleka futhi nokududuza umfundi onengcindezi yokubhala izivivinyo zokuphela konyaka.Ongoti abeluleka ngezindlela ezifanele zokudla bathi, akumele umfundi noma uthisha bahambe, bengasidlile isidlo sasekuseni.
Baxwayisa ngokudla umfudumezo ekuseni, bathi kumele kube yisidlo esinomsoco esizosiza umuntu ukuthi ababhekane nezinselelo zosuku.
Abeluleki bathi kumele umfundi noma uthisha baqikelele ukuthi bayawuthola uvithamini C. Okuhle wukuthi akudingeki ukudla kube wuhlobo olumba eqolo kodwa okuningi ungakuthola ekhaya nokuphekwa zonke izinsuku.
Odokotela kwezokondleka komzimba baluleka ukuthi kudliwe imifino nezithelo ngisho wenza isikhafitini sengane, kumele ungakushiyi ngoba umzimba uyakudinga.Ukudla okune-zinc njengofishi, ubhontshisi, amakinati, inyama ebomvu nezinye izinhlobo zezinhlanzi kuyasiza.
Amakinati ohlobo lwe- almond abalulekile kakhulu, futhi umuntu angawadla nesidlo sasekuseni noma uma ehalela ukudla okusheshayo ukuze athole izakhamzimba.
Ukudla izithelo nemifino kusiza umuntu athole amavithamini okuwu-A (fishi), C (amawolintshi namanatshi) no-E otholakala (imifino namakinati)Iziphuzo-Phuza izingilazi zamanzi eziyisishiyagalombili kuya kwezingu-10 ngosuku.
Lokhu kukusiza ngokuthumela imisoco lapho kumele ifinyelele khona nokhuculula ukungcola egazini, nakwezinye izingxenye zomzimba ezibalulekile.Ukuphuza amanzi akusho ukuthi ungakuphuzi okunye, ungaphuza kancane ujusi noma esiny isiphuzo.Abezempilo batusa ujusi oxutshe ngemifino, izithelo namanzi.
Uma ungumuntu okhonze itiye, qaphela ungasebenzisi ushukela kakhulu okungenani faka uju, bese ugada nesikalo secaffeine singabi siningi.Uma ingane yakho ithatha imishanguzo yesifo esithile, ungalenzi iphutha yiphuzise noma uyikhumbuze uma seyindala iziphuzisa.Kuyasiza nokwazisa uthisha wayo ukuze naye akulekelele ukuyikhumbuza uma kumele iwaphuze nasemini isesesikoleni.UGinger nolamula-Ingxubevange kalamula noginger isabalulekil ngoba nayo ithi ayisebenze njengamanzi kodwa futhi iphinde ikulekelele ekulweni nomkhuhlane nokugula okungakuhlasela kalula.Usawoti noshukela-Qikelela isikalo sokudla okunosawoti noshukela, okungenani usawoti owudla ngosuku awube ngaphansi kuka-5g okuyinto elingana nethisipuna.
Iziphuzo ezinoshukela, oswidi namakhekhe nakho kuyingozi okungenani uma ukuhalela zama ukudla izithelo.Kwabanezingane ezifunda amazinga aphansi, kubalulekile ukuzithengela ama vithamini asaswidi nalawo okuthi uma ziwaphuza anambitheke sajusi.Lokhu kuzokusiza ekutheni zikujabulele ukuwasebenzisa ngoba zichazwa nawukunambitheka kwawo.
IVolvo izodayisa izimoto ezihamba ngogesi kuphela
IVOLVO imemezele ukuthi zonke izimoto zayo zizobe zihamba ngogesi kuphela ngo-2030.Le nkampani yaseSweden ithe ngo-2025 uhhafu wezimoto ezidayisayo kuzobe kuyizimoto ezihamba ngogesi kuphela kuthi omunye kube ngezihamba ngophethroli nebhethri ama hybrid.Isikhulu sakwaVolvo uHakan Samuelsson sithe sikhlwa ukuthi alikho ikhasimene elizobe lifuna ukuhamba ngemoto kaphethroli futhi izimoto zikagesi yizona ezizobe ziheha kakhulu.Le nkampani ephehthwe yiZhejiang Geely Holding Group ithe eminyakeni ezayo izokwethula izimoto zayo ezintsha ezihamba ngogesi nezizodayiswa online.Ithe amagaraji ayo angu-2 400 emhlabeni jikelele azoqhubeka nokuba khona ukusevisa izimoto nokusiza amakhasimende uma ethenga online.IVolvo yethule imoto entsha ehamba ngogesi iC40 Recharge eyelama iXC40 Recharge.
Ifika nama nezinjini zebhethri ezimbili ngemuva nangaphambili ezinebhethri elingu-78kWh.
Uma ulishaja ngeshaja ye fast-charge lifika ku-80% ngemizuzu engu-40 futhi ikwazi ukuhamba ibanga elilinganiselwa ku-420km.Le moto ngeke ize idayise egaraji kodwa izotholakala online kuphela.Isikhulu sakwaVolvo Car South Africa uGreg Maruszewski sithe bazoletha iXC40 Recharge kuleli futhi bazoqinisekisa maduze ukuthi iza nini.
"Yize izinhlelo zokwethula iVolvo C40 Recharge eNingizimu Afrika zingakaqinisekiswa kodwa ngiyajabula ukusho ukuthi sizoletha iXC40 Recharge, imoto yethu yokuqala kagesi kuleli zwe kulo nyaka.
Yigxathu elibalulekile ezinhlelweni zethu," kusho uMaruszewski.
